TEXT: You Rams excel at initiating new activities rather than finishing them, making this your kind of day. You look forward to the future with great anticipation, especially since an optimistic Jupiter-Mars opposition gives you an energetic boost. Although so much cosmic encouragement makes it difficult to cut back your busy schedule, be careful that you don't exhaust yourself. Fortunately, with just a little bit of forethought, you can still have a fantastic time while pacing yourself for the long haul.

Your potential to accomplish a lot around your home is great today, but you're not interested in the stress that too much activity brings. You might even wish you could retreat into your shell and let all the noise pass you by. Nevertheless, the holiday celebrations may be hard to ignore. Even if your dreamy day of solitude doesn't materialize, you can still find time to relax. Although the planets inspire you to act boldly, make sure to reserve some energy and resources for the days ahead.

Finding balance in your life can be tricky because your current tendency is to push your limits too far. You want to squeeze the most out of every minute of the day and are not willing to accept anything less. One problem with this kind of extreme thinking is that you could set yourself up for a big disappointment. Instead of looking at each event as an all-or-nothing proposition, remind yourself to keep things in proper perspective. Accepting reality as it is frees you from having to turn every moment into an extraordinary experience. Finding joy in the simple things makes your heart happy.

Although your first impulse may be to decline an invitation today, hanging out with supportive friends is healthy for your self-esteem. Sharing in the fun with your favorite people is heartwarming, but there's no need to overindulge with food, drink or gifts. Concerns about your finances might seem far away for the moment, but finding pleasure is not dependent on spending money. Surrounding yourself with loved ones is a surefire way to recharge your soul.

Your I-can-do-it attitude is currently on overdrive, making nearly everything sound possible. But this isn't a great time for speculation, especially if the outcome looks too good to be true. You aren't usually one to let the random ideas of others pull you too far off your planned course of action. Nevertheless, you may need to do a bit of back-pedaling in the days ahead unless you exercise caution now. Explore all options with an open mind today, but do your homework before saying yes.

Too much and too fast are not your style. You prefer to reduce complex situations into manageable pieces through logical analysis. However, you could overreact today and fall into obsessively worrying about the wrong things. No matter how challenging it is to believe that the outcome can match your idealistic expectations, forget about being rational for once and take a risk. You'll never know what could happen unless you spread your wings and fly.

Relationships have recently shown you a path of personal growth that is pushing you beyond your old comfort zone. Life is exhilarating today because the horizons of your social world are broadening and exposing you to new experiences. However, the uncertainty of the unknown doesn't make you feel safe. Nevertheless, it's not time to pull back out of fear. Imagine how you could interact with loved ones if you actually believed that anything is possible. Now, act in according with this new vision and see what the future brings.

Maintaining stability in your relationships keeps you on your toes now. Your feelings are soaring and then something happens to bring them crashing back down to earth. It isn't fun to vacillate between such extremes. However, you can see the absolute best in any situation today and yet still maintain a realistic perspective. Contemplate your future goals without feeling obligated to make any lasting decisions. Extending your imagination into the unobstructed blue sky is a breathtaking experience if you're willing to keep your heart open, no matter what.

Ripples of excitement build into waves of anticipation with the new year stretching out in front of you like an uncharted ocean. You're ready to set sail, eager to engage your future while courageous Mars heats up adventurous Jupiter. But no matter how amazing everything appears, it's time for a reality check; if it's overdue, there could be some disappointment on the horizon. However, if you have paid attention to the facts along the way, you could be very close to reaching an important goal. Keep your eye on the prize and your shoulder to the wheel.

Your sense of who you are or what you have to offer others may be overblown now, but this distortion isn't necessarily a bad thing. In fact, your heightened self-esteem might be the catalyst that finally motivates you to take a calculated risk in a relationship. Ask for what you need; whatever you want is reasonable as long as you aren't too greedy. Just be sure to generously give back in return to make this a fair trade.

You are running on a full tank of gas today, but oddly enough, you're burning through your fuel faster than ever. Your confidence is so high that you could overestimate your resources or you might even think your friends and relatives possess superpowers. However, this inflated view can lead you down a path to disillusionment when you realize the limitations of being human. Reel in your blind optimism while you still can; life is awesome enough without embellishing it further.

Your happiness is integrally entwined with your productivity now, so you might find chores to do in order to increase your sense of satisfaction. Fortunately, you can talk yourself down from your high expectations; it's a holiday and it may not be convenient to undertake something you cannot finish. In fact, you could get more peace of mind from completing a minor task today than starting a major project. It's wonderful to feel so alive; just remember you don't have to push the edges of the envelope in order to have a fabulous day.

You might be incredibly busy today, even if you don't get very much accomplished. You're more interested in pursuing a sparkly new person or a fresh idea than you are in finishing your work. Unfortunately, this kind of irresponsible attitude can stir up the ire of a coworker who wants you to hold up your end of the deal. Avoid causing unnecessary trouble now by fulfilling your promises before doing anything else. Exercising self-discipline early in the day gives you the chance to embark on an intellectual exploration later on.

You are torn between opposing forces today, yet due to a lack of resources you're limited in how you can respond. Accepting an intriguing invitation sounds tempting today, but previous obligations might not give you enough time. You would love to jump at a chance to make more money, but it may not materialize right away. Don't let discouragement bring you down; express your creativity knowing that your efforts will be acknowledged in the future. Keep plugging away for now; your opportunity to shine will come soon enough.

Having too many choices can be a bit overwhelming today, especially if you're trying to follow through on unfinished tasks that are left over from before the holidays. Nevertheless, the Moon's current visit to your inquisitive sign is exciting because you can't help but see wonderful opportunities everywhere you look. There's no reason to be too hard on yourself if you aren't able to concentrate on your work. Just make certain that you come back to it later so you don't let anyone down while you chase your dreams.

Taking defensive action by retreating behind a wall of secrecy won't necessarily make you feel any more secure today. The Moon is hiding out in your 12th House of Privacy, reinforcing your tendency to emotionally withdraw if circumstances become too confusing or intense. However, your smartest strategy is to talk about your concerns. Bringing your feelings out into the open now saves you from having to fall into your fantasies in order to feel safe. Surprisingly, reality could be better than your dreams.

Although there may be pressure on you to follow through on your professional commitments, you prefer to be socializing with your friends or associates today. Unfortunately, you could easily forget to return to your chores if you choose to play in the middle of the day. Instead of avoiding responsibilities by jumping from one distraction to another, focus solely on one thing at a time. The company of others will seem more pleasurable when you can truly relax and enjoy it with a clear conscience.

You're at a fork in the road and have choices to make now that could significantly impact the trajectory of your career. You can see the pros and cons of both paths; nevertheless, you must choose based on what you know today, rather than what might happen in the future. Your dreams are inspirational, but it's wise to be practical and pay attention to the facts. Nevertheless, don't hesitate for long; trust your instincts to steer you in the right direction.

Your current perspective is not limited by social convention now, yet stepping out of the box may lead you onto an unfamiliar path. Unfortunately, placing too much importance on your impractical ideas can be disorienting if you don't ground your radical plans with reality. However, it's better to give your mind permission to wander rather than attempting to stop your natural creative flow. Just remember that you don't have to act on every whim or share every thought. Exploring your imagination enables you to visit other worlds as you please.

You may already have your schedule set in stone but you might have to adapt it to an unexpected change of circumstances, anyway. You won't likely change your mind easily, but your unwillingness to be flexible isn't helpful now. Having to relinquish your plans may seem like a setback, but it could be a true blessing in disguise. This is not about your failure to reach your goals; rather, it's a temporary break in your progress that allows you to recharge your batteries so your energy is there when you need it most.

Relationship dynamics are in the spotlight today and others might be the source of excitement or irritation, depending on the circumstances. More likely, someone is both pleasant and bothersome at the same time. Although you want to enjoy the company, it's difficult to stick to your agenda when other people keep pulling you off track. There isn't a simple solution to this dilemma, but being adaptable enables you to maintain a positive attitude. Your willingness to meet the opposition halfway opens the door to a whole new world of possibilities.

You're uncertain about what's expected of you at work today. Even if you are assigned a specific task, there may be a variety of ways for you to tackle it. The dualistic Gemini Moon's visit to your 6th House of Details can weigh you down with minutiae or tie you up in red tape unless you keep your eyes on your goal. Ultimately, it's more effective to jump in and get busy than to endlessly analyze all the angles. The sooner you begin, the quicker you finish.

You may be fighting a losing battle in your current war against change. It's ironic that you appear to be such a progressive person yet you cling to the status quo like a non-swimmer sticks to the shore. Thankfully, you have recently processed some pretty big lessons about the intuitive power of your strong imagination. Tuning into your dreams can play a significant role in your current drama of transformation.

You may believe that you can give up an old habit now by simply reaffirming your resolution to do so. Although stating your intention is a crucial part of the process, words alone won't do the trick. You must actually alter your behavior to set the new pattern in motion. You're on the threshold of a significant transition, and you might foolishly attempt to make it happen all at once. But even if you experience a sudden breakthrough today, the most enduring changes unfold gradually. Perhaps you feel a sense of urgency, but there's really no hurry at all.

You feel as if you're a salmon swimming upstream in a storm today as the currents of circumstance hinder your progress. Although you're quick to blame others for your predicament, the real struggle originates within you. You might act like an ostrich and bury your head in the sand, pretending that you don't see what's happening. But as you know, denial won't solve anything -- nor will you be able to maintain this posture for long. Instead, be ruthless as you drag your fears out into the light of day. Self-awareness is the key to positive change.

Your thoughts may seem out of your control as they take you for an intense trip through your fears today. Thankfully, you can come out the other side with a complete change of heart. Although this metaphysical journey isn't light and breezy since it doesn't offer any guarantee of success, it will be exciting, nonetheless. There's no reason to succumb to negativity or doubt. Take time to assess your strengths and weaknesses so you can prepare for the future with an open mind and a sustainable plan.

The most beautiful emotional treasures are hidden deep under the apparent calm today. Typically, your curiosity motivates you to quickly move on to what's next, but now an irrepressible compulsion to understand your feelings inspires you to explore beneath the surface. However, you may become so obsessed with the potential rewards that you reach too far. Lighten up; the current situation will continue to evolve at a healthy pace once you realize you don't have to push so hard.

You are giving birth to a whole new way of relating to friends and family now, but this emotional process comes with its own share of stress. In order to reinvent yourself you may need to confront someone's control issues, especially if your recent growth spurt appears to threaten the status quo. However, you might be the one who is stuck -- and you don't appreciate anyone meddling in your affairs. There's no need to hold onto the past now; it's slipping away from you whether you like it or not. The only constant you can count on is change.

You're ready to blast ahead with your plans today, even if you are receiving mixed signals from everyone else involved. Unfortunately, pushing your agenda won't likely work out in your favor now. You could inadvertently rekindle an unnecessary emotional conflict while blindly speeding toward your goals. Nevertheless, don't be afraid of proceeding on your own if your friends don't share your current passion. Express your fierce independence by being willing to stand out in a crowd.

You're overly concerned with making the disparate pieces fit perfectly now, leading you to plan more than is necessary. Unfortunately, getting lost in the minutiae spoils the fun by taking the spontaneity out of the day. Avoid getting swept up in an unnecessary power struggle, even if you're positive that your solution is the best one. Ease the pressure on current circumstances by consciously choosing acceptance over fear. Stepping away from a direct confrontation creates enough space for the spark of creativity to grow into the fire of self-expression.

Someone's unexpressed feelings might rock your boat today, even if you desperately try to hold steady. Unfortunately, the hidden price of keeping the peace is higher than you realize since jealousy can generate anger and resentment. The potentially negative energy is tricky to control because sharing may be as problematic as keeping quiet. It's healthy to talk about your fears, but don't alienate anyone with unnecessary emotional intensity. Negotiate a workable compromise by stating your case as objectively as possible and then encouraging others to do the same.

There's so much on your plate that you may be secretly tempted to run and hide. Nevertheless, the adrenaline has kicked in and you're committed to do whatever it takes to cross some tasks off your list. Unfortunately, you might disagree with someone who has a radically different idea of how you should spend your time. Today's Sun-Pluto conjunction can turn every interaction into a major drama. Processing your emotions before you respond allows you to maintain control of the flow of events. You are a force to be reckoned with now so channel your intensity into your work.

You are driven to succeed today, but it's helpful to acknowledge that honoring your core values is more important than achieving material satisfaction. You might reconsider a recent decision and want to modify your behavior, but this sudden turn can be complicated if you're already in motion. You didn't get to this point overnight, and you won't be able to change direction in a moment's notice, either. Fortunately, there's no need to panic, so take your time and carefully map out your strategy. You still need a song in mind if you want to march to your own drummer.

Even the most minor issues can quickly blow out of proportion as tempers flare and passions erupt. Today's Sun-Pluto hookup occurs in your sign, making you more susceptible to the emotional intensity in the air. You might be obsessing about determining your plans for the future and you're not willing to take no for an answer. Unfortunately, you could inadvertently invite resistance if you come on too strong. A gentle and persistent approach is more productive than overpowering anyone else with your powerful resolve. The art of persuasion takes a light touch.

You're living in a dreamworld if you think you can stay on schedule today. Others can't help but notice the sparkle in your eyes and the spring in your step now that captivating Venus is in your sign. However, your enthusiasm might be dampened if unexpected events require you to abandon your plans. Don't struggle to keep your agenda intact; just let it fall apart so you can put the pieces back together in a more creative manner. The process of starting something anew must begin with the ending of the previous cycle.

Your vivid visions of the future may run you ragged now, bringing thrills one minute and concerns the next. However, you might realize that your plans are not unfolding as expected today. Rather than accepting defeat, try to see this as a rare opportunity to reinvent yourself in harmony with your hopes and dreams. Let go of past goals that no longer hold any meaning and forget about conforming to other people's expectations. Set new priorities for your life and step boldly into the year ahead. Be true to yourself and don't look back.

Your current dependency on others makes you feel uneasy since you usually take pride in your self-sufficiency. But today's nurturing Cancer Full Moon lands in your 4th House of Security, reminding you how much you need people in your life. You must find a way to balance your love of freedom with your desire for healthy relationships. Play out all the possibilities in the safety of your mind, but don't over-commit in haste just to get what you want in the moment. Your chosen path is not an easy one now, but practicing patience and trusting the process can lead to happiness.

The most trivial conversation today could suddenly turn into a discussion about your most significant aspirations in life. In fact, all subjects are fair game now with the Cancer Full Moon spotlighting your 3rd House of Communication. However, her opposition to the powerful Sun-Pluto combination in your 9th House of Big Ideas requires you to connect your current situation with your larger goals. Talking about your dreams is only a start; investing in sweat equity helps to assure your success.

Finances may present a problem now, unless you stop to handle a sticky situation before it grows out of hand. Fortunately, you can prevent a possible fiscal mess by cutting back on your expenses to bring them more into alignment with your current resources. The cautious Cancer Full Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Money indicates that a little prudence is wise at this time. Don't wait until it's too late; proactive behavior nips the problem in the bud and  brings you a healthy sense of self-empowerment.

You don't like it when someone is overly insistent; you can feel the pressure in your gut and it just makes you want to push back harder or withdraw into your shell. Your emotions are at high tide while today's powerful Full Moon floods your 1st House of Self. But others see through your veneer now even if you try to hide your annoyance. Ultimately, it takes less energy to establish clear boundaries by letting everyone know about your limits right from the start. There's no reason to deny your needs; show up exactly as you are and the respect will follow.

Your imagination is in full bloom now and it's nearly impossible to keep your colorful fantasies from growing out of control. Although the Cancer Full Moon emphasizes your 12th House of Escapism, you can prevent losing touch with reality today by focusing on chores that have been left undone. Thankfully, it's not necessary to do everything at once, even if you are so inclined. Starting small makes the most sense while the Sun is hanging out in your 6th House of Details. Being practical is not as much fun as exploring your daydreams but you'll feel proud of your accomplishments by the end of the day.

You can create something of lasting value today, even if this is a day of rest. The Cancer Full Moon brightens your 11th House of Community, prompting you to enjoy the magic of a spontaneous moment with friends; all you need to do is give yourself permission to have fun. Supervising recreational activities with children may prove to be just as enjoyable for you as it is for them. Although you might think you should be doing more work, some days are emotionally fruitful in intangible ways you cannot measure.

You're torn between taking care of your own personal needs and making sure that others are having a nice time. Of course, you Libras make the most gracious hosts and hostesses, but it might feel like the current situation is an either-or proposition, as if there isn't enough happiness to go around. The Cancer Full Moon in your public 10th House of Responsibility opposes the Capricorn Sun in your private 4th House of Foundations. You cannot play on both sides of the fence today just to avoid conflict. It's not your job to please everyone all the time; break free and follow your bliss.

It really could be a lovely day in the neighborhood if you're willing to stick close to home today. You might just learn something enlightening about yourself or your loved ones by resisting the temptation to leave the nest while the Cancer Moon lights up your 9th House of Faraway Places. Surprisingly, you can make up for your lack of geographical variety by traveling within your imagination and still have an amazing time. Keep your eyes and ears open so that you don't miss the beauty all around you.

Handling criticism isn't easy for anyone, but it can be exceptionally tough on you Archers when your sunny optimism is cast in the shadows of doubt. The Cancer Full Moon shining in your 8th House of Deep Sharing reflects your uncharacteristic emotional intensity. You won't be satisfied today unless you schedule time to sink into the unknown watery realms. Thankfully, you don't have to take this journey alone. Accepting advice from others without letting it shake your confidence empowers you to make constructive changes and then get on with what's next.

You have the capability to effectively tailor your actions to produce specific results today because you can intuitively feel the energy of others. Unfortunately, too much analysis now only gets in your way while the receptive Cancer Full Moon meanders through your 7th House of Relationships. Worrying about how others perceive you is stressful and it's unfeasible to think that you can control all the emotional variables at this time. Find a flow and just roll with it for a change.

Although some of your craziest fantasies have practical applications now, it may require a fair amount of patience to figure out how best to realize your dreams. No matter how far out your imagination takes you today, the Cancer Full Moon's presence in your 6th House of Self-Improvement allows the thoughts to unfold without negative judgment. The best part of the plot is that you can pick and choose which ideas have the most potential for future manifestation. Happily, you are the writer, director and star of your own movie.

Turning the day into a spiritual retreat seems like an idea that's very close to your heart, yet you're afraid it might disappear with the flash of a frown if you discuss it with someone else. However, you might be quite surprised when your friend or partner responds with a smile and a twinkle in the eye instead of the negativity you expect. Luckily, the Cancer Full Moon fills your 5th House of Self-Expression with light, so take a risk and share your vision. Trust in your heart and let your imagination soar.

A conflict between your head and your heart could drain some of your enthusiasm today. You know what's best for you, but you're pulled in another direction, nonetheless. You often make the smartest choices by spontaneously reacting to the current circumstances, but this time may be an exception. Self-restraint is rewarded; you're better off listening to logic than to your intuition now. Make a rational decision and put your choice into action only after you sort out the facts.

Reevaluating your professional objectives makes perfect sense now that talkative Mercury makes his debut in your 10th House of Career. Sharing your aspirations with your colleagues can help to clear the path to success. But don't overstate your position or you may lose credibility with the very same people you want to impress. Sticking to the truth enables you to gain much-needed support. Offering an enlightened compromise at the right moment could provide immediate relief for everyone involved.

If you run into resistance from an authority figure today, the planetary energies are telling you something you need to know. At first, an unexpected obstacle might appear to prevent you from reaching your goals. But don't give up too soon because stern Saturn is just putting you through your paces to see if you really have your act together. Slow down and listen; you must figure out what you need to learn so you can pass this test with flying colors and move on.

If you are withholding anything from close friends or relatives, consider taking this opportunity to clear the air. Although the moody Moon's current visit to your sign might tempt you to remain quiet, other cosmic forces are encouraging you to share what's on your mind. Just don't turn your disclosure into a struggle for control; express your feelings without arguing about who is right and who is wrong. Taking full responsibility for your emotions relieves the pressure all the way around. It's time to be part of the solution and not the problem.

Your ability to hide your feelings today may be the key to staying out of trouble. Even your craziest ideas sound completely normal to others because you intuitively know what to filter out of a conversation. Even if your fantasies take you on a wild goose chase, no one else will be the wiser because you appear to have your feet planted on solid ground. Paradoxically, the higher you fly in your mind, the more stable you seem. Dancing in your dreams is fine as long as the music that moves you can be heard on Earth.

Although you need to be around other people today -- friends or coworkers -- you wish you could run away when the energy becomes too intense. It may be nearly impossible to find an easy balance between your desire to enjoy the company of people and your wish to be alone. However, no one needs to know what's going on within the deep recesses of your imagination. You can still escape into your own magical world even in the midst of a crowd.

Even if you're not usually over-protective of those you love, you are inclined to take care of everyone that comes into your sphere of influence now. Of course, you are naturally supportive, but the nurturing Cancer Moon prompts you to overextend your energy today. But be careful that you don't suppress negativity just so others will accept you. Your actions seem more sincere when they come from your heart.

Sometimes taking a vacation sounds like a better idea than it is in reality. However, a sensibly planned trip may be fun now. There's no need to leave right away, but the sooner you begin considering all of your options, the sooner you can turn this dream into something real. If possible, include someone else in your little adventure, since the energy you receive from others at this time will only serve to fuel your enthusiasm and inspire you to make the magic happen at all costs.

Working in close proximity to someone may create annoying tension today. Paradoxically, it's not that you want to work alone; it's just that you prefer to reserve the right to withdraw on a moment's notice when you've had enough of other people's nonsense. Focusing on the most practical aspects of the job at hand will help you keep things in perspective if you start to lose patience. Setting clear priorities enables you to overcome your testy attitude and makes it a breeze to cooperate with your coworkers.

This is a fantastic day to apply your determination toward your professional goals, even if someone seems to hesitate to support your activities. You have the ability to easily transform your ingenious thoughts into decisive actions; if you can think it through now then you can make it happen. Don't allow anyone's doubts to rain on your parade when you have the cosmic forces on your side. Let your ambitions soar; the only one that has to believe in you is you.

You have been in a rather secretive mood recently and today is your chance to come clean. But even if you express what's in your heart, you still might not reveal everything. You can make it sound like you're more open-minded and forthright than you actually are. However, don't waste energy pretending you have nothing to hide because others will know if you're not being real. Total honesty is part of the deal when it comes to cultivating successful relationships.

Your intuition is running on overdrive now that three planets are moving through your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. Although this instinctive method of perceiving the truth is often quite accurate, it can present unexpected problems today. You may have a tough time distinguishing your own feelings from those of people around you. Heightened sensitivity is useful, but only if you're able to see things clearly. Rely only on the facts that are right in front of you; your imagination will serve you well again tomorrow.

You may grow bored with your work today unless you can figure out how to own your vision of the future. The lively Leo Moon activates your 5th House of Self-Expression, encouraging you to share your feelings, even if it means rattling some cages in the process. But putting your plan into motion might require more preparation than you want to invest. Don't let difficult odds stop you; creative thinking enables you to discover the best way to manifest a magical solution.

You might be so caught up in the details today that you can miss an opportunity for fun that's right in front of your nose. You have responsibilities to meet and you don't have the luxury of indulging in frivolous activities. Nevertheless, you can still enjoy yourself by making a simple shift of attitude. The playful Leo Moon inspires you to approach your work as if it were a game. This change of perspective infuses you with a competitive spirit, empowering you to overcome any obstacle standing between you and your goals.

Evasive tactics won't succeed today if someone doesn't support your plan to solve a problem. You might try to talk your way around the issue instead of confronting the difference of opinions directly. Unfortunately, avoidance isn't a very smart strategy since your lighthearted attitude can alienate the same people you want on your side. Just be straightforward right from the start, or you could end up being so clever that you outsmart yourself. A straight line is the shortest distance between two points.

You could be so obstinate when it comes to spending money today that you openly disagree with a caring friend who thinks you should be more frugal. Although this conflict may not be worth an argument, you still need to be careful about downplaying your feelings because you might grow irritated if you remain completely silent. Ultimately, it's best to say what's on your mind now and finish the conversation. Even if you must compromise in the end, it never hurts to think twice before making a big purchase.

There is a dramatic shift in the cosmic energy that motivates you to let others know what you need today. It seems more natural than ever to share your feelings without worrying about the consequences. Nevertheless, you still might have to spend extra time in dialogue with those closest to you to help them understand your process. Don't be overly concerned if someone takes you to task due to his or her convictions. Acknowledging areas of conflict is not a problem as long as you go on to establish common ground.

You can thoroughly enjoy yourself today, even if there doesn't seem to be a lot of social activity in your corner of the world. The Leo Moon's visit to your 12th House of Spirituality allows you to find joy, even in the simplest of pleasures. You don't have to go out of your way to make something special happen. Grab a bit of well-deserved rest and relaxation now while you have the chance. No fretting is required; count your blessings, instead.

Seeking out memorable experiences that can be shared with your friends today sounds like a wonderful idea at first. Unfortunately, you might become so involved with a project that you consider postponing your social plans. Establishing a productive flow can be quite satisfying, but think again before you cancel a previous engagement. Even if it requires a slight push to get out the door, you'll be glad you did once you're in motion. There's a whole wide world of possibilities awaiting you if you're willing to say yes.

You often prefer working behind the scenes, but the proud Leo Moon dancing in your 10th House of Status encourages you to demand the recognition you deserve. You may even be tempted to overdramatize your feelings to ensure that they are heard and acknowledged today. Unfortunately, your overbearing behavior might actually produce results that are opposite to what you desire. Ironically, you won't have to practice self-restraint once you realize that letting go of your ego frees you to reach for the stars.

Your vivid imagination is busy dreaming up future adventures. But your eagerness to fabricate stories is stronger now than your ability to turn them into reality. However, you might discover that you don't have to worry about being so pragmatic to make your fantasies real. Lean on using your common sense by eliminating all but the most practical ideas. Then, allow plenty of time to develop your plans before you initiate action. Thinking in advance maximizes your chances for success.

You strive to work hard, believing that personal satisfaction is yours if your goals are clearly defined. However, you still may be disappointed once you realize that you don't have all of what you want today. But even if your basic needs are  fulfilled, you might still think that something is missing -- yet you haven't a clue as to what it could be. Your frustration can get the best of you unless you truly believe that there's no hurry to find the answer. Take your time; you have a few more weeks to sort it all out.

You might choose to stand up for yourself today if others bully you into taking a different course of action. Don't let anyone get away with assuming power that wasn't earned. If you see a friend or coworker who is misusing authority, be brave and speak up. But don't get hooked into believing that you have to prove anything. Simply getting the truth, as you see it, out into the open helps to shift the dynamics. You can be the hero if you're willing be the first to talk about what everyone else is thinking.

Your job requires a high level of visibility today, even if you don't feel like being on center stage. People can see through your attempts to make it look like you're highly focused now, whether or not your mind is actually wandering. There's no point in trying to hide the obvious. Acknowledge the richness of your current fantasy life while still doing your best to cross tasks off your list one at a time. Spending quality time in both the mundane world and the spiritual realms is your secret to success.

Complications in a relationship probably won't diminish the intensity of your current connection. Unfortunately, trouble may develop if emotional or geographical distance raises issues of abandonment. However, defending yourself by assuming a self-protective posture isn't the answer. Overcome your resistance and open your heart to the unknown. Your positive attitude is your best weapon in your ongoing battle for happiness.

You might not be able to suppress your attraction to someone or something, and your feelings become more obsessive if you try to push them away. But the underlying issue now is about control -- or loss of it -- as the plans you make fall apart. Don't waste time clinging to your expectations. Instead of comparing the current flow of events to your original agenda, embracing the changes with hope and anticipation allows for the best possible outcome.

It's as if you're a marionette and someone is pulling your strings; you have no choice but to respond accordingly. You could become quite entangled if you resist, until you feel tied up in knots. Fortunately, you can rely on your mental agility to free you from the limitations. The first step is accepting responsibility for your actions. Once you acknowledge your role in creating the current restrictions, making the necessary changes will be a labor of love.

Your love life is undergoing a gradual metamorphosis that can have a great impact on your self-esteem. Your emotions are very intense, but something isn't quite right today. As much as you try to ignore the little things that might get in the way of more crucial concerns, there could be a larger problem that's not so easy to escape. Your determination to feel better about your progress motivates you to find a way through this transformational period. Lead with your heart and your head will follow.

Your sunny optimism is your guiding light, even in the face of difficult circumstances. Everyone seems to be trying to tell you something, but it's hard to glean the meaning behind their words. Don't lose hope in spite of any emotional obstacles. Don't try to gloss over the lesson, even if avoidance would make your present situation temporarily easier to handle. Believe it or not, your life grows richer as you face up to the reality of the current events. The storm clouds have silver linings if you take the time to look for them.

Although you will likely receive the emotional support you seek today, there could be a darker side to the offer. You won't be satisfied unless others accept you without expecting anything in return. But there may be secret agendas and hidden clauses in the unspoken agreements now. Don't wait until you're caught off-guard by something you should have known. Be relentless in you search for the truth; shining the light of awareness into the shadows might be enough to save you from making a big mistake.

You truly believe that you are clever enough to charm your way out of any problem that surfaces today, but what you encounter might not be as manageable as you expected. The more you share your feelings now, the more fuel you add to an already volatile situation. Your intuition may be telling you to make a stand, but acquiescing to the prevailing winds is a wiser strategy. Once you stop fighting against the current dynamics, you can concentrate more on your own needs. Interactions with others will flow smoother when you are in sync with your inner process.

You are less focused on your personal issues today than you are on the larger trajectory of your life. Everything seems to be more tumultuous now while the theatrical Leo Moon is stymied by domineering Pluto, actively suppressing your passion. It's as if you're sitting on a volcano, trying to hold back the teeming lava. But too much restraint only drives the tension deeper, creating the possibility for eruption later on. The safest course of action is to reveal your feelings as gently as you can and let the energy ebb and flow naturally on its own.

It's hard to maintain your enthusiasm today without losing touch with reality. It's not that life is dark and gloomy; it's just that you may be feeling like the party's over and now you have to get down to work. However, your refusal to let anything spoil your day pays off later when good news changes your outlook and restores your confidence. Keep your eyes on the horizon; although the waiting is the hardest part, patience is a reliable virtue at this time.

You typically like to keep your emotions under control, especially when you have to meet a deadline. Unfortunately, denial isn't a viable option; you won't be able to suppress your need for freedom that is now pushing its way to the surface. Instead of fighting the inevitable, just let your feelings arise naturally. Although you might rather remain cool, calm and collected, you won't be able to move on until you express what's in your heart.

You have been seeing yourself in the mirror through rose-colored glasses recently, but the filter is changing now, temporarily dimming the rosy glow. Although you might be disappointed that everything is no longer perfect, you're also intrigued by the potential of the less-traveled road ahead. These are healing times if you are willing to follow the powerful waves of alternating hope and doubt. Creativity will rise and shine in the days ahead if you nurture the seeds that are already present in your imagination.

An influential person's attempt to convince you to change your direction at work can annoy you today because you see your future in a completely different light. You may need to defend your position, even if you wish you could just let it pass. However, if you state your case without throwing shade onto others, everything will likely work out for the best. Remember that there's nothing to fear now; your faith in yourself and those you love is stronger than anything standing in your way.

Your attention is directed at getting ahead on the job now that the fun is winding down. Of course, it makes sense to organize your life and focus on your career as much as possible. But don't become so intent on your goals that you miss out on an amazing experience that's right in front of your nose. Take care of business today but don't turn down an opportunity for personal enjoyment. Adding a bit of mischief into the mix inspires you to put even more effort into your work.

If you are clear about your overall direction in life, the little things will fall into place today. Although it's helpful to define your goals in great detail, it's counterproductive now to actually compare your progress to your original expectations. Sometimes it's more productive to focus on each task as you do it without worrying about how it fits into the bigger picture. As long as you know where you're heading in the long run, cut yourself some slack and joyfully engage each moment as it comes.

Family matters can be very complicated and dealing with details at home may be a bit overwhelming today. It's your natural inclination to sweep everything under the rug, but this avoidance tactic won't solve anything. You will be much better off in the future if you get down to the real nitty-gritty as soon as you have the chance. Building trust requires honesty and perseverance, but it will be invaluable to you in the future.

Although you are often led around by your emotions, you may be able to step outside of your feelings today to see your world more objectively. Focusing on your communication skills can help you discuss even the most complex issues in depth. But don't let a conversation wander all over the place; sticking to the subject at hand will make you more effective in finding answers to the larger questions of life.

Relationship dynamics at work are challenging if you have an agenda that's not fully supported by others. Nevertheless, your current confidence feeds your sense of optimism, even if it flies in the face of actual circumstances. But you may notice a crack in your armor later today when the Moon leaves your 1st House of Personality to hang out in your 2nd House of Resources. Maintain your idealism while accepting the reality of the situation. Exercising good judgment can lower your emotional cost and raise your self-esteem.

Being emotionally vulnerable is more likely now that the sensitive Moon is back in your sign. You may feel slighted if you don't receive the appreciation that you deserve for your hard work. You are usually more than willing to jump in and help others achieve their dreams. However, you must also give something back to yourself today in order to enhance the quality of your own life. There's nothing wrong with exhibiting a bit of self-interest, especially if your health and vitality could benefit from your attention.

Someone may require your assistance today, but don't wait to receive a specific request. If you are concerned about a friend, pick up the phone and give them a call. He or she may only need a kind ear and a shoulder to lean on, but remember that confidentiality is crucial if you want to establish trust. You won't need to fix anything to be of value; your emotional support could have more of a positive impact than you think. Follow your intuition when it comes to helping those you love.

You might have to take severe criticism from someone today, yet remaining open to their advice ultimately works to your advantage. Nearly everyone could get on your nerves while the fussy Virgo Moon lingers in your 11th House of Community. Your own perceptions are quite accurate now, so you easily see how others can improve their efficiency, too. Be sure to present your opinions kindly, so that your message is heard with the proper intent. Respect is a two-way street if you want to engage in a constructive dialogue.

The greater your dreams, the more the minutiae will require your attention. Similarly, the higher you aim, the more precision needed. Remember, you are most effective today when you handle the little things, even if you are annoyed with trivial tasks. Don't let frustration get the best of you; honor the bold Leo Moon's visit to your 9th House of Big Ideas by reaching as high as you can. However, prepare for the Moon's shift into laser-like Virgo by focusing on the fine points without resistance.

Although you excel at playing the role of an authority figure, sometimes it's more advantageous to be humble in your approach. If you are willing to adopt a beginner's mind, a teacher can be extraordinarily helpful to you now. Listen carefully and take detailed notes so that you can learn as much as possible. The information you receive today is worthy of your time and effort if you want to experience personal growth. True enlightenment comes from being a student of life.

Your compassion is required when dealing with a partner or close friend today. However, a thorough examination of your communication style can also reveal hidden patterns that you need to know about now. Although you might wish you could fast forward to a happy ending, working through the complex issues first makes any solution more enduring. Demonstrate your commitment to the relationship by showing up with an open mind and a loving heart.

You might believe your good intentions are solid enough to make a relationship work. Unfortunately, your idealism isn't necessarily being played out by the current circumstances. Even if you aren't ready, your friend or partner could want more of a commitment from you. Or, perhaps you have unresolved issues that you don't want to talk about yet. Emotional detachment only works as a temporary fix; sooner or later you must come clean if you want to experience more love and happiness.

Your irrepressible idealism won't save you from the potential trouble caused by your irreverent behavior as you seek out the next adrenaline rush. You may be so excited that you lose track of your common sense and serious problems can arise if you don't stop to think before you act. However, a carefully calculated gamble might prove to be a lot of fun if you remember to take the necessary precautions along the way. Better safe than sorry.

You might believe that you have entered a Karma-Free Zone but your current actions have very real consequences. Although you yearn to break away from someone's control today, you don't seem to be able to exert your authority over others. Nevertheless, the message is clear; no one can keep you locked up now if you think you are free. The immediate key to your happiness is to consider which rules you're willing to accept and then adhere to them happily. There is plenty of room to be true to yourself within the acknowledged limits.

Following your instincts can lead you into an exciting but unstable situation today. Normally, you are tentative about your participation in a group activity until you check out all the angles. However, you're thrilled with the idea of jumping into the unknown on a whim. Don't fight the impulse to initiate action; enjoy the fun while it lasts. You have a short-lived chance to create a magical memory that will make your heart happy.

You're tired of waiting for the right career opportunity to present itself. You want results now and may be motivated to gamble on your future. However, your current sense of immediacy could trigger a hasty decision that doesn't necessarily support your long-term plans. Practicing a little more patience is your smartest strategy; you can always continue to explore your options in the safety of your own mind. Think twice before ambitiously trying a radical solution when a more conservative one will do the trick.

Even if you recently cooled your jets and readjusted your timeline, taking a wait-and-see approach today won't work for you. Something unexpected occurs that requires you to react immediately. Although you still prefer to consider all of your options, you might not want to pass by an opportunity to explore something that stimulates your sense of adventure. Don't be afraid to experiment with the edge; you can always work out the necessary details later on. Bold action generates the very excitement you seek.

You may be pulled into someone's emotional melodrama today, reactivating old fears from days gone by. Ironically, you are eagerly anticipating a chance to conquer your demons and put them to rest once and for all. You have skirted around this scary memory long enough; it's now time to dive into the heart of the matter and finally release the past. The potential for lasting reward is great if you are willing to face the music and dance with the devil.

Although you have recently experienced many unusual things, your partner or a friend might do something today that takes you totally by surprise. In fact, you may secretly wish that you were the one rebellious enough to break the rules and behave in an outrageous manner. Get ahead of the curve by planning how to make your unrealized dreams come true. You really don't have to rely on someone else to act out your suppressed desires. Your preemptive strike is better than patiently waiting for something to save you from yourself.

The familiar pattern of your daily routine is often reassuring and enables you to feel secure about your life. However, you may be longing to break free from your regular grind so you can do something radically different today. But it's tricky to put your plan into motion because you don't know how much effort to exert to get what you want. Pushing too hard can stir up a hornet's nest while letting the opportunity pass will leave you feeling flat. Nevertheless, it's better to err on the side of risk now than caution if you want to live life to the fullest.

You may be climbing the walls today, especially if your creativity is being restrained in any manner. You are so eager for adventure that you could overlook your current responsibilities to pursue your eclectic ideas. Unfortunately, you're still expected to play according to the rules, and your brilliance might not have a chance to shine if you end up offending others. Don't give up; your persistence enables you to work within accepted conventions while also expressing your unique outlook on life.

You might be overly worried about keeping your secrets quiet today, especially if you have something wild in your background that others don't know about. But your fears may be unwarranted; be brave and risk judgment by sharing your story with someone you trust. Your shy resistance could quickly transform into giddy exhilaration as soon as you start to talk. Cracking open a door to vulnerability can be scary at first, but now it's worth taking the chance.

An unexpected conversation with a coworker or close friend can rattle your nerves today because you are shocked where the discussion goes. Luckily, you're not receiving bad news; it's more about having your old assumptions questioned and your core values challenged. Don't cling to a familiar belief that has outlived its purpose; instead, focus on the freedom that a new perspective brings. The future grows brighter and your heart becomes lighter once you leave your worn-out baggage in the past.

You are poised to do something today that is totally out of your normal range of conduct, but you believe that extraordinary times require extraordinary measures. The vast array of possibilities is intoxicating, but it's prudent to exercise a bit of discretionary caution or you might end up wasting money on something you don't really need. In fact, your happiness is not dependent on acquiring anything in the material world. However, you could discover a real bargain on a ticket to a magical experience that will make you smile for a long time to come.

You might blast ahead with your original plans even though they could lead to more trouble than they are worth. Ironically, your common sense is working fine today; the problem is your inclination to fearlessly overrule reason with your desires. Fortunately, you can minimize the negative impact of your carelessness by repeatedly reminding yourself to slow down and think about what you're doing. It may sound like a familiar warning, but the sky is the limit if  you stop to acknowledge your immediate surroundings before moving forward.

Don't rely on your friends for sound advice today, because they are likely to encourage your dreams, no matter how impossible your goals may be to manifest. Of course, receiving support from an ally feels great, but you might be better off if someone told you that your idea is ill-conceived. If you truly want to know whether or not you should proceed, make an objective list of all the pros and cons and then follow the most obvious conclusion. The good news is you have the capability to make the most intelligent choice all by yourself.

You may be able to come up with plenty of reasons to decline a current opportunity, but you will likely say yes, anyhow. It's tough to see the downside of the current situation today because your hopes are so high and any progress appears to be better than none at all. Just remember that you might face discouragement if you continue to harbor such outrageous expectations. Taking the medicine of reality isn't painful at all and can actually help you stay healthy through tumultuous times.

Normally, your need for emotional security leads you to set boundaries so you don't destabilize your life. Nevertheless, you also like to be as cooperative as possible. Today, these two strategies collide as your optimism tempts you to take on more commitments than you should. Don't let things reach a breaking point before you pull back to protect your heart. It's a sign of strength to recognize your limits before it's too late.

You have big plans on your mind but it doesn't serve you well to lose sight of what's actually possible today. Your extroverted nature usually works in your favor, but you might attract so much positive feedback now that you begin to believe you are invincible. Much to your chagrin, you haven't yet transformed into a superhero, so step back from the excitement and downsize your intentions before they get the best of you.

Managing your mood swings may be a challenging task today because the reflective Moon in your sign puts you in close touch with your changing emotions. However, your innate sense of clarity is tough to find now because you can't help but see amazing possibilities everywhere you look. Keep in mind that you might be better off waiting a day or two before making any life-altering decisions. Fortunately, you will be able to make smart choices again once your rational perspective returns.

Putting on a happy face won't resolve your worries, especially if you discover problems with someone's plans for the day. Instead of covering your concerns with a quick smile, express your opinions as objectively as you can. You may be able to justify your thoughts, but your logical words aren't necessarily without their bias. Thankfully, setting your perspective out on the table might spark an informative conversation. Even if the discussion doesn't lead to a concrete solution, at least it prompts you to think about the most crucial issues with an open mind.

You are socially astute today and intuitively know exactly how much pressure to apply to a situation to get what you want. However, your wisdom could fly out the window once you see some positive results from your actions and you impulsively decide to ask for more. Remember, too much drama can prompt your most valuable supporters to retreat in haste. There's nothing wrong with having grandiose ambitions as long as you know when to stop pushing and when to be grateful for your blessings.

You're trying to keep your ambitious goals from taking over your entire day, but bombastic Jupiter may not know how to take no for an answer now. Although a current boost of confidence can help if you're suffering from low self-esteem, it could be too much if you're already bouncing off the walls with enthusiastic anticipation. However, it's up to you to know how to best channel your energy. Take your foot off the gas pedal and gently coast for a while; you might enjoy the ride even more.

Your pragmatic approach to managing a rather large project can put you in the driver's seat as others give up before they gain any traction. Thankfully, you know that you're well suited for the job and are ready to give it your absolute best. Be careful; your perceptions are bent a bit out of shape by your desire to succeed, so it's still wise to exercise caution today. Instead of trying to do the impossible and failing, set realistic goals that you can surpass.

You may attempt to simplify complex relationship dynamics today because it's easier to figure out your game plan when everything is neat and tidy. But leaving out the complicating factors just to suit your whim is not an intelligent idea. It's smarter to work with all the facts and be unsure of your next move than to arbitrarily avoid the truth to feed your false sense of security. Remember, ignorance is not bliss; however, knowledge does lead to power.

You are moving ahead with your new objectives and might even be proud of your significant progress. However, there may be danger lurking in your current optimism. Of course, the power of positive thought fosters success, but it might also prevent you from seeing an important truth if you take your hopeful perspective to an extreme. Keep your sails filled with air by remaining open to the prevailing winds of change.

Expressing your relationship goals clearly is crucial today, but your personal needs may be at odds with what is expected of you. Finding common ground in this particular conflict is challenging because your obligations make it difficult to follow your heart. Nevertheless, don't give up by denying your feelings; you will ultimately have more choices if you state your truth -- contradictions and all -- instead of trying to avoid it. There is no substitute for honest communication when it comes to love.

You may be running around in circles as you go from one activity to another today, even if you intend to finish everything you start. Your plan is to complete each job, but you're easily distracted by the variety of unexplored paths in front of you. Don't be too concerned about how much you accomplish now. Getting a handle on your reluctance to change could be more powerful than proving your ability to be productive. Expanding your horizons might make you nervous at first, but it's time to spread your wings and fly.

You are eagerly anticipating the rising energy of the day, but a bit of unexpected turbulence can make it tricky to surf the incoming cosmic waves. Instead of complaining about the intensity of the rough waters, shift your perspective and embrace the next round of excitement into your life. It's really not necessary to find lasting solutions to any of the problems that now pop up. You're better off navigating your way as if this is a temporary situation, instead of assuming that it's a permanent part of your life. Your positive attitude makes all the difference in the world.

You're so intensely focused on maintaining harmony in your relationships now that it's challenging to see what's around the next corner. But even if you attempt to ignore your current feelings of uncertainty, you won't be able to do so for long. Your eyes are big and wide open today, and once you realize what is behind the curtain, you want others to see it, too. But don't wait until an uncomfortable situation becomes too overwhelming to handle. Bring what you know out into the light as soon as you learn the truth. Awareness is your secret to success.

Playing other people's games according to their arbitrary rules was acceptable for a while, but you are driven to add your critical opinion to the situation now. Your friends might expect you to continue in the same old manner, but you are motivated to clarify confusing boundaries so you can reestablish your authority today. Overreacting isn't useful, but neither can you stay quiet. Ultimately, it's wise to just let others know exactly what you need and let the chips fall as they may.

It could take several more days for relationship dynamics to settle down, so it still makes sense to stir up the energy now to see where it goes. Conflicts that escalate today are symptoms of deeper material issues that are not yet resolved. You can probably talk yourself into believing almost anything that ends well. Nevertheless, you will be happier if you prepare to readjust your thinking if a reality check points to a different conclusion. Hope for the best but keep a backup plan in your pocket just in case.

Your emotions are very close to the surface today as the reflective Moon returns to your sign. Nevertheless, turning feelings into decisive action is a daunting task. Your moods shift often and every single thought you have brings up another feeling that is different from the last. Someone may attempt to force you to make a choice, but it isn't necessary yet. Wait a few more days before deciding what to do. In the meantime, enjoy riding the highs and lows without getting trapped by either extreme.

Gently floating downstream in the flow of your feelings sounds idyllic today, but each time you begin to get comfortable, practical thoughts wake you from your pleasant reverie. You may grow increasingly aware that the real events in your daily life must take precedence over everything else. It grows tougher to land yourself back on solid earth, yet this is exactly what is needed to make the most of this auspicious time.

You might actually think your current solution to a lingering problem is a fair and sensible one. However, it's not very wise to move too quickly today, for you could change your mind a few more times before you settle on one particular answer. Be careful; your inflated sense of urgency may deceive you into acting impulsively. Count to ten and then count again before making your move.

Although you desperately want to excel at your current efforts, you don't have to do it at someone else's expense. The Moon's shift into your 10th House of Status demands that you consider the needs of others if you want to be an effective leader. Climbing over those around you to climb the ladder of success will ultimately serve no one at all. You can gain more authority now by tuning in to the group consciousness and acting for the good of all.

You could come across with more confidence than you actually feel now that the calculating Capricorn Sun forms an imbalanced alignment with effusive Jupiter. Although you may be projecting your biases, you're ready to change your mind on a moment's notice if you are offered facts that cut through your defenses. But your apparent bravado can be a deterrent if it scares others away from sharing their ideas with you. Soften your assertive stance to make room for a meaningful dialogue with those you love.

A complex partnership that was initially based upon equality can temporarily encounter uncomfortable dynamics today, especially if someone exerts pressure on you. Unfortunately, your partner might be sinking deeper into the relationship just as you are withdrawing into your own private world. Show some foresight with an objective approach that rebuilds trust. Paradoxically, you might have to step back before making a long-term commitment. Fostering your independence now increases the potential for a closer relationship in the future.

You don't want to make anyone's life more complicated today as seeking peaceful solutions to ongoing problems is a high priority. Although you may be less willing to fight now that your key planet Mars is swimming through the compassionate waters of Pisces, you're still likely to passionately react if someone pushes you too far. Defend your territory if necessary, but show your real strength by establishing common ground instead of insisting that things go your way. Cooperation is more constructive than competition.

You have so much to do that it's crucial to avoid being overwhelmed by all the details. Concentrate on your productivity today while the Moon is still busy in your 6th House of Work. Advanced planning plays an important role in your current drive for efficiency, but allow time to rest between tasks in order to sustain your energy throughout the day. Long-term strategies are more successful now than flying by the seat of your pants. You know better than anyone else that slow and steady wins the race.

You may be caught up in your own nervous energy today, but trying to make too much happen right away can wreak havoc. Taking a deep breath and finding your center ensures smooth progress. If you scatter too many seeds now you could wear yourself out trying to juggle all your commitments. The fruits of your labor will be rewarded if you remember to be patient while striving to reach your destination. Keep calm and carry on.

A little annoyance can precipitate an emotional meltdown if you believe that ignoring your feelings will make them go away. Don't hide your heart in the sand; instead, face stressful circumstances head on by considering a variety of available options. Choose the most sensible course of action, but remember that it's not necessary to clear new paths where none are needed. Casting light on an issue goes a long way toward discovering a lasting solution.

The pace of your life is quickening again, bringing a taste of excitement along with great potential for change. However, it's not productive to push your agenda onto anyone else at this time. Instead, make the best of the present moment by listening carefully and responding graciously. You have more time than you realize to prepare for future opportunities. Refining your strategy now is wiser than waiting for the action to begin.

Exploring the source of your anxiety today pays off in the weeks ahead. You have been busy putting all the pieces in place as you mapped out your goals with cautious determination. Now, as your adrenaline begins to stir, you may worry about the execution of your plan and how it affects other people. Run through it one last time in your mind and then let go because your attention is required in the present moment in all manner of communications. The quality of your relationships just might be the determining factor of your success.

You are acutely aware of the importance of the decisions you're facing today and are determined to take your time and make the right choice. However, people seem to be meddling in your business, trying to persuade you to follow their advice. Luckily, you are so in tune with your own needs now that your instincts are your best source of guidance. Follow your intuition: you are the only one who can know when it's time to tip the scales one way or the other.

You are usually quite comfortable knowing more than you share, but today the situation may be reversed. You could actually be missing a crucial piece of information and wish you had someone to consult with. However, don't be so suspicious; it's not likely that anyone is purposefully withholding anything from you. Ask the right questions and you might receive the answers you need. But don't hold on to your fears if satisfaction isn't forthcoming; some things remain a mystery for a reason.

Gaining clarity on your wildest dreams can be enlightening now because if you make the right choices, they might actually come true. Naturally, it's not quite that simple, but you do have the potential to lay a foundation for your future by sharing your goals with friends and coworkers today. Don't waste this moment on meaningless fantasies. Being conscious of your true intentions prepares you to step into the next chapter of your life.

Your nerves may be on edge today as you contemplate the uncertainty in your future. Oddly enough, you are still quite confident about where you are going; however, you could be confused about which path to follow to reach your destination. You might need to take on more responsibilities to conserve your resources, which could distract you from your long-term ambitions. Be as flexible as possible when responding to the inevitable changes. For the next few weeks, your adaptability is your secret weapon.

It's more tempting today to dream of the future than to concentrate on the present moment. Your sense of urgency is waning and your overall energy is shifting now that industrious Mars is leaving your sign and entering your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. You are more willing to put extra effort toward a project that will take time to come to fruition because you can see the value of your contribution. But don't exhaust yourself by taking on too much at once; you will go further and last longer by maintaining a slower burn.

You are on the launch pad, ready to blast into orbit as fiery Mars shifts into your empathic sign today to ignite your emotions. However, since compassion is one of your greatest strengths, it's time for you to express this highest form of love. Just make sure to move carefully or you could get swallowed up by someone else's pain or misfortune. Giving yourself permission to step back from the crowd to cultivate a spiritual practice is not selfish; it's essential for your mind, body and spirit.

A friend or coworker might tell you something that you prefer not to hear today, but you're so involved with talking about your career plans or a specific project that you don't even notice. Instead of being wrapped up in your own version of the story, refocus your attention on the point that others are trying to get across. Carry the light of your awareness when stepping into the shadows that appear in front of you. You have the power to transform your fear into courage if you're willing to give change a chance.

Finding simple pleasures within your regular work routine is your fastest path to happiness today with the gracious Libra Moon visiting your 6th House of Habits. You are at your best now that the important things are going according to your plan. Nevertheless, you're not fully satisfied; you're yearning for more excitement in your life. You might even do something crazy to pump extra energy into your day. Walk on the edge but maintain enough balance so you don't fall in the process.

You thrive on the creative buzz you receive from the artistic Libra Moon now as she dances through your 5th House of Self-Expression. Your exuberance is amped even higher now that electric Uranus is rattling your cage. You're in a playful mood, yet still eager to do something productive with your most colorful ideas. However, there is no need to be worry about the end result yet; just take enough time to express yourself as boldly and authentically as you can.

Logical analysis isn't usually your primary consideration when making decisions because you seafaring Crabs are emotional beings. However, you may grow anxious as your rational thoughts lead to one conclusion while your heart chooses to head off in a different direction. Exploring all desires is a luxury, but it's safe as long as you keep them within your imagination. Nevertheless, you don't have to act on every whim. For now, know that your dilemma will begin to fade once the Moon moves into watery Scorpio later this evening.

You are so busy that you don't have time to pursue your heart's desire today. Perhaps you have simply tried to pack too much into your schedule. Or maybe you have details to settle that you thought were already completed. Either way, don't get lazy and let your responsibilities slide, even if you wish you could take the day off. Fortunately, taking pride in your accomplishments brings the ultimate in satisfaction. Work now, play later.

Carve out some time to uncover the hidden meanings behind the information coming your way now. Fortunately, there's great potential in the future of your relationships because there may be an opportunity for healing, especially around issues of love and romance. The Sun is still shining brightly in your 5th House of Fun, yet it's tricky to know how deep you need to dig in order to overcome whatever's blocking your creativity. Relax into the flow; there's no deadline on processing your feelings. Things don't have to change overnight.

You are painting your life using a very wide palette of feelings now. You're attracted to new and different ways of having fun, even if you are judged for following your bliss. Unfortunately, people may see you as moodier than usual today, but establishing a spiritual practice can help to settle your erratic emotions. Silently build your case for whatever actions you are taking but don't say too much about your plans just yet. Instead of overplaying your hand, wait a few days until you find the answers within before sharing your ideas. A mysterious smile will say more than words.

You may seek solace within the confines of your own inner world today since the evocative Moon is lingering in your 12th House of Secrets. Thankfully, you know that your ability to create peace in your life begins with accepting your own feelings. But it's not wise to overdo the everything-is-wonderful philosophy or you won't be motivated to initiate the changes necessary to be truly happy. Combining a dash of self-forgiveness with a carefully considered  action plan could produce positive results once the Moon returns to your sign later in the day.

You might be living in a bubble where you believe that the good times will last forever, but they won't. Nevertheless, you have nothing to fear now. Every cycle must wax and wane in its own time, as does the light of the silvery Moon. Even if you have recently been riding an emotional high, the energy shifts today and you may have to moderate your exuberance. But there's no reason to be discouraged if you can't pursue every desire. Discuss your concerns with a trusted companion; leaning on your friends for support helps you remember what's most important.

You want everyone around you to be satisfied and will do your part to make it happen. Nevertheless, you're not prepared to sacrifice your integrity for any reason. You might have to face a dilemma now that creates stress from these two conflicting points of view. Ultimately, you must play the role of the judge and decide how the next phase of your life unfolds. Even if you aren't the final authority, you're still responsible for your own actions -- and whatever you do today has a lasting impact on tomorrow.

Your charisma is off the charts and you're on the prowl for excitement today. Although you might try to keep your energy on an even keel, your mind is racing as you consider all the things you want to do. Practicality is not one of your immediate concerns as rebellious Uranus connects with indulgent Venus in your sign. Nevertheless, you have more freedom to explore the edges if you keep things running as smoothly as possible. Luckily, with a bit of conscious intention and sensitivity to others, you can get away with being as weird as you want.

You intuitively pick up subtle messages that inform you of the needs of others, yet it's nearly impossible to get a clear read on the incoming signals today. Someone's behavior may appear to be out of control and you're concerned enough to step in to help now. Even if you're ready to swing into action, you still might restrain yourself at the last moment due to a lack of confidence. However, there's no reason to hold back; you're stronger than you realize. Let your friends lean on you while you are up for the challenge of saving the day. Playing the role of a superhero is easier than you think.

You seem to be growing increasingly impatient each day, especially if someone is more interested in getting to the bottom of your current feelings than moving on to whatever happens next. You might feel as if you're trapped. Nevertheless, investing your time to delve into an emotional issue might be exactly what the doctor ordered. Set aside your desire for personal satisfaction for a couple of days. Finish up old relationship business now before distracting yourself with something shiny and new.

Your emotions may not be apparent to others now, but that doesn't make them any less important. An old memory that's buried in a hidden corner of your mind has unexpected power over your unconscious actions. Fortunately, a friend or partner should be able to help you explore the shadows of your past, but you must be willing to stick with the issues as they surface today. Don't avoid the unknown because your current vulnerability can lead to exciting emotional growth.
