You might feel threatened by a coworker's competitive nature today as the primal Scorpio Moon intensifies already raw emotions and lessens your interest in playing fair. You are postured to defend your territory, even if you haven't been personally attacked. Thankfully, you can discover the truth before any open hostilities are exchanged. There is nothing in particular that you must do to experience the healing energy now. Luckily, a change of heart opens the door to closer relationships at work.

Your fear of rejection makes you feel uncomfortable about sharing your innermost thoughts with others. A cluster of planets in sympathetic Pisces urges you to take your emotions more seriously. You crave intimacy, but you might not be ready for that level of emotional disclosure yet. Meanwhile, you are eager to grow professionally in your craft. Thankfully, concentrating on your career objectives might be the perfect distraction for now.

You love the notion of being close to someone special, but still prefer to keep the energy lighthearted today. However, competent Mars is approaching dreamy Neptune in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, instigating an inner conflict between your desire for intimacy and your fear of vulnerability. The fact of the matter is you won't be satisfied now by keeping things on a superficial level. Don't try to rationalize your actions; instead, give yourself permission to follow your heart rather than your head.

You take quiet pride in being able to analyze the dynamics of a situation and create an effective plan that's beneficial for all. However, several planets are traveling through diffusive Pisces now, making it more difficult to determine which information is useful. Instead of obsessing about what you don't know, nurture significant relationships based upon your feelings. But be careful not to overreact; getting too immersed in the details now could lead you to miss the most obvious solutions to your current dilemma. Open your eyes and your heart at the same time.

Your world may be settling down now, after a few days of lunar instability. But it's challenging, nonetheless, to keep your spirits up when sobering Saturn is in the picture. You are ultra-serious today; even if opportunities abound, you might grow discouraged by an apparent lack of success. Nevertheless, maintain consistency in your daily routine because it will eventually bring you the satisfaction you seek. Flaunting your creativity is good for your soul, but it's more rewarding to play by the rules for the next several days, instead.

Your own thoughts might overwhelm you today until you stop resisting the shifting emotional tides. Fluctuating moods complicate your interpersonal communication as the inconstant Moon visits your sign, making it difficult to know how long any emotion will last before transforming into something else. Don't waste your time or energy endlessly worrying about things that are out of your control. The future depends on your willingness to embrace the unknown.

Although you might be afraid that you're approaching the end of a road, you are also at the start of something new. Instead of trying to stop the inevitable, finish what you can while the powerful Scorpio Moon is activating your 12th House of Destiny. Practicing detachment makes sense now because you need to let go of your previous expectations. However, you may not be able to do it by yourself, so accept assistance when it's offered. The creative process is enhanced when you lower your defenses and allows others to help.

Your friends may be shocked when they learn of your unorthodox perspective. However, you're so focused on reaching your goals now that you're not worried about anyone else's expectations. Nevertheless, you don't like it if others try to give you direction and you might fight back if they push too hard. Nevertheless, it isn't worth turning an ally into an enemy, even if you have to temporarily downplay your plans to avoid conflict. Your willingness to compromise can end up saving the day.

Normally, you're not one to succumb to peer pressure, yet people seem to be offering you sound financial advice now. But even if you don't have a solid plan in place, you still prefer to figure it out on your own rather than using someone else's solution. It's one thing to show everyone that you're an independent thinker, but you can demonstrate your real intelligence today by listening to those who have your best interests at heart. Make the most strategic decision you can, no matter where the idea originates.

You are inclined to take radical measures once again. The intensity can present problems because several planets in imaginative Pisces blur the fine line between being spiritually inspired and losing yourself in a fantasy. Thankfully, you receive a reality check from practical Saturn, preventing your visions of the future from floating off into the clouds. Don't be afraid to dream; just make sure you stay anchored to the earth when you travel.

Your natural restlessness prompts you to blast your way forward no matter what the signs are saying; however, this isn't a winning strategy today. Your key planet Mars is telling you that all systems are go, yet your path seems to be blocked now, nonetheless. You don't have to add to the frustration by trying so valiantly to overpower the current obstacles. Make the most of the stressful cosmic energy by creating a long-term plan to clear the road ahead before progressing further. Work smarter, not harder.

You have chores to do today that may not be much fun, especially if your current responsibilities don't leave you any time to explore more creative pursuits. Even if you think you can meet your obligations, it's still wiser to temper your expectations. Unfortunately, your boss could misinterpret your confidence and pile on more tasks instead of praising you for your hard work. Understate your optimism and focus on productivity, instead.

Although you may establish ambitious goals today, your progress is delayed by unforeseen circumstances. Rather than letting negativity get the best of you, acknowledge your current limitations and then focus on your strengths. Everything should turn out fine as long as you don't promise too much. However, even a simple task could go awry if you commit to more than you can deliver. Take full responsibility for your actions without apologizing for something that's beyond your control.

Your intuition is encouraging you to do something you have never done, like going on a fantastic adventure in an exotic location. Unfortunately, your vision might have to remain unfulfilled for now because real world commitments are calling. Nevertheless, you don't have to give up on your idea, however unrealistic it may sound in the moment. Instead, consider taking small steps toward an impossible dream, even if it seems very far away. There is no hurry; patience is your most valuable asset now.

Your ability to quickly organize the various parts of a complex job can turn you into a hero today. But people may continue to make unreasonable demands on your time, even if you're not able to help them out. Although you might be tempted to express your frustration and set someone straight, it's much smarter to just step aside and let others figure it out on their own. They will ultimately appreciate your skill in executing a defensive strategy when it's to your advantage to avoid conflict. Taking the high road serves everyone's best interests.

Uncharacteristically, you're tempted to throw all caution to the wind and run as fast as you can toward your current destination. You can't help but be as restless as a tiger in a cage now as impulsive Mars floods your system with adrenaline to trigger an immediate response. However, your apparent proximity to the finish line is the result of your mind playing tricks on you. Instead, maintain a sustainable pace while reserving some energy for when you need it later on. Think of this as a marathon and not a sprint.

You have extra energy to take on more projects at work -- or so it seems. It turns out that you could underestimate the size of a job now and find yourself in trouble when you cannot meet your commitments. Instead of trying to make yourself look better in another person's eyes by making promises you can't keep, stick as close to the facts as possible while planning your day. If you don't rein in your energy today, someone might have to do it for you. Sidestep stress by practicing enlightened self-restraint.

You have too much happening in your life now to let your anger impede your productivity or diminish your happiness. Luckily, you can magically transform the current situation by telling others exactly what you want. But giving orders isn't sufficient; you must lead by example. The bottom line is that you cannot ask anyone to do anything that you're not fully prepared to do yourself. Your positive attitude is a perfect complement to your hard work.

You might be uncertain about your actions at work today, even if you can justify them to your associates. Unfortunately, you could be stopped in your tracks anyhow because authoritative Saturn -- now in your sign -- won't let you proceed if you're not fully prepared or if you're heading in the wrong direction. Don't allow self-doubt to adversely affect your efforts; the current obstacles are there to remind you to stop spinning your wheels and to concentrate your intent on the most significant matters first. Your chances for success greatly improve if you have a viable plan in place.

You're not one to shy away from hard work, but you will be much more productive if you set healthy limits. Karmic Saturn puts you through your paces today, testing your resolve to accomplish your goals. Nevertheless, you can't take on more responsibilities just because red-hot Mars fires up your ambitions. Do your best to help out those in need, but don't be afraid to say no when necessary. Even you tireless Capricorns need to recharge your batteries now and then.

You may be feeling the social bug now, especially if your friends entice you with invitations to intriguing gatherings. However, your boss might be leaning on you to do extra work, even if you prefer to take a bit of time off. This conflict forces you to make difficult decisions about your schedule. Leaving the fun and games behind is not your first choice, but it may be the right one. In the long run, your answer is less important than your attitude. Accepting your responsibilities with a sense of pride shows that you mean business when it comes to your work.

Openly disagreeing with anyone is not your idea of a good time, but you still may need to stand up for your convictions now if someone gets in your way. Unfortunately, whoever tries to stop you from reaching your goals probably wields quite a bit of power. However, you have much to gain by facing the current resistance instead of simply acquiescing without saying what's on your mind. Nevertheless, downplaying your progress may be a wise strategy so you can appear like less of a threat to those in charge. The only person you have to prove anything to is yourself.

You may be thinking about heading to your dream destination with the Moon moving through your 9th House of Faraway Places. But this isn't just about a vacation. You are on a mission as you search for your special place on Earth. Forget about immediate gratification; this journey is important enough that you shouldn't take no for an answer now, even if you can't follow through on your explorations yet. Setting your sights on the horizon is a good place to start, but it will take hard work and determination if you want to make your dream come true.

A dilemma could surface today around your need for simplicity, even within a complex situation. You are driven to find the most practical solutions to your problems, but it's not as easy as you wish. You may inadvertently contradict your intentions by saying more than necessary. Stirring up someone's wrath isn't the best path to a peaceful day. Luckily, a bit of conscious self-restraint might have a longer-lasting positive impact than you expect.

Although you often enjoy bantering with people who are as clever as you, today you may actually try to avoid others because you're not interested in debating your opinion on every subject. Unfortunately, seeking solitude isn't the best way to deal with smart people who might contradict your stated position. Be open to learning something you don't already know. It's a sign of real intelligence when you can admit you are wrong and someone else is right.

You are typically cautious in how you present yourself, but today you could consider drastic action in your haste for self-improvement. Nevertheless, it's better to test an idea by discussing it first, instead of just jumping in and making changes you can't undo. Taking the time to think your plan all the way through ensures that your actions will have the greatest positive effect on your future. Cultivating your creativity is an admirable pursuit as long as you don't try to paint your masterpiece in just one day.

Romantic inclinations can make your life more interesting today, but you may have mixed emotions as to whether or not to act on your feelings. The Moon is skipping through your 5th House of Love and her alignment with cold Saturn and hot Mars is simultaneously discouraging and encouraging. Impulsive behavior won't likely create a happy ending to your fairy tale, but a fortunate outcome is possible if you stop and express both sides of your dilemma. Ultimately, pleasure won't arrive on its own; it's up to you to make the first move and get the ball rolling.

You may be able to tell that an emotional power struggle is brewing beneath the surface today, even if others are acting as if everything is copacetic. However, someone may be less than friendly, although you haven't a clue why. Be patient and don't ask too many questions; it could take a few days for the real issues to manifest. In the meantime, do your best to avoid open conflict since happiness can only be attained through awareness, compassion and growth.

You're quite capable of turning on the charm, even in the most difficult situations. But your friends might notice an emotional chill from you now that the Moon is hooking up with somber Saturn in your 3rd House of Communication. Fortunately, you can still make your point as long as you don't try to cover up your true intentions with social niceties. You can act kindly without laying on false sweetness; a no-nonsense approach brings the best results today.

Your relationship to your material possessions is undergoing a dramatic shift as you reconsider what you want these days. You might be willing or even eager to let go of once-prized belongings that have turned into unneeded baggage. Your values are transforming and it's time to lighten your load emotionally and physically so you're better able to travel the road ahead, unencumbered by the weight of your past.

You do not want to waste precious energy on a communication mix-up today. Nor do you want to be misled by anyone because your feelings are strong and your patience is short. You just don't have time for playing games now; you expect everyone to get right to the point. Your emotions may be raw, so give yourself time to process inwardly before revealing any insecurities to those who have not already earned your trust. Following your intuition, rather than other people's expectations, leaves little chance for regret.

A lighthearted daydream can morph into an obsessive fantasy if you let your guard down. Oddly enough, the more you try to set your thoughts aside, the more they linger and gain strength. Suppression doesn't work now, so just let your imagination play through even if it raises uncomfortable fears or desires. Mental meanderings are more troublesome and persistent if you bury them. Channel your inner artist by expressing your visions in a creative manner.

You may be overly demonstrative about a social or political issue with the Moon camped out in your 11th House of Groups. However, you are less interested in going along for a ride than you are in focusing your efforts on making a difference. With karmic Saturn so close to the Moon, your contribution will most likely be appreciated by others. But act now because of your own values and not because someone wants you to get involved with their pet cause. Things will fall into place if your inner world is in alignment with the circumstances around you.

You might think you're being straightforward today, but your actions don't necessarily support your intentions. At first, your behavior could be awkward as you hold your feelings in. But then, when you realize you're not being authentic, you can overcompensate by revealing too much. Ultimately, you must find a healthy outlet for your conscious expression that is neither too hot or too cold, but just right.

The incoming waves of excitement are so palpable that they could distract you from your previous plans. Your bigger-than-life fantasies keep your anticipation level high, even as you face pressure to meet your current obligations. Obviously, there are unchangeable circumstances, so accept reality as it is and just get busy. Don't worry about missing the big one; the truth is you won't be able to avoid it.

Monitoring your thoughts carefully throughout the day enables you to settle down, yet you still could be easily provoked if you believe someone is talking about you behind your back. Unfortunately, off-the-cuff witticisms won't likely land you where you want to go. Rather than responding defensively, listen closely to what's being said to gain a new outlook on your life. Incorporating other people's perspectives can be messy, but it is sometimes the most reliable path to personal growth.

Using your sarcastic sense of humor as a weapon may be inappropriate today. People close to you grow tired of your verbal sparring as a means to circumvent a more revealing conversation. Since others might not be in the mood for your sharp tongue now, they could just end the conversation abruptly, leaving you to wonder why. It's as simple as you make it; play nice if you don't want to play alone.

You're not enjoying your current role of being the one who reminds others to be responsible now. You might even try to avoid being the authority figure because you want to run away and have fun. You're tempted to act defiantly, but your best strategy is to keep your irritation to yourself today and take care of your chores. Don't be discouraged; you'll have time during the week to break free and be silly after your work is done.

Although you're certain you can accomplish nearly anything you set your mind to now, you're still cautious about making commitments you can't keep. Your confidence is softened by a pervasive realism, preventing you from going overboard. But don't get too serious or you might miss an opportunity that's right in front of your nose. Stretch beyond your current comfort zone to reach for the stars.

Establishing emotional stability is a challenging task today because you're feeling restless. In fact, your goals probably remain just beyond your immediate grasp now. Paradoxically, when you get closer to your destination, you seem to subconsciously move it to someplace even further away. Your weird strategy isn't about productivity; it's simply your sneaky way to motivate yourself to cover a lot of new territory.

Your current insecurity might lead you to make a wrong conclusion about someone you love. You're eager to do whatever it takes to be a part of a partnership, but it feels like someone is actually working against you for no apparent reason. Instead of continuing to try to create an emotional connection, chill out and back off just a bit. Once others have more room to breathe, they might be more willing to meet you halfway. Finding common ground is more likely in an atmosphere of mutual respect.

You do not want to accept no as the final answer, so you might try again after rephrasing your question. Although you were initially hoping for a resolution today, there are still many shades of gray between the black and the white. Keep in mind that it may take a few more days until the outcome is clear. Don't rush the process or you could subsequently waste precious resources. If you decide to slow down, then time will be on your side.

Everything looks good on paper until you come to the sudden realization that you made a faulty assumption. It's not easy to decide what to do now that your philosophical reasoning can't rescue you from your current predicament. Instead of making a situation worse, do exactly what you should do when you get lost. Stop; don't go anywhere until you have regained your bearings. Ask for directions, if necessary, and then continue on your way with renewed confidence.

Your natural single-mindedness drives you to finish a task before starting a new one. Unfortunately, the current circumstances may not be so accommodating and you could be forced to begin another project before you are ready. But don't be too quick to judge what's best for your future. Instead, let go of your expectations and just see what happens next. Sometimes, not having a plan set in stone enables you to make more out of an unexpected change of events. Flexibility is your friend.

Setting your dreams on the front burner is a mixed blessing now. Although you may be walking on air as you share your plans for the future with your friends, you might be so excited that you soar dangerously high. Just remember that your exuberance could inadvertently set you up for failure. Balance your fantasies with your common sense; let your head drift up into the clouds, but keep both feet planted firmly on the ground.

You feel a sense of urgency today as your adrenaline levels climb, inspiring colorful visions of your great escape. You are impatient and want to break free from the past before you are forever stuck in it. Continue to explore every outrageous idea, especially the ones that will surprise everyone. But don't act before the time is right. Even if it's hard to wait, the experience will be more than worth it in the long run. Your imagination is where your dreams take root.

You might think you need to hold back your feelings about your future plans so that you don't upset a tenuous situation. But it's time to realize that you aren't the center of everyone's attention now, even if you believe otherwise. However, you can't restrain your desires forever, so it's a smart idea to initiate a process of gradual self-expression. Start slowly to lessen the shock value. Give others time to absorb your words and reflect on them before you take your revelation to the next level.

Although you're typically quite practical, you might temporarily set common sense aside to undertake something that is a bit risky. Although your actions are still goal-oriented, you're less concerned about tangible accomplishments now and more focused on your dreams of success. Even if you have mixed feelings about what you are doing today, rest assured that it's okay to cut loose from your obligations for a while. You can return to your unfinished business with renewed vigor after the New Moon on Tuesday.

You're captivated by your dreams of globetrotting these days, but your yearnings for adventure won't be satisfied by a casual visit to a friend in a nearby city. Seriously consider going the distance now, like taking a trip to a place on your bucket list. Fly in your imagination to another galaxy or cruise in your time machine back to the Renaissance. Paradoxically, it doesn't matter whether or not you actually pack your bags and go as long as you allow yourself the luxury of traveling there in your mind.

You may be under growing pressure from someone close to you as Tuesday's New Moon draws near. The emotional stress is an indicator that something needs to change and a confrontation could be unavoidable. There are sensitive issues about intimacy that must be addressed. Whether you like it or not, withdrawing from an intense connection might not be your most intelligent course of action, especially if you're reacting on gut fear. Instead, find the courage to choose love as your guiding light and slowly establish healthier ways of relating to others.

It feels like boredom is settling in and you are craving a change of scenery. But even if you are right at the edge of a big shift, you can't make things progress any faster than reality will allow. It's as if your speed limit is being set by external events, rather than by your own intent. Frustration can be a result of impatience, for the real transformation will take more time than you prefer. Keep the faith, there will be enough clues in the days ahead to foreshadow the next act of the play.

Although you might switch your attention to more playful activities, immediate pleasure may not be forthcoming. Even a simple romantic adventure could run into delays while you manage the logistics. Reality seems to get in the way of your enjoyment just enough to keep you aware of what you're missing. Don't give up; satisfaction is closer than you think. You can climb the tallest mountain with a good map, a solid plan and your unwavering determination.

Sticking close to home may be all you need to feel emotionally secure today. However, you could still grow restless, motivating you to head out in search of new and different avenues for expressing your creativity. Don't worry about how your friends and family might react; the outcome is likely to pleasantly surprise you. Keep in mind that any negativity you encounter probably has its roots in envy. Take a chance and walk on the wild side, no matter what anyone else thinks.

Oddly enough, you're chattier than usual, but you glean more meaning from life now if you look beneath the funny stories and clever repartee. Unfortunately, you could run into a wall when someone isn't amused by your penetrating questions. Don't try to charm your way through an awkward interaction. Instead, take the initiative and talk about the issues as you discover them. Your willingness to address a tough subject in a fair-minded manner will win the admiration of those who previously resisted your efforts.

Retail therapy is not usually an advisable path to happiness; however, there are times when spending money does feel good. Your current justification for making a purchase could be fabricated, especially if you want to take advantage of a bargain. It's worth taking some time to reconsider your actions. There's nothing wrong with buying a beautiful object; it's even better if the price is right. However, you don't need to stretch the truth to come up with false reasons for your self-indulgence. This is not about what anyone else likes; it's about acquiring something that touches your heart.

You sense that your time to act is running out -- and, actually it is. It's natural to experience  a little anxiety and moodiness now that the sensitive Moon is back in your sign. Although other people don't necessarily comprehend your current angst, unfinished business can stand between you and your goals. Unless it's truly urgent, try not to start a new project until after Tuesday's New Moon. Reexamine recent events and tie up loose ends while you still have the chance.

Old feelings run their course tonight and then they mellow out before returning to the cosmic recycling bin. Still, you are not yet ready to transition into the next emotional cycle. Instead of planting a new crop of ideas in the garden of your imagination, think about the importance of the compost pile where today's psychological garbage magically transforms into tomorrow's healthy soil. Be patient and allow the process to evolve at its own pace.

Spending quality time with people who recognize your true self is certainly good for the soul. Group activities take up more of your life now that the Moon is camping out in your 11th House of Social Networking. However, your real challenge is to keep some energy in reserve to meet your emotional needs and those of your family. Don't make foolish commitments in situations that aren't fully connected to your heart. Acting with integrity keeps your intentions clearly transparent to everyone involved.

You really don't want to explain every decision you make today because you believe that logic isn't always the most important factor. Talking about your choices now can actually detract from your experience; you prefer to focus on the present moment and simply follow your intuition. Thankfully, you don't need anyone's approval for what you are feeling. However, it never hurts to run your plan past someone reliable before you swing into action. A little objectivity is your secret to success.

You might have a set plan in mind for how the day should unfold, but you can't expect others to be able to read your thoughts. It makes more sense to climb out on a limb and let someone close to you know what you want now. But even if you share your hopes, you still may be misinterpreted if a friend or relative makes an incorrect assumption about your intentions. Taking sufficient time to clearly explain your motives today could be enough to prevent headaches for everyone involved. Tread carefully until the fog lifts tomorrow.

You have very specific emotional needs today, yet it's tricky to find the right words to convey them. To complicate matters further, it's all too easy to imagine the worst because your dreams are overflowing into the real world, making it nearly impossible to separate illusion from reality. Thankfully, struggling to discern the truth isn't necessary if you are willing to allow fact and fiction to exist side by side. Luckily, dreams really can come true.

Your natural sensitivity to the feelings of those around you is a lot to handle today if you get into a disagreement with someone close to you. Your resistance to change only adds to the confusion, especially if you're afraid of losing your sense of identity. Fortunately, you can capitalize on the gentle Mars-Neptune conjunction by consciously softening your stance while still maintaining your current position. Others will quickly pick up on your change of attitude, paving the way for cooperation rather than conflict.

Hiding your emotional intensity isn't usually a viable strategy because feelings gain power when they are suppressed. Nevertheless, the Moon's short-lived conjunction with controlling Pluto may provoke a melodramatic meltdown. However, if you are frustrated by certain people's inability to do their jobs, losing your temper clears the air of pent-up tension. Thankfully, an apology goes a long way now, especially if your words sounded excessively harsh. Keeping the drama to a minimum today saves you from future regret.

Don't be so certain that you know what's happening because your reality filter may not be working all that well today. You might have enough stars in your eyes now to prevent you from seeing what's right in front of you. There are specific tasks that need to be done, but your lack of focus makes staying on track nearly impossible. Nevertheless, there's no reason to be self-judgmental; just do the best you can and pick up where you left off when your concentration returns. Let your imagination wander but wait until tomorrow before taking matters into your own hands.

You may feel as if you've stepped into a world of paradox today. The veil between this world and others is thinner than usual, but you're also quite attached to your creature comforts while pleasure-seeking Venus opposes excessive Jupiter. Don't resist the flow of images that arise from your imagination, even if you can't understand what they mean. Thankfully, there's nothing special you have to do now, except listen closely to the messages from beyond while continuing to meet your mundane commitments.

You can tell that your inner landscape is undergoing dramatic psychological change for the better. Although your key planet Pluto is touched by the evocative Moon this morning, other cosmic influences keep the energy steadily moving toward the light. This is an opportunity to step into the shadows, dredge up the past and then let the spiritual process do its magic. You may be exploring unfamiliar ground, but the personal transformation you are experiencing is perfectly safe.

You might be hesitant to place too many expectations on current events, yet you're still feeling quite optimistic about your future prospects. There's nothing wrong with wanting more from life as long as you can avoid obsessing over the idea of success. Your adaptability makes the difference between frustration and happiness. Activate your imagination and dream big; just give reality enough wiggle room to unfold with a few surprises.

There seems to be a lot at stake today and you're tempted to take extreme action to turn the tide in your favor. However, micromanaging emotional tension can backfire if you fall short of keeping up with all the complex interactions. Maintaining control over too many variables is a study in frustration. However, loosening the reins a bit deepens your connections with those you love, which ironically, will also make you more productive in the long run.

A bubble of rainbows and unicorns might be all you need now to protect your dreamy confidence from intrusions by reality. Luckily, your imagination is the wellspring of your future. You can't go wrong if you unfold your story one step at a time and allow your audience a chance to take it all in.

You are better off saying less today because your words might end up misrepresenting your true intentions. Rather than relying on your quick wit, open your senses to direct impressions and act on your perceptions. Don't bother rationalizing your choices or justifying your gut feelings that lead you toward a particular destination. Listen to your instincts; you can always fill in the details afterward. Follow your heart now and not your head.

Your network of friends and acquaintances is a source of great stability and inspiration today, so listen closely to any advice they are willing to give. Although you're not required to follow anyone's lead, others offer practical approaches that could help you handle a sticky situation. Lingering self-doubt won't magically disappear, so be gentle now when judging yourself against your own heightened expectations. Contrary to your current worries, there isn't a hurry when it comes to untangling the mystery that is you.

You're uncertain about a significant choice you must make now, but rest assured there isn't any one single path that's clearly right or wrong. Whatever you currently decide, your route will be a circuitous one and the detours will teach you lessons that you might have missed by zipping along unimpeded. Don't take yourself so seriously; you will have a very different perspective on what happened when you look back in a couple of months. Maintaining a healthy sense of humor saves the day.

You may feel a sense of relief because you see a friend or partner in a more realistic light today. You're comforted by the realization that you can make concrete decisions based on what you know, rather than flying by the seat of your pants. However, it's still wise to act with caution because you could miss crucial information that catches you off guard if you become too complacent. No one knows better than you that it never hurts to pay extra attention to the subtle nuances and the pesky details.

Trusting those closest to you helps to reduce your current confusion about your work plans for next week. Thankfully, you are in an excellent position to turn any lack of clarity in your favor if you're not too eager to change everything all at once. Today's lesson is about letting go of control, so roll with the incoming waves without resistance. Having a flexible agenda is more important now than proving the strength of your willpower. Your willingness to compromise comes in handy when you need it the most.

Karmic forces are at play behind the scenes, making or breaking a potential romance. The Moon's current visit to your 7th House of Partners, combined with several planets chilling in your 5th House of Love, is a powerful energetic mix that blasts open your heart or increases your awareness of your desires. Thankfully, there's no need to push for the resolution of a relationship issue now; instead, just allow the current events to unfold without adding pressure to the situation. Giving deep feelings a day or two to work their way to the surface may be enough to change the game.

You prefer doing your chores the same way you've done them in the past now that the Moon has settled into your 6th House of Habits. Although you might have your methodology all figured out, your coworkers have a different agenda in mind for you. There's no need to stir up any resentment from others today; acknowledge those who are in charge and work with them rather than against them. You can accomplish more if you're willing to compromise and save your battles for another day when there are more important matters at stake.

You are a wellspring of innovative ideas when it comes to new ways of making money, but it might seem as if your timing is slightly off. Nevertheless, you can still make solid progress today, even if you underestimate the amount of time needed to complete a project. Methodical Saturn's influence is strong now, making it possible to achieve your goals as long as you don't take any shortcuts. There may be more exciting strategies later on, but for now playing it safe is your most reliable route to success.

You could sidestep unnecessary trouble today by remembering that you can't possibly have all the answers to every question. Although this warning might sound unnecessary, a momentary glimpse of awareness can be dangerous if it tricks you into believing that you understand more than you really do. Nevertheless, your mind is able to grasp complex mental relationships if you give it the chance. Instead of impulsively acting on your assumptions, reconsider all the facts from the ever-changing perspective of now.

Magic follows you around today, yet this intangible buzz can grow annoying if you try to establish direct correlations between your actions and your goals. Unfortunately, relying on your common sense lures you down a path of elusive expectations that may create disappointment rather than satisfaction. However, nearly anything is possible now once you accept that reality is not playing by the causal rules of the material world. If you can conjure up an image in your dreams, you stand an excellent chance of turning it into something tangible.

An inflexible attitude can create problems today, especially if you get into a disagreement about something that's important to you. You're confident about your point of view, but you might feel as if someone is conspiring to change your mind. Avoid escalating a passionate discussion into unnecessary conflict. Although there's no reason to be shy about clearly informing everyone exactly where you stand, remaining open to other people's perspectives could lead to unexpected personal growth.

Although you reserve the right to change your opinion often today, don't expect your friends to keep up with your uncharacteristic mood swings. The Moon's current visit to your pragmatic sign reassures you that your emotions make sense and that no one else has the authority to tell you how to react. Someone else's actions won't likely shift your position, but it's wise to keep your options open now, just in case. Altering your course at the right time increases your chances for success.

You might not be interested in expressing your emotions today while the Moon squares talkative Mercury from your 12th House of Privacy. If you do choose to share your feelings, your words may be misconstrued as more aggressive than you intend. Wait until tomorrow when the reflective Moon enters your sign before telling everyone what you think. Avoiding a tricky conversation is much easier if you simply don't go there in the first place. Make use of this quiet time by exploring the magic in your dreams.

You are at your best today when you're involved in a community project or part of a team at work. However, you might not be able to assume the identity that's necessary for you to fully merge with the rest of the group. Your current resistance to assimilation encourages non-conforming behavior, but don't be afraid of stepping into the center of the circle -- even if you believe you would be more comfortable now standing out on the edge. You have too much to bring to the table to justify going off on your own.

You may be asked to pitch in and help someone out now, even if you're weary of putting your needs second. But your generous spirit prevails because the Moon's presence in your 10th House of Public Responsibility indicates your need to assist others in reaching their potential. Thankfully, the Moon's smooth trine to unwavering Pluto empowers you to make a plan and then stick to it as if your life depends on it. Focusing on the details allows your energy to flow more easily throughout the day. When you give to others, you receive more in return.

Your efficiency is challenged by people around you today as they make their dreams sound fascinating enough to distract you from your path. However, the determined Taurus Moon goes a long way toward keeping you on your path. Nevertheless, you still need to pay attention to the boundaries of your coworkers (or the lack of them) if you want to feel good about your accomplishments by the end of the day. Rely on tried and true methodologies to get ahead, even if you are inspired by others to reach for the stars.

You prefer to keep things light and easy now, but could get drawn into intense discussions about your feelings, anyhow. You might be annoyed with the emotional detour today while the sensible Taurus Moon visits your 8th House of Deep Sharing. But don't try to hide your feelings behind a smile that says everything is fine. Let others know that you are available to partake in an uncomfortable discussion but you're not willing to feed into any negativity. Your clarity in communication saves the day.

You may have an encounter with a friend or a lover today that temporarily turns him or her into an opponent rather than an ally. However, it's not in your best interest to acquiesce too quickly because some things shouldn't be negotiable. Your current nemesis might appear to be quite determined, but will likely give in under your persistent pressure. Luckily, your relationships can be strengthened in the long run if you remain true to your heart.

A simplistic approach to your life is a healthy antidote to your hectic schedule today. Instead of seeking the peak experiences of inspiration, you're motivated to meet your responsibilities in a timely manner because you don't like the heaviness of unfulfilled promises weighing on your conscience. Although it goes against your nature, you could benefit greatly now by letting go of the big picture and concentrating on the details one item at a time.

You have a magic touch now and can transform the most mundane chores into fantastic opportunities for personal fulfillment. But don't let financial considerations stand in your way; it should only take a few days to resolve the stressful money issues. Luckily, you can achieve personal satisfaction even while working today because the earthy Taurus Moon assists you in a practical manner while traveling through your 5th House of Love and Creativity. Sometimes the most wonderful experiences are the ones right in front of your nose.

You can sense a shift in the cosmic energy as beautiful Venus leaves your sign for the greener pastures of your dreams. You might be a bit disoriented if your needs don't align with where you seem to be heading now. Unfortunately, the more you try to find your way back to the basics, the more complicated everything becomes. Don't rely on logic to determine your next move; trust your instincts to steer you in the right direction today. Your search for answers starts with loving yourself.

You could become singularly focused in your quest to accomplish your goals today because you might be trying to justify taking time off later. But this strategy is ineffectual if you have already overloaded your calendar with so much to do that it will be a miracle if you can meet your own expectations. Instead of dreaming about a possible escape in the future, embrace the beauty of present moment while sweet Venus is gracing your imaginative sign with her presence. Change your mind and find happiness in the here and now.

Doing too much at once is part of your modus operandi, but everything may fly out of control today if you don't wisely practice time management. You're tempted to overload your schedule because you think you might go crazy if you don't keep yourself busy. However, your concern about missing the action is unwarranted; there will be plenty of opportunities even if you cut back on your commitments. Paradoxically, you might accomplish more if you narrow your focus and try to do less.

Acting spontaneously sounds liberating today, but previous obligations might prevent you from accepting an invitation to a special social event. You may be annoyed with a coworker who steps in to play the role of leader, even if he or she isn't your real boss. Ironically, once you accept that your work comes first now, you will be able to enjoy your free time with a clear conscience. Oddly enough, acknowledging limitations can bring more freedom than you expect.

You might feel as if you have been set up because you weren't told all the facts prior to agreeing to participate in a project at work. Thankfully, the Moon's current visit to your adaptable sign reminds you of how facile you are when it comes to learning as you go along. Nevertheless, you don't appreciate it when specific information is intentionally kept from you. It's your decision alone whether or not to proceed under the current circumstances; no one can fault you for being true to yourself.

You don't know how to react to something you hear today, especially if it doesn't match up to the picture you already had in your mind. You want to put all the pieces together, but the circumstances are complicated and elude logic. You're inclined to set aside reason and follow your instincts, but you will have more success now if you go over the facts again and again, until they fit into place. Practicing patience enables you to think clearly until you find the answers you seek.

You are wary of anyone who backs away from facing the music today. You aren't interested in pussyfooting around; you need inarguable facts to get to the bottom of the truth. However, others might want to take a more casual wait-and-see approach which ruffles your feathers. Even if talking about your concerns smooths over differences, a final resolution may be hard to come by now. The good news is the outcome continues to grow more favorable over the next few weeks. Focusing on your common goals is the key to your success.

You often struggle while tackling several tasks simultaneously because you prefer setting priorities and concentrating on one job at a time. However, you're more adept at multitasking now, effortlessly moving between projects. Nevertheless, you still could reach a tipping point if you feel like you're juggling too many things at once. It's just not worth the stress; set some chores aside for a bit so you can tie up the loose ends on what's most important. Seize this opportunity to finish up old business once and for all.

You might appear more stubborn than you actually are now, but anyone who makes assumptions about you too quickly could easily misread your energy. You're eager to discuss your plans and figure out the best way to bring your ideas to fruition. However, your determination can be mistaken for inflexibility today. Sticking to your agenda makes strategic sense as long as you also remain open to finding better solutions to achieve your objectives.

Your willingness to make a commitment means a lot today because you're determined to put aside your pursuit of happiness while you fulfill your promises. Naturally, with Venus and Mars visiting your 5th House of Fun and Games, you would much rather be playing, but your priorities are quite clear now. You know that you won't be able to fully enjoy yourself if you're worrying about letting others down. Taking pride in your unwavering loyalty is enough of a reward by itself.

Hopefully, the relationship work you have recently done begins to pay off, even if your partner or companion hasn't yet noticed the difference in your behavior. It's easy to get discouraged today waiting for recognition, especially if others appear to have an easier time than you in the romance department. Don't let your impatience spoil the positive changes that are right around the next corner. Your good intentions and a solid commitment to authenticity are enough to keep you on the right path.

Although you might be worried that you can't handle your current responsibilities now, your friends and associates are confident you can rise to the occasion. Even if you aren't interested in working so hard today, you still have the necessary stamina to finish the job. But if you find yourself distracted by an unexpected event, simply refocus on your goals as quickly as you can. Ultimately, your steady demeanor and fierce determination will lead you to the success you seek.

Even if you are working to solidify plans with others, a gulf can widen between you and a friend. It's frustrating if progress is delayed by your attempts to figure out who's right and wrong today; a smarter strategy assumes that everyone has something positive to offer. Your chances of success improve when you take the best parts of each idea and combine them to create the ultimate plan. Cooperation isn't easy today, but a healthy process of give and take produces the results you want.

There are more than enough facts at your disposal today, and additional information doesn't make your decision any easier. Nor does knowing more ensure a better outcome, even with the Moon finishing up her stay in your 3rd House of Information. You probably already have all the answers you need. Don't bother sorting through the details one more time; instead, clear your mind of excess distractions. The right choice will come from your internal wisdom and not from external sources.

Although you're quite aware of your feelings today, you don't necessarily want to make them available for public consumption. Others probably realize that you're keeping your concerns to yourself, but they might not be able to figure out how to react to your silence. Thankfully, you don't have to worry about what others think now; you only have to decide for yourself how much you want to share. Keep in mind that revealing your secrets not only increases your vulnerability, but also sets the tone to strengthen a significant relationship.

You may be swept up in a complex dilemma that pushes you up against the edges of your own comfort zone. But it's really not as dramatic as you make it out to be, even if you're anxious hanging out in the emotional realms. Don't waste energy trying to control your feelings since that strategy never works as well as you wish. Instead, carefully observe what makes you uncomfortable today as your key planet Venus tenses up under stern Saturn's pressure. If you're willing to go there, self-awareness is the most effective catalyst for change all by itself.

You might be required to make a choice today, and responsibility typically wins out over fun while sensible Saturn forms a stressful square with pleasurable Venus. It appears as if fateful circumstances are controlling your life now rather than your own desires -- and it grates on your nerves because you prefer to be in charge of your own destiny. Pushing through your own resistance is your key to gaining knowledge about higher truths. Delaying gratification seems like a sacrifice, but it could lead to a deeper sense of contentment in the long run.

Although you have to manage your normal routine today, it's important to also take time to reflect on your emotional needs. Even if your current self-absorption seems a bit out of character, you stand to make real gains if you can isolate what you want for your own happiness. You might try to apply logic to an illogical situation, but it won't help you untangle your feelings now. Take a risk and leave the rational world behind while you explore the realms of your imagination and heart.

You are quite capable of creating a bubble of happiness around you if you can graciously accept the present limitations now. Unfortunately, it seems as if there isn't room enough in the bubble for anyone else, so you may experience a temporary sense of isolation. Nevertheless, the constraints are imaginary; there are no barriers between you and those you love, except the ones you build yourself.

You think you can sidestep relationship obligations because you have more important things to do today. However, you won't be able to escape from doing your part without adversely affecting the dynamics between you and loved ones. You might not be pleased with those who make demands on you, but you don't need to isolate yourself to prove your point. Instead of erecting unnecessary boundaries around your heart, try meeting others halfway. Finding a healthy balance between dependence and freedom is your best route to a happier personal life.

Someone at work may get on your case today about an issue you consider trivial. You might not intend any harm, but what you say now can inadvertently hurt a person you care about. Try to maintain a high level of compassion in all your interactions. If you open your heart, a friendship will have a chance to blossom, even if it doesn't happen overnight. Plant the seeds of good will and watch them grow.

You may have to confront issues of low self-esteem today, making you doubt your every move. However, relationship problems seem to grow if you withdraw to address your concerns on your own. Your detachment could make the other person uncomfortable with the emotional distance. Don't take yourself or anyone else too seriously now since the energy will warm up again in a few days. In the meantime, keep the communication channels as clear as possible to foster a harmonious atmosphere.

You might not even try to bridge the widening gap between your emotions and the circumstances of your life now that austere Saturn is at odds with sweetheart Venus. Be courageous and face the current issues, even if it doesn't seem like it's worth your effort. You may not feel fully satisfied with your accomplishments today, but the rewards will follow if you simply show up and do the work.

Your need for close companionship cools today, possibly leading you to spend time on your own in self-reflection. However, your friends and coworkers might misinterpret your behavior and think you're being negative in spite of how you explain your true intentions. Let your actions speak for you by doing something constructive, no matter how inconsequential it seems. Methodical and careful movement enables you to progress toward your goals while still keeping your emotions to yourself. Nevertheless, don't stay in your reverie too long or you might miss the support that's within reach.

You have social commitments that you prefer to avoid as friendly Venus struggles with cranky Saturn in your 11th House of Community. Unfortunately, you still must deliver on previous promises, even if you want to just lay low and fly under the radar. It may be easier to rationalize attending a function if you consider it to be business-related. Push through your own resistance and join the human race; you might end up having more fun than you anticipated. Fake it until you make it.

An emotional dynamic could work in one of two ways today. On one hand, you might pull back from the intensity of interactions with others to establish clear boundaries for yourself. On the other hand, you can apply your talents in more practical ways now. But even if you don't feel as creative as usual, your artistic or technical skills could still be put to good use. Overcome any lingering discouragement or self-doubt and swim steadily toward your goals.

You're concerned that time is running out and you still have a lot of unfinished business on your plate. Even if you have a plan to complete your work prior to the weekend, it's still a good idea to limit your nonessential activities so you can fulfill your obligations. It's not easy to make the best choices now unless you stand back from the social whirlwind, set new priorities and follow through in a practical manner. Thankfully, you have plenty of motivation and stamina to spare, so get busy while action packed Mars is working on your behalf.

You have plenty of ideas about your future, but can't decide on a single course of action when there are so many choices. It's challenging now because you prefer to limit your options and concentrate on one thing at a time. Exercise caution, even if you're still tempted to squeeze in another activity. Overbooking your day is currently not in your best interest. Honor your preferred work style by extracting the most out of every single experience before moving on to the next.

You may be so restless today that you're ready to leave the safety of your world in order to step into an adventure. Unfortunately, prior responsibilities make it nearly impossible to simply fly off into the sunset on your dream vacation. Nevertheless, the combination of the Moon's presence in your sign and retrograde Mercury's alignment with the Sun inspires you to plan even even more escapades. However, concentrating your attention on the immediate work at hand frees up more time to enjoy your explorations later on.

You're bouncing off the walls today and might have trouble calming your feelings. Fortunately, others can't see past your smokescreen of complacency; it's much easier to manage your desires by temporarily keeping them to yourself. Everything becomes more complicated once you share what is on your mind -- so be careful of what subjects you bring up on your own. Discretion is your secret weapon as long as you use it wisely. Knowing who to trust is the key to your success.

Your high standards at work make for unrealistic expectations that are difficult to meet now. Although you can understand why your associates are acting as they do, logic doesn't diminish your disappointment. It's a mistake to give up on a teammate when they have so much to offer. Your best bet is to cut him or her some slack for being who they are rather than who you want them to be. Standing by a potential ally strengthens your relationship for the long haul. Demonstrating your loyalty is a good place to start.

You have ambitious objectives and probably have already lined up a variety of interesting activities for the day. But the separate events might not unfold as expected. Don't stress yourself out trying to force your agenda on to the changing landscape. Luckily, you can hold on to your overall vision, even if you need to make adjustments to your original plans along the way. It might feel as if you're fighting for your survival, but you need to pace yourself if you want to come out a winner. You can forfeit a few battles and still remain victorious in the war.

It feels as if you're on a roller-coaster ride today as your emotions rise and fall and rise again, leaving you with a queasy feeling in the pit of your stomach. You might grow weary of the excitement, yet you don't know how to stop it. Don't worry; things are already in the process of slowing down, even if they remain intense throughout the day. The trick is to be present with your reactions in every moment without being obsessed about what happens next. Living in the here-and-now is not as easy as it sounds; nevertheless, peace of mind is a reward worth the effort.

Your emotions seem raw today but you're still capable of moving through powerful transformations very quickly. The efficiency at which you can process negativity now is a direct result of what you have already learned from doing your own shadow work. It's not time to battle with ghosts from the past; it's your turn to dance with them. Jump into the fire of experience and then let go when the metamorphosis is complete.

Although you might think you can cleverly step around an emotional swamp today, you may still become enmeshed in someone else's drama. Luckily, you won't stay too serious for long, since your wicked sense of humor is your saving grace now. Just don't laugh things off too quickly; being funny just to avoid an important issue won't solve a thing. Nevertheless, a proper dose of lighthearted charm at the right moment is the perfect antidote to a sticky situation.

You're tempted to employ a heavy-handed approach at work today, but your attempts will likely fall short of pulling it off successfully. Luckily, you're not inclined to take yourself too seriously now because you can see exciting possibilities every which way you turn. Even if you can't decipher your future clearly yet, there's no reason to push it away. Use your energy wisely to work with the natural currents instead of trying to control them. It's not your job to eliminate the clouds; the sky will clear on its own.

Your strategies are changing so fast now that it's hard to make long-term decisions. Cerebral Mercury is backpedaling past the Sun in your logical sign to rev up your mental activity. However, you may be afraid of losing your intellectual edge before you have a solid plan for the future. The current situation might not be as critical as it seems; your fears are probably worse than any possible outcome. Nevertheless, focus on the best-case scenario since your simple act of intention actually helps to manifest your vision.

You can't wallow in discouragement today, even if you encounter resistance from someone at work. Although an old issue may rear its ugly head again, you can deal with it from a position of strength, not weakness. The present circumstances are substantially different from the previous ones; you are a creator of your karma and not a victim of it. Focus on the sweet potential rather than doom and gloom. Maintaining a positive attitude may be more crucial to your future than anything else you can do now.

Harboring secret getaway plans could be a sweet distraction today, but they may fall apart once you remember all the promises you made. Even if you're willing to leave your responsibilities behind, there are too many other reasons quickly piling up against your great escape. But don't throw in the towel just yet. Everything is still in flux and you might find a way to realize your fantasy. No matter what happens, it's healthy to renegotiate the balance between work and play while you have the chance.

You're excited about your career now, yet it's also a source of endless worry. Finding a place of rest isn't easy as you are distracted by one thing after another today. Even if there are things going on beyond your control, you can bring about positive change if you're willing to be patient. Just because you can't do everything right away doesn't mean that your efforts aren't effective. Imagining your success is the first step to getting there.

Although you have good reason to be prudent with your finances now, you are still tempted to buy something beyond your means. Weigh out the pros and cons carefully before committing the money, for a large purchase might over-extend your cash position. Even if can justify your expenditure, it's still better to rein in your impulses than to learn an unpleasant lesson the hard way. Reevaluating your resources is a much wiser use of this time.

Oftentimes, you comfortably dance around the edge of your feelings, especially if you are uncomfortable with them. However, it's important that you get to the source of your desires now or you'll inadvertently create situations that will undermine your happiness. Reconsidering your relationship priorities is an excellent way to start this journey that leads you to reconnect with your heart.

If others are resisting your current pursuit of your dream, reconsider your role in bringing these unsupportive people into your life. The relationship houses of your chart are heating up, but you might need to look at your own past in order to better understand your current predicament. Draw on the courage of the Lion; it may hurt to learn what you need to know, but you'll feel more empowered once you know the truth.

Petty disputes with your friends or family may stir up old wounds today. Even if you believe it is wiser to leave old issues buried, they still might trigger conflict anyway. No matter how unpleasant it sounds, one more exploration into your personal history can help you gain clarity on your present life. Revisiting your past now could be an effective catalyst that ultimately sets your life back on track.

Your current circumstances at work may feel oddly familiar as you have trouble judging the relative importance of a particular situation. You often tend to look at the bright side of things, but can get hung up now with all that is wrong. Vacillating between optimism and pessimism makes it impossible to reach a final decision. Waiting a day or two to see where the energy takes you might be useful. Thankfully, your negativity could very well dissipate on its own if you just remember to recount your blessings whenever doubt begins to surface.

Although you might have a case of the blues today, you can change the game by not taking yourself too seriously. You may be reconsidering the relationship between how much you need to work and what benefits you receive in return. Unfortunately, it might seem as if you're being short-changed, but retreating to your corner to sulk won't solve anything in the long run. Stick with your routine for now, since your temporary discouragement will pass. Fortunately, your rewards are waiting just around the corner.

Deeply-rooted patterns are sneaking into your awareness today, awakening you from a fantasy that still continues to fascinate you. However, you can now see your attachment to the past. Even if there is some emotional pain connected with your memories, the air is being cleared so you may move on. There is no need to hang onto behaviors that aren't productive any longer just because they worked for you once before. Retelling your story in a different light transforms you from a victim into a hero.

Friends and relatives might make you uneasy today because they bring you face to face with your core values. Unfortunately, some principles that you hold dear are based upon opinion rather than fact. Thankfully, what you now learn can help you separate your beliefs from the truth. Don't be afraid to look at your life from an entirely different perspective. Reassessing your emotional needs creates an opportunity to build relationships on solid foundations rather than worn-out assumptions.

Although you are quite enthusiastic about your future prospects, prior commitments prevent you from heading off in a new direction now. Family obligations could be defining your schedule, but a busy calendar ultimately won't get in your way. You are unstoppable, even if everything takes longer than you wish. But don't let doubt creep into your thoughts. Instead, do what is expected of you today while you continue to dream about tomorrow.

You have the capability to make headway now on a variety of innovative projects, but your activities are not just about carefree, playful expression. What you create must also be practical. However, it's wise to be cautious about falling into the Venus trap of believing that beauty is more important than anything else. The good news is you won't have to deal with disappointment if you can remember to keep your feet on the ground when reaching for the stars.

You're more likely to be spellbound by the vision of an ideal romance today than tumble head-over-heels for any individual. Because this kind of conceptual love is hard to manifest, you may have a real problem on your hands, especially if you are dealing with someone else's jealousy. Striving to be honest is admirable, but this doesn't mean you should reveal all your fantasies. Nevertheless, be as clear as possible when sharing your feelings or you could face resistance to your free thinking.

You are less interested in getting dragged into an emotional discussion now than you are in losing yourself in a most sublime fantasy. Although beautiful Venus hooks up with illusory Neptune to fascinate you with dreams of perfect love, your joy could be founded on ideas of escape. Your inner world may be so alluring that you just can't resist the urge to daydream. Luckily, you can enjoy the diversion as long as you remember the difference between what's real and what's not.

Your charm can work wonders but cautionary alarms need to remind you that you are so convincing today that you could actually con yourself, too. Thankfully, you may be able to avoid self-deception by considering what others need from you instead of only looking out for your best interests. Your perspective widens when you engage in honest dialogue. Reexamining your priorities now prevents colossal headaches down the road.

Shift your thinking into the higher realms of spirituality, rather than only focusing  on your quest for romantic love. Find something that touches your soul and connects you to the beauty of the cosmos. Organized ritual works for some, yet reflective meditation may be better for others. Even a few minutes of solitude can provide a chance for you to hear your own inner voice that guides you on your magical journey.

It's a lovely surprise when a significant other opens up to you, so listen carefully with your undivided attention to every word said. It isn't useful today to criticize or even disagree with anything in particular. Simply receive a heartfelt disclosure as the precious gift it is. The potential for intimacy is great when you are invited into someone else's imagination, so don't ruin it by trying to be practical. Instead, give yourself permission to join in and dream a little dream, too.

You might attempt to cling to the irrefutable facts as if they are a lifeline today because fantasies can totally disrupt your efficiency. The songs of the mythical sirens are luring you away from logic and the lush landscape of imagination can be very enticing. Don't fight the call just because you are afraid it's not real; let your guard down and allow the magical healing power of love fill your soul with joy.

Although you are naturally attuned to beauty, now your tastes are more refined and your opinions are more defined. Your key planet Venus conspires with fanciful Neptune to raise the bar of excellence when it comes to experiencing pleasure. You can visualize your ideal, yet you are also captivated by the intensity of the present moment. Let your love light shine by encouraging your creativity to take flight and your imagination to wander.

You may tumble down the rabbit hole today, a victim of sweet infatuation, but you might not tell anyone about it. Although you could be quite entranced with your magical journey, it feels safer to stay quiet about your emotions now, especially if you're not prepared to deal with the consequences. The choice is yours; your heartfelt desires belong to you alone, so don't be afraid to wear a mysterious smile and keep everyone guessing for a while longer.

Your willingness to believe your own hype sets you up to promise more than you can deliver today. You might think others are expecting a superhuman performance from you, no matter how much you do to prove your competence. Instead of tiring yourself out trying to accomplish too much, pare back your activities before it's too late. Even if the variety of possible activities makes it difficult to prioritize them, choose anyhow and move on. Whatever you decide will create a life of its own.

Trusting your senses is tricky business today, especially if you think you should be doing something else than what's on your calendar. It seems unfair that you can't just enjoy the beauty of the moment, but it may not feel right to abandon your chores. Working hard early in the day is one way to alleviate the stress and can help you to justify blocking off time to escape into a fantasy later on. Your future grows from the seeds of potential that you sow into your fertile dreams.

Your charisma is more alluring than you realize today, as the magical Venus-Neptune alignment heaps an extra helping of radiance onto your plate. Sharing your dreams enables you to transmit vibes that capture others in your web of illusion. Your mind is powerful now and may even affect physical reality. Wizard-like, you can think yourself stronger, taller or prettier -- and magically, that is how you are perceived. Use this special gift wisely for the good of all.

Some things are better left unsaid, so just soak in the pleasure of sweet stillness today and enjoy the unspoken stories of love. Your key planet Neptune sends you to the outer limits of your imagination as it receives a delicious kiss from enchanting Venus. Even if you try to explain what's happening, your words cannot adequately convey your magical flights of fancy. Silence is golden during moments of indescribable beauty.

Your drive to explore new territory is countered by uncharacteristic feelings of self-doubt today. An inner voice reminds you to be sensitive to other people's needs over your own. However, the advice won't likely prevent you from acting on a brilliant idea if you have the chance. Just remember to temper your desire for immediate action with kindness so you don't inadvertently hurt someone you love. Taking the high road sets the standard for everyone to follow.

You just might save the day by inventing the amazing plan that everyone has been dreaming about. Ironically, your stroke of brilliance could come at the very last minute. Your logic is sound today, even if it' s unconventional and unexpected. Sharing your idea encourages others to lend their support to your solution. But don't be afraid to take charge now; assume a leadership role until you are sure that everything is running smoothly and can be left in the hands of someone who can take it to the next level.

You are flying at top speed today, yet you still feel something weighing you down. The feeling of carrying too much baggage may be associated with an unpleasant memory that raises issues of self-doubt. However, you can't get very far as long as you're in denial. Thankfully, you can change everything by simply being more aware of your emotions and taking responsibility for your current actions. The dead weight could be dropped in an instant once you accept your past and move on.

You want to express your emotional needs as forthright as possible today, and you expect people to sit up and take notice of your clarity. There might even be one particular person you hope to impress, prompting you to act impulsively in a manner that is completely out of character. Your spontaneous behavior could attract the attention you seek, but maybe not in the way you prefer. Don't try so hard; just be yourself and don't worry so much about the outcome. Speak your truth and let the chips fall where they may.

Helping others is a primary concern today, but you prefer to do it sight unseen while the Moon is still visiting your 12th House of Invisibility. Thankfully, you can accomplish something that means a great deal to someone close to you after the Moon's midday shift into your sign. You might not even realize what you did, but your generous actions could bring deep healing to a loved one. Fortunately, grandiose gestures aren't necessary; it's your intention that matters most.

There is no reason to take the fall for someone else's erratic behavior. If a coworker does something that catches you off guard today, just do your best to take it all in stride. Luckily, unexpected twists and turns could open your eyes to a different way to do a routine task. It might seem like a reach at first, but you may discover that you're the only one who has been standing in the way of your success. Changing your perspective gives you new options.

You might step away from the spotlight today because you know you're not in control of others while the Sun aligns with unpredictable Uranus in your 7th House of Relationships. You don't mind a bit of anonymity, but it might be time to reexamine your insecurities if you're uncomfortable with a lack of attention. Luckily, you could be more effective now using your talents to help someone else achieve their goals. There's no need to worry if you don't receive the credit you deserve today; the spotlight will return to you soon enough.

You might feel as if there's no way out of your previous commitments. You're willing to resign yourself to do what you said, even if you're unhappy with how things have developed. Thankfully, everything can suddenly flip as an ingenious idea lights up your brain like a flash of lightning. Prepare for positive change with cheerful optimism since your attitude can make as big a difference as anything else.

Fitting into the standard constraints of a traditional relationship is nearly impossible now that your emotions explode with brilliance in their own unique way. You have something very special to offer, so don't be too self-judgmental if your heart refuses to take orders from your head. Fortunately, those closest to you probably already know that your intentions are well meaning. If they can appreciate you for who you are, rather than who they want you to be, it should all work out. But first, you must learn to love yourself.

You are in direct touch with your feelings now as you attract highly emotional people into your orbit. You often avoid revealing too much vulnerability, but you might be destabilized enough today to open up to someone you trust. Exploring a tough issue gives you a chance to learn more about yourself. Luckily, a difficult situation can rapidly morph into a more pleasant one if you're willing to roll with the incoming waves. Let go of your expectations and embrace the unknown.

You might believe you're headed for a major conflict today, when out of the blue everything dramatically improves. Don't try to rein in anyone's behavior because your fear of a negative outcome could actually coax it into manifestation. Thankfully, you have the power to sidestep an unnecessary dispute today if you remember that open conflict won't bring you any closer to your goals. Solve your current problems within your brilliant imagination before trying to affect positive change on the outside. The solution is within the grasp of your mind.

It could be safer than you think to jump into the  abyss of the unknown today, as long as you trust that everything will work out for the best. Fortunately, you are able to gather the support you need now as long as you establish clear priorities. Nevertheless, your creative visualizations only take you so far.
