The power of positive thought still needs to be reinforced with a concrete plan and solid effort. You can turn a long shot into a sure bet if you're willing to work for what you want.

It may seem as if you've been coloring within the lines for too long, but now you remember what it's like to be your creative self. Today's showy Leo Full Moon highlights your 5th House of Fun and Games, urging you to express yourself spontaneously, whether or not you are artistically inclined. But even if you struggle finding a source of inspiration, a touch of uncertainty works in your favor today if it prevents you from doing something foolish. Paradoxically, you can dazzle others with your brilliance without going over the edge.

Your professional stability may be under stress now, especially if you also have to manage inescapable domestic responsibilities. The Leo Full Moon falls in your 4th House of Foundations, shifting your focus to personal matters, even without family obligations weighing on you today. When your inner core is tested, you're motivated to dig in your heels and stand firm. Your tenacity serves you well as long as you don't overplay your hand.

You might try to remain incognito today, but casting the spotlight on your contributions isn't such a bad idea. You could even turn out to be a hero if you're willing to take a risk and make a splash. But presenting too many alternatives at once may prove distracting to all involved. The demonstrative Leo Full Moon shines in your 3rd House of Communication, inspiring you to see a viable solution others miss. Simplify your ideas and they will carry you and those around you toward greater success.

Trouble could be brewing if you recently made extravagant purchases that were not within your budget. Your self-esteem is at stake, so you might go ahead and spend more, even if you don't really have the resources. Meanwhile, today's Leo Full Moon lands in your 2nd House of Money, placing extra emphasis on your finances. Being mindful of your current frivolous tendencies may be enough to help you keep your dollars in the bank. The most important blessings are not material ones.

Hiding your needs is a futile endeavor today, for they -- along with your idealistic dreams -- are creating observable ripples on the surface. This Full Moon in your sign increases the magnitude of your emotions and complicates your day more than you can imagine. But any attempts to bury your feelings now will just attract bigger problems. Your mantra is "express, don't suppress." Just keep kindness in mind when making a few waves of your own.

You could sour a sweet moment by giving it too analytical of a spin today. Just because you are anxious over the lack of clarity, there's no need to ruin a thrilling experience with so many details that you lose the magic. Luckily, the choice is yours because the Leo Full Moon lights up your 12th House of Imagination, reminding you that loose ends have their purpose. Don't try to push a situation to its logical conclusion; let the natural flow of events dictate your next move. There's no time like the present to pursue your dreams.

Avoid overstated dramatic gestures today, for it's more important to be in touch with your own feelings than to put on a show for someone else. Anything can happen now, but stress could quickly grow out of hand if you're too rigid about sticking to your plan. Although the Leo Full Moon stirs up drama in your 11th House of Social Activities, relationships can be a significant source of excitement if you're willing to let go of old expectations. Responding fluidly to the changing circumstances creates the most reliable path to satisfaction.

The difference between what you want and what you must do is greater than normal and you may believe that you've lost your way. The Leo Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Public Responsibility, heightening your sensitivity to the needs of your coworkers. But you're not willing to set your personal goals aside just to satisfy someone else's wishes. Achieving inner peace is nearly impossible if you assume an all-or-nothing attitude to save your pride. You have a shot at obtaining happiness if you know how to practice the art of compromise.

Those closest to you are amused and amazed at what comes forth from your mind today. You could be on a roll and believe there's no limit to what you can do while the lively Leo Full Moon brightens your 9th House of Adventure, infusing your imagination with inspirational ideas. However, it's prudent to remember you are as human as everyone else is. Soar to new heights but don't take anything past the point of acceptability. Consider your audience before you open your mouth.

You may be less certain than usual about your destination, yet, oddly enough, you could be more confident about getting there. Additionally, you are easily confused by other people's outrageous ideas now that the Leo Full Moon joins flamboyant Jupiter in your 8th House of Shared Resources. Although you're excited about new avenues of expression, you are also wary of making a sudden wrong move. If you can't yet determine your next step, it's not time to take it. There is no penalty for waiting until your path clears and your goal is in sight.

Although you might want to sidestep messy emotional involvements, withdrawing in fear only creates more tension. Stay fully present while others express their feelings, even if you aren't sure where the conversation is leading. However, the melodramatic Leo Full Moon rattles your 7th House of Partners, increasing the odds of someone needing more than you can give now. Establishing clear boundaries enables you to maintain your autonomy while still connecting with someone you love.

Make use of the vibrant Leo Full Moon's presence in your 6th House of Daily Routine to improve your overall well-being, especially if you recently experienced a health concern. Even if you are at the top of your game, you might be susceptible to stress now, so it's still wise to be proactive and watch your diet and get proper exercise. Instead of being overwhelmed by all the big changes on the horizon today, consolidate your vision by first making a list of your tasks and tackling something that is easily manageable. Small steps will lead you to success.

Someone close to you may push your emotional buttons today. Although you try to look the other way, you probably won't be able to hide your annoyance while assertive Mars aligns with self-righteous Jupiter. Presenting a smiling face won't be enough to avoid an interaction that could erupt into an unpleasant encounter. Thankfully, you can turn this difficult situation around by transforming your anger into compassion. Showing a little love and a lot of understanding goes a long way now toward making everyone happy.

You might feel as if it's time to set the record straight. You are prepared for a confrontation, if necessary, but everyone seems to mellow as the day draws on. Setting aside logic enables you to ride the emotional waves that originate within your subconscious without trying to suppress them. Although the relentless Leo Moon proves to be inflexible and tricky to handle, sharing an intimate experience can soften the energy and help to overcome your fears.

It's one thing to be absolutely sure of what you want, but fixating on any one particular goal is likely to bring you unhappiness today. You have a special opportunity now to push past an associate's judgment that's bothered you in the past more than it should. More importantly, you can use the power of positive thinking to turn a potentially obsessive approach into one that's certainly more manageable in the days to come. Pursue your dreams with a light touch and a joyful heart.

Your current resistance to change may be an obstacle to intimacy today. It's risky to reveal your feelings, so you might just let the present moment pass without saying anything at all. However, you have a chance to release an old pattern now. Start tentatively and focus on what is in your heart. Ultimately, your willingness to share your vulnerability can deepen your connection with someone you love.

You can feel the magic of romance everywhere you go today. However, a dynamic change in a relationship won't likely happen until you're willing to listen to your partner and receive the same support you give so easily. Keep in mind that everything isn't always fun and games and that opening your heart to love also means opening it to heartache. Fortunately, a highly charged emotional interaction could morph into a more comfortable one later on if you're willing to let the process take its course.

You desire a quick resolution to a lingering disagreement and may try to force an issue in order to catalyze an already unstable situation. Don't push your luck by demanding that everyone stop in their tracks and listen to your every word. Paradoxically, your intentional avoidance of a tough issue can be just as dangerous as placing it the spotlight. Allowing your feelings to surface naturally without judging them as right or wrong keeps you on the path to emotional equilibrium.

You may feel weary from following the dramas of your friends and associates, yet their stories have somehow become yours. It's no simple task to separate yourself from all the interpersonal relationships that require your time and attention. Although your stress might not disappear overnight, there's movement that brings you some comfort today. Don't try to figure out everything on your own. Leaning on a trusted companion can help just enough to move things in the right direction.

You can't escape from your powerful feelings, even if it's not easy to integrate them into your day. Although it's usually wise to share what you want with someone you love, it's unfair to make him or her responsible for your satisfaction. Staying somewhat detached from the outcome creates sacred space for an original solution to magically unfold. Practicing just a touch of emotional self-restraint at the right moment can make all the difference in the world.

You may jump to conclusions today, assuming you can get your needs met without even considering how others might respond to your actions. An irritating aspect between warrior Mars and bombastic Jupiter warps your perspective and could trigger behavior that's out of proportion with the current situation. There's no need to turn a minor setback into a national emergency. Quietly working behind the scenes accomplishes more than making a scene. Just remember, there is no free lunch; prepare to work harder than ever if you want to find lasting satisfaction.

You might try to resist the pressure to reexamine your feelings today, for self-exploration currently seems like a lot of work without much benefit in return. Unfortunately, your desire to cling to the status quo could cost you dearly if you let an opportunity pass you by. Keep in mind that the real reward won't likely be found in riches or recognition, especially now karmic Saturn is activating the Sun in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. The good news is that you have a chance to experience a spiritual growth spurt, which can bring a kind of happiness that money can't buy.

A casual discussion with a friend or partner today might raise unexpected emotional issues. Although this conversation may be constructive, it's easy to slip into disagreement over your conflicting needs. Applying a healthy dose of compassion helps you understand that you can have differing perspectives while still supporting one another's dreams. This mutual appreciation is a prerequisite to discovering a treasure that ultimately strengthens your relationship in a surprising manner.

Although it's not easy to comprehend all the forces that brought you to this very moment in your life, you're particularly clear about what you want to happen next. Unfortunately, current circumstances may not be very forgiving, offering you less leeway to respond to a complicated emotional dynamic. Luckily, you can make your decision-making process easier if you're willing to wait for satisfaction. Your patience is the key to ultimately achieving your goals.

You prefer to see yourself as unrestrained as an eagle riding the thermals, but your responsibilities might not give you enough freedom today for actual flights of fancy. Even if you believe you know an escape route, it's still quite complicated to break out and make your move. Don't be hard on yourself if you're unable to follow through on your plan. Just relax and sink back into your daydreams until you're ready to make them come true.

Oddly enough, you may be content to engage in a flirtation today without actually making any progress toward cultivating true love. Nevertheless, your weariness builds to a crescendo if others make unreasonable demands of your time, tempting you to make a hasty retreat from the relationship scene. However, facing your fears is one way to push beyond the comforts of the status quo. Communication is challenging now, yet the potential for transformation brings you closer to happiness one conversation at a time.

Your emotions can drag you all over the map today, making it nearly impossible to rely on logic to decide what to do. It isn't that you are being wishy-washy; it's just difficult to make up your mind when staying open to all the possibilities sounds more fun. One minute you are eager to cash in your chips and move on. But the next minute you are trying to figure out how to hold onto what you have already gained. An all-or-nothing answer isn't in your best interest now when there is so much middle ground available to explore and so much at stake.

You have an important lesson to learn at work today, especially if an associate is standing in the way of your progress. Uncharacteristically, your first impulse may be to escalate a minor confrontation into a major fight. But there's no need to prove your superiority now just to make a point. Instead, adopt a spiritual approach that is non-confrontational and less emotionally charged. Taking the high road sets a fine example for others to follow.

Everything could seem more complicated than necessary now, but you're not sure how to simplify your life to reduce your current stress. The complexity arises from your heart desiring something you don't know how to obtain. Holding firm to your personal goals now is a smart strategy that should ultimately pay off as long as you're willing to show some flexibility along the way. Discerning what is important and what is not is your ticket to success.

You have your heart set on getting ahead at work, but don't necessarily have enough patience to follow through with your plans today. The Moon's return to your sign increases your emotional sensitivity, leaving you frustrated because it would be easier to focus on your job without so many distractions from your personal life. Unfortunately, your friends and family might not be so supportive when it comes to your ambitions. Don't be afraid to set clear boundaries in order to honor your priorities. Paradoxically, knowing your limits is the first step to success.

You may feel trapped by the obligations of your daily life, temporarily blocking your creative flow. But your regular routine could fall apart now, making it all but impossible to think about realizing your dreams. Don't sell yourself short by believing that you can't do the miraculous. You are much more capable of conjuring magic than you know, but you must have faith and practice patience for positive results to manifest.

You need to decide whether or not you can keep up social appearances today while still remaining true to yourself. However, making the right choices now isn't as trivial as you think because they are part of an ongoing process that can redefine the structure of your relationships. Mental Mercury is arguing with physical Mars, intensifying your feelings as the boundary between platonic and romantic love is tested. There are no wrong paths to take now; no one can blame you for following your heart as long as you allow others to do the same.

Someone might give you a hard time about taking yourself so seriously today. Nevertheless, you have a lot going on now and you are not pleased if others disagree with you for no apparent reason. Keep in mind that it could be your own frustration that creates the bulk of your current stress. At least, make certain you continue to meet your obligations at work, even if you're still sorting out how to handle everything else. In the meantime, don't be afraid to laugh at your shortcomings. Let your sense of humor be your secret weapon as you go about your day.

You might not be a very happy camper if a friend or family member wants something from you that you can't deliver now. Unfortunately, these demands could precipitate a power struggle that won't likely have a clear cut winner because of complicated interpersonal dynamics. Instead of getting ahead at someone else's expense, just focus your energy on being as awesome as possible. Don't waste your energy trying to fix an insoluble dilemma; alter the rules of the game, instead.

Although you may be motivated to shake up the status quo today, a stabilizing Mercury-Saturn connection means you won't be successful until you acknowledge your current limitations. Fortunately, circumstances won't remain static, even if you don't see a clear path to your destination. Trying too hard now only pushes your goal further away. Paradoxically, loosening your grip on the future is the best way to make sure that you arrive there on time.

You're tired of having to learn hard lessons and may act in a rebellious manner just to see what you can get away with today. You're tempted to stir up a bit of mischief by challenging an authority figure who appears to be overly rigid in his or her approach. Examine your part in fomenting the current tension. Once you stop projecting your internal battles onto anyone else, relationship dynamics become much easier to navigate. Finding peace with others starts by creating peace within.

It's nearly impossible to know when to stop, for you are overly enthusiastic about what lies ahead. You are an inspiration to others today, motivating them to join you in the passionate pursuit of your dreams. Nevertheless, it's important to be cognizant of the needs of those around you, for it's easy to forget what other people want when you are so fired up about your plans. Your key to success now is taking the time to see things from a variety of perspectives.

You crave attention now and want to be appreciated for all that you do. It is easy to feel unrecognized, but your perceptions aren't necessarily based on reality today. Instead of putting on a song and dance, hoping that others will notice you, just soak in the current dynamics without laying your expectations on top of everything. It may be awkward at first, but as long as you don't ask to be the star of the show, you can get the recognition you need.

Your ideas may be so outrageous now that others wonder if you've temporarily lost your way. If you are called upon to give a five-minute presentation, you will likely have fifteen minutes of solid material. You are eager to commit more resources than you have at your disposal. Just keep in mind that your scope of vision is widened far beyond your normal view today. Consciously narrowing your focus greatly improves your chances for success.

There's a hard-to-define distinction between following your dreams and tending to your current priorities. It's easy to close your eyes and see the world as a perfect place now, but your vision may only exist in the realm of fantasy. You can set yourself up for disappointment, since your illusions will eventually collide with reality. If you maintain a practical approach to reaching your goals, you will have the potential to be truly inspirational.

Although you might believe you're being very concise in your message, your ideas are so big now that others miss your point completely. It's as if your meaning is lost in the translation and all that comes across is your heightened sense of urgency. However, if you temper your hopes and dreams with a bit of hard cold reality, you can  avoid creating any confusion. Speak less and listen more; this rather uncomplicated strategy could not only save the day, you may learn something eye-opening in the process.

You routinely expend a fair amount of energy making sure that all the details are in place, but now every little task takes more time than you expect. Distractions, however pleasurable, pull at your attention from every direction. You may as well abandon your previous plans and just do the best you can to navigate the chaos. Be easy on yourself; whatever isn't completed today can always be finished up later on. Even you virtuous Virgos deserve a bit of respite from responsibility.

The more you try to explain your motives today, the less sense you make. Nevertheless, you have a strong desire to garner support from your loved ones and are ready to take extreme measures to get others on your side. If you truly want to be seen in a clear light and appreciated for who you are, unfold your story step by step instead of spilling all the beans at once. Sharing your dreams with someone worthy of your confidence can be a magical journey if you slow down and do it right.

People at work keep you on your toes today, for their ideas seem to be more ambitious than yours. Listening to others talking about their hopes inspires you to aim higher when making your own plans. In fact, you might feel so confident that you attempt something you've never done before. However, it's prudent to scale back your commitments even if others are encouraging you to take on more. Unfortunately, following someone else's dreams can only set you up for disappointment. Ultimately, you're the only one who knows what your heart truly needs.

Although you may be an optimistic person, today you take things to a new level and are a case study in the power of positive thinking. But even if you believe the world is your playground, you're still being tugged in opposite directions. On one hand, you're ready to bail on your responsibilities and spend the day in the pursuit of pleasure. On the other hand, you are fully aware of the needs of those around you and are willing to do whatever you must to help them. Your altruism is admirable but your mission is to find a way to merge the two divergent paths into one.

You have a crucial role to play today on the job or at school. Your current willingness to work with others encourages them on their personal quests. Your panoramic vision enables you to see how an individual's agenda fits into the larger scheme of things. Nevertheless, you must manage your enthusiasm because your words may inadvertently inspire someone to take on more than they can handle. Tone down your exuberance a notch and you just might end up being a real live superhero.

Your friends may caution you about the dangers of taking the easy way out of your responsibilities. Nevertheless, your mind is not on work today; your thoughts are consumed by a variety of more intriguing options. Although your exit plan might not be a graceful one, you can squeeze in a bit of extra fun now, even if others disapprove. The trick is to find a middle ground so you don't go overboard in your search for a good time. Moderation is the key to staying out of trouble.

Your coworkers express their needs to you in a dramatic fashion today, but their overblown presentations don't necessarily help you understand exactly what they want. You would like to support them, but the more you listen, the less sense it all makes. Don't be afraid to ask for specifics so that you can make a decision based upon your own priorities. Putting in a little due diligence empowers you to choose with a clear conscience.

You try to please others today, but even your best intentions are not good enough if your behavior seems abrasive. Your emotions may run so deep now that it's healthier to err on the side of caution than to reveal your feelings to others. Although you can wait until tomorrow when everyone is less sensitive, you could begin to open up right away as long as you remember to move slowly. Giving your friends the space to integrate what you say is a more thoughtful approach.

Managing relationship dynamics is more complicated than you expect today. Although you might be able to tell there's a lot going on beneath the surface, finding your way through potentially explosive emotional landmines could be tricky business. Don't stick with an agenda that isn't working; instead, respond to each situation as it develops. You can always return to your unresolved issues tomorrow when the coast is clear. Authentic communication doesn't have to be volatile if you consider everyone's feelings right from the start.

Your underlying motives might not be as altruistic as they seem, even if you go out of your way to put others at ease now. However, there's nothing wrong with your desire to be admired by someone you like, especially since you're more productive when you feel appreciated. You fall into the communication flow when there's a healthy balance of give and take. Nevertheless, the best kind of love is offered without keeping score of what you receive in return.

Even if you believe everything is unfolding naturally today, someone close to you may still think you're too controlling. But any manipulative behavior is probably motivated by your fear of someone taking advantage of you. However, there is some truth to both sides; if you can become comfortable with any outcome to the current situation, the need for power struggles dissipates. Building trust is more important now than reaching your final destination.

You may obsess about what you're going to do today, but over-planning is likely a waste of time. You could misread the dynamics of a situation and make a faulty assumption by relying on wrong data. Or, perhaps, the circumstances might change without warning, turning your entire schedule upside down. It doesn't matter whether or not you were ever really in charge; unresolved tensions relax when you finally let go of control. Sharing power shakes up the energy and increases your chances of success.

There is no need to overreact if someone makes unreasonable demands of you today. Your best  strategy is to push back with a firm but gentle touch. Mischievous Mercury is still backpedaling in your 6th House of Routine, so misunderstandings might easily creep into the picture if you respond too quickly. Take your time and consider the feelings of others before creating ripples that will spread on their own. Clear communication is key for creating more harmonious relationships.

It might seem as if your friends are not being very supportive of your goals at first, but your worries could be unfounded. You may have too much on your mind and too many leftover chores weighing on your shoulders to be objective. But don't expect everyone to rush to your rescue now, just because you're under pressure. Luckily, sticking to your initial plan will actually help you handle your personal obligations on your own. Take pride in your current self-sufficiency, and earn a few admirers along the way.

Your energy reserve may be on empty today, making you feel rather frazzled if you can't establish a steady work pace. Something slipped just slightly out of alignment and it could take a conscious attitude adjustment on your part to snap your thinking back into place. You're due for a break from whatever you're doing; anything that changes your focus in a healthy way should also help you regain your natural rhythm and passion for life.

Saving your pennies isn't your idea of fun, but you wouldn't have to pay attention to your finances today if you took care of your personal business yesterday. You wish you could kick back and fantasize about the unrealized potential in your life and concoct long-term plans, but an immediate cash flow problem demands that you handle it right away. Don't put off the inevitable; the sooner you get started, the sooner you can return to manifesting your dreams.

You can't decide whether to push ahead more forcefully now or if it's smarter to temporarily retreat. Frustration sets in if you wish you took a different course of action. But what you do next might not matter so much; rest assured there isn't any right or wrong way to go from here. Either way, your path may be temporarily obscured. Your wisest strategy is to bide your time until you receive a clear sign from the universe that tells you which direction to take. Even you ambitious Mountain Goats deserve a day of fun every now and then.

Your dreams contain messages, whether you remember them as soon as you wake up or if they return as fragmented images throughout the day. However, it's wiser to proceed with caution because your fantasies seem so real that they can lead you on a wild goose chase. Don't just assume that you have enough information now to discern the difference between fact and fancy. Considering these are the last days of Mercury retrograde, maintain a wait-and-see attitude until your clarity returns.

Your intuition is operating on warp drive now, making you even more attuned to other dimensions. In fact, you might even feel as if you're living your life within a dream. However, something weird happens that wakes you up today, reminding you to be more practical when it comes to your priorities. You may not be completely comfortable during this drastic transition, but applying your common sense in the present moment could save you from disappointment later on. Combining both worlds places you in a position of power.

Other people may be sitting on fences today and nothing you say or do seems to be enough to push them one way or the other. Rather than working yourself into a state of frustration, stop and reevaluate your part in creating this uncomfortable predicament. In fact, your insecurity might be more of a problem now than another person's ambivalence. There's nothing to be gained by forcing a decision prematurely. Remember, you tend to lead the pack; give others the time to make their own choices at their own pace.

You're concerned that you could miss an exciting opportunity if you don't take proactive steps and share what's on your mind immediately. However, your sense of urgency might not be supported by the facts. Although you may be prone to overreact today, time still could be running out -- just not as quickly as you think. Your enthusiasm is contagious, yet slowing down the delivery of your message increases your chances for success.

Normally, you have the quickest wit in the room, but you could grow anxious today if you can't process your ideas as fast as they pop up. For brief moments you're so sure of yourself that you're likely to jump to erroneous conclusions. Instead of attempting to integrate every thought that surfaces, weigh the relative importance of each idea so you can let go of the less important ones. It's currently more crucial to set sensible priorities than trying to follow every whim. Thankfully, having a practical plan in place inspires you to keep on track.

Your changing feelings about a family matter are easily misinterpreted today by someone who thinks you don't care enough to choose a side. But the nurturing Moon's visit to your 4th House of Domestic Conditions indicates that nothing could be further from the truth. In fact, you may be quite sympathetic to more than one solution, so inform those you love of your current thoughts to avoid any further misunderstandings. There is no hurry to make a decision as long as you're being perfectly honest and allowing others to do the same.

You may be cast in the role of a peacemaker today, acting as a shuttle diplomat that goes back and forth between the disagreeing parties. Even if you have your own opinions, keep them to yourself for the sake of harmony. Don't let anyone trick you into taking sides or you could lose your neutrality, along with your ability to assist others in establishing common ground. Your enlightened compassion is the foundation on which others can build understanding.

It's not your top priority to convince others to accept your beliefs, but this doesn't mean you're a pushover if someone tries to persuade you to support a different point of view. However, you might surprise a friend or associate by how quickly you can shut down in order to defend your core values if you're feeling cornered. Ultimately, letting others know your limits right from the start is a better strategy than overcompensating after the fact. Standing your ground is easier than you think.

You could believe everything is copacetic with a friend or relative, only to discover that you overlooked an essential fact. Meanwhile, others may lose patience with you because they incorrectly assumed you already knew the truth. However, it really doesn't matter whether the error was of your making or if information was purposefully withheld. What's most important now is that you learn from your mistakes and then move on. There's no substitute for the wisdom of experience.

You often have more going on behind the scenes than others know about, and today you can take this complexity to an entirely new level. Flashing a smile to cover deeper concerns may not seem honest, yet it's still an effective coping mechanism to make it through the day. You will have an opportunity to clear the air of hidden emotions soon enough, but for now, there's no need to rush the moment. In the meantime, continue to observe your shifting emotional landscape without feeling the need to share your thoughts until you're ready.

Although you may already have exciting plans in place, the future is not set in stone. In fact, the Moon's presence in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals indicates there are multiple possibilities on the horizon. You're not tied to one specific outcome anymore, so feel free to envision a variety of adventures in your mind before choosing one to make real. Exploring fantasies about your great escape is the first step to making it a reality. Plant the seeds of tomorrow in your dreams today.

Playing it cool may not convey what is actually in your heart today. Although you prefer to demonstrate your objectivity and detachment, people could misunderstand your understated approach now, assuming that you care more about your ambitions than about your home and family. Fortunately, you can remain fully engaged without having to be overly emotional. Just be sure to let others know that they mean the world to you while you have the chance.

Someone close to you might say something that strikes you as rather odd today. You may try to let it go, but you still could become stuck on this awkward moment until you determine the source of your angst. Remember, you don't have to wait for a question to grow into a full-blown problem before you handle it. Express your concerns as they arise, instead of walking away from a potentially uncomfortable discussion. Facing the music is easier the sooner you do it; honesty creates harmony.

Understanding other people's motives is nearly impossible now, for they only offer you specific parts of the big picture. Although useful information may be lurking beneath the surface, you're not interested in spending your precious time peeling layers of the onion just to get to the core. Instead of looking for answers you don't have yet, just work with what you already know. Trusting your intuition is what you Fish do best.

You can tell that your most important relationships are evolving, but you still might feel that your forward progress is impeded as interactive Mercury approaches the end of its retrograde period on Wednesday. You may attempt to focus on your work but your mind is wandering around in another dimension today, trying to remember a dream that seems important for some unknown reason. Set aside a block of time to meditate since your subconscious has important messages to reveal now if you're willing to stop and listen.

You know that there is still plenty of work to do, but the long-term outlook appears so rosy that you could get lazy about meeting your current obligations. However, don't wait until it's too late to put your legendary determination to good use. Finding new sources of motivation is key to your success, because if you don't do it, no one's going to do it for you. Claim your power and use it for the good of all.

Buzzing around like a busy bee sounds like a legitimate way to spend your time today, but it's challenging to accomplish as much as you wish. Thankfully, an unexpected energetic surge propels you to prepare for Mercury's direct turn on February 11. Rather than initiating new projects, shift your priorities to completing as many unfinished tasks as possible. Although you might feel frustrated because you cannot do everything you want, it's easier to tie up loose ends now than in the weeks ahead. Nevertheless, mapping out your plans in your imagination sets the stage for the future.

The fevered pace at work may be a lot to handle now, but luckily, the intensity could begin to settle down later in the week. Nevertheless, it's helpful to take some time away from the chaos today. Explore new avenues for growth, rather than only showing up at your job and doing what's expected. Having a good strategy in place empowers you to meet the challenges ahead while also offering you the chance to pursue a new opportunity.

You wish you could be footloose and fancy-free today, yet you cannot justify taking time off when there are so many things to do. Complaining about your chores won't help since it only shifts your attitude into a negative space. Take a deep breath and imagine fulfilling your obligations effortlessly and then being free to joyfully follow your bliss. If you can clearly visualize the results of your hard work, it will be easier to accomplish what is most important. A subtle change of perspective puts a positive spin on your day.

Methodically checking off items on your to-do list one at a time produces its own unique brand of satisfaction. However, now you wish you could just spend the day hanging out with a special friend. Your dreams linger on your mind now and you can't help but fantasize about your secret life as a rock star, dancer or artist. Although you've left your natural practicality behind now, it's not wise to abandon your responsibilities. Take care of business today and follow your heart tomorrow.

It seems as if you are being pushed and pulled between extreme likes and dislikes, and you can't anchor yourself in the real world. Your desire to navigate a more moderate course is complicated by the evocative Moon's current visit to your sign. Unfortunately, rapidly fluctuating moods make it nearly impossible to hide your emotions for long. Even if you pretend that everything is okay, others can see through your facade now. Stop resisting the ebb and flow of your heart; those who matter most will accept you just as you are.

Releasing unrealistic expectations can lead to a new lease on love now that sensual Venus hooks up with healing Chiron in your 5th House of Romance. Nevertheless, you might keep your feelings to yourself because you don't want to appear vulnerable. It's tempting to mask your heart by dazzling others with your ingenious ideas. But you're probably less interested in turning your thoughts into reality than using them as a smokescreen. Ironically, expressing your emotions is ultimately more productive than burying them.

It's a perfect day to spend time with friends, catch up on the past and talk about the future. Although you thrive conversing about the variety of interesting subjects, discussions can suddenly take you into totally unexpected directions. Don't try to control the topic of a conversation now; you might be pleasantly surprised by what comes up and where it leads if you're willing to go with the flow. You can find inspiration in the most unlikely places.

You often seem as steady as a rock, which encourages other people to rely on your dependability. Although you want to live up to your reputation, your promises can be much bigger now than your ability to fulfill them. Consider your motives; if you're accepting new professional challenges so someone will like you, think again before saying yes. However, if your commitment is truly for the benefit of all involved, nothing will stand between you and your goals.

The more you try to explain yourself today, the less clear your message becomes. Instead of wasting time struggling with this communication dilemma, just let it pass naturally. Others might see you as an impractical dreamer now, but it's only a temporary phase. You'll likely be back to your rational self tomorrow and once again everyone will know where you stand. In the meantime, let your imagination wander wherever it wants and see what treasures it discovers.

You're eager to find the lighter side of each moment today, but everyone else seems annoyingly serious. You could grow frustrated if your associates want you to be more thoughtful about how you prioritize your time now. Although you understand their feelings, you still may resist their efforts to change your plans. Reassure everyone involved that once you recharge your batteries you will return to your obligations with renewed enthusiasm. Play now, work later.

Managing your schedule is complicated today because seeing things in a clear light is nearly impossible. Although you want to get to the truth, you don't have the time or energy to pursue answers through endless analysis. It doesn't matter whether or not you even have a long-term plan; just set your goals high and do what you can to reach them. Any kind of productive behavior now is more useful than dreaming about what you could do sometime in the future. He who hesitates is lost.

You may be under the false illusion that people are giving you a hard time but, surprisingly, they rush to your rescue if you need their support. However, you must be open to graciously accept what others are offering now, or you could miss an opportunity to receive help over a rough spot. There's no reason to show your superiority, especially when your perspective is out of whack. Don't let pride stand between you and the love that's all around you.

No matter how determined you are to have a good time today, you're still likely to feel overwhelmed by all that's expected of you. Although you may have a plan in hand, sticking to it is no easy matter. The best bet is to just do whatever seems most important minute by minute along the way. Unfortunately, your time is running out. You can have fun another day; put your best foot forward now by finishing one task before beginning another. You may be happily surprised by how much you can accomplish if you start small and work hard.

Taking your mind off work may be tricky business these days, but your desires could drive you to distraction, whether or not they are convenient. Unfortunately, ignoring your feelings isn't a viable option now because they remain persistent, especially if you resist them. Surrendering to the inevitable is more sensible than trying to avoid it. Letting your emotions flow naturally allows your fears to transform into trust -- which, in turn, paves the way to a higher level of productivity.

Although you might not have an obvious reason to be more self-confident today, it feels as if you are being guided by a benevolent mysterious force. Nothing is gained by questioning whether or not this ethereal assistance is real, so just listen to your intuition with an open mind. No matter how you choose to rationalize your current experience, rest assured that acting on a hunch that's good for everyone involved is surely the right thing to do.

You're not ready to trust your choices today because you think you're missing a piece of the puzzle, but gathering additional information isn't the answer, either. Nevertheless, you still may want to do more research or, at least seek out the benefit of other people's advice. Even if you're concerned about the current conflict between your head and your heart, it's time to take a risk and let your passion guide you. Forget about finding logical justifications for something you already want to do. Follow your instincts now, for they will lead you in the right direction.

Sharing your vision of the future is a powerful catalyst for your friends and associates today. However, no one is interested in receiving more data now, so spouting facts and figures to defend your fantasies is a waste of energy. If you attempt to coerce others to support your plans, they may end up making empty promises just to placate you. Don't rely on anyone else to make your dreams come true when you have all the tools at your disposal to do it yourself.

There's no reason to add more stress to an already delicate situation, but your forthright response could be tough for someone to handle, anyway. On one hand, everything might seem more difficult than it has to be today. On the other hand, you're willing to follow an over-complicated plan because you have a very clear trajectory in mind, even if it's an unpopular one. Fortunately, you have the ability to elevate the overall mood by simply choosing to acknowledge the good in everything and everyone.

You want others to see you shining brightly in the best possible light today because you believe your actions are a source of inspiration. Luckily, you can keep far enough ahead of everyone else now that you appear to be a natural born leader. Fortunately, you don't have to do anything differently from what you have already done in the past. You have the most profound influence if you consistently act on your feelings with honesty and integrity.

Calculating your options and weighing the various pros and cons to your ambitious plans is your top priority now. Naturally, you want to make the best choices, but the most sensible course of progress grows more complicated with the crosscurrents from other people's opinions. Even if your closest friends and allies are on your side, they might withdraw emotionally once they realize that there's little for them to do. Fortunately, you are feeling more confident day by day, enabling you to continue a reassessment of your goals while waiting out the confusion.

You're anxious to assume a leadership position today because you intuitively know what needs to happen next. Unfortunately, those around you aren't so quick to relinquish their power now. Caution is advised; you can't just command an authoritative role in order to demonstrate your competence. Avoid direct confrontation at all costs; fortunately, you can use your ingenuity to find an indirect route to achieve your objectives. Creativity is your friend.

Miracles aren't likely to happen out of the blue, even if you woke up anticipating something special today. Nevertheless, serious healing magic can suddenly unfold right before your eyes as long as you don't try to force anything on your own. Above all, don't push your perspective on anyone else. Swim like a Fish in a school and, for now, take the course of least resistance. You might be happily surprised by the power in numbers.

Friends might attempt to entice you to go on a little adventure today, and you are more than ready to follow their lead. Be sure to examine all the facts first, whether it's a social engagement or a business venture, since you could be so eager to dive in that you're fully involved before you know the whole deal. Employing a little common sense can save you from having to untangle yourself from a complicated mess. Aries rush in where angels fear to tread.

Even the simplest act can turn into something very wonderful, but it could also grow into more than you want. Your friend or partner may get bent out of shape if you don't deliver on your promises. Normally, your determination would be enough to get you through, but today you are better off by consciously restraining from taking on too much. Realistically evaluating the size of any project before making a commitment is the most reliable route to success.

Life seems to present you with many lovely possibilities, but you need to be careful about saying yes to everything.Even though you see yourself as the supreme champion of multitasking, this is not the best time to spread yourself too thin. Distractions may lead you down a most enjoyable path for a while, but you have too much at stake to be unproductive today. Concentrate your energy and your intentions will bring the positive results you seek.

Your feelings are a source of strength today as the emotional Scorpio Moon harmonizes with vulnerable Venus in watery Pisces. But it's more complicated to integrate your changing moods with your thoughts because the Moon squares the Sun. Although sharing your heart with a close friend sounds like a good idea, you might choose to clam up instead of saying anything. Even if someone pressures you to talk, exercise your free will by setting clear boundaries and revealing your inner process only when you are ready.

Discord between your actions and your feelings may be the primary source of stress today. You know what you need, but are unable to express your heartfelt desires easily at this time. However, when you do finally tell others what you want, your tendency is to go overboard and say too much. Pay close attention to how people react to your requests and use their feedback to guide you through the rest of the day. When in doubt, err on the side of caution.

Something intangible may be missing from your life today, even if you feel loved by those closest to you. It's not that you're being unreasonable in your demands; it's just that you know exactly what you want and aren't willing to settle for anything less. Nevertheless, your dissatisfaction can dissipate if you lighten up  and are gentle with others. Remember, other people are probably doing the best that they can -- just like you. Sometimes perfection is an unattainable illusion that stands in the way of your happiness.

You're inclined to proudly display your feathers today as big old Jupiter encourages the Moon to strut her stuff. Nevertheless, you may feel conflicted because you want to be appreciated, yet you really don't want to draw too much attention your way. You might be afraid that others will notice the inconsistencies between your head and your heart. Muster up a bit of courage and face your fear; let those you love see you in your truest colors.

You might slip into a temporary funk as the tumultuous Scorpio Moon intensifies your emotions. However, you won't sink too deep now with the Moon aligning with jovial Jupiter and the radiant Sun. Thankfully, it's not difficult to transform any negative emotional patterns into positive ones today. Journey within to do your spiritual work, but don't forget to return to your center to receive the benefits of your process.

Finding that magical balance between rigid pessimism and blind optimism is a bit of a trick today as you're drawn to react with extreme intensity either way. The heavy Scorpio Moon squares buoyant Jupiter, placing you in the middle of a cosmic tug of war. But even if you are unsure of the outcome, taking a risk and expressing your emotions can turn an uncomfortable situation into one based on love and support. A simple disclosure on your part sets a positive example for others.

Handling your friends' emotional intensity may be quite stressful now, especially if they have strong opinions that sound non-negotiable. Even if you try to maintain a positive attitude, you might not be able to reason with them. Your best tactic now is to sidestep conflicts over trivial issues, saving your interactions for things that truly matter. Instead, practice the art of compromise and focus on the common ground that you share.

It seems as if every area of your life is touched by trickster Mercury's direct turn in your sign. Interactions with friends and family may get tied up in misunderstandings or, perhaps, a conversation just takes much longer than you expect. You might not be sure you can live up to other people's demands. However, you could be feeling leftover stress from the hectic pace earlier in the week. Nevertheless, you see bright glimpses of hope on the horizon. Staying flexible enables you to successfully ride the waves of opportunity in the days ahead.

This could be a momentous day if you stay in touch with your imagination, but the possibility of being overwhelmed by mundane issues is likely. Nevertheless, the most productive path now is defined by your dreams and not your immediate responsibilities. Naturally, you can't ignore what's on your plate in the present moment, but you can change your attitude and consciously let go of your resistance today. You don't have to surrender your dreams if you remember that you're fully capable of simultaneously walking in both worlds.

Naturally, you might wish previous commitments weren't weighing you down today, but there's no escape from fulfilling your obligations. The optimistic Sagittarius Moon encourages you to dream larger than life, but you still could appear irresponsible to someone else who thinks you should focus on the tasks at hand. Don't push your luck. You could get all you want and more if you eliminate the excess noise and take care of business. Channeling your enthusiasm into your work is your ticket to success.

Although you're distracted with big ideas about your future, it's critical to rein in your unrealistic fantasies and be as practical as possible today. It's tempting to ride your adrenaline rush and grab an opportunity that seems to offer big rewards in return. But things look better than they actually are, so it's sensible to set aside your hopes for immediate gratification and work toward improving your stability in the present moment. A carefully made choice now will ensure a happier outcome later.

You're not looking forward to buckling down and doing exactly what's expected of you today, yet this isn't an ideal time to reveal your true feelings by rebelling against authority. You may attempt to sidestep an unpleasant activity now, but you could just create additional problems if you run out on your obligations. Even if others tempt you with an intriguing invitation, save the fun and games for another day and hold up your end of the bargain. You might be surprised by the sense of pride you feel when you look back at your accomplishments.

You may resist the idea of working closely with someone today, but you could be persuaded to venture out of your safety zone no matter what kind of defensive tactics you employ. Instead of jumping through hoops to set up unnecessary roadblocks, soften your self-protective posture and be open to what others have to offer. It's more useful to stay connected with your feelings now than to deny your emotions just because they make you feel insecure. The discomforts of  vulnerability are outweighed by the advantages of collaboration.

Your generosity of spirit is appreciated by those who come into contact with you today because your positive attitude can be quite contagious. However, there may be an emotionally charged agenda that creates disagreement among friends and coworkers. Rather than declaring your position and then fighting for it, avoid becoming too attached to any one outcome. Go ahead and make a choice if you must, but be willing to meet others halfway. Common ground is built on mutual respect.

You may have a highly productive day in store, providing you can steer clear of conflicts with authorities. Unfortunately, you could inadvertently provoke a power struggle by doing something your own way. You should be able to minimize stress now if you remain sincere in your intentions and follow through to the best of your abilities. Thankfully, there's no need to prove your proficiency today; lessen the pressure by balancing your work with a little bit of lighthearted fun.

You might have assumed that you were directing the show today, but it turns out that you're not the one calling the shots. You may run into someone who thinks he's the boss, yet it's difficult to uncover the whole story about who is in charge. Instead of putting up a fight, just go with the flow while the drama unfolds. Be a careful observer of the dynamics behind the scenes but don't try to make any changes just yet. Once the bigger picture becomes clear, you will intuitively know  what to do next.

You thought you could finish everything that's expected of you, but your confidence may begin to wane as the day wears on. Fortunately, you can still come through with the goods today because you are motivated by the fact that everyone is depending on you. If necessary, you know how to push your limits to meet your deadlines. Don't be afraid to demonstrate what you can do. However, nothing will be gained by judging anyone else too harshly just because you're the model of efficiency now. Don't waste time comparing anyone's level of productivity to yours when you could be celebrating your success, instead.

Maintaining your confidence is critical today because the Moon joins somber Saturn in your 1st House of Personality. You may experience delays or encounter unexpected obstacles, creating bouts of self-doubt. Thankfully, this conjunction is in exuberant Sagittarius, offering some balance if you're willing to eliminate superfluous activities. You're better off if there are fewer tasks on your to-do list now so you have more time for each item. Creating a realistic agenda for yourself enables you to show others the meaning of success.

You may have several impulsive moments today when you are all too eager to pursue a fleeting whim. However, don't let your desire for instant gratification hijack your day. Even if you want to do the right thing, you're also keeping your eyes peeled for a quick escape. Remember, your key planet Saturn presents you with an extra load of responsibility. Fortunately, concentrating on your commitment to excellence soothes your current wanderlust, enabling you to settle down and be more productive than you ever imagined.

You're willing to put in long hours and work hard because you want to be considered an integral part of the team. However, you might go out of your way to appear easygoing because you don't want anyone to know how seriously you take yourself now. Ironically, you could sabotage your success by trying too hard. Consciously relaxing just a bit may be enough to let your true nature shine through so others can see the real value of your contributions.

You are driven to demonstrate your competence at work today and go out of your way to fulfill any promises you made. Nevertheless, it's not easy to keep on task with so many planets drifting through your sign these days. You can find additional stability from your interactions with others, but you also need to express your dreams, too. Don't deny your creative and imaginative side. Thankfully, concentrating on your outer goals doesn't require you to ignore your inner world.

You may be bored with your daily routine and are tempted to do something drastic about it today. Fortunately, you can get away with making changes that only a few days ago would have created problems. Don't let a current opportunity slip through your fingers. Pushing for short-term gratification now doesn't necessarily prevent you from establishing long-term goals as well. Working both ends of the time spectrum increases your odds of achieving success.

Aiming high is admirable, yet you may be too ambitious for your own good today. Reaching too far sets you up for failure and you could lose sight of what you can actually accomplish. If you fall short of your objectives, don't try to shift the blame to anyone else. Just temporarily scale back your goals and try again. Hitting your mark builds confidence and empowers you to strive for something more. You can produce great results if you're willing to start small and work from there.

You might feel slighted as the spotlight of appreciation shines on everyone except you while the Moon is traveling through your 7th House of Others. But don't lose sight of the fact that the real lessons come from confronting your feelings, and not from unconsciously projecting them on to those around you. Acknowledge your reactions to current circumstances as entirely your own; your behavior is ultimately more significant now than what someone else says or does. Fate is what happens to you while free will is how you respond.

You normally prefer contemplation prior to action, but you're likely to say you can do something now before you even consider the actual steps. Thankfully, you can always renegotiate a promise if your enthusiasm gets the best of you. It is far better to be straightforward and let everyone know what's going on as soon as you realize you are over-committed. No one will fault you as long as you're honest and diligently try to fulfill your obligations. Although you might not be able to move mountains today, your efforts certainly won't go unappreciated.

You have excess nervous energy that has nowhere to go today. Unfortunately, if you can't find a way to express it in a healthy manner, you could suddenly lose your temper for no reason at all. However, undertaking a complex project that demands all of your focus is a perfect outlet for your adrenaline. Don't worry about finishing everything you start now; just jump in and get the ball rolling. Your plans will magically come together once you are in motion. Thinking on your feet works in your favor when everything in your world is moving so fast.

Normally, you have more than your fair share of common sense at your disposal, but you seem to have misplaced your sound judgment today. You're striving for a more unconventional approach to a solution, but you may not be able to logically justify your radical ideas. Fortunately, your intuition is probably right on track. Instead of wasting precious time and energy explaining your every move, just do what seems the most expedient. Acting on your instincts now is your most reliable path to success.

Your plan to catch up on all the little things that you recently let slide makes it difficult to relax now. But your good intentions may not be enough to shift you into the right gear. Although you know what you must do to reach your destination, all you really want to do is chill. Nevertheless, don't postpone your chores. Making smart use of your time in the present moment is the quickest way to get the rest you seek.

You may be considering acquiring something you have wanted for a while. However, it wouldn't hurt to do another round of research now that the purchase date is getting closer. You might have set very high expectations, yet suddenly are surprised at how much everything costs. Don't needlessly stress about money because practicality will win out over fantasy soon enough. In the meantime, indulge your dreams because they encourage you to step beyond the status quo and into the unknown.

Everyone seems to know your story before you say a word today, prompting you to feel emotionally vulnerable. Nevertheless, the cavalier Sagittarius Moon is hanging out in your 1st House of Personality, putting your emotions right out in the open for all to see. But rather than worrying about someone's opinion of you, change your frame of reference and enjoy being recognized for who you truly are. There is no reason to hide once you remember that your fearless heart is your greatest strength.

Today it's a great idea to change your plans to include a bit of rest and recreation. You expend a lot of energy meeting your obligations and acting responsibly in your daily life. There's nothing wrong with wanting to kick back and take some downtime or run off with your friends. All work and no play isn't a healthy way to live; it's much better to embrace your desires and give yourself permission to unwind while you have the chance.

Today you long for some good old-fashioned fun. However, you could have so many social activities scheduled that they become more like chores rather than play. The friendly Sagittarius Moon illuminates your 11th House of Friends, making it nearly impossible for you to turn down an invitation. However, selectively eliminating a few invitations now clears your calendar and gives you a better chance for enjoyment. Sometimes the idea that less is more makes sense.

You naturally take charge today without even realizing it because your intuition is so strong. At first, you may not understand why things unfold so smoothly as circumstances seem to fall in your favor. Thankfully, the Moon harmonizes with your key planet Jupiter, bestowing cosmic good fortune upon you. Nevertheless, you must also do your part by remaining open to all of the opportunities knocking at your door. An adventurous attitude serves you well.

You want to balance your obligations with your need for fun and games once the Moon enters responsible Capricorn today. Although your regular routine brings you back down to earth, you're not necessarily willing to let go of the idealistic hopes that still brighten your future. Remain cautious and optimistic at the same time; you can skillfully manage the tension if you stay aware of both extremes while the tightrope is stretched between your desires and your commitments. A delicate balancing act serves you well.

A series of reality checks inspires you to regain your footing in the world. But until you know exactly where you stand, you won't be able to get on with the important business of rearranging your priorities and figuring out what you want to do next. Use this time to create a new strategy or improve a practical plan, and then get busy with the work of making your dreams come true. Reach for the stars but keep your feet on the ground.

You might not be used to taking everything so seriously, but thankfully, you are a fast learner. Even if you try to casually make plans, a carefree attitude won't help your cause now. You must set clear priorities and focus on the most critical issues or you could mistakenly commit to the wrong approach. Don't be afraid to make adjustments as needed. Concentrate your efforts through the early part of the day to get a jump-start on what's to follow. A stitch in time saves nine.

Your day may not flow according to plan, especially if you have to deal with an intense person who seems to enjoy pushing your emotional buttons. Perhaps the drama in a personal relationship becomes too much to handle now, or maybe you have a run-in with an old friend or lover that rattles your nerves. Don't retreat into your shell, even if this interaction is stressful right from the start. Something good will come of your persistence because there is a silver lining even in the darkest of clouds. Respond with love and not with fear.

Don't wait until someone else takes charge; step up to the plate and aim for the fence. As long as you act within a context of cooperation, things will work out for the best for everyone involved.

A combative atmosphere may reveal a difference of opinions at work today. External circumstances require you to perform at a high level of competence while doing your job. But you want to do some things your own way, only to find your path is blocked for one reason or another. Don't internalize your frustration because you will only stir up more stress if you do. The most obvious solution is to act with integrity and take pride in your work, regardless of everything else.

You have no patience with anyone who tries to prevent you from having your share of fun today. But pleasure is not your true goal; your real enjoyment comes from expressing what's in your heart. Fortunately, there's not much that can impede your creativity as playful Venus and Mars skip into your 5th House of Spontaneity. There's no reason to do anything halfway now so don't hold back. This is your chance to show the world what you have to offer. Shine, baby, shine.

You may not be able to control all the changes in your personal life, yet you're secretly excited about your future prospects. There is a lot to do around the home now and, thankfully, you have the drive to start projects and the energy to complete them. Maintain a low profile today; it's difficult to downplay your emotions, but your discretion is worth it. At least, you can avoid some of the drama that otherwise might arise due to differences of feelings. Staying out of the limelight enables you to accomplish more than you expect.

Close friends raise the noise level of your daily routine. But you're quite expressive yourself, and your eagerness to converse might unintentionally initiate more conflict than you want. You tend to over-personalize other people's actions today, so don't engage in pointless arguments. An emotional showdown is a complete waste of everyone's energies and won't make anyone happier, no matter who wins the fight. Don't overstate your case; instead, channel your  your passion into your work.

Be cautious about making an impulsive decision today, especially one that relates to how you spend your money. You're inclined to purchase something you don't really need, or you might buy it for the wrong reasons. Unfortunately, problems arise if you over-identify with material possessions. Your current lesson -- even if it's a repeat -- is that happiness comes from within and not from what you own. Take stock of all the blessings in your life, and you may discover you already have everything you need.

You might have grown accustomed to repetitive waves of energy that continue to surge through your life these days. But the Moon's current visit to your sign is another reminder of the big changes that are unfolding right before your eyes. You are quite excitable and easily overwhelmed by your emotions today. Opening your heart to a close friend could make you feel uncomfortable at first, but it has the potential to deepen your relationship. As Jim Morrison sang, "The time to hesitate is through."

Social commitments pile up on your calendar, making you realize that you don't have much time to spare. You might need to clarify your boundaries by emphatically saying no if you have spread yourself too thin. However, hiding in your cave isn't the wisest course to take just because you have too much on your plate. Nevertheless, avoiding unproductive distractions makes sense today, even if you're feeling restless. Focus on your immediate chores and you will work your way through this tricky territory sooner than you expect.

You want others to think you are happily embracing the future as you smile your way through the day. You might pretend that all is well now, but you're probably afraid of being misunderstood if you tell others how you really feel. Although you're usually adept at steering clear of unnecessary melodrama, your impulsive actions may inadvertently stir up an uncomfortable level of intensity today. Being totally honest about your fears is the first step to healing your lingering insecurities. Your authenticity earns you admiration from your friends.

Although you recently were comfortable swimming in emotional waters, it seems as if you're being hauled up onto dry land now. It's time to act on your feelings instead of just passively experiencing them. Unfortunately, memories of a previous rejection arise when you swing into motion, You may consider pulling back in your shell, but it's healthier to take a few deep breaths and honor your past before pushing through the resistance. No matter what happens next, taking a chance and revealing what you want is your best bet for fulfilling your dreams.

You are handed a "Get Out of Jail Free" card today, and your confidence soars as you imagine all the possibilities ahead. There's little that can hold you back as the fiery Aries Moon joins rebellious Uranus in your extroverted 9th House of Big Ideas. You have more than enough momentum to make new plans for the future, even if you haven't fully processed what is occurring in the present moment. Thankfully, you don't have to figure it all out yet; methodically reassess your options and let time work its own magic.

You might be frustrated with your own fluctuating moods today. You're itching for new experiences even if you're constrained by promises you made in a relationship. Nevertheless, something unexpected reawakens buried desires and inspires you with the excitement of living in the moment. Paradoxically, you can't just forget about your previous commitments, leaving you conflicted about how to spend your time. Although you may surprise others with your joie de vivre, you deserve a chance to pursue pleasure just as much as anyone else.

The line between commitment and codependency is hard to define today because it's your natural inclination to make other people happy. But the Moon's presence in your 7th House of Relationships is a stark reminder of how difficult it is to be true to yourself when someone else is an integral part of your life. Although fulfilling your own needs could create stress, taking care of yourself also makes you a better partner in the long run. You can't love anyone fully until you love yourself.

You are exploring new territory close to an unfamiliar emotional edge today, but it might be smart to keep your feelings to yourself. Your patience has run out and you are nearly ready to do something that you'll probably regret. Thankfully, it's totally your choice; you don't have to do it. There may be too much at stake to tempt fate with unnecessary risks now, so try working off your anxiety through physical exercise instead. Channel your nervous tension into something positive and you won't have anything to apologize for later.

You're feeling lucky enough to win the lottery today, which could tempt you to gamble more than is prudent. Maintaining a positive attitude is always a wise strategy, but your unflagging optimism might be too much of a good thing now. Risk-taking won't automatically lead to loss, but taking a tried and true path improves your chances for success even more. Don't be greedy and overextend your resources; establish realistic goals and then be diligent in your effort to reach them. Less is more.

You can see the distant horizon now and your ambitions propel you toward your destination. However, your foundation may be weak if you don't trust your own perceptions. You might be so self-critical that you doubt your ability to sustain productivity when you move into unfamiliar territory. You could exhaust yourself by trying to prove your invincibility. Ironically, slowing down today can actually help you achieve success quicker than you expect. Believing in your tenacity makes the journey one of personal growth.

You may spend your day running around in circles, distracted by one thing after another. Anything that's new and different reminds you that breaking free from routine is always an option. But you don't need to wait for additional reasons to make your move. Exercise your right to be as creative as you please. Just remember that your current decisions aren't necessarily about life-changing matters. Consider how best to express your unique sense of style in every moment and make your choices accordingly.

You might be having trouble completely letting go of your past and fully immersing yourself in the next phase of your journey. However, it's crucial to accept the feedback you receive from the universe at this time. There's no reason to allow discouragement to overtake the promise of the future; the current challenges are meant to help propel you toward your goals rather than stopping your progress. If everything is coming up roses, don't go looking for the thorns.

You are anxious to make your move today because you believe you will lose your opportunity if you don't act right away. However, you could overextend your resources if you don't stop to think first. Even if you are quite sure of yourself, this isn't a smart time to test your limits with Saturn in the picture. Start slowly for a change; accruing experience is more reliable in the long run than acting on false confidence. Wisdom wins over inspiration.

You tend to see your world through a spiritual lens today, empowering you to reassess a problem with a healthier perspective. Although it's likely the circumstances haven't changed, a new and improved attitude makes a huge difference. You may be tempted to share your new outlook with everyone you meet, but too much talking could dissipate your energy. Instead, maximize your current potential by channeling your highest intentions into constructive action.

Although you may have been in a rut for a while, you're finally making progress on a personal issue. You're ready to take a gamble with your heart, but revealing a longstanding problem can be scary because you don't know how others will react. Nevertheless, your impatience serves an important function, prompting you to bring someone into your confidence. If you allow the current opportunity to pass, you could be left with regret tomorrow about what you didn't say today. Act now while you have the planets cheering you on.

You may experience a sense of relief today because you are eager to move beyond an old pattern of keeping your feelings quiet. Your world seems to be more supportive of your emotions now, giving you the chance to shift the dynamics of a significant relationship. Unfortunately, your current optimism won't last unless you take immediate action to show that your intentions are honorable. Thankfully, a carefully calculated risk could bring the positive change you seek.

Your future seems brighter today since the resistance you were previously facing has faded away. You can't contain your impatience; if something exciting isn't already happening, you are eager to fuel the fire with your optimistic energy. It's crucial to seize the day because your enthusiasm might not last once stern Saturn makes its presence felt tomorrow. You have the potential to help others enjoy themselves while you express your own joy.

Although your motivation to succeed hasn't disappeared, you're not as worried now because your goals are actually within reach. You aren't home free yet, but you might be able to slow down today and catch your breath. Enjoying a bit of time off can be rejuvenating, but don't let too many hours slip away. You may have another hoop to jump through before you achieve satisfaction. Wiling away your day in dreamland won't help you get your work done any faster. Take a well-deserved break but don't forget your mission.

Others may inspire you with their creative flair and sense of beauty while artistic Venus hooks up with energetic Mars in your 7th House of Companions. Perhaps a friend or partner becomes overly enthusiastic about a project, encouraging you to become more involved. Although everything outside of your original plans might seem like a distraction, this is not the full story today. Stay flexible enough to head off in an entirely new direction; anything you start now gains greater significance in the weeks ahead.

Throw away the recipes and forget the rules; follow your gut instincts today when it comes to doing a task in an entirely new way. You are less restrained by old habits now, empowering you to analyze your work methods in a different light while you have the time.
