Although your emotionally detached logic may be appropriate at work, it comes across as cold and unfeeling to family members or friends in a domestic setting. Take time and connect on a heart-to-heart level for satisfaction that's beyond measure.

It's as if you are lifted high above the chimney tops and humdrum worries of the mundane world as your imagination soars to new heights. But you may be hesitant to relinquish your earthy subjectivity because you're afraid you might not be able to return to ground level when duty calls. Nevertheless, worrying about being practical isn't in your best interest today; your responsibilities will still be there tomorrow. In the meantime, explore the amazing possibilities that lay dormant in your dreams just waiting for you to discover them.

Relationship dynamics continue to shift, making it nearly impossible to figure out where you will land. On one hand, your dreams are more colorful and vibrant, putting you directly in touch with the supernatural realms. On the other hand, your visions also seem more real and reachable than ever. Don't panic; your common sense will keep your feet on the ground now even when your thoughts drift off into space.

You may wish you could be a hermit today, but previous obligations to others might stand in your way. You don't mind being in the company of someone you admire, but you're not interested in playing a supporting role in anyone else's drama now. Even if you are socially oriented by nature, it's healthier to get back in touch with your own needs than to be distracted by trying to meet another person's expectations. Spending some quality time alone enables you to cultivate deeper connections later on.

Although you might instinctively know that slowing down is wise, you still could resent the limitations that your current commitments place upon you. Instead of stubbornly fighting against the resistance you face today, just let go of your personal agenda for a while. Your path is in the process of opening and will continue to do so if you don't pressure everyone to follow your plan. Relax and go with the flow if you want others to support your efforts. Keep calm and trust the process.

You're not very interested in listening to other people's criticism today. It isn't that your self-image is based upon idealistic illusions; it's just that you can see the flaws in your relationships as well as anyone else. Thankfully, you know your feelings come and go, like the rising and falling of the tides, so it's pointless to struggle against strong currents when your efforts would be futile. Wait for the tide to change before announcing your ambitious intentions for the future.

Although nearly everyone seems to go out of the way to be nice to you now, you can intuitively sense if they're being shallow. You don't like it when anyone says positive things just to get your attention. However, other people may genuinely want to be your friends. Moving past your fears and expressing your concerns will force the issue, enabling you to see if your initial suspicion was well founded. Be honest; maintaining your integrity is more important than anything else.

There may be noticeable forward movement concerning family dynamics today, but resolution still isn't progressing as fast as you wish. Everything is taking more time than it should, so your actions don't seem to have the desired impact. But rather than being too self-critical or becoming frustrated, a smarter strategy now might be to take a step back and retreat. Stop chasing your tail for no reason; instead, be kind to yourself and replenish your energy reserves while you have the chance.

An inkling of self-doubt could lead you to reconsider a recent decision, especially if you were not realistic about assessing your abilities. Your assumptions may be totally irrational now and your expectations markedly exaggerated. However, you will begin to see things in their proper light again very soon. Don't quit prematurely; you might feel discouraged today, yet the situation will likely work out beneficially in the long run. Believing in yourself is the first step to success.

Your emotional expression might be blocked today, but you are probably willing to shift your attention to long-term career goals. Make sure that your interest in professional aspirations isn't just a means of escaping from your personal problems. Paradoxically, you may reflect back on this time with appreciation for everything you had to endure as circumstances required you to make constructive changes. Don't waste energy fighting the inevitable. Letting go of control now helps to make room for new opportunities around the next corner.

You may be a harsh judge of yourself or others, and could inadvertently push a long-time ally away. But regardless of what you actually do today, fate ultimately plays a deciding role in the outcome of events. It's not worth the effort to limit your options, even if you can't see the positive possibilities of the current situation. Thankfully, most minor problems seem bigger now than they actually are and will resolve naturally in just a few days. Instead of placing so much weight on the future, just go along for the cosmic ride and see where you land.

The tables are turned and you might be having a tough time keeping up with everyone in your life now. Some of your closest friends or relatives appear to be moving faster than you are today, yet you're not feeling particularly motivated to catch up. Everyone has a different role to play in this life, so you don't have to maintain a hectic pace unless it's warranted. Acknowledging you can't do it all might make you feel uncomfortable. Nevertheless, letting go of dreams that have not panned out gives you the chance to find ones that will make you happier in the long run.

Your persistently practical outlook on life enables you to be less emotional about cutting your losses  and moving on. However, it's not a good idea to react too quickly because vulnerable Venus bumps into somber Saturn today, subduing pleasure and delaying gratification. You might sell yourself short now, so wait a few days before making any significant decisions. Although the odds don't appear to be in your favor yet, the energy will shift in response to your good intentions and unwavering heart.

It isn't wise to pin all your hopes for personal satisfaction on a romantic relationship because you would be better off now to aim for a higher expression of love. Sensual enjoyment is not completely out of the question, but a deeper friendship and a more spiritual connection bring you greater happiness at this time. Nevertheless, even if the fulfillment of a wonderful fantasy seems out of reach today, don't let that stop you from aspiring toward becoming a more compassionate human being. Instead of searching for the perfect partner, strive to be the best person you can be.

Maintaining a cheerful attitude can be challenging today, especially if you are feeling as if you have missed your chance to achieve satisfaction. Don't give up on your old dreams, even if you are disappointed by the current course of events. Your vision is being tested now; it's not a viable option to take the easy way out by just discarding what's important to you. Keep the faith, no matter what. Honoring your values rather than your goals is the fastest way to rediscover your center.

You can't help but say yes to a special invitation today, even if you think you should be more practical. You get along famously with others while your key planet Mars is harmonizing with joyful Jupiter. Nevertheless, don't take the easiest path just because you can; putting in a little extra effort could turn a wonderful opportunity into the most extraordinary one ever. The more fun you have, the more progress you make toward reaching your goals. Go for the gold and give it your absolute best.

You might be needlessly licking your wounds from an emotional disappointment yesterday. Although warrior Mars is waving his banner today, you don't have to go to battle to achieve a victory. The truth is you only need to be honest and speak from your heart. However, be ready to back up your words with action, if needed. There's no reason to look behind you when there is so much potential just ahead.

You are motivated to make a name for yourself by climbing the ladder of success today, and it appears as if your efforts will soon be rewarded. However, your outward accomplishments may not be as important now as your recent change of attitude. Even if reaching your goal takes longer than you expect, your confidence allows you to shine like a star. Friends and coworkers support your ambitions because they respect and admire you. Don't abuse anyone's trust by making false promises. Your authenticity is the key to your success.

Although you are often happy to play the role of a nurturing friend, you have a tricky time balancing your feelings due to the deeper emotions that are working their way to the surface today. It's as if there are contrary sides to your personality vying for recognition. This inner conflict may be just as confusing to you as is to others. Nevertheless, you can avoid a misunderstanding if you're straightforward about your complicated intentions right from the start.

Ironically, you feel good about what you see in your future, but you may be missing an important piece of the puzzle. Instead of only concentrating on the approval you receive from others and the good fortune coming your way now, look within yourself to create a more meaningful existence. Reconsider your basic values, analyze your recent assumptions and uncover hidden issues, even if there are more thorns than flowers. Everything is less scary in the light of awareness.

You are highly capable of managing your business affairs now, but unexpected assistance from a good friend or friendly advice from a coworker could make your life a lot easier. Naturally, you can be your own superhero, but today's cosmic energy is so positive for relationships, it's not smart to go off and do something important by yourself. Involving others in your activities encourages camaraderie and makes the day one to remember.

You can express yourself with an assertive flair today, especially through artistic creation or spontaneous behavior. Unfortunately, words might fail you now, so don't bother trying to explain your emotions; follow your instincts and demonstrate your feelings, instead. When all is said and done, your actions really do speak louder than anything else.

You don't need to tone down your intensity today; your powerful emotions are compelling and your friends and acquaintances will probably want more of you rather than less. You are so highly attuned to sexy Mars that it's nearly impossible to wipe that all-knowing smile off your face. Luckily, exuberant Jupiter encourages you to take charge. Just remember to consider your desires carefully before sharing them with someone else. Otherwise, you might receive what you wished for, even if it's not in your best interests.

Your high spirits are inspirational today as optimistic Jupiter raises new possibilities everywhere you look. The secret to your success is to align your heart with energetic Mars and act on your desires. Thankfully, expressing your emotions moves you closer to someone you really like. Although love is favored now, don't become so sure of yourself that you miss the obvious signals right in front of your face.

Sometimes you aren't the greatest communicator in the world, especially when it involves sharing emotions that make you feel vulnerable. Nevertheless, you tend to fare better today if you can steer clear of more rational realms. You're willing to reveal your feelings, even if you don't know where the other person stands. It's not time to be shy when it comes to acknowledging what's in your heart. Softening your established boundaries can open up new possibilities for love.

You may believe you're slipping and sliding down a slippery slope of emotions now as you share your ambitions for the future. However, this journey of revelation is not about furthering your career goals or finding your life purpose. It's more about an illogical attraction, a warm and fuzzy feeling that often acts like a warning sign -- especially when your heart mean business. There's no valid reason to keep your dreams to yourself; take a risk and tell someone special how much you really care.

Your enthusiasm may be over the top today, or, perhaps, you are experiencing someone else's positive attitude. In either case, there's more going on than meets the eye, and, fortunately, what comes to the surface now can be quite pleasant. Don't try to hide your feelings, even if you're worried that things could turn out badly. Be courageous and put your wishes out in the open for the world to hear. If you don't gamble with your heart you'll never know what could happen.

You have set your agenda in stone and won't be easily distracted from your goals today. Your unrelenting drive might seem obsessive to your peers; however, you should still be able to present a more lighthearted demeanor, even if you're secretly freaking out. Although your unwavering determination is a powerful asset, it's still wise to know when to call it a day. Thankfully, time isn't running out as fast as you think now, so take a moment to acknowledge how much progress you have already made.

Your tenacity can help you win a tough argument today, but the price you must pay could be too severe. The Moon's shift into your 7th House of Companions raises the stakes in an intense disagreement. Your victory will likely be hollow if an emotional drama drains you of your energy. Make the best case you can for your point of view, but then be willing to shift gears and meet others halfway. Connecting on common ground creates a sense of camaraderie for everyone involved.

Manipulating reality can be as simple as choosing your words carefully. You are extremely clever at smoothly altering other people's perceptions without anyone being aware of your shenanigans. Unfortunately, you might not realize the lasting impact you can have on those around you. Thankfully, reconsidering your objectives before saying anything avoids accidentally hurting someone near and dear to your heart. Use your power of persuasion for the good of all.

Expressing yourself with unrestrained intensity and unwavering certainty is empowering today. You're finally ready to let someone at work know exactly how you feel, but it's still tricky to bring your complex emotions out into the open. Your feelings may be bouncing all over the place, and no single action can describe all the nuances. Stepping outside your comfort zone requires courage. Nevertheless, taking a risk by sharing your perspective reliably chips away at the walls that separate you from your peers.

You can see the positive side of nearly anything today, even in a situation that others think is hopeless. It's not that you are in denial; it's just that you're simultaneously optimistic and pessimistic now, giving you an advantage when collaborating with your coworkers. Fortunately, they will be more than willing to follow your lead once they realize your intentions are completely authentic. Trust your intuition to steer you in the right direction.

You are at the top of your game today, applying your intelligence to navigate your way out of an emotionally intense predicament. At first, you may worry that you're being lured into a situation that could trap you. But upon a more detailed analysis, you return to the power of positive thought. Don't allow temporary limitations to prevent you from achieving success; instead, face the obstacles and let your adrenaline fuel your growth.

Although you may be hopeful about the trajectory of a current relationship, your emotions are running on high alert today. You prefer to minimize the drama, but the stress seems to follow you now wherever you go. Instead of avoiding involvement, remain open to another person's process without feeding your own fears into the story. Ultimately, your optimistic attitude can tilt the scales in a positive direction. Being a good listener could be enough to alleviate the current intensity and calm everyone's nerves.

You might be inexplicably fearful of what you don't know today. The Moon's visit to your sign indicates a couple of days of heightened emotional activity, yet the changes you experience now are of long-lasting significance. You may react defensively by clinging onto an old relationship or memory that is no longer serving your best interests. But don't be reckless; suddenly dropping someone or something of value can be counterproductive. Take your time to see where the current energy leads before making a decision you can't undo.

You are tempted to hide your anger today as the inscrutable Scorpio Moon worms her way through your 12th House of Secrets. Nevertheless, your compelling attraction to someone special could lure your feelings out of the shadows while driving away any lingering negativity. You may resist taking a long, hard look at all your options because you are afraid of the depths you might have to explore. Just remember, anything that is buried now will likely work its way to the surface in a few days. Examining your heart isn't easy but the truth will set you free.

Close friends and relatives might not realize what an invaluable source of strength they are for you now. The good news is they don't have to go to heroic measures to demonstrate their support. Just knowing that you have a team to lean on in a pinch is quite reassuring. Thankfully, you don't need to be rescued today. Nevertheless, graciously accepting assistance at the right time can catapult you to the next level of success.

Your apparent optimism may be confusing today. Nevertheless, everyone sees you as a walking inspiration because your cheerful disposition motivates them to make an extra effort on the job. Although you're able to accomplish a lot of work on your own, you still might think you missed your mark. Getting stuck in your personal dissatisfaction won't help your cause. Instead, concentrate on the good you can do for others and your confidence will return quicker than you expect.

It seems as if there is a flock of angels watching over you today. Perhaps, someone or something is clearing a path for you right through a complicated situation. Rest assured that your choices are being supported by the cosmos, so be bold and reach out to help someone else. In this manner, you can be an energetic conduit, receiving blessings and then, in turn, passing them along to those who could use a little magic, too.

Although everyone may appear to be going nuts, you feel as sane as ever. Then again, you may not be the best judge of reality now that your key planet Mars connects with crazy Uranus and passionate Pluto. You might not even realize that you're driving against the flow of traffic because you believe you possess super powers today -- and maybe you do. Nevertheless, it's not wise to assume you can magically escape the laws of the physical universe. Follow the rules by choice, not because it's required. If anyone can create order out of chaos, it's you.

You might not have a solution for a tense social dilemma yet, but you're able to keep relatively calm in spite of the pressure. Perhaps you realize that you can't single-handedly change the current instability, so you don't need to invest a lot of energy in trying to fix the situation. Naturally, you must do whatever is necessary to survive, but you can actually contribute positively by being the anchor in someone else's storm. People count on your dependability more than you know.

The current excitement at work gets your adrenaline going, but you're probably not as happy if you have to hide your feelings. Oftentimes, all you want to do is share the information that you have before moving on to what's next. However, a stormy emotional component makes everything more complex now. Maybe it's time to act as if you're the lightning and strike with unexpected brilliance and force. Telling the truth can upset the status quo but also clears the air of tension.

Your mind is chock full of original thoughts and you are eager to act on every single one of them. Unfortunately, you may need to get your plans approved by someone who doesn't seem so friendly to your cause right now. If you can't figure out how to get your share your ideas, you might discover that negative emotions quickly replace your intelligent visions. Don't let your feelings bottle up or you could ruin a good thing before you know it. Being your authentic self is more important than ever.

You want everyone to know about your emotional turmoil now, but you don't want to go through the process of explaining everything to each person. Although actions speak louder than words, it's a mistake to believe that anyone will understand your true intentions if you just swing into motion without saying anything at all. Just remember that it's not their fault if you choose to hide your vulnerability. No one can come to your rescue if you don't ask for help.

Nothing much has changed since yesterday, but you might feel more playful today. Instead of worrying about everything you can't control, you have surrendered to just letting go. But it would be incorrect to say that you have thrown in the towel. You're simply reconsidering your strategy and changing your tactics because you must. However, don't lose track of the final destination if you want additional freedom in your life. Even if it appears that you are experiencing a setback, a delay only increases the energy and propels you even further.

You may as well toss your calendar aside today because it only brings you frustration if you try to stick to your previously conceived schedule. But this doesn't mean that you can also shirk your responsibilities. Although you will still be held accountable, it's much easier to be creative if you do it on your own clock. Flexibility is your secret weapon in the war on mediocrity.

There is no stopping you today because of the powerful stress generated by the catalytic alignment between your two key planets, Mars and Pluto. Fortunately, you are able to express your creative brilliance as long as you keep bringing your focus back to the business at hand. You don't have to live up to anyone else's expectations now; you can get away with being totally unconventional if you so choose. Somehow, even your most radical behavior seems acceptable to others. Walk on the wild side while you have the chance.

You might believe you already missed your opportunity to add an outrageous activity to your day. However, the truth is you can still act on an off-the-wall plan if you make it happen soon. Others are looking to you for inspiration, hoping you will pull a rabbit out of a hat. Don't worry about what everyone thinks; expressing your most brilliant ideas needs to be satisfying for you and not anyone else.

You can't maintain the status quo by simply declaring your intention to do so. However, even your most concrete plans can't prevent the changing tides from wreaking havoc and raising self-doubt. Intellectually, you realize that risky behavior can pay off handsomely, but you're hesitant to gamble on anything yet. Maybe you are motivated by fear; maybe it's common sense. Either way, listen to your intuition and don't try to logically rationalize what doesn't feel right in your heart. You will know when the time is right to take a leap of faith.

Your schedule seems totally unmanageable today and the more you try to reassert control over your daily routine, the faster you spin in circles. Fortunately, you can simply change the game entirely by loosening the reins and allowing the chips to fall as they may. You may be happily surprised with the results when you acquiesce and trust in the wisdom of the universe.

You have a significant decision to make today; you can either take preemptive action or wait for changing circumstances to force your hand. Fortunately, being the lightning bolt feels exhilarating, while being struck by it is a frightening experience. You are keenly aware of the stress, fiscal or emotional, and you can no longer pretend that it will resolve on its own. Thankfully, you don't need to have a solid plan in place. Just shake things up enough so they cannot possibly settle back down to the way they were. Any movement now is better than holding on to the status quo.

It's in your best interest to cool off your overheated emotions, but common sense is hard to come by today. You may be cruising for a fight but unfortunately, there is no obvious target for your aggression. You just need a healthy outlet for your anger if circumstances aren't going your way. Nevertheless, don't bury your negativity or there will be a price to pay; just keep in mind that you don't have to act unconsciously on your fears. Thankfully, expanding your awareness increases your options.

You're longing to make an escape, but even if you can't get away for the day, spend some time in solitude when you get the chance. Try taking a walk during your lunch break, meditate someplace quiet or strike a yoga pose in the privacy of your office. Even dancing to your favorite music could help settle your nerves. One way or another, create space so you can hear your inner voice rather than the stressful demands of everyone around you.

You are still juggling a variety of scenarios, so it's nearly impossible to relax. Thankfully, there is light at the end of the proverbial tunnel. You can sense that big patterns are changing, but there won't be an overnight turnaround. You might continue to feel like others are blocking your progress, but resist any temptation to spill your resentment onto inappropriate targets. But neither should you ignore the situations that have created these feelings. Seeking a middle path is nearly always your best alternative when you have extreme choices to make.

You might feel as if you're ruling the roost today, but there is an unexpected distraction that prevents others from perceiving you as the nurturing mother hen. Perhaps you are slightly more insistent than usual. Or, maybe it's the chicks who are the more demanding ones.You might just need to demonstrate that it is indeed you who's in charge now. Thankfully, you know how to assert your authority while still being kind.

Although a relationship looks good on paper, there are a few things that come to light today that you hadn't previously noticed. Emotional conflicts between you and others may surface now because you are so driven to succeed at this time in your life. Unfortunately, your admirable ambitions could be running amok. Consider tempering your goals with a healthy dose of moderation. Finding the right balance between work and play allows everyone to breathe easier.

An opportunity to express yourself creatively is slipping away now and there isn't much you can do about it. Although you may see signs of the end of the long winter freeze -- this is more about the end of a phase for you. However, nothing is gained if you try and push the river. You can't demand others to move faster than they are willing because it only increases the stress on everyone's minds. In fact, moving into the next cycle will only happen when you are ready, and not a moment sooner.

Confronting the widening gulf between your thoughts and feelings grows more pressing as the day unfolds. These internal conversations don't require another person; they occur naturally now as you continue to observe the conflict between two active voices. Of course, you may inadvertently project your dilemma outwardly onto a relationship if you think denial is a viable strategy. Even in your interactions with other people, steer clear of situations that require you to stay strictly in the logical and rational realms. Lead with your heart and don't look back.

You may be feeling restless, eager to act out on the aggressive side of the equation today. The truth is that your unexpressed fears could make the current situation even more complicated. But you are growing weary from what might seem like a fight for your life. However, it's time to salve any open wounds and consciously begin to slow down your emotional roller-coaster. Whether it's apparent or not, you are the one in charge of this ride.

There are emotional issues that have been stewing for the past few days, yet you appear to be finally passing through the eye of the storm. Perhaps you are still being battered by the winds, but it's nearly impossible to know for sure which direction you will be facing once the dust settles. Whatever you do, stay focused on the horizon now. Your persistence pays off if you hang in for the long haul. However, if you do lose patience, a minor meltdown can be extremely cathartic today as long as you know when to call it quits.

You could unknowingly drive an emotional wedge between you and someone at work today. It really doesn't matter how good your intentions are unless you continue to follow through with your efforts. However, you could make matters worse if you alienate others with your heightened sense of urgency. Don't push too hard toward achieving your goals in the real world. Acknowledging your desires doesn't guarantee success, but it's the first step to reducing the current stress. Sometimes people just want to be included in the process.

The current confusion is finally morphing into a more stable situation. Your old spark has returned, so fire up your intellect and prepare for the show. Your day may be hijacked by heated conversations about your responsibilities or endless evaluations of your work habits. But avoid negotiations that require objective analysis, since it's difficult to separate your rational thoughts from your irrational needs today. Nevertheless, you can enjoy the lively dialogue once you gain a fresh perspective on your feelings.

You need to find an outlet for your current wanderlust or it might drive you to make a decision that undermines the gains you've already made. Luckily, you are a sight to behold once you have made up your mind. Ask your friends for guidance, but don't be afraid to trust your heart. Listen with your entire being and not just your head; your spirit already knows which adventure is best for your soul.

Defending your ideas against someone with a different agenda than yours can turn into more of a debacle than you want. You just want to hold your ground, but could end up angering someone in the process. However, the emotional outburst may not be as intense as it appears at first. If you feel like you are being pushed to a breaking point, stop arguing and change your mindset instead. Thankfully, once you reclaim your center you won't need to fight for the approval of anyone else. Striving for self-sufficiency is what you Rams do best.

Your hopes for the future are fueled by idealistic fantasies today. Unfortunately, your reality doesn't necessarily support your inspirational dreams. Your work is cut out for you now because you must find a way to harmonize your desires with everyone else's, making it difficult to just follow your heart. Nevertheless, satisfaction isn't as elusive as it might seem. Hold your torch high and keep your eyes fixed on your long-term goals. Today's setbacks evolve into tomorrow's success stories.

Your greatest challenge today may involve choosing which tasks to complete and which ones to postpone for a later date. It isn't that you made too many promises; instead, it's others who are asking more of you than you can accomplish at this time. In fact, noisy Mercury could overwhelm you with too much information now. Do whatever you can to help, but don't be concerned about someone else's judgment once you have established your limits. Setting healthy boundaries enables you to do your best work.

You might have made a commitment that's weighing heavily on your mind now, and there appears to be little you can do to prevent someone's disappointment. Don't waste energy doubting yourself as you contemplate your next move. The current stress isn't meant to point out your weaknesses; its real purpose is to highlight how much you already have on your plate. Rely on your good intentions and emotional fortitude to navigate these confusing times. Changing your attitude is an act of free will and is the first step toward improving your circumstances.

Staying in touch with your inner spirit takes extra concentration when you're feeling stressed. Fortunately, you have a deep reservoir of determination and resolve. However, others seem to thwart your efforts, regardless of your tactics. Attempting to undermine someone's authority won't help your cause now, since this strategy only impedes your forward movement. Instead, graciously acknowledge whoever is in control and then get on with the business at hand. Dazzle your adversaries with your kindness and your competence.

You're stuck between two uncontrollable forces without an apparent way out today as clever Mercury locks horns with unpredictable Uranus and unrelenting Pluto. Unfortunately, the more you struggle, the worse it gets. Instead of trying to escape, stick around and learn the truth, even if you think it could be unpleasant. Your willingness to uncover the facts now will steadily resolve the tension over the days ahead. Perseverance is your friend.

Someone's hidden motives come to light now, adding to the stress between you and others. Your coworkers might not like what they learn today, but the awkward energy should begin to shift once the truth is revealed. Whatever the disagreements of perspective, common ground can be established, even if it takes more time than you prefer. Have patience; the process of healing works best on its own timetable. All you can do is make it clear that your intentions are pure and you're more than willing to do your part to move forward.

You are usually up for a good challenge when you know that you're doing the right thing. But now as communicator Mercury aggravates your key planet Pluto, make sure that you're not being played as a pawn in someone else's game. If you think that you are being manipulated today, step back from the struggle and reconsider your options. Temporarily disengaging from the dynamics of the current situation allows you to detach from your feelings long enough to make the most logical decision.

You might secretly believe you're fighting for a losing cause today, but holding firm to your fading optimism may still be the best thing you can do. If you begin questioning your long-term goals now, you could start a spiral downward into worry or despair. Stay aware of what's going on, but don't focus on the dark side or it will be impossible to be productive. There is a silver lining to the rain cloud that is yours to discover if you keep an open mind and a receptive heart.

You are feeling extremely passionate about your life now and are eager to work hard just to keep all the balls up in the air. However, this isn't the best time to start a new venture, since loose ends may fray faster than you can tie them back together. Remain focused on your goals with a singular purpose, even if you feel overwhelmed in the present moment. The positive impact of your current efforts will be seen as early as next week. Keep the faith; the rainbow is closer than you think.

Your nerves are on edge today, making it nearly impossible to complete what you start because you can't concentrate. Your current impatience prompts you to talk before your thoughts are fully developed as cerebral Mercury anxiously aligns with unorthodox Uranus. Unfortunately, your radical thinking may upset your colleagues now, so it's wise to consider other people's feelings before saying too much. Using your common sense helps you avoid unnecessary confrontations with those who would make better allies than enemies.

Uncertainty rises from the hidden depths of your subconscious and your initial impulse may be to clamp down on your fantasies and become uncharacteristically rigid now. Unfortunately, your inflexibility won't help you manage the stresses of the day. However, the pressure begins to abate when you accept that you don't need to know where you are going just yet. Loosen your grip on reality today and your desired destination might magically appear closer than you expect.

Although you have come to the conclusion that practicing patience is your smartest strategy now, you still might feel as if you're jumping out of your skin. You're enthusiastic about the future, yet you can't decide whether to laugh joyfully at the possibilities or scream out of frustration at the delays. Your coworkers might be concerned about your erratic behavior, but their worries will likely turn into respect as you pick up steam over the next several weeks. Have faith; your time will come.

You might appear somewhat subdued today as you settle into a steady pace and go about your chores. You're not concerned about receiving recognition for your individual contribution now; you're more driven just to get things done right. Your friends and relatives see you as a real team player because you're happy to trade anonymity for the overall success of a group project. The joy of sharing in a common goal is worth the personal sacrifice.

You wish that being observed by others didn't make you feel uncomfortable today. You might think that you would be happier once you escape public scrutiny. Whatever you do, you seem to garner more than your fair share of attention now; however, you might end up growing more accustomed to the spotlight as the day wears on. Unfortunately, your dramatic performance could make someone uneasy. Thankfully, you can play a starring role in the current project and still share the recognition with your coworkers so that everyone feels appreciated.

Following the rules might not make sense to you now, but it still isn't advisable to bite the hand that feeds you. Be respectful and work within the existing constraints even if they seem illogical. You can always question authority later, especially since rebellious behavior today won't likely make you any friends or influence those who matter. Think twice about your message before you say anything; even a minor slip of the tongue can start a verbal battle that you would be wise to avoid. If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all.

You probably know better, but it's so tempting to say what's on your mind today if you think you can balance the score by uttering a few clever words at exactly the right time. However, you might believe that some things are better left unsaid. Don't waste energy by holding a grudge if you have unexpressed anger that needs venting. Just remember to be kind in your delivery. Steering clear of blaming anyone else for your feelings garners you more support than you expect.

You are usually quite rational in your approach to solving problems; however, a friend or partner could confuse you with their stories, even if you think your logic is sound. At first, you may doubt your ability to accurately interpret what you hear, but as you listen further you realize that you aren't the cause of the current misunderstanding. Nevertheless, don't wait until you are trapped by an emotional drama; avoid conflict, even if it means walking away without resolution.

You may be at odds with someone today, and you don't understand how the warm and fuzzy feelings could have cooled off so quickly. Thankfully, a lover's quarrel or a business conflict won't last long if you can maintain mutual respect, no matter how strongly you disagree. But don't force the issue now because tempers might flare without warning. Instead, return to the discussion next week after everyone's emotions have settled down. Focusing on the strengths of a relationship helps to retain the magic.

A heated debate with an acquaintance can rattle your nerves today and pull you off track. Although you may be tempted to settle the score right away, it's impossible because there's actually no single correct answer. Fortunately, you're probably easily persuaded to accept the difference of opinions if you feel like your words are heard. Don't fight to win; just speak your piece as clearly as you can and give others the courtesy of doing the same. Take the high road and move on.

You may believe that cooling your jets now will help you stabilize your position with someone you like, but the idea of new projects at home spark your interest before you slow down enough to matter. If you are wise, you won't take off with an intriguing idea until you give it plenty of time to develop. However, you could become obsessed with your scheme and try to launch it prematurely. Downplay your plans until next week after you've had a chance to perform due diligence. Haste makes waste.

You might decide that being patient is more prudent than climbing mountains today, trying to achieve impossible results. You could exhaust yourself if you attempt to force a river to flow uphill now that the Moon has returned to your ambitious sign. But it's pointless to fight the inevitable, even if you feel the need to stand your ground. Bide your time and wait until the cosmic energy shifts in your direction. In the meantime, concentrate on completing any unfinished business so you are ready to jump when the time is right.

Oddly, you are more certain about your feelings today, even if a close friend or relative thinks you're barking up the wrong tree. Luckily, you're wise enough to recognize that there can be differing methods to successfully handle the same issue. Establish common ground and then agree to disagree on the specifics. Rather than arguing about the divergent approaches, focus on your similar values and build from there.

Although you're in an agreeable state of mind today, a conflict could erupt if you say more than is necessary. Ironically, your attempts to avoid an argument only seem to agitate it. Unfortunately, you may be more confused about an important issue than you realize, and your lack of clarity fogs your communication now. If you're not one hundred percent positive, simply admit it; being transparent prevents headaches and invites intimacy.

You may think you're being unfairly attacked today by someone who is simply trying to improve your overall efficiency. But don't overreact by compromising too quickly and changing your behavior to accommodate others. There's no need to pretend you're willing to alter your approach just to avoid a confrontation. Thankfully, you will be less likely to provoke trouble now if you're honest about your motives right from the beginning. Ultimately, it's in your best interest to give others the benefit of the doubt.

Although your desires may conflict with someone else's today, the disagreements will probably be minor ones. Still, there's no reason to feed the fire with your insecurities. Instead, make use of the strategic Capricorn Moon's intention to plant your best thoughts, and then nurture them until they slowly take root for future growth. You might think that you have to disclose all your ideas now, but this assumption can complicate matters even more. Patience is one of your innate virtues, so slow down and let everything unfold organically.

You're usually at the top of your game when your world is buzzing with so much mental stimulation. However, you're so exuberant today that you may blurt out something that's better kept to yourself. You intuitively understand that your plans could change several times before the day is done, but you might forget about where you are in the process. Practicing meditation or deep breathing enables you to settle your busy mind. Taking the time to calm your nerves helps you avoid moments of regret.

Someone may share an ingenious idea today that sounds totally sensible, but it just won't fit into your tight schedule. Unfortunately, analyzing all the facts again might not help your decision process. You could listen to other people's stories all day long while still resisting to help them out. Or you can just jump in with an open heart, even if it means putting your own issues on the back burner. Go for the assist; it won't be as time consuming as you think and the intangible rewards make it worthwhile.

You may be struck with the lightning of awareness today, but you must make the effort to follow through and do something with your brilliant idea. This arrangement seems fair, but if someone else suggests another plan, why are you still the one who has more work to do? Unfortunately, changing these inequitable dynamics appears to be beyond your reach. Although you want more control of your own life, it's wise to do what's expected of you now. You'll have a chance to put things back in balance soon enough when the spotlight is back on you.

You are grateful that you have your common sense to fall back on today because without it you might be swept up by every idea that comes down the road. Although one part of you is bored with your regular routine now, you might not be ready to break free just yet. Others are counting on your stability, so bolting isn't necessarily an appropriate move. Hold on to your horses; choosing the right time to initiate decisive action bodes well for your success.

Understanding how your fears influence your judgments isn't an easy task, yet this inner emotional journey can push you toward making one decision or another. Keep in mind that your integrity is more important than what anyone thinks of you. Don't let your own intellectual noise lure you off track. Believe it or not, your thoughts pick up speed over the days ahead, making it harder to reclaim your peace of mind. Make the most of this moment while you have the chance.

You have set your heart on a much bigger prize today -- an emotional treasure buried deep beneath the observable surface. A minor irritation can provoke you to withdraw and escape into your imagination, but turning inward now may stir old fears that impede your progress. Unquestionably, it's better to deal directly with an annoyance before it morphs into something larger that becomes untenable, adding another detour to your important search. A stitch in time saves nine.

Use your authority as effectively as you can today by sharing your real-world experiences instead of just trying to boss others around. You have recently returned back to reality from a trip to the outer limits of possibilities. Luckily, you can again hear the voice of common sense, even though it clips your wings in the process. Keep both feet on the ground until you see tangible results from your heartfelt efforts. Leading by example is your key to success.

Although you might believe that time is running out, the game is far from over. Don't trust your senses today because a trick of light warps your perceptions to match your unexpressed desires. There is a lot more going on than meets the eye as the evocative Moon and secretive Pluto in your sign remind you that simple logic won't necessarily override your passion. Denial isn't a viable strategy, so keep an open mind until your head and your heart are in agreement.

You don't want anyone to notice how serious you feel today because you believe their assumptions could paint you into a corner. You are scared of being stuck in a role you don't want to play. Reassessing your options is advisable while mischievous Mercury squares heavy-hitter Saturn over the next couple of days, throwing a few unexpected curve balls your way. Don't be overly concerned about the opinions of anyone else; the only expectations you need to conform to are your own.

You could willingly play the part of the conscientious person who honors everyone's interests today, even if you sacrifice your own point of view in the process. The responsible Capricorn Moon's visit to your 11th House of Teamwork enables you to keep your preferences to yourself in the name of community spirit. Just remember that your feelings are important as well, even if they are temporarily subsumed by the needs of the larger group. Fortunately, you don't have to lose your individuality to be an integral member of the tribe.

Frustration arises as your most ingenious ideas meet the stone cold reality of unchangeable circumstances today. However, facing insurmountable resistance might not be enough to stop you from trying to get your way anyhow. The lesson you need to learn now is critical, even if you don't want to hear it. Your point of view isn't the only one that matters. Be open to the feedback you receive and incorporate other people's perspectives into your own. Being brilliant is easy if you take the time to listen.

A communication problem comes back to haunt you today, especially if it escalates into a major disagreement. In fact, this could be such a drawn-out power struggle that you might need to retreat to gather your thoughts. You won't likely find a quick solution, but your dogged persistence may win your opponent over in the end. The right amount of stubbornness can be just what the doctor ordered. But you must know when to call it quits if you really want to move forward.

Your life takes a definite turn for the better, but not until you first face a problem or two that might take the wind out of your sails. You may not normally be so serious, but you're not likely to be happy-go-lucky when you're struggling with obstacles that you have set in your own path. Stick to the facts today without assuming the worst. But be willing to step into unexplored areas on the map to gain the most from this tumultuous cosmic storm.

Being satisfied with your current circumstances might endow you with a somewhat lazy attitude early in the day. Nevertheless, a little restlessness could be a strong motivational factor by the afternoon. Even if you don't think you're ready to embark on an adventure to the unknown, at least you can be the one who stirs up a bit of excitement at home. Anything that catalyzes a larger shift helps you gain a renewed passion for life.

You may feel as if your life is separated into two opposite parts today. The first piece of the puzzle can be rather serious as you deal with a difficult situation at work. Others might see you as a stick-in-the-mud now, but you're not ready to surrender your position, however unpopular. Luckily, the other part comes into play if you maintain your integrity and pass this test of character with flying colors. The joy in your personal life is more than enough of a reward for your extraordinary efforts.

The real world impinges upon your fantasy life today, forcing you to rein in your imagination. However, cerebral Mercury won't leave you alone with your thoughts, making it twice as hard to follow your heart. Your inner voice judges nearly everything you think now, making it difficult to let your mind roam. But you might feel stuck, even when you try to stay on track. Ironically, accepting your own limitations empowers you to break free from the current restraints. Fly, baby, fly.

Steer clear of any friends who tell you what to do today because they can end up costing you valuable time and energy if you listen to them and ignore your own common sense. It's not that others are purposely misleading you; it's just that they don't understand your scheduling constraints. Your previous commitments are more extensive than anyone else realizes and how you manage your day has wider ramifications than the present moment. Set the tone for the future by establishing practical boundaries and adhering to them no matter what temptations you encounter.

Although it seems as if your choices are limited today, you can still make the most of the present moment if you're willing to adjust your expectations as you go along. But you may be in a weird mood because you don't know whether you can trust your own instincts now. In theory, it's safer to rely on the facts until your intensity settles back down. However, in practice, you might not be able to wait. Make a list of all your options along with the pros and cons of each before making any drastic moves you regret.

There are so many creative ideas you want to pursue these days, it's nearly impossible to contain your exuberance. Unfortunately, you can't follow every road just because it might lead to another rainbow. Rather than attempting to fit everything into your tight schedule, be flexible about what you include. Although you can't control all the variables at play, conserving your energy today increases your chances for long-term success. Powerful cosmic dynamics are at work now, so willingly go with the flow instead of fighting it.

Thankfully, you won't have to spend the day playing catch-up if you've been doing your job all along like a responsible Capricorn. Instead, you can finish your obligations pretty quickly today and then have the chance to dive into something new. However, you might not feel free to do exactly what you want. If an emotional issue surfaces with a family member now, take the time to resolve it thoroughly before moving on. A closer connection is possible if your intentions are pure and your conscience is clear.

When friends and peers expect you to do something in particular, you often rebel. You prefer doing things your own way in your own time. However, you may not have an opportunity to choose today. You can work yourself into a state of frustration by resisting other people's demands. Nevertheless, it's much easier to just do what you should so you're free later to do whatever you wish. A little cooperation goes a long way toward cultivating an atmosphere of mutual respect and trust.

It's time to take your work to the next level, no matter how much you have already accomplished. Unfortunately, you can't just wish your way up the ladder of success. You must be persistent while demonstrating your competence. But if you do encounter an insurmountable problem, just view it as a sign that you must make a fundamental change to your current strategy before proceeding further. It's much more effective to have your ducks in a row prior to attempting to manifest your dreams.

You currently like the idea of having a few days to chill out, but might be surprised at how quickly you get bored with nothing to do. Or, you may need to face the reality that rest and relaxation are harder to come by than you imagined. Nevertheless, aggravation won't have a chance to take root if you're willing to accept things as they are, rather than as you wish. Honestly, it's not so much about what happens to you; your true test of character is determined by how you respond.

An old familiar memory rushes back into your thoughts today. But rather than feeling nostalgic, you can see glaring similarities mirrored in your current life. It's comforting to know that you can recreate a sweet feeling from the past without losing touch of the present. But don't fall into the trap of expecting the outcome to be the same. Although your flexibility is refreshing, your willingness to be surprised is your ticket to true satisfaction.

You might suddenly realize today that your life trajectory isn't going to change as fast as you had hoped. It might be rather jarring to have your expectations dashed, but it's crucial to understand that bigger issues are still in play. Fortunately, reality is not as set in stone as you think. You don't need to reinvent your plans or redefine your goals; you only have to revise your schedule, giving the transformation more time to come to fruition. Today's failure leads to tomorrow's success.

Everything boils down to adopting the proper perspective today, especially if you are feeling like you're not making enough progress in your career. Oddly enough, you're able to maintain your optimism, even if one thing after another seems to slow you down. If you have recently changed directions, hold to your new course. If you haven't yet put your ideas into motion, it's time to take initiative and make something happen. But don't think the current situation is all-important; it's just another step on your amazing journey to realize your potential.

The good news is that you are on the receiving end of more encouragement now than you dreamed possible. However, the bad news is everyone seems to have an agenda that's different from yours. You would love to embrace their support, but you don't want to alter your plans for any reason. Although there's no quick solution to this dilemma, it's best to graciously accept the assistance rather than to fearfully push it away. Thankfully, the full story will come out sooner than you expect, clearing the air once and for all.

You begin to see the possibilities ahead through a wide-angle lens today. Happily, this is not pie-in-the-sky dreaming, for your practical approach to planning keeps you on a straight and narrow path. Nevertheless, you might have trouble regaining your center because you are willing to entertain a variety of options to carry you into the future. Although this ambiguity is unsettling to you discriminating Virgos, don't make any definitive choices too quickly. The longer you can sustain multiple scenarios, the more satisfied you will be with the final outcome.

Although relationship dynamics might be more complicated than ever, you have a particular goal in mind and are confident you will reach it one way or another. If fact, you may be feeling more certain about a recent decision, but your current optimism can backfire on you if it prevents you from seeing things in their true light. Proceed carefully when separating your fantasies from reality. Dreaming big is a wonderful exercise as long as you keep your feet on the ground.

You can rely on your closest friends to come through with flying colors on your behalf now. However, you may need to ask for what you want, even if you think that someone close to you should be able to decipher your thoughts. But the practical side of communication shatters this mind-reading myth. Take the guesswork out of the picture by being as precise as possible. The more specific you are in your disclosure, the better your chances of feeling fulfilled at the end of the day.
