Although you may be floating on a Neptunian cloud today, it's still a challenge to let go of your responsibilities, especially if your work directly impacts those around you. However, you don't have to succumb to anyone's arbitrary pressures and random deadlines. You can obtain great benefit from setting your regular routine aside for a while. The richness of the treasures you could discover while exploring your imagination will ultimately have a positive impact on you and everyone you touch. Dream first, act later.

You might feel burdened by your everyday chores, leading you to spend time dreaming of a different life. But breaking free from old habits might be tougher than it appears. Although the anticipation lures you into uncharted territory today, doing something contrary to the status quo can be a bit disconcerting. Instead of trying to escape from your situation, consciously alter your attitude first. Adopting a new awareness could gradually shift your experience out of a rut and into an entirely different direction.

You may have a tough time concentrating on your work today because you're distracted by one interesting thing after another. For an instant everything seems clear, yet just a few moments later you're no longer sure what to do. Your current indecisiveness about how to approach the task at hand could create anxious feelings if you think that people are pressuring you to make a commitment. Thankfully, consciously postponing your final choice for a couple of days might be sufficient to help you coast through these tricky times.

Even if you want your life to settle down, something could happen to tilt the day in a different direction that doesn't conform to your agenda. Your initial reaction may be to try to gain control, but clinging to your previous schedule only increases your frustration. Instead, ease your grip and allow the instability to rattle on through. Don't act prematurely; reassert your will only once you have both feet back on solid ground.

Although you might go out of your way to seek thrills and chills today, you're tempted to withdraw from the action once it arrives at your door. You may have grown more accustomed to the peaceful atmosphere than you realize and start to miss it once the pace quickens. However, the needy Moon's visit to your sign encourages you to grasp for something that is just out of reach. Be appreciative for your current blessings since real satisfaction is only obtainable in the present moment. A grateful mind is a powerful mind.

You are not as calm on the inside as you seem on the outside today. People tend to see only your outer shell, preventing them from noticing your currently unsettled emotions. You may be nervous as you analyze whether or not something is important enough to fight for now. You have to choose between continuing on your way toward your previous destination and setting a new course. Even if you're uncertain, deciding one way or the other settles you emotion and frees you up so you can move forward.

You think you are ready for nearly anything that might happen, but circumstances may not be as forgiving as you wish. Someone's unexpressed feelings could create a drag today, as if you're a boat pulling an anchor along behind it. Once you realize you can't find the source of the weight, your first impulse might be to get angry. Unfortunately, misplaced emotions won't help your cause. For now, take the course of least resistance. Going with the flow helps you to conserve your energy for when you take a stand later on.

Your power of analysis is inherently strong as long as you aren't overwhelmed by too many details. Unfortunately, you might find it difficult to follow through on anything you start today because it's challenging to navigate your way through the streams of incoming information. Thankfully, you don't have to obsess about filtering out all the irrelevant data. Simply work with what you know and concentrate on your goal until you achieve it.

You may be relieved when you realize how many options are available today. Ironically, your newfound freedom of choice can stabilize your current situation because you don't feel as trapped as you once thought you were. Nevertheless, you really don't need to make any major decisions now. Keeping multiple paths open as long as possible enables you to be better informed about your alternatives before making a commitment.

You're being challenged to relinquish your need for intensity today and, thankfully, you can appreciate the value of a more casual approach to life. Practicing flexibility allows you to go along with someone else's plan now, even if you believe yours is better. Just remember that acting in a halfhearted manner doesn't work for you all-or-nothing Scorpios. Anger or resentment could surface if you stubbornly hold on to your previous desires. Fortunately, being honest right from the start all but ensures a mutually beneficial outcome.

Someone could fly into your life today and have you chasing whimsical ideas as if they were the most important things in the world to you now. You're confident you can grab this lovely illusion and create something tangible from it, even if it's totally unrealistic. Unfortunately, you could waste too much energy running down a dream that isn't as enthralling once it's caught. Think twice before pursuing a fantasy you might soon regret.

You have several intriguing ideas while at work today, but your mind is racing and you could be off to the next inspiring thought before you do anything with the current one. Unfortunately, a useful concept might get lost in the shuffle if you don't take the time to write it down as it's unfolding. You shouldn't rely on your memory if you want to retain something important. Building on a solid foundation requires a methodical approach and disciplined follow through.

You are refreshed by incoming waves of enthusiasm, but new ideas that surface today might not be as viable as they seem at first. You may grow discouraged if you think your strategy is an intelligent one, only to see it quickly lose luster. Don't try to hold onto any one possibility above all the others; allow every thought to rise and fall in its own time. Ironically, remaining detached from the outcome gives you the best chance of manifesting your plan.

Trusting your natural psychic powers isn't easy today because your logic leads you to conclude something very different from your intuition. It doesn't matter how often you run through the individual steps in your mind; your rational analysis remains at odds with what's in your heart. Fortunately, you gain a wider perspective when you don't force conflicting points of view into a single answer. Integrating your feelings with the facts leads to success.

The adrenaline is pumping through your body these days, but a twinge of intuition warns you not to make any sudden moves. Your natural inclination is to ignore the danger signs by closing your eyes and just jumping into the fray. Although red-hot Mars in fiery Aries tempts you to rush precariously close to the edge, sensible Saturn advises you to think things through one more time before going too far. Oddly enough, consciously exercising self-restraint today isn't as difficult as you might think and, thankfully, works in your favor.

Clever ideas rush into your awareness today, but there's no way to follow each one of them to its conclusion. Your most practical strategy is to narrow the field of possibilities prior to taking any decisive action. It's pointless to waste time switching focus from one task to another, even if each is worthwhile. As Einstein wisely said, "ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important." There is a reliable path to success hidden in the noise; your assignment is to find it.

You may be tougher on yourself than anyone realizes today. In some ways, you're like a stage magician, for everyone just sees what you want them to see. People are fascinated with your hands waving around in the air and all the amazing stories you tell, but they don't understand this show is all about hiding the mental juggling act you are performing behind the curtain. Instead of going to such extreme measures now, just take swift action to fix what's wrong. Being honest might seem harder at first, but it is much easier to remember the truth in the long run.

Events at work have become pretty intense lately, but the problem is that you can't tell who is really in control. Don't try to outsmart others with your logic today, or you could end up tying your emotions into knots that aren't easily untangled. Thankfully, you will discover allies you didn't know you had if you simply lean toward cooperation now rather than competition. No one is completely in charge; everything works better when there is an underpinning of collaboration and an atmosphere of team spirit.

Your actions may produce lasting results today without a lot of extra effort on your part. Thankfully, you won't have to wave your flag very long to get others to follow your lead. However, don't be surprised if they admire your dramatic flair instead of your conscientious work. Nevertheless, be humble; the real issue now is not about what you do; it's about how you can add meaning to the life of those around you. Let your generosity of spirit speak for itself.

You're quite proud of your work, even if no one seems to appreciate all the hoops you are jumping through to accomplish your goals. However, you might not feel like you're making much progress if you start to believe the negative feedback. Thankfully, you have more control over what happens than you realize. Your persistence will be rewarded, so remain focused on your objectives today no matter what anyone else says. Be true to yourself and your light will shine through the darkness.

An artist's life is not all fun and games. There are unique challenges in expressing your creativity, even if it looks like child's play to others. Practicing self-discipline and demonstrating a strong work ethic sets the stage for a big payoff. Although you're tempted to take the easy way out now, it's imperative to keep the production lines moving today so you can reach your goals on time. Creating your masterpiece takes complete dedication on your part.

Although your current feelings may be rather fickle, you can still learn a lot by exploring them as they change. Fortunately, you are quite adept at integrating complicated emotions lurking around in the shadows of your subconscious. However, you must resist the temptation to leave questions unanswered now just because you are restless. Instead of skipping off to the next captivating distraction today, remain in one place long enough to satisfy your quest to understand the mysteries of the cosmos.

You might feel as if you are stuck in a restrictive box today, but paradoxically, you don't seem to mind the constraints all that much. Although you still believe that a radical approach is your fastest route out of a difficult situation, you aren't at liberty to act on your thoughts now. Ultimately, it's nearly impossible to decide whether to be rebellious or rational. Others may encourage more reckless behavior, but the most traditional approach increases your chances for success at this time.

You tenacious Goats are famous for climbing with even more determination when the going gets tougher, as if you want to prove that nothing will stop you from reaching the top. Nevertheless, it's challenging to concentrate now if you want to explore every opportunity that arises. Ironically, you might even appear more scattered than you actually are. There's a diabolical method to your madness today, so don't let anyone plant a seed of doubt in your mind. Believing in yourself is the key to reaching the summit.

People tend to take you quite seriously today, even if you're channeling the weirdest and most whimsical aspects of your inner nature. Fortunately, you can play both ends of the spectrum, simultaneously being an unconventional rebel and a disciplined devotee. Although an impulsive reaction seems like the opposite of a more compulsive approach, you might somehow combine the attributes into a single posture that gets you what you need. Make the most of this magical cosmic balancing game while it lasts.

A lingering domestic issue takes an important turn toward resolution today. However, the conflict isn't over yet because there are more things yet to be said. In the meantime, you can still inch closer to a satisfying compromise if you simply let your true feelings out of the bag. Embrace the reality of your heart; sharing your hopes and fears creates an atmosphere of trust and clears a bright path to the future.

Everything appears to be coming up roses now, but your positive attitude is still being directly fueled by your fantasies. You know that there is more happening beneath the surface and you are extremely curious about what isn't being said out loud. However, you may try taking the easy way out by ignoring your doubts and keeping your discomfort buried at an unconscious level. Although you might declare that you're worry-free today, it's healthier to talk about your feelings rather than avoiding them. Sharing your secrets inspires others to do the same.

You are wise to initiate action sooner rather than later today while the Moon is still hanging out in your 2nd House of Values, empowering you to clearly verbalize your core beliefs. Unfortunately, if you delay the conversation until later in the evening, you're likely to stir up an emotional melodrama. Taking the time to reveal your thoughts to a trusted friend can open a door to a meaningful discussion about your dreams for the future.

You may have to consciously slow yourself down today. If you continue to run at full speed you could be exhausted by the evening. You appear as if you're open to other people's ideas now, but chances are you have already decided your course of action. Unfortunately, if a friend confronts you about your beliefs, you could lose your temper before you know it. Be mindful and don't project your moodiness onto anyone else now, just because you might be able to get away with it. Be honest and establish firm boundaries for the sake of everyone involved.

Everything may seem rather chaotic today as you run around juggling all your projects. Unfortunately, you might not successfully fulfill your obligations if you take on too much at this time. If you become anxious about your work, an ensuing letdown could be difficult to handle. Being aware of your feelings should go a long way toward preventing an inappropriately intense emotional response to a relatively innocent question. Take a deep breath and count to ten before opening your mouth.

The winds have changed and you are breathing easier today. You're able to look ahead and see all future possibilities, rather than still being tied to past responsibilities. Swing into action with firm resolve; you have a chance to accomplish more than you expect now if you stay focused on your goals throughout the day. But start early because your momentum will surely slow down as the day progresses. Strike while the iron is hot or you might miss the boat entirely.

You are determined to produce measurable results today, but your willpower gradually fades as your mind is drawn to less pragmatic things this evening. Unfortunately, you don't have the luxury of being able to lose yourself into your imagination now as a disagreement abruptly brings you back to the present moment. But don't take your annoyance out on others just because you wish you could still be meandering around in your dreams. Resolve your differences as quickly as possible so you have time to explore your fantasies.

Although you may be imagining all the exotic places you want to travel to and all the intriguing people you hope to meet, you're running out of time. The weight of your unfulfilled commitments is quickly overtaking your other thoughts. This stress could lead to an unnecessary argument because it's easier to blame a friend or lover for your circumstances now. Even if you are unhappy with the current dynamics, taking full responsibility for your situation is the quickest route to reconnecting with your true self.

You have been plucked from your natural habitat today, yet are able to quickly adapt by visualizing a time when you were more comfortable. Later in the day, the tides shift, inspiring you to rediscover the emotional connections with those you love. Unfortunately, everything might not be as simple as you wish. Acknowledge where reality falls short of your expectations in such a way that releases everyone else of the need to be responsible for your happiness.

It may appear as if your friends' eagerness to follow your lead is more bark than bite, making it harder to trust their intentions now. Although your current cynicism could appear out of character, you're fairly certain that others will just let you down. You might grow more sullen throughout the day and even pick a fight with someone in an attempt to express your frustration. Instead of taking your fears out on anyone else, look within for your answers. Acknowledging your role in creating the current dynamics gives you the best odds for finding a permanent solution.

Something profound is coming down the road and as hard as you try to get out of the way, you cannot. Thankfully, physical harm is not likely, yet you may be confronted with the wide gulf between you and your loved ones now. This isn't the time to force a resolution between two people who respond very differently. Instead, stay aware of the feelings that arise, for they reveal where there is work still to be done. Listen to your heart and the mystery will solve itself in its own time.

Finishing your chores is challenging work now, especially if you would rather be dreaming about your future than managing the mundane details of a annoying situation. But the Moon's entry into your 6th House of Work this afternoon convinces you that tomorrow will be a much more productive day. And, astrologically, this just may be true. Nevertheless, some things must be completed today or you'll just end up doing them under pressure at a later time. Bite the bullet and do what must be done.

You might go out of your way to hide your feelings today, but your attempts may not be sufficient to do the trick. Even if you sidestep a confusing situation early in the day, it's likely to swing back around and catch you off guard later. Don't stress too much if you are involved in an uncomfortable discussion. Instead of trying to emerge victorious in an argument, simply strive to find common ground or just smile and walk away.

You might have to use some much-needed discretion today as your feelings deepen and seek expression in the outer world. The problem is that your intensity may be too much for others to handle now, and unless you want to push them away, it would be best clench your teeth, swallow hard and keep some things to yourself. Thankfully, you can still find joy in your solitude; don't be afraid to go it alone.

Others may see you as a force to be reckoned with, even if you are trying to downplay your power today. You are at the top of your game, making it crucial to apply your intentions with careful consideration, lest you waste the chance to move closer to your goals. There's no need to hold back, as long as you are acting with awareness and being kind to those around you. Maintaining a realistic perspective and a compassionate attitude works in your favor now.

You're sorely tempted to run out on your responsibilities to play with your associates, friends or family. This little self-indulgence would normally be fine, except you'll probably realize that lighthearted distractions are not going to be enough for you now. You are seeking ways to connect your outer world with your innermost passions. However, you won't get what you want if you push too hard. It takes a delicate touch to convey your intentions without stirring up unnecessary resistance.

The difficulty you might encounter today originates from your sensitivity clashing with your drive to pursue what you need. Although you often tend toward the passive side of the spectrum, now you feel energized and are willing to trust your instincts. Your emotions are demanding expression, so why stand in your own way? The sooner you share your desires with someone you want to impress, the closer you'll be to the potential of satisfaction. Follow your heart and don't look back.

You are playing the lead role in your own personal movie today and, as long as you know when to step back from the spotlight, you will be a big hit today. However, you really don't want to be successful if you're the villain, for others might believe this to be the real you. It may be better to take off your mask and be vulnerable enough to be seen for who you are and not for what you do. Thankfully, your chances of being truly appreciated increase when you actually show up without expectations and with an open heart.

You can convince others that your position is a solid one, but you're not going to persuade anyone with your words today. Language is too shallow and just won't get your true conviction across. Your best sales tool now is your actions, which will certainly speak louder than any words you could conjure up -- even if you are highly skilled with language. Beauty is currently the major motivating force, so take your time and act only when your aesthetic sense says yes.

Relationships are nearly always on your mind and these days are no exception. Although you are driven to seek pleasure today through your interactions with others, you won't be easily satisfied. But don't fall into the trap of thinking that you need more to fill your cup. It's about quality, not quantity. Going beyond the senses isn't for everyone, but life remains empty now if you can't share your feelings in a meaningful manner.

You can't get away with any selfish behavior today because there are too many people who are counting on you. Nevertheless, you're inclined to sneak away for a bit and indulge your senses in a feast of pleasure. You don't need to turn your day upside down; you only need to carve out a little time for rejuvenating your soul. Refreshing your psyche is a great idea as long as you don't overdo it. Be creative; be real. Most of all, be true to yourself.

You have a unique vision to bring to life today. You may understand that your long-term goals won't be achieved right away, but whatever you do in this moment can have great impact on your future. The most important thing is to avoid acting for personal reasons alone. The more you include the needs of others in your current ambitions, the easier time you'll have of finding fulfillment.

You may be hearing two distinct voices now, and each of them is presenting a convincing argument. On one hand, you know there's no quick fix and that you're in it for the long haul. Sometimes, it's smarter to play cautiously. On the other hand, you might feel as if you can't lose no matter what. Naturally, the truth is somewhere in the middle. You can navigate this contradiction by listening to the reactions of others. Taking their perspective into consideration helps you choose the most viable course at this time.

Your day is overloaded with too many things to do, but there's no one to blame the apparent chaos on but yourself. You've just packed too much into a single day and made one too many promises. The good news is that you still can make it all work even if it seems impossible at first. When in doubt, ask your heart for guidance. Even if you're extremely competent, it's okay to be human. No one expects you to be a superhero all the time.

Sometimes your feelings can confuse you when you are required to exert your will. You tend to avoid direct confrontation, for it brings up issues of uncertainty within your imagination. Now, however, you can go after what you want without worrying about offending people with your honest disclosure. In fact, they will want to help you; just make sure you are clear about your destination before asking others for their support.

You might want to close your doors and shutter your windows today as the self-protective Cancer Moon invites you to hide from the outer world. It's not that you're ready to become a hermit; it's just that you need a little time to reflect on all the recent changes you have experienced. Don't be hard on yourself if you aren't up for another challenge just yet. Sink in to your feelings and nurture your soul. There will be plenty of time tomorrow to re-enter the fray and show off your superhero powers for the ones you love.

You like the idea of getting cozy with close friends and family today. However, you're not operating at the same speed as they are and may grow frustrated if they want you to accompany them in activities that just seem distracting. Unfortunately, your unwillingness to participate could place an unnecessary restriction on your pleasure quotient now. A more viable strategy is to go along with the fun until you reach your limit and then politely excuse yourself so you can reclaim your center of gravity. Practicing adaptability enables you to benefit from the best of both worlds.

You may be uncomfortable with sharing your emotions, especially if you think that someone is judging your every thought today. You might mistakenly believe that others see you as weak if you let your feelings get the best of you. However, this fear originates from your own false assumption that passions should be subservient to logic. Demonstrate your courage by expressing your true desires without suppressing them. Authenticity is your friend.

Your emotions are intimately linked to your metaphysical beliefs today and every aspect of your spiritual practice seems connected to a personal feeling. Luckily, you can transform negativity by adopting a more philosophical approach to life. Engaging in casual discussions about your current situation may be enough to alter your view about a difficult issue. Communication is the key; you can change your trajectory once you decide to let down your guard and talk about your fears.

You might not be forthcoming with your emotions today, but the sensitive Cancer Moon's visit to your 12th House of Privacy prompts you to delve deeper into the secrets of your dreams. Whether or not you say anything about your fantasies now, you cannot escape the rich inner experience of your imagination. But don't fall too far into the trap of isolation. When the time is right, reach out and touch someone you trust by speaking your truth. Words may be all you have at first, but you can take a relationship to the next level by opening your heart.

You can benefit from an compatible relationship between your emotions and your thoughts today, even if they usually work in such separate ways. Mental Mercury's sweet trine to the Cancer Moon establishes a smooth flow of energy from the heart to the head. Naturally, you prefer to elevate your most practical thoughts over irrational feelings. Fortunately, you don't have to make a choice now. Sharing your passions with a loved one enables you to enjoy the results of clear communication while it lasts.

It's simple to conjure up your ideal success story today. However, your plans aren't concrete and your daydreams are running on the fuel of inspiration. It's tricky to separate the facts from the fantasies now and the harder you try, the muddier it all becomes. Instead of seeking objectivity, allow the mind to wander without worrying about uncovering the absolute truth. Clarity will return soon enough; enjoy floating around on the clouds of imagination until it does.

Although your creative muse is hanging around these days, it's tempting to just be lazy. Unfortunately, it currently takes extra effort to defy the urge to do nothing; you must consciously take the initiative if you want to be productive. Your current lesson is about conscious choice. Your commitment can make the difference between a day of escape and one of memorable accomplishment. Set high goals today and strive with all your might to achieve them.

You have enough energy to set the world on fire today, but you might not do anything about it because you don't want to upset the status quo. Nevertheless, you're growing more dissatisfied day by day and are getting closer to making a drastic move. Although you aren't necessarily ready for action, it's time to finalize your plans. Make use of the cerebral Moon-Mercury trine by wrapping words around your visions. Talking about your future as if it is real can actually help to manifest it the way you see it in your dreams.

You may be befuddled today because others seem too clingy for your taste. You enjoy the fruits of participating in an interdependent relationship where there is mutual trust and a balance of give and take. But people who are overly needy make you want to head for the hills. However, it's wiser to give them the benefit of the doubt; they are only trying in their own way to be happy. Taking the higher road and helping a friend in need could quickly cycle around and bring you more joy than you expect.

Holding onto old habits doesn't necessarily serve you well these days, and your ability to rationalize unproductive behavior can be a trap worth avoiding. Thankfully, you're able to see the negative pattern and break out of the rut; however, it might not happen as quickly as you hope. Don't attempt to talk yourself out of trying before you make several wholehearted attempts to open a door to a different future. There's no question about it: your mind is more powerful than you think. You only have to give it a chance to work its magic.

It seems as if someone cranked up the flow of your ingenious juices today and you can't find the off switch. Normally, this would be an exciting time, but your radical inspiration may complicate your life. On one hand, you're not interested in making a beautiful artifact for others to appreciate; you're more intrigued with finding the truth in hidden mysteries. But on the other hand, your very act of creation touches the magic of the cosmos in a way you cannot deny. Shine your brilliance by standing up to the plate and hitting one out of the park.

Your confidence rises as the bright Leo Moon dances through your 5th House of Fun and Games today, but you could tire yourself out before fulfilling all of your responsibilities. Even if you believe that working faster is the answer to  your problems, this strategy of overcompensation won't likely be all that successful now. You might still need to process lingering emotions left over from a recent melodrama, so don't overextend your energy. Being methodical is the most effective way to achieve your goals and conserve your resources at the same time.

It's more complicated to express your feelings today if they seem contrary to what everyone else is experiencing. Nevertheless, denying them will only add to the tension as the fixed Leo Moon's presence in your 4th House of Home and Family turns up the heat on a domestic issue. You may think that it's wise to avoid facing a volatile situation, but you will actually feel greatly relieved if you confront whatever is bothering you sooner than later. Opening the communication channels removes the blockages and gets the energy flowing again.

Although you might plan to fly under the radar today, the pace of events seems to be rapidly  speeding up. However, adapting your expectations to the changes allows you to appear as if you're more in control than you actually are today. Thankfully, you can shift gears so inconspicuously that others won't even realize you are feeling stressed out. Just make sure you don't expend more energy than you have or you might run out of steam next week. A little advanced planning saves you from a big headache later on.

Financial issues seem to be on your plate again, now that the Moon is camped out in your 2nd House of Money. The current solution may be as simple as attending to your personal accounting, but deeper and more complex problems might also come to the surface today. Your good intentions aren't necessarily sufficient to put everything back in order. You can improve the situation by demonstrating your responsibility and following through with whatever you start. Your extra diligence is all that's needed to turn things around in a positive direction.

You may be itching to do something totally unusual today and think it would be fun to share your radical ideas with someone special. However, you might need to exercise caution because once you start talking it might not be all that easy to stop. Telling your friends about your dreams can lead to wonderful interactions, even if your visions are not yet based in reality. Just keep in mind that saying too much too soon disperses the energy prematurely. Don't spill the beans before you're certain of your plans. The anticipation is half of the fun.

The stakes seem higher today than they are in reality. Unfortunately, it's complicated to withdraw from a game that you started, even though the Moon is hiding out in your 12th House of Escapism. Be crystal clear about your intentions right from the beginning. Whatever happens now, don't be tricked into thinking that you must come out on top. If there are no winners, there are no losers; all you need to do is play your part the best you can and encourage others to do the same.

You might choose to spend so much time hanging out with friends today that your chores begin to suffer. However, any projects that are still unfinished could see significant progress in the weeks ahead if you apply yourself now. Nevertheless, your productivity may not live up to your expectations no matter what you do. Thankfully, you can truly enjoy the Moon's visit to your 11th House of Social Networking if you're not overly self-critical. Luckily, you're still able to accomplish more than you expect since your window of opportunity remains open for a few days.

Although your behavior often reveals how you feel, people can misinterpret your actions today if you don't take the time to explain your position. The expressive Leo Moon shines in your 10th House of Public Responsibility, requiring you to take charge of your life in a way that clearly demonstrates your intentions. But don't expect immediate support or you might be disappointed; it may take several days for everyone to be back on the same page. In the meantime, be clear in your communication; the resistance will fade if you bring others along on your emotional ride.

You're inclined to talk about your feelings in a very personal manner today. However, the emotional content of your current disclosure might catch others off guard, possibly even making them uncomfortable with your blunt honesty. Although you can moderate your intensity if you run into negativity, don't use anyone else's fear as a justification to withdraw. Instead, gently lean into an awkward situation until the stress begins to lift and the mood lightens once again.

Relating to people's feelings can be tricky business today because their motives are probably quite different from yours. Naturally, it would be much simpler to smooth over any rough spots if you knew what others wanted. Unfortunately, you're pretty sure you are missing a piece of important information now, even if everyone appears to be forthright. Paradoxically, the more you push to uncover the mystery, the more complicated it becomes. Back off for a while and the details will reveal themselves sooner than you expect.

A close relationship demands vigilance on your part today, but the background tension might not dissipate even if an apparent conflict is resolved. On the surface, it seems as if the dynamics are back to normal, but you could still be left with a lingering feeling of confusion. Don't make too big of a deal about your current uncertainty. Oddly enough, sometimes it makes sense to focus less on a problem, instead of more. Downplay the drama for now and let the situation unfold organically, giving everyone room to breathe.

You want to be acknowledged for your consistent efforts at work or around the home as the nurturing Moon moves through your 6th House of Routine. It doesn't matter whether your contribution is large or small; a little recognition goes a long way. But you won't get away with grandstanding for the sake of attention now; attempts to prolong your time in the spotlight will likely backfire. Just do your job with your own creative flair and rest assured that others will notice, even if they don't have anything nice to say today.

Although you have been on a rocket ship ride with several planets blasting through your impetuous sign, you may be growing weary as energetic Mars prepares to leave the land of Aries tomorrow. You are envisioning an escape route just in case you need it. You could be feeling skittish if you feel cornered, but overreacting won't likely produce a positive result. Succumbing to your worries about the future only alerts others to your anxiety. For now, it's smarter to relax and listen to your heart than dream about being somewhere else.

Your unwavering determination is your greatest strength as you continue to express your love today, even in the face of an emotionally confusing situation. Lovely Venus is at her best while in your sign, even when attempting to harmonize with intense Pluto. However, this cosmic combo demands that you concentrate on the underlying feelings rather than being distracted by the surface noise. Aim deep and you won't be led off track by unimportant issues or temporary fears. You are solid now as long as you remain on course and put honesty above all else.

You are able to cleverly maintain your balance today while you are lured into unknown emotional territory. However, you may have to push past your own resistance and share your feelings, even if you're uncertain about how someone else will react to your disclosure. Thankfully, the conversation is likely to go much better than you expect now as long as you don't freeze once you start talking. But it's a two-way street; you might learn something new if you are truly willing to listen with both an open mind and an open heart.

You might sink into a deep and dark mood today as you attempt to reveal your secrets to a trusted ally. But your sense of urgency may be unfounded, provoking frustration or anger if your confidante isn't willing to match the intensity of your emotions. Nothing is to be gained by trying to change anyone else; focus on your own inner process, instead. Ironically, taking full responsibility for your feelings allows your dissatisfaction to transform into an appreciation of the love in your life.

You could grow annoyed with people being so nice to you now because their support of your life plan just doesn't feel authentic. You might even see their propitiating behavior as a sign of weakness. However, it isn't wise to harden your position on an ill-conceived idea. Thankfully, you have an opportunity to show that you can be strong and yielding at the same time. Recognizing the wisdom of flexibility with respect to your desires empowers you to navigate through a very intense day with flying colors.

You think you can narrow your focus and limit your distractions in order to concentrate on what you need to do today. Unfortunately, this strategy is doomed from the start and grows more difficult to manage because your emotions are stirred, inspiring you to set your heart on some distant destination. It doesn't matter if you're incredibly smart; it's just plain foolhardy to ignore your feelings. Having more facts at your disposal won't help since you already know in your gut what you must do.

You may be feeling quite confident about your current plans now, but something is still gnawing away in the dark at the back of your mind. You might be limited in your options today, especially if you're obsessing about a relationship from the past. But trying to escape from your personal history is futile; dig into it with passionate curiosity, instead. Once you can find your way around in the shadows of your subconscious, you'll be better able to navigate in the light of reality. Trust your heart to lead you in the right direction.

Your unexpressed anger can cool into ice and morph into resentment, which is exponentially more difficult to process. Fortunately, vulnerable Venus trines your key planet Pluto today, exacerbating your emotions and preventing them from going quiet. Letting go and acting on your intuition is easy if you can relinquish your fears first. Following your instincts now is your best insurance against fostering negativity. A grateful mind is a powerful mind.

Your sense of self-worth and net worth are inextricably intertwined today, even if they usually seem like separate issues. Today's passionate Venus-Pluto trine impacts your 2nd House of Resources, empowering you to ride an intense emotional wave of energy. You might want to consider cashing in on your current confidence and asking for a raise or a promotion. Naturally, the dynamics at work need to support your request, but in any case your contribution and your courage won't go unnoticed.

You are still enjoying the sweet benefits of lovely Venus skipping through your 5th House of Spontaneity. Your involvement in a significant creative project or a new romance may be intensifying, and you're tempted to go overboard as you try to give the performance of your life. This can be quite a memorable day as long as you don't struggle to accomplish the impossible. It's better to thoroughly explore one feeling today than to pursue several different options.

It's refreshing to feel so creative today and exciting to believe that things could get even better during the next few days. However, your happy-go-lucky attitude may be quite deceptive now. You might skillfully disarm someone's aggression, yet you're still ready for serious business in a moment's notice. Use your keen ability to shift back and forth between the light-hearted and heavy-handed extremes, so you can make the most of every moment. Your charm and tenacity are an unbeatable combination.

You may be afraid that the negativity of someone at work might grow into more of a problem during the days ahead. Although nipping a worrisome situation in the bud sounds like an intelligent plan, it's not always the smartest strategy to suppress the natural expression of uncomfortable emotions like fear and anger. If you really want to preempt potential trouble, ask thoughtful questions and be an active listener as well. Sometimes, all a person needs is to be heard.

It's odd, but you can't decide whether everything is going along as it should or if something weird is happening that's pulling your day off track. You might be afraid that you're not as in control as you wish today, even if you're making progress on the most important projects. Perhaps you would be more satisfied if everything was turned upside down, but it feels as if some sort of cosmic superglue is keeping the status quo from coming apart at the seams. Don't worry so much about things you can't change; it's time to accept that the universe has different plans for you.

You may experience such a strong boost of energy today that your confidence soars to new heights. However, your enthusiasm isn't about unrealistic expectations based on pie-in-the-sky fantasies. You actually try to pin your hopes on the facts as you see them. Nevertheless, something is out of kilter and you might be surprised by a sudden shift in the cosmic weather. Instead of running around trying to figure out what you missed, gracefully integrate the changes as quickly as possible. Just like a colorful chameleon, adaptability works in your favor.

You are not overly concerned with reaching your goals today because you realize how arbitrary time can be. After all, there is always tomorrow. Your feelings are more important to you now than your production, regardless of what anyone expects. Unfortunately, you can't completely separate yourself from the judgments of others who are sharing your space. Even if you believe that your reactions are strictly your business, living with people in close vicinity requires sacrifice and compromise on an ongoing basis. No man is an island.

Although your career aspirations are still meaningful, you're dreaming about your future in less concrete terms now. Ironically, you might believe that your goals are built upon sensible expectations, even if they're not. However, all the substantiating facts in the world aren't enough to pull you back to earth today. Don't fight the natural rhythm of the cosmos. Give yourself permission to follow the currents wherever they carry you for the sake of the experience.

You might wish you could kick back and let everyone continue on without you today. But you know that others are judging you by what you accomplish so you have a difficult time of relinquishing your real world obligations. Make heart-centered choices; whatever you do now, it's crucial to positively reinforce your self-esteem. It's not helpful to decide upon a course of action based upon your assumptions about the reactions of anyone else. Your success is best measured by the level of your personal satisfaction and the pride you take in your work.

You are happiest today when you are actively pursuing your future. Unfortunately, there are a few unexpected bends in the road, and you may be confused about reaching your ultimate destination if you're pulled too far off course. Nevertheless, your task is to hold steady on your current path now, even if you feel like you've lost the plot to your story. Whether or not you can see through the fog, your light shines brightly for those close to you. It only takes one candle to light up the dark.

It doesn't really matter how long a particular friendship has already lasted; you are ready to emotionally shift gears today. Taking things to the next level sounds like a lovely idea now that assertive Mars enters your strange and intimate 8th House of Deep Feelings. But the trick is to move slowly and remain open to the rhythms of the heart. There is no need to rush what should unfold naturally. Honesty and trust are essential ingredients for your happiness.

Someone's agenda crosses paths with yours today and you're not willing to just walk away from an unresolved confrontation. The best possible course to take is one of direct communication and unflagging honesty. However, your passionate emotions might not blend well with the theme of practicality called for by four planets in earth signs. Forget about settling your differences or proving your point now. Instead listen to the other person's ideas and simply acknowledge his or her position. Awareness leads to mutual respect and, hopefully, your peace of mind.

You may lose steam this afternoon but running out of energy might not be as bad as it sounds. Instead of just powering your way over any obstacles you encounter, you have to take a longer view if you want to reach the finish line. This philosophical perspective requires you to cultivate a special skill to a new level of competence. Luckily, you are likely to gain tools now that will benefit you for the rest of your life, regardless of the progress you make on your goals today. Life is a marathon, not a sprint.

Your center of gravity is strong enough today to withstand a cyclone. You are determined to reach your destination and nothing will obstruct your forward progress. Nevertheless, you still may have to deal with more than you bargained for because what you see is not necessarily what you get. Life plays tricks on you now, even if you think you're prepared for any type of emergency. Take stock of all your options and be ready for the mind games that can haunt you when reality is bent out of shape.

You would like to push beyond your regular patterns of communication but might not know the best way to get started. You tend to be more effective when working in pure conceptual realms, but have trouble escaping from a more pragmatic view over the next few weeks. Don't assume you have all the answers just because you've amassed a lot of information. Sometimes the most useful solutions come from the emptiness that's between the noisy facts and figures. Dancing with the unknown leads to your success.

Life can feel like a struggle if others demand more precision and detail than you have to offer today. You wish you could remain floating around in your dream world, yet you realize that there is work to do and it won't just happen on its own. However, it may seem as if your extra efforts are for naught if you aren't making much headway on any one project. Nevertheless, it's a big mistake to judge your success by rational analysis now. The most significant progress eludes measurement, so save your assumptions and conclusions for another day. Let your imagination run the show.

It seems as if so much has happened these past few months that your life has irrevocably changed. Although the stability you once relied on has faded, you could gain small victories in your current battle to regain control. You're ready to swing into action right away now that clever Mercury is visiting your spontaneous sign. But reacting too quickly might have you running off in the wrong direction, determined to fix a problem that can wait. Ask someone you trust to help you set new priorities today before you make a mistake. Look before you leap.

You aren't the first one to come up with a viable answer to an annoying dilemma today, but your solution is sound enough that it is worth waiting for. Your idea may appear overly simplistic on the surface, but it's nearly impossible for others to find a flaw in your rock-solid logic. Ironically, the pieces of your plan all fit so well together that others might suspect you of hiding the truth for the sake of expediency. Don't back off just to calm someone else's fears; the resistance will dissipate faster than you expect, allowing you to be the hero in the end.

There won't be many unexpected surprises today because mischievous Mercury is held in check by somber Saturn. You are standing on a foundation stable enough to support a reliable action plan. But don't settle for less and accept the status quo when you can stretch yourself further and establish exciting new goals. Grab this opportunity to demonstrate your analytical skills while your logic is as good as it gets.

The unrelenting intensity of your desires continues to rattle your world, even as your new-found clarity subdues your frazzled nerves now. If your plans are still ambiguous because you can't make up your mind, the fog begins to clear today, offering you the ability to see what's ahead. Deciding how to best tie up loose ends is a smart strategy today if you want to be ready for the future when it arrives. You might be shocked by how much you accomplish if you just keep your head down and stay focused. Channel your passion into your work.

You might think you have too much on your plate and are worried about getting everything done on time. Although your anxiety is likely self-imposed now, you grow calmer as the day proceeds. Thankfully, there is little need to overcompensate by proving anything to anyone today; your current fear of failure is likely unwarranted. Do whatever you can without creating unrealistic expectations and then set new goals tomorrow when your far-sighted vision improves. One job done right is better than several left undone.

You may be less traditional in your thinking today than others realize, even if it seems as if you're towing the party line. Your ideas might actually be quite progressive, yet keeping them hidden is a good idea now so you don't seem out of place at work. Fortunately, you have the ability to concentrate one hundred percent on your career if you so choose. Your singular focus could be enough to ease the pressure that's building in other areas of your life at this time. Energy flows where attention goes.

You take your role as arbitrator of reality quite seriously today, but people may be growing weary of your desire to fix relationships that don't live up to your exacting standards. Your friends and associates might think you have done enough and now it's time for you to back off. However, you're very patient and you're willing to wait before taking any initiative. Making decisions for others before you attend to your own personal business won't help matters. People who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones.

You can achieve a high level of personal satisfaction now, even if the dynamics of your current relationships are complicated. Unfortunately, unresolved issues may provoke you to disclose secrets that you would normally keep to yourself. Thankfully, your reasoning is very sound, allowing you to effectively consider all the possible scenarios before saying something you might later regret. Nevertheless, it's still wise to acknowledge old insecurities so they don't impede your progress. Remember who you're talking to before you say a word.

You may be exploring strategies to stabilize a relationship, especially if your partner seems to be acting flighty now. You are ready to take desperate action if you think someone you care about is slipping away. But rather than needlessly panicking, this is the time for cool and collected behavior. Slow down and think everything through first. Your rational approach of sharing your concerns in a non-judgmental manner inspires others to meet you halfway. Leading by example lets your true intentions shine through.

It might seem as if your schedule has become so hectic now that it is too crazy for you to handle. Thankfully, you are blessed with organizational superpowers today as cunning Mercury forms an easy trine with your key planet Saturn, bringing much-needed stability to the chaos. But taking on too much can be disastrous now, so don't try to do everything all at once. Set practical priorities before you initiate action; make a list and then methodically check off the items one at a time for the best results. Don't forget that you're the master of your own destiny.

If you have been procrastinating lately, use your time management skills to create a structured calendar that leaves you room to run your errands and still connect with others. Go out of your way to communicate with friends and coworkers because people will take your ideas more seriously today. There's no reason to wait any longer; you are a force to be reckoned with now and your positive attitude goes a long way toward propelling you on the road to success.

Today is the day to deliver your final answer, especially if you have been delaying a major decision. Nevertheless, you won't likely act foolishly because communicator Mercury is obeying orders from cautious Saturn, adding a cool logic to your thought process. Following a hunch often works best for you, but cold hard facts will take you even further now. Remember, your best choices are made with both your head and your heart.

Your life is unfolding in warp-speed motion today, yet it might not seem overwhelming at all. In fact, you could be experiencing great pleasure in keeping up with the hectic pace. Paradoxically, you are quite realistic about the hard work ahead, even if your ideas about all your current projects are blown out of proportion. Nevertheless, exercising a little caution is helpful and may be the key that enables you to accomplish the very ambitious goals you have set. Feeding off the buzz can carry you to great new heights.

You don't need anyone to inspire you today; you woke up with a specific agenda in mind and are eager to do nearly anything to manifest your dreams. Although you're optimistic about achieving your objectives, the frenzied atmosphere at work takes a lot out of you as you try to tame the chaos. You may crave peace and quiet, but you might not be so lucky to find it now. Instead of trying to slow everything down, just move into the situation knowing that your life is changing for the better. Fly, baby, fly.

You may be surprised by the consistency of enthusiastic support you are receiving from your coworkers and friends now. Try as you might to remain calm and collected, you are more likely to be thrilled by the variety of possibilities in front of you. Keep in mind that even the most stable relationship needs to evolve so you can take full advantage of an upcoming opportunity. Don't be content with the comfort of stability because you stand to gain more if you maintain your flexibility today. Think big; the stretch will do you good.

You can tell that the days ahead may present a few challenges, even if you're looking forward to the work. However, you might need to show your muscle by taking control of the situation and steering it in the right direction. Unfortunately, so much is going on now that you can't stay on top of every minute detail. Your best strategy is to pick a project and give it your very best. Although it could take a few days before you see positive results, your commitment to the long haul helps you make the most of the day.

You want to take time off to play today but you might have too many responsibilities to just get up and go. Although taskmaster Saturn rains on your parade in your 5th House of Recreation, you can still find a way to express your joy. You may be frustrated because it feels like certain aspects of your life have grown out of control. Even if you are facing trials and tribulations now, sharing the love that is in your heart turns hard work into child's play.

You may be required to grow in unexpected ways now by exercising your compassionate side, especially if complicated relationship dynamics are at play. However, you can't pretend you're comfortable with what's going on if you're not. But the kindest solution to this dilemma is to take the time to try to understand the motives of those you love. This conscious choice to walk in someone else's shoes allows you to support others in their process, even when it's not the same path as yours.

Your long-term objectives may be in jeopardy, especially if others are relying on you more than you expected. Unfortunately, you could be so enthusiastic that you over-commit every which way you turn today. Nevertheless, you're being guided now by a sensible inner voice that reminds you to slow down and be methodical in your approach, which gives you the time needed to be present for someone else. Remember, when you help a friend, the positive energy cycles back around to you in surprising ways.

New opportunities seem to come your way at work now, but they actually originate from you and not anyone else. Your positive and passionate attitude may have more to do with your response to the flow of external events than anything else. Good fortune could change at the drop of a hat unless you develop a practice around learning to graciously accept the abundance of the universe. When you know that you deserve the best, you will be more apt to receive it.

It may seem like the unshakeable foundation you have been seeking is now very close to materializing -- even if it's still just somewhere out on the horizon. You nostalgically yearn for a lost certainty to guide you through the complex choices ahead. But your potential growth depends upon temporarily letting go of your dreams of stability. Instead, be open to fulfillment in the present moment and not in some distant future. Be here now.

You are attempting to gracefully balance your relentless drive to get ahead with your irrepressible desire for security. Sometimes you're not satisfied with your current circumstances, yet neither are you willing to risk your position just to achieve more. You might think that it's impossible to make steady gains today, but you can accomplish more than you expect if you take it one step at a time. You don't need to gamble your present on your future to come out on top.

Something has changed and you aren't clear yet as to how all the pieces of the picture will fit back together. Relationships demand your immediate attention and you are willing to do your part to reap the rewards. Although you are finally at the beginning of a new cycle, you still must practice patience, for balancing self-restraint with enthusiasm is an ongoing process. Trust your intuition, especially if you don't have all the facts yet. Transforming uncertainty into positive action increases your chances for success.

If you applied yourself effectively over the past weeks, you will be recognized now for a job well done. Kudos from your coworkers or even your boss surely brightens your outlook.
