The real problem is your cavalier attitude; if someone thinks you're not being serious enough they might want to teach you a lesson. Your smartest strategy is one of cooperation and compromise. You will be happily surprised with your progress once you let go of your preconceived notions and trust the process.

You know you're an emotional softie but you don't want your hypersensitivity to stand in the way of professional progress today. You might jump to the wrong conclusion, assuming you just need to work harder to prove your intelligence. Oddly enough, speeding ahead won't help you reach your goals any quicker, especially if you think you need to suppress your feelings along the way. There are no shortcuts now; focus on your responsibilities and the rest will follow.

You might not even be aware that you slipped away from the real world and drifted off into the realms of your imagination. But if you look at everything very closely today, you may notice that things are bent slightly out of shape. A temporary escape into this parallel dimension isn't a problem, but confusing your dreams with reality can create quite a mess. Instead of struggling to discern the truth, explore every idea that floats across your consciousness as if it's the inspiration for your next masterpiece.

Your boss might not be very demonstrative with his or her support of your efforts today, but you keep pushing ahead no matter what. You're confident that you can prove your value if only given the chance. Meanwhile, you could turn into a modern-day Sherlock Holmes, searching for clues to help break down the wall of resistance. Your frustration builds because the closer you get to the truth, the harder it is to find. You won't win any battles using your infamous persistence, so think cooperatively rather than competitively  if you want to move up the ladder of success.

You may share an intriguing idea with someone today because you want a strong and clear response. But rather than receiving a definitive yes or no, you might not be able to tell where the other person stands. There's no reason to overreact since it is all too easy now to misread the signals. And, even if you're certain about the accuracy of your perceptions, keep in mind that everyone's feelings are prone to change these days. Instead of pressing anyone to be more specific, relax your need to know. Letting go of control allows the energy to flow freely and improves your chances of getting the answers later on.

Your vivid daydreams of a faraway destination can make you feel like you're actually there. Unfortunately, you can't reach your exotic paradise immediately in the three-dimensional world and still be home in time for dinner. You could set yourself up for disappointment unless you are fully satisfied by traveling in the mental realms, instead. Why waste time packing your suitcase when indulging in a good fantasy is all you need to recharge your batteries.

You have your work cut out for you today, yet you may choose to set it aside to pursue a more creative venture. Don't worry about the unrealistic expectations of others while you are busy running down a dream. If you keep up with your chores, whatever else you do will remain beyond the realm of criticism. Rather than expending energy justifying your actions, show the world what amazing feats you're capable of once you put your mind to something that truly matters.

People have a tough time trying to reason with you today because you believe you already possess all the facts you need to make up your mind. You might say that you're interested in new information as it arrives, but the truth is you keep a very stringent filter on your inbox. But don't lock others out just because you're afraid of what you could learn from them. Engaging in honest conversations -- even with an adversary -- may bring you a much-needed fresh perspective. Keep in mind that nothing is etched in stone yet. Today's decisions could change as soon as tomorrow.

You have many tasks on your to-do list today and it's a smart strategy to complete as much as possible before the Moon leaves your 6th House of Work. It is more complicated to return to your schedule once your attention moves on to something more captivating. Don't procrastinate because someone could distract you with their project at any moment, temporarily hijacking your plans. Maintaining your focus will leave you with something significant to show for your efforts at the end of the day. Effective time management is currently your key to success.

Exciting diversions to your daily routine are like guests being welcomed in for a cup of tea. Although your common sense doesn't approve, you will probably say yes to an invitation that comes your way now even if you don't really have the time to play. Naturally, meeting your obligations remains a high priority, but your overall quality of work could suffer if you don't also give yourself the chance to relax and have fun. Cut yourself some slack; the high expectations you place on yourself will carry you through whatever course you choose.

You might experience unexpected stress because of the heavy responsibilities that fall on your shoulders now. However, you're still ready to go out and stir up some mischief, even if there are consequences to pay. Your productivity could slack off today, but you should be able to make up for lost time tomorrow. Give your mind a break and exercise your creativity while you can. All work and no play is not a viable option for you free-spirited Archers.

You probably won't be able to stick to your previous plans today, and accepting this fact early on in the day could alleviate a lot of unnecessary tension. Your moods are meandering all over the map, making you less likely to follow through on your original agenda. But rather than suppressing your feelings, it's healthier to remain in touch with them. Trying to maintain objectivity could be exhausting and unproductive now. You will feel much better once you give yourself permission to temporarily relinquish control. Let go and allow your heart to lead the way.

You may receive an important message from someone who is very close to you. Paradoxically, what you are told could be contrary to what you believed you were going to hear. Although this new information complicates your life, you will only make matters worse if you try to block it out. You can't avoid negative consequences by pretending there isn't a problem. Be smart and deal with any issue that surfaces now before it spins out of control. Denial is not your friend; facing the music today saves you from heartaches tomorrow.

You're emotionally unsettled today because you sense something big is about to change. Your feelings are volatile and you can't tell where they are leading you. Unfortunately, attempts to ignore your needs could trigger you to unconsciously act out. Trying to control the energy by limiting your interactions with others only makes you feel lonely. Thankfully, you are a Fish and know that it's easier to swim with the currents instead of resisting the tide. Go with the flow; you can figure out your next move later after you reclaim your center and your creative muse returns.

No matter how psyched you are about the changes ahead, something could happen that catches you completely off guard now. Although there's nothing to do in preparation for the unexpected, remember that your mind is exaggerating the significance of everything that happens today. Your positive outlook on life motivates others to accomplish more than they think possible. But everyone can make even more progress if you control your tendency of going to the extremes. Finding the sweet spot between optimism and realism empowers you to skillfully navigate the changing landscape, leading the pack all the way.

You may attempt to downplay your desires because you want everyone to think you're cool under pressure. Nevertheless, you're more than likely to give in to your feelings and throw caution to the wind while excessive Jupiter encourages assertive Mars in your sign. You might even shock someone today with your blunt approach. However, your uncharacteristic boldness is useful for  overcoming any resistance, even if you hadn't previously thought out your strategy. Although you typically like to have a more concrete plan in place, the results could still bring you the satisfaction you seek.

You normally leave the execution of plans to everyone one else while you are busy running around exploring one fascinating idea after another. However, you need to modify your tactics today if people are behaving irresponsibly or advising you to stretch beyond your normal limits. But don't look to anyone else for the solution to your current dilemma. Just pick a destination and focus all of your energy on reaching it. You might be pleasantly surprised when your new strategy of unwavering determination produces the outcome you were seeking all along.

You may experience a breakthrough in awareness today by discovering how to improve your day without jeopardizing the parts of it that are already working. But having a brilliant idea is not significant unless you can follow through with decisive action. You have a lot going for you now as long as you don't attempt to accomplish too much right away. It's better to take many baby steps toward a long-term goal than a few giant steps that lead the wrong way. Ironically, starting slowly and building momentum as you gain confidence saves you time in the long run.

Your enthusiasm continues to grow by leaps and bounds; you might feel so confident that you actually believe that you can't do anything wrong. You may not even realize that you sound  overbearing today, leading others to think there are ulterior motives in play. Unfortunately, you could inadvertently offend people unless you soften your approach. Although you don't mean any harm, it's still smart to avoid giving a false impression by acting less aggressively. As long as your intentions are honorable and your behavior is above reproach, you don't need to prove anything to anyone else.

You usually prefer to take things step by step, but your current excitement may trick you into making lots of changes right away. Unfortunately, following through with your plans can be difficult if you move too quickly today. Although it sounds counter-intuitive, you'll accomplish more if you slow down and get it right the first time. Practicing perfectionism is a useful strategy now, especially if you want to be proud enough of your work that you feel ready to move on to your next challenge.

A current decision could be a critical turning point on your path, so carefully reconsider your choices before you make a commitment you can't reverse. Even if someone is pushing you to initiate action right away, it's smarter to step back and thoroughly analyze all your options. Don't waste energy trying to justify your lack of productivity today or you might miss your chance to grapple with the bigger picture. Instead of getting caught up in the drama of the moment, keep your eyes on the prize if you truly want to achieve your dreams.

Career opportunities loom large and your anticipation of the possibilities intensifies day by day. You're excited about the next phase of your life, but it's still too soon to make your next move. Although big changes are now behind you, more are already heading your way; you could have a very different perspective within a few weeks. Resist jumping to any half-baked conclusions today; there's still more you need to learn before making a life-altering choice. Let destiny unfurl at its own pace and dance with the unknown.

Obviously, you are happy when so many things seem to be going your way. But the energizing cosmic energy brought to you by passionate Mars squaring joyful Jupiter is not a permanent fix. Although you needn't worry about your plans falling apart today, your current overconfidence can be a trap that makes you overly complacent. You still have to put in the extra effort if you want to keep your life on track. If your goals are really important to you, do everything in your power to reach them for the sake of your own happiness.

You may be feeling pressure to expand your range of operations now. However, you're not necessarily sure that you can deliver on everything that's expected of you. Thankfully, you have a few well-rehearsed tricks up your sleeves that reinforce your high level of professionalism. Just don't let any lingering insecurities stand in the way of your current work. Fear of failure is not a healthy motivation; instead, focus on the success you wish to achieve. When you show everyone that you mean business, you'll pass even the harshest of tests today with flying colors.

You might be ruminating about all the people you know who have boldly ventured far from home while pursuing their purpose in life. Meanwhile, you may be challenged by circumstances that prevent you from embarking on your own spiritual journey. However, nothing is gained from indulging in a self-pity party. Don't attempt to rein in control of your thoughts because they are the motivational juice for what you decide to do next. Although your active fantasy life is a bit exhausting now, it will most likely settle down after a night of good rest. The seeds of your quest are sown in your dreams.

A new project at work may be enough to put the bounce back in your step. Even if your job feels like a tired routine, a fresh wave of enthusiasm washes into your world now and opens your mind to all the amazing possibilities in front of you. You might feel as if you're standing at a fork in the road and need to make an important decision right away. But don't fall for the illusion of overnight success. There's no reason to rush when you have a plethora of opportunities to inspire your imagination.

Waves of positive energy motivate you to take a chance and creatively express your feelings to someone you like. Although you appear to be lighthearted and even playful, there is more going on than meets the eye as the Aries New Moon forms an otherworldly alignment with mysterious Pluto. Don't be afraid to tap into the potent energies that lurk just beneath the surface. Act now and let fate take its course. Trust the cosmos to lead you exactly where you need to go.

Although you might appear relaxed and easygoing, you have a hidden agenda today that is influencing your most important decisions. But you're not about to share your innermost thoughts now that the independent Aries New Moon fires up your 12th House of Secrecy. However calm you seem to others, you're actually busy plotting and planning with great intention. The Moon's shift into your determined sign later in the day may be your signal to put your ideas into action. There's no time to waste now; you can slow down later only if you get started right away.

Although you love the action of the present moment, your thoughts are wandering off into the future with great hope and eager anticipation. Today's spontaneous Aries New Moon activates your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, making it tough to stick to your routine today. Rather than relegating your fantasies to the back burner, go along for the ride as if you were watching a movie. Don't worry about integrating your dreams of the distant horizon with the pressing reality of here and now. Dance in both worlds; connect the two later on.

You may be overly concerned now with your reputation in the neighborhood, at church or even in your family. You want to live up to everyone's expectations while the Aries New Moon emphasizes your 10th House of Responsibility. However, what people think about you is less important than how you feel about your current actions. Taking some quiet time for contemplation can lead to useful insights that empower your expression and expand your role in the world.

You might think your plans are practical, but your excitement overrules a more sensible approach to the day. The enterprising Aries New Moon lands in your 9th House of Big Ideas, tempting you to use your charisma to sell your current cause. It's a mixed blessing that your newly found inspiration effortlessly lures others into your camp. However, you may suffer a rude awakening later this evening when the events run off course and make you see the errors of your ways. Preventing disappointment is easy if you go out of your way to see things as they actually are in the first place.

You could throw your normally cautious approach to intimacy out the window now as the reckless Aries New Moon stirs the energy of your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You're not content to filter out emotional intensity for the sake of analytical clarity. You might feel a pressing sense of urgency, like you could miss an important experience if you don't take a risk right now. Luckily, your good intentions may be enough to ensure a positive outcome. Be present right now and then let the winds of change carry you where they will.

Seeking balance in relationships is one of your primary directives in life. Today's active Aries New Moon draws your attention to your 7th House of Others, making you even more aware of your role as peacemaker. But you could be so intent on helping someone else that you lose track of your own needs. If you're not centered in your energy, you won't be of value to anyone else. Harmony starts within; when you're content with your own dreams, it's easier to be a supportive partner for someone else.

There's no time like the present moment to make a serious dent in your current list of projects. However, you might mistakenly believe you can do everything all at once now that the self-directed Aries New Moon falls in your 6th House of Work. No doubt, you are a force to be reckoned with when you focus your intentions like a laser light saber. Just don't take on so much that you exhaust yourself in the process before you complete any once task. Curb your enthusiasm but not your intensity.

It's never difficult for you to justify a play day, but it's even easier now that the ardent Aries New Moon highlights your 5th House of Fun and Games. Everyone seems drawn to you because they assume life will be more exciting when they are in your company. But they get more than they bargain now for because you're not as footloose and fancy free as you appear. Beneath your cheery disposition is your unrelenting drive to make this day as memorable as you can. Although others may be surprised when they realize your true motives, they'll still be glad they joined you on your adventure.

You need a day off, one without your normal ambitions driving you to take on more responsibility. Instead of trying to produce tangible results now, give yourself the room to sink into your feelings and hang out with those you love. Don't just fill in your calendar with more things to do. Cancel a social appointment and consider staying home tonight. You have been reaching outward and upward long enough. This Aries New Moon falls in your 4th House of Roots; see how it feels when you luxuriate in the tender loving care of your closest friends and family.

Filling up your day with one exciting activity after another will certainly keep your mind busy, but you might be better off if you took some time to smell the flowers along the way The fiery Aries New Moon ramps up the energy of your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, making everything seem more important than it actually is. You can only distract yourself so long before you grow weary of the commotion. All that glitters is not gold. Slow down and enjoy a bit of silence in between all the extraneous noise.

People might criticize your current priorities because they think you are scattered today. But you have a concrete plan, along with the enthusiasm and determination to execute it on schedule. Don't let anyone else's negativity plant seeds of self-doubt in the fertile soil of your imagination. Honor the Aries New Moon by channeling its creativity into your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Instead of wasting precious time and energy defending your choices, believe in yourself and let your actions tell your story.

It's nearly impossible to know what to do today because your friends seem to be sending you mixed messages. Ironically, you are willing to soften your approach in consideration of anyone who sets clear limits, only to have them accuse you of withdrawing when the going gets rough. Unnecessary confusion can get in the way of resolving a misunderstanding if either party makes a hasty assumption. But don't retreat into denial; if there's any doubt about what's been said, check it out. Fortunately, falling back on honest communication enables you to find your way back into the light of truth.

You may remain bewildered about a romantic interest today even if you think you can charm your way through the emotional fog. However, logic is elusive while Venus, the Goddess of Love, squares delusional Neptune. You might even deceive yourself about your altruistic motives since your 2nd House of Core Values is being tested by the cosmic chaos. Happily, this irrational alignment is also capable of triggering your highest ideals. Don't try to cover up your uncertainty; admitting that you're searching for answers is smarter than pretending you already have them. Humility is your friend.

Concentrating on the present moment is a real challenge today because magnetic Venus is battling with dispersive Neptune. Previous goals don't seem as important now that Venus is dancing through your fickle sign. Nevertheless, you're tempted to move forward anyhow without any clear direction. Although you don't want to just spin in circles, there is a hidden treasure buried beneath your current uncertainty. It may not be the best time to make an important decision, but a wild goose chase could lead you to discover something that comes in handy down the road.

You're so enchanted by your vivid imagination today that it's hard to believe your fantasies aren't real. However, the stark beauty of the mental images is less important than the hidden messages that they convey. Unfortunately, it's not very useful to adopt an overly analytical approach to your interpretations because your logic might limit your creativity. Paradoxically, the only way to capture the magical energy flowing through you now is by letting go of any attempts to control it. Enlightening experiences are awaiting your discovery if you have the courage to take the scenic route.

You aren't ready to reveal too much about your feelings today because words can't communicate the subtlety of your emotional landscape. Although you long for the intimacy that comes from sharing your hopes with someone special, it's wiser to wait before you say anything you later regret. It's healthier to err on the side of discretion until you regain your clarity. In the meantime, there's no reason to rein in your fantasies. Dreaming about your ideal future is the best way to bring it into manifestation.

You may sound more wishy-washy than you feel today because loving Venus squares fuzzy Neptune in your 7th House of Relationships. No matter how clear your intentions are now, your words won't be specific enough to please others. Rather than angering someone with your faulty logic or premature conclusions, wait a few days until you have more information and then reevaluate your position. Stop thinking and fully experience the luxury of floating in the realms of your imagination for a while. You have no idea of what treasures you might uncover unless you take the time to look.

Planning your next exciting adventure is lots of fun, especially if you don't have to let reality call the shots. Your dreams are larger than life with magnetic Venus visiting your 9th House of Big Ideas; nevertheless, her anxious square to nebulous Neptune blurs your thinking. You may be obsessed with your dreams of a great escape, but your fantasy destination could disappear right in front of your eyes. Don't accept defeat when life is offering you an opportunity to shine your light. Simply create a more realistic version of your vision and confidently try again.

You are cautious today and might find yourself tiptoeing around a delicate relationship issue. Nevertheless, your feelings are quite real, even if your emotions are colored by your camouflaged vulnerability. Trust the higher wisdom of the universe; you don't need to keep to yourself as much as you think. Many people won't understand your actions now, so take the time to explain your thought process as clearly as possible. With just a little extra effort on your part, unspoken words don't have to get in the way of being honest with those you love.

Keeping your feelings in check seems like a smart strategy today, but your desire to be seen and heard by someone you admire could win out over your need to play it safe. However, your message may be muddled, since you actually might not know what you want. Although it helps to talk about your current confusion with a trusted companion, complications arise from saying too much. Let your friend know that you're not ready to make lasting decisions now; you're still gathering data and contemplating your options. Be open with your heart only if you're not asked to defend it.

You could be in for a bit of drama today if your plans fall apart because of lack of proper execution. But even if you have a knack for making your dreams come true, your ideas are not as practical now as you think. Nevertheless, don't quit because you're probably closer to success than you realize. Inching forward slowly is more effective than throwing in the towel. Take another shot at achieving your goals later in the day when you can gain more traction. Practice makes perfect.

You might be required to respond to an unpleasant surprise that impacts your financial condition today. Although you want to believe that you are always on your toes, you may have overlooked an apparently unimportant detail that creates more worry now than you want. Luckily, you still can react quickly by coming up with an ingenious solution as long as you don't just assume that you have everything under control. Sometimes, asking the right person for help opens the door to a much-needed breakthrough while also taking a relationship to the next level.

You may be wearing your heart on your sleeve without even knowing it while vulnerable Venus is squaring off with deceptive Neptune in your sensitive sign. Nevertheless, you could be confused by the reactions of others today because you aren't certain if they understand your true feelings. Actually, your closest friends and family can intuitively sense your emotions before you say anything at all. Don't overcompensate by talking so much that it dilutes your message. The most powerful magic is created now without uttering a word.

You're in for a treat today, since you finally get to enjoy the sweet rewards of past efforts. But you might feel as if life is challenging you to stand still and appreciate your current  position, even if you are itching to begin something new. Just as you think you have your restlessness under control, a wave of anticipation catches you off guard, reminding you that you aren't quite ready to settle down. Nevertheless, you don't have to be the first one out of the gate; kick back and indulge in life's pleasures before taking off on your next adventure.

The fact of the matter is it usually takes a lot of provocation for your anger to boil over. Although the Sun's return to your pragmatic sign today encourages you to be calm and peaceful, stress can slowly build until you turn into a raging Bull. Thankfully, you prefer to be a lover than a fighter by focusing on the beautiful aspects of life rather than contributing to any negativity. Setting your intentions on the most positive outcome allows your good nature to shine through all the needless noise.

It's time to take an objective approach by analyzing familiar issues that recycle in your life before they get set aside again without resolution. Of course, it's tempting to bury an unpleasant recollection and the uncomfortable feelings attached to it. However, exploring unknown territory reveals how your emotions are intertwined with rigidly constructed memories. Although self-reflection is useful to generate  personal growth, sooner or later you need to stop worrying about all the things you cannot change. You can't fully embrace the future until you have dealt with your past.

Schedule plenty of time over the next month to reassess and redefine your life path rather than limiting it to the present circumstances. Instead of only focusing on the tedious work you must do today or needlessly obsessing about office politics, look for ways to cultivate your long-term goals. Imagine where you want to be in ten years, but remain practical in the process. Ultimately, it's much more satisfying to watch your dreams slowly take lasting shape than to see them bloom quickly, only to fade from the picture. Good things are worth the wait.

Having a job that pays your bills might not be enough to keep you emotionally satisfied now that the Sun brightens your 10th House of Profession. You want a career path that also offers you opportunities for growth and advancement. Unfortunately, your long-term goals may require you to make decisions that interfere with your personal life. However, you can consciously choose to pare back your aspirations so you don't end up over committed. Be proactive and simplify your agenda before you're in trouble down the road.

Your current optimism motivates you to take care of business and clear as many things as possible off your to-do list. Although you have a heightened sense of purpose now, you might have trouble converting your good intentions into the most effective behavior. However, the Sun's shift into your 9th House of Adventure insists that you make your move sooner than later. Luckily, you can accomplish nearly anything you set your heart on today -- as long as you know when to say no. Sometimes, enough really is enough.

Your curiosity could very well get the best of you today as you're driven to explore the vagaries of love. You are not satisfied with shallow answers now and seek the hidden components of interpersonal relationships. But this newly found interest isn't just an idle wandering of your heart; it's about a search to establish a healthier emotional balance. Thankfully, you should be able to positively transform your world if you can discover what causes are at play. Luckily, increasing your awareness may be all that's needed to find satisfaction.

You want quick answers to the most basic questions before you set yourself up for additional frustration. The radiant Sun camps out in your 7th House of Partnerships over the next month, illuminating a widening gulf between your desire for emotional complexity and someone else's need for low-key simplicity, especially if it impacts a current relationship. Even if you're unable to resolve these divergent approaches, your recognition of the two extremes makes interactions less of a struggle now. Although it feels as if everything is beyond your reach, you can always expand your mind and open your heart.

You wish you were embarking on a journey of a lifetime, but you cannot afford to ignore your current responsibilities now. The Sun's month-long visit to your 6th House of Work emphasizes the daily routines that give your life consistency. Don't worry about missing out on the fun; you will have plenty of time to play before you know it. The sooner you acknowledge that the immediate emphasis is not on achieving personal satisfaction, you can find happiness by continuing to do the smaller things that truly matter. Count your blessings and get to work.

Ironically, you could take your current desire for pleasure so seriously that you overbook your calendar and stress yourself out. Luckily, you don't need to try so hard to impress anyone because you're heading into a joyful few weeks while the Sun is shining in your 5th House of Fun and Games. However, it's counterproductive to think and plan so much that it squashes your creative spontaneity. It's better to stick to your daily routine just enough to support your independent self-expression without further jeopardizing your stability.

Maintaining your freedom of movement is essential for your creativity to soar, but you also don't want to destabilize your current security. However, you might not be ready to give up your emotional attachments, even if your drive for independence is irrepressible. Keep in mind you are the only one who can solve your own internal conflicts when push comes to shove. Your surprising discovery is that no drastic action is required now as long as you stay in touch with your feelings. The surest way to avoid having any regrets is to listen to your heart.

Establishing reliable channels of communication helps you keep your thoughts from leading you astray. Although no one is likely accusing you of slacking off now, you still need to pick up your work pace because the planets are giving you the green light to move forward with your plans. Paradoxically, you also must be more efficient with your time in order to take on another project. Grabbing an opportunity while it lasts is wise as long as it doesn't turn your whole world upside down.

Life seems complicated if people aren't being clear with you. Although you might not know what to make of someone's inconsistent story, you're able to remain detached from the distractions of an emotional drama. In fact, you can conquer nearly any challenge thrown at you today. Handling obstacles that appear in your path requires diligence, but you won't feel depleted now, even if you commit a lot of energy to making your point. Pace yourself and don't quit no matter what happens.

Your dogged tenacity is your not-so-secret weapon today as you remedy an uncomfortable situation that is creating its share of stress. But you may not be able to put Humpty-Dumpty back together again as quickly as you wish. Nevertheless, giving up is not an option. Avoid the obvious shortcut; quick fixes won't last, making them a waste of your time. An extra dose of persistence empowers you to find a more permanent solution to the problem.

You really don't want to take a stand if a powerful person opposes your efforts today, and just thinking about a confrontation can make you anxious. Thankfully, the process is easier if you initiate a constructive conversation with a positive attitude. You are at your best when your thoughts are in motion. But don't wait until you have everything mapped out, since you're capable of outmaneuvering nearly anyone if you remain mentally agile. If you stay open to learning something new from an adversary, you might just get exactly what you need from the interaction.

You can nip a growing problem in the bud, even if someone is behaving badly now. But your plan will likely backfire if you attempt to suppress another person's expression of fear or anger. The best way to handle this delicate dynamic is to engage others by asking probing questions that demonstrate your genuine concern. Once you grasp the situation in its entirety, you could engage the tension out in the open instead of fighting in the dark with a hidden enemy. Shining the light of awareness is in the best interest of everyone involved.

You're curious about what everyone is up to at work today, yet your playful nature may be quite misleading. Behind your easygoing smile lies an agenda to get others on board with your line of thinking. Perhaps you have bitten off more than you can chew and hope to gather the support you need to get a job done. Instead of beating around the bush, just be direct and ask for what you want; you might be pleasantly surprised with the results. Honesty begets respect.

You want to put your skills to good use today, but it may take a few tries before you settle down and find a strategy that really works. You might start one project, only to reassess your goals and shift your entire course of action. Nevertheless, there is a consistent theme in each of your plans, even if you can't see what it is just yet. Uncover the common thread and then make that your top priority. Once you know the exact direction you're heading, the details will quickly fall into place.

Maintaining concentration can be tricky early today because it's easy to be distracted by emotionally draining interactions with coworkers. Still, it's hard to ignore the conflicting information that you receive now, even if you can't yet determine its significance. Although you're concerned that you might be missing something, you could be so uncharacteristically certain now that new facts won't change your mind. Even if you think you have all the answers, keeping your mind open to other possibilities makes all the difference in the world.

You may be in a very positive state of mind today, especially if your plans seem to be unfolding on schedule. However, an uneasy feeling might still be gnawing away at the edges of your imagination. Don't ignore your twinges of uncertainty; instead, take this opportunity to explore the shadows of your current doubts. Thankfully, expanding your perspective allows you to alleviate your fears. Once you adjust to the new landscape, practice navigating around the twilight of your subconscious without being afraid of the dark. Self-awareness breeds transformation.

Conversations with a significant other could be so intense today that the emotional drama seems overwhelming. You're tempted to overcompensate by putting on a special show that won't be quickly forgotten. Luckily, the outcome will likely be quite rewarding as long as you keep your eyes on your destination rather than your performance. Placing too much emphasis on appearing unrealistically perfect might cause people to shake their heads and walk away. Simply being yourself is your best strategy to create the meaningful connection you want.

You might go out of your way to share your feelings today, but your message isn't easy for people to swallow. Your current emotional intensity may be out of character, surprising others and triggering their insecurities. Still, you're not interested in placating those around you with meaningless banter now. Don't waste energy getting angry with someone who won't match your serious attitude. Instead of trying to change anyone else; simply observe the difference in your communication styles and let it go. Exploring your own heart is its own reward.

You may feel restless today, especially if someone you love is being so nice to you that it makes you uncomfortable. Other people's pleasantries might even seem like a sign of weakness to your independent way of thinking. But don't mistakenly harden your position now just to demonstrate your strength. Be resolute and yielding at the same time, instead. Staying flexible in thought helps you move through your day with a gratitude that's more appropriate for the current situation. Opening your heart is the best place to start.

A coworker or partner who seems to have answers for your questions could motivate you to take action. Fortunately, competent peers can help you be more productive now, but their presence isn't a reason to acquiesce your power. Instead, look at the role you play in your own success, even if you are only one member on a team. Having amazing allies on your side won't rob you of your self-esteem as long as you acknowledge your valuable contribution to the group effort, too.

You realize that practicality will pay off as you reassess your current financial condition. You know what's right, but might not make the smartest decisions about your money today because being responsible sounds boring now, prompting you to look for ways to escape your obligations. However, you don't have the luxury to slip away yet. Stabilizing your fiscal situation won't be as painful as you expect if you just narrow your focus and get down to business.

You are driven to make significant progress today as thoughtful Mercury hooks up with impatient Mars. Fortunately, this planetary alignment occurs in your practical sign, empowering you to set priorities and concentrate on your goals. Nevertheless, it's tempting to blame someone else for restricting your creativity, but your fear of failure is likely your real nemesis now. Don't worry if everything seems to take longer than you expect; your willpower enables you to overcome any obstacle that challenges your success.

You tend to see the best possible outcome to nearly any difficult situation now, even if people believe you are being too optimistic in your assessment. The fact is you have your mind wrapped around the entire set of circumstances, no matter how complex the logistics may seem. You know that your thoughts require time to solidify, even if others want your answer right away. There's no need to waste energy explaining your game plan to anyone else. Trust your instincts and stay on your current path until your destination comes into sight.

You grow tired of hearing about everyone else's dramas, especially if you have your own emotional issues you want to share with your friends today. However, you might need to reconsider your tactics if there isn't sufficient time to talk about your concerns now. Nevertheless, it's solely your responsibility to raise topics that are important to you; you can't expect someone to read your mind and do it for you. Friendship is a two-way street; being a compassionate listener hopefully inspires others to do the same.

Use your words with care today because they carry a lot of weight now that messenger Mercury aligns with macho Mars. Even if your heart is in the right place, repressed anger could spill over into a conversation without you even knowing it. Instead of speaking only from your point of view, consider other people's feelings before you say anything. Tempering your honesty with a bit of kindness helps everyone involved feel more appreciated in the long run.

Although your visions of the future may need clarification or even revision now, you can take the stress in stride without missing a step. Thankfully, your key planet Mercury is humming in harmony with cosmic bad boys, Mars and Pluto, pushing your creativity close to the edge. There's nothing to be gained by trying to juggle too many projects at once; take a few deep breaths and reassess what still needs to be done. Stay on track and watch the light at the end of the tunnel grow brighter as you gain control over your destiny.

Opportunities for growth pop up everywhere you go today. Resourceful Venus creates a supportive sextile with auspicious Jupiter, revealing the silver lining to every black cloud in sight. However, your mental machinations will only take you so far. Surprisingly, it's easy to go the extra distance once you sink into your feelings. There's no reason to be afraid of what you don't understand. Emotions may ultimately hold their secrets, but you can discover magic if you're willing to delve into the mysteries of your heart.

You may be uncharacteristically quick to share  your thoughts today, especially as loquacious Mercury steps into the unknown to have a conversation with dark Pluto. Nevertheless, divulging too much information can generate a whole new layer of complications. People are less inclined to listen if you're only pushing your personal agenda, so don't talk just to blow your own horn. Engaging in a free-flowing discussion to find places of mutual understanding is a strategy that works well for everyone involved.

Although you might not be in the mood to settle down today, there are critical tasks that require your attention. In fact, you may finally be ready to have that heart-to-heart conversation with your boss about your work. Don't play coy; if something needs to be brought out into the open, do it now while communicator Mercury is willing to fight for your cause. Once you make it through the difficult part of the interaction, you may be happily surprised by what happens next. Good news is waiting for you around the corner if you have the confidence to go after it.

Your mind is like a steel trap today, enabling you to catch relevant facts and hold onto them until they are needed in a conversation. You are driven to use information to your advantage because you have no time to waste in achieving your objectives. Although your sense of urgency could annoy others, they might also be secretly impressed with your impeccable analysis and unwavering ambition. Acknowledging that there is plenty of time to reach your goals alleviates the immediate stress. Thankfully, you will gain more support if you take a few deep breaths and relax.

Although you love to surprise others by pulling rabbits out of hats, advanced preparation helps you take your success to the next level. But you may be even more productive today if you underplay your hand to avoid inviting unnecessary opposition. Making progress is more difficult once resistance is stirred. Ultimately, your quiet determination is your most useful weapon; gentle persistence brings the most gratifying results.

You know that your professional prospects are going well when you feel good about your accomplishments at the end of the day. Fortunately, your associates will probably resonate to your success story by praising your contribution to a recent project. Additionally, powerful friends in high places may even add more than kind words to the mix now as they help you network in new circles. But don't think for a moment that you're receiving something for nothing. Rest assured that today's rewards are directly connected with yesterday's hard work.

Although you try to keep your emotions contained, someone's innocent actions could inadvertently trigger a spontaneous reaction of suppressed anger. Even if you're convinced that everything will turn out well in the long run, you still might forget and lose your temper in an impulsive flash of passion. Blowing off a little steam feels good in the moment, but it won't help you find a lasting solution. Nevertheless, sharing your feelings in a caring manner helps to alleviate the tension and makes the best of an uncomfortable situation.

You long to enjoy the fruits of your recent labor, but you might have to postpone the fun to handle a minor emergency first. Nevertheless, you have a detailed mental picture of how you expect to enjoy yourself, but achieving satisfactory results could be delayed a while longer. Don't struggle to escape your responsibilities or panic about your apparent lack of progress. Focusing too much energy on the outcome could push your dreams further away, instead. Assuming a more laid-back attitude enables you to find pleasure in the present moment.

A friend or partner's criticism plays an important role in your success today. You could be lost in dreams of the finer things in life, only to be confronted by people who aren't playing by your rules. Someone may rain on your parade by showing you where your current plan is lacking. Although you don't want to confront anyone now, burying your discouragement only makes it grow. Avoid the trap of thinking others want to stop you when, in fact, they might actually have your best interests at heart. Keeping an open mind to the feedback you receive cultivates an atmosphere of cooperation and respect.

You're feeling the need to reassess your long-term goals at work but, unfortunately, they might not fit into your current career trajectory. Still, you enjoy discussing the variety of possibilities ahead, even if you're not ready to actively pursue any one specific idea yet. Don't worry about meeting other people's expectations today; just take time to thoroughly explore your options. Regardless of your next move, you might be surprised by what you learn in the process. Exercising a bit of caution makes sense, but waiting too long is counterproductive to your growing momentum.

Your psychic powers are running at full tilt while the hypersensitive Cancer Moon camps out in your 12th House of Spirituality. However, you have a gnawing concern that comes and goes throughout the day, telling you that you're not on the right path. Although you don't have to make any major decisions yet, there's no reason to stick to your previous plan if it isn't working. If you're not sure which way to turn, rest assured the passage of time will be enough to change your perspective. Cut your losses and move on to something else only after you have taken the time to weigh out all of the pros and cons.

Making definitive plans for your next adventure isn't as easy as you expected. You may believe that you have all the various puzzle pieces in place only to suddenly discover that your basic assumption is incorrect. Just remember that some ideas are not worth salvaging. It's wise to know when to simply walk away and start over. Nevertheless, everything probably seems more complex now than it will in just a couple of days, so practicing patience is smarter than overreacting. The best-laid plans of mice and men often go awry.

Your hopes and dreams color your thought process today. You could even realize that your logic isn't very sound, but it's advisable to go through the motions anyhow by visualizing exactly what you want. Keep in mind that the cosmic energy is unstable now and your master plan will likely continue to change over the days ahead. Don't wait for others to decide where you're going or your destiny will be left in their hands. Paradoxically, you may feel as if you're being blown around by the winds of fate, but you're really the master of your own ship.

Just when you think everything is going well, you could run into a minor setback involving a clash of wills between you and an authority figure. Although a financial disagreement may play into the picture, it's more likely that one person's rigid values are upsetting to the other. You might even think that someone is plotting against you, motivating you to overcompensate by acting in a self-righteous manner. Ultimately, adopting a flexible approach inspires everyone to work together for a higher cause.

You might be able to justify your position on a serious matter today, but your decision could have unforeseen consequences down the road. Everything appears more complicated than you prefer, making it all-too-easy to grow befuddled by the conflicting information. It's not that you can't see clearly; it's just that conflicting facts increase the difficulty of choosing one path over another. Take your time; forcing a final answer now creates more problems than it's worth. Dance with the unknown for a little while longer until your clarity returns.

You see a relationship issue from both sides now, but you're not ready to commit to either point of view. Thankfully, you can navigate your way through this tricky territory by moving toward the center of the potential storm rather than away from it. Staying in touch with your feelings helps you to avoid an unnecessary meltdown as long as you remember that your moods are still in flux. Try not to make any sudden moves; keeping your balance is more important than anything else today.

You often take pride in your unorthodox point of view, but you might not be able to rationalize your eccentricities today. Furthermore, expressing a rebellious opinion could generate chaos now because you aren't clear when explaining how you reach your conclusions. Don't force your assumptions onto anyone else; there's no logical reason to escalate the current situation into an open conflict. Keep the conversation friendly while biding your time until the energy stabilizes. Be a lover, not a fighter.

Although you can normally spin yarns by following the meandering currents in your imagination, there's no room for daydreaming today. In fact, it's best to keep it real by avoiding speculative thinking now that the Sun is activating stern Saturn in your 10th House of Authority. Even if you find the right words to describe your feelings, your actions may be out of sync with your message. The easiest way to stay out of trouble is to keep your thoughts to yourself until your behavior is more in step with your heart.

You are curious enough today about what motivates you that you are driven to explore your own fears. It's as if a previously closed door begins to open today, allowing you access to uncharted depths in the recesses of your subconscious. Tread cautiously because finding your way in to this normally inaccessible space might be easier than dealing with the skeletons you discover there. Nevertheless, you are empowered by the truth and no longer need to fill in the facts with your own subjective worries. Awareness is power.

You are like a lighthouse beacon for your friends today because you can hold your ground, even in the midst of a storm. Your steady nature is a true inspiration to your peers, even if they can't compete with your determination. However, this is not a good time to be complacent, since the currents are shifting and you could quickly lose your sense of direction. If your perspective changes too quickly, bring your focus back to your immediate environment until you have reestablished your bearings. Don't let anyone down; shine your light for all to see.

Interpersonal dynamics seem unstable today, making it tricky to balance your needs with the emotions of others. Nevertheless, a solid opportunity for growth could be in the picture if you're willing to work on understanding your true feelings. Even if you believe you recently avoided a potential meltdown, feelings tend to cycle around now and the past could catch you off guard in the present moment. Rather than creating unnecessary conflict, trusting your intuition leads you to the higher spiritual ground of forgiveness now.

You may be required to work with people who are confrontational today. Fortunately, you can be sympathetic to the feelings of others without actually lowering your defenses. A cautious approach is helpful to revealing your desires now, since your vulnerability could land you in an unpleasant predicament. No matter which way it goes, keep your eyes focused on your goals. Your tenacity saves the day, even if you must separate your personal convictions from your actions for a while. Choosing peace is always a good idea.

You are eager to approach your work from a slightly different angle today, prompting you to challenge authority if it prevents you from doing your job well. However, you might run into annoying problems unless you can demonstrate your sincerity right away. No one will be impressed with your cleverness today; instead, others need to know, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that you are expressing what's in your heart.

Settling down isn't on your agenda today, even if you're tired of your irrational feelings running you all over the place. Luckily, your astute ability to analyze complex facts puts you ahead of the game. Nevertheless, you feel the stress as you consider the conflicting data that comes from your various experiences. Don't be afraid to retreat emotionally to reestablish your own metaphysical center. Instead of rushing the process now, be patient and create a more workable plan that can actually take you to your destination.

Although everyone thinks you're busy working, you may be spending more time than anyone realizes sorting out your feelings. People assume you're pitching in and doing your part to help the cause, but you don't necessarily feel like a team player today. You have more important things on your mind as you integrate the details of your daily routine into your larger vision. It's not your job to get along with everyone now; simply acknowledge what is most important to you and let others form their own opinions. The only person you need to please is yourself.

It's time to make a concerted effort to pull in your energy and concentrate on exactly what you need. You can accomplish a lot by eliminating extraneous distractions, but you still might not find enough time to make your dreams come true. Avoid hanging on to old judgments about the value of your work. Don't worry about the long-term ramifications of a current decision. Just show up and do the very best you can in each moment. Sticking to your good intentions makes room for a more positive perspective to emerge.

Recent confusion may lead to open conflict today. The good news is an animated discussion clears the air of ill feelings and might even result in an unexpected agreement. However, you may harbor resentment if being stuck in a seemingly endless debate prevents you from reaching your goal. Trying to persuade others to accept your solution now only widens the existing gulf. When you acknowledge the differences of opinions instead of pretending they don't exist, antagonism morphs into cooperation and common ground can be found.

You could be so single-minded about fulfilling your desires today that getting along with others seems relatively unimportant. You may believe everyone is taking an extreme position with no room for compromise. Unfortunately, your current intensity can scare people off or intimidate them to act out of character. In either case, the pleasure of the moment could be lost unless you decide to play well with others.

One of the ways you maintain your cool composure is by keeping your feelings to yourself. Unfortunately, suppressed passion could boil over today and spill out of its safe container. Don't pretend you are innocent by acting surprised when you express your true desires. A healthier response requires honesty and admitting what you have known for a while. Even if your emotions are quite inconvenient now, it's better for your friends and associates to know what's in your heart. The truth will set you free.

You are more inclined to trust your instincts about love and friendship today, even if they draw you into an unnecessary battle of wills. Others might not agree with you now that your perspective has grown into a more spiritual one. The facts as you know them resonate with your larger-than-life worldview. But it's better to be cautious when revealing your personal beliefs, even if you are confident about your position. Remember, unnecessary conflict can undo the positive steps recently taken. Limit the topics of conversations for your own peace of mind.

Your creative juices are flowing today and it's up to you to find the medium for expressing them. However, this isn't just a fun distraction; you have big ideas about what you want to accomplish. Although your desires may tempt you with the possibilities of pleasurable experiences, you'll be happier in the long run if you have tangible results at the end of the day. Being productive is an admirable goal as long as you don't lose your connection with your muse in the process.

There's plenty of action on the home front today, especially if your feelings clash with someone else's. Oftentimes, you see conflict as an annoying source of trouble; you prefer an atmosphere of peace and harmony. Rather than viewing the current family tension as a dynamic you wish to avoid, change your attitude. Engaging in passionate dialogue is an excellent way to explain your own position on an important issue as well as letting others clarify theirs. Your patience and flexibility will lead you to the calm after the storm.

Your regular weekend routines grow more complicated today if other people's unspoken desires cloud the atmosphere. You may talk about simplifying your life, but it's not going to be easy to cut back on your activities in order to accommodate someone else. Instead of fretting over what you can't finish now, just try to meet your obligations as best you can. No matter how much progress you make, you might be surprised with how much you enjoy yourself once you find your groove.

Today is a perfect day to shift gears and put your plan into motion. You have had enough time to process your feelings and consider the various possibilities ahead, so don't  put off the inevitable any longer. Rather than waiting for better conditions to initiate action, take a few steps toward your most important goals now. Although you may be tempted to set priorities based strictly on practical considerations, pursuing an unrealistic dream can open a whole new vista of possibilities. You'll never know what's possible unless you're willing to explore the unknown.

You have a smile on your face and a bounce in your step because you can feel your confidence returning today. You might actually notice that the Moon is back in your sign because you are acutely aware of your changing moods. Fortunately, the Moon is moving toward a conjunction with buoyant Jupiter in your 1st House of Personality, adding to your optimism. You may be too impatient to methodically follow a plan now, but locking your sights on a distant goal can help to assure your success. Ironically, keeping your eyes on your desired destination gives you the creative freedom to make it up as you go along.

You might be reticent to participate in social activities today, but circumstances make it increasingly difficult to operate quietly behind the scenes. You need time to concentrate on your priorities, but there aren't many topics you're compelled to talk about now. Explore the magic of your imagination, for that's where you can make the most meaningful connections, especially if you share your discoveries -- when you are ready -- with someone you trust.

You are eager to enjoy the benefits of spending time with a special person or a select group of friends today. Thankfully, your good cheer prompts others to hang out with you because they want to soak up your good energy. But the Moon's visit to your 11th House of Social Networking doesn't come without complications, for her square to the Sun could trigger an unexpected power struggle if people have conflicting agendas. Nevertheless, you don't have to focus on the differences. Rather than trying to unify diverging goals, search for the common ground that you already share.

Your nerves may be on edge today because people seem so fixed that there's little room for your perspective. Although you're willing to be vulnerable and share your needs with a dependable friend, the thought of conflict stresses you out now. You prefer to spend the day on a magical mystery tour, but it's nearly impossible if someone thinks you should be more practical. Thankfully, there's no need to push the panic button. Set your frustrations aside and follow what's in your heart, even if you must let others go their own separate ways.

Your close-up vision isn't very accurate today; however, it seems as if you can see forever. You look out toward the distance and you are certain that the horizon -- although it's quite clear -- has moved even farther away. Fortunately, this trick of the light allows you to visualize your future while still juggling your current schedule. Set the notion of immediate gratification aside. Once you remove the immediate pressure, reaching your goals could seem as easy as a walk in the park.

Your anxiety may be hard to shake today because you know how important it is to stay on task and live up to your promises. To complicate matters further, it's not enough to satisfy your own definition of success; others have their set of expectations, too. However, the temptation of having some good old-fashioned fun looms large and it might be nearly impossible to resist. Fulfill your obligations in the real world while imagining what you would do if you were totally free of responsibility. Luckily, no one can stop you from dreaming.

Your day could be hijacked by someone who feels the need to share a relationship drama. Whether it's a romantic partner or a new acquaintance, it might appear as if he or she is attempting to limit your personal freedom. However, expressing yourself independently is crucial now because it's your key to rejuvenating your emotional power. Although you're tempted to drop everything to ride to the rescue, keep in mind that you won't have much left to give others unless you take some time for yourself.

Household chores or work-related tasks seem overly tedious today, which could make you feel unusually restless. Your impulsive solution might be to shake everything up in order to turn a dull routine into an intriguing experience. Don't be afraid to express your big ideas, even if they are out of proportion with your current circumstances. Honoring your dreams will ultimately enable you to accomplish more while in pursuit of your higher purpose.

You are cruising for excitement but you haven't decided how much to say about your plans for the day. Although you want to steer clear of emotional entanglements, you might not be able to avoid getting hooked by a complicated situation today. Your feelings could change again so don't judge yourself too harshly if you need to backtrack later and make a new strategy. A rational approach helps to keep you free from unnecessary drama, but could prevent you from finding the thrills you seek. Sometimes the pleasure is worth the cost.

You long to swim in calmer emotional waters, but you might have to stir up a few waves of your own first if your values conflict with someone else's. There's a blurry line between demonstrating your integrity and just being overly obstinate. Obviously, don't give up before you make a concerted effort to get your point across. However, relinquishing your need to convince everyone that your position is the only correct one allows you to walk away from the current turmoil. Choosing your battles wisely gives you the opportunity to create your own future.

A recent experience may have created unexpected ripples in your life, shaking up your previous assumptions about what you want from others. You're tired of pretending to be satisfied with the current circumstances and your antidote might involve doing something exciting just for yourself now, regardless of what anyone else thinks. Although you prefer to keep your options open, you could be forced to make a choice today. Even if none of the available alternatives appears perfect, take a risk and express your freedom. No one but you can decide what makes you happy.

You see through the obvious faults in someone's big scheme, which might stop you from investing your time in an unrealistic strategy. However, your unspoken criticism can be perceived by others as negative energy you need to overcome. Although you tend to err on the side of caution, you have a clear sense of how to break free from the trap of routine today and want to create your own plan. The truth of the matter is somewhere in the middle and your wisest tactic is to find a path of compromise that works for all parties involved.

It isn't all that easy to zone in on what you offer others, but reevaluating your contribution to a group effort may be a very interesting exercise for you now. Meanwhile, applying your energy to mundane tasks is not a waste of time if you practice self-reflection along the way. Something as trivial as cleaning the house or doing yard work can be inspiring today if you focus on those things that bring you joy. Ultimately, your gratitude is contagious and others will appreciate your ability to make the most of the present moment.

You normally know how to set limits that increase your efficiency. However, you're mildly obsessed with gathering as many facts as you can today. Unfortunately, possessing a whole lot of data isn't as reassuring as simply having certainty. As much as you attempt to let your practicality reign supreme, your current enthusiasm can set you up to inadvertently mislead others. Your reputation is on the line; luckily, you're still capable of using your natural sense of discretion now to save the day.

Knowing what to expect from a relationship can make the difference between a brilliant success and a discouraging failure. However, your desire to initiate change must be motivated by optimism because if you're afraid that something won't work out, you could settle on a second-best course of action. Fortunately, you don't have to try so hard now; your partnerships have a better chance of flourishing if you relax into the unknown without trying to control the outcome. Keep your heart open and let nature take its course.

Having a conversation about some aspect of intimacy and actually being intimate with a loved one are not the same thing. Naturally, it's easier to approach this delicate subject from the perspective of an observer, even if you're confident enough to jump right into the fire now. A sufficient amount of detachment can help you deal with your feelings much more effectively than becoming overwhelmed by them. Nevertheless, you must surrender sooner or later if you want to have the full spectrum of emotional experience.

Although you're naturally better at describing a generalized concept than zooming in on the individual facts, the presence of three planets in your 6th House of Details enables you to separate the finer points from the big ideas now. However, it's nearly impossible to gauge how much persistence or resistance might be necessary to get your needs met. You're afraid of asking for what you want and being met with disapproval or even derision. Be as honest as possible today; it's better for everyone to know where they stand than to lead them down a garden path. Transparency is your friend.

You may be charmed by someone's flirtatious manner and unconventional ideas now. Unfortunately, people's behavior could have you running in circles if you fail to sort through all the incoming information. Your analytical ability is one of your greatest strengths; carefully reassess the entire situation instead of impulsively following your instincts. Once you know that you're making the right choice, announce your intentions and don't look back. As long as your actions are grounded in logic, it pays to listen to the vagaries of your heart.

You might feel like you're riding a streak of creative lightning today, but it's still a struggle to put your best ideas into concrete action. Unfortunately, you may be tempted to quit prematurely, especially if you aim your sights too high and set yourself up for disillusionment. However, you could miss your chance to demonstrate your talents if you don't establish any goals at all. Quit thinking so much and just flow with your imagination, wherever it leads. Your most extraordinary work now comes from honoring the spirit of the moment.

Your close friends and relatives demand your undivided attention today. Ironically, their encouragement is also just what you need to support your personal growth. Unfortunately, you may have such unrealistic expectations that everyone seems to fall short of their goals now, leaving you disappointed with their efforts. Nevertheless, it's crucial to express your gratitude for what is yours; you cannot afford to waste any energy on negativity. There's no need to pray for miracles; shining your light inspires others to do the same.

It's prudent to look before you leap while the dramatic Leo Moon amplifies your tendency to act spontaneously. Your sharp instincts usually steer you well, but an irrepressible desire to express your independence might lead you astray today. If a friend or coworker is critical of your shortsightedness, listen to what is being said instead of immediately going on the defense. Gingerly stepping around any argument now could give you the chance to learn a very useful lesson. Taking someone's advice to heart doesn't mean you need to give up on your dreams.

Your innate ability to hold your ground comes in handy today if someone attempts to pull you in another direction, but your inflexibility might also complicate the circumstances. You can unwittingly create an embarrassing situation by overstating your position and then attempting to defend it at all costs. Take a proactive approach now before minor problems become major issues. Just remember, if everything seems perfect, you're probably not looking hard enough. Knowing the truth can be painful but it's still better than operating in the dark.

Your clever charm can easily distract someone with superficial pleasantries if it's in your best interest. However, the tables are turned today and you may be the one who wants to talk about an unresolved issue that's on your mind. But the conversation won't automatically prove constructive just because you initiate a discussion on a delicate matter. The terrain may be tricky to navigate at first, but stick with it until your message is understood. You will feel a great sense of relief when everything is finally out in the open. Tenacity is your friend.

Although you might believe it's a good day to come out of your shell and take a risk, it won't be as easy as you expect. Your life is further complicated by your heightened sensitivity to other people's feelings today; worrying about their reactions makes it harder to remain true to yourself. Nevertheless, it's more important to maintain healthy boundaries than to monitor every word you say. Don't mix up anyone else's fears with yours. Fly, baby, fly.

You may not be able to stop your emotions from spilling over into your work environment while the animated Leo Moon battles with argumentative Mercury. You can be extremely expressive today, especially if you are suppressing any anger. But your coworkers don't want to hear your negativity and their response can upset you even more. However, you could be agitated now because of a hurtful memory; the present moment isn't as intense as it seems. Be gentle with your judgments before you say anything you regret. Finding an appropriate outlet for your feelings is good for everyone involved.

It's not all that easy to trust your logic today, even though that's where you normally find your answers. Your subjective impressions are strong now and you may be provoked to express an irrational opinion so quickly that you don't think about your reply. You might conclude that someone is intimidating you into engaging in a war of words, but your willingness to engage can precipitate a conflict that turns everyone into a loser. Strive for a sensible solution that's built on cooperation rather than competition. Lead with your heart but don't leave your common sense behind.

You are determined to clarify your goals and establish priorities that support your hopes for the future. However, your preferences are not in sync with the expectations of others now, and you can't easily share your intentions because you're afraid of letting someone down. Unfortunately, too much self-restraint leads to disappointment in yourself, so find the strength to say what's on your mind. Openly expressing your feelings is therapeutic; your self-esteem improves when your inner and outer worlds are in alignment.

You're not in the mood to step through a variety of mechanical motions at work just to make someone else happy today. However, if you're able to tap into your creativity, anything is possible. Although you cannot fake enthusiasm, you might get so lost in your fantasies of success now that they seem completely real. Acting as if your dreams have already come true can turn your performance into a stellar one that everyone will remember for a long time to come.

Your sudden resurgence of optimism may inspire risky behavior today, especially if you assume that you're running out of time. Although you're able to express your opinions without restraint, it's helpful to be understated in your approach because you might appear pushier than you realize. Don't be so preoccupied with your own agenda that you think everything you do is acceptable. Take a few steps back to give others a little breathing room. You have a better chance of garnering lasting support now if you're not in such a hurry.

Your passion about a new project motivates you to work harder and smarter, but your intense ambition may seem overwhelming to others. Normally, you can control your excitement and meter it out in a methodical manner to earn the respect of your peers. However, your feelings might get in the way of your calculated success now unless you temper your drive with a bit of common sense. Thankfully, the Moon squares logical Mercury in practical Taurus, enabling you to steady your energy and take the most practical route.

People's expectations are so high now that you can't possibly deliver on all of the demands being placed on you. Although you could come through with flying colors, you still may be afraid of disappointing your coworkers. Someone in particular might push you too hard and your natural response is to simply push back. Open conflict will only impede your progress and tarnish your reputation; being the best team player you can be turns you into a real hero.

You may inadvertently create a major complication for yourself today if you unilaterally decide that you know what's best for everyone. Even if you're being quite logical about the current work dynamics, you could focus a great deal of significance on a minor detail now instead of considering the whole picture. Changing your strategy isn't easy, but incorporating other people's ideas brings much better results than obstinately sticking to your original plan. An inclusive attitude serves you well.

You are motivated by reasonable objectives today but others may be surprised by your unconventional approach. Unfortunately, you might not realize how big a gulf exists between your intentions and how people interpret your actions. Even if you carefully monitor your behavior, you still could be misunderstood. There's no need to overreact; thoroughly discussing your strategy enables you to communicate your perspective with precision. Including your colleagues in your plans allows everyone to share in your success.

You're in your element today and don't want to take time to explain all the details of your game plan. You don't understand why everyone needs so much information when  you just want to get on with your work. Rather than acting annoyed that you must review plans you thought were already good to go, take your cues from the advice you receive instead. You can waste precious energy feeding your anger or you can grab this opportunity to take your good idea and make it even better. Set your ego aside for the sake of success.

It seems as if the big pieces are in place so you're not sure why it's taking so much effort to get your work done today. No matter what, you're determined to overcome any obstacles that arise from your recent decisions. However, you need to pay close attention to your priorities or you might spend time focusing on logistics that are relatively unimportant. Having every little thing perfectly in place would be wonderful, but not if it prevents you from making immediate progress with your plans.

If a coworker or a friend has something urgent to share with you today, slow down long enough to listen. It may seem as if someone is on your case now and even the slightest criticism might elicit feelings of self-doubt on your part. But there is little time to question your skills, so process your resistance as quickly as possible. Instead, step up to the plate and address the underlying issue that is currently standing between you and success. Once you see the problem in a clear light, you can face your own music, change your tune and move on.
