You could squander your energy by attempting to fight the inevitable today, but the more you struggle against your responsibilities, the harder it is to fulfill them. Instead of fantasizing about the pursuit of more enjoyable activities, just make the best of what's right in front of you in this moment. But don't try to placate anyone with a song and dance. Your no-nonsense attitude combined with sincere effort is the best way to win others over to your side.

Sometimes, you are the most creative when you interpret your ideas in a lighthearted and playful manner. But more often, it's just sweat and toil as you strive to produce something worthy of your efforts. Luckily, you can access the best of both worlds now as your pragmatic approach to a project empowers you to be inspirational in your thinking. You don't have to push your vision along in order to be more efficient today. Express your feelings as authentically as possible and your work will speak for itself.

You can take a good idea too far this week because your imaginative approach feels so exhilarating now that you're inclined to run with it as long as you can. But expressing yourself in an artistic manner to grab the spotlight is not a wise application of a passing inspiration. Grandstanding for personal gain won't end up helping your cause. Pay attention to your muse and follow it wherever it goes. Surprisingly, riding your stream of consciousness now will give you the most practical results.

Your friends and associates place a lot of confidence in you now, which is appreciated but also makes you nervous. They think that you can do nearly anything as you juggle schedule demands and complete difficult tasks as if you were a magician. However, you might be more anxious than others realize, worrying that you can't meet the impossible expectations that seem to be ballooning out of control. Nevertheless, don't underestimate your abilities today. Put your nose to the grindstone and get busy; everyone could be quite pleased with your results when you focus your passion on what matters most.

Narrowing your field of vision enables you to make the most of your limited resources today. Thankfully, your willpower is intense now; whatever you believe to be true can actually manifest as long as you remain vigilant in your work. Your first inclination is to agree if someone asks for a favor, but it's healthier to take a few deep breaths before you respond. Consider the ramifications of assuming another obligation prior to fulfilling your previous commitments. Attention follows intention; setting priorities is key to your success.

Your plans may appear to be progressing smoothly today. But rather than simply going along with the flow and responding to issues only as they surface, take control by stirring up your own waves and surfing to your destination. It isn't in your best interest to wait for something to happen; fine tune your strategy and put it into motion as soon as possible. Naturally, there may be adjustments required later on, but it's still better to initiate action now before the cosmic winds change direction and the opportunity passes.

Although you're tempted to keep your thoughts to yourself, your impact at work is minimal today if you remain silent. Your rational perspective makes a lot of sense to your coworkers, giving you the power to change people's minds. But there's no need to worry about what anyone thinks; just let them know your plans as they take shape. Your ability to detach yourself from the outcome increases the positive influence you now have on others. Strike while the iron is in your hand and everyone will be suitably impressed.

You're probably receiving more support at work now than you realize even if someone appears to be resisting your efforts. Rather than assuming a defensive posture, take the unsolicited feedback  to heart. Don't exclude potential allies just because they don't agree with all the details of your plan. Your ability to adapt to the will of others could make the difference between success and failure. Be open to modifying your strategy instead of attempting to do it all on your own. Ironically, you can personally benefit the most from finding your strength in numbers.

There's a stack of chores in front of you and you have high hopes of getting everything done today. However, events may not unfold according to your plans due to circumstances that are beyond your control. Don't waste time trying to figure out what went wrong because you might not be able to understand it, even if you have all the facts. Nevertheless, your imagination reigns supreme now. Exploring fantasy realms inspires you to loosen the reins and try a new approach to the work at hand. Trusting your instincts leads to greater productivity.

You believe that you are being your most charming self today, but something you say might be misconstrued, creating problems where there previously wasn't one. You are patient enough to meticulously explain your intentions, but somehow your words can still miss the mark. Your smartest strategy now is to stop trying so hard to convince others to listen. Paradoxically, as you relax your need to prove anything, others will finally get your point.

Discovering a hidden truth can be a real shocker but at least you have a stable emotional framework to soften this unexpected reality check. If interactions with friends are stressed because of a recent disagreement, the dialogue should flow more easily now if you don't get hung up on unimportant details. But you could also gloss over a significant piece of data that spins a conversation into strange territory. It's not necessary to force the topic back onto familiar ground today; just be aware of where you stand and how far you're willing to go.

You're expected to take the lead on the job today, but someone may hesitate to follow your directions. This lack of support is only one facet of a delicate situation -- especially since the negativity that appears to come from others could actually be yours. Reexamine your plans and be open to the possibility that you are facing your own suppressed fear in a projected form. If this is the case, you're the only one who can change your mind. Believing in yourself is the first step to success.

You may be operating on autopilot today. It's not that you aren't aware of your actions; it's just that you are spontaneously making choices while you are still in motion. However, you might need to modify your behavior now because you want to be more conscious of why you are deciding one thing and not another. Logical analysis can be constructive as long as you don't turn it into an obsession that disconnects you from your intuition. Your self-awareness enhances your professional success.

It's nearly impossible to understand people's behavior today because their words don't seem to match their actions. Confusing relationship dynamics might throw you off course as you try to make all the pieces fit together into a comprehensible picture. Surreal experiences and an overactive imagination can lead you to feeling alienated from others, even if your conversations seem to flow smoothly. Simply acknowledge the gulf between your fantasies and reality; thankfully, just talking about the differences may be enough to bridge the gap.

You don't like it when someone prods you into doing something that you are not ready to do just yet. Luckily, your current indecision is already starting to wane and a friend or an acquaintance acts as a catalyst by sharing a perspective you hadn't previously considered. The good news is your intuition may be more on target than you realize when it comes to manifesting your dreams. Make your move while the cosmic forces are working on your behalf.

You have the potential to feel passionate about a new project if you are open to the guidance of your imagination and signs from other spiritual dimensions. But you might float through the day in confusion if metaphysical communication isn't your cup of tea. Your traditional planetary ruler, Mars, is downloading cosmic instructions sent from mystical Neptune today, requiring you to stay receptive to the messages contained in symbols rather than words alone. Fortunately, you can still learn valuable lessons even if you don't understand the meaning of it all just yet.

It may not be easy to maintain your optimism now, but a touch of self-doubt need not be a source of worry. Every once in a while, it's healthy to consider realistic scenarios and integrate them into your plans to increase your chances for success. It's absolutely crucial to think critically today, even while dreaming of all the amazing possibilities just around the corner. However, there's no need to shut off your imagination in order to reach your goals.

You're relieved that everything seems to fall into place today as you take care of your domestic chores. But, you might also feel as if you're just going through the motions and that your mind is wandering elsewhere. Although your inability to concentrate could be somewhat disconcerting, there's no harm in living in two worlds now. Keep one foot here on Earth while the other one steps off into Fantasyland for a little excursion. A wondrous adventure is waiting for you in your imagination if you're willing to go there.

It's as if you've been given a free pass to visit imaginary worlds that you get to create on your own. Whatever indulgence you choose now, sensory stimulation becomes a catalyst for generating vivid fantasies. However, you also have very real obligations to handle today, and you can't avoid them by burying your head in the clouds. Balancing your desires and your responsibilities is never easy, but if you simply take your time and do it right you can enjoy the escapist behavior of your choice with a clear conscience.

You may as well be co-starring in a fantasy movie while your key planet Neptune sends out several scripts from a parallel universe today. You are eager to impress everyone with how well you play your role, but you're perplexed because you aren't sure which part is yours. Your real lesson now is about trust. Asking a reliable friend for direction is a good start, but you must put your faith in their advice to earn your place in the spotlight.

You are distracted by one unexpected event after another today, but you handle the apparent chaos well. Although you are comfortable hanging out on the edge of the unknown, you should tread carefully now; you're not as invincible as you might think. Ironically, even if your adrenaline is pumping, you still have a positive effect on others because the current uncertainty is more exciting than being stuck in a rut. Nevertheless, it's wise to calm your nerves with meditation, yoga or physical exercise. You can do even more good if you channel your excess energy into healthy pursuits.

You might feel ready to give up today, tired from doggedly chasing material goals. You have more on your plate than anyone realizes yet you're still being asked to spread your energy even thinner. Instead of agreeing to someone else's agenda, set priorities and focus on the most important tasks first. Panic is unnecessary even if you run into unanticipated problems. It's all about your frame of mind. Looking at the current pressures from a more spiritual perspective offers you the breathing room you need.

It's all too easy to wear your heart on your sleeve with sweet Venus bringing her special charms to your 1st House of Personality these days. But there's an awkward tension in the air and you can lose your patience if you don't take time to honor your feelings. You may even find yourself swept up in the heat of an argument now, wondering how things went so wrong. Remember, you're not the only person who is stressed out today, so steer clear of unnecessary conflict by demonstrating how well you listen when relationships are at stake. Responding with kindness cultivates an atmosphere of love and respect.

People may assume that you're satisfied with your personal relationships, but they don't have a clue because you're keeping your true feelings under wraps. Your heart is drawing you out into deeper waters today where the emotional currents can carry you off course. However, you could reach a breaking point if it requires too much energy to hide your inner world from those you love. Don't procrastinate; say what's on your mind before it's too late. Nevertheless, demanding results will just stir up unnecessary resistance. Keep your expectations to a minimum now and give others time to respond in their own fashion.

You don't understand why people seem to expect more from you now, but you're not happy with the extra pressure and you could spend much of the day attempting to alleviate the tension. Unfortunately, even the cleverest of tactics won't hide the edge in your voice. Examine your underlying emotions if you notice that your words sound sarcastic or mean. There are several sensible strategies for reestablishing harmony, yet saying hurtful things is not one of them. Instead, cultivate the peace you seek by treating others with respect and kindness.

Concentrating on your job is more complicated now than anyone realizes. Sometimes it's relaxing to let your thoughts meander for a while, but today your fantasies may activate memories that are not all that pleasurable. Worrying about meeting someone's expectations leads you around in endless circles. Fortunately, you can halt a temporary emotional tailspin by doing something useful in the present moment, rather than wasting time stressing about the past. Focusing on what you can control instead of what you can't is essential for your progress.

Behaving in a practical manner can be tricky business while romantic Venus aligns in an otherworldly configuration with jovial Jupiter and surreal Neptune. Nevertheless, a lighthearted attitude seems inappropriate if you think you should be more concerned with serious issues. You may be too conscientious to even entertain the notion of escaping from your responsibilities today. Although satisfaction seems elusive now, the Moon's return to your sign helps you understand your feelings in relation to the outer world. Figuring out what your heart wants is the first step to happiness.

You're not happy about having to maintain such a high level of productivity today, especially with so many intriguing distractions knocking on your door. However, your strength of purpose is non-negotiable when it comes to your work. You really don't want to get angry at anyone, but enforcing your limits could be an effective way  to quickly let others know that you mean business. Those unwilling to help you along your path would be wise to quietly step out of your way. Establishing clear boundaries now sets you up for future success.

You are especially intrigued by the mysteries of life and love today. However, you may be frustrated by your unsuccessful attempts to put your feelings into words. You're tempted to sidestep the entire issue by telling a humorous story so you don't have to expose your vulnerability. However, skimming the surface won't reveal the hidden meaning of life or deepen a relationship. Although it's easy to demonstrate your clever wit, it's more important now to be completely honest and share what's in your heart.

Although you're listening to the beat of a distant drummer today, you won't likely be caught off guard by an unexpected event. In fact, you appear to be more emotionally stable than ever, drawing people to you as they try to manage the stressful situations in their lives. However, you have your own worries now, and everyone else's demands just add extra layers of anxiety. Nevertheless, go ahead and offer your shoulder to a loved one; what might feel like a sacrifice at first could end up being the most meaningful thing you do all day.

Remembering simpler days from the past makes you feel nostalgic today as you secretly wish for their return. You long for the innocence and simplicity lost, and can't help but feel frustrated with how complicated your life has grown. Thankfully, you still have an opportunity to live out your dreams, even if you're balancing on an emotional high wire now. This chance won't come again, so don't let your fears or doubts stop you from embracing your future.

You have more emotional strength held in reserve than people realize, yet your uncertainty about your own power can get in the way of your success. Don't succumb to any feelings of insecurity by needlessly comparing yourself to anyone else. You are a unique individual with unique capabilities; the key now is your own self-awareness. Listen to your inner voice of intuition; having faith in the wisdom of the universe empowers you to be true to yourself.

Your productivity can reach new heights now, even if you fritter some of the day away. However, just drifting along isn't in your best interest; you must make a concerted effort to use the cosmic energy that's available to you today. The real key to your success is to focus on one activity at a time. It's quite simple: if you maintain your concentration, even for short bursts of focused intensity, you will get so much work done in such a short amount of time that others will think you're a wizard. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

You might feel a bit off balance today as work-related pressures tax your ability to make informed decisions. Being flexible is not necessarily one of your greatest strengths, yet staying loose can make all the difference in the world now. If you are uptight, you could find yourself struggling with things that are unimportant in the long run. Instead, go with the flow; listen, feel and respond to reduce friction and make a little room for fun. Spontaneity is your friend.

You want to impress people with how fast you can think on your feet, but they prefer you to have all your facts in order today. Although loquacious Mercury feels at home in your sign, you cannot fast-talk your way around the truth. You're an excellent conversationalist who can switch topics so rapidly that others can't follow. Face the music; you're not going to dazzle anyone with your fancy footwork now, so you might as well stop tap-dancing and settle down to business.

Letting go of an old belief allows you to be more experimental with your life today. Nearly every interaction holds the potential to explore new possibilities. You can approach a problem with a unique solution that might not work out, but, fortunately, you don't have to get it right the first time. Giving yourself permission to make mistakes enables you to consider many alternatives before following through on the one that makes the most sense. You may have to look outside of the box to find your key to success.

Listening with an open mind to everyone today enables you to play the role of the gracious diplomat. Demonstrating an honest curiosity about the lives of those around you motivates you to help others to find workable resolutions to their differences. Your interest in widening your perspective allows you to tune in and hear what people have to say, thereby giving you a solid foundation for a healthy and productive dialogue. Your willingness to engage acts as an inspiration to the rest of the world.

You're hearing conflicting stories at work today and you don't know who to believe or which way to turn. A simple decision could become complicated because you cannot uncover all the facts. Nevertheless, it's crucial to find your answers before the current circumstances change dramatically. Don't wait for a better time; keep asking questions until you get to the bottom of the issue. But this quest for the truth is not just about alleviating the tension; you can also deepen your understanding of the complex dynamics at play if you're willing to dig deep enough.

People may be tugging at you from different directions with their unrealistic expectations. Being adaptable enough to meet the needs of others is admirable as long as you don't lose yourself in the process. Unfortunately, you might feel hypersensitive with the receptive Moon still lingering in your sign today. One way to overcome your emotional vulnerability is to establish your agenda before you even leave the house. Heading into the day with a clear vision of your goals could be enough to keep you on track no matter what happens.

Your emotions are highly volatile today, even if you keep them wrapped up tightly, safe from prying eyes. Instead of assuming you know how others are feeling, assume the role of an observer while waiting for the right moment to share your insights. You can become the real power broker behind the scenes by avoiding the bright spotlight now. Take pride in your work, even if only a handful of people notice at first. Don't force anyone to play his or her hand; be patient and your chance to shift the energy will arrive soon enough.

Your presence can be a shining light in someone's life today as you lift the spirits of a sad friend or encourage a disenfranchised colleague. However, there's no need to worry about coming up with the specifics of an alternative plan for anyone, since details aren't your forte. Your current goal is to paint a rosy picture of what's possible in the future, rather than dealing with the practical matters of the day. Being a visionary is a job that suits you well, especially when you can illuminate the way for others to follow.

You might feel as if you are walking along a tightrope today as you try to maintain your emotional balance. Expansive Jupiter inspires you on one side while erratic Uranus destabilizes you on the other. You're tempted to ignore your responsibilities and cut loose, but it's probably not a wise choice for now. Instead, let your innate maturity guide you through the day while keeping your eyes open for a possible escape route in case you need one.

You're often motivated by higher truths rather than immediate practicalities. However, these conceptual ideas can be quite a distraction today, preventing you from focusing on important issues on the home front. Although exploring your philosophical approach provides much inspiration, it's not healthy if it distracts you from taking care of urgent family business. Jump into the fray with an open heart. But don't try to control every thought, for your unbridled imagination is the best tool you have to fix the current problem on your plate.

You have a fairly even-handed approach to a complicated relationship issue today. The Libra Moon falls in your 8th House of Intimacy, requiring you to traverse some pretty tricky emotional territory. You might not have the words to easily describe the mixed signals that are flowing between you and a loved one now, so finding common ground can be elusive. Nevertheless, allowing for give and take in conversation may be just enough to guarantee that both parties are heard. Honest dialogue is the most reliable path to resolution.

Although you Rams are sometimes criticized for behaving selfishly, the emphasis is on everyone else today. You might even feel a sense of relief now that you can take a break from focusing on your own personal agenda. Instead of trying to get your way, concentrate on what you could do for others to make them feel at ease. Fortunately, your current graciousness allows everyone to reflect your positive vibes back to you.

Serving others now can take you down a very sweet path to happiness today as the lovely Libra Moon brings you an abundance of pleasurable experiences. However, you might not feel so great if you choose to only satisfy your own needs. It's not worth the effort to try changing external circumstances to match up with your personal preferences. Instead, let go of your expectations and offer your assistance wherever you think it might help most. Being someone's angel is its own reward.

Although complications that are outside the sphere of your control loom close, friends and family are especially supportive now, bringing you joy in the moment. You deserve the respite you may be offered from a rather tumultuous few weeks and the heavier issues clouding the horizon won't get in your way if you let them slide for a while. Thankfully, taking some personal time enables you to return to your responsibilities emotionally recharged and physically well-rested. A change of pace does you a world of good.

You might not be able to spend the entire day hanging out with your family and friends, but being around those you love revitalizes your spirit while the Moon is camping out in your 4th House of Domestic Conditions. You are eager to show everyone that you have what it takes to be a consummate host now, so round up a few friends and fire up the barbecue. However, entertaining others is only part of the equation; don't forget to bask in the love of those closest to you while you have the chance.

You don't have to say yes to every single invitation with your name on it, because you could end up so scattered that your current spark of excitement is extinguished. You may have many tasks to complete, especially if you are in charge of a family or group activity. Rather than running in circles attempting to take care of everything for everyone, try delegating some of the chores to others. Relinquishing control isn't easy, but it's the wisest thing to do now for the benefit of the group.

You're able to keep your feet on the ground today while also flitting around like a social butterfly. You have a particular point of view, but don't want to waste energy defending it. Even if you successfully hide your current beliefs from public scrutiny, you still can't escape from the pressing concerns that are weighing on you. Spending a little time on more serious matters may be prudent, but even you conscientious Virgos need to get away from your regular responsibilities. Work smarter, not harder.

Maintaining an objective approach to life isn't straightforward today as the emotional Moon in your sign activates susceptible Venus. Your insecurities, opinions and biases may leak out, even if you think you are cleverly keeping them out of sight. Don't fight to hide your natural likes and dislikes; if you bury your feelings, you could end up angry or resentful. Instead of pretending that everything is all right just to please everyone, show up and be your authentic yourself.

You are in touch with emotional dynamics that are just lurking in the shadows but you don't want to create additional problems in a relationship now, making it difficult to share your concerns. Nevertheless, you also have some significant information you need to express. Don't tie your disclosure to anyone else's actions; just put your feelings out there with no expectations. Ultimately, whatever you say can be less disruptive if you say it with kindness.

Kicking back with a few of your best friends might be just what you need today. In fact, the timing could be right for a celebration, since it's wise to surround yourself with like-minded people while the Moon is currently visiting your 11th House of Networking. Be grateful that you are a part of a growing community. Your sense of belonging to something greater than yourself grounds you in ways that may not be apparent on the surface. When you're more comfortable with your place in the world, you become a more productive member of society.

You demand respect from all those you encounter while the Moon is energizing your 10th House of Status. Fortunately, doing the right thing elevates your standing in your community. Although you enjoy the company of others, you may be too busy with your own personal agenda to have much to do with anyone who isn't in your closest circle of friends. Instead of pursuing every social connection now, limit your interactions to those who can move you closer to your dreams.

You may feel as if you're up for nearly anything that sounds like fun, especially if your friends are participating in the activity. In fact, what you do is currently less important than who you do it with. Although you can get away with following your heart now, you still must honor your previous promises. Nevertheless, there's nothing wrong with trying to postpone a deadline until tomorrow if it means you can do something special today. Ultimately, you need both work and play to be a happy camper.

You prefer to approach all interactions in a rational manner today. Unfortunately, if someone makes an unreasonable demand, you still might try to fulfill their wishes. Balancing your needs with those of others can be challenging, but don't be afraid to establish healthy boundaries now or someone may push you too far. Remember, catering to the desires of others doesn't mean you must give up on finding satisfaction. Be a good friend to yourself.

Sticking close to the facts is crucial today because deviations from the truth elicit an unavoidable reality check. You can run into trouble if you don't think about the impact of your words before you speak. But you won't get away with shallow communication while the Scorpio Full Moon illuminates your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Creating intimacy in a relationship requires you to have the courage to delve into your emotions. Open your heart and meet the other person halfway.

You have big ideas about how much you can accomplish today, only to realize you underestimated the time needed to achieve your goals. If you promise more than you can deliver, someone might confront you with his or her disappointment over your lack of productivity. It's all too tempting to just ignore the criticism with the Scorpio Full Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others. Nevertheless, actively listening without becoming overly defensive increases your chances for happiness in the long run.

You might not be willing to accept opinions that you consider to be unnecessarily critical when the Scorpio Full Moon lights up your 6th House of Details. However, your sharp tongue can be quite cutting today if someone gets on your case. But your sarcasm could be a byproduct of your unexpressed hurt feelings. Instead of masking the truth with humor, take a risk and acknowledge your vulnerability. Being human isn't always easy, but it's the only option available at this time.

Conjuring up nostalgic memories of the past when relationships seemed less complicated won't help your current situation today. The emotionally intense Scorpio Full Moon floods your 5th House of Romance, bending your social life out of shape. However, this warping of reality is simply a sign that change cannot be avoided any longer. Don't retreat from a conflict of values that needs to be addressed now. Facing a tough issue that stands between you and someone you love can ultimately simplify the dynamics and bring harmony back into your relationship.

Your unspoken feelings are stretched like a rubber band today and the tension could make you quite uncomfortable. Unfortunately, there aren't any quick fixes to the complex circumstances that are tangling up your personal life. Rest assured that the situation is about to improve now that the Scorpio Full Moon casts her light in your 4th House of Domestic Conditions. However, it's up to you to facilitate the necessary change by making enough time with family members to talk about those things that truly matter.

You are anticipating a shift in the emotional dynamics in your immediate environment, but you don't know how it will play out. But even if you decide to maintain the status quo in your daily routine, you still feel the pressure to change now. The provocative Scorpio Full Moon highlights your 3rd House of Communication today, inspiring you to reveal feelings that aren't easy to bring out into the open. However, sharing your heart's desires is the first step toward manifesting the improvements you so desperately seek.

Just because you have a tough time making up your mind sometimes, your indecision isn't necessarily a sign of weakness. In fact, you often go out of your way to be objective when choosing one path or another. However, you must announce your choice while the various alternatives are still available now. The Scorpio Full Moon enlightens your 2nd House of Core Beliefs, empowering you to hold on to a position even if you are uncertain about it. Be strong; don't compromise your values for the sake of temporary convenience. Follow your instincts and don't look back.

You could inadvertently undermine your position or lessen your effectiveness by expressing your feelings now. A more strategic move is to carefully monitor your inner process rather than running with your gut reaction. Today's evocative Full Moon is in your sign, sensitizing you to the subtle energies in the atmosphere. However, waiting for the right moment to share what's in your heart enables you to gain power rather than lose it to a fleeting moment of passion.

Something important is ready to go down in a relationship today, but you might not be able to wrap your mind around it yet. The seductive Scorpio Full Moon reflects the energy of your 12th House of Destiny while powerful unconscious forces pull you in directions that aren't yet apparent. But overreacting now won't lead to satisfaction. If plans for the future seem to be growing out of control, just roll with the waves for a few more days. Ultimately, being honest with those you love is your best path to creating positive change.

Your intentions may be up in the air today with the mysterious Scorpio Full Moon activating your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. However, it's not as if you're lost in the dark; you have likely struggled plenty to figure things out. Although you clearly understand the dynamics at play, you just don't know how to put the pieces together to make it all work. Relinquishing control doesn't mean that you have failed. In fact, releasing the reins at the right time is a true act of courage and grace. Close your eyes and let the Force be with you.

People seem to think you can do nearly anything today, leaving you a bit worried about meeting their expectations. It isn't that you lack determination; it's just that you may feel as if you're in over your head and the pressure to get it right is overwhelming now. Nevertheless, the resolute Scorpio Full Moon occupies your 10th House of Public Responsibility, so you're not willing to just walk away from it all. Don't allow your fears to work against you. Breathe deeply and give it your best shot; your true friends won't ask for anything more.

Your active imagination enables you to see things in a different light. But this paradoxical approach to reality may be a burden today because it's no simple task to explain your intuitive process to anyone else. Nevertheless, the perceptive Scorpio Full Moon stimulates your 9th House of Future Vision, empowering you to influence the unfolding changes by visualizing them before they occur. Trust your inner guidance; your feelings are probably more in tune with the big picture than you think.

You must make a decision today as your desire to demonstrate your love conflicts with more practical pursuits. It's as if your gesture of affection could cause negative ripples in other parts of your life. Nevertheless, you might choose to proceed as if you didn't care what happens next. Be careful; there's no reason to push an unstable situation past the point of no return. Your plans will only fall apart if you go overboard in your drive to experience pleasure in the moment. Observe the edge without going over it.

Everything seems more complicated than necessary today. People may tell you more than you deem appropriate and knowing too much isn't a comfortable position for you. You might want to retreat in your mind to a simpler time, but going back to the past won't prevent the future from arriving. The wheels are in spin and you can't stop them even if it all feels like too much. You have the best chance to positively influence the future when you fearlessly act with good intentions. Instead of closing down your heart to protect it, keep returning to a place of love.

You may be so busy today that you don't have time to get anything done. Part of the problem is your frantic need for personal interaction. You might spend more time at the water cooler sharing your weekend adventures or on coffee break exchanging gossip with your coworkers. Consider why you're avoiding your work before you land in trouble with your boss. There are smarter routes to expressing your independence than baiting authority by goofing off. Maintain your reputation by setting clear priorities and sticking with them. Less talk and more action is the key to your success.

You might employ complex tactics to keep your emotions off everyone else's radar screens. Unfortunately, the logic that drives this evasive strategy may be faulty to begin with. If you try to steer clear of expressing the wanderings of your heart, you could get drawn into an argument about your core values, anyway. If your insecurities start to show, your passions will rise and you'll likely slip and say more than you intended. Believe it or not, it's less stressful if you just speak your truth right from the start.

Being the identified optimist in your group can be a blessing because people like to bask in your enthusiasm. However, too much of a good thing may backfire today. Blind faith won't get you to your destination any faster; it will only have you running off the road with your eyes closed. The power of positive thinking works for you as long as you apply small doses of self-restraint along the way.

You might believe that angels will swoop down to rescue you today -- and maybe they will. But, unfortunately, maybe they won't -- and this isn't a risk that's worth taking now. Even if you have helpers in other dimensions working on your behalf, it's still smart to go through all the motions as if you were on your own. Positive intentions and rigorous follow-through will likely be rewarded. As the Arab proverb says, "Tie up your camel first and then put your trust in God."

Your vision of the future is wide open today; you feel as if the sky is the limit. However, you may push your luck too far and the price you might have to pay for your bad judgment isn't worth the possible rewards. People may mean well when they encourage you to act on your dreams but be wary of anyone who says you can do anything you want now. Even if you're more capable than you admit to yourself, acknowledging both your strengths and your weaknesses makes the difference between failure and success.

Your passion for your work overcomes any reservations you may have about turning down a new project. However, just because you can talk yourself into saying yes, this doesn't make it a good idea. Don't be a fool and rush in so fast that you lose sight of the common sense that should be guiding your decisions at work. A tried and true tactic is to make a list of all the pros and cons of the venture. Making an informed choice is only possible after you objectively assess the opportunity from all angles.

Expressing your creativity today might require you to step so far out of the box that you can't even remember what containment felt like. Exploring your imagination is enticing, but it's not without its complications. Admittedly, traveling out of the realms of certainty and into the world of unrealized inspiration is a gamble. There are no definite cause-and-effect guarantees in the Land of Vision. Nevertheless, your current attraction to the potential of the unleashed mind may be irrepressible now. No one can take this journey but you.

Your friends can't see the weight of responsibility you are carrying on your shoulders now. They might expect you to be more happy-go-lucky than you actually feel. However, you have neither the time nor the energy to stop and explain yourself to every person you meet along your way today. Don't let anyone talk you out of your current plan of action. You mean business, but your optimism is strongly at work beneath the surface, motivating you to do great things. When you reach for the stars, you have the power to change the world.

Breaking out of a rut has consequences today, but you're willing to wager on your future. Taking a calculated risk is admirable, assuming you have actually done the logical analysis first. However, you could miss your opportunity to make a knowledgeable decision if you don't even stop to think about the ramifications of what you say or do. Limits are not meant to hold you back now; instead, they can clarify what is important and what is not. Free your mind and the rest will follow.

You are hopeful that your compassionate nature will get you through a difficult obstacle course today. Fortunately, your inspirational objectives are a tremendous help, but they are not enough to save the day by themselves. You can see the top of the mountain, but must have a concrete plan to reach the summit or you will fall short of your mark. However, once all the pieces are in place, you still need to come through with the goods. Realizing your goals requires a methodical execution; there is no rest for the ambitious.

People can't help but take notice of you when you walk into a room today. It's as if they are watching your every move to see what you will do next. Don't squander this chance to bring others into your camp. Remember, your persuasive powers are the strongest if you remain true to yourself -- so consider what you value most. Your integrity is non-negotiable; once you are clear about your priorities you can let circumstances influence your progress, but not your direction.

No one seems to understand you today because you're at a loss to find the right words to describe your emotions. Since it's challenging to put your feelings into language now, just work with whatever thoughts come to mind. There's no reason to push the process, but initiating a dialogue still makes the most sense if you want to create deeper connections with others. Keep your heart open; quiet perseverance is your secret weapon for relationship success.

Your actions are closely aligned with your heart now, creating quite a force to be reckoned with. People might be too quick to write you off as a lightweight, but your closest friends and relatives are more inclined to listen to your ideas today because your behavior conveys the fire of your convictions. Nevertheless, choose your words carefully, but don't expect immediate results because it may still take a while for your message to sink in. Fortunately, you're wired into a vein of inspiration and the truth will prevail.

You are tapping into a deep well of emotions now and are more than willing to tackle the most significant issues of the day. Fortunately, you're in a fantastic position to learn something new about your relationship with power, assuming that you are motivated to process your feelings rather than just observing them. Don't try to explain your motives to everyone who inquires about your objectives; just ask them to respect your current choices and your need for space. Sometimes you must spend a little time in self-reflection before you can be emotionally present for others.

You may spend a lot of needless time and effort managing your extreme feelings today, but emotional moderation is likely an elusive goal when others interfere with your process. You can become so worked up over the situation that you believe the issues at stake are more critical than they actually are now. As stressful as the current conflict sounds, you simply must take a leap of faith and let go of control. Fortunately, you could be pleasantly surprised at everyone's willingness to jump in and do their part to support you on your journey.

Your powers of concentration turn you into a superhero today, leaving little to stand in your way of success. Trust your intuition because you can see the future spread out in front of you now, even if you can't yet put your vision into words. In the meantime, create a detailed strategy, but give yourself a few days before you share your current scheme with anyone else. There's no reason to show your hand until you're ready to play it. Putting your cards in order is necessary to turn the game to your advantage.

Your creativity is flowing from the unseen depths of your mind today, enabling you to express what's in the dark recesses of your imagination. Nevertheless, it may be too soon to know exactly where your inspiration is leading. But don't worry if you can't get far enough ahead to gain some perspective or you might exhaust yourself for no reason at all. Follow your muse without asking too many questions. To quote Oscar Wilde, "Life imitates art far more than art imitates life."

A secret doorway to hidden treasures within your subconscious is unlocked today by the radiant Sun's superconductive trine with penetrating Pluto. These gems are most often totally unreachable, but you have access to the mysterious secrets of the universe now. Walk boldly into the shadows, even if you are clueless about what you might discover. Pay careful attention to all the signs along the way; your heightened awareness helps to dissolve your fears and reveal rich spiritual rewards.

Your most reliable personal growth comes from focusing on your regular routine and simply performing your work-related chores as powerful Pluto trines the Sun in your 6th House of Details. Fortunately, you currently enjoy the idea of crossing one item after another off your list of things to do. Fulfilling your responsibilities is not only good for your self-esteem now, it also could have positive financial ramifications. Demonstrating your competence pays off in ways you can't imagine.

You may be obsessed with the possibility of romance today, but it's not the wisest time to fall victim to unrealistic fantasies. Even if you want to escape the more mundane realms, there is work you must do first. Aside from feeling proud of your accomplishments, taking care of business works to your advantage in other ways, too. Since you are more emotionally satisfied when you have something tangible to show for your efforts, others will likely notice your improved demeanor. Instead of chasing your dreams to find happiness, your positive attitude may lure your dreams closer to you.

Someone could be trying to support your efforts from behind the scenes today, but it's difficult to discern who it is or why they are doing it. It may not be a simple task to work with energy that you can't engage directly. Fortunately, you can make better progress if you just settle into the flow for a while, even if it feels awkward at first. You may be pleasantly surprised when you set aside your rigid agenda and place your trust in the unseen wisdom of a secret ally who has your best interests at heart.

You are swimming in unfamiliar waters of emotional intensity today. You might even panic for a moment, concerned that there's too much drama you don't understand. Nevertheless, your approach to the unknown is quite pragmatic now, even if you are unsure of where the currents may carry you. Whatever happens, don't let your need for clarity reduce the possibility of having an incredible experience. Instead of being distracted by the noise inside your head, listen to the stirrings of your heart.

Fixating on your future goals makes focusing on the present moment impossible. Nevertheless, you're like a bee to honey today and you can't take your mind off the road ahead. Perhaps the temptation of so many lovely flowers is just plain irresistible. Nevertheless, ignoring your current responsibilities is not an option. Make whatever modifications to your schedule are necessary to reach your goals. Take care of business now so you can embrace your future later without any baggage.

There could be so many opportunities to seek pleasure today that it's confusing to know which route to take. You might even believe that your options have so much potential that you can't go wrong, no matter what alternative you choose. Thankfully, you may not be so far removed from the truth. You have taken the first steps on a very important journey that can be rewarding, both financially and emotionally, as long as you keep moving forward. He who hesitates is lost.

People naturally assume that you're having a good time but you're secretly worried about taking on too many commitments today. Your apparent indifference keeps others in the dark, but only for a short period of time. Once you lose your cover it may be time to face up to your real-world obligations. But this doesn't mean that everyone gets to tell you what to do. You retain the right to define what's on your plate. Drawing clear boundaries is the first step to regaining your power.

You might have an ingenious idea about how to make money today, only to discover that you are missing an important piece of information. Perhaps, in your eagerness to succeed, you just forgot something you already knew. But your current confidence is not a substitute for having a solid foundation on which to build. Fortunately, a trusted colleague could possess the rational perspective you lack. Taking the time to go over your assumptions with someone else may be all you need to put your thinking back on track. Mixing creativity with practicality is your ticket to success.

Your presence is a gift to others today because you are able to maintain your positive attitude in spite of any problems you encounter. Fortunately, leading by example works well for you now as long as your enthusiasm doesn't get the best of you. You could become so passionate about the prospects of your current job that you end up spreading your energy too thin and losing ground. It's wonderful to motivate yourself with a big carrot at the end of the stick; just make sure that it's still within your reach.

Even if you are famously known for your efficiency on the job, following a goal-oriented schedule is not going to happen today. Your agenda might be to keep yourself on a straight and narrow path, but simple twists of fate continue to deliver disruptive messages about your place in the world. You are not meant to be a retiring wall flower now. Engage fully at every chance you get until a new course of action become apparent. Dance like no one is watching while you have the chance.

Yesterday's uplifting ideas may be today's headaches. It's as if each innovative thought is like a hot air balloon that expands so much that it pops. Just as you were growing accustomed to the panoramic view, your fantasy disappears and you must come to grips with your disillusionment. Rest assured this reality check is all part of a larger process. Explore your options without putting all your eggs in one basket. If one door closes, another will open.

Lofty career goals are not enough to inspire you today; what you need is some good old-fashioned magic. In fact, just setting the bar higher can have a chilling effect on your creativity now. If you're worried about missing your mark, you're not likely to take as many risks to express your imagination. Nevertheless, the well-traveled path isn't for you now; reach for the sky, but keep your faith or you might fall off your unicorn.

Sometimes making a new mess is more fun than cleaning up an old one. Unfortunately, you might have already turned your life upside down in a recent search for excitement. You have an eye for the extraordinary, yet putting all your resources into one inspiration now could very well spell doom for the project before it has a chance to get off the ground. Don't leave loose ends untied today, for your window of opportunity is closing fast. Unfinished business will grow harder to complete over the days ahead, so stop playing around and get to work.

Your high level of competence can trick you into underestimating the time and resources needed to complete a job. Unfortunately, people may be counting on you now because they know you perform well under pressure. Meanwhile, you're trying to cover your error in judgment by working even harder to get things done. Don't act too surprised when something happens out of the blue today, releasing you from your impossible deadline and resetting your interpersonal dynamics at work. Be grateful for this unexpected gift from the universe and make the best use of your time.

You're eager to cut loose today but you don't want to do it alone. Although others might be out to have fun, you're concerned that they won't be able to keep up with you. Unfortunately, you may be so zealous in your quest for pleasure now that you're prone to overindulge in food, drink or sensory stimulation. Unfortunately, too much of a good thing leads to trouble rather than satisfaction. Don't wait until it's too late;  set healthy limits while you can. Toning it down just a little brings you joy without any negative consequences.

Your confidence is soaring today, leading you to think you have all the answers at work, but you're not the only one ready to take charge. Instability could be brewing as conflict between the various strategies on the table seems inevitable. Unfortunately, resolving the disagreement could require more resources than  the project, itself. There isn't enough time to deconstruct every aspect of each proposal. Endless analysis may lead you in circles, while finding common ground is the obvious solution.

You aren't happy with your busy schedule today, but you're resigned to take the more responsible path anyway. Nevertheless, you must confront your irrepressible temptation to procrastinate; nothing will be gained by distracting yourself from your current obligations. Thankfully, once you commit to wholeheartedly focusing your intentions, you gain the power to harness your unrealized potential and have a productive day in spite of yourself. Ironically, your mind is your weakest link and your greatest ally.

You are all set to put the finishing touches on a project today, but unless you are very persistent, things might not go according to your plan. There's a lot of mental interference in the atmosphere now and the noise could tempt you to ignore your agenda and follow a fleeting whim. Hopefully, you can override your need to escape by practicing a little common sense. You have an opportunity to turn a dream into reality if you pick one track and stay on it.

You may appear quite busy today, but others can't figure out why you're getting so little done. Oddly enough, you don't even notice that you're wasting energy running in circles. Fortunately, you can regain control of your day by consciously slowing down. Analyzing the consequences of your behavior prior to initiating action is much more effective than flying off the handle in every direction. Less hurry and less worry leads to higher productivity and greater self-esteem.

Although you can be quite cautious when it comes to revealing your feelings, it's refreshing to skip the never-ending analysis today. Normally, you prefer to contemplate all your options before doing anything. However, making every little decision as if you're playing a game of chess takes the excitement out of life. Give yourself permission now to react without concern for what happens next. Putting your emotions out on the table might bring more relief than you expect. Take a chance and open your heart.

You might have committed to so many activities today that you don't know how you're going to manage your time. Your responsibilities grow more demanding throughout the day and your schedule becomes less forgiving as the afternoon unfolds. Nevertheless, avoid getting so caught up in your own agenda that you can't see a solution that's right in front of your nose. A healthy dose of adaptability allows you to accommodate unexpected changes into your calendar with a minimum of disruption. A positive surprise can occur if you give it room to manifest.

Your resolve grows stronger throughout the day, raising your confidence about a current project at work. Unfortunately, being productive isn't your only consideration today; you also want to enjoy yourself in the process. Be careful; don't use your personal desires to justify sabotaging your efforts if you're not having a good time. Stay on course and demonstrate your expertise. Ultimately, the satisfaction you derive from a job well done will be enough of a reason to celebrate.

You're determined to complete your work but no matter how practical your approach, you still can see beyond the castle walls. Your perspective on life won't fit into a neat and tidy package now. In fact, you might even recognize how your current efforts merge with your future plans in a way you haven't yet grasped. You will do your best work in the long run by finishing on your own timetable, not someone else's. Fortunately, everything should fall into place if you maintain a high level of focus and an unwavering faith in yourself.

You may grow agitated as you strive for perfection, especially if you find it hard to concentrate now. If you are tired from working so many hours on a project, take stock of what you have already accomplished and pat yourself on the back. Simply letting others know what you still have left to do alleviates the immediate pressure. Don't waste energy on self-judgment. A little extra rest is all you need today; tomorrow you will feel refreshed and ready for anything.

If you have been lax at work recently, it's time to reassess your priorities before continuing in your old ways. Although you want to put your life back in order, you could overcompensate and take on too much in order to prove your good intentions. However, the ambitious Capricorn Moon helps you plan your schedule with efficiency in mind. Make your energy last longer by taking a more methodical approach. Managing your time wisely allows you to work less and accomplish more.

Your friends may be surprised with your uncharacteristic emotional intensity today. They might back off from a conversation to avoid conflict even if they think that you are wrong. Thankfully, the Moon's monthly return to your sign empowers you to express your vulnerable side without losing track of your goals. Nevertheless, do yourself a big favor and tone down your fervor. You don't have to push others beyond their comfort zone to stay passionately engaged with your meaningful cause.

You could be drawn into a complex drama today and there might not be a straightforward way to avoid it. You may sink into your emotions and the more you struggle to be somewhere else, the deeper it gets. There's no need to panic; your smartest strategy is to stop resisting. Listen to what others have to say and don't put up unnecessary walls. Your gift is to be a sounding board now for those who need it most. Thankfully, the appreciation you receive in return touches your heart in ways you didn't expect.

Your obsession with one particular version of the future can impede your progress today. Or, you might grow afraid of being stuck on your current path, especially if you don't like where it's heading. In both scenarios, your attachment or avoidance intensifies the situation and makes it more challenging to navigate through the circumstances. Relaxing your expectations allows you to explore more options and regain a healthier perspective. Wider horizons lead to a happier heart.

Your self-confidence is based on your practical outlook today; you know your strengths and understand what you must do to achieve your goals. However, you still may worry about the possible reaction to your direct approach. Although you might not mislead anyone intentionally, you're tempted to sidestep a delicate situation because Venus' shift into receptive Cancer increases your vulnerability. Nevertheless, your self-esteem could suffer unless you follow through with your original intentions and just get the job done.

You are motivated to bring a discussion out of the clouds and back down to earth today because you aren't interested in wasting time on philosophical issues or subtle nuances. For you, it's quite simple: pay attention to the place where the rubber meets the road. Gaining solid traction nearly guarantees that you will reach your destination in a timely manner. You continue to make progress as long as you return to the basics at the very first hint of trouble. Don't wait until you spin out of control before taking  action.

You might be feeling a little insecure today since charming Venus has left the chatty world of your sign and slipped into timid Cancer, where she remains for the next month. You may mistakenly believe that you have lost your edge, but nothing could be further from the truth. Although the pace of life is already starting to slow down, you will have sufficient opportunity to accomplish all you want over the weeks ahead. Remember, sometimes the most intelligent tactic is to say nothing at all and let your actions speak for you.

Naturally, you're more comfortable when there is an emotional resonance between you and others. However, you may grow annoyed today when you realize a coworker or friend isn't open-minded enough to accept your unconventional ideas. Unfortunately, your personal well-being might not be someone else's top priority now. Nevertheless, it's still worth your effort to share your true feelings. Even if the reaction isn't as supportive as you wish, you'll still gain respect for standing up for yourself.

You'll have much more success today if you break each job into smaller tasks while the responsive Moon is traveling through your 6th House of Details. Instead of just jumping into a project spontaneously, it makes more sense now to have a  methodical frame of mind. Keep one eye on the big scheme of things so you always know what move you are going to make next. Although you may run into unexpected interruptions along the way, doing your homework before you get started minimizes the delays.

People seem to go beyond the call of duty to reassure you about your long-term dreams today. Their support is refreshing because your coworkers sometimes find fault with you for placing too much significance on the wrong things. Nevertheless, your current attention to details is not up for negotiation. Your confidence is growing now, but it's not helpful if favorable feedback goes directly to your head. The most reliable course of action is to continue demonstrating your integrity by being as productive as possible. Pride goes before a fall; a touch of humility saves the day.

An intense domestic predicament might require your immediate attention today, but a dramatic show of emotions doesn't necessarily mean that anything is wrong. It's just that you could be afraid that personal issues will interfere with your job performance. Establishing firm boundaries empowers you to attend to matters at home and at work while keeping things separate enough so you don't create additional complications. Drawing a line between your two worlds helps to simplify your life.

You're ready to enjoy a busy day, especially if you already have a solid plan in place for reaching your current goals. You're eager to jump in and work hard now because you're excited about the potential rewards. However, it's not wise to bank on a payoff before you even begin. Luckily, you should be able to fulfill your obligations today if you are realistic in your resource assessment and have a purpose that goes beyond material gain. As Einstein wrote, "Not everything that counts can be counted."

You have a pragmatic attitude toward money today and your incisive thinking all but ensures that you'll make the smartest choices. Nevertheless, your finances may be in need of some serious attention while the Moon hooks up with powerful Pluto in your 2nd House of Material Possessions. Unfortunately, impulse buying could quickly land you in trouble, so think twice before purchasing something you don't even need. The wisest approach to spending now is the most conservative one.

You may run into more complexity than you bargain for if you assume a leadership role on a current project. Alternatively, you might feel upset because people expect too much from you. Logic tells you that you wouldn't have to work so hard if others did their fair share, too. Don't worry; you'll be able to join in the fun later, even if you are the one who does most of the heavy lifting all day long. Winston Churchill said, "The price of greatness is responsibility."

You have a secret weapon at your disposal today; you can tap the hidden resources within your subconscious mind to make the most out of nearly any situation. The Moon's current visit to your dreamy 12th House of Fantasy inspires you to trust your intuition. It may not be apparent at first, but the variety of possibilities increases once you give yourself permission to dream big. However, you can't just ignore the current circumstances; consciously work within the constraints of the real world for the best results.

You might be very realistic about your goals today, but it's still complicated to manage whatever is currently on your plate. In fact, you prefer to live in the future rather than in the here-and-now. Keeping your dreams alive is absolutely critical, but you must also be ready to respond to each situation that manifests. Ultimately, it isn't wise to sever your connection with reality to focus on unfulfilled wishes about tomorrow. The only place you can effect change is in the present moment.

You are a quick learner and thinking on your feet enables you to be quite comfortable in situations that would make anyone else uneasy. However, you may get your signals crossed today and make a rash decision based on a misunderstanding. Reality isn't as black and white as you expect; it's possible to see a lot of shades of gray. Acknowledging your lack of certainty lessens the pressure you might feel now. Instead of running with one of your spontaneous ideas, it's wiser to take your cues from others. You don't always have to be the leader of the pack.

You might not be able to make too much sense of recent events and have trouble shaking off a belief that you should know more than you do. You may have suffered during an emotional encounter, yet it's crucial now to concentrate on the present moment instead of the past. Don't look back; channel your energy into communicating your current perspective instead. Being practical works best for you, but don't shut out a good idea just because you can't back it up with solid facts. Sometimes faith is all you really need.

You feel like a pendulum swinging one way and then the other. If you have been too serious these last few months, you might be tempted to overcompensate today and show a more happy-go-lucky side. However, ignoring reality is not a smart strategy, even if you deserve to escape into your imagination. Indulging in a bit of fantasy can be emotionally healing now as long as you also acknowledge the importance of current events. The good news is that walking in two worlds comes naturally to you Twins.

Someone might be all over your case about your work or a relationship. But you don't really want reminders from people who don't know all the facts. You know exactly what you must do; your problem is that you currently lack the concentration you need to finish the job. If your willpower is flagging now, rest assured that you will have more energy in the days to follow. Although denial isn't a permanent answer, kindly asking others to back off today gives you time to find a solution on your own.

People seem to have a lot to say today, but you may be so enchanted with your own world that you don't have the energy to connect with everyone else. However, in the spirit of friendship, you might take time to listen to someone's story, but it only serves to distract you from your inner work. Fortunately, you don't have to close yourself off completely from those you love in order to be true to yourself. Follow both paths at once; inspiration can be found anywhere you go.

Your thorough analysis usually enables you to make the best-informed decisions, but your thinking might be a bit too convoluted today for your own good. Rational Mercury flourishes when it has good data as its disposal, but your logic is somewhat confused by dreamy Neptune. You can swiftly turn even the most basic facts into subjective stories and the most accurate perceptions into impressionistic paintings. Once you accept that everything in life is illusory now, you will be able to be spontaneous and enjoy yourself in the present moment.

Unfinished projects at work or home weigh heavily on your mind, especially if you have more obligations than you can meet today. There's no reason to waste your precious energy fretting about things you can't change if the demands being made on your time are unrealistic. Your fantasies may send you into a tailspin of doubt, but don't let them drive you to distraction. Rather than getting caught up in your fears, continue to demonstrate your competence without second-guessing your decisions. A positive attitude produces the best results.

Although your perceptions are instinctively on point, you're likely to take them to a deeper and darker place than needed. Your imagination may run wild now and you could spend too much time lost in fantasies without conscious limits. No matter what, don't let your nagging worries turn into all-encompassing compulsions. If you find yourself obsessing over too many strange ideas, pull your energy back into the real world through physical activity or direct engagement with others. Flights of fancy are fine as long as you remember when it's time to return to Earth.

You may continue to experience pressure to take care of lingering financial matters today. Or, perhaps, you might derive considerable benefit from reevaluating what you have to give to others. Either way, be realistic about what you value and what you are worth. You are being offered a very small margin of error now; there's no room to fool yourself. A mistake in judgment will likely cycle back to haunt you pretty quickly, so take your time and get it right. Finding peace of mind is priceless.

There's no reason to set your sights so high today that you set yourself up for failure. Even if you have time to focus on your goals, you still cannot accomplish everything you want. Part of your current dilemma stems from the wide gap between reality and fantasy, with little ability to distinguish between the two. The fact is you are a human being, possessing irrational emotions that can't help but affect your thinking. Lighten up and grant yourself temporary permission to daydream -- even if it negatively impacts your productivity. Exploring your imagination is the first step to understanding your heart.

Although you might be unable to keep your mind from wandering today, your unexpressed thoughts can teach you exactly what you need to know. However, you must be totally honest with others and tell them you are not in the mood for socializing now. Sharing your truth prevents anyone from expecting more from you than you can give. There's no need to fear the dark corners of your brain, for they hold the keys to the most amazing lights of inspiration.

You wish you didn't have so many commitments today because you're not interested in engaging in lighthearted conversations upon command. Nevertheless, it's not wise to postpone an event because you'll probably feel more inclined to participate once you get there. You don't have to fake a pleasant attitude; if you are in a serious frame of mind now, just be exactly who you are. Others will appreciate your honesty and integrity, making you grateful that you don't have to hide your true nature when among your friends.

Although you are widely known for your impulsive behavior, your current social involvement is probably more considered. Your motives might not be obvious, but you could go out of your way now to cooperate with people to hide your fear of rejection. Unfortunately, this uncharacteristic strategy won't likely lead to the results you seek. Instead, adopt a radical approach by expressing your feelings and letting the cards fall where they may. Others find it easier to converse with you when you are upfront and honest right from the start.

You might not act very friendly today because you don't want to engage in long discussions about your feelings. However, carefully choosing what to say and what to keep secret offers you the illusion of being in control. Your plan could backfire when people realize you're holding back, prompting them to push you toward the very same dialogue you're trying to avoid. But there's no reason to get tangled in complex webs of denial. Showing up with an open mind and no expectations all but ensures pleasurable interactions.

Meeting people's expectations may seem like an uphill battle, but you don't know how to sidestep the climb. Fortunately, your entire agenda could change in an instant once you realize it's not about pleasing anyone else. It turns out that you're the only one who might be disappointed by your performance today. Others are more likely to accept you unconditionally than you may think. Striving to maintain high standards is worthy of your efforts, but don't let any one goal get in the way of your happiness.

You attempt to mask your current hypersensitivity by throwing yourself into your work today. You think no one will notice your feelings if you impress others with your efficiency. However, your friends are less interested in what you accomplish now than how you communicate with them. Your magic stems from expressing the tenderness in your heart so forget about demonstrating your proficiency. Producing tangible results will not create your legacy. In contrast, the positive effects of nurturing those you love will last a lifetime.

You're not inclined to reveal your deepest feelings now because you don't believe that others really care about what matters most to you. It seems as if everyone always wants to be around you when you're in a playful mood, but it's hard to find a companion who wants to stick around when you have more serious things on your mind. Unfortunately, hiding your desires restricts your inner child, turning you into a party spoiler. Ultimately, you're better company when you show your true colors and wear your big heart on your sleeve.

You have a unique way of getting your chores done today and you don't need anyone's approval to move forward with your plan. You might even take your non-conformity one step too far now by alienating someone, as if you're testing the limits of a friendship. Even if your intentions are honorable, people could take your actions the wrong way. Don't complain if others aren't willing to put up with your antics; change your attitude instead. Creating a sense of community begins with you.

You may have a mother-hen complex; you want to take care of everyone today even if you can't fit another chick under your wings. But your desire to protect the people you love might be more about gaining respect now than demonstrating your compassion. Examine your heart before trying to save another lost soul. Unless you're acting with integrity, you could do more damage than good. But if your motives are pure, you can be a superhero in the eyes of those you help.

Your reluctance to reveal your secrets might create unnecessary distance between you and someone you like. It's not that you want to be alone today; it's just that you may choose to keep your heart hidden from others if you don't feel deserving of love. However, there's no need to create a self-fulfilling prophesy by pushing the all-or-nothing button. Instead, take a small step toward creating a lasting friendship. A solid foundation built on vulnerability and trust allows a relationship to develop over time.

Showing your softer side is nearly impossible when others make too many demands on your time. Unfortunately, your friends and relatives might grow annoyed today because you are more interested in being clever than being real. Although you have the witty repartee working on your behalf, the current dynamics are exacerbated if you suppress your feelings. Don't waste time trying to determine who is to blame. Shift the energy by opening your heart to the potential of connecting in the present moment. Taking the high road inspires others to do the same.

Keeping your emotions under wraps seems natural, especially if you think that expressing them could interfere with your plans. However, someone very close to you might be in immediate need of your help. Unfortunately, you can't avoid the drama by simply ignoring his or her disclosure; this misdirected strategy only inflames the situation. Attempts to control the flow drive the feelings deeper and amplify their power. Although it's counter-intuitive, openly communicating your desires breaks old patterns and positively transforms the dynamics for everyone involved.

You might believe you can act as unconventionally as you feel today, but your eccentric behavior won't go unnoticed. In fact, your friends may be seemingly harsh in their current judgments. You don't need to worry about the opinions of others today; you only have to be true to yourself. And although you're not responsible for anyone's reaction, your kind concern still goes a long way toward mending the fences that make good neighbors.

Hiding your desires behind a stoic presentation won't necessarily fool anyone who really knows you. People can see right through your performance because your deep sensitivity shows in your eyes. Instead of wasting precious resources pretending to be something you are not, let your inner light shine. You might not be everyone's cup of tea, but at least they will know what to expect from you before it's too late. Expressing your vulnerability is not a sign of weakness, but one of strength.

It feels as if you're standing on the edge of an emotional cliff trying to decide whether or not to jump. You intuitively believe that you'll be safe as you fly toward the ground, yet the adrenaline rush is exciting. However, this mysterious gravitational tug with the unknown is also be a bit scary. You're not as confident once you enter the feeling realm, especially if you don't think you're in control of the situation. Nevertheless, your experience can be meaningful and memorable if you're willing to take a risk with your heart.

You may be drawn into an intense situation at work today that pits your solution to a dilemma against someone else's. An emotional drama could ensue if you aren't willing to give an inch as the fixed Aquarius Moon squares the obstinate Taurus Sun. It helps to acknowledge you don't have all the answers, even if being flexible isn't your first choice now. Forget about being right; instead, focus on what you can learn by collaborating with others. A team effort produces what you can't do alone.

You are tempted to tip-toe around a delicate topic of discussion today. However, you can unintentionally bring up unpleasant memories for someone close to you if you can't face the underlying emotional conflict. Forget about using humor to avoid the subject because making light of your feelings only impedes your progress now. Overcome your fears and search for lasting solutions rather than patching things up with a superficial band-aid. Taking a more spiritual approach allows the real healing to begin.

You aren't interested in creating any emotional conflict, but you believe that stepping onto unfamiliar ground now can lead to a greater satisfaction.
