Normally, you're quite logical, but setting aside your need for rationality opens new doors of creativity now. Remain receptive to any messages that originate from your subconscious, even if you can't understand them right away. Intuition works in mysterious ways.

Your creative urges are stirring and it's wise to make the most of these feelings while they last. Whether you pull out the colored pencils, acrylic paints or your camera, try to capture your vision as vividly as possible. It doesn't matter what medium you use; your current assignment is to recognize beauty where you see it and to express how it influences your heart. Even just listening to your favorite music can be enough to transport you into the spiritual dimensions that are beyond the physical world. Your imagination is a fertile ground for your next artistic adventure.

Someone may ask you to participate in a community event or to become involved with a cause that helps others. However, you might not be willing to move in that direction today if your schedule is already too busy. A clash of intentions could produce a temporary standoff, but the disagreement won't likely turn into a major battle. Ultimately, the choice is yours; your smartest strategy may be to ignore the pressure and just ride out the storm. Charitable acts mean so much more when they come from your heart.

Your over-the-top optimism could hijack your day if you actually believe that anything is possible. Fortunately, you can have an inspirational impact on others, but you may lose your effectiveness if you are unrealistically enthusiastic. You feel extremely adventurous and lean toward taking a risk, especially if it involves an impulsive attraction. However, try not to confuse anyone with that twinkle in your eyes unless you know exactly what you're getting into today. Once you are honest about your intentions, the sky is the limit.

The events of the day may turn out to be a lot more complicated than you expected. Someone might try to change your course by pulling strings but you will likely see through the veiled attempts to control the situation. You're not amused by any hidden manipulations; you prefer to bring everything out into the open where reality is more manageable. Nevertheless, the gulf between your subjective world and the external circumstances presents a paradox. Fortunately, you don't have to solve this surprising mystery to find true happiness now.

A friend or relative might have an unexpected outburst today that triggers your discomfort. The tension is exacerbated by the fact that you often grow anxious when you step out of the logical realms and into the irrational world of feelings. However, you can actually learn from your own illogical reactions, even if you aren't sure where they will lead. Don't blame anyone else for your emotional struggles. The source of your uneasiness comes from within now, so you need to face these fears once and for all and then let them go.

Your top priority now is to hold onto your center of gravity so you don't float off into your dreamworld for the next couple of days. Thankfully, nothing needs to stop you from indulging in your fantasies while you continue to perform your mundane chores. Even if you wish you were doing something more creative, maintain the appearance of your normal routine. You are free to dip into unseen spiritual dimensions when no one is looking as long as your outward productivity doesn't suffer.

You may easily upset others today if you are completely honest with them about what you want. You might even justify your position with the facts, but speaking with authority doesn't make your words true, especially while aggressive Mars squares deceptive Neptune. Insisting that you are right isn't a viable strategy because you sound foolish if you pretend that you are an expert on something you're not. Rather than bending reality in your favor, downplay your needs by saying less and listening more.

You could talk up a storm today, acting as if your fantasies are actually based in reality. However, you're not as pragmatic as you seem while your key planet Venus squares wild Uranus, making unusual experiences more enticing than familiar ones. Even if your goals are attainable now, you still might misjudge the resources needed to reach your destination. Your imagination will lead you astray if you let it, but potential rewards are worth the risk. Just don't go too far out on a limb before you know how much weight it can actually support.

People wonder how you can get away with expressing yourself as boldly as you do today. Meanwhile, you're thrilled because it seems like your most colorful dreams are ripe for harvest. However, you might mistakenly believe that your radical tastes are simply too weird to share with those around you. You may suddenly realize how much you aren't saying for fear of being judged because of your eclectic desires. Ultimately, reigning in your rebellious attitude just enough to slip under the radar makes more sense now than blowing your own horn.

You might not receive the clarity you seek today no matter how hard you try to find it. Unfortunately, you won't likely surrender your search before turning into your own worst enemy in the process. You can't help but think what it would be like if everything was new and different now, but it's not. Even if you desire more excitement in your routine, you're not ready to sacrifice your long-term security to live on the edge. Instead of making any drastic changes, continue to wander around in your imagination while still exploring your options.

The bottom line is you want more adventure in your life and you're willing to say yes if the right invitation comes along. Even if you have a viable plan to realize your dreams now, you might be tempted to discard it suddenly for a new pursuit. Happily, people seem to support your current decisions but they miss the mark when trying to understand what you really want. You may feel quite restless but it's not yet time to make a break for the future. Maintain the status quo the best you can while preparing to make your big move. Success doesn't happen overnight.

Hiding your emotions isn't a sensible choice today, thus making it impossible to go along with the group consensus. You may resist the flow because you're uncertain of what will happen next, especially if you feel others are conspiring to prevent you from reaching your dreams. Your best move is to avoid being overly attached to your desires now because your fears are strengthened when you worry about things you can't control. Taking care of your current needs is what matters more than anything else.

You're stuck in the middle of conflicting strategies now, and you cannot possibly take both paths. Even if you feel like time has run out, you're not ready to close the door to one opportunity in favor of another one. Normally, exercising flexibility brings you strength, but your current inability to make a decision can be unsettling. No matter how ambivalent you are, just choose a path and move forward without looking back. Any action today is better than none at all.

Although you are known for sticking to your principles, you still might be tempted to take the easy way out today. Your desires are swinging back and forth now, making them more difficult to defend. Additionally, words don't necessarily come easily if you try to explain your position to those who may not support your dreams. Ultimately, your inner process isn't anyone else's business; sharing your secrets is totally optional and should only be done to further your cause.

You are forever the optimist and usually don't see anything wrong with asking for what you want. However, life is complicated these days because your desires are drawing you far outside the social norm and you're afraid people won't understand your unorthodox needs. Your imagination is running wild today, challenging you to combine your fantasies with reality. Fortunately, expressing your emotions may be the catalyst to start the alchemical reaction that propels you to your destination of choice.

Your current situation at work may present you with a fascinating conundrum; however, you don't like riddles that are unsolvable. Your problem is that you may be unexpectedly attracted to the very same kind of uncertainty that you normally avoid. Rather than being drawn to someone because of their apparent stability, you're enchanted by the person with the most eccentric ideas now, even if they have no practical value. However, if you're willing to take a risk, you may discover a priceless treasure.

It's tricky to turn an innovative idea into something tangible today, even if you receive a blast of creative energy. Unfortunately, you may think you're wasting time trying to accomplish the impossible. However, your emotions are on edge and you're eager to push past any resistance. A sudden fascination stirs feelings that conflict with your logic but don't try to rationalize what's in your heart now. Follow your bliss; the crazier your dreams, the more satisfaction you can achieve.

You reserve the right to march to your own drummer now as you practice a nonconformist strategy. You're not interested in being a part of the team or fitting into complex family dynamics at home while you're driven to distinguish yourself from the crowd. Your courage is inspirational, but people must be free to choose to break the rules in their own unique ways. Nevertheless, don't miss your chance to wildly abandon restraint and dance to the music you hear within.

Rushing around just doesn't work today because you may have to go back and do things over again. If you have specific tasks that must be completed, you're probably overeager to finish them as quickly as possible. However, you could get mired down in red tape unless you take each step in the proper order. As boring as it sounds, it's more efficient to follow accepted procedures from the beginning than to bolt ahead without regard for the rules. Haste makes waste.

Finding your creative groove comes naturally today if you limit your activities from the start. Obviously, you want to have something tangible to show for your efforts, but you might sabotage your good intentions by jumping from one idea to another. The more definitive you can be when describing your goal, the less trouble you will have when executing your plan. Don't try to build an entire house now; instead, narrow your vision and eliminate extraneous activities for the best results.

You may resist the restrictions being placed on you now, but they are for your own good. Three planets traveling through rambling Gemini encourage you to spread your energy between family and professional matters. However, you can't do an acceptable job if you need to be two places at once. Thankfully, the laser-like Virgo Moon forces you to tighten your focus. Be grateful for the cosmic reminder; concentrating your efforts now leads to enjoying a wider palette of possibilities later on.

People might commend your high level of efficiency today, but you don't necessarily believe you deserve the compliment. Whether you're holding on to residual emotions from yesterday's craziness or playing out noisy scenarios in your mind, you feel more scattered now than anyone realizes. It helps to acknowledge the gulf between your subjective and objective worlds without making it an issue for others. Fortunately, your inner life won't get in the way of your progress unless you choose to make it a problem. Work now, worry later.

You bring a whole new level of awareness to your work today and it can inspire you to perform your job more effectively. Instead of just going through the motions while doing a task, you're considering more economical ways to be productive. It doesn't matter whether or not your analysis pays off with a new method of doing your job. What's important is your improved attitude which positively influences everything you do. Your single-minded approach will generate results you cannot yet imagine.

Maintaining high standards at work is what you do best, but sometimes your drive for perfection gets in the way of your production. However, your conscientious outlook is apparent in everything you undertake now, enabling you to accomplish more than anyone expects. Fortunately, you can draw energy from a deep well of reserve today as long as you don't wander from your task. Aim high, keep your eyes on the target and your shoulder to the wheel.

You may not appear any different from the outside today, but something significant has changed and you know it. Although you might feel weary from being bounced around by strong emotional currents, you aren't willing to just drift along with the flow. Go inward and find your center of gravity because you have the power of perseverance on your side now. Establish priorities based on your long-term goals and don't let anyone talk you out of your plans. Be like the little engine that made it up the mountain by repeating, "I think I can, I think I can."

Your dreams are so pragmatic today that it's hard to distinguish them from a business plan. Fortunately, you are so perceptive now that your logical analysis won't lead you astray. But it's smarter to rework a previous idea than come up with new ones while retrograde Mercury is revisiting old territory. Thankfully, you won't reach a wrong conclusion if you start out with solid facts. Your associates offer good advice that augments your strategy, but their thoughts may not be any better than yours. Rely on your inner compass to lead you in the right direction.

There are several alternative paths in front of you now, but one probably stands out as the most direct route for reaching your professional goals. However, it seems as if everyone has a different plan for your future, but listening to others as they expound on their ideas is only helpful for a while. Knowing when to excuse yourself from the conversation is crucial, for your answer will come from within only after the external noise settles down. Ultimately, no one can decide your next step but you.

It's tempting to take on so many tasks today that you can't do a masterful job on any one of them. Several planets buzzing around in fragmented Gemini are activating your 6th House of Routine, thwarting your efforts to zero in on any single objective. Nevertheless, you must overcome your current inclination to scatter your energy willy-nilly. Set your sights on one exciting destination and let all others temporarily fall away from your view. Cultivate a laser-like approach to your work, for success will be yours if you can maintain your focus.

Your intuition won't let you down today, but you must listen to your inner voice for it to be of value. Unfortunately, setting aside the facts isn't your usual style, but a hunch that comes from out of the blue could defy common sense. Remember, the most ingenious thinking isn't necessarily linear, especially as the rational Virgo Moon connects with shadowy Pluto in your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. The truth doesn't arrive in a straight line, so trust the process and follow the zigs and zags for the most surprising results.

Although you might like to dream your way to success, the Virgo Moon keeps you on a straight and narrow path today. Even if you want to escape, there's little opportunity to fade into the fuzziness of your imagination now. Your coworkers want you to succeed because they also benefit from your accomplishments. Collaboration currently works in your favor; being part of the team is easier when you are interacting with people you trust.

You may solve a problem at work through sheer  willpower, enabling you to turn a sticky situation to your advantage. However, you also realize your small victory is part of a larger issue for which there's no fast and easy fix. Meanwhile, criticism about your productivity shifts from logistical concerns, opening the door to an ideological power struggle. Your wisest strategy now is non-engagement because once a conflict is underway, you lose even if you win. Make peace, not war.

There's no need to make a quick decision about an ongoing project today because the more time spent in the revision process, the deeper you can go in reassessing your resources. And although you have something practical to learn now, it's still tempting to take the easy way out in order to end an unpleasant conflict. Think long and hard about your current choices, for the consequences of your actions will likely be longer lasting than you realize. Your integrity counts more than anything else.

You've had more than your fair share of doing exactly what others expect from you. You are eager for more fun and games in your life, even if you have important obligations to meet today. Luckily, you will be quite productive if you buckle down and concentrate on your work. You can't help but feel wonderful when you have something tangible to show for your efforts. Take care of business right off the bat so you have the time to run off in search of your favorite distractions later in the day.

Simmering relationship tension raises uncomfortable issues today, even if everything appears copacetic on the surface. Although you may do your best to avoid confrontation, you can't help but notice there's a showdown brewing. Your gut tells you to retreat, yet you could be cajoled into reacting emotionally if you're unsure of where the current changes will lead. Nevertheless, don't over-inflate the importance of the present moment. Instead, look at this interaction as  one part of a long-term positive shift in the overall pattern of your life.

The rapid pace of events makes you believe that your schedule is out of control today, but it's not too chaotic for you to effectively manage your affairs. However, you might feel overwhelmed later in the day, especially if you're already thinking of everything you must do tomorrow. Don't get stressed out over how much you have to finish. Thankfully, your worries are worse than the reality; starting with a can-do attitude makes your work more pleasant right from the start.

You are doing your best to keep the lid on your emotions, but you might have a minor meltdown today, revealing your doubts about your ability to handle your current workload. However, the pendulum is swinging the other way now as you find the time to catch up or even get ahead. Setting priorities is crucial, for it's important to know when to let go and move on to what's next. Your confidence will return when you are able to make noticeable progress toward achieving your goals.

Just because you're not talking about your feelings today doesn't mean they are non-existent. But, your silence won't necessarily improve your chances of reaching your goals, either. Although your thoughts may be flying all over the place, it's still hard to turn any of them into concrete reality now. This doesn't mean they are bad ideas; it simply indicates that your timing might be off if you push too hard. Your optimism returns later in the day and you should be able to move forward again, as long as you don't try to make up for lost ground.

Your self-criticism continues to grow lighter day by day. In fact, you might even take a tentative step and acknowledge that you did a great job, even if it didn't turn out exactly as expected. Happily, you are in touch with a more nurturing side of yourself now. But you can do even more good by expressing your feelings outwardly, so shower your unrelenting support on those you love. Your positive energy ripples outward in unimaginable ways, returning joy to you in the process.

You can experiment with letting down your guard today, even if you recently had to hold a position of authority longer than you wanted. If your command was successful, you will be able to relax and allow events at work to run their course. But even if your reign hasn't produced your desired results, it's still a good idea to back off and let someone else take charge. Knowing when to relinquish power is the sign of a confident leader. You don't have to be the star of the show to share in the success.

You might be so intent on reaching the top of the mountain that you could trip and fall if you don't watch where your feet are going today. You must turn your vision into something concrete, but this can be tricky business if your mind is wandering so far off into the future that you're no longer interested in engaging in the present moment. There's nothing wrong with daydreaming when your work is done, but you could end up in trouble now unless you keep your focus on what's right in front of you every step of the way.

Complications keep popping up now no matter how hard you try to get your schedule under control. It's not that you long for simplicity; in fact, you enjoy the creative buzz when there's a lot happening around you, as long as you can figure out where you fit into the picture. Luckily, your path becomes more obvious as the day wears on. There's no time like the present to embark on an adventure that sets you on the road to your destiny.

You can usually rely on your intuition to steer you in the right direction, but something is slightly off center today, challenging you to make healthy choices. Unfortunately, your self-confidence may suffer when you realize your tried-and-true approach to problem solving just isn't working right now. You can't close your eyes, assuming the Force will guide you safely to your destination. Recognizing your predicament enables you to trust your logic over your imagination when it matters most. Let the facts speak for themselves.

If a recent disagreement with a friend or lover created feelings of distrust, you have an opportunity to heal the rift today. Unfortunately, you could be accused of being negative if you attempt to address an uncomfortable subject. Thankfully, there's no need for complete resolution now; speak your mind and then move on. Your calm and rational approach demonstrates your willingness to compromise. Communication is a two-way street, but taking the high road inspires others to do the same.

You won't get the immediate results you seek today, but you're likely to rationalize your behavior, nonetheless. However, if you stretch your thinking a bit, you can discover new ways to handle a recurring problem at work. Stepping back and re-prioritizing your responsibilities is a worthy use of your time but you're more comfortable keeping things the way they are now. However, reconsidering your overall strategy allows you to break through your resistance and plan for the future with a hopeful heart.

You're probably feeling slightly lackadaisical about making significant headway on a big project today. The evocative Moon in your 5th House of Spontaneity is busy hooking up with all the planets in happy-go-lucky Gemini, blessing you with an effervescent outlook on life. Enjoy the lighthearted energy now, since your playful approach to the day might surprisingly provide a generous boost in your productivity. Your childlike curiosity knows no bounds.

You might try to keep your thoughts to yourself today, but somehow they escape from your lips anyway. However, it's critical to carefully consider your message because your words pack more power these days than you realize. Fortunately, your clever mental agility combined with a strong conviction in your beliefs is an unbeatable recipe for success. You can persuade others to see things from your point of view now, as long as your heart is invested in what you say. Decide what matters most and then get busy asking for the support you need to make your dreams come true.

These are cosmically auspicious times that can bring you closer to your goals if you're willing to stand up and walk your talk. Words seem to flow off your tongue smoothly when you tell people about your ideas for the future. But idle chatter becomes an endless distraction today, making it especially important to galvanize your thoughts into actions before your momentum fades. Accomplishing nearly anything you set your mind to is possible now if your behavior is aligned with your passion.

Taking care of the simplest tasks today may be more complicated than it appears at first. Thankfully, the Moon's current visit to your 2nd House of Resources supports your efforts to make the most of everything you do. Nevertheless, dig beneath the surface for missing pieces of information that might have significant consequences before signing an agreement or handing over any cash. If you are clear with your intentions and precise with your words, you will cross the finish line with flying colors.

You have a plethora of ingenious ideas that all seem worth pursuing today, but you can't turn every flash of inspiration into dramatic action. Rather than attempting to be a superhero, simply write down your most innovative thoughts. Even the most amazing epiphanies could quickly fade back into the hidden depths of your unconscious if you don't fill in all the details. Create a masterful plan now but wait to put it into motion until the timing feels right.

You may be able to clear up a lingering problem today, even if it's been bothering you for a while. Nevertheless, you could inadvertently mix up your facts as trickster Mercury plays a wild card while retrograding through your 8th House of Transformation. Although you aren't normally inclined toward sloppy thinking, you are so focused on getting the right answers now that you could stumble in the process. Watch your step; success is within reach as long as you pay careful attention to the thin line between truth and illusion.

Unresolved issues could sneak in amidst friendly gestures today as the diplomatic Libra Moon sashays through your 11th House of Groups, encouraging you to act graciously. Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible to tell if a topic is significant enough to address now or if it's only a temporary frustration. Thankfully, you can get away with taking the course of least resistance for a while, leaving the heavy lifting for some other day. Playing nicely with others cultivates a harmonious environment and a better night's sleep.

You may be busily chasing your tail today without accomplishing very much at all. You might even revisit the very same pitfalls over and over again in your race to finish your work. Fortunately, you're able to shake up the dynamics by discussing your concerns with a trusted colleague. Participating in an honest dialogue about your objectives allows others to offer you valuable support, helping you to break out of the vicious cycle. Gaining objectivity serves you well if you truly want to create positive change.

Your ability to conjure up the future of your choice is greatly heightened by the reflective Moon's presence in your 9th House of Adventure. Oddly enough, your current optimism encourages others to seek out your approval for their own dreams. Although you are pleased people are asking for your opinion, you're not sure why anyone thinks you know enough to give them advice now. Save the self-questioning for some other day and help out however you can. Just make sure to leave enough time to manifest your own exciting plans while the magic of the cosmos is at your fingertips.

You might think you're being completely rational today but your feelings are actually running the show. Ironically, you could use fancy rhetoric to demonstrate your analytical skills, only to become so emotionally charged that your message loses its impact. If you feel secure within the context of your own life, you don't have to share your process with everyone else. Mercury's retrograde dance in your 4th House of Security makes it tricky to say what's on your mind. Actions speak louder than words; the more generous and kind you are with others, the better it will be for everyone involved.

You're on the edge of your seat, anxious to embark on your next adventure. However, relationships demand your attention while the reflective Libra Moon floats through your 7th House of Partnerships. Whether your interactions with others are difficult or comforting today, you may find yourself reconnecting with people from your past and returning to familiar conversations. Luckily, you might even uncover a long-lost memory that will come in handy in the future. Keep an open mind and a receptive heart for the best results.

Your loyalty is tested as coworkers waver on their promises, but don't let anyone's lack of commitment throw you off course. Mercury's current reversal prompts everyone to rethink priorities and reevaluate previous decisions. You don't have to let the uncertainty rattle your foundation. Stay grounded in simple activities that bring you pleasure. Work in your garden, walk your dog or dance to your favorite music. Save your concerns for now: there's no need to worry about things that probably won't happen anyway.

Your overactive imagination acts as both a blessing and a curse today. The world sparkles a little brighter but nothing is exactly as it seems while mischievous Mercury retrogrades into a square with surreal Neptune. Give yourself plenty of breathing room to sort out your options. Although people are unusually unpredictable now, it's best not to sweat the small stuff since surprises keep your life interesting. Use all the colors in the crayon box, but don't sign on any dotted lines.

Keeping your relationships and work life in balance requires a great deal of emotional energy. You may be feeling overwhelmed now as you attempt to stay on top of the most pressing matters and try to please everyone who demands your attention. Thankfully, your living space provides a natural refuge and place of comfort as the reflective Moon shines in your 4th House of Home and Family. Retreat from the busy world as soon as possible and indulge in some good old-fashioned rest and relaxation. The person you need to take care of most today is you.

Recent turbulent circumstances with family members and friends have taught you how to open your heart and adapt more gracefully to life's curve balls. Today's artistic Libra Moon highlights your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, bringing creative ideas and fascinating people into your world. You heart-centered Leos know how to show up for those in need when it counts; now it's time to enjoy the love that others want to shower on you.

Your finely-tuned analytical mind has been working overtime since cerebral Mercury turned retrograde last week. Although your employment situation remains stressful and family obligations occupy most of your personal time, powerful cosmic forces are conspiring to help you now. Just when you think you can't fill your brain with one more detail, much-needed support arrives in an unexpected package. It doesn't really matter if it's from a boss, a friend or a stranger. Don't look a gift horse in the mouth; just open the door and let it in.

People have been so unpredictable lately that they may be getting on your nerves. Luckily, you have the skills of a natural diplomat and intuitively know how to smooth their feathers. Your charm can coax them back into their more agreeable and likable selves. This talent for turning difficult situations into good ones pays off now as your friendship and loyalty are rewarded. Count your blessings today and find a way to celebrate.

Not everything is at it appears while the evocative Moon travels through your 12th House of Secrets and Mysteries. However, you are wise to resist going into detective-mode today to figure out what people are thinking or hiding; instead tune into a big-picture view of your life. Is it time to let go of troublesome people? Are you ready to ditch old unproductive habits? Quiet your mind now and turn inward for the answers to the most insistent questions. The busy world of complications can wait.

If your natural optimism has been dinged due to recent life changes, you could use a break to reclaim your center. If responsibilities are weighing you down, the Moon's presence in your 11th House of Groups lightens your load with supportive friends, fun events and networking opportunities. It's time to circulate, so accept the invitation you were wondering about. Delegate a few tasks to others if you can and embrace the love and goodwill coming your way.

Like a butterfly emerging from a chrysalis, your life has been in an ongoing process of transformation. You have seen more than your fair share of difficulties and have had obstacles to overcome. It hasn't necessarily been easy, but you are gaining a foothold and now your hard work is beginning to pay off. Stay focused, even if conflicting information battles for your attention today. Handle each situation with grace; fortunately, no one knows how to take care of business better than you.

You have so many choices in front of you now that it may be challenging to decide what you want to do next. While nothing needs to be permanently settled yet, consider getting out of your familiar environment and exploring someplace new and different. Your world is opening up in exciting and wonderful ways as the Libra Moon lights up your 9th House of Adventure. Keep your options open today, for you will soon receive information that will help you make excellent long-term decisions. Patience isn't merely a virtue; it's required.

At your best, you are psychically attuned to the vibes, thoughts and emotions of others. Ordinarily, these extrasensory talents help you make your best decisions. But with Mercury moving backward through changeable Gemini, it seems as if people barely know what they are thinking themselves and you're likely to tune into a tangled mess of contradictions. Do yourself a favor and retract your antennae, for luckily nothing needs to be nailed down today. Persistent problems will be easier to solve once you have more clarity.

Your plans begin to fall in place today as you gather more information about your partner's vision of the future. However, you need more time to find common ground since you still have important details to work out. Unfortunately, you can't apply everything you discover now, so store what you learn for later when you can use it. Don't act prematurely; listen, observe, and deepen your perspective as much as possible while reevaluating the relationship dynamics. No hurry; no worry.

You might have big expenses on the horizon that require you to spend more than you planned. Naturally, you Bulls like to feel secure about your monetary situation but lingering concerns may be plaguing you now. Your key planet Venus moves into your 4th House of Security today, encouraging you to take a more practical approach in your relationships. Paradoxically, you may be tempted now to shake everything up for the sake of change. But be careful about overreacting and creating more complications. Meet others halfway or you could miss out on the love that's already in your life.

Your social life receives an energetic boost when charming Venus moves into your 3rd House of Communications today. It's a lot more fun to talk about how much you enjoy the company of your friends, rather than exposing your vulnerability with a more intimate emotional interaction. Fortunately, there's no reason to fret over how to best express your feelings when you're with people you trust. Simply let go and flirt with the edge; your heart is happiest when a bit of excitement is added to the mix.

Your perspective on love is about to change, but first you must look back over the past several weeks to reevaluate what the planet of beauty has already brought to your life. Continue to build on what you have now that sweet Venus is moving out of your sign to enter your 2nd House of Resources. Although this is an opportune time to stabilize relationships, you may still be toying with the idea of starting a new one. Breaking free of the structured routine might feel good for a day or two, but don't forget to leave a trail of breadcrumbs so you can find your way back.

There's no valid justification to keep your feelings quiet today. But it is crucial to make sure that your current agenda is in your best interest because it's all too tempting to get carried away with your desires now. Watch your step, for you could be more flirtatious than you realize with amorous Venus influencing your 1st House of Self. Remember, all your actions have consequences. In the final analysis, the choice is yours.

You could miss a wonderful chance to express your desires today if you are so afraid of negative consequences that you remain silent. Luckily, all is not lost since there will be new opportunities in the near future. Nevertheless, you increase the likelihood of happiness if you can transform your attachment to personal love into something more spiritual as sensual Venus moves through your soulful 12th House for the next several months. Adopting a grateful heart is a good first place to start.

Your self-image may be distorted now; nevertheless, you believe that you have something very personal to hide today. However, revealing your secrets is easier and more enjoyable than you expect. Your key planet Venus is opening your heart in new ways while jovial Jupiter boosts your confidence. It's quite possible to take a feeling too far, but acting in a responsible manner could avert a potential mess later on.

You're eager to put on a show now that magnetic Venus starts to draw attention to your 10th House of Public Status. However, you aren't sure how much effort you should devote to a current project while you're juggling conflicts between your personal desires and professional obligations. The good news is you may receive recognition from people who only know you only through your work since you're so adept at compartmentalizing your life. Just accept the positive feedback wherever it appears with the appropriate amount of gratitude and humility.

Coasting through the day sounds like a marvelous idea, especially if you are working too hard. Nevertheless, your unchecked desires can take you on a detour as it gets tougher to maintain the balance between fantasy and reality. Although your heart and your head are pulling in opposite directions, you don't need to be afraid to share your personal dilemma. In fact, your vulnerability makes you more lovable. There's no need to give up on the idea of fun just because you haven't a clue as to what to do next.

You may believe your life will fall apart unless you act maturely. Believe it or not, there is a time and a place for letting go of responsibilities, too. Don't be so rational today; instead, indulge your passions for a change. There's no need to judge yourself negatively just because you want to have a good time. You have already done your fair share of the labor so go ahead and release your inner child and explore your imagination. Play now, work later.

You could fall in love with the idea of love now, whether or not you're in the market for romance. Flirty Venus dances into your 7th House of Relationships to add sparkle to your interactions with nearly everyone. You can also feel the optimistic buzz from giant Jupiter, overpowering your need for stability. Go ahead and explore all the possibilities without choosing any particular one. Following your heart inspires you to make the best choices for your future, but there's no need to complicate a lovely day with too many promises.

There's no magical escape route today, so you might as well buckle in and get busy. Thankfully, congenial Venus makes work more pleasant once she moves into your 6th House of Employment. Nevertheless, you might scheme and dream about breaking free to avoid your obligations to others. However, you could actually enjoy helping someone else now even more than fulfilling your own needs. It does one's heart good to be of service to others.

You wish you were free enough to say whatever you want, but you realize that your chances of finding happiness are greater if you keep some things to yourself. You want to be accepted for who you are, yet your brusque manner could rub others the wrong way. Thankfully, you understand that reaching your goals today is more important than how you get there and you're willing to moderate your aggressive approach to appease others. Take everyone's feelings into consideration since the ends don't always justify the means.

You're a formidable opponent today, even if you prefer to steer clear of conflict. Your unwavering patience and single-minded resolve can wear someone down who stands in your way. You gain strength from your ability to avoid arguments, even if there are obvious differences of opinion. Gentle persuasion brings the results you seek without having to raise your voice or push anyone's emotional buttons. Hold your ground and wait for others to come to their senses and agree with your point of view.

You are reluctant to share your feelings now, but your quiet acceptance of a close friend or partner helps to create a more harmonious atmosphere. It's apparent there's nothing to be gained now by effusive rants or frantic melodramas. Enjoy the peaceful energy while it lasts, but remember that it might just be a temporary eye of a hurricane. Don't worry about justifying your goals to anyone today; you are well equipped to share your story as long as you're not in a rush to prove your point. Keep calm and carry on.

Someone might be secretly pulling the strings from behind the scenes to manipulate the current course of events. However, you aren't willing to give up your power now until you try to bend reality in your direction. Interacting with others is challenging if you believe you don't know the whole truth. But rather than wasting time attempting to uncover anyone's hidden agenda, just concentrate on your own positive actions, instead. Happiness is within reach as long as you realize that it comes from within.

You have a clear sense of what's possible and what's not. More importantly, your generosity of spirit plays a significant role in achieving your goals today. Your charm is readily apparent while Venus is sparkling in your 1st House of Personality, and her easy trine to karmic Saturn gives you a realistic outlook on life. You can successfully push the edges of the current stability by taking a calculated risk now. Thankfully, decisions about money or love will likely turn out for the best as long as you remember to weigh your options carefully before making your move.

You possess a sharp clarity of mind today that breaks through the fog, allowing you to feel confident about an important choice you must make. You can see your life unfolding and you know what to do to create the future as you envision it. However, it is a mistake to think your current decision is the final one because logical Mercury is still retrograde in your 10th House of Status. Although you have a general idea of what it takes to reach your destination, there are still specifics to be determined. Give yourself some breathing room so you can recalibrate your direction as needed.

Managing your relationships may require kid gloves today as you attempt to balance your need to express yourself with your desire to sidestep conflict. You want to be among friends now, but not at the cost of losing some facet of your self-identity. Thankfully, you are a force to be reckoned with now as authoritative Saturn harmonizes with resourceful Venus. Combining kindness with honesty enables you to get the best from both worlds.

It's apparent to you that a special relationship is more complicated than it seems to everyone else. You know what you need, but you may be hesitant to agitate things in a way that could disturb the status quo. Fortunately, you are blessed with trustworthy friends who may not tell you what you want to hear, but their honest opinions are sound, nonetheless. The current window of opportunity won't last, so don't procrastinate. If you want another perspective, ask before it's too late.

Your friends and relatives may grow weary of your avoidance tactics today because it's clear you don't want to be pinned down. Although you prefer to keep your options open, people are pressuring you to tell them your opinion without talking in vague generalities. Don't let your current resistance to making a commitment turn your closest allies into unexpected enemies. Focus on building stability, not upsetting it. Appreciating your loved ones in the present moment allows you to honor your relationships without compromising your ideals.

Your desire to find pleasure today may not be obvious to everyone else. However, your ruling planet Saturn is basking in the warmth of delicious Venus, encouraging you to share the sweetness of life with those you love. However, your current laid-back attitude doesn't mean you're carefree enough to ignore your responsibilities. Although Venus motivates you to follow your heart now, you still have a difficult time letting go of your obligations. Sign your own permission slip and take the day off.

You may be quite serious about relationships today as responsible Saturn trines romantic Venus in your 7th House of Others. Nevertheless, you still want to be seen as someone who knows how to have a good time. Your current emotional fulfillment depends on finding a balance. Your best strategy is to inspire your friends to join in your creative pursuits. However, achieving satisfaction is more likely if you don't set your goals too high. Engaging life without any expectations now gives you a wide latitude to experience happiness.

You know more than you are saying today, but no one can get you to spill the beans while the Moon is hiding out in your 12th House of Secrets. Perhaps someone told you something in confidence, or maybe you haven't yet put your developing ideas into words. Either way, your friends appreciate your trustworthiness because they understand that you will divulge what is necessary when the time is right. But don't confuse your current need for privacy with alienation. You can still be close to those you love without sharing everything on your mind.

You could spend a lot of time thinking about your future, but might remain stuck in a routine that's tough to break now. Dreaming about what you want your life to look like is much easier today than putting your ideas into motion. Thankfully, there's no urgency to initiate action yet; the time for manifestation will come soon enough. Instead, simply consider the positives and negatives of each option without becoming attached to any single outcome. Reexamining all the angles has you sitting pretty for when you're ready to make your move.

You're excited about your solution to a lingering problem at work, but the situation could turn out to be more complex than you realize. Even if your plan seems solid, it won't necessarily work unless you're willing to modify it on the fly in response to the unfolding events. Don't let a lack of imagination stand between you and success. Rather than trying to defend your initial idea, be appreciative of any feedback you receive and make revisions as needed. A true sign of strength is knowing when to ask for help.

Although others are counting on you to finish your regular chores, you're eager to do something spectacular today. Thankfully, you're clever enough to pull off doing both. Nevertheless, your wagging tongue and cavalier attitude could land you in trouble if you casually say something that people take the wrong way. Remember, you really don't need to have the last word in every conversation. Even if you know you're right, remain silent now for the sake of keeping the peace.

You may think that your friends who should be supporting you are ambivalent or possibly even working against you. However, accusing anyone of foul play could leave you feeling out of sorts today. But a short fuse on anyone's part feeds your insecurities and transform an unintentional mistake into a serious squabble. Luckily, you can change the dynamics by letting everyone know how you feel instead of trying to convince others your position is right. Dropping your defenses and starting an honest dialogue opens a path to common ground.

You might grow annoyed when you realize that a current conversation feels hauntingly familiar. In fact, you've probably had this very same discussion before and its reappearance now indicates the issue hasn't been resolved. Unfortunately, it's not likely to be settled today either, so don't push too hard for a quick fix. A mutually acceptable conclusion to this difference of opinion can't be forced; an agreement will come naturally on its own schedule if you can find the patience to trust the process.

You realize what's expected of you today and you're resigned to fulfill your commitments, even if your heart isn't in it. Thankfully, you can keep your doubts to yourself and still go through the necessary motions quite effectively. However, there's a price to pay because the consistent stress will ultimately tire you out. There is no logical reason to wait until exhaustion sets in; take a breather and get the rest you need as soon as there's a break in the action.

Although you appear to be the quintessential friend today, you could be hiding your anger out of respect for someone else. Thankfully, you can downplay any negativity now because of the strength of your convictions. The bottom line is you don't want to make waves and draw attention to your feelings; you prefer to offer your objective eye and creative hand to those around you in a gesture of support. The appreciation you are likely to receive will fill your heart with joy.

You could act in a self-righteous manner if you are certain that you have found the correct answer to a difficult question. Initially, it's just a matter of happily announcing your solution to everyone, but your disclosure might turn ugly if someone disagrees and decides to push back. A conflict may spread like a brush fire now, sparking new hot spots along the way. There are many roads that lead to the same destination; thankfully, the heat will subside when you accept that the wisdom of others is worthy of consideration, too.

People might complain about working with you if you are rigid about your schedule today. However, you can't even see how stubborn you are now; in fact, you may actually think your approach is extremely flexible. The simple proof is in how well you get along with your coworkers. If you can sense any hostility, rest assured it will swiftly dissipate if you are more willing to cooperate. Changing your attitude turns an adversarial relationship into a collaborative one without a lot of stress.

You may wake up convinced that there won't be sufficient time to finish all the work on your plate today. Or, maybe you're concerned that there isn't enough cash on hand to meet your current commitments. But even if your worries are justified now, it's still helpful if you can replace some of your apprehension with a dash of hope and trust. Having faith in your ability to manage all the moving pieces works in your favor as long as you remember to balance it with a touch of reality.

Your ability to solve complex problems is usually strengthened by your powers of deduction. But even if you have already reexamined your options, your current desires are conflicting with your rational style now. Unfortunately, the evocative Moon's return to your sign doesn't make your life less complicated, since you wish your feelings weren't getting in the way of an already tough predicament. The simple act of honoring your emotions can teach you a valuable lesson you might otherwise miss.

Fitting into family functions or group activities can be awkward today because you don't want everyone to know your true feelings. You might see yourself as an outsider now, but retreating from people will likely bring the attention you wish to avoid. Although confronting your fears is advisable, your current emotional vulnerability could make any situation seem overwhelming. However, rather than taking everything so personally, adopting a more spiritual approach helps you put your life in proper perspective.

Your choices are as murky as mud today, yet you're ready to boldly take on the world in spite of the confusion. Allow as much time as possible before making a critical decision because an impulsive judgment call could lead you down a dead-end path, even if you believe you're doing the right thing. It's crucial to figure out the truth first, for faulty assumptions only create tension in your interactions with others. For now, playing out fantasies in your imagination is safer than doing it in the real world.

You might not be able to figure what to do next because of conflicting instructions you receive from your boss. Instead of attempting to gain additional clarity about your professional goals, it's wise to step back now and let the issues resolve on their own. However, there's no reason to hesitate on an important personal decision just because you feel blocked at work. You can still make significant progress on the home front if you're willing to reach a little further and try a little harder for the benefit of those you love.

Although you could have all your facts gathered neatly in place, you still may draw an incorrect conclusion from all the right data. It's as if you set a trap for yourself by taking every thought too far today. It's one thing to know what is true; it's a completely different issue to turn your stacks of information into a successful game plan. Think again before initiating any action you might soon regret. Review your assumptions one last time to make sure you're on the right track.

Your psychic sense seems right on target today and you don't really care about justifying your choices. You are so confident of your intuition now that you trust your feelings without a second thought. Although your hunches may be uncannily correct, it's still challenging to discern a causal relationship between the facts at your disposal and your emotional response to the situation. Stop over-analyzing everything; just follow your heart and hope for the best.

You can tell there are emotional dynamics that are beyond your range of experience, but you can't quite put your finger on them. Although you may be relying more on your intuitive accuracy now because it seems to be working better than ever, you would be wise to treat this newly found skill with care. Even if the likelihood of being correct is good, the odds are not perfect. Don't assume you are right until you back up your conclusions with reality. Trust your instincts, but listening to a second opinion never hurts.

You are closing in on a significant personal or professional breakthrough, but you must suspend your disbelief in order to make the leap. Unfortunately, progress will be difficult to come by now if you develop your plans based only upon logical analysis. Instead of sticking to rational thought to find your answers, take a leap of faith into your limitless imagination. Nothing is holding you back from fulfilling your destiny except your fear of the unknown.

Often you are blessed in having the Scales of Libra assisting you in weighing and balancing the facts. Although you're usually a champ when it comes to seeing both sides of an issue, your ability to remain objective is probably unreliable today. Your current desire to find an immediate answer throws you off balance, swaying you one way or the other. You might not be certain of what you want but any choice you make now could do more to decide your future than you realize. Reconsidering the alternatives to cover all your bases is surely in your best interest.

You might have an odd feeling that the fates have something special in store for you today. However, you may have a hard time knowing how to connect with your destiny. Your current uncertainty about your professional goals could muddle your strategy at work. To make matters worse, dreams from the past resurface to confuse your present aspirations with older ambitions. Thankfully, once you give yourself permission to float for a few days, you won't be so frustrated by your lack of commitment. Too much searching often blinds the eye that seeks yet never finds.

It's prudent to avoid starting a major project today because you could easily mislead yourself about the amount of resources you will need to complete your work. Your exuberance may morph into discouragement as the reality of the situation begins to dawn on you. Your best bet is to use your time effectively by shifting into planning mode today. Buoyant Jupiter empowers you to see the big picture now, but it's wiser to swing into motion a few days after Mercury turns direct. Waiting for the wind to blow in your direction makes all the difference in the world.

Your ever-present need for stability could be challenged by a strange and enigmatic situation today. The more you attempt to untangle the complexity of the politics on the job, the more perplexing the dynamics become. You may dream of retreating to safer ground, but even the return path is more complicated than you remember. Relax; once you stop struggling, the answers will come from within.

Your mind is racing a mile a minute and little will prevent you from sharing your opinions today. Unfortunately, you could talk too much and turn a concise thought into a rambling string of unwieldy concepts that bewilders others. You can state your case clearly if you use fewer words, but don't oversimplify everything by assuming that your actions speak louder than your words. You still must clarify your intentions now since no one will understand your true motivation without a clear explanation. Thankfully, you're a genius at knowing exactly what to say.

It's your second nature to tap into mysterious energies from parallel universes, but you can't always rationally account for the results. The reflective Moon's current visit to your spiritual sign is just the tip of the cosmic iceberg today. Any attempts to resist the otherworldly planetary forces at work now may produce weird results. The outcome is equally difficult if you push your personal agenda too aggressively. Taking a wait-and-see position is your best move to cultivate peace of mind. Give reality a chance to catch up to your colorful imagination.

You can become a superhero today, but you must overcome your current tendency to take the course of least resistance and just roll with the incoming waves. Fortunately, warrior Mars is working on your behalf now, assisting you in your task of defying the laws of nature. Discovering the solution to a problem is the easy part; the tricky part is mustering up some uncharacteristic persistence. Once you have a plan, lock onto it with unflagging determination. Don't trade the  satisfaction of a job well done for a shot at transient pleasure. Put on your cape and save the day.

Even the most boring day can have a surprising twist, taking you on an unexpected detour. It's as if you stepped onto a magic carpet that has a mind of its own. You're not in control now, but you might not care because the ride is so enjoyable. Delicious Venus hooks up with dreamy Neptune to manufacture a bit of romantic fantasy. At the very least, join your friends on a social outing, whether or not the activity sounds like fun. You may be pleasantly surprised by what happens when you push outside of your old comfort zone and trust the universe.

People might attempt to talk you into going along with the current group consensus now, but you'll likely break rank to do something on your own. You may try to justify your behavior by blaming it on the present circumstances, but this rebellion is actually your own doing. It's healthier to admit you feel stifled and are in need of the freedom to do as you please. Happily, there's no reason to go along with the crowd today; following your impulsive tendencies will probably be rewarded in ways you can't imagine.

You can't help but feel nervous if coworkers encourage you to step out past your normal limits today. Even if someone's outrageous plan sounds intriguing, the very thought of doing something so unconventional gives you the jitters if you worry about how others will respond. Fortunately, you could receive support from the most unlikely of allies if you're open to it. Go ahead and reach well outside of the box now; once you get a whiff of all the amazing possibilities, there will be no going back.

You're sitting on pins and needles today, ready to do something adventurous and risky. You might later regret your impulsive behavior, so give your plans another round of consideration before following a passing whim. Luckily, there's plenty of room for pleasure if you don't approach the situation from an all-or-nothing perspective. Exercising a small amount of caution is probably enough to enable you to have your fair share of fun. You don't have to jump into deep water without a life jacket to prove your courage.

Everyone casts you in a serious light, but the truth is you're a lot more restless today than others realize. If someone around you cuts loose, you're right there, ready to jump in and join him or her on a quick escape. Fortunately, you should be able to get away with having some fun, even before people notice you have slipped away. There's no reason to try and change anyone's perception of you because you will earn more respect if you dance to your own drummer without explaining every move you make.

Comparing your idealistic fantasies with your current commitments is an exercise in futility. You really don't want to do the same things in the very same ways you did them last time. You're fascinated by experimental models for living, loving and working -- so nearly anything outside of the ordinary is intriguing today. Be careful; just because you can visualize something in your imagination doesn't mean you should automatically go ahead and make it happen. Practicing a little bit of conscious discernment now goes a long way.

Your romantic dreams don't necessarily match up with your current relationship dynamics. In fact, even if you are enjoying a fulfilling love life, you still may yearn for additional freedom today. The irony is that if you made your desires known, you might be pleasantly surprised with the outcome. Don't shut yourself off to unrealized possibilities before you take some time out of your schedule to explore them. Initiating action is required to make your fantasies come true.

This is an intellectually provocative day and you might find it so stimulating that you don't want it to end. Buoyant Jupiter is magnifying your 9th House of Adventure, and you may be wondering how you will handle the complexity. Your emotions are all over the map and whatever you do now, you could feel as if you should have done something else. Still, the lack of stability heightens your intoxication with the thrill of it all. The energy will likely begin to settle back down tomorrow so enjoy the excitement of this moment while it lasts.

You might be unhappy with the emotional volatility on the home front and nothing you do seems to settle the turbulence. In fact, it feels as if a volcano could erupt at any moment. You're better off in the long run to ride on the choppy currents, rather than resisting the flow. Thankfully, your anxiety dissipates when you concentrate on maintaining your center of gravity instead of attempting to control every variable in your environment. Thankfully, your sensible behavior acts as a beacon that others can follow.

Nothing seems as easy as it should be today if you're anchored to your past in a way that makes it harder to respond to the present moment. You know what you want but aren't free to execute your plan just yet. Don't let arbitrary restrictions or delays make you so frustrated that you impulsively do something reckless. Proceed carefully now and think twice before making any unnecessary moves; rest assured you have more time than you think to change the world.

You're eager to try something that seems so out of character now that it takes someone in your life totally by surprise. Unfortunately, people might criticize you for your erratic behavior today, mistakenly believing you're acting immature and irresponsible. This is your moment of truth, regardless of anyone else's expectations or demands. Make an original statement about who you are and what you want by staying true to yourself.

You are working with a short emotional fuse while the Moon is agitating reactionary Aries, and your shoot-from-the-hip delivery could turn a sticky situation into a real problem. Thankfully, a little common sense goes a long way to prevent a meltdown over a misunderstanding that won't matter much in the long run. However, if you get caught up in the heat of the moment and choose to express your feelings, at least minimize the potential damage by accepting responsibility for your role in the current disagreement. It takes two to tangle but only one to walk away.

Although you may need to work with someone whose long-term goals aren't the same as yours, at least try to see things from an open-minded perspective today. Instead of allowing your exasperation to explode in an unpleasant interaction, take the high road and acknowledge that your differences don't have to impact your collaboration in a negative way. You can be true to yourself, even while putting patience ahead of insecurity. The sooner you cooperate, the sooner you're done.

A sudden imbalance of power could rear its ugly head today. You might believe others are working against your personal interests, yet no one is honest enough to come out and say anything directly. Your best response to this awkward situation is to remain as optimistic as possible, even if you grow more irritated throughout the day. Relying on your natural friendliness and adaptability enables you to dance around the unpleasant edges of conflict without getting your feet dirty.

Expressing negativity isn't always appropriate or appreciated, but letting your anger loose today could be a sign of strength. Often, your reaction is to withdraw emotionally when stressed, leading to passive-aggressive behavior. Nevertheless, frustration can push you to the edge now, provoking you to lose control if you aren't aware of your own inner process. Denying your feelings only makes matters worse, so share your concerns without getting hooked by your attachment to what others think. Keeping it real is most useful if you also keep it kind.

Your friends seem dissatisfied with your actions today, yet you don't believe that you're doing anything wrong. However, adopting a cosmic perspective reveals everyone is performing a role in your personal drama and it's just plain annoying if the actors aren't following your script. Even if others seem to be the source of the problem, continue to bring your focus back to your feelings. Ironically enough, once you take responsibility for your part, the erratic energy should begin to settle down. Lead by example and hopefully others will follow.

An anxious coworker may step over the line today. Rather than avoiding direct confrontation, initiate an open dialogue about the current tension. However, applying force isn't helpful nor does assuming an authoritative posture resolve the issue because the truth will come to the surface when you least expect it. But if you choose to nudge the process along, get right to the point. Properly considered words are effective agents of change if they are delivered with good intentions and kindness.

People seem impossible to read today. You might go out of your way to accommodate others, but your amicable behavior currently increases your frustration and your uncertainty. Paradoxically, the friendlier you are now, the worse you feel on the inside. Trust your instincts, even if you don't have the facts to support them. But don't start a fight with an imaginary opponent; shadowboxing will only tire you out without leading to a solution. Continue to gather information before confronting anyone with the truth. There's no need to play games with those you love.

Keep your nose clean now or you might get pulled into an unnecessary conflict before you know it. However, don't be afraid to shake up the status quo if your intentions are honorable and your goal is worthwhile. Nevertheless, powerful emotions are stewing on the back burner and you're right to worry that they could hijack your day. Fortunately, you can pull a rabbit out of a hat by taking an entirely radical approach. Seize the day and don't look back.

Everything would be perfect today, but someone may not be playing according to your rules. It might even feel as if a rain cloud is threatening your parade, even though it's still sunny on your side of the street. There's no reason to let fear dampen your current enthusiasm. You don't have to outrun bad weather; instead, head off the developing storms by proactively confronting any negativity. Unaddressed issues are the only scary ones. Tilt the odds even further in your favor by avoiding the blame game; the final outcome is influenced by your positive attitude more than anything else.

Your strong resolve can block out some of today's tension, but choosing to remain unaware of it only deepens the problem. The self-determined Aries Moon raises concerns about how your personal story is unfolding and who ultimately controls your destiny. It's counterproductive to slip into denial now, so play the role of the rebel and bring differences out into the open while you have the chance. Confrontation may be inevitable, but your willingness to compromise offers lasting solutions to the current turmoil.

Life seems so hectic today that you're actually worried something could fall apart unless you watch your immediate environment like a hawk. You prefer playing your cards only once you determine you are ready. However, you might be forced to make your move in response to someone else's behavior. Don't panic and overreact; just walk away from the table and return to the game after you have collected your thoughts. Your strategy and execution will improve once your feelings are back in line with your heart.

Being swept up in a wave of social activism won't likely help your personal life, but it can still be a good thing in the long run. If you find yourself spending all your free time with people who think like you, go ahead and ride the surge while it lasts. However, this moment of heightened activity might be a temporary passion for you, even if it's a lifelong commitment for others. Let your compassionate nature shine; your current journey teaches you a priceless lesson about your place in the world.

You might have been caught in intellectual cross-currents recently as Mercury retrograded in your 3rd House of Communication. Although life seems more hectic than ever, the tide is about to change and the noise will soon transform into exciting opportunities for growth. Don't waste time second-guessing your choices; it's time to launch your ship of ideas into the seas of commerce. Some journeys are worth a leap of faith.

Although it's been more work than play lately, your progress continues to be slower than you prefer. If you have done your homework, things will finally begin to go your way. However, the change will not happen overnight, but you can feel it in the wind, nonetheless. Mercury's direct turn in airy Gemini inspires you to soar above the mundane world. There isn't a better sensation than to have your wings lifted by a steady breeze that carries you to great heights.

Your nerves are on edge, but finding a healthy outlet for your restlessness may be enough to turn the energy around. You've been longing to travel, but circumstances continue to stand between you and your wanderlust. Ultimately, it's about your incessant need for mental stimulation. You might have reached a saturation point in your current situation, and must find new adventures to catalyze your thinking. Hang on to your hat; the universe is about to grant you your wish.

You may be dreaming about sneaking off to a monastery for a spiritual retreat when no one is looking. You're in a contemplative phase and might be overwhelmed by all your choices. Thankfully, this period of isolation only lasts a few more days and hopefully gives you the chance to gain a new emotional awareness. There's no reason to be fearful of being alone, but also don't be afraid of putting your thoughts out into the open. If you want something magical to happen, it's time to make your move.

It feels as if many personal demands have been placed on your doorstep over the past few weeks, requiring you to participate in more social activities than you prefer. Thankfully, your way of relating to others is on the precipice of change. Although you may still be involved with a group of like-minded people, you're more inclined to engage with them in a voluntary capacity rather than out of obligation. Find a way to step beyond your personal needs; your generosity of spirit will be returned to you many times over.

You're not usually one to waste words, yet you may be entangled in endless conversations at work these days without much to show for your efforts. The bad news is your frustration level continues to escalate. The good news is you are at a turning point and progress could be just around the corner now that your key planet Mercury is turning direct in your 10th House of Career. There's no reason to express your dissatisfaction. Just strive for excellence and be thankful when you start to reap dividends over the days ahead.

Thoughts of an exotic journey have been floating around in your brain but you know better than most that there's more than one way to take a trip. Learning expands your mind in the same way that travel does, and you don't even have to leave the comforts of home. You may have felt like circumstances prevented you from following your curiosity, but now you're ready to begin a new chapter in your life. Even if it's just a fantasy, it's time to pack your bags and go.

You secretly enjoy thinking about things that are out of bounds for most people. You're naturally comfortable delving into the mysteries of sex, death and the meaning of life, but recently your thoughts have left you feeling dazed and confused. Now, as Mercury moves direct, you will have an opportunity to share some of your metaphysical ideas with someone who understands your darker side. Go deep; your words have a more profound effect on others now than you will ever know.

Intimate conversations may have been turned inside out recently, creating unnecessary misunderstandings. But rather than quickly moving on to new business, it is an opportune time to slow down and revisit these serious issues. Discussions that were previously impossible now unfold without the heavy baggage that had initially accompanied them. Remember, it's not enough to tell your side of the story today. Listen attentively to the feedback you receive from everyone else. Communication is a two-way street so don't block the exchange of ideas.

Focusing on the details of life is enough to jog your memory today. Since Mercury has been busy doing its retrograde thing in your 6th House of Habits, any changes to your daily routine should take all the facts into account before you create more trouble. Dig into the issues when complications arise because the real action occurs wherever you place your attention. Don't be fooled into diverting your energy into unimportant tasks. Set ambitious priorities and stick to them like glue.

If you recently backpedaled in a romantic venture, it's now time to stage your comeback. Grab your favorite pen and write a letter to the person who is the object of your affection. No doubt, emailing or texting isn't as effective but will do the trick. No matter what medium you use today, open your heart and lay your feelings on the line. Believe it or not, rejection isn't the worst thing that could happen. Keeping your unexpressed desires to yourself is a worse fate because you'll never know what kind of love might blossom until you try.

A recent visit to a familiar childhood haunt may have stirred up a flood of memories. Or, perhaps, a conversation with a dear friend or relative started you thinking about the good old days. Regardless of the catalyst, you might be going through a phase when nostalgia takes you on a magical mystery tour. Although you have much to gain from remembering your past, don't dwell in it. In order to embrace your future, you must be one hundred percent present in the here and now.

An unfinished relationship discussion may resurface today, as if a recently dispatched issue was waiting in the wings to be called back onstage. Much to your chagrin, if you weren't able to fix the problem earlier, you won't likely solve it now, either. Paradoxically, the harder you strive for resolution, the more elusive the answers become. Nevertheless, gently leaning into the resistance is still the most strategic tactic because the energy is about to shift, freeing you to move on.

You may believe that you can power your way through any obstacle you encounter at work today, but the Moon in your sign is telling you to slow down and go with the flow. Instead of trying to prove your competence, you'e better off taking the time to figure out what you're doing wrong first. Dogged persistence is not as successful now as establishing a bulletproof plan based on the facts at hand. Build your strategy one brick at a time to create the strongest foundation.

Don't expect anyone else to understand what you're talking about today because the reflective Moon's visit to your 12th House of Spirituality puts you in touch with metaphysical truths that aren't easily explained. Your colleagues won't likely follow your cosmic ramblings just because your thoughts make perfect sense to you. It doesn't matter if you can see the beautiful complexity of the entire universe; your best bet now is to stick with the simplest approach when it comes to connecting with others, nonetheless. Perhaps it's wise to be silent; sometimes the magic is for your eyes only.

Your friends are willing to show up for you today, so asking them for support shouldn't be such a big deal. You might not like the idea of putting yourself in a vulnerable position, but revealing your true self creates a more balanced flow of energy between you and everyone else. Obviously, you want to feel safe when sharing your insecurities, but you can still follow the advice of a trusted companion without worrying too much about the consequences. Normally, you excel at nurturing those you love, but now it's time to gracefully receive the generosity of others.

You are tempted to play the role of a caretaker today, even if you secretly don't want anyone to depend on you too much. Luckily, you have an uncanny ability to know how to quickly win others over to your side. Don't be scared of acting without full justification; the outcome should be favorable as long as you maintain a high level of integrity. Thankfully, you won't likely go wrong if you stick to your true convictions and work for the greater good of everyone involved.

You have ample reason to believe your goals are within reach. But even if you struggle with your confidence because of recent setbacks, things should finally begin to turn around today. Nevertheless, you're a tough critic to please and it can be difficult to reserve your judgment long enough to accept life as it is and people as they are.
