Luckily, you gain the gift of a truly empowering vision once you commit to taking the high road and giving others the benefit of the doubt.

The romantic energy you're feeling could be overpowered today by a disagreement regarding your life path. Your dreamy mood might suddenly dissipate as it's overtaken by fears that arise from the depths of your subconscious. The Moon's presence in your 8th House of Transformation suggests a lot of emotional turmoil exists beneath the surface. Don't attempt to cling to the current moment as a matter of pride; letting the present recede into the past makes room for a brighter future.

You might wear yourself out trying to keep up with everything that's happening before you finally find a groove and settle into a regular pattern. Although completing what's expected of you shouldn't be a problem, your life may be more complicated now than you wish. Instead of frantically attempting to get back to the basics, resign yourself to living with the current glorious complexity until it begins to simplify on its own. This might sound scary for the weak of heart but, fortunately, you Scorpios are at your best when you rise to the challenge.

Maintaining your focus isn't as straightforward as it should be today. Nevertheless, you still might try to complete one-too-many tasks, even if common sense tells you to pare back your calendar immediately. Surprisingly, you can accomplish everything you set your mind to if you're conscientious about being practical with your promises. Success now depends on your ability to say no again and again to the incoming parade of distractions. Ultimately, it's your unwavering desire to be productive that keeps you on course. The mind can do anything; you are the master of your own destiny.

Although you can be more successful than you thought possible today, you also might feel as if you're missing something crucial. Without a doubt, there's more going on than meets the eye now, yet you can't put your finger on it. Forget about solving an unsolvable mystery; instead, make a commitment to accomplish what you can and then get to work. If you want to reach the mountaintop, there's no time to waste.

You begin your day knowing exactly where you want to channel your creative energy, yet you grow less certain as the hours pass. New possibilities are revealed now and each has its own merit. Nevertheless, the choice is ultimately up to you. You're the only one who can decide how to connect your goals with those of everyone else. Fulfilling  your own desires alone won't emotionally satisfy you today, so consider the needs of your companions, too, if you want to have a happy heart.

You are incredibly busy today with the Moon stomping around in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Fortunately, you can remain totally focused even with all the distractions clamoring for your attention. You are fully committed to delivering on your promises and won't be led astray by those things that would normally catch your eye. Your coworkers may think you're a bit obsessive now, but you're not even listening to their objections. You know you're on the right track; make the most of this cosmic momentum while it lasts.

You are dangerously close to reaching your boiling point today and may struggle to keep a lid on your volatile emotions. Militant Mars is your ruling planet, tuning you into trouble before it even happens. Although the warrior planet is combining forces with the willful Sun, you can consciously use this energy for a positive cause instead of succumbing to its negativity. Stand up for an underdog or defend an idea that's close to your heart. Take the high road by choosing your battles carefully and fighting fairly for the good of all.

You may not be comfortable expressing your anger, but you can still be a formidable opponent if people push you too far. Although someone could challenge your motives, you're able to exhibit a great deal of patience today. Keeping your emotions in check seems like your best option now, but you might not stifle your annoyance for long if your values are called into question. Unfortunately, the stress won't likely pass until you confront its source. Assuming the role of the peaceful warrior is the most effective way to resolve the tension.

You might be more argumentative than usual today and your clever wit can't seem to save you from yourself. Feisty Mars is traveling hand-in-hand with the Sun in your sign, and whatever you do now appears to fan the flames of conflict as the friction grows. Nevertheless, the outcome of the current situation is still within your control. You could waste precious energy in a fight that won't likely matter in the long run or you can summon up enough courage to just walk away. The choice is yours.

It's easy for you to use your intuition to see what's going on behind the scenes, but sharing your feelings with your friends is more complicated than simply observing them. Your greatest challenge now is to express the truth exactly as you see it, while knowing that you may have to actively defend your beliefs. If you decide to speak your opinion today, avoid getting mired down in the details. Concentrating on the big picture makes sense as long as you don't let your philosophical approach supersede the facts staring at you in the face.

Making a dramatic gesture may be your unconscious way of showing resistance today because you're not interested in participating in a plan that doesn't support your dreams. If you don't want to make too many waves about your difference of opinion, engaging in physical activity will help you to let off some steam. However, there's a good chance that your plans will backfire if you don't express yourself one way or another. Proceed carefully; blowing your cool could alienate the very same people you want to have on your team.

You're motivated to take on the world today with the superhero Sun-Mars conjunction activating your 10th House of Responsibility. But it's difficult now to follow one task through to the end before finding yourself distracted with another one. Thankfully, you can reach into your metaphysical toolbox and pull out a dose of practicality to counteract the scattered energy. Picking one project and sticking with it leads to a higher level of satisfaction than running around in circles without having anything to show for your efforts at the end of the day.

You often excel at playing the diplomat, but peacekeeping isn't your primary motivating force today. You're not as quick to acquiesce to the demands of others while warrior Mars hooks up with the willful Sun in your 9th House of Adventure. You want to make something monumental happen in your life and won't let anyone stand in your way now. Although you mean well, your actions may be charged with a combative tone that provokes conflict. Be smart; if you unwittingly agitate someone's ire, apologize and retreat before things spin out of control. The good news is it's possible to be assertive without being aggressive.

You are quite a force of nature while the Sun illuminates your key planet Mars. It's not easy to act in moderation now, especially if you currently lack a healthy perspective. You might not even stop to think about your long-term trajectory; you just push toward your immediate goal and overpower anyone who resists your efforts. But the fact of the matter is your friends and family can be your greatest asset if you include them in your plans. Be on your best behavior while manifesting your future or you may waste a cosmic opportunity to get what you want.

You could inadvertently overwhelm people with your lofty intentions, yet you might have a crisis of confidence today if you don't have a strong support system in place. The combative Sun-Mars conjunction falls in your 7th House of Others, flooding your system with so much adrenaline now that you might project your own anger onto anyone who crosses your path. Strong convictions are useful to accomplish your goals as long as you tone down your approach until everyone else is on the same page as you. Gentle is the new strong.

You're typically quite proficient at taming the contentious energy of hot-under-the-collar Mars. However, you're tempted to ride roughshod over other people's needs today in order to stick to your regular routine. Fortunately, a friendly Taurus Moon reminds you that taking a simpler and kinder path is the wiser choice today. Believe it or not, it's not mandatory to have every little thing go your way; quit micromanaging your day and you'll be happier in the long run. Compassion and consideration cultivate respect.

You might be so excited about a project now that you ignore your friends as you pursue your ambitions. It's all too easy to forget about what anyone else thinks as the Sun-Mars conjunction fires up your 5th House of Self-Expression. However, the support you receive could make all the difference in the world, so slow down and explain your intentions. Sharing your plans helps you clarify your next steps. Dreaming out loud with loved ones recharges your creative batteries and warms your heart.

There could be so many things going on at home today that you don't know where to jump in. The action-packed Sun-Mars conjunction falls in your 4h House of Domestic Conditions, emphasizing your personal life. However, it's not time to simply close down and drop out of sight. You can create a communication whirlwind if you pick up your phone, get online or directly engage those who are in your immediate environment. The positive energy you stir up now sets a harmonious tone for the weeks ahead.

Change is in the air today, but you can't figure out which direction the wind is blowing. At first, you may be excited with anticipation as you map out your schedule for the near future, only to be drawn back into old fears. Your memories could bring up unexpected anger that prevents you from swiftly processing your emotions. Don't be so judgmental if you aren't living up to your own ambitious expectations. Instead of comparing the present with the past, focus strictly on the power of now so you can gain the most out of your current experiences.

Enjoy the relaxed pace while you can because circumstances will likely grow more complex as the day unfolds. Being pressured to respond doesn't necessarily make you feel good and others may encounter the brunt of your frustration instead of your support. Thankfully, you don't have to play the role of the spoiler if you keep communication channels open from the beginning. It's simpler to be honest about your resistance than to explain yourself after someone's feelings have already been hurt. A stitch in time saves nine.

You instinctively know that you must take decisive action today, but there seems to be too many choices vying for your attention. You may worry that you might miss a significant opportunity because you are so caught up in current events while the Moon is busy raising a ruckus in your sign. Don't give up just because it seems like others are trying to prevent you from following your guiding light. Keeping your dreams alive is crucial for your soul, even if fulfillment isn't in the immediate picture.

In theory, you like the idea of being part of a tightly-knit family, but you can do without all the day-to-day dramas that seem to be part of the package now. However, you haven't necessarily failed if you think you're falling short of your personal goals. Looking back to gauge your success only leads to self-doubt. Live in the present moment while fully experiencing the intensity of your current feelings instead of retreating to your past. The future is calling so let go of your baggage and move on.

You may appear highly energetic and overly enthusiastic today, but your inner world could be less cheery than anyone realizes. You know you must continue to push forward, which is why you are wearing a smile and trying to assume a positive attitude. Even though it might seem as if you can't shake your current disillusionment, you do have the power to snap yourself out of your malaise if you so choose. Instead of seeking perfection, just practice accepting things as they are now and finding joy in the moment.

Your high ideals and unrealized dreams can only motivate you so far; you also must connect with the mundane side of your life today. Anything that helps you keep your feet on the ground should be actively pursued now-- especially practices that blend a spiritual perspective with physical movement, such as martial arts or yoga. Committing to disciplined activity can be part of a larger plan that distracts you from obsessing about unfulfilled fantasies and puts you on track to a more fulfilling life.

One of your primary roads to personal growth is through your continuing exploration of relationships. However, your current analysis could lead you to the disappointing conclusion that your present state of affairs is quite different than your idealistic dreams. Stop the self-criticism before you sink into uncertainty, since judging yourself harshly only limits your potential at this time. Focusing on the positive aspects of others enables you to regain your confidence and cultivate deeper levels of friendship and intimacy.

You might have a sneaking suspicion today that you've been shortchanged and something important is missing in your life. Unfortunately, this reflection of residual childhood longings isn't just a passing whim. In fact, somber Saturn is retrograding back into your sign to remind you that there's still work to be done balancing your current trajectory with your earlier expectations. Exploring memories can help you gain insight, but releasing old anger and resentment frees you to find real happiness in the here and now.

Friends and family may be the current source of drama that begs for your involvement. Nevertheless, it's probably best to observe the unfolding circumstances from a comfortable distance if they don't directly concern you. Unnecessarily worrying about matters peripheral to your main priorities only stresses you out now. You could even complicate the situation today by adding your two cents before anyone asks. Establishing a clear boundary and sticking to it works to everyone's advantage, especially yours.

No matter how much you have accomplished so far in your life, you still may fall short of your own unattainable ambitions. Nevertheless, you can't travel your individual road to happiness until you understand what motivates you to be successful. Unquestionably, you can learn a lot about yourself by reexamining your personal history from time to time. It's not about arriving at your destination now; the true measure of success comes from knowing which path to take.

Last night's discouraging dream may still linger on your mind after you wake up today. Unfortunately, it's no easy task to untangle the symbolic meaning of this otherworldly message from your subconscious. Forget about explaining your feelings to anyone else now. Instead, head back into the uncomfortable shadows and let the strange images wash over you without any fear. There's no doubt about it: you have a special destiny to fulfill. Meditating on your dreams is the first step to deciphering the mystery of your future.

Everywhere you look you can't help but see that so many people are dissatisfied with their lives. Your deep compassion for their failures may also be the source of your current disillusionment. However, your dreams are so vivid now that their clarity reminds you of the stark difference between your imagination and reality. But don't waste time analyzing everything that's wrong with your world. Instead, consciously focus on something that has solid potential. Channel your efforts toward positively changing what you can and leave everything else to the universe.

You aren't likely to take no for an answer today, but you might have to think on your feet and do some fast talking to receive the approval you seek. You could grow frustrated if you are swept up by interpersonal politics that are beyond your control. But don't quit too soon, since gentle persistence will probably bring you what you want. However, four planets buzzing in adaptable Gemini remind you that maintaining a flexible attitude is essential to keep up with how quickly the circumstances are changing.

You need more time to integrate all the information at your disposal but it's difficult to think while more data is still coming in. In fact, one distraction after another keeps you hopping today. Thankfully, the intensity begins to settle down as tomorrow's New Moon approaches, giving you enough peace and quiet to actually hear your own thoughts. Meditation eventually produces feelings of contentment, but the real trick is to learn how to find your balance even while you're busy.

If you think your needs will go unmet today, it's probably because your moods are shifting so rapidly while the Moon is camped out in your fickle sign. You may receive exactly what you want, only to have your desires morph into something else. Thankfully, your friends and associates are fairly easygoing now about your restlessness, so there's no reason to hide your feelings. Building better relationships starts with keeping others informed about your unfolding emotional process. You are free to take flight once everyone is on the same page.

You might believe you have to keep something private today. However, once you start telling your story, your need for secrecy is unexpectedly overshadowed by a strong desire for transparency. Luckily, you may suddenly realize you don't have to hide as much as you often do. Your growing excitement about being validated by your peers can have you sharing your feelings before you even have a chance to consider the consequences. Although it's time to come out from behind your castle wall, you don't have to overwhelm everyone all at once. A little disclosure goes a long way.

You can't hold your tongue once your focus shifts from listening to actively participating in a discussion. You may have valid concerns for your recent trepidation, but progress on several fronts today wins out over your resistance. Any reasons you might have to remain silent are obliterated by the chatty Gemini Moon moving through your 11th House of Social Networking. You need to engage with others now more than you need your autonomy. Choosing a path of collaboration leads to the road of success.

Although you're quite capable of building a case for what you want today, a logical presentation doesn't assure that you will make noticeable progress right away. Nevertheless, this isn't a sensible time to back down, since your words have more momentum these days than you realize. Facing external resistance might actually be the result of projecting your own internal fears. Overcoming apparent obstacles may take more time than you wish, but the potential payoff is definitely worth the sustained effort.

You're quick to take center stage today, especially if you're offered a chance to tell others about your adventurous plans. Your typically gracious approach may be lost as you face the fear of being misunderstood by a coworker or a friend. You might think that raising your volume will compensate for your current insecurity. However, this impulsive strategy could backfire by prompting people to hastily withdraw. Luckily, the ultimate viability of your ideas isn't affected by someone else's acceptance or rejection. The only opinion that matters right now is yours.

People may become anxious today if they're uncomfortable handling intense emotions, leaving you uncertain about sharing what's going on in your heart. Unfortunately, suppressing what you want to say only makes matters worse even if you have the kindest of intentions. However, the interactive Gemini Moon provokes you to take a risk and express your feelings without expecting anything in return. Be gentle; if others don't feel threatened by your passion, they might just surprise you by sticking around and participating in an amazing discussion about things that truly matter.

Intriguing people enter your life now, making it impossible to turn down an invitation to learn something new. But connections with others aren't as stable as you think while the changeable Gemini Moon illuminates your 7th House of Relationships, filling the day with one noisy interaction after another. Luckily, you're not required to discover the meaning of life today; all you need to do is soak in as much information as possible and be grateful for the experiences as they happen.

You might not be able to shut off your over-analytical thinking today, even if a constant flow of ingenious thoughts are spinning around inside your head. Your pragmatic approach to life prefers one solid thought to lots of ephemeral ones. Nevertheless, it may be fine to let go of your current expectations if you don't need to produce anything tangible now. Allow your mind to wander, since you will instinctively come back to center when the time is right. Stretching your imagination will ultimately reward you with something positive to show for your mental meanderings.

You really don't have to demonstrate your cleverness today since those who know you already recognize your intelligence. Rather than overstating your case or rambling on too long about your latest greatest idea, just show up and be real. There's no reason to use words to prove your point because your brilliance shines through your actions as physical Mars aligns with the radiant Sun in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Walk your talk and see who follows.

You could find yourself exploring new feelings today, but you're more content with just getting your feet wet now than jumping into deeper waters. It's quite natural to skip over the top of several complex issues while four planets in light-footed Gemini tap dance through your 4th House of Emotional Security. Consider your current inquiry as an initial test drive only. Wait until after tomorrow's New Moon to draw any conclusions from this reconnaissance mission.

There are so many things you want to start today that you can't keep up with your own agenda. The noisy Gemini New Moon joins forces with impetuous Mars in your 3rd House of Information, filling your mind with data that can actually prevent you from seeking the deeper meaning of your experiences. You may be preoccupied with all the external commotion now, while wishing you had a chance to seek the pleasures you believe are waiting for you somewhere nearby. Keep your dreams alive by talking about them when you can. Don't lose hope; your time will come sooner than you think.

You're unabashedly concerned about money now that the Gemini New Moon is activating your 2nd House of Resources. Unfortunately, you might not be able to fully relax until your material world feels secure. It's quite disconcerting if you're consumed by the realization that you're not as financially comfortable as you wish. Nevertheless, nothing is preventing you from reconsidering where to go next. But you must make a choice today; you can always change your mind along the way. Prosperity is yours for the taking.

If you're all tangled up in your thoughts now, remember that curiosity is a common Gemini trait and you need to play out all the alternatives before narrowing it down to just one. However, the inquisitive Gemini New Moon prompts you to obsess over irrelevant details. It's natural to feel a bit lost in your own mental maze, but you're perfectly safe and exactly where you need to be today. Ruthlessly exploring every option available empowers you to make the best choice for your future.

Your powerful dreams serve a very important purpose now, and you would quickly lose interest in your future without the inspiration they provide. You often look back to the past when you are worried about what's ahead, but the mischievous Gemini New Moon dancing in your 12th House of Destiny may have your fantasies working on overdrive. Try not to push your current concerns away; instead, embrace your thoughts as messages from within. But be ready to take them to the next level by giving yourself permission to reach for the stars.

If you're struggling to hold on to the status quo at work, it's helpful to reassess your goals while the clever Gemini New Moon is triggering your 11th House of Dreams and Wishes. Your mental agility enables you to run circles around others now. However, you must also be willing to learn something new about yourself or people will think you're just playing games. There's no need to bluff your way through the situation as long as you stay open to the lessons at hand. Being a student of life keeps you in touch with the wonders of the world.

Others are supporting your pursuit of a particular professional path now that the interactive Gemini New Moon emphasizes your 10th House of Career. However, you have additional goals that might not be recognizable by your current choices. Thankfully, it isn't necessary to reveal your inner conflicts yet. In fact, sharing your true feelings today only confuses your coworkers and complicates matters even more. Research your options in the privacy of your own mind before putting them out in the open for everyone to see.

You are highly motivated to let go of desires that only have a small chance of being fulfilled as the whimsical Gemini New Moon highlights your 9th House of Big Ideas. You have reached a fork in the road where you're eager to make dramatic changes in order to spice up your life. Even if you're impatient to embark on your next adventure, you still have to put your plans in order. Don't sweat the small stuff today; concentrate on your exciting long-term goals rather than the tedious details of the day.

Be careful about complicating a tricky situation today as the scattered Gemini New Moon influences your 8th House of Intimacy. You are fueled by an insatiable desire to explain the unexplainable as you drive toward achieving your lofty goals. Your current assumption that the outcome will be an all-or-nothing one muddies the waters even more. The best way to avoid problems in the future is to be honest in the present. Keep all communication channels clear of any possible misunderstandings by being more transparent in all of your interactions.

You could be struggling to find a healthy balance between pursuing your dreams and living up to everyone else's expectations. The dualistic Gemini New Moon falls in your 7th House of Relationships, tempting you to leave your fate in the hands of others. Your current dilemma stems from your illusion that you can have it both ways now. Thankfully, your diplomatic skills rise to the occasion, but you still must eventually make your choice because you can't serve two masters at once. Don't get swept up in the moment and rush your decision; allow plenty of time for your inner voice to make itself heard.

A coworker might believe you are acting selfishly today, but you know that you must attend to your own needs before you can truly help those around you. You may feel a bit overwhelmed now with everything that's going on; you won't be much good to yourself or anyone else until you establish a workable rhythm in your everyday life. Nevertheless, the information-rich Gemini New Moon lands in your 6th House of Daily Routine, enabling you to increase your efficiency so you have the time and energy to be of service to others.

You may be so quick to change your story for each new audience that it's hard to know where you stand on any given subject today. Meanwhile, the flexible Gemini New Moon inspires your 5th House of Romance, motivating you to share your heart's desires. But don't be overly concerned about impressing anyone with your song and dance; if you please yourself, everyone else will jump on your bandwagon now. Being loved starts with learning to love yourself more.

You're highly protective of your home and family because subconsciously you realize that everything can't stay the same forever. The fickle Gemini New Moon occupies your 4th House of Foundations today, prompting you to overcompensate and justify your behavior as you cling to familiar feelings. Ironically, it's your attachment to the past that destabilizes the present. Instead of resisting the inevitable, become a secret agent of change.

Remaining quiet might seem like a sensible strategy today, but you can't avoid conflict by simply relying on defensive maneuvers. Even if you try to keep your feelings to yourself, unexpressed emotions have an uncanny way of leaking into interactions and hijacking your day. It isn't fun to lose your temper, so get your concerns out into the open now instead of naively assuming that things will improve on their own. Transparency is your friend.

Interactions with others flow so smoothly today that you may think you're missing something. Ironically, the truth is you're probably glossing over a critical fact or conveniently forgetting what you were told earlier. Fortunately, you can consciously choose to focus on the details of your conversations. The simple act of bringing your awareness to the present moment helps to prevent an unnecessary misunderstanding. Be here now and the future will fall into place.

Your nervous system is on high alert these days, but you really don't want others to know how fast your mind is buzzing. Your calm exterior is your secret weapon against being swept up in another distraction today. You need some space because you don't want to slow down your current thinking process. Your thoughts are free to explore new territory if you don't have to explain yourself every step of the way.

You wish you could talk about your feelings now that the Moon is happily back in your sign, but you might be feeling too shy. You don't want to make anyone uncomfortable, so you won't likely go out of your way to bring up a sensitive topic that could provoke someone to withdraw. However, it's easier to acknowledge your intense emotions once you understand that your abandonment issues can precipitate exactly what you're trying to avoid. Go ahead and face your fears; bringing them out into the open is the first step to overcoming them for good.

Don't blindly trust anyone who promises you the world because they're not telling you the entire story now while the Moon is playing hide and seek in your 12th House of Secrets. Take care of important business as if you are riding solo today, even if others enthusiastically offer to help you. It's fine to listen to those who are supportive of your cause, but don't expect them to have the answers you seek. Ultimately, you are your own hero; the faith you have in yourself is what matters most.

You will likely play your hand close to the chest today because you don't want to upset your friends or destabilize any existing relationships. Unfortunately, it may be impossible to avoid a confrontation if someone attempts to manipulate your feelings. The nurturing Cancer Moon is highlighting your 11th House of Social Networks, encouraging you to protect those you love. Do whatever is necessary to defend your home territory as long as you don't intentionally hurt anyone else in the process.

Your need to help others at work can make you feel indispensable today while the Moon is waxing in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Unfortunately, uninvited meddling in people's affairs could also create a real mess, especially if you go too far. Don't fall into the trap of over-inflated self-importance. Your coworkers might actually get along just fine without your assistance now. Wait until someone asks you before jumping in and taking over. Focusing on perfecting your own performance allows you to lead by example without saying a word.

You may tenaciously latch onto a fascinating idea and run with it today, even if it's not a very practical one. You might not have time to seriously develop your strategy, but you still can derive pleasure from just playing out all the possibilities in your mind. However, you could turn a rather simple desire into such a big deal that the original thought is lost in the noise. Give yourself permission to dream, but don't lose perspective on what's real and what's not.

Sometimes keeping your most amazing ideas under wraps is the best path to making your dreams come true. You are continuing to ride several days of exciting cosmic waves, yet you could spoil your chances for success if you reveal too much about your plans. Instead of talking about your ideas with anyone who will listen, focus on putting the details into place first. Although you often get away with developing your strategy on the fly, a more cautious approach now works to your advantage.

You are usually wise enough to be the self-restrained one in your group, but all bets are off today. It's not that your emotions are out of control now; it's just that being aligned with a higher purpose adds intensity to everything you do. Luckily, your friends and coworkers trust you enough to listen with an open mind as you unfold your strategy. Don't blow this chance to explain exactly what you're thinking, even if you aren't sure yet how all the pieces will ultimately fit together. The feedback you receive might be the missing link to your success story.

You're not all that comfortable with so many images and ideas swirling around in your brain now, leaving you unsure of how to manage the chaos. But instead of disengaging from the real world to dream about your future today, concentrate on a single destination and maintain your focus until you make measurable progress. Applying your creativity doesn't mean wasting your time in fantasyland; developing a step-by-step plan that places your goals within reach is your ticket to success.

Although people see you as quietly confident today, you might not have that much to say yet because you secretly lack certainty about your direction. You're on a creative surge with the evocative Moon inspiring your 5th House of Self-Expression, but the real action is taking place within your imagination and out of sight from anyone's watchful gaze. Don't feel obliged to demonstrate your brilliance now; just gently express what's most important to you once you're satisfied with the results of your inner process.

Your attraction to someone special makes it difficult to express your desires because you're afraid of being rejected. You could grow overly concerned that your needs aren't supported by the current dynamics, leading you to bury your worries. However, pretending that everything is copacetic won't work in your favor since it will be quite apparent that you are holding something back. Ultimately, it's not what you choose to share that's problematic now; it's how you deliver the message that counts.

You're drawn to a rebellious person who pushes against your boundaries today, but you're cautious about acting out your feelings. You might believe you shouldn't step outside your comfort zone and therefore you may deny your unconventional attractions. Don't try to rationalize your desires; you don't have to justify your personal tastes to anyone. It's time to live your own life now without worrying about the expectations of others. Follow your heart and don't look back.

Your antennas are raised and you're scanning reality for something exciting to do but it's time to act responsibly if you want to achieve tangible results. You won't be satisfied for long if you just run off to the next event, so stop and face the music now. Ironically, your fears are probably more challenging than anything that actually happens. Sink into the messy realm of uncertainty today; navigating through emotional waters isn't your natural preference, but it's essential for your spiritual growth.

Differences of opinion in an intimate relationship continue to create unexpected ripples and today they might reach a critical point, leaving you with unresolved feelings. Your emotional sensitivity contributes to the turmoil, but losing your temper now seems like the only way to clear the air of unexpressed emotions. Nevertheless, a smarter strategy is to express your frustrations before they grow too potent. Sharing your concerns can help bring down your walls and fortify the love that's already in your life.

An act of generosity reveals more than you intend today, especially if you're feeling more secretive than usual. Unfortunately, your magnanimous gesture won't likely express your true emotions now. However, you still might need to go through the motions whether you like it or not. Remember, once you have worked through your resistance, you should be able to reclaim your power by simply being true to yourself. The first person you need to be honest with is you.

You aren't the least bit interested in burdening any of your friends with your problems today. However, it's healthier to let them know the issues that have been on your mind, rather than keeping everything to yourself. Don't go searching for sympathy; just accept responsibility for your lot in life and keep working to manifest your dreams. Rather than dwelling on your fears, take the time to catch up with everyone before you let the negativity bring you down. Take comfort in the fact that others care enough to listen.

Although you prefer being the cool-headed one that others can count on, you currently lack your usual objectivity. You wish you could hide your reactions, but you care so much about your work now that your emotions are quite obvious to everyone. Once you become aware of your vulnerable position, you might overcompensate by shutting down your feelings completely. However, this all-or-nothing approach won't lead to anyone's satisfaction today. Be courageous and show your concern for your fellow companions.

Although your long-term goals are coming back into sharp focus now, the road to your future is being blocked by the past. Old fears may resurface today when you realize that nothing can change until you begin to shift your own attitude. Unfortunately, this realization might not be very reassuring, especially if you are preoccupied with the obstacles instead of your dreams. Keep the faith; the significant progress you have already made will continue to grow more evident over the weeks ahead.

Waves of uncertainty flow through your life today, reminding you to stop running around long enough to process your unresolved emotions. But you could worry that others will question your effectiveness if you're not performing miracles at work. Fortunately, you have not lost your edge; you're just experiencing a type of personal growth that doesn't mix well with your regular extroverted style. Don't let anyone else's judgments alter your trajectory. Breaking away for meditation and contemplation can be exactly what you need now to evolve to the next level.

Your schedule doesn't necessarily allow the time for an emotional melodrama today, so you might try to keep your feelings out of the equation. Unfortunately, this unrealistic strategy could fall apart if someone inadvertently involves you in the same kind of drama you wish to avoid. You're ready to run; nevertheless, keep your heart and mind open to what you're being shown now rather than exhausting yourself resisting an important lesson. You might be surprised by what you learn if you stay put and ride out the storm.

Your current optimism collides with reality today because you aren't ready to face a lingering issue head-on. The subjective Cancer Moon's visit to your 6th House of Employment challenges you to stay objective at work because you have specific opinions about almost everything. Encountering resistance from friends and coworkers can be demoralizing, but it also helps to clarify your thinking now. Thankfully, the truth dissipates your fears and frees you from worn-out patterns from the past.

You may be worried about the wisdom of a recent choice, but you're also hopeful that your life is on the upswing. Fortunately, you can be very patient now, even if your emotions are all over the place. Nevertheless, it's still impossible to tell if you're overreacting to the current situation or if the residual negativity you're feeling is actually real. For the sake of clarity, wait a few days prior to changing your game plan. In the meantime, visualize the most positive outcome instead of stressing about all the things you can't change.

You wake up with a fresh outlook on life. It seems as if the dark clouds are lifting and you can see further off into the distance. It feels as if you should be setting long-term goals, but the childlike Leo Moon adds an element of playfulness to nearly everything you do. You're eager to face even the most challenging situations; just narrow your field of vision and proceed methodically as you turn your dreams into reality.

You might inadvertently reveal your innermost feelings in a rather nonchalant manner today. It often takes time for you to open up and verbalize your emotions, but the bighearted Leo Moon's presence in your 4th House of Roots makes self-disclosure seem like the simplest course of action. Grab this opportunity to share your dreams while you can, since expressing your hopes for the future sets an uplifting tone for the days ahead.

You may have so many things on your plate today that you feel weary before you even begin your first task. Although it's not easy to establish a sustainable pace, getting started is half the battle now. Don't waste precious time worrying about the possibility of letting someone down because you aren't sure you can hold up your end of the bargain. Just keep pushing forward; you could be happily surprised at the end of the day when you look back and see how much ground you actually covered.

Everything seems to be moving along smoothly now that your efforts are being acknowledged by your peers. But it's not a good idea to kick back and rest on past productivity as the lively Leo Moon energizes your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Even if your motives are more convoluted than others realize, your hard work is appreciated today. There's no reason to create drama around your hidden feelings. Simply express them without resistance when it's appropriate. Showing up authentically results in more harmony and acceptance than if you remain in your shell.

Your intuition is running on overdrive while the receptive Moon brightens your 1st House of Self, but you're also excited by other people's unconventional plans. Your world is reverberating with unfamiliar tunes and you're eager to sing along. However, there's still a nagging voice encouraging you to play it safe now. Find ways to honor your vulnerability while still moving joyfully toward your future. Your tentative steps today will lead to a significant journey tomorrow.

You may be overwhelmed with all the new information that's recently come your way. Nevertheless, the conflicting data must be integrated into your current perspective, even if you think it will distract you from your real work. You might be so worried that you impulsively spill the beans without regard to the consequences. Nevertheless, there's no need to reveal your doubts today; a consistent and methodical approach will put you in good stead while you postpone major decisions for when you feel more grounded.

Although there is an action-packed day in store for you, it feels as if something is preventing you from doing as much as you wish. It might even be that social obligations lure you away from fulfilling your job-related duties. However, if you remain focused on your responsibilities, the potential for enjoyment will likely resurface later in the day in ways that you don't expect. Count your blessings, for you excel at winning the balancing game that ultimately enables you to fit both work and play into your life.

There's still more progress to be made when it comes to resolving issues of self-esteem, but you may experience a bit of a reprieve now. Three planets in expressive Leo are visiting your 10th House of Career and Public Life, bringing a new sense of optimism to your career path. You are cosmically empowered to take action and overcome self-doubt. Be patient, yet persistent. Don't  ease up on your efforts, but it is important to acknowledge that achieving results will take time. Just remember that your positive attitude today can work wonders in the long run.

Your optimism is building to a crescendo this weekend, yet you must be careful not to construct castles in the sky. If you over-commit your energy, you might end up wasting the current opportunities in front of you. Nevertheless, it's still tempting to blindly trust your instincts now; however, it's more practical to support your positive outlook with a concrete plan and the necessary follow-through. As Thomas Edison said, "Invention is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration."

You can tell that your energy is shifting along with the dynamics at work, but you might still resist the change. Accordingly, you may feel stressed as current circumstances require you to let go of familiar routines that bring you comfort. Although you're concerned that your actions will adversely affect others, you need to take a risk while the dramatic Leo Moon is dancing in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Observe your reactions closely today, especially while interacting with people who stir up your emotions. It's perfectly acceptable to switch the topic if things get too intense for your taste.

Personal interactions with friends and associates  brings you a lot of joy today; however, there might be a price to pay. If you overextend your social calendar now, you might find yourself too tired to fulfill your obligations. Fortunately, you can turn moderation into a spiritual practice that has immediate practical benefits. Curtailing your activities enables you to conserve enough energy to feel content with both your personal and professional accomplishments at the end of the day.

You might feel like a hamster running in a wheel today, as you mull over the same ideas over and over. Your mental gymnastics may almost feel obsessive, but they also indicate that there could be a significant piece of information about a current project still missing from the picture. Nevertheless, continue to shine your inner light for all to see. Don't exert too much energy trying to find an elusive answer; just trust that it will all make sense in due time.

Unsettled career questions make it tough to relax today, but at least the rush of adrenaline lets you know you are alive. Relationship dramas may weigh on your heart now, but openly expressing your intentions brings temporary relief. Unfortunately, the underlying issues won't be resolved so easily. Don't bother trying to tie up every feeling into a tidy package. Just maintain a positive attitude as you continue to reinvent your future. Remember, lasting change doesn't happen overnight.

Friends or family members may be overly critical of your plans while relentless Pluto leans on strict Saturn in your 7th House of Others. Your confidence is rattled today because you believe it's your fault if you fall short of someone's expectations. Although you might not receive the approval you want now, recognition could come later if you're willing to face your fears. Don't keep everyone at a distance so you can appear invincible. People are more likely to support you if you have the courage to be your authentic self.

Your inner turmoil could go unnoticed today because your current busyness keeps you distracted from the real issues at hand. Although you feel quite productive in your own way, you may still have trouble maintaining your focus for long. You can consciously concentrate on achieving the results you want or you can just fritter your time away by doing one trivial thing after another. You might be surprised with how much enjoyment you derive from channeling your passion into your work.

You're ready to swing into motion today, but you might be feeling a little lazy and don't want to move too quickly. Spending the morning in contemplation could be just what you need now so you can analyze the possible outcomes to each of your ambitious strategies. However, constructing a careful plan won't propel you to your desired destination by itself. Use the fixed and fiery Leo Moon's intent to initiate bold action that will lead to tangible results. Make the most of the cosmic momentum while you have the chance.

Keeping your emotions secret is prudent from time to time, but now it's time to follow your natural inclination and share your desires with others. However, you can't indiscriminately express every single whim that pops into awareness, regardless of whom you happen to be talking to at the moment. Your personal life is your business, unless you choose to divulge your feelings to someone you trust. Thankfully, satisfaction is yours if you are judicious when it comes to revealing your heart.

Discussing your plans with a close friend provides a welcome sense of relief, but it's not wise to endlessly ramble on. The Moon's presence in your 12th House of Privacy raises issues about the conflict between discretion and honesty as you vacillate between telling others your true feelings and saying nothing at all. In the final analysis, all you can do is stay conscious of your words and stop talking before you diffuse your message. Consider your audience; if you run into any doubt, err on the side of caution.

Your growing desire to be a part of a larger community motivates you to step out of your comfort zone to mix and mingle with the crowd. The Moon's trek through your 11th House of Social Networking invites you to be a more active participant in your group of friends and associates today. However, you must establish clear limits or you could be dragged into an unnecessary drama before you know it. Remember, your determination to hold your ground is what allows you to join in the fun without any emotional risk.

You might be expected to set aside your weekend plans to help a friend in need. Even if you're committed to doing your part, you don't like it when others just assume that you will say yes. Instead of immediately offering to rearrange your schedule to jump into the project of the moment, share your concerns first. Once you place your position out on the table, you can negotiate a solution that is more comfortable for everyone involved. Working for the common cause is admirable as long as you don't lose yourself in the process.

You're even more outspoken than normal, espousing opinions on everything for everyone to hear. But people may be confused by your behavior because you're uplifting and inspirational one moment and overly resistant to new ideas the next. Instead of blurting out the first thing that crosses your mind, take a deep breath and let others know you need to clarify your thoughts before you share any conclusions. No one will fault you for your honesty; a little circumspection works wonders for your image.

Deciding whether or not to disclose your intentions to someone you admire may be a real struggle today. Naturally, you want your feelings to be acknowledged, but you're also afraid of losing the support you already count on. Push through your fears and express your thoughts without expecting any particular response. The wisest way to prevent potential emotional distress is to remain unattached to the outcome. Opening your heart is mandatory if you want to give magic a chance to work.

Slipping into a familiar relationship pattern is all-too tempting while the emotional Moon canoodles with benevolent Jupiter in your 7th House of Companions. Although Luna connects you with all that's gone by, there's no guarantee that a tried-and-true method will succeed while unpredictable Uranus is in the picture, too. Instead of reacting impulsively and running for shelter, consider the consequences before just playing it safe. Look forward to find your happiness in the future rather than wistfully gazing back at the past.

There's a small window of opportunity to upgrade your daily regimen if you're willing to use it. The Moon's current hook-up with propitious Jupiter in your 6th House of Health reminds you of the inarguable relationship between diet, exercise and your overall well-being. Even if you already eat organically and practice yoga, it's time to raise the ante and make minor improvements to your personal routine. It's always wise to cultivate more awareness and further enhance your lifestyle; even the tiniest adjustments now can have significant positive ramifications over the months to come.

It's not fun when someone rejects your plans, but you might as well reserve your complaining for some other day. You won't likely receive a lot of support if an idea of yours can't stand up to fair criticism. Thankfully, the circumstances are not as dire as you think. Your contributions can have significant impact if you are willing to hear the tough truth now, learn an important lesson and step up your game as needed. The most successful people know there's always room for improvement.

Although you've been trying your best to simplify your life, you're still busier than you prefer. Luckily, today is a turning point and you can finally begin to regain control of your calendar. You have been running down a dream, but are now required to stop so you can concentrate on a single issue that demands your immediate attention. Fortunately, redirecting your thoughts away from fantasies and toward mundane considerations enables you to set aside extraneous distractions and produce measurable results.

You aren't interested in listening to the cool voice of reason today because it seems as if your current commitments prevent you from taking the most desirable path. Without an apparent way out of your present dilemma, you might have to get serious now about changing your schedule. Thankfully, you realize that your casual attitude can't make the very real problems disappear. The good news is that your determination to untangle a complicated dilemma could be enough to do the trick.

You've been happily immersed in your imagination, yet today your daydreams run into the cold, hard truths of reality. Unfortunately, you're not ready to leave your fantasies behind but the longer you avoid your obligations, the more of a challenge it will be to handle them in the long run. Starting your work now is smarter than procrastinating for one more day. Although your irrational feelings are running all over the map, they won't lead to satisfaction. Your logic is the key to finding your way back to your center of gravity.

Reaching your long-term goals might feel like an impossible dream as you try to sort out where things stand in your life now. But there's little time for self-pity because you have important work to do today. Don't waste precious energy if you want to take advantage of the current window of opportunity. Make use of your legendary Leo zest for life as you make positive changes to your trajectory. When the going gets tough, the tough get going.

It seems as if you're being schooled today on a lesson you already know, making you feel a bit foolish in the process. But it's no one else's fault if you have a hard time accepting criticism. Thankfully, the Sun's shift into your 11th House of Long-Term Goals and the Moon's return to your sign can help take your mind off the present moment and aim your dreams toward the future. Make the necessary changes within yourself, without trying to change anyone else.

Blind optimism morphs into enlightened realism today as your big ideas collide with a heavy dose of the truth. You might believe you only have two options. On one hand, your open-minded perspective is life-affirming; on the other hand, you can choose to shut down your heart in fear. However, there's a wide range of alternatives in the middle. The most important thing to do now is to make the most informed choices possible before moving on. Finding the sweet spot between the two extremes is your key to happiness.

You long to have a deep conversation with a confidant today, but he or she might skillfully avoid talking about anything that's too unsettling. Or, perhaps you are the one who is cleverly engineering the conversation to prevent an uncomfortable topic from surfacing. Although the opportunity to discuss your feelings will continue to grow throughout the days ahead, don't let this chance to connect with someone you trust slip by. Burdens are lighter when shared with a friend.

Normally, you can see the positive side to nearly any situation. You are innately skillful at making just about everything sound better when you are trying to inspire others. Although you get a real kick out of banishing gray clouds from the sky, you still might have a difficult time today staying on the sunny side of the street. Nevertheless, it's imperative to maintain your most glorious vision of the future, for your optimism touches more people's lives than you realize.

You face a complex dilemma today, for your success might appear to be in jeopardy as the Sun agitates your key planet Saturn. Your expectations are stymied by current limitations, making it hard to muster up the self-confidence you normally have at your disposal. Your natural reaction may be to circle the wagons now and anticipate the worst. However, your lack of control is only a temporary state of affairs. Your dedication, coupled with a positive outlook, should put you back in the saddle faster than you think.

Although it's the weekend, your attitude about your job could turn a notch more serious while sobering Saturn forms an anxious alignment with the Sun in your 6th House of Employment. Spend time imagining new ways to sustain your recent gains by solidifying your professional relationships. If differences of opinion are at play, there's no need to force resolution. Instead of worrying about something you can't fix right away, focus on areas of your life where you can make progress today.

Disagreements with a lover or a playmate can be emotionally draining today, especially if your partner believes you're making a fuss over nothing. But you just want to be appreciated for who you are; your tender feelings may be wounded now if someone forgets to respect your wishes. Recognizing your needs is important, but resolving discord in a relationship still requires your commitment to meet the other person halfway. Making the first move might not be easy, but it's the quickest way to forgive and forget.

Trivial facts can be annoying today, especially if they get in the way of your ambitious goals. However, you're in a hurry to produce results and could judge others harshly if they can't keep up with your accelerated pace. Naturally, practicing patience might alleviate tension before it even arises, but you just don't have the time to wait. You'll take the faster speed, along with the complications. Thankfully, the cosmos will reward your independent thinking now as long as you have a solid plan in place. Being a leader doesn't always mean the pack will follow.

You don't have a lot of bandwidth for frivolous activities today; however, a bit of fun isn't out of the question. You are ready to temporarily set your responsibilities aside, especially if you believe it's possible to learn something valuable from an extracurricular experience. Find out in advance how much time you need to allow for play so you can finish up your chores later on. It will be easier to escape with a clear conscience if you already have all of your bases covered.

You aren't necessarily the most meticulous worker in the world, yet you can move very quickly once you start a job. Unfortunately, you might put too much attention on the details if you are trying to impress someone today. But even with the very best of intentions, your work may not bring the emotional satisfaction you seek. Nevertheless, don't be too self-critical; just do the best you can at every turn. You may be quite pleased with how quickly your efforts bear fruit if you maintain a positive attitude.

You can accomplish more today if you prepare in advance instead of making everything up on the fly. Attending to your work commitments early allows you to have time to get in touch with your feelings. Meeting your obligations is honorable, but don't be so focused on the clock that you miss a truly wonderful chance to connect with your heart. Ultimately, it's not your worldly success that matters; it's the love you cultivate in your life that counts.

You want to catch up on financial matters today while your mental acuity is sharp. However, the best application of your analytical skills isn't  to pay bills or balance your accounts. The current issues are more significant and affect nearly every aspect of your world. If you must make a choice about allocating funds now, use your resources in the most practical way possible. Avoid making quick assessments; instead, reflect on what's of most value to you before gambling with your future.

You might be uncomfortable with your irrational mood swings today while the emotional Moon visits your pragmatic sign. Avoid tasks that require high levels of concentration now, for you may not be able to prevent your mind from wandering. Even if you want to take the day off, you're unwilling to disappoint those who depend on you. However, scheduling short breaks throughout the day improves your ability to capitalize on the brilliant ideas that light up your mind.

Containing yourself is nearly impossible today even if you're not quite ready to let others know your feelings. Ironically, keeping your emotions quiet now can heighten your spiritual awareness as long as you don't slip into denial about what's going on in your relationships. Don't succumb to external pressures; you'll know exactly when to act if you trust your intuition more than anyone else's advice. Listening to your heart is the most direct path to happiness.

Socializing with your friends and coworkers in an unconventional setting offers the change of pace you seek today. But don't try to micromanage the situation and shift the energy to your advantage. Instead of wasting time by attempting to create a memorable event, just stay flexible; there's nothing to be gained now by trying to control the current dynamics. Ultimately, you have more fun and are more authentic when you are acting spontaneously, instead of working from a script.

Unrealistic attempts to juggle one-too-many tasks today could lead to giving a poor performance across the board. Tread lightly in all of your interactions because understating your responses is the most efficient use of your energy now. Just take care of every problem in a calm and collected manner as soon as it pops up. Your confidence suddenly returns when others acknowledge how well you are handling a complicated situation. Reining in your enthusiasm just a little allows your competence to shine.

Powerful forces are at work today, yet they may be lurking in the shadows, leaving you on edge. However, it's not your smartest move to accept the adage, "out of sight, out of mind." You might be tempted to overlook a minor detail now, but the tiniest thing could be the catalyst that turns your day around. Instead of jumping from one task to another, stick with each one until you are sure that the energy has run its course. Determination is your friend.

There are numerous benefits to working in close collaboration with a partner now, whether you're starting a new endeavor or just running through your regular tasks. Someone might reveal important information that widens your perspective. However, you may be so quick to judge the contributions of others today that you shut them down before you hear what they have to say. Giving your peers a chance to express their ideas not only improves your work but also strengthens an important relationship in the process.

You may feel as if everything you do today doesn't quite meet other people's standards. But the fact of the matter is someone might be highly critical of your actions if he or she doesn't understand you or your behavior. Rather than responding as if you are a victim, carefully explain your intentions one more time. Even if you're heading back over familiar territory, it's still more advantageous to share your hurt feelings instead of hiding them. Initiating an honest dialogue provides an opportunity to clear the air once and for all.

Conflicting cosmic instructions make it nearly impossible to please others today. One voice tells you to go while another commands you to stop. Macho Mars runs into Saturn's obstacles and there doesn't seem to be a way to get past the resistance. If you push too hard, you may wish you didn't. But if you don't try at all, you will wish you did. The only logical strategy now is to steer clear of extremes as you actively work the accelerator and the brake to stay within the speed limit.

You can grow very obstinate if you're manipulated in ways you don't like. It might feel as if everything is changing too fast today for your tastes, but clinging to the present is futile nonetheless. The more you attempt to hold your ground, the harder it is to get your footing in the midst of the storm. Don't try to fix everything; instead, find pleasure in the little things you can actually control. Luckily, the stress continues to lighten over the days ahead, so there's no point in fighting the inevitable when you can embrace the unknown.

You're reluctant to reveal your fantasies today because you worry that people will misunderstand you. Unfortunately, carrying around too many secrets could inadvertently invite a minor emotional meltdown. In the same way you can create walls by hiding your feelings, you can also remove the barriers by talking about your concerns with someone you trust. Relationship dynamics might not improve right away; in fact, things could get worse before they start to improve. Being honest sets the right tone while practicing patience leads to success.

Although you may be talking a mile a minute today, you still might not say exactly what you mean. People can tell that your chattiness is just one of your ways to cover up your insecurities. Fortunately, you're already on the edge of making an important breakthrough now, so don't waste time burying your emotions. The key to your current satisfaction is staying conscious of your process and allowing it to progress at its own natural rate. Don't worry about what to say next; when in doubt, simply bring your awareness back to your heart.

You might think you're taking the most rational path today, but you could be under a false illusion that everything is fine. Unfortunately, something that was recently bothering you could suddenly erupt again unless you stay in close touch with your feelings now. However, your growing sense of urgency may not actually be a true reflection of the current circumstances. Don't wait for something crazy to happen; express your emotions before they get blown out of proportion. Being honest from the start prevents unnecessary drama from hijacking your day.

You might be so sure of your current actions that you miss the nuances of the political dynamics at work today. Unfortunately, you could set off an emotional landmine now that the moody Moon is traveling through your sign. It may feel as if someone is working at cross-purposes now, but it's more likely that your goals seem so different because you have such divergent approaches. Seek common ground in the present moment instead of trying to integrate your plans for the future into another person's dreams.

It seems as if everyone has his or her particular idea of what you should be doing now, but no one is bothering to ask you what you want to do. This apparent disconnect is tricky territory to navigate, especially if you already feel alienated from those you love. Although people appreciate you trying to meet their demands, it may be more important to acknowledge your own needs first. There might not be a simple solution in sight, but you can minimize your frustration by shifting your attention away from your long-term goals and just live for the day.

Instead of trying to convince anyone that your strategy is practical, examine your weaknesses so you can better understand how they lead you to overcompensate in your work. Rather than focusing on your own progress today, see what you can learn from others without trying to compete with them. When you're ready to jump back into the fray, remember that winning is less important than turning every moment into another chapter in your journey of self-discovery.

Although you're doing your best to demonstrate your good intentions, people still may not be satisfied with your efforts. You're feeling performance pressure now and it's disconcerting if you sincerely believe that others are working against you. However, there's absolutely no need to fight back; just continue gathering the facts and be ready to tell your side of the story when asked. In the meantime, rest assured that the only one you truly have to please is yourself.

You're willing to endure hardship and austerity as long as you know that a big payoff might be yours in the near future. Your patience usually works in your favor, but now impulsive Mars is pushing for immediate results. Unfortunately, nothing is going to change overnight that will enable you to claim your reward any faster. Lessen your anxiety by temporarily suspending your need to speed up the process. You will arrive at your destination exactly on time if you confidently persevere in your efforts.

You know exactly what you want but you have no idea how to get it. Don't worry if you're without a coherent strategy today; too much advanced planning only reduces your spontaneity. Unfortunately, some people may see you as uncooperative now, but that's not your intent; you just want to make your point as succinctly as possible. Once you make your case, you really don't have to try so hard to prove your loyalty or your competence. Ultimately, your actions will speak louder than your words.

You may be feeling your oats today, but possessing self-confidence doesn't necessarily mean your dreams will automatically come true. Part of your problem is that asking for the wrong thing now sets you up for failure before you even start. Thankfully, your sense of timing improves as the day wears on. What begins as a blunder could turn into a strong conviction to do the right thing. Following your moral compass enhances your chances for success.

Your intensity is on the rise, yet you may feel moody and withdrawn today, filling you with contradictions. Unfortunately, you're bothered by the same things that wouldn't necessarily concern you on some other day. Additionally, you might grow annoyed with your own denial because you don't want to confront the source of the current irritation. Nevertheless, consciously facing an uncomfortable issue now is smarter than unconsciously losing your temper down the road.

Work is stressful these days, but you can't just stay home to avoid the tense dynamics. Although your heart might not be totally committed to what you're doing, you need to show up in a responsible manner. Even if you have doubts about your ability to deliver the goods, don't hold back just because you're feeling insecure in the moment. Go beyond the call of duty and put your best foot forward. The appreciation you receive will fuel your confidence, leaving you happy you made the extra effort.

You may experience a bit of an emotional letdown today as passionate Mars leaves your sign to float in the warm waters of Cancer. Although you might be afraid that you're going to miss all the action, nothing could be further from the truth. There is plenty for you to do if you focus on solidifying what you started over the past month. In the meantime, treat yourself to a gift of some quiet time for a change; after all, you need the rest so you will be fully prepared for the work ahead.

Happily, your confidence is irrepressible now, even if obstacles resurfaced this week to slow your progress. Luckily, superhero Mars shifts into your sign this morning, boosting your stamina and motivating you to start your latest version of your action plan. Although it's not your intention, you could run over someone else's agenda today without even realizing it. It's critical to find a proper outlet for your enterprising nature so you don't take your frustration out on a loved one. Channel your passion into your work.

Your expressive personality has been working on overdrive and you may have spent too much time socializing without producing anything of lasting value. However, your needs are changing now that energetic Mars is hiding out in your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. Instead of dreaming about receiving recognition from your peers, you're fantasizing about running off to a monastery or at the very least, a remote tropical island. You relish the lack of performance pressure today. Enjoy your temporary invisibility while it lasts, for you'll be called back onto center stage soon enough.

You are known for taking your commitments very seriously, but it is best not to overdo it today. If your sense of loyalty to a friend stems from guilt, it's wise to keep your motives to yourself. Honesty is an admirable trait, but you really don't need to express everything all at once. Nothing will be gained by telling your whole story now except a colossal headache. Give others a chance to reflect on what you say before barraging them with another layer of complexity. Life isn't as complicated as you make it.

Seeking balance is a never-ending struggle, but this search for harmony triggers a familiar conflict between home and career today. You might be inclined to take on more responsibility at work without sufficient energy to follow through on your ambitions. Or, maybe family obligations are tilting the scales away from your professional aspirations. No matter what's happening now, the Moon's return to your sign personalizes the current crisis. Luckily, with vigilant self-awareness your emotions won't bottle up and turn to resentment. Remaining transparent keeps everyone on the same page.

Walking away from an emotional confrontation doesn't indicate that you aren't willing to fully experience your feelings. It's just that you believe your involvement won't add anything positive to an already complicated situation. The Moon's presence in your 12th House of Privacy delivers the message that sometimes keeping your reactions to yourself is the healthiest thing to do. Nevertheless, stay in touch with your desires, even if you choose not to share them today. Timing is everything.

You are often fun-loving, even cavalier, as you journey through life, so you may surprise others during this more introspective phase. Even if you're emotionally reserved now, don't shy away from acknowledging a difference in perspective if it will improve the current dynamics. Simply work through any conflict that arises today by adding a dash of self-deprecating humor. If you can muster up the courage to face your own sense of inadequacy, there's an excellent chance that your natural optimism will return soon enough.

You're resigned to the fact that you have to put your shoulder to the wheel, but you're willing to do whatever it takes since the stakes are so high. However, you aren't necessarily ready to get started immediately, even if there is already a lot of work waiting for you. You might justify your current inaction by claiming you're reserving your energy for later on when you will need it. Go ahead and glide through the day if you want, but don't procrastinate for too long or you'll be sorry. Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

There are such a limited number of options in front of you now that you could feel trapped by your own familiar patterns. Unfortunately, you may have sacrificed your independence for an emotional security that you're not even sure you want. Luckily, talking about your dilemma is the first step toward finding a solution. Even if nothing dramatically changes right away, you'll still feel better once the issues are out in the open. Everything will appear less daunting once seen in the light of day.

You might be angry with a friend or lover today, though it's challenging to say anything without making the situation worse. Although your conflicted emotions are playing out on the relationship stage, this dilemma is really about your inability to express your passion. You are likely irritated because your actions aren't truly representing your feelings. Fortunately, there's no need to resolve the differences between your inner and outer realities now. In fact, allowing them to temporarily coexist can be the source of great spiritual teachings if you're willing to do the work.

It's tempting to take the demands of your job home with you today, but loved ones are quickly annoyed by your cranky mood if you do. Your attitude affects those around you more than you realize, so don't spread your negativity by bringing your problems home from work. You might feel as if you're on a collision course with reality now, yet you can avoid the crisis of impact by being more compassionate in your interactions. When in doubt, widen your perspective to include what others want, too. The needs of the many outweigh yours alone.

You wish you didn't feel so much pressure to accomplish your goals, but there aren't enough hours in the day to allow you to relax. You might try to finish your work, but you won't make much progress by doing the same old thing in the same old way today. Avoid slipping into a rut; if something doesn't rattle your cage early in the day, then take the initiative and step outside of the box on your own volition. Don't wait too long to shake things up if you want to create positive change.

You may regret bringing up a subject in a conversation today that has already been discussed one too many times. Even if you are uncharacteristically clinging to a past memory, it's apparent that others are ready to move on. Thankfully, if you just stop and think about how your reluctance to let go could trigger hurt feelings now, you can prevent an uncomfortable situation from turning into a more painful drama. Don't look back; walk through the door to your future with no regrets.

Although you strive to be fair-minded today, it's just as easy to go overboard with your opinions without even realizing your bias. You may perceive people as being more optimistic now than they actually are, tricking you into believing that everything is copacetic. But the real meaning of a current emotional exchange might be connected to someone's motives that are so subtle you miss the point. Do your best to listen to what's being said in between the spoken words so you can tune into the underlying message. Discovering the truth is the first step to enlightenment.

A familiar relationship issue could resurface today when a close friend or relative says something hurtful that would have been harmless on any other day. Nevertheless, insensitive words may dredge up a difficult memory that you wish to avoid. Regain your emotional balance by distinguishing between old fears and what is occurring in the immediate moment. Keep in mind you're not in the same place as you were before and therefore don't need to suffer the same consequences. Treating those you love kindly in the present helps heal wounds of the past.
