Although your creative imagination offers plenty of inspiration, don't just succumb to wandering in your dreams today; walk between both the mundane and the magical worlds for the best results.

It might feel as if someone stole your wallet or broke your heart today. Or perhaps you're the one who is raining on someone else's parade by withholding affection. You may be experiencing a sense of loss if you think you're coming up short in the money or love department. However dissatisfied you are with your current circumstances, there is a silver lining to the dark cloud above you as you learn to temporarily get by with less. Keep the faith; your clarity will enable you to define what you truly want once the blue skies return.

The people who you think know you the best don't seem to understand you at all today. To make matters worse, the harder you try to explain your feelings, the more distance you create. Instead of rushing to bridge the gulf, calmly accept the space that has appeared between you and a loved one. A healthy relationship has its own rhythm of expansion and contraction, like the breath. Instead of trying to control this process, just observe it. There's no need to push for resolution now; simply allow the emotional tide to ebb and flow at its own natural pace.

Too many chores on your to-do list prevent you from getting closer to your loved ones today. You don't have the luxury of engaging in open-ended conversations about your feelings. The issues you want to explore must be postponed to another time. Instead of pining over what you don't have now, let it go. Focusing on the lack of heart connection only spirals you into loneliness. Concentrate on what you can do to raise your game when it comes to relationships. Upgrading your emotional quotient will improve your interactions with people once repressive Saturn moves out of the way.

Although you often like to maintain a fairly low profile, you want others to stand up and take notice of you today. Unfortunately, it may seem as if you can't get the respect you think you deserve, no matter how awesome your work is now. Don't let anyone shake your confidence; if you know you're doing your best, just let the criticism roll off you like water off a duck's back. The truth is self-esteem comes from within and not from others.

Love's sweet indulgences are on your mind, but grumpy Saturn has a different plan for your day. Expressing your passion doesn't work its usual magic today. Unfortunately, laying on the charm won't affect others if they are already entrenched in a serious mindset. You're ready to put on a show, but you're quick to pack your bags and head home if there's no audience to appreciate your performance. Nevertheless, don't make the mistake of believing it's an all-or-nothing deal when the lesson is about scaling back your expectations. Work now, play later.

You might keep your romantic dreams to yourself now if you believe they will never come true. Meanwhile, your friends contribute in their own way to your current sense of isolation without even knowing it. Although you may interact with others socially, it seems as if they're having trouble seeing the real you. Your lack of communication could inadvertently fuel the tension. Obviously, sharing your heart is scary because it exposes your vulnerability. However, communicating your feelings is the antidote to the victim mentality you may find yourself susceptible to. Self-empowerment begins with self-expression.

You can't seem to please your boss or your coworkers today no matter what you do. Although this discord would usually bother you enough to turn your self-confidence into self-doubt, you currently have a much more straightforward response in mind. You just want to wish everyone luck and go home. Naturally, you would prefer for others to appreciate your efforts, but you're not going to make peace now even if you try. Let others be annoyed with you if they must but don't let their opinions bring you down.

Money may be tight these days and romance is nowhere to be found. However, these stressful circumstances are not valid reasons to give up and hide under the covers. Instead of wasting precious time feeling sorry for yourself, reevaluate the ways you can improve your current fiscal situation and upgrade your relationship life. Quit worrying about everyone else and just focus on striving to be the best version of you possible. The love you need to cultivate is the love for yourself.

The secrets you keep buried have more influence now that vulnerable Venus is squaring austere Saturn in your 12th House of Privacy. It seems as if reality can't live up to your fantasies now no matter what you do. You might even feel like your dreams are being squashed for no reason. However, your frustration will lessen when you stop trying to make your life as perfect as it is in your imagination. Graciously accepting the difference between your inner world and the external circumstances puts you back on the road to gratitude and harmony.

It's hard to read people because their behavior is unpredictable and their expression inscrutable. In fact, the more questions you ask, the more they clam up while four planets are hanging out in self-protective Cancer and your 7th House of Companions. Although your gentle persistence could surprisingly bring positive results, you'll never know if you surrender too soon. There is a delicate dance between being overly demanding and just shrugging your shoulders and walking away. Finding that sweet spot turns your frustration into success.

You have to be a worker bee today when you would rather be a social butterfly. You may feel as if you're the only one who has to meet a demanding production schedule, but the truth of the matter is everyone -- you included -- must contribute to the greater good. Unfortunately, you might have to move personal relationships to the back burner temporarily while you take care of urgent matters of business now. Responsibility is a matter of integrity.

Producing tangible results needs to be your top priority today. You don't have much leeway now; you're expected to be highly responsive to pressing issues in the real world even though you would prefer to spend the day pushing the boundaries of your imagination. Don't wait to see what drama waits in the wings to release the unexpected tension; pull in the reins immediately before uncomfortable events do it for you. You're not all airy-fairy and this is your chance to prove it.

Although profound resistance to your plans can stop you in your tracks today, don't give up on a good idea just because someone tells you it has no merit. If you don't understand why you are running into trouble, stop and listen carefully to the message of the Cancer New Moon as it floods your 4th House of Security. Obstacles are more easily handled once you accept that your current fear of change is unwarranted. Ironically, it's less important to reach your destination now than it is to fine-tune your plans. Safety comes first.

Although you probably have a overcrowded calendar while the Cancer New Moon rocks your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, it's still tough to shift into gear. At first, you're tempted to get by with doing less but your energy builds steam throughout the day, enabling you to overcome  anything that stands in your path once you find your pace. Just remember you're not the only person with an ambitious agenda and intriguing ideas. Staying open to new information from a variety of sources can dramatically change your perspective and increase your options.

It's all too easy to waste time running around in circles just trying to keep up with the hectic pace of events. But unless you slow down and reconnect with your core values today you may not feel satisfied with your objectives while the Cancer New Moon emphasizes your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Proceed with caution now; taking time for contemplation should not be thought of as a retreat. In fact, you could jeopardize your success if you continue to move too fast. Remember, reaching your goals is more like a marathon than a sprint.

The emotional New Moon in your sign is an early warning sign of an energetic shift that's unfolding at home or within your family. You might choose to hide your head in the sand, only to be shocked by what happens. Or, perhaps you're trying to co-create your future by living the change you seek. Start by creating a list of resolutions, as if today is New Year's Day. Focusing your positive intentions during the New Moon plants significant seeds of thought in your fertile imagination.

Today's Cancer New Moon is a fresh start, but this new beginning falls in your 12th House of Endings, revealing an ironic blending of two cycles. But beginning a new phase prior to completing old business can be extremely problematic for everyone involved. Allow the current process to play out naturally or you might miss your chance to get the closure you need. Your best bet is to stay aware of the relationship between what you are finishing and what you hope to do next.

You may feel uncomfortably isolated while the moody Cancer New Moon shakes up your 11th House of Community. People that you can usually count on are nowhere to be found when you go searching for advice today. Thankfully, your real friends will come through in the nick of time with the support that you need. But don't draw conclusions prematurely; give others the benefit of the doubt instead of assuming the worst.

You may feel pressured to make a career move today as the Cancer New Moon highlights your 10th House of Career. But a relatively minor family crisis might add stress to your day, especially if you're already involved in a disagreement with another family member. You won't be happy if someone tries to take control of the situation now, but you should heed their advice, nonetheless. Don't throw the baby out with the bathwater; be astute enough to show your ability to discern what's useful from what is not.

Building emotional continuity in your life is an admirable goal, but it may come with a component of drama now that the moody Cancer New Moon stirs up trouble in your 9th House of Big Ideas. You may be happy to know who you are and where you are heading. But your drive can be so intense now that you feel compelled to stand up for your beliefs. Tread carefully, for you could inadvertently provoke a conflict by resorting to aggressive behavior. Instead, channel your passion into physical activities instead.

You might be unsure about your evolving direction because the Cancer New Moon rattles your 8th House of Transformation, evoking a sense of discomfort by pushing you to explore feelings that you would rather forget. Don't belittle a friend's melodrama by judging it so trivial that you don't have to get involved. Your willingness to partake in a meaningful dialogue may be exactly what's required to take a relationship to a new level of intimacy.

An overly emotional interaction with a friend or partner reveals that he or she has more to tell you now than you previously thought. There may be a suppressed issue lurking in the background as the Cancer New Moon occurs in your 7th House of Relationships. Unfortunately, you might not know what to do about the imbalance. Direct confrontation could make matters worse. But letting it slide ends up contributing to the negative energy. The conversation will be awkward at first, but you can make a positive difference if you talk about your uneasiness without blaming anyone else.

You aren't necessarily aware of harboring any resentments about your job, but it's not that simple to let go of an unresolved hurt. Fortunately, you have a pretty good grasp of the source of your current negativity if you are willing to be honest. The Cancer New Moon's presence in your 6th House of Logistics gives you a clear picture of what you must do next. Be open to receiving emotional support from people who have your best interests at heart. Leaning on loved ones gives you the strength to process your feelings and get on with the real work at hand.

You can finally stand and hold your ground after an extended period of uncertainty. But your feelings are more complex than they seem on the surface now that the cautious Cancer New Moon lands in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Don't overcompensate with false bravado; there's no logical justification for flaunting your victory. Nothing is gained by creating a competitive environment where others are threatened by your success. Softening your stance helps to relieve tension and return harmony back to your relationship world.

You're waiting for someone to say the wrong word today so you can pounce on them in defense of your position. You're probably unaware of your true motives; you're not even conscious of how intense you sound now. Although you are more bark than bite, people still might take your intensity at face value. There's little to gain by protecting your boundaries from imaginary enemies. Lowering your voice and letting others speak is a simple yet straightforward way to realign the tense dynamics. Take a deep breath and count to ten before you act in anger.

It feels like your loved ones are pushing your buttons today just to see how far they can go before you push back. It seems like it's one thing after another and you are overwhelmed with all their demands on your time. At first, you're eager to demonstrate your good will by rearranging your schedule, but it probably won't be enough to satisfy everyone. But even the most easygoing of Bulls have their limits and you may soon reach your boiling point. Although you just want to reclaim your personal space, you might have to make a big commotion to get others to notice. Speak softly and carry a big stick.

Subjectivity rules the day. You and a friend or loved one may find it difficult to find common ground in a disagreement over a difference in values. Your two positions couldn't be more opposite today and finding points of understanding may end up being an exercise in futility. The most direct route to creating resolution might be going your separate ways for a while. Walking away takes courage but it's an integral part of the peace process now. Above all, be kind in all your words and deeds or you will have a wider gulf to cross down the road.

There isn't even a split second between your thoughts and your reactions today. Being so fast on your feet might be advantageous in a crisis situation but could be problematic for relationships. You might do something foolish before you think about the impact of your behavior. It may sound impossible to do now, but you must stop and reevaluate your present situation before you speak or act in a way you will soon regret. Don't snap at the ones who care the most.

You can take a simple comment from someone at work today and turn it into a soap opera melodrama. Unfortunately, you're not processing your thoughts now; you're just blindly reacting from a place of fear or pride. Don't bite someone's head off if he or she just asks you a simple question. Starting the day off with a bit of self-reflection through meditation, yoga or prayer might bring you enough awareness to move through the day with grace and gratitude. Keep the roar to a minimum and you should be fine.

You Virgos know quite a bit about self-sufficiency and your survival skills may be put to the test today. Paradoxically, you could feel the loneliest when you're in the midst of a crowded event or a group of friends. However, you might be better off spending time alone and doing things that further your spiritual path. Looking to others for a solution only adds unnecessary stress to your relationships when what you really need now comes from within. Personal growth is a journey you must do alone.

On the surface it appears that you're just another member of the group, however, you might actually be subtly pulling all the strings. Others don't even realize you're the master puppeteer behind the scenes. Just be careful that you don't get so enamored with being in control that you forget the plot. Your priorities may need sorting out today, but everything will be alright if you remember the collective cause is more important now than your personal dreams. Participating in the show instead of trying to run it increases your chances of being on the winning team.

Your own special version of honesty may be too much for most people to handle today. Even if your intentions are well-meaning, you might harm more than help if you speak before you think. Maintaining a safe distance from others until your blood is no longer boiling seems like a sensible way to minimize collateral damage. However, burying your feelings is an invitation to disaster because they will gain power and inconveniently express, anyhow. Your real work isn't about changing your message; it's about increasing your awareness. It's easy to criticize someone else, raise the bar and improve your game, instead.

Placing your dreams of adventure temporarily on hold may be necessary today because there are the needs of others to take in consideration, too. Unfortunately, another person's dependence on you is in direct conflict with your current yearning for freedom. You don't like the fact that you can't just run off and follow your bliss. Although you value your independence, you're willing to accept your current position of accountability to maintain healthy relationships. Try an empathetic approach by putting yourself in someone else's shoes before taking a hike in your own.

You want to buckle down and take care of business today, but everyone seems to have their own tale to tell. Obviously, you have a personal agenda as well, but your priorities are different than everyone else's. The bottom line is you don't have the patience to deal with people's trivial concerns when there's serious work to be done. In the most diplomatic manner possible, inform everyone that success must be earned and there's no time like the present to get busy. Leading by example is the best way to get your message across.

There's no denying that you have a lot of chores on your plate today. Paradoxically, the more you accomplish, the more there is to do. No matter how hard you work, people expect more. To make matters worse, you can't seem to concentrate now as you continue to float off into inner space. Although you might not be able to prevent drifting in and out of focus, you could capitalize on your imagination by applying a splash of creativity to your daily routine. A little change will do you good.

You're having trouble fitting in with the group today and you're not even sure you want to try. You feel the need to resist the peer pressure to conform because you don't want to lose your creative edge. But don't be afraid to take a risk and try a whole new strategy. You might get away with pacifying others, so do whatever you can to accommodate their wishes as long as it doesn't compromise your beliefs. If everyone sees you as a valuable member of the team, you'll end up having plenty of latitude to express yourself in your own unique manner.

You might receive a rude awakening if you think your past accomplishments will be enough to let you slide by without having to do much real work today. It's true that wishful thinking can be a very effective tool for self-motivation but, unfortunately, your current confidence isn't necessarily based on reality. Creating a best-case scenario in your imagination won't automatically improve your life. Instead of resting on your laurels, visualize the potential at stake now and invest the sweat equity required to make something special happen. You reap what you sow.

You want to be a valuable team player today at work or in your community, but your sweet dreams of cooperation and harmony might be too good to be true. At the slightest sign of discord you're tempted to make a hasty retreat, but running back to your safety zone is just another illusion. Avoid disappointment by relaxing your expectations. Facing reality and accepting it just as it is empowers you to get the most out of the group experience. Being authentic in all your actions sets an example for others to follow.

You might act as if you know what you're doing today, but unbeknownst to others you're lost in your own thoughts. Your current lack of direction may be at the root of your confusion. Instead of pretending like you have all the answers now, admit what you don't know so you can focus on what you do know. Revealing your vulnerability is not a sign of weakness; it takes strength to show up as a human, complete with your imperfections. Success is closer than you think if you remain honest with yourself.

You believe that today's uncertainty will surely lead to tomorrow's success story, but you're not yet sure of the details. Your imagination is working overtime to color in the missing parts of the picture, but you would be better off filling in the gaps with the truth rather than with some pretty fantasy. Steer clear of pie-in-the-sky optimism for it won't lead you in the right direction. Instead, play it safe now and stick to the facts for the best results.

You're acutely aware that you are not in charge of other people's feelings. In fact, you don't even seem to be in charge of your own now. Your heart is like a pendulum while the moody Moon holds court in your sign, making it nearly impossible to maintain your course. Just as you think you're making progress, you start to second-guess an earlier assumption. But self-doubt is not a fruitful path. Your emotions are in transition and making final decisions is futile until you regain your bearings. Give yourself some breathing room until the fog lifts and your confidence returns.

You are feeling the need to be nurtured by your co workers or social network, but you're afraid of losing your identity in the crowd. Luckily, maintaining your own direction while also benefiting from a larger collaboration is easier than you might expect. Bring your creative ideas to the group process rather than hoarding them for yourself. Your concerns about losing your independence will vanish if you set clear boundaries right from the start. People can't dim your sparkle unless you let them.

You can't see very far down your current career path now, complicating major decisions you need to make at work. It's challenging to establish rational priorities when your logic is so warped by your feelings. The chores you have on your agenda today might actually be less important than the ones you're delaying. It could take a few more days to sort things out, but your clear-eyed objectivity will return and you'll be able to pick up the pieces where you left them.

Although your originality is apparent, integrating your creativity into your work can be quite a dilemma today. You have no trouble imagining all the colors and the sounds, but you can't figure out how the elements all fit together. You're currently living in two different worlds and the dissonance can be intense as your dreams resist the structure of the three-dimensional realm. Don't try so hard to finish your next masterpiece; generating new inspiration is enough for now.

There are many wonderful opportunities on the horizon, but the weight of the world seems to be on your shoulders today. You have great ideas and high hopes, but might feel frustrated if you can't get off the ground because you're unable to see through the fog. It's enough to take the wind out of your sails. You just might want to go home, crawl into bed and pull the covers over your head. The possibilities are too good to pass up now, so fight the impulse to indulge in self-pity. Have faith; spread your wings and fly.

Interpersonal dynamics may be the cause of serious angst today. You're doing your best to make sense of what others want, but you still fall short of your goal. No matter how hard you try, you're not connecting emotionally with those you love. Although relationships are difficult to navigate now, it's possible to break through the confusion by reducing the pressure to be understood. If there's a gap between what you say and what others hear, don't go back to clarify your intent. Let your message marinate for a while before you try again with a fresh approach.

You can gather all the facts you want, but you're still not going to get to the bottom of an issue today. Your search for answers will likely come up empty-handed with elusive Neptune blurring the planetary picture. Your unwavering hope is that someone will arrive on the scene with a brilliant plan at the very last moment. However, you could set yourself up for disappointment if you're waiting for a miracle. Focus on obtaining practical results from your current efforts without worrying about the outcome. Mysteries have a way of solving themselves when no one is looking.

You could be fooling yourself into believing that your heart is steering you in the right direction now. You might even spin a few stories if you think they could justify your irrational behavior. Normally your intuition is the first place you go to find answers. However, it's wise to stick to the three-dimensional world when seeking solutions today. Allow your imagination to run wild but treat it more like an entertaining movie than an oracle. Go against your nature and let common sense be your guide for a change.

You thrive on the unpredictable nature of the day as mischievous Mercury spars with unorthodox Uranus. Your love of spontaneity works well with the current uncertainty since circumstances can suddenly shift without warning. Thankfully, an electric burst of energy could send shockwaves through your romantic life that start your heart rocking and rolling again. Don't let pride stand in your way. Tell others exactly what you want today; you have no idea what magic is possible unless you try.

You're more nervous than others might suspect today, but you're a natural at keeping your stress under wraps. Your nonchalance may be based on your clever ability to compartmentalize different aspects of your life. Nevertheless, hiding your doubts now isn't as easy as it sounds, but you might choose to minimize your concerns for the sake of those you love. However, you need to confide in someone you trust or find a way to release some steam before you blow your cover. Thankfully, you're more comfortable with your feelings tonight after Venus and the Moon shift into virtuous Virgo.

You love the intellectual stimulation that cerebral Mercury brings to the table today. However, getting your ideas out into the open is much trickier than it seems at first. Perhaps you're overly concerned that your remarks might seem out of context or could be taken the wrong way. But your nagging worries won't ultimately stop you from talking because you chatty Geminis can't stay quiet for long. Paradoxically, a cautious and contemplative approach to communication now enables you to say more in the long run. Listen as much as you speak and you will learn as much as you teach.

Your emotions are running amok today and you can't seem to get a handle on what surprise may be lurking around the next corner. On one hand, you're anticipating the potential excitement but on the other hand, you're also dreading the unknown. Don't take things so personally; make the most of the current instability by leading with your sense of humor rather than your hypersensitivity. Luckily, your resilience is your saving grace.

You can feel a disturbance in the Force today as magnetic Venus and the Moon exit your sign for the more emotionally reserved fields of Virgo. But even you fun-loving Lions need to take a break from the action now and then to catch your breath. This temporary lull is a blessing in disguise, since it offers you a rare chance to recharge your batteries and to prepare for the next round of engagement. If you can escape your obligations, it's a perfect day for a catnap in the Sun.

Skip the second cup of coffee today because the nervous Mercury-Uranus square already makes you feel as if you're jumping out of your skin. Although you could have a heavy load of chores to do today, your thoughts are so scattered that you don't know where to begin. However, it's not all bad news; you might be relieved because you can sense that a welcome change is in the air. You just need to get through the initial transition before you're able to settle into a productive rhythm.

You might have been planning on a day of peace and quiet, but someone may show up unannounced to drop all their drama on your doorstep. Although you wish you had the strength of self-preservation to turn them away today, you're such a good friend that you shake your head and let them in anyway. Remember, there are limits to being a caring friend, especially when nurturing yourself is as important now as being a sounding board for others. You have to take care of yourself before you can care for others.

Even the best-laid plans can go awry today through no fault of your own. It's as if there are secret traps waiting in unsuspecting places. Naturally, the least stressful course of action is to laugh and remember your infinitesimally small place in such a vast universe. The disproportionate extremes are shocking enough to awaken you from your sleep. Discerning what you can control from what you can't is the first step to regaining your sense of balance.

Your enthusiasm only carries you so far today, especially when you realize just how much time and energy it will take to reach your destination. Unfortunately, your biggest and boldest ideas could run into a wall of reality, requiring you to totally reassess your strategy. Nevertheless, your thoughts seem to have a life of their own and won't necessarily evaporate just because you think it would be more convenient if they left you alone. Keeping one foot solidly on the ground empowers you to make the most of your visions without being swept away by them in the process.

Someone's eccentric behavior drives you nuts today, but you might bite your tongue and refrain from sharing your opinion. Thankfully, you have the good sense not to stir the energy up even more since you know it won't make a difference. Your lesson now is about practicing tolerance and allowing others to express themselves in ways that are alien to you. Interpersonal dynamics are at play and your patience will win over hearts in the end. An open mind is a powerful mind.

Your unconventional approach to life may be troubling to those in your immediate surroundings today. Although the cosmic high-frequency buzz fuels your adrenaline, your hyperactivity is probably a tad annoying to others. Nevertheless, you don't want to lose your audience now; you only wish they could appreciate your unique brand of originality. Don't wait for others to curb your enthusiasm when all you need to do is find a healthy outlet for your energy. Taking the path less traveled makes all the difference in the world.

Your belief system may clash with someone else's today, creating an unpleasant dissonance in an otherwise harmonious relationship. In theory, you're eager to discuss your differences, but it would be a mistake to think that you'll find common ground quickly. Thankfully, you don't always need to be in agreement on every subject with those you love. Cultivating mutual respect and emotional trust deepens the heart connection more than anything else.

Your Sunday routine may not include going to church, but it's a perfect day to reconnect with your spiritual path in a way that resonates with your heart. Fortunately, you won't necessarily have to go anywhere special if you take time for your own brand of worship today. Prayer comes in many shapes and sizes; you don't have to fit your practices into anyone else's religious box. As the renowned theologian Matthew Fox said, "It doesn't matter where you dig the well. You reach the same water."

You're basking in your element today and want nothing more than to enjoy the camaraderie of your close friends. You derive a special satisfaction from conversing about common interests with your peers and encouraging their passions. But don't let your current obsessive need for planning cause you to miss out on the fun. No matter how you throw the dice now, there are too many variables for you to control. Ultimately, the details don't matter as much when you're in the company of those you love.

You might have your mind set on organizing things around the house today. Luckily, fulfilling your goal doesn't mean you need to spend the entire day indoors clearing out closets. Think outside of the box and trade in your cleaning supplies for some yard tools. A day spent in the garden improves your environment while also allowing you to experience the joys of nature. Whether it's your yard, a volunteer pea patch or a neighbor's place, getting your hands in the dirt is a grounding experience.

Friendly chit-chat at the barbecue replaces emotionally intense conversations in your perfect world today. You prefer taking a more casual and lighthearted approach with the Moon's emphasis on your 3rd House of Distractions. Your picture of an ideal afternoon includes playing games and sharing delicious food with friends and family. But life rarely behaves the way it does in your imagination and you must be wary of falling for your own illusion. Do what you do best: keep your ears open in case someone you love needs a shoulder to cry on or some motherly advice.

It might seem as if you're on an extended holiday now as your phone goes strangely quiet and you feel far from the bustle of the crowd. Believe it or not, the universe is trying to tell you that rest and relaxation is your top priority today. Thankfully, you're not being judged by your accomplishments now as everyone knows you deserve this break. However, at some point there will be questions about your goals and you will need to be ready with your answers. Instead of worrying about how you might meet other people's expectations, seek insight from your intuition to create a perfect plan for your future.

Someone might try to pull the wool over your eyes but now with lucky Venus and the reflective Moon camping out in your sign, you'll likely come out smelling like a rose. There's no reason to rush any decision today just because you're being told exactly what you want to hear. Ultimately, your not-so-secret weapon is your power of discernment; you can sniff out the difference between a sales job and a genuine offer if you maintain your high standards in your vigorous search for the truth.

You like the idea of going on a spiritual retreat today. In fact, something as simple as spending time in nature where you can contemplate your place in the world might do the trick. However, you could easily mix up your schedule and an errand may take longer than planned, causing you to panic when you start running behind. Remember, it's not about traveling any great physical distance or invoking a particular ritual; you can create meditative space wherever you are in the world with a few deep breaths and a prayer.

Your intuitive nature is receiving strong signals today but your deciphering of the cosmic message could be a bit off target. Unfortunately, you could inadvertently mix up your desires with your interpretation as you bend your perceptions to match up with your dreams. There's no doubt about it, your psychic powers are on point but your logic filter isn't functioning up to par. Take careful note of what you see and hear in other dimensions, but it's best not to make radical moves when your common sense isn't available to ride to the rescue.

You're not content just to be among your friends today; you need to stand out from the crowd. You want people to notice your accomplishments, but they seem to be focusing on the wrong things now. However, it's not what others might miss that's currently important; your disappointment stems from your own lofty expectations. Give everyone the same latitude of expression that you would like for yourself. Show your gratitude not your criticism. Appreciation is a two-way street.

Luxuriating in your fantasies of world travel needs to take a practical slant now if you ever want your yearning for adventure to be fulfilled. It's not emotionally satisfying to only dream of escape when you know there is so much out there waiting to be explored. What would it take for you to actually embark on the journey of your lifetime? You don't have to book any reservations today, but researching all the possibilities in a pragmatic manner is an ideal first step to making your dreams come true.

You're swimming in unfriendly waters today and might suddenly feel as if you have no air to breathe. It seems like your current circumstances are stifling your emotional expression and you don't know how to shift the energy. Thankfully, reality is more than a conceptual puzzle for you to solve. Sometimes sinking into a juicy experience without having any agenda at all reveals truths that you would otherwise miss. There is treasure to be found in the least likely of places if you are willing to keep your eyes open and look.

It's admirable to believe in the best possible outcome for those you love. But don't wear rose-colored glasses today when considering matters of the heart. In fact, it's prudent to steer clear of making long-term promises entirely while your perspective is slightly warped and wobbly. You could grow so busy making others happy now that you disregard your own needs in the process. But this is not a romance novel of someone else's creation; step out of the fairy tale and be the star of your amazing life.

Sorry, Aries, you need to save your daydreaming for the night since concentrating on your work needs to be your top priority today. Spacey Neptune is like a fly in your ointment, captivating you with fascinating visions that have no practical use in the present moment. Even if you wish you could extend your weekend, it's prudent to get an early start and finish your tasks before others have a reason to complain. You might grumble a bit at first, but you will be much happier later on if you're free to pursue your dreams without worrying about chores left undone.

As long as you don't let too many distractions pull you off track today, you can take great comfort from the orderliness imposed by the meticulous Virgo Moon. You are being given an opportunity to plant your roots in the ground, setting the stage for personal growth. Although you can dream about the future in great detail, your smartest strategy now is to tend your garden in the present moment. There will be plenty of time later on to anticipate the harvest. Don't waste energy searching for greener grass when you need to be doing the hard work that's right beneath your feet.

You might have a precise plan to achieve today's objectives, but a misunderstanding at work leads to confusion about your next task. Asking others for their input is tricky business because they are not giving you much information to go on. It's as if they want you to figure out everything on your own. Fortunately, you don't really need anyone to tell you what to do because you have a secret weapon at your disposal now. If you sit still and quiet your mind, your inner voice of intuition will offer you the solution in a moment of brilliant clarity. Sometimes wisdom comes from within.

Your cautious approach to the future often saves you from landing in trouble. However, coyly playing games while deciding what to disclose and what to withhold sends mixed signals today. People don't know how to respond when they can't figure out your intentions. However, sharing your concerns can widen your perspective if you're open to the feedback you receive. Others won't be blindsided by your actions if they are involved in your process from the start. Delay committing to a final plan until you've weighed and balanced all the alternatives alongside all the consequences. Better safe than sorry.

People might think there's something wrong just because you're not acting like your extroverted self these days. However, nothing could be further from the truth even if you can't be coaxed out of your lair today. Although you're known for your social prowess, you need time alone to recuperate from last month's dramas and celebrations. Tell others it's their turn to shine now but not to worry; your star will soon return to burn even brighter than before.

It's nearly impossible to be efficient when you believe you're not getting the full story. It's as if people are keeping you out of the loop because they don't want to distract you from your work. However, your concentration wavers if you start to think that you don't know the whole truth. Stop obsessing; you can do your best work now by shifting your focus inward without worrying about anyone else. Paradoxically, your self-reliance deepens the bonds between you and your peers when they realize your determination is golden.

You're all business today and aren't interested in sharing your feelings with anyone. Because you're naturally so susceptible to the well-being of others, you're afraid of opening the proverbial emotional door while the evocative Moon is hiding out in your 12th House of Privacy. Unfortunately, your coworkers might take your aloofness personally, wondering what they did wrong. But your need for personal space isn't up for discussion; you just don't want to show your vulnerability now. Keep your nose to the grindstone and let people judge you for your actions rather than your words.

You prefer to keep what's most important to yourself unless you're talking with someone who can truly understand your passion. As much as you long for the support of your peers, you're tentative when it comes to sharing your creative urges now because you're afraid that someone might belittle your ideas. The solution to your dilemma is not to go quiet; the key is to find the right person to confide in today. Connecting with like-minded souls who are walking similar paths empowers you to move mountains on your way to manifesting your dreams.

You're mysteriously attracted to the very same things you might normally avoid. You often gravitate toward blue sky and bright sunshine, but now you might be spellbound by anything that is hidden in the shadows. Even if you're usually afraid of the dark, you're fascinated by what you might find there today. Gather your courage and trade in your airline tickets for some psychological scuba gear. If you are willing to do some emotional diving, there is sunken treasure waiting to be discovered by your adventurous soul.

Responsibility is relentlessly calling, demanding that you put your plans for the future on temporary hold while you manage a minor relationship crisis today. Although you're bewildered by the emotional dynamics, you probably recognize that it will be a much simpler affair to handle the situation now before it festers into something ugly. Nevertheless, your dreams won't go away just because you are busy putting out fires. Thankfully, reshuffling your priorities might be the trick that allows you to balance all the variables in your life.

There's no reason to engage in a power struggle over allocating resources now, even if you're worried about completing a big project. Instead of wasting precious time in a petty dispute over things you can't control, just continue to work diligently and keep your mouth shut for the sake of harmony. Thankfully, it's not difficult to acquiesce on the details because you're already thinking about the bigger fish that must be fried later on. Nothing will be gained by allowing anyone to redirect your focus today. Keep your eye on the prize and everything will turn out fine.

Everyone seems to be in a more serious mood than you today, but it's probably not in your best interest to rock the boat. Unfortunately, you could work yourself into a state of frustration if you try to share your playful creativity with the world. Nevertheless, it's still prudent to follow the low-key tone set by others so as not to ruffle any feathers. Happily, respecting people's need for peace and quiet doesn't have to detract from your enthusiasm. You can still sing your song without shouting it from the rooftops.

You're willing to work extra hard today in order to solidify your recent progress. Nevertheless, it's nearly impossible to completely override your natural tendency to rush into action. However, your impatience could jeopardize all that you have gained. Maintain a methodical pace and execute the proper follow-through to reach your goals. You don't have to gamble with your future now if you plan your course of action without expecting to change everything all at once. It may be a bitter pill to swallow at first, but sometimes slow and steady wins the race.

Your schedule is stretched to the limit today, yet your relentless drive might prevent you from scaling back your activities. You don't mind constructive criticism from a friend or partner, but it may seem as if encouragement is hard to find now. It's helpful to set firm boundaries if you are encountering resistance from others. Don't let anyone rain on your parade if you believe it's your turn to bask in the sunshine. Ultimately, it's up to you to prove everyone wrong; your actions will speak louder than their words.

Although you may still be harboring fantasies about new ways to make money, it's time to turn your schemes into reality today. Innovative ideas sound good at first, but now you must execute a sound business plan to be successful. Thankfully, you can exert more control over your future once you realize the importance of practicing self-discipline. Rather than letting your imagination run wild, concentrate on achieving one worthwhile goal. You can accomplish more than you think once you wholeheartedly commit to focus your mental superpowers in one direction. Willpower is the magic ingredient necessary for your success.

You can't afford to drift off into space today if you have already made prior commitments. Even if you're having a tough time remaining focused, you can deliver on your current promises when you truly believe your goals are worth pursuing. Avoid the temptation to daydream; it's more productive to keep yourself grounded in reality so you don't have to pay the cost later on. Fulfilling your previous obligations now paves the way to your future success.

Achieving your objectives requires unwavering determination, but it's best to downsize your fantasies if you want them to come true. There's no point in exhausting yourself by aspiring toward unrealistic goals, but that doesn't mean you should surrender your dreams; in fact, just the opposite. Instead, search for a middle path that allows you to honor your lofty aspirations while taking a pragmatic approach to your success. Balance may be elusive today, but dogged persistence moves you steadily in the right direction. Fortunately, compromise is possible without giving up what matters most.

You have plenty of responsibilities on your plate now and may be feeling nervous if you are behind in delivering on your promises. Thankfully, your anxiety will begin to fade once you start crossing things off your to-do list. The same chores that seemed overwhelming yesterday are a piece of cake now. Eliminate extraneous activities and concentrate your efforts where they will have the greatest impact. If you set your mind to something and then apply yourself with unwavering commitment, you can accomplish nearly anything you want. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

Although you have been sitting on the fence for a few days, you're ready to make a big decision today. Libras are known for vacillating at times because they're naturally adept at tempering extreme ideas and finding common ground. However, you see the handwriting on the wall and are eager to choose one direction now. It's more important to be swift in judgment than to be perfect. Thankfully, you will still have the chance to adjust your trajectory as your perspective continues to evolve. Seize the cosmic moment and embrace your future.

You may be recycling the same thoughts around in your mind over and over again, trying to reach a different conclusion. But you probably won't reveal your inner process because you believe others won't understand your current plight. Talking about your concerns is not the quickest route to happiness; you must take direct action now. Fortunately, you will be happily surprised with the support you receive if you simply settle down and channel your angst into your work. Putting in extra effort brings positive results faster than you expect. Procrastination is no longer a luxury you can afford.

There are many paths in front of you at this time; but ultimately, it's up to you to choose one and stick with it. Unfortunately, you might be carrying some unnecessary emotional baggage and pushing through your own resistance is your only viable option now. Luckily, someone may give you a chance to demonstrate a new and improved version of you. However, you must take the initiative by surrounding yourself with open-minded people who can help you process your feelings. Your future shines brightly if you are willing to do the work.

Although everyone assumes you're open to feedback when it comes to your future, your convictions are stronger than anyone realizes now. You are singularly focused on your long-term plans, even if others are telling you to pay attention to the current dynamics. However, you may think that your friends are just making matters worse by distracting you with their opinions today. Fortunately, you have the necessary tools to stay on the straight and narrow path and it's up to you to use them. Keep your eyes on the distant horizon and relentlessly inch your way to success.

You may feel as if you didn't make any progress on the job yesterday, but thankfully, you get to make up for lost time today. There's less resistance now as you push toward your goals, motivating you to raise your level of productivity. But don't spread your resources too thin; you will be more effective if you concentrate on one single goal at a time. Instead of struggling to finish all your work, prioritize your tasks before rolling up your sleeves and getting down to business. Approaching the day in a logical manner maximizes your efforts more than you might think.

Your concerns about your future plans could grow more serious today, prompting you to make an overdue decision. But every little problem seems to be tied to larger issues and there's no way to avoid the bigger picture. Bring your shovel and be prepared to dig your way to the bottom, if necessary. There's no reason to rush the process; it's your own psychological pressure that creates this false sense of urgency. Slowing down allows you to explore the various alternatives and choose the best route to your long-term success.

You might try a more cautious approach to sharing your feelings today, but you could be stressing over the wrong things. Instead of wasting time trying to guess how others will react to your emotional disclosure, just let the cards fall where they may. Your impatience can interfere with whatever stability you have already gained. But even if you feel stuck with no clear direction, there's no need to force progress now. Relationship dynamics will make more sense soon enough if you can relax your expectations and enjoy the present moment.

You have very specific ideas about how your day should unfold but you may not be able to stick to your initial plan if you want to play nicely with others. Managing your schedule is impossible when people keep changing their minds about the activities that include you today. But you can't just take all your toys and go home because you might need to provide a strong shoulder for someone to lean on when things get dicey. It's pointless to push your personal agenda now; you have a lot to learn and plenty to offer by going along with the flow.

You may not feel like revealing too many details today, even if you know exactly what you want. Keeping quiet seems like your best option since you're afraid that others might not agree with your position. It's likely that your intuition is on point now because your coworkers don't understand your current motives. Thankfully, you won't have to respond to questions you prefer not to answer if you don't give too much information away in the first place. Focusing on someone else's needs is a clever deflection because it allows you to play the role of a supportive friend while also conveniently taking the bright light off of you.

Although acting more spontaneously sounds like a wonderful idea in theory, you might not enjoy the experience if you're worried about the criticism you could receive for your behavior. You feel emotionally exposed now as if others already know your desires, even if you haven't uttered a word. However, your fear of disapproval can be a problem if you're monitoring everything you say and do. One way to reduce your current stress is to practice unconditional self-acceptance. Ultimately, those who matter will respect you as long as you're being true to yourself. Authenticity counts.

Your imagination continues to run rampant with three planets clustered in your 12th House of Fantasy. However, drama is simmering in your real life and you could be pulled into an emotionally charged conversation with a close friend or relative now. Although you prefer to keep your feelings private today, you won't be able to stay out of the spotlight for much longer. Nevertheless, use your downtime to figure out what your heart wants so you are ready to handle the delicate relationship issues that pop up in the days ahead. Forewarned is forearmed.

You can't help but be nervous about sharing your goals with your associates, but exercising too much hesitation today could cause you to miss an exciting opportunity. You might shy away from casual conversations or even turn down a social invitation if it doesn't align with your agenda. Although making a hasty retreat isn't necessarily wise now, neither is responding too quickly. Something worthwhile will likely withstand the test of time, so waiting a day or two before making a final decision ultimately works in your favor.

You often go out of your way to balance your needs with others since maintaining peace and harmony is key to your relationship success. You might even choose to keep some of your preferences to yourself because you don't want to disturb the status quo. You may have a specific destination in mind today, yet you're reluctant to say anything because you don't have the logistics in place. Don't worry about the details now; just be clear about your objectives with the understanding that satisfaction could still take a while to reach. Honesty is the best policy, especially with yourself.

You have been reconsidering your long-term goals ever since solemn Saturn retrograded into your sign last month. Even if you're anticipating the future, today's Mercury-Saturn trine requires you to stop and review your past to better understand your current feelings. You may worry that you can't actualize your ambitious plans, but your caution could turn into self-doubt if you overanalyze every move. Do yourself a favor now; don't assume the worst-case scenario or that might be what you manifest. Rest assured that your lost confidence will return; it's just a game of mind over matter.

You may not want anyone to know that you're wrestling with your doubts now, but there's no reason to fake confidence if you aren't currently feeling it. It's healthier to show more emotional restraint instead of taking something too far when you are not totally invested. Spontaneity comes naturally to you, but you benefit today from some quiet time to reassess your direction. You don't have to spill the beans if you're not in the mood; leaving some details to the imagination serves you well.

You might not want to deal with an associate who is emotionally needy today, yet your empathy with someone else's feelings can open doors to a new level of friendship. It's worth the struggle now as you try to determine what lines to cross and how much to reveal. Of course, it's safer to play the role of the stoic friend and hide behind a wall of reason. However, avoiding your feelings could create unnecessary resistance. Lean into your fear of intimacy by being radically honest; you may be pleasantly surprised by what happens when you open your heart.

You could be so goal oriented today that others don't know how to react to your unabashed ambition. Your emotions are uncharacteristically intense, even if you don't want to dwell on them. But any attempt to downplay your feelings creates a different set of problems as someone misinterprets your nonchalance as a sign of disinterest. Don't hold back now when it comes to expressing your dreams; go out of your way to let the ones you love know how passionately you feel about your future and their place in it.

You may be overly concerned that you have taken a relationship too far too fast and now you want to run to a place of emotional safety. Or maybe you made an inaccurate assumption about someone's feelings, creating unnecessary drama. Fortunately, with realistic Saturn in the equation today, you're committed to getting all the facts right, even if they complicate matters. There's no need to make any sudden moves. Take a few steps back from the awkward situation and give yourself enough distance to regain an objective perspective. Time is your ally.

Expressing yourself honestly grows more complicated when you're concerned about protecting someone else's feelings. You're bursting at the seams today; your creativity is like a fireworks display that commands attention. You've been waiting for this moment and you want to put on a show that everyone will remember. Although you're running on sheer adrenaline and pure inspiration, you may still experience a bit of stage fright. Thankfully, your courage will outweigh any last-minute doubts. Take a few deep breaths and shine like the star you are.

Taking a sentimental journey with a loved one requires careful planning as you balance your personal desires with professional obligations. Nevertheless, you're longing to connect with a family member or someone from your past. The current planetary emphasis on your 4th House of Roots makes this a perfect time to share childhood memories, revisit old haunts and luxuriate in nostalgia. Just remember to return to the present before someone thinks you've run out on your responsibilities. Reminiscing is a lovely diversion today as long as you're not avoiding your work.

Although you might be known for your gift of gab, you can take it to a whole new level now when loquacious Mercury bumps into the Sun in your 3rd House of Information. You could strike up a conversation with nearly anyone today, but your enthusiasm may be overwhelming to your audience. Stop talking long enough to let others respond and share their stories as well. Your positivity is contagious and there is much to gain from a mutual exchange of ideas. Communication is a two-way street.

You could surprise yourself with your strong reaction if someone catches you off guard and challenges your beliefs. When push comes to shove, you resolute Crabs can put up as good a fight as anyone else. You're especially tenacious if you feel emotionally threatened in any way now. If someone so much as looks cross-eyed at a loved one today, you might overreact and put on quite a show of loyalty. Standing up for your convictions is honorable as long as you don't overplay your hand.

Your star is on the rise now and you can't help but draw a captive audience wherever you go. It seems like everyone is hanging on every word you speak today, making you feel as if your entire life is a stage on which you must perform. Nevertheless, you're not ready to reveal all your talents just yet. Although you might still be holding a few tricks up your sleeve, you're on the precipice of setting the world on fire with your charisma and charm. All you need is a leap of faith to make the magic happen.

You are reluctantly dragged into the spotlight today, but you can dazzle everyone with your mental agility nonetheless. You know your message is important, but you're not sure that you're prepared to divulge all your secrets to the rest of the world. Nevertheless, you have plenty to say and you can even temporarily lose yourself in the excitement of the moment if you feel in your element. There are no rules to follow as to when you should speak your truth, so trust your intuition to tell you when the time is right.

Sharing your long-term aspirations with your colleagues is key to your future success now that messenger Mercury aligns with the brilliant Sun in your 11th House of Dreams and Wishes. Luckily, you have all the cosmic support you need when communicating with your peers today. Be prepared to deliver your clever elevator pitch at a moment's notice. This is an auspicious time to go the extra mile while socially networking because you never know who you might connect with next. Turn on your legendary charm and watch what happens.

It's easy for you to consciously compartmentalize your life and set your personal feelings aside while you engage in activities that further your career goals. You're motivated to express your perspective today, even if no one is listening at first. Whether you sit down with your boss for a brainstorming session or write up your plan to save the world, it's critical to get your ideas out in the open. Fortunately, your flair for the dramatic can create quite a buzz now, so don't miss this opportunity to be heard. The art of persuasion is your key to getting your message across.

You are inspired to climb up onto your soapbox and rhapsodize on the virtues of liberty and justice today. You could slip right into playing the role of a modern-day Socrates because of your natural philosophical orientation. It's perfectly fine to share your lofty ideas as long as you don't believe you're the only one who has the exclusivity on the truth. Don't suck all the oxygen out of the room. Give everyone the breathing room to respond with their opinions, too. Never forget that you can learn something valuable from every person you encounter.

Although it might not seem like your cup of tea, you're eager to talk about intense relationship issues today. Even if sharing your feelings doesn't come naturally, you can open up now without pursuing an agenda. Of course, you don't always have to be busy vying for position at work or trying to move up in the status game. Nevertheless, you are still goal oriented in your thinking as the cerebral Mercury-Sun conjunction activates your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Love doesn't require perfection; don't let your fear of failure stand in your way when it comes to expressing your heart.

Waiting politely for your turn to speak isn't likely to work today. In fact, your friend or partner may be talking a mile a minute while the brilliant Sun cozies up to chatty Mercury in your 7th House of Companions. You can't get a word in edgewise because others are hogging the limelight and won't even stop to catch their breath. You might have to dramatically interrupt someone's babbling stream of consciousness if you want to express your opinion on the subject at hand. Thankfully, your emotional eruption shifts the energy in your direction so your words will be taken seriously, too.

Although you're comfortable discussing your creative ideas at work today, you might be totally tongue-tied when sharing what's in your heart. Your inability to reveal your feelings is unusual; nevertheless, your current eloquence may be limited to job-related issues. However, your emotions could fester, leading you to lose your temper later on. If your verbal communication is stymied, write about your unexpressed passions in a journal or in a letter you never send. The simple act of declaring your truth relieves the internal pressure and allows you to move on.

You prefer to be in full control of your fate, but you could easily spend more time responding to external situations today than manifesting your own events. You depend on people for their well-honed skills and the resources they bring to the table, but they also expect certain things in return from you. Fortunately, creating your own personal destiny is still possible as long as you take the needs of others into consideration in the process. Developing compassion enables you to maximize your potential in ways you never imagined.

You are hoping to solidify the most important relationships in your life today, but you keep falling back on your fantasies as you try to express your needs. However, people in your immediate environment might not even appear interested in making your wishes come true. But instead of slinking away to nurse your wounds, it's much more strategic to engage others from a different angle now. Your chances for gratification improve when you face the facts instead of retreating to the safety of your imagination. Remain open to the element of surprise for the best results.

You might struggle to float through the tricky currents that carry you this way and that way today. Although complex interpersonal dynamics at work seem to be out of your control, you're ready to dive in to save the day anyway. Thankfully, temporarily setting aside your personal desires enables you to deftly handle the volatility of the current situation. Postpone the important discussions for next week when the planets are more conducive for clearing the air. Meanwhile, create a healthy distraction by doing something unexpected and extraordinary.

You're ready for fun and games even before the weekend begins and you can't help but let the whole world know it. Although you might not have any plans set in stone yet, you can imagine almost anything is possible while dreamy Neptune trines the passionate Scorpio Moon in your 5th House of Play. In fact, your fantasies are so vivid today that you might even start to believe they're true. The first thing you should do is talk over your expectations with someone you trust. Initiating a reality check now can save you from an awkward moment later on.

Emotional interactions on the home front could lead to a messy conflict that hijacks your weekend. Luckily, your current annoyance won't necessarily trigger a major confrontation if you're willing to utilize flexibility in your interactions with a close friend or relative. Reduce the pressure now by dragging the feelings that lurk beneath the surface out into the light. Even if a heart-to-heart conversation feels uncomfortable at first, being honest resolves the tension before things get out of hand. If you toss water on the embers today, you won't have any fires to put out tomorrow.

Interpersonal communication might feel strained now, but maintaining a healthy perspective is necessary instead of obsessing over an issue that ultimately doesn't matter. Your biggest concern isn't what to say; it's whether or not to say anything at all so as not to disturb the peace. However, denying the problem isn't a satisfying solution, so sit down for a heartfelt discussion today before it is too late. You might just be pleasantly surprised when others enthusiastically meet you on common ground.

You may be able to sail through the day, but you're still afraid of hitting rocks you can't see from your vantage point. It's difficult to tell if you are drifting deeper into the choppy waters today or if you are returning to the shallow waters of the shore. Either way, you must get to the bottom of a relationship dilemma in order to reestablish your equilibrium. Once you acknowledge your core values, your vessel will regain its proper course. Maintaining balance is easy to do when you have your priorities straight.

You normally undertake an emotional journey into your private world of unexpressed feelings when the moody Moon makes her monthly visit to your sign. However, the dynamics are more complicated now because someone might be withholding important information from you. Thankfully, there's no need to kick and scream for answers yet; it may just be your insecurities interfering with reality. Simply observe what's happening around you with a healthy dose of detachment; everything will make more sense in the days ahead.

You're not in the mood for company now but retreat isn't an option when there are so many demands being made on your time. You need to be at the top of your game mentally, not just for your benefit but also for everyone who depends on you. Keep your eyes and ears wide open. Staying in the communication loop today will pay off over the weekend when social activities bring you the satisfaction you seek. Sacrifice your solitude if you want to maintain your credibility amongst your peers.

You may be totally exasperated today because you know that fulfilling your current responsibilities might not serve your long-term interests. You clearly have ambitious goals, but must set them aside now to cater to the needs of the group. The more you can focus on the immediate tasks at hand, the faster you will finish. However, people seem to be distracting you as if it is some sort of parlor game to see who can keep you from your job the longest. Play along for the sake of the team, but remember to return to the work waiting for you as soon as possible.

You're not afraid of complicated logistics; in fact, you thrive on difficult mental puzzles and complex mechanical concepts. However, you don't enjoy being enmeshed in the tangled web of a sticky emotional conundrum now. Unfortunately, there may be a weird power struggle brewing that you can't understand. Don't push for resolution yet unless you want to stir up a hornet's nest. Be patient; settling the score next week without conflict is likely if you can let it go today.

You're under the impression you can sense every single wave in the universal sea of consciousness today. Nevertheless, it's an impossible task to process all your perceptions when you are receiving so many signals. The emotional intensity may be so great now that you feel like shutting off your radar and going undercover. However, the current trick is to focus on the small things and do them well. Leave the big picture for another day when life isn't so noisy and complicated.

Your outrageous actions might be shocking today as revolutionary Uranus electrifies your key planet Mars. But you could lose your credibility if you rattle the cage at home just to generate a reaction. Your creative energy is irrepressible and you're willing to push the envelope, but something or someone may be blocking your inner artist from running free. If change needs to occur now, then your radical behavior is worth the ensuing drama it provokes. But if you're just looking for an adrenaline rush, hold onto your horses because the risk won't be worth the reward.

Someone's sudden emotional disclosure could rock your world today. The things you learn might be so unexpected that it's as if the ground is shaking beneath your feet. But you can't allow people to upset your center of gravity when you need to fine-tune your plans for the future. It's one thing to be a sounding board for a friend who is struggling to process their feelings; however, you need to figure out a way to help them without destabilizing your life at the same time. Drawing clear boundaries is the first step to success.

Expressing your feelings as they occur today is the simplest strategy to prevent your thoughts from driving you crazy. Although you may not be comfortable revealing your true emotions, it's a lot safer than bottling them up until the pressure becomes unbearable. Instead of waiting until you lose your temper at the most inopportune moment, gradually let off steam before it builds to a boiling point. You might misdirect your anger if you get swept up in the moment and say too much. Deliver you message in small doses and moderate your tone for the least disruptive outcome.

Your friends are aware that you're keeping secrets, but they don't want to pry because they know how much you value your privacy. You may be so immersed in an emotional experience now that you're uncertain how to express your energy. But rather than immediately diving into the deep end of the pool today, splash around in the shallow end until you are more accustomed to the temperature. Your shyness will pass if you can get past your initial awkwardness and share your feelings with those who love you the most.

You could speak your truth so colorfully that others are taken back by your blunt delivery. But your dramatic flair is non-negotiable; you can't change your character just because your forthrightness makes someone uncomfortable. Unfortunately, your common sense is worn to threads today and you might not have the patience to temper your actions. Although you may get a kick out of shocking people now, don't act unconsciously and hurt those you love with your antics; practicing compassion enables you to keep your priorities in place.

There's a fine line between acting on your impulses and just doing something plain foolish. Unfortunately, your fear of being negatively judged might motivate you to overcompensate today, thinking it best to bury your feelings and move on without a word. However, suppressing your desires just drives them deeper and strengthens your subconscious resolve to do something drastic. You need an inventive outlet for your restless energy now; exercising a little healthy rebellion is fine as long as there are no casualties in the process.

You want recognition from your peers today, but you still value your dignity more than you're craving public admiration. Nevertheless, placing yourself directly in the limelight may not be as rewarding as you currently imagine. If you want to maintain your stellar reputation within the group, be on your best behavior now and don't try to steal the show. A successful ensemble production is the most rewarding experience for everyone in the end.

You're poised to strike back if your friends criticize your recent efforts today. Ultimately, you want to be acknowledged for your contributions and appreciated for your talents just like everyone else. Instead of retaliating with a clever zinger or giving others the cold shoulder, take a more productive path and repurpose your frustration into an impassioned drive to accomplish your goals. Be proud of your work; your satisfaction at the end of the day makes it all worthwhile.

You may rush in and try to save the day, but you could end up causing more harm than good if you don't pay attention to the clues of the cosmos. A hint of chaos is in the air today and things feel a little too wild and wacky even for you anything-goes Centaurs. The solution is simple: don't try to fix what you don't understand. No one expects you to play superhero 24/7, so give others the chance to shine while you cheer them on from the sidelines instead.

The stranger things are in your environment now, the stronger your motivation to hold your ground. However, the safety zone you might like to run to only exists in your imagination. Ironically, you realize that a strategy based on fear won't work, which encourages you to take a sudden risk today. However, an extreme response isn't the appropriate antidote to the current instability, either. Taking several baby steps is more sensible than making one single giant leap before you're ready. You're not operating in a vacuum; what you do affects others more than you know.

You might be obsessed with increasing your personal freedom while independent Uranus is prominently in the picture today. However, your spirits may be dampened now with the brooding Moon-Mars trine occurring in water signs. Staying in touch with your feelings is a challenge while you are traveling through such unfamiliar territory. Keep checking in with your heart so you know which path to follow. Thankfully, finding humor in the most unlikely places is your saving grace.

Relationship dynamics are changing so fast now that you can barely keep up. The romantic energy is suddenly shifting, and your new outlook is quite different from your previous perspective. For example, wooing each other into the wee hours of the morning often turns into diaper changes in the middle of the night as love evolves. Although you might want to make a radical move today, let your feelings develop at their own pace along with the rhythm of life. As Einstein reminds us, "The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once."

No matter how serious your intentions are today, it's too soon to say whether or not you'll be successful at getting much accomplished. You can be quite the convincing salesperson now, but you may be as good at fooling yourself as you are at misleading others. If someone accepts your over-the-top expectations as the truth, you might have to face the music when the facts are discovered. A wiser approach is to be completely realistic now so you don't have to backtrack and revise your story later. Full disclosure is the best policy.

A little voice in the back of your mind is warning you to tread carefully in your relationships today. Meanwhile, your closest friends may be cheering you on, encouraging you to make your move. Nevertheless, there's no reason to justify your caution to anyone if you aren't ready. However, you're more inclined to take a chance and start a discussion on a sensitive topic as the day wears on. Just proceed at your own pace; you already know from prior experience that you achieve better results when you follow your own heart.

You're inspired to share a spiritual experience, weave your words into a poetic phrase and put a positive spin on nearly everything you say today. Happily, your current idealism motivates you to reestablish a solid connection with a loved one now. However, underlying tension won't likely disappear overnight. Do whatever you can to  alleviate the stress, but remember that repairing a relationship is an ongoing work in progress. Open your heart and love will find a way.

You often choose to keep your feelings under wraps because you're afraid of being judged or criticized. Nevertheless, today's effusive Sagittarius Moon urges you to blurt out whatever is on your mind before considering the consequences. Pushing through your natural resistance allows you to follow the current advice of the cosmos. Just remember that you're the only one who can decide how far you want to venture out of your cozy shell. Find a friendly audience before revealing the whims of your heart.

You want to be as positive as you can in everything you do now that the cheerful Sagittarius Moon harmonizes with the Sun and Mercury in demonstrative Leo. But it's tough to connect with others in a lighthearted manner if you're still holding on to stressful memories of the recent past. Luckily, you can still come through for those you love if you concentrate on being real, rather than on being liked. Believe it or not, authenticity wins out over popularity in the end.

You are dancing with such wild abandon today that you might forget to pay attention to little things like the music and the steps. Thankfully, you still have your common sense intact because graceful Venus blesses you with a cool, calm and collected perspective.
