Although you want to be open and honest, keeping some things secret may be appropriate now. Just don't let your caution morph into apathy in the process. Find the sweet spot between disclosing everything and saying nothing at all.

Surprisingly, you could be the most practical one in the group today because the recent Venus-Saturn square is rattled by the reflective Moon in your 3rd House of Communication. You can easily discern what is real and what is an illusion. Although your friendly demeanor disarms others, your inner perfectionist and logical thinking are running the show now. If you visualize what you want in clear detail and hold steadfast to your dream, you can manifest miracles in your life.

You might achieve more than you expect today once you get into your groove. Tying up loose ends actually feels satisfying and your self-confidence grows with each task you complete now. Remember, nothing will hold you back for long, except your own self-imposed limitations. Stick to your agenda and continue building momentum throughout the day. You can move mountains with a little perseverance and a lot of sweat equity.

People can't help but experience your inspirational side now that the evocative Moon is back in your fiery sign. Your passionate appeal could motivate others to subscribe to your ideas today whether your perspective is accurate or not. Naturally, you wouldn't mislead anyone intentionally, but the pictures you now paint with your words can be so pretty that everyone wants to participate in your story. Though telling a tall tale might be fun for a while, adhering to the facts will keep you out of trouble.

You're uncharacteristically inclined to dramatize everything you say today, making it tough to maintain your credibility. However, you can utilize the expansive nature of the fearless Sagittarius Moon to defend others who may not be as eloquent as you. There's no reason to rush the process now; your words carry more weight when you give them plenty of time to fully sink in. Fortunately, your passionate determination empowers you to accomplish extraordinary feats and perform random acts of kindness at the same time.

Your friends come knocking at your door for advice today while the Moon's presence in your 11th House of Dreams and Wishes creates utopian visions of the future. Your strategy is to focus on the potential prosperity now rather than the fear of scarcity. Fortunately, you can have a positive impact on others if you maintain an optimistic outlook. No one will accuse you of wearing rose-colored glasses if you remember to present both sides of an issue in a fair light.

You want your friends and relatives to acknowledge your competence at work while the Moon is highlighting your 10th House of Public Status. Nevertheless, you must balance your desire for efficiency with your need to have fun. Prioritize the tasks in front of you; if you finish the most important ones now, you'll earn the right to kick back later. Don't squander your reputation when there's so much at stake.

You're on a roll, talking up a storm with everyone you meet. Your enthusiasm is stimulated by your lofty visions of the future as the fiery Sagittarius Moon inspires you to aim for the stars. Unfortunately, you could easily overextend your reach, lose your balance and fall off your unicorn. It's not easy to gain mastery of your own energy when you're so passionate about life, but it's certainly worth the effort. It's amazing what magic you can create with a little fairy dust and the right attitude.

Your future seems too uncertain for your liking, and you're willing to take drastic measures to put your life back on stable ground. You may attempt to plan your day in great detail because you prefer to know exactly where you are going. Unfortunately, the lines on the map keep shifting today, making it impossible to determine a reliable route. Thankfully, the current ambiguity won't last long; explore all the alternatives you can imagine while you have the chance.

Someone's larger-than-life drama could give you a colossal headache now. Normally it's you that's bouncing off walls, but today the restlessness of others keeps pulling you off center. You really don't want to be a buzzkill and spoil everyone's fun, but you might try to rein it in so you can redefine your limits. Don't worry if you have to play the role of a parental figure for a while. Once you have re-established your routine, you'll quickly return to your old ways and be the life of the party once again.

A total stranger may enter your life with a get-rich-quick scheme or a magic love potion, but if it sounds too good to be true, it most likely is. Whatever you do now, don't fall for blind optimism or naive idealism when it comes to money or love. Ironically, big ideas might inspire others, but you're more successful if you handle your life in bite-sized increments today. Paint a detailed picture of your future in your mind's eye. Take small steps and walk before you run.

Your optimism is a wonderful asset as long as you know when to stop believing your own hype. Unfortunately, you might be so dazzled by your own brilliance today that you lose your ability to make sound decisions. However, taking yourself out of the center of every plot widens your perspective and reveals a whole new spectrum of possibilities. There are many different kinds of success beyond those involving material wealth. Your life improves in surprising ways when you realize you don't have to turn everything you touch into gold.

You might see the advantages to being left to your own devices today, but you also desire close companionship. Naturally, you can't choose to wear your invisibility cloak if you also want to be noticed on the social scene. But others can be so wrapped up in their personal dramas that you get dragged along for the ride. If you make your intentions known right from the start, you won't get washed away by someone else's emotional tide. Remember, you can help out those you love, but the only one you can truly save is yourself.

You may be talking a good game now, but doubt and confusion could be lurking behind your show of bravado. Even if you're passionate about a specific goal, you might not be able to turn your ideas into something practical. Making a concrete plan work should be simple business but it's not today because as soon as you get close to your objective, it loses its sparkle. Although some people believe all roads lead to Rome, the journey is still more important than your final destination.

You're setting an admirable example at work these days, but following through with your inspiration may be trickier than motivating others to join your cause. You might be tempted to start a project but your thinking is a bit warped now, especially with respect to your long-term goals. Ultimately, it's easier to encourage someone else today than it is to manifest your own visions. Nevertheless, don't give up; be ready to start plowing in the fields of dreams again at a moment's notice.

People just don't seem to understand your motives today. You have an abundance of great ideas and plenty of energy while the reflective Moon is camping out in your inspirational sign. In fact, you may be climbing so high in the atmosphere now that you must fly solo because no one can keep up with you. Stop trying to include others on your adventure; you'll soar to greater altitudes than ever before when you accept that you're on your own. The sky is the limit if you are brave enough to go it alone.

You might not put a lot of faith into your intuition as a general rule; you prefer making decisions based on the hard cold facts. However, your psychic radar is picking up on all kinds of warning signals today and it's advantageous to listen. Obviously, you can choose to shut down your imagination, ignore your hunches and pay the price later. Or you can take a risk and remain open to the information you're receiving now from beyond your five senses. Sometimes, the unconventional approach is actually the most sensible one.

Normally your associates lean on you because even if you are an out-of-the-box thinker, your conclusions are usually quite rational. However, you might waffle on an investment today because you're not thinking clearly, especially when it comes to your finances. Don't allow your mind to wander too far, but keep your thoughts to yourself if you do drift off track. Illusory Neptune's presence in your 2nd House of Personal Resources clouds your logic so save the fiscal planning for another day. Remember your priorities; don't let money come between you and your friends.

Utilizing your creativity in the workplace may be necessary for your personal fulfillment today. You have the good fortune to be able to daydream in vivid colors and wrap-around sound. But your penchant for fantasy only gets in the way of success now unless you can turn your liability into a valuable asset by transforming your regular routine into an exciting game. If you love your job, you'll never work a day in your life.

You may be so jazzed about a new project that you're off and running today, even if you don't have a plan in place yet. However, your exhilaration won't last long unless you develop a sensible strategy. A reassessment of your resources is the first step to getting your dreams off the ground. Luckily, you can remain idealistic now without losing your footing. However, balancing your optimism with realism is not enough; once you have your angle figured out, you must also initiate action and be willing to follow through on whatever you start.

It might sound too good to be true, but chasing your creative whims today leads to sweet rewards. Releasing your inner child is just what the doctor ordered. What did you love when you were a kid? What's missing from your life now? If necessary, delve into your memories to recover a missing piece from the past. As master storyteller Tom Robbins wrote, "It's never too late to have a happy childhood."

Sinking into your emotions can seem scary at first, but once you get the hang of opening up to others, you might recognize the benefits. In fact, you may even wonder what took you so long to see the light. However, don't be misled into thinking everything will be wonderful forever just because some warm and fuzzy feelings are surfacing now. Nevertheless, taking the good, the bad and the ugly without reservation can be empowering for everyone involved.

Sharing your feelings with a close friend or partner grows more comfortable as the day wears on. At first, you might be overwhelmed as if there aren't enough hours in the day to finish your work. You surely don't have time to indulge in personal conversations. But then you suddenly realize time is just an illusion and you can have your cake and eat it too. You have the power to consciously bend reality in your favor now if you harness the cosmic energy to work on your behalf.

Your mind may be on your money today, but there's an intrinsic link between your attitude at work and your current fiscal condition. Although you might try to deny this connection at first, when your productivity is flowing, the income will follow. Nevertheless, don't waste too much time trying to micromanage your budget now; Of course, it's necessary to watch the bottom line, but a lasting solution to your current problem won't come from saving pennies. Increasing your net worth starts with improving your self-esteem.

Everyone can see the twinkle in your eyes and the bounce in your step as you exhibit your playful side today. Just because you have a no-nonsense reputation doesn't stop you from flirting when you're in the mood. There's no better time to ask for what you want than when captivating Venus harmonizes with the Moon in your 5th House of Romance. Don't wait for a more opportune moment to shine your love light; grab the cosmic opportunity  and reveal your heart's true colors.

You may be keeping your feelings under wraps today. Subtlety is more your style while your key planet Venus is on a spiritual retreat in your 12th House of Mystery. It might seem as if everything is moving in slow motion when it comes to interactions with others, especially since you're operating in a dream state now. Nevertheless, your desire to establish meaningful connections inspires you to push through the fog. Ultimately, determination is your ally as you seek ways to deepen your relationships.

Connecting with others seems effortless today as you reach out to include them in your plans. It's as if your regular air of mystery magically morphs into an easily accessible charm. Even if your natural tendency is to hang back and keep your guard up, you're feeling friendlier now, making this a great time to mix and mingle. Break your old patterns -- and everyone else's expectations -- to get the most pleasure out of the social opportunities the cosmos is offering you. Open up your heart and watch what happens.

You might let out an audible sigh of relief as the external noise finally quietens down now. Normally, you enjoy the Moon's monthly return to your sign, but this time around the energy could have been just too much - - even if there was plenty to celebrate. The Moon's shift out of your sign today is a welcome change of pace. You don't want to wreck your infamous reputation as a free spirit, but secretly you're eager to demonstrate your more ambitious side and get back to work.

Relationships are top priority today as your long-term goals align with your personal desires. The Moon's return to your sign often isn't a comfortable fit because it emphasizes your lack of control with respect to your emotions. However, an affectionate Moon-Venus trine encourages your heart to take over and run the show now. Seize the moment and tell someone special what you really want. The universe might just have a surprise in store for you if you come from a place of love.

You can't avoid interpersonal attachments now, even if your feelings complicate the day. Unfortunately, denying your changing moods only makes them stronger. Thankfully, your current practicality rides to the rescue. Although you might not be able to make your emotions disappear entirely, you can downplay them enough to choose the most sensible route. Sharing your concerns reduces the stress while also giving you the chance to receive some really good advice. Find a trustworthy ally and start talking.

You're willing to negotiate with a friend or partner today because the longevity of a relationship is ultimately more important than the details of the current arrangement. You have a chance to restructure the rules of the road and your newfound objectivity bodes well for a beneficial outcome. Reassessing the deeper issues rather than just focusing on the surface noise is the best use of your current pragmatism. This can be your next step in your personal growth, so set the stage now to make room for your long-term goals to evolve.

There is so much emotional noise today, it's nearly impossible to process all that's going on. You might not be very receptive to conflicting messages because you are afraid of being sidetracked by someone else's agenda. Meanwhile, you're defending your right to maintain your individuality because you're on your own mission. Nevertheless, there isn't as much at stake as you think, so pick your battles carefully before you find yourself in the middle of an unnecessary argument. Take the high road and strike out on your own.

You might find yourself in the middle of someone else's power struggle today but you're not willing to be distracted by disagreement that's not yours. You may attempt to sidestep the entire conversation, but you come to realize you can have a major positive impact on the situation. Thankfully, you don't have to produce a solution out of thin air; all you must do is listen to both sides of the debate. Sufficiently airing an issue could be enough to dissolve the tension for now. Playing the role of the reluctant hero saves the day.

Sharing your feelings with a trusted friend seems like a good idea, but a relatively harmless disclosure could elicit an unexpected reaction. You understand the necessity of self-restraint now because you can sense the rather delicate balance of power. Nevertheless, you aren't eager to change your mind today, and your current lack of flexibility might make a tense situation even worse. On the other hand, meeting another person halfway manifests mutual benefits. Finding common ground gives everyone a chance to be a winner.

Someone's attempts to control your feelings could bring an upwelling of anger to the surface today, but it seems more intense than the situation actually warrants. Although you feel the need to vent your frustration, you don't want to deal with the emotional fallout. Play it cool and circumnavigate the current conflict. Or, if you must engage, ride your passion and speak your truth, no matter what. There's no right or wrong answer when it comes to your heart.

You might bury your feelings today to avoid a potential meltdown as your emotions draw you into the shadows. You're accustomed to the light, but may be resistant to exploring the dark. Don't be distracted by trying to follow your previous agenda. It's more crucial to concentrate on your reactions and process them in real time than wasting energy explaining your motives to others. Just open your heart and show up as you are.

You're unhappy about the public role you must play now and you're not sure how to get out of it. Unfortunately, there are no quick and easy fixes to your problem, even if you are in touch with the complex dynamics at work. You may be tempted to internalize someone else's struggle and treat it as if it were your own. However, steering clear of any melodrama that isn't yours is mandatory. Don't worry about disappointing others if you choose to back away. You have bigger fish to fry and little time to do it.

Everyone knows you excel in delicate negotiations, so it's only reasonable that they would call on you for assistance now. Although you might want to help, you have your own decisions to make today. Fortunately, there's still time to practice a bit of subtle diplomacy, shuffling back and forth between the disagreeing parties. Your success depends on remaining neutral at all costs. A fair and balanced approach benefits all parties involved.

You have been in the middle of an intense tug-of-war for weeks now, unable to fully express your anger. Unfortunately, you can't just walk away from a conflict that pits your need for long-term emotional security against your desire to tell the truth. But the situation is more complex if you're uncertain about what you're willing to negotiate. In the end, practicing the art of compromise helps you navigate these tumultuous waters. Flexibility is your friend.

You would do anything to avoid being dragged into an emotional squabble today yet it becomes more difficult to stay on the sidelines as time goes on. You're not interested in choosing sides because you don't want to fuel unnecessary conflicts. Nevertheless, you can still be an outspoken community member who warns about the pitfalls of spreading fearful negativity. Follow your own spiritual path and let your love light shine as a beacon for the rest of the world to follow.

A relationship may be a significant source of tension now as battle lines are drawn and remaining civil grows more urgent moment by moment. You might begin sorting out your differences through cool and calm communication. Nevertheless, you can easily slip back into emotionally engaging in the ensuing drama. Instead of behaving self-righteously and pushing someone's buttons, act with restraint. A small dose of discretion goes a long way to settle everyone's frazzled nerves. Be kind; think more and speak less.

Maintaining objectivity is unlikely today, even as you try to see the pros and cons of a coworker's plan. Unfortunately, you believe you know what's best for everyone and are quick to share your opinion with anyone who asks. But instead of judging others, clean up your own act first. Making small improvements at work throughout the next week is more constructive than wasting time blaming another person for your dilemma. The biggest changes start with you.

Your friends might believe they have your best interests at heart, but their behavior is too controlling for your taste today. Nevertheless, it can be awkward to come right out and tell them to back off because your abrupt message could alienate your most supportive allies. Dig in your heels and set clear personal boundaries that empower you to feel truly independent. Just make sure you listen to the advice you receive before going off on your own.

You can push boundaries without even realizing it when you are keyed up about something new. However, today's enthusiasm might be a bit misdirected as assertive Mars is misaligned with delusional Neptune. The problem is your favorite idea may not be as brilliant as you think. Don't be so cocky that you stubbornly try to defend an incorrect assumption or an unrealistic goal. Be patient and review your plans one more time; haste makes waste.

Your professional goals may seem more tangible with your dreams right at the tips of your outstretched fingers. On the positive side, you can believe a fantasy is so real that your legendary determination makes it so. However, you may be overconfident, convincing yourself that you're very close to reaching your destination even if you're not. Use your common sense before wasting more energy pursuing something that can't happen. Focus on the possibilities in the present moment instead.

Jumping to conclusions can land you in a heap of trouble today as you revive an old dream of becoming a student for the sole purpose of learning. Exploring educational options is admirable as long as your primary goal is to expand your mind. Unfortunately, the Moon's visit to your 9th House of Higher Truth doesn't always prompt the most practical thinking. Widening your perspective is a healthy process as long as you don't rush to make a decision. Avoid participating in a comedy of errors today by giving your ideas enough time to develop before doing anything rash.

It's safer to keep your unexpressed emotional desires to yourself today, for your intensity could be unsettling to someone else. However, you still must be willing to gamble on the unknown if you want to experience new levels of intimacy with someone that you admire. Revealing your feelings creates a vulnerability that could pull you into a danger zone; thankfully, the benefits outweigh the risks if you're sincere in affection.

You might be concerned that a magical moment could slip through your fingers today, but no amount of logic can help you figure out an effective strategy to stabilize your position. Attempting to rationally understand a relationship that eludes comprehension is an exercise in futility. An approach based upon intellectual analysis only brings you back around to the same dissatisfaction you're trying to escape. It's time to release your need to discover truths other than what is already in your heart.

You have a perfect opportunity to influence your physical well-being today by simply changing your mind. The Moon's shift into innovative Aquarius and your 6th House of Daily Routine helps you focus your energy on self-improvement. The powerful impact that positive thinking has on your life should not be underestimated. Obviously, taking decisive action is part of the program, but for now your attitude is the key to a happier and healthier you.

You could easily rekindle an old flame today; however, your feelings may be more dependent on your illusions than reality. You're more open to the possibility of playful romance, whether or not you're willing to express your emotions. Since a current infatuation might be the result of idle daydreaming, you really don't require anyone to act out your fantasy. Go ahead and enjoy the fruits of your imagination without trying to reach satisfaction in the real world.

You believe you understand how a domestic situation is going to play out, especially if you are in the process of reevaluating your long-term goals. However, it's nearly impossible to know to make a decision now because your future still seems like a fantasy. There's little you can do to fill in the elusive details of your upcoming adventures. Instead of taking concrete action, give yourself permission to dream without attempting to make anything real yet.

Communicating your ideas can be exasperating today, especially if you want others to play on your team. The good news is you have many options available, but your current plans probably lack substance. Normally, you're quite happy to float in the realm of abstractions. However, your immediate need to create realistic goals now is in direct conflict with your dreamier thoughts. Nevertheless, making a commitment to anything is better than drifting along without direction. Saying yes requires you to take a risk, but putting all your eggs in one basket is safer than you think.

Your ego may lose its sense of proportion now as others encourage you to reach for your dreams. Obviously, self-confidence is a useful asset, but your outrageous ideas can annoy those who might otherwise be your most supportive allies. Moderating your ambitions with a little modesty is a wise strategy today. A healthy perspective on life makes all the difference between your success and failure. A touch of humility can save the day.

People might think you're being particularly weird today, but it's just business as usual for you. In fact, you might have a few tricks up your sleeve to make you to seem less grounded than you actually are. You can cleverly avoid a skirmish over who is in charge if others are less threatened by you. However, you're still a formidable opponent behind your eccentric veneer. Don't waste too much energy with a strategy based on misdirection; honest communication from the start is a much better way to build trust and get things done.

You may be engaged in an uphill battle to keep your dreams under control today because they are overflowing right into your waking life. Obviously, rationalizing your feelings when your emotions are strongly influenced by unconscious urges is a tough task. If you can't map out a sensible course of action, step back until the path becomes clear. A temporary retreat isn't a sign of defeat when you're using your time constructively to get your bearings.

You want to shout your opinions from the rooftop today as the Aquarius Full Moon lights up your 11th House of Networking. But you're not too concerned about what anyone else thinks now because you're sure that your perspective is the right one. Although your plan might work out just fine, your words still could sound more aggressive than you actually feel. Garner support by toning down your message and acknowledging the validity of alternate approaches. Create an environment where everyone can be a winner, not just you.

Your unwavering commitment to accomplish your work prompts you to do things your own unique way. The Aquarius Full Moon wires your 10th House of Career, driving you to succeed at any cost. Your ambition is admirable, but you can be so resistant to change that your closest friends wonder why you are sabotaging your own possible success. Unfortunately, your plans may be jeopardized without the cooperation of your allies. Blind optimism could prevent you from seeing things objectively, so be open to the advice others have to offer.

Your original approach to your job demonstrates your cleverness, but it might also end up making more work. Today's Aquarius Full Moon emphasizes your 9th House of Big Ideas, inspiring you to dream about all the amazing possibilities ahead, rather than concentrating on the present moment. Thankfully, your goals are attainable if you proceed with caution and stick to the basics. Keep things simple and don't look back.

Negotiations can be tricky business today, especially if you're worried about getting your fair share of the pie. The Aquarius Full Moon overwhelms your 8th House of Shared Resources with brilliant ideas, triggering issues around jointly held possessions or investments. People may appeal to your egalitarian values, urging you to lessen your demands. But you want to be an equal partner now, instead of playing a subservient role. Don't just say yes to make someone else feel better while your self-esteem suffers unnecessarily. Standing up for your rights earns you the respect you deserve.

A powerful opportunity to heal your heart can be a gift from the cosmos today if you're experiencing difficulties in the love department. The Aquarius Full Moon illuminates your 7th House of Others, possibly reactivating an unresolved relationship issue. Meanwhile, romantic Venus returns to linger in your sign for the next two months, stirring up feelings for an old friend or lover. Fortunately, re-framing a past relationship in a new light alters your perspective and frees you to be more fully alive in every moment.

You may be so preoccupied with your thoughts that you don't recognize the emotional warmth waiting to embrace you with open arms. The conceptual Aquarius Full Moon falls in your 6th House of Details, encouraging you to lean on your analytical skills to solve a current problem. Although you might believe you're listening carefully, you won't pick up other people's messages unless they arrive on your exact frequency. Opening your mind to new channels of communication today can teach you a very valuable lesson about connecting with your heart.

Your creativity shines while the Aquarius Full Moon sparkles in your 5th House of Self-Expression. You could put on a brilliant performance if you don't try to control every part of the process. A smart strategy is to have a variety of projects to keep you busy while you're hoping for inspiration to strike. Be ready to ride a creative wave if it comes along, but don't be disappointed if nothing extraordinary happens today. As Tom Petty sings, "The waiting is the hardest part."

Something could suddenly snap today as the Aquarius Full Moon activates your 4th House of Domestic Conditions while opposing the showy Leo Sun in your 10th House of Public Status. Your resolve to restore balance to your life should alleviate any emotional upset but downplaying your feelings isn't the answer. Instead of pitting your personal responsibilities against your professional commitments, find ways to support one with the other. Ultimately, creating stability on the home front gives you a firm foundation on which to build your success.

You are aware that your wanderlust makes it difficult to follow through on existing commitments these days. The free-thinking Aquarius Full Moon excites your 3rd House of Distractions, reactivating a familiar theme of intellectual restlessness. Although you might be frustrated by current circumstantial limitations, you can still improve your situation by acknowledging your adventurous desires while simultaneously juggling your copious responsibilities. Managing your time creatively is the key to your success.

Your current financial condition may seem rather unstable today while the erratic Aquarius Full Moon stresses your 2nd House of Money. Maybe you discover your cash on hand is less than anticipated or, perhaps, your bills are greater than previously calculated. Either way, don't avoid a fiscal issue that pops up now, because addressing it rationally is much wiser than putting it off -- even if you don't have a complete solution yet. Taking a small step in the right direction may be enough to set you on a path that eventually leads to a final answer.

Sweeping changes are necessary to get your life back on track now. However, the Full Moon's presence in your sign brings unexpected events that require you to adapt to other people's schedules, anyway. It takes courage to be flexible now instead of rigidly sticking to an old agenda that no longer works. Although this might be an exercise in cooperation, don't lose yourself in the process. It may seem as if others are getting the better end of the deal, but in reality you're the one who stands to gain the most by opening your heart.

You would rather pursue a more meaningful path in life but dramatic events at work demand an increasing amount of your undivided attention. Your friends and colleagues might not even notice that you're struggling now that the Aquarius Full Moon shines in your 12th House of Invisibility. But there's no escape from your routine or your responsibilities. The answer is to integrate a more spiritual approach into everything you do.

By all appearances this is a day made in heaven to play, party and perform. Normally, you're not the shy one and would be the first to jump on stage and entertain the crowd. However, you may be in a more serious mood now and can't seem to snap out of it. Stop worrying about what might go wrong. If you continue to focus on the negative, you'll inadvertently bring it about. Instead of fretting that you may squander this opportunity for fun, just accept the cosmic energy as it is. You can't help but do what's right for you if you go with the flow.

You're happiest in the comfort of your own pasture, but even you easygoing Bulls can benefit from exploring the greener grass on the other side of the hill. You might try to justify your desire to stay at home and let the day pass you by without much action on your part. However, it's prudent to recognize your sense of balance is off kilter today. Free your mind and widen your horizons. The potential for pleasure is much greater now than you can imagine.

Your larger-than-life perceptions may lead you astray today, so don't rush to judgment before you have all the facts in place. Although your future is bright, not everything is as rosy as you currently think. You might draw the wrong conclusions now, even if you have plenty of good information at your disposal. Unfortunately, you could easily mix up reality with your illusions that are influenced by your desires. Positive change is in the air if you let go of your expectations and get out of your own way.

A clash over personal values with someone you love is unsettling to say the least. Although you're often the one to rein in your feelings if you fear rejection, it might be time to take a leap of faith and express what's in your heart. However, there's no reason to overreact and threaten the security of a meaningful relationship. This isn't a tug of war that requires someone to win and someone to lose; it's about being honest and accepting that intelligent people can possess differing viewpoints while still respecting and cherishing each other.

You may be suffering from an emotional hangover as the bright light of yesterday's Full Moon begins to wane. Unfortunately, there's no rest for the weary when your name has top billing and you're expected to dazzle the crowd. Part of you loves the idea of an encore, but your inner voice is reminding you that you've had enough for now. You don't need the applause to know that you're adored. Let go of your leading role and see what it's like to work behind the scenes, instead.

A little peace and quiet may be yours for the asking today if you don't go looking for trouble. But cutting yourself off from your friends won't bring you the long-term emotional satisfaction you seek. Nevertheless, taking a break from your regular weekend activities could be enough to replenish your spirit. Being on your own for a while enables you to reengage socially later in the day with a fresh new attitude on life and love. A grateful heart is a powerful heart.

It's nearly impossible to contain your joie de vivre these days. You might even consider running away with the circus while a pack of rowdy planets in your 11th House of Social Networking encourages you to connect with people who live life as an adventure. Although it's important to find like-minded souls who share your interests, don't give all your energy away to others today. There's magic inside you that needs to find a way out, so don't sacrifice your own creativity for the sake of the group.

You thrive on demonstrating your competence today as the universe challenges you to achieve your goals. Luckily, you have already established a new direction in your life and are happily on your way to your destination. But although you're skipping down the yellow brick road, the closer you get to Oz the further away it appears. Don't trust your five senses now; your ability to make logical decisions may be impaired but your imagination can save the day. Follow your intuition wherever it leads.

You're so eager to rush off to the next amazing activity you can't even contain your excitement. Everything looks like it's coming up roses, but you are less in touch with reality the more extreme an imagined adventure seems. Scaling your expectations down to size is the first step to getting your life back on solid ground. Don't wait for the looming reality check to force you to do what you already know needs to be done. Your preemptive strike clears the air more efficiently than being struck by the lightning of karma.

You might discover your resources are stretched further than you realized but you don't want others to know about your error in judgment. However, it's counterproductive to let your pride stand in the way when your closest friends are more than willing to help. Whether it's time, money or moral support you need, give someone a chance to be your personal hero for the day. Not only will you be able to accomplish your goals, you'll set the stage for a solid relationship built on real trust.

People seem to think they know what's best for you today, but the truth is you're the captain of your own ship. Unfortunately, you might go overboard carrying your flag of independence too far. Others can play an important role by supporting your dreams if you let them. The trick is finding the sweet spot between cooperation and self-reliance. Collaborating is a positive experience if you don't lose your unique voice in the process.

There's too much drama going on today for your personal taste but it seems as if there isn't much you can do to avoid it. However, visualizing how you want things to play out just might have a subtle influence on the course of events. Use your imagination to paint a picture that's more in harmony with your preferences. Don't worry about the circumstances that are beyond your control; a minor adjustment to your behavior could alter your trajectory enough to change your destination.

Let your freak flag fly and flirt like there's no tomorrow as mischievous Mercury trines uninhibited Uranus in your sign. Although social obligations and professional responsibilities continue to demand a significant portion of your attention, you have a sweet opportunity to reconnect with the innocence of romance today. A dream may be a wish your heart makes, but if you don't take a leap of faith and act on a fantasy, it won't stand a chance of coming true.

Dreams of the distant future pull you out of your comfortable past. As intrigued as you might be about all the possibilities that stretch out before you, it's less threatening to think about them than to take concrete action. It's as if you want to shine your light while remaining safely under the covers. Fortunately, you can count on your friends and family to listen to your hopes and concerns. Visit the outer limits in your imagination but remember that home is where your heart is.

You have a spiritual message to share with others today, but it may be challenging to find the right social context in which you can feel safe enough to let down your guard. There are plenty of thoughts running through your head now, including unorthodox political ideas and radical opinions about love. Hang out with a trusted friend who will walk on the wild side with you for a while. All topics are fair game; there's no need to withhold your personal expression as you explore new territory. Go forth and conquer.

You can't be faulted now for making a dramatic gesture that lets everyone know exactly where you stand on an important issue. Reality is giving you the green light to move forward and share things you may normally keep to yourself. As long as you're not trying to enlist anyone to join your cause, it's healthy to state your beliefs clearly, regardless of what others may think. Although your closest friends might not agree with everything you say, they will likely stand by your current decisions, nonetheless. Step out of the shadows and into the light of day.

Although the universe is probably encouraging you nearly everywhere you look, too much of a good thing is not as wonderful as it sounds. If nothing else, at least examine your true motives if you're being generous to a fault when interacting with those you love. There's nothing wrong with telling a story so captivating that your audience is mesmerized, but you could take it too far. Less is more; exaggerating isn't necessary to get your message across. Stretching the envelope could seem like a brilliant idea in the moment, but you'll have a hard time finding your way back to the truth if you do.

You may be quite distracted by your vivid fantasies now even if they don't seamlessly fit into a conversation in your current social context. Although your imagination is working on overdrive today, you don't have to talk about your metaphysical beliefs to have a memorable experience. Thankfully, you can derive profound meaning from a spiritual awakening without anyone else knowing about it. Pursuing enlightenment is the natural thing to do while the magic follows you around wherever you go.

You're striving for absolute transparency in communication today, but the truth is hard to find. You want to know exactly where your friends stand, yet the more you uncover, the less you know. It's even more confusing when the ones you love are sending so many mixed messages. You may eventually realize that everyone's conflicting advice is muddying the water, not clarifying it. You might have to withdraw from the group to reestablish your bearings. You can always ask questions again after you reevaluate your unrealistic expectations and whittle them down to size.

You could surprise everyone today, even yourself, when you decide to buckle down and commit to a project. Although you are optimistic about your ambitious timetable, remember that Saturn the Tester is looming in the background now. No matter how much you plan, things could take longer than you think. Fortunately, your relentless nature works in your favor and will see you through to the other side. There's no reason to doubt your capabilities; just remain open to readjust your schedule as often as reality demands.

Although you Archers are the zodiac's champions of optimism, there are so many opportunities knocking at your door now that even you can't keep up with all of them. Adventures seem to be lurking around every corner; worlds are waiting to be explored beneath every rock. It's as if you're standing on top of a mountain and believe you can see forever and a day. Nevertheless, even the best of news comes with a price. If you lose all sense of boundaries, you could also lose your balance. However, maintaining a healthy and humble perspective enables you to go as far as you can imagine.

You may be uncomfortable with someone's effusive display of unbridled joy today. It's not that you want to restrain anyone's natural expression, it's just that you're uneasy with such intense emotional displays. Nevertheless, you might be surprised by the lessons you learn from this opportunity. Take a page from their book and see what it feels like to relax the rules. Revealing your true colors now won't necessarily further your personal aspirations, but it certainly could bring a smile to your face that you will remember for a long time to come.

You're more than willing to go along for the ride with an unconventional companion today. Ironically, you're eccentric in your own right, but may be suppressing your non-conformist tendencies because of current constraints. If others rattle your cage now, it awakens that part of your personality you have tried to bury for the sake of acceptance. Nevertheless, you're okay with your denial because it seems safer to express your weirdness through another person. Enjoy the unexpected buzz while it lasts, since responsibilities will demand your attention soon enough.

You could be lost in space today but you're able to camouflage your confusion by coming through with flying colors. Unfortunately, you can feel the pressure because others are expecting a lot from you. Luckily, your command performances may be so technically perfect that no one even has a clue that more is going on than meets their eyes. While they are mesmerized by the magic of the details of your actions, you're busy communing with nature, angels and aliens. Your clever trick of making everything seem normal gives you a wider latitude to explore all the other realms to your heart's delight.

You wake up believing you can do anything today, but reality has a different tale to tell. Oddly enough, you won't likely be surprised if you run into an obstacle. It's as if your inner parent warned you to be more practical and you weren't willing to listen. Thankfully, it's not too late to change your ways. A more cautious approach to reaching your goals will take you further than running on enthusiasm. The trick to getting something accomplished now is honoring the opposite messages at play.

You might be tempted to take the day off today, but avoiding your responsibilities won't make them disappear. The fact of the matter is people are counting on you now and you don't want to let them down. Fortunately, your dependable nature motivates you to be there for those who need you the most. It turns out there's nothing more satisfying than being able to show up and save the day. Being a superhero is better than staying at home and missing all the action.

Beginning a project is one thing but finishing it is something entirely different today. You can talk a good game, but sooner or later others are going to expect you to put your words into action. But it's more complicated than it seems if you're not clear about your own objectives. Nevertheless, it may be wise to set your personal needs aside for a while and focus on the demands of work. The sooner you set a sustainable pace the more successful you will be by the end of the day. Start off small and build momentum as your confidence grows.

You have high hopes today, but you could easily underestimate the resources required to complete a job. You might begin by putting all your marbles on the table, but this unrestrained approach encourages you to blow through your time and money without much to show for your efforts. From a practical perspective, planning in advance makes a huge difference. A little self-discipline right from the start ensures you will have what you need down the road.

You feel like you should be the star of the show, but could be dismayed to discover there's no audience. With so many planets in your demonstrative sign, you want it to be all about you today, but there are other factors to consider. Instead of rushing around to prove what you can do, spend your time creating a solid foundation for everyone else to build upon. You may not be admired in the way you prefer, but others will deeply appreciate your contributions in the long run.

It's nearly impossible to resolve the ongoing dissonance between your imagination and the current events in your life. Obviously, you know the difference between the subjective and objective realms, but you believe that your dreams could alter the outcome if your intentions are pure. To some extent this is true, but you still must start with the mundane now and work toward the spiritual, not the other way around. Maintaining a healthy flow between the inner and outer worlds is effective only when it's a two-way street.

Seeking support and recognition from others is an exercise in futility today. No matter how much acknowledgment or love you receive, it may still feel like you're not getting what you deserve. Nevertheless, self-esteem begins with loving yourself; instead of looking everywhere on the outside for validation, focus on your strengths and not your weaknesses. When you perform at your highest potential without expecting anything in return, people will sit up and take notice.

No matter how hard you work today, there's still more to do. However, you might be further along on your path than you realize. Sometimes, you can't see the results of your efforts right away, like when you're climbing a hill. Until you reach the summit, you don't have a wide enough perspective to see how far you've traveled. Continue on your present route without making any major changes until you gain the objectivity you need. Don't veer off track when you're so close to your destination.

All the promises in the world won't overcome your current self-doubt if you're stuck on a memory of a past failure. You may not have the luxury of engaging in a long, drawn out emotional process. Instead, acknowledge the inarguable facts and start from there. Be as realistic as possible about your goals, but don't stop believing in your dreams. Persistence is your secret weapon in your battle against the clock.

It might seem as if the group process is hampering your progress today. Or it's possible that people are really working against your efforts. Instead of trying to lead everyone along on your chosen path, you might have to give up your high expectations of harmonious teamwork. Don't be afraid to separate yourself from the pack. You can't get around the complexity when multiple points of view are involved. Thankfully, you can clarify your own trajectory by setting firm boundaries and sticking to your agenda.

Your career objectives may be in direct conflict with your personal goals now. Your job-related duties prevent you from connecting with those you love in the way you wish. Unfortunately, you must make choices because you can only spread yourself so thin. Normally, you could rely on the advice of others to help you with your dilemma, but they are likely to encourage you to follow your heart. Nevertheless, the logical solution is to accept that it's appropriate to refocus on work for the time being. Once you can measure your professional progress, you'll have more time to revitalize your personal life.

Putting all your eggs in one basket might seem necessary, yet success comes at a high price now. If you want to shine professionally, you have to prove you have the determination and discipline to reach your goals. Unfortunately, you may be distracted by a string of unimportant diversions that steal your time. However, no one is taking anything from you; it's your decision where to focus your awareness. You're standing at a fork in the road; consider the pros and cons of each path before picking the one that suits you best.

You're able to step directly into the flow of events today, even if you don't know what you're doing. The lovely Venus-Jupiter conjunction blesses your 5th House of Fun and Games, making it nearly impossible to miss the beneficial effects of this cosmic gift. Although you can inspire others with your soaring optimism, you may try to take the everything-is-wonderful approach too far. An unexpected twist of fate might be a wake-up call from your future, reminding you to keep everything in proper perspective. When life hands you lemonade, you should be grateful and drink it.

It's nearly impossible for anyone to bring you down today while delicious Venus is cavorting with jolly Jupiter in your 4th House of Security. Ironically, everyone doesn't share your excitement and your unrestrained optimism may put someone else in distress. Thankfully, it doesn't take much effort on your part to curb your enthusiasm just a little. You can make a positive impression now, but no one likes a know-it-all. Express your heartfelt joy in a supportive manner while still being mindful of others.

You may be happy with your current mode of operation today, even if you have to deal with mundane annoyances such as paying bills and juggling one-too-many responsibilities. Luckily, a sudden change of circumstances allows you to temporarily revise your previous agenda to capitalize on an unexpected opportunity. Your flexible attitude works in your favor as long as you resist assuming your method is best. Practicing humility is your key to success.

You may be rather lazy today, even though your senses are wide awake. Opulent Jupiter dances with luscious Venus in your 2nd House of Self-Worth, filling your life with feelings of abundance and pleasure. Happily, too much of a good thing still seems pretty darn good today, as if you can overdo without suffering the consequences. Unfortunately, you can't escape the effects of overindulgence, but you might decide it's worth it. Revel in your good fortune while the lucky stars are on your side.

It's as if you're a magician today, effortlessly pulling one cute rabbit after another out of thin air. You make everything look so easy now because you're having such a good time demonstrating your charming wit and spirit of generosity. However, turning a clever thought or poetic turn of phrase into something more practical could be a challenge. Thankfully, there's no reason to struggle. If you let go of your attachment to a specific outcome and stay open to all the possibilities, your chances for success are endless.

You're tempted to gloss over a significant fact today if you think reality might get in the way of your big plans. Normally, you're quite attentive to the details, but you may be more concerned with fulfilling a pleasurable fantasy now, even if you must temporarily dance around the truth. Fortunately, your integrity prevents you from stepping too far out of line. Additionally, you don't want to waste time later cleaning up from a lapse of good judgment. Nevertheless, a bit of self-indulgence is good for your soul.

You could go overboard when expressing your generosity toward others today as the delightful Venus-Jupiter conjunction sweetens your 11th House of Friends and Associates. It's all too easy to overcome any self-doubt that may be stirred if you are putting your reputation on the line. In fact, the possible rewards seem so great that justifying the risk isn't difficult at all. However, it's still wise to think through your plans before you do something that you might soon regret. Exercising a little common sense enables your random acts of kindness to have the greatest impact.

A well-meaning person could enter your life now, offering you a business opportunity or an unexpected chance to further your career. Receiving a generous gift is another possible manifestation of the auspicious Venus-Jupiter conjunction that graces your 10th House of Status. You could be pleasantly surprised no matter what happens. Of course, there's never any cosmic guarantees, but be ready to gratefully accept whatever good news arrives at your doorstep today. Don't hesitate; open the door and let it in.

It's easier to re-evaluate your future plans than to actually motivate yourself today to make a move. However, you're willing to take a leap of faith and say yes if something sounds intriguing while the promising Venus-Jupiter conjunction shines in your 9th House of Adventure. Nevertheless, success comes at a cost now, and there still may be a few surprises along the way. The potential is great if you exercise good judgment. Managing your obligations early in the day frees you up to respond to an unexpected opportunity with open arms.

Support comes out of left field today as friendly Venus joins propitious Jupiter in your 8th House of Shared Resources. Collaborating with others is a win-win proposition because nearly anything you do now serves to further your long-term goals. Your ambitious nature is currently your greatest asset. Don't be overly concerned if you can't figure out where the opportunities might lead. All you need to do is climb on the bandwagon and enjoy the ride. A grateful mind is a powerful mind.

Your current success depends on your ability to combine your unique creativity with your persuasive charm. Working with those who share your passions is your ticket to happiness as the harmonious Venus-Jupiter conjunction highlights your 7th House of Partners. Friends and associates bring much-needed skills and resources to the table, paving a clear path to your goals. Oddly enough, pursuing the pleasure principle may be the key to attracting those who can help you the most.

Relaxing doesn't feel like a viable option today, especially if you are swept up in the anticipation of what's right around the next corner. Even if something wonderful at work catches you off guard, it's still challenging to stop long enough to let the experience sink in. Luckily, you can make a conscious decision to soak in the sweetness of the present moment instead of immediately returning to the task at hand. Stop to appreciate the power of now; mix work with play when you are given the chance.

You might not easily accept the fact that you can't have everything you want now. Satisfaction grows even more elusive if you expect others to fulfill your needs. Anger can sneak into the equation if you're not careful today. But don't toss blame around if you're feeling frustrated; striking out against someone else only pushes them away. Instead, hard work or strenuous exercise is a healthier outlet for your bottled-up tension. You'll be a lot more fun to be around if you're not ready to explode at any given moment. Breathe; this too shall pass.

Your efforts to socialize today may be met with a cool reception. Although you might believe someone is purposefully setting obstacles in your path, making a significant connection isn't out of the question. Cold Saturn's stressful square to warm Venus requires you to set aside your fantasies for a while. Fortunately, putting in the extra effort that builds a strong foundation improves the chances of creating an enduring relationship. There's no free lunch when it comes to love.

Your clever wit naturally gives you a distinct advantage when it comes to having a good time. However, you may be too anxious to fully enjoy yourself today. You could be so concerned about losing your goodies that you unconsciously clench your jaw in fear. Unfortunately, holding your breath only produces the opposite effect of what you really want. This stress is inconsequential in the larger scheme of things and you can change the atmosphere by simply relaxing into the present moment. Counting your blessings is the quickest way to remember what you value most.

You may be afraid that your happiness is about to slip through your fingers. Unfortunately, you can easily succumb to this self-induced uncertainty and withdraw from close encounters with those you love. However, a better strategy might be to face your demons and consciously overcome your instinctive resistance. The more awareness you shine on your hidden feelings, the more lighthearted you'll feel about life in general. Mustering the courage to engage your worries empowers you to conquer them.

Pulling back into the safety of your home and family may be your most sensible move as the tides of change wash upon your shore. You might be feeling a sense of urgency, but won't likely lose your chance to find fulfillment if you don't jump to act today. In fact, you have an excellent opportunity to tie up loose emotional ends now so that you can launch into a new cycle in the days ahead. Reconnecting with those you love does your heart good.

You have a realistic handle on your emotions today, but with your new focus comes the need to take decisive action. The bad news is you may be pulled in the direction of separation now, rather than connection. The good news is you have the potential of fixing something that's been bothering you for a while, but it requires you to reveal your vulnerability first. Ultimately, listening to your heart won't lead you astray when it comes to manifesting your dreams.

Financial troubles may be a sign that you've been neglecting your responsibilities lately. But the stress you feel might not be limited to money since it also raises issues of your own self-worth, especially pertaining to love and relationships. If your confidence takes a hit, don't waste time worrying about what others think or say about you. You need to be your own biggest fan if you want to create the best possible outcome.

The expectations of loved ones can generate emotional pressure and their needs are so over-the-top now that you're tempted to run for the hills. Your sense of alienation might be exasperated by the lack of support from those who profess to be on your side. Keep in mind that your current experience may be heavily influenced by memories of difficult times. Forgive and then let go of the past; healing is only possible when you're truly ready to move on.

Suppressing a sudden rush of emotions might seem totally unnecessary to you. However, others could be overwhelmed by your energetic onslaught now if you release pent-up feelings without any self-restraint. Luckily, your uncharacteristically practical vision of the future can pull you out of a downward spiral today. Do what you do best: aim your thoughts at an impossible goal and then defy all odds by taking the high road to reach your destination.

You may believe that it's a smart idea to avoid your friends today, as you move through a period of self-imposed isolation. Although the idea of socializing might seem as if it could boost your morale, conversations fall short of your high expectations now. Don't be too self-judgmental; a bit of quality alone time offers you a rare opportunity to listen to your inner voice. Blocking out the extraneous noise enables the wisdom of your soul to be clearly heard.

Your first order of business today is delivering on your recent promises. Responsibility calls, even if you prefer to be spending your time with others while pleasure-seeking Venus is revisiting your 7th House of Relationships. Reality is your taskmaster now and you must do what's being asked of you, which means you have to temporarily set aside your notion of personal satisfaction. Thankfully, applying yourself in a disciplined and industrious manner increases the chances of fulfillment down the road.

It feels as if your current actions won't alleviate your sense of disappointment, no matter what you do. Thankfully, it isn't the end of the world if you have to postpone your plans to make a dream come true. Don't assume this delay is a cancellation; you're just putting a potential adventure on hold so you can make it perfect. In the meantime, patiently tend to the most pressing issues on your plate today; ironically, you might actually fix whatever prevented you from reaching your goals in the first place.

You're ready to settle down and put your nose to the grindstone as taskmaster Saturn pushes your key planet Mars into action. Nevertheless, it's challenging to limit unnecessary distractions as one temptation appears after another. But rather than wasting time pursuing transient pleasure, be responsible and focus on the specific projects in front of you now. Committing to a strict schedule is required today if you want to reach your goals.

A familiar wave of practicality washes away the heightened intensity of the past few days. You may breathe a big sigh of relief now that the Moon is chilling out in your even-tempered sign. However, there is still plenty of work to do, leaving you little time to grow complacent. Luckily, your actions are on target today, enabling you to deliver on your promises and, perhaps, even exceed everyone's expectations. Your dependable nature is appreciated more than you know.

You are pulled in many directions as you attempt to sort out the most productive way to move through such a busy day. Although you're eager to pursue experiences that pique your interest, you don't have time to follow every compelling lead. You may be excessively talkative today, only to be criticized for your lack of focus. Take responsibility for your actions, make tough choices and limit your explanations. Achieving balance is complicated now, yet carefully considering your decisions before you make them assures the best possible outcome.

Your associates may not see past your hard-working exterior today, but your feelings are running strong, nonetheless. Take several deep breaths and contemplate what form of expression works best for you, rather than just running on automatic pilot. It's all too easy to get swept up into doing what's expected, even if you must hide what's most important to you. If anyone pressures you to step too far out of your comfort zone now, set clear boundaries before things get messy. Your destiny is in your own hands.

A melodrama begins to fade today as your common sense grows stronger by the hour. You aren't interested in being sidetracked by someone's emotionally intense story, especially one that seems to go nowhere useful. Instead, work toward improving your life by being as productive as you can. Once you fulfill your responsibilities, choose rejuvenating rest over frivolous activities. Conserving your energy is your only viable strategy now if you want to have enough stamina to see your commitments through to the end. Inch by inch it's a cinch; yard by yard it's hard.

Efficiently managing your internal world now is a necessary part of putting your external affairs in order. Your current attitude sets the stage for your future success. Taking care of business will only get harder to handle as the days fly by if you let yourself become overwhelmed today. Although an I-can-do-it frame of mind is necessary, positive thinking isn't enough now. Pitch in and do your share; ultimately, relying on your industrious nature is your most reliable tactic for achieving your goals.

People may be overly critical about your work today as retrograde Venus joins gossipy Mercury in your 11th House of Teamwork. Instead of letting others rattle your cage, improve your game by applying the valuable feedback you receive. There's no time to get discouraged by anyone else's judgments. Thankfully, counting on your common sense helps you to avoid taking any comments too personally. Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder.

You want everyone to accept your authority without question now while the planetary emphasis is on your 10th House of Public Status. However, stern Saturn's square has you wondering whether or not you're actually on the politically correct side of an issue. Nevertheless, it's not enough to be right; you also want people to appreciate you for your brilliant competence. Rather than inflating your expectations, keep your plans simple today and then do your best to make them real. Your unwavering determination enables you to work your magic and charm your audience.

You're reticent to reveal your innermost feelings today but, thankfully, people might not even notice. It's not that you are carrying around dark secrets; you're just trying to prevent professional relationships from growing more complicated. Consider the potential impact of your words prior to sharing too much information. Practicing a bit of self-restraint now is less stressful than dealing with the negative consequences afterward. Discretion is your friend.

You are tempted to run out on your commitments and chase more pleasurable pursuits. Although you might not be able to act on the spur of the moment to join in the fun, you can still schedule time for socializing into your day. Ironically, it's easier to enjoy yourself now if you can delicately balance your demanding responsibilities with playful activities. As paradoxical as it sounds, establishing an agenda allows you to be more spontaneous.

Playing nicely with others today propels you along your professional path. However, don't get so wrapped up in your own ambitions that you aren't sensitive to the objectives of the group. However, there's no reason to completely set aside your needs in deference to the preferences of your coworkers. Finding common ground enables you to do your own thing while still following the rules of the game.

Focusing on your work can be a real challenge today when you have so many thoughts running around in your brain like the proverbial hamster in a wheel. You are wise to channel your internal chatter into creative outlets, instead of wasting your energy trying to silence it. Don't worry if your coworkers think you're too serious; you have bigger concerns now that leave you little time for social niceties. Ultimately, your actions will speak volumes and others will be suitably impressed.

You may have taken on one too many responsibilities but you're still so confident that you are ready to place even more on your to-do list today. Unfortunately, you could spend an inordinate amount of energy simply trying to fulfill your obligations, leaving you little time left to relax. But don't wait until the end of the day to wish you had less to complete. Judiciously cutting back on your activities sets healthy limits right from the get-go, enabling you to successfully balance work with play.

You assume your strategy is sound, but you still might discover you oversimplified your plan along the way. Your thoughts are a bit scattered today, even if your personal goals are crystal clear. Although you know that pleasure comes to those who wait, finding time for enjoyment is a luxury you don't have yet. But don't let discouragement bring you down; satisfaction will be yours as long as you keep your eyes on the prize.

Your schedule can get out of hand today as your key planet Mercury connects with excessive Jupiter. You could easily underestimate the time and energy required to finish a specific task. Although you may be temporarily overwhelmed, you should be able to pull it all together just in the nick of time. Don't complain, even if you regret how much you actually promised. Instead, keep your chin up and see this challenge as an opportunity to show others what you can do.

You might lose momentum today if you stop to think about everything that could go wrong with your plans. Reality is testing you to see if you can overcome the obstacles that pop up in your path. Fortunately, your inner strength gives you clarity of vision now so you can organize many disparate puzzle pieces into a comprehensive picture. Although your friends show up to support your efforts, it's up to you to graciously accept the assistance that's offered. A shared burden is easier to bear.

The emotional landscape is rapidly changing now and it's nearly impossible to know how you're going to feel next. Oddly enough, you seem to vacillate between possessing superpowers and being a mere mortal. You might actually be able to leap tall thoughts in a single bound; however, you still have to follow through with sensible action. There's nothing wrong with having your head in the clouds if you remember to keep your feet on the ground at the same time.

You seem like a production engine now and you're capable of achieving more than anyone can imagine. Luckily, your steadfast commitment to your goals is likely to be positively acknowledged by others. However, you could be so enamored with your big plans that your overconfidence becomes your downfall. Don't accept more responsibilities than you can realistically manage. Take preventative action today before you find yourself in over your head.

You could be a case study in demonstrating the power of positive thought. It's as if you're on some sort of productive high now and might even be able to imagine something right into existence. It's too bad your sunny confidence can't be bottled and saved for a rainy day. However, the muse is fickle and you will land yourself into trouble if you just assume you can sustain a steady pace. Give yourself a bit of leeway today; allow yourself to meander and don't be afraid to daydream along the way. All those who wander are not lost.

You might not have time to play, even if there's potential fun dangling right in front of your nose. You want to enjoy the company of others, but it's not prudent to avoid responsibilities that you already accepted. Acknowledging the limitations of what you can't do in the present moment allows you to be freer to pursue pleasure or explore the meaning of life without the added burden of having to please everyone else. Promise less; deliver more.

You may be caught up in the residual tension of a power struggle today as you continue to navigate the changes that are being demanded of you. But the more you attempt to cling to the status quo, the more complicated the conflict grows. However, if your commitment to a social cause is more important than achieving your personal goals, you can gracefully dance your way through the resistance. Leave your ego at the door when you're working for the greater good.

You're feeling a bit under the weather today, making it challenging to step past self-imposed restrictions. Nevertheless, you're eager to take advantage of the exciting opportunities calling your name. You could learn something valuable if you don't retreat back to your safety zone too soon. Instead of performing a disappearing act, recognize that your fears don't have to get in the way of the positive potential of your future. Summon your courage; life isn't a battle, it's an adventure.

Someone may present such an amazing idea today that it's hard to say no. However, you might be feeling so positive now that nearly every opportunity seems like a worthwhile one. It really doesn't matter if you're invited to participate in a business deal or attend a private party; the event probably sounds better than it actually is. But there's no good reason to react negatively; just remain open to modifying your position as more of the truth is unveiled. Entertaining all your options enables you to make the best choice in the end.

You believe you're seeing the entire picture now, but you may be sadly mistaken. Unfortunately, precision thinking isn't conducive to a vision quest. You can imagine a highly complex scenario, but just as easily, you could also get sidetracked with all the details. You will probably choose to act upon your new opportunity today because you're eager to turn over a new leaf. Just remember not to over-commit your resources or you might end up regretting your decision. Dream big, but start small.

A never-ending string of distractions makes for an extremely busy day. But rather than growing tired from the steady barrage of activity, all the twists and turns just seem to make your life more interesting. Nevertheless, it's wise to delay important decisions because your judgment could be slightly impaired now. Relax and enjoy the unplanned events this weekend, even if your previous plans unravel in the process. Sometimes magic hides behind chaos.

You're capable of untangling the intricacies of financial planning today, so it makes sense to attend to money management while your thinking is so sharp. Unfortunately, you may be required to iron out a problem that's exacerbated by your temptation to spend too much cash. But the current issues also involve your emotional relationship to your possessions. Stick with your logical approach to move past whatever is standing in your way of material success.

You may start the day as an irrepressible optimist but the power of positive thinking gradually slips away. The mentally agile Gemini Moon squares trickster Mercury, challenging you to maintain a healthy perspective on new projects or adventures. Although cultivating an I-can-do-it attitude is empowering, too much self-confidence lures you in over your head before you remember that you can't swim. Thankfully, you can avoid trouble later by acting cautiously and treading water now.

Although you might chat up a storm today, you're keeping the most significant topics locked up behind your emotional firewall. However, protecting yourself from potential hurt could also add to your current loneliness. But you're not one to confuse flirtatious dialogue with the heartfelt communication that leads to intimacy. Don't let your insecurities stop you from sharing your secrets. Find a way to interact with your friends without closing down your heart.

Although you're sometimes called Lucky Leo, your current good fortune is more about your positive attitude and your ability to find the silver lining in nearly any dark cloud. Thankfully, your friends are rallying around you to support your dreams. The sweet thing is you don't have to do much of anything today, other than remaining open to the assistance coming your way. Count your blessings and soak in the love while you have the chance.

People see you as more gregarious today, but in reality social chit-chat annoys you most of the time. Nevertheless, you can still get so wrapped up in trivial conversations and superfluous activities now that you are distracted from your real work. Don't fight the inevitable; let go of your agenda and return to it tomorrow once the noise quiets down. Taking life less seriously for a while gives you the chance to put your feet up and catch your breath.

You might be planning your getaway to an exotic location in great detail, whether or not your imagined vacation is practical. You deserve a quick escape after the challenges you have recently experienced. Start talking about your next adventure today, even if it seems like a pipe dream at the moment. Remember, you're greasing the wheels and putting a larger chain of events into motion that could culminate in your travel fantasies coming true.

The deeper you dig today, the easier it will be to navigate through the tangle of weeds that appear to hold your life together. However, taking the next step is harder when you're stuck in place. Thankfully, you can see the truth from just about every angle, so with a little detective work you should be able to figure out how to move forward. Remain true to what you know and incorporate what you learn now into your values. Trust your intuition to guide your way.

It might feel as if there's too much drama going on around you today, but the  events in your environment aren't as important as what's going on within your own heart. If you  stay aware of the complex dilemmas going on within your relationships you will come out on top. Thankfully, as you address your inner issues, external ones become less scary. Calm your irrational fears so that they can't take root. Your personal growth is best served when you have the courage to be honest.

You could take on more than you can possibly finish because you tend to overestimate your capabilities today. However, your optimism can't last once you realize there are not enough hours in the day to finish everything. Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible to determine a strategy that makes the best out of a difficult situation. The worst thing you can do is try to hide your uncertainty. People will be sympathetic if you're honest about your limitations. After all, you're an imperfect human just like everyone else. Laugh at yourself and lighten up.
