You may fervently believe your perspective is worthy of top billing, but your arrogance can quickly turn others off. Cooperation is a much more productive model now than competition. Instead of shutting anyone out, listen closely to each person's ideas, since adapting to new information could make the difference between failure and success.

You normally excel when it comes to separating useful data from irrelevant information. However, pompous Jupiter can negatively influence your natural facility for wrapping up all the details today. Your thinking might grow sloppy if you're distracted by the plethora of possibilities in front of you now, especially if you concentrate on the overall generalities rather than the particulars. Keep your feet on the ground and use your common sense for the best possible outcome.

You might surprise everyone today as you make snap decisions with uncharacteristic crystal clear vision. In fact, you are at the opposite end of the spectrum from wishy-washy now. Fortunately, you can take in the entire picture, but it's imperative to overcome the biggest potential pitfall. Be certain that you have all the facts at hand and not only those that support your position. Trusting your intuition is much more reliable when you start with the truth.

Your ability to accomplish your objectives today is directly impacted by your thoughts, so stay  conscious of what runs through your mind. It's not that you can simply manifest everything you visualize with a snap of your fingers, but it just might feel that way now. However, your false sense of confidence is a trap. Even your best-laid plans quickly fall apart if you overextend your resources. On the other hand, you won't make much progress unless you reach beyond your normal limits. An extra push will be rewarded as long as you don't go too far.

Everyone seems to have the same diabolical purpose today: distracting you from your work. It's increasingly difficult to focus when there are so many compelling things calling your name. Your key planet Jupiter can be doggedly persuasive, encouraging you to talk your way through a challenging dilemma. Be forewarned; there is trickster coyote energy in the air and nothing is as it appears. If you over-inflate the balloon, it will surely pop.

You may be offered an opportunity to conquer a tough challenge now by being completely objective about your current circumstances. If your ethics are based upon solid thinking, you will be able to build an empire you can be proud of. But your world might tear apart at the seams if you can't manage all the details. Integrity of data is crucial. Speak your truth and you can easily convince others to join you in your quest.

Someone could present a wonderful idea to you today that seems too good to be true. But before you become more entangled in its energy, make sure to discuss all aspects of the plan with everyone involved. If you don't explore every angle, you might sadly discover you overlooked something obvious in your haste to jump on the bandwagon. Don't be foolish; there's no reason to rush in without proper analysis. Waiting may be the hardest part but it's also the smartest thing you can do now.

It appears as if the sky is clearing today, portending fair weather and smooth sailing ahead. Unfortunately, reality may fall short of your fantasies. Thankfully, you can create a perfect scenario within your imagination -- even if your dreams are totally unrealistic. However, it's wise to stick to your regular daily routine as much as possible now. You are in an excellent position to capitalize on your good fortune as long as you don't fall off the proverbial edge.

Nothing is more important to you today than living up to other people's expectations and you might even become obsessive about doing the right thing. Your drive to finish what you start is probably much stronger than your need to be distracted. You understand that you have no other option but to take care of unfinished business before you run out of time. There are deadlines to meet and your reputation is at stake; it's now or never.

Your emotional steadiness goes beyond a textbook description of a stubborn Bull. Romantic concerns that might normally be upsetting are taken in stride today because you believe you can safely say what's on your mind. However, you might have a sneaky suspicion that no one is listening to you. But don't rock the boat just to see if anyone is paying attention. Waiting for the right moment to have a rational discussion is less stressful for everyone involved and more effective in the long run.

You're confident you can communicate your ideas easily today, and you expect others to be charmed by your charisma. Although you may be poised to swing into action before you have all the details in place, your cavalier attitude clashes with a more contemplative side of your personality that comes to the forefront now. Assimilate your careful analysis into your strategy, for it helps you hit your target with even more accuracy. Practice makes perfect.

Your brain may win out over your heart in an internal struggle between logic and emotions. But it isn't wise to overreact to a situation before you allow sufficient time to process your feelings. It makes good sense to override a strong attraction that will only add drama to your life as long as you don't just shut down prematurely out of fear. Sometimes, the most loving thing you can do is to take care of yourself.

It could seem as if you have reached the end of the road and that summer is already over, even though it's not. However, your anticipation of the future heightens your sense of urgency today as the Moon highlights your 11th House of Hopes and Wishes. You might try to squeeze so much into your schedule that you don't have time to enjoy any of it. Nevertheless, a more deliberate approach works if you stop and set priorities early in the day. Oddly enough, slowing down enables you to accomplish more than you ever dreamed possible.

You may be locked in an endless debate that has no clear winner as passionate Pluto aligns with the practical Virgo Sun today. Your words sound overly emotional, even if that's not how you feel. Although you might keep your vulnerability a secret for now, the truth will probably leak out soon enough, anyhow. Take control by shifting the conversation from a confrontational argument into an opportunity to share your passions. No one can find fault with your words as long as you communicate in a respectful manner.

You wish you could lean on others now, but everyone seems to be on their own edge of change and therefore somewhat unavailable. Meanwhile, you can find balance as long as you keep your worries to yourself. Unfortunately, you may be living under an illusion based upon what you don't want to know. Nevertheless, it's easier to simply take care of a problem by responding quickly than it is to wait and see what will happen next if you leave things alone. Don't put off until tomorrow what can be done today.

Don't quit now just because you're feeling overwhelmed. Have faith that you can get through all your assignments if you simply focus on one task at a time. However, all kinds of distractions pull you away from your mundane commitments. Fortunately, the Sun's trine to persistent Pluto blesses you with the ability to maintain your concentration, no matter what. You can reach your desired destination if you put your mind to it. Where there's a will, there's a way.

Although your enthusiastic nature can often move mountains, optimism alone isn't enough to prepare you for the big changes ahead. Don't try to fake competence or you could find yourself in over your head before you know it. You must clearly demonstrate your competence before you ask others to accept you as their leader. Your passion is inspirational but all talk and no action won't get you very far today. Lead by example and not by command.

There's so much uncontrollable energy floating around in the atmosphere today that you might not be able to suppress your current anxiety. However, you won't find peace of mind by trying to run the entire show. Being in touch with your feelings isn't necessarily a problem, especially if it motivates you to exert your authority over those parts of your life that are within your sphere of influence. But don't fight an unwinnable battle; knowing when to let go can turn potential frustration into surprising satisfaction.

If there are lingering questions from a close friend or partner hanging between you, respond to them as fast as possible because your window of opportunity is closing quickly now. Instead of secretively manipulating the pieces of the puzzle, bring any remaining concerns out in the open while you can. Once all your cards are on the table today, it will be much easier to talk about what is wrong and discuss a variety of possible solutions. Clearing the air is the kindest thing you can do for all parties involved.

Stand up and say what's on your mind today because your words carry the intensity of the conviction of your beliefs. Go the extra mile to be completely honest with your friends while the Sun harmonizes with profound Pluto in your 11th House of Social Networking. Just be certain you're making sense when you share your feelings, since you could be extremely passionate about a relationship issue now. Aim your thoughts carefully and don't stray from your truth. Claim your power while you have the chance.

It feels as if you have one last chance to revisit your childhood to salvage something meaningful you left behind. Perhaps you set aside some artistic pursuit or creative pastime as you grew up and were told to be more responsible. Surprisingly, resurrecting an old hobby can bring a deep sense of emotional fulfillment no matter how many years have gone by. True expressions of the soul are not bound by time, space or matter.

You know that you should be planning for your future now, however, you can't help but take one more stroll down Memory Lane to replay the good times you've shared with friends and family. However, the trick is to remember there are just as many wonderful experiences ahead. Instead of getting stuck in the past today, put your mind to creating special occasions with the ones you love in the present moment that will grow into future memories down the road. Gratitude is evergreen.

You want to spend time reliving the glory days but your past might not actually be as awesome as you remember it. You may have blown the events out of proportion over time, but they seem so real to you now. Nevertheless, you are eager to talk about your recollections and could even hope to reconnect with old friends from college or even your childhood pals. Reaching out to reminisce is a lovely diversion on a Sunday afternoon; pick up the phone and just say hello.

You still may be hooked on old tapes when it comes to receiving love and money. But you need to remember that's how you lived in the past. Now, as sweet Venus is turning direct, it's time to break habits that no longer serve you well. Focusing on your lack of resources does nothing to enhance your bank account. If you're always fretting about the scarcity in your life, you'll never feel the abundance around you. Prosperity starts as a state of mind.

You have waited for this day long enough. Even though your life might not radically change today, it feels like the tables are finally turning in your direction. You can sense something different in the atmosphere, as if a weight has been lifted. However, you're not quite ready to put on your dancing shoes just yet; your emotions are sinking into more serious realms now as you ask important questions. But once you have your answers, you will be good to go.

Your ability to remain rational grows weaker when confronted by the emotions of someone who matters to your heart. Unfortunately, your recent sacrifices might have tilted the scales too far in another person's favor. Although gentle Venus is turning direct in your 12th House of Soul Consciousness, spiritual love may not be a satisfactory substitute for romantic love. Nevertheless, the emotional tides are shifting and your compassionate attitude could pay off with surprising results.

You're standing on shaky ground today, and aren't so sure of your next move. Nevertheless, it's time to take the lessons you've learned over the past six weeks and put them to good use. Trusting your feelings to steer you in the right direction now gives you a chance to take a stand about something important. Although social alliances appear to be changing, your foundation is strongest when you speak from your heart.

All this time you've been working in the dark and finally, you can see the light at the end of the tunnel. You have been applying yourself diligently without even a glimpse of the ultimate destination. But now, the horizon is growing visible through the lifting clouds and your anticipation grows by leaps and bounds. Share your dreams with others while magnetic Venus is attracting people of importance to your 10th House of Status. There's no reason to compromise your goals when you are so close to achieving them.

What seemed next-to-impossible just last week now seems highly likely. It's tempting to take people's stories at face value, especially when it's more fun to disregard the details and focus on the big picture today. However, you might think that heading out on your own would be a good idea until you remember how entangled your life is with everyone else's. Fortunately, you can pull off a major coup with just a little bit of luck and a lot of hard work. Cross your fingers and hope for the best.

You're not typically all that comfortable letting others take care of you, but recently you spent a considerable amount of time reassessing your relationships. You can't help but notice how much others want to help you and it fills you with intense gratitude. Instead of seeing your vulnerability as a weakness, it's time to see it as a strength. Your reevaluation phase is over; accept support when offered -- emotional, physical or fiscal -- and return the favor when given a chance.

You can see the love that's shining all around you where only recently you felt there was little to be found. Oddly enough, it's possible that nothing has changed -- except you and what your heart wants. Rehashing an old issue may be particularly cathartic now, especially if you go back to make amends. It's amazing how much healing can occur with just a simple apology. As Shakespeare wrote, "A light heart lives long."

You're ready to break old patterns that prevent you from experiencing love as fully as possible. You're tired of running into the same old ghosts that keep reappearing as long as you don't fully address your fears. Thankfully, your relationships take on a whole new vibration if you're willing to learn from your past mistakes. To err is human; to forgive is divine.

You're not going to let anything bother you today, or so you think. Your swashbuckling strategy might actually work for a while, but it's unfeasible to maintain your cavalier attitude if someone's inconsiderate actions offend or threaten you. Even if you choose to ignore the sleight, addressing your unresolved feelings is less complicated now than if you wait until later. Being honest about your experience is better than letting an annoyance grow into resentment. Your reaction may ruffle someone's feathers, but expressing your emotions clears the air once and for all.

You're quite positive about your life's direction today and may even ignore a conflict in your calendar so you can maintain your current peace of mind. You're concerned that others will judge you unfairly, but it's impossible to bury your head in the sand while the introverted Cancer Moon squares chatty Mercury. It's healthier to face a potential problem in your schedule than to tap dance your way around it. Confront your fear of rejection; your dilemma is not as big as you think. You are most likely to find a solution when you open your heart and involve others in the process.

Although you might be tenaciously clinging to fears about your finances today, you could be putting on a show of confidence so others won't see past your charming demeanor. Wanting to present your life in a complimentary light is perfectly understandable, but don't try to fool yourself even if you are dazzling others with your fancy footwork. Managing your money needs to be a top priority. The only thing anyone needs to know is that you're busy and can't be disturbed now. The sooner you take care of business, the sooner you can have some fun.

You seem rather distracted today, yet it's wise to acknowledge your feelings and express your needs while the evocative Moon is back in your sign. You're beginning a whole new emotional cycle now, yet your attachment to the past prevents you from fully embracing the future. Patience is one of your strengths; just don't turn it into an exercise in procrastination while waiting for the most propitious moment to act. Reveal your heart while the planets are in your corner and Lady Luck is on your side.

You may appear to be quite agreeable in all that you do today, but you still have your own agenda cooking on the back-burner, nonetheless. Instead of trying to persuade anyone that you're onto something big, you might choose to simply hide your true intentions from others now that the reflective Moon is lurking in your 12th House of Privacy. The fact is there's no need to explain your decisions; your actions speak louder than any words you might use to rationalize your behavior. The element of surprise is your secret weapon.

Everyone seems to be relying on you for something today and you don't want to let anyone down. Although various commitments are pulling you in many directions, you desperately want to narrow your focus and do one thing at a time. You have high expectations for the quality of your experiences, but find it impossible to relax when you're under too much pressure. Perfection is not required; establish a new agenda that permits you to slow down and fully enjoy your time with friends and family.

You might not be as emotionally available as others expect these days, but you're doing significant work within the confines of your mind. Do the best you can to maintain appearances to give yourself the room you need to continue your inner journey. Remember, today's creative ideas fuel your intentions for the days ahead. Set boundaries if people keep interrupting your reverie; getting lost in your imagination now helps you find the keys to your future success.

Your desire to support someone else's plan doesn't mean you have to relinquish your own dreams. Unfortunately, you may feel pushed into an uncomfortable emotional box if you believe that people are taking unfair advantage of your flexibility. Try not to blame anyone for their shortcomings; just focus on your own reactions instead of what others did or didn't do. Adopting a compassionate strategy allows for the best possible outcome for everyone involved.

An intense relationship issue with a powerful person may turn into an outright conflict today as clashing points of view demand your intervention. Nevertheless, direct confrontation won't produce a clear winner now, so minimize unnecessary drama by refusing to cross swords or words with anyone. Instead of wasting precious time arguing about who is right and who is wrong, explore common ground so you can accomplish more than either of you could on your own. Take the high road and see who follows.

You're as busy as a beaver today and happy that you have a variety of things to do on a day off. Nevertheless, you're not thrilled if people are overly dependent on you. You don't like running all over the place to bail out others when you secretly wish you were addressing your own needs. Although you can't ignore your personal relationships, you can reshuffle your priorities so that your goals take precedence. Being clear about your desires from the start prevents anyone from having unrealistic expectations. Standing up for yourself inspires others to do the same.

Crosscurrents at home require your undivided attention today. You're up for nearly anything and your positive attitude will ultimately hold you in good stead. But your eagerness could set up an unhappy situation where you are stretched so thin that you cannot enjoy yourself, no matter what you're doing. Stay aware of your energy level so you can maintain a sustainable pace and, ultimately, feel satisfied at the end of the day.

A relationship dilemma may be interfering with your ability to laugh while everyone else around you is busy having fun. Or perhaps your emotional needs are in conflict with your current social obligations. Either way, you must find a sensible course of action that allows you to remain in touch with your feelings without believing that you must fix everything right away. Resolution will come in time if you don't try too hard to play the hero now. A willing heart and a healthy sense of humor are all you need to bring to the table today.

Sparks are flying and you are energized by the electric buzz in the atmosphere. Irrepressible Uranus zaps your key planet Mars today, provoking you to act on your feelings without restraint. However, you're likely to have transitory moments of self-doubt interspersed throughout the day. Rest assured you will bounce back each time, so make the most of your enthusiasm when it returns. Your passion for life is contagious, but others will be more supportive of your spirited approach if you remember to respect their boundaries in the process of chasing your dreams.

There's a lot going on today but you don't want to be pulled off course. It's all too easy to be swept up in distractions with so much planetary energy reverberating around you now, leading you to misplace your wallet or skip an appointment. You might try to run away from all the commotion because too much instability makes you nervous. Nevertheless, you don't need to ignore reality to find happiness. Let your inner composure act as your guide as you calmly navigate the outer chaos of the day.

Everyone seems to be having a good time today and you long to be a part of the action. You're ready for the show as long as you can share the stage with people you respect. You don't want all the attention because you know that responsibility comes along with performing the lead in a production. Nevertheless, you would like your magical moment in the spotlight. Luckily, your charm works in your favor now as long as you don't lay it on too thick. Ultimately, the best role you can play is your authentic self.

You may seem overly moody to others today, especially if you're oblivious to their perceptions. Although the reflective Moon is swimming through your sign, you don't have time to contemplate your emotions when there's a lot at stake at work. You are overwhelmed with so many tasks to do that you can't sit still. Setting clear intentions right from the start empowers you to maintain your direction in spite of the hustle and bustle of the day. Fixating on your goals anchors you even when circumstances keep changing all around you.

Your actions tell the most convincing story today. In spite of all your inspirational talk, you're happy to fly solo now. You're not willing to go along with the group consensus, but your agenda is so brilliant that people may choose to follow you, instead. Unfortunately, you're moving so fast that you appear as a blur to those who might select you as their leader. Nevertheless, your independent attitude isn't necessarily in your best interest. When you work as part of a successful team, the whole is more than the sum of its parts.

There's a lot of energy wafting through your world these days and it needs a positive direction to prevent it from bottling up. Luckily, you are in touch with your feelings and are certain about your destination. Nevertheless, you may need to make mid-course corrections throughout the day when you encounter unexpected twists and turns on your path. Fortunately, the element of surprise works to your advantage now if you don't resist the changes. You can easily exceed your own expectations if you're willing to meet reality halfway.

You're not in the mood to put up with any nonsense today. Your emotional fuse is short and your reaction to someone's shortcomings could be swift. However, your impatience with a friend or coworker might actually be a result of your own frustration. Expressing what's on your mind may feel cathartic in the moment, but could create major disruptions to your routine. Decide in advance if your outburst will be worth it. Not every thought or feeling needs to be shared. Channel your angst into your creativity and there will be less collateral damage to regret.

You might be running circles around everyone at work today. Your nerves are on edge and your energy is indefatigable. However, something may be quietly gnawing away at your confidence from a dark corner in the recesses of your mind. This negativity can be a momentary passing thought if you're willing to be proactive in your thinking. Once you know the source of your self-doubt, you can quickly move past it and reclaim your position as the unchallenged king of the mountain.

Your current creativity is a sight to behold because it appears as if you are freely living your dreams. You Archers have sprouted wings and are riding high on the planetary thermals as inventive Uranus trines energetic Mars in your 9th House of Distant Horizons. However, unbeknownst to others, your emotions are anchored to a stable point on the ground, blessing you with the ability to soar without losing touch with reality. Balancing between reckless abandon and cautious responsibility empowers you to reach further into the future than ever before. Fly, baby, fly!

Your penchant for serious thinking won't stop you from joining in the fun and games today. Even if you are tempted to act in an authoritative manner, you can't play the role of a heavyweight for long when your spirit feels so light and free. Partaking in the pleasures of the day is more beneficial to you in the long run than striving to achieve another goal. Sometimes a  Mountain Goat just wants to act like Pan, spontaneously singing and frolicking on the edge of a cliff without a care in the world.

You're eager to show off your wild and quirky side today and people can't decide if you're brilliant or crazy. Thankfully, your actions are inspired by a higher power that encourages you to go right to the edge of acceptability without stepping over it. Don't cling to old patterns; trusting your instincts now won't steer you wrong while warrior Mars harmonizes with ingenious Uranus. You possess the magic to make anything happen as long as you believe in the impossible.

Your current understanding of your place in the world is in the midst of major upheaval as spontaneous Mars trines unpredictable Uranus in your 2nd House of Values. So much is happening so fast that there's no way you can maintain the status quo. Fortunately, you're so busy anticipating the future that you're not experiencing any feelings of fear or uncertainty. However, you may be like a fish out of water now; luckily, integrating the changes with a spiritual slant allows you to walk on solid ground like a pro.

You wake up wired for action, feeling jolts of intellectual lightning that won't let you go back to sleep. This mental adrenaline rush makes it nearly impossible to moderate your message today. Fortunately, you're so connected to your spiritual path now that your passionate nature can be quite inspiring to others. Nevertheless, you could become your own worst enemy if you are convinced that your way is the only route to success. Focus on projecting the positive potential without trying to prove your superiority. All roads lead to Rome.

Your plans seem to make perfect sense today as long as you don't attempt to explain them to your coworkers. Naturally, this silence can become a real problem, especially if your approach is more radical than everyone else's. You're willing to break a rule or two in order to achieve success while the rebellious Mars-Uranus trine is in the picture, but perhaps a close friend is urging you to take an even greater risk now. Obviously, you respect the opinions of those you love but, ultimately, your heart knows what's right for you.

Your insatiable curiosity may play a role in a complicated scenario today because you're unwilling to accept the party line as a rational answer to your questions. Unfortunately, you could run into trouble if a tough opponent decides you're the source of the quandary now. Don't waste your energy trying to convince others to support your out-of-the-box ideas. Instead, concentrate on your most immediate goal and don't let up until you see real progress. Knowing what to do in the long run is much easier when your priorities are in order and your mind is clear.

You know in your heart you're about to do something outrageous that frightens you as much as it excites you. Sometimes taking a risk, even a calculated one, provokes angst. However, you might slip through this portal without concern because your unorthodox behavior is receiving cosmic assistance now from the brilliant Mars-Uranus trine. Nevertheless, you still have to speak up and let the universe know what you want. You're more likely to get exactly what you need if you boldly take the initiate; he who hesitates is lost.

You need to be acknowledged at work today and you won't take silence for an answer. Oddly enough, you might feel very secure on the job now, even if you're actually living close to the edge. You may be optimistic about your current trajectory, but your entire plan could backfire if you pressure others with your unconventional ideas. Explain your strategy objectively and then wait to see how everyone reacts before doing anything drastic. Integrating the valuable feedback you receive makes all the difference in the world.

You can't keep quiet about your fears now, even if you think your disclosure will only make you more vulnerable. Fortunately, revealing your feelings allows others to see you in a more human light. Once you soften enough to let someone comfort you, your apprehensions may disperse on their own. In fact, your preemptive strike could be enough to prevent the situation that you previously thought was inevitable. Sharing your concerns with a trustworthy friend calms your nerves. Sometimes a supportive shoulder is all you need to regain your confidence.

You prefer to be a busy bee today, yet you also might grow weary of pollinating so many flowers. But burning up all of your energy early in the day means you won't have the creative juice later when you really need it. You have nothing to prove to anyone else; instead of panicking because you think you're being judged, take control of your day and set your own pace. When you aim for a distant target now, you become the master of your own destiny.

You feel a thrilling electrical current when you flirt with the edge, whether you are skydiving, starting a new job or ending a stale relationship. Ignoring your impulses is nearly impossible while sexy Mars trines shocking Uranus, driving you to try something you've never done before. Watch out for the point of no return today; you can't change your mind once you step past it. Remember the moral of the Hansel and Gretel fairy tale: no matter how many bread crumbs you leave for a trail, it isn't always possible to find your way back home.

Your friends may encourage you to do something that's good for your heart and soul. Naturally, you don't need too much convincing to escape your routine, but the point isn't to avoid your responsibilities in the process. Instead, just be adaptable enough to pursue a bit of unscheduled fun in your day. Taking a spontaneous break might be just what the doctor ordered, but it could also raise some eyebrows at work. Don't surprise anyone with your sudden exit; explaining your actions in advance reduces the tension before it has a chance to gain traction. Accountability matters.

You have a number of projects to complete this week and a strategic plan to reach your goals. However, your day won't likely play out according to your expectations. There are too many unknown variables that require you to go along with the ambiguity or you may have a rough time fitting in with others at work. Nevertheless, remaining open to last-minute changes might quickly turn a frustrating day into one filled with anticipation and excitement. The same external events can either make you crazy or happy; the choice is yours.

It's all too easy to justify your current behavior as the expressive Leo Moon performs in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Nevertheless, you have important decisions to make now, freeing you to shift gears and leave your past behind. Don't engage in endless conversations that go nowhere today. Pay close attention to the sensations in your body and do what feels best. Although others might not like your choices, the intelligence of your heart won't lead you astray.

You might think you intuitively know what people want before they ask for it. Still, it's wiser to wait until others articulate their needs today, instead of making matters worse by jumping to an incorrect conclusion. It can be disheartening if a coworker says no to your suggestion, even if it's apparent that he or she lacks vision. But fretting about a stressful situation is simply a waste of your talents. Let the energy sit and see how everyone feels in a few days. There's no hurry if your heart is in the right place.

The clock is ticking and there are only so many hours in the day. No matter how hard you push, your progress might appear to grind to a halt today. But don't worry because everything is likely still on course. Success is just going to take a little longer than you originally expected. Use the extra time to review your plans and fine-tune them however you can. Ultimately, your additional preparation makes you even more productive when the pace picks up in the days ahead.

Your big plans for the future might seem daunting now as you think about how long it will take to reach your destination. You are fully committed to succeeding in your endeavors, but need to apply yourself more diligently than you ever imagined. Although it sounds counter-intuitive, find time to kick back and chill today while you still have the chance. You may be happily surprised how much a little rest and relaxation revitalizes your attitude and lifts your spirits.

Your life may resemble a three-ring circus these days but that's typically how you like it. Nevertheless, the Moon's hyperactivity in your 3rd House of Distractions might be a bit too much noise, even for you. Your juggling act looks like a lot of fun until you don't complete your work in a timely manner, tumbling your illusory house of cards. Luckily, even a minor setback could ultimately work in your favor if you take the changes in stride. A true professional knows the show must go on.

You recently made a promise that you thought was beneficial for your career but you might begin to doubt your own wisdom today. Nevertheless, you're willing to follow through with your commitments, even if you're not as certain about the outcome. Fortunately, your tentative nature serves you well if you take time to consider alternatives now. You might happily discover a better way to reach your destination or you will be more self-assured as you continue on your chosen path. In either case, stretching your horizons and exploring all your options makes good sense when it comes to professional matters.

Life seems like an exciting jousting tournament today and you're anxious for the match to begin. Unfortunately, the rules of engagement aren't necessarily clear and your opponent hasn't even been identified. It's like you're Don Quixote, ready to fight figments of your imagination. But you don't have to create problems where there are none. Instead of seeing reality as something to defeat, channel your aggression into manifesting a more positive future.

You aren't as interested in getting everything perfect as you are in having fun today. However, you don't want anyone to know that you're willing to compromise your work ethic for the opportunity to take a walk on the wild side. Luckily, your chances of pulling off a little escapade are supported by a rebellious Moon-Uranus trine while the emphasis on your 12th House of Privacy provides you with an invisibility cloak. The key to winning your freedom now is to fly under the radar while chasing your dreams.

You may be unnecessarily self-critical now because you want to make the best impression possible on your associates. You are willing to put in extra hours today if you believe your actions will demonstrate your cooperative attitude. No matter how admirable your intentions are, there's a limit to what you can do. Treat the current situation at work like a game of chess; contemplating your next move is a smarter strategy than simply reacting spontaneously. In the meantime, cut yourself some slack. As the Dalai Lama said, "Love is the absence of judgment."

Although your professional trajectory might look good on paper now, sticking with your plan may be more challenging than you anticipated. Thankfully, you're not as concerned with the immediate events as you are with your long-term objectives. Of course, it's wise to apply your wisdom and experience to whatever is occurring in the present moment. However, you may have to make some adjustments in how you approach your work. Consider your current situation as a work in progress; the good news is everything doesn't have to be finished in one day.

Your current exuberance is off the charts; you see unobstructed horizons every which way you look. It feels as if nothing can stop you now. However, your exhilaration is a mixed blessing because you may be so confident that you don't pay attention to the obvious clues. You might even believe that the rules of the road are made for everyone except you. Instead of courting disaster through denial, improve your game by embracing self-imposed limitations. Judicious use of the brakes ensures a safe journey.

A highly energetic person may have a lot to offer you today, but there's an emotional price to be paid when working closely with anyone else. Ironically, it's exceptionally tricky to engage in a mutually beneficial partnership when everything appears so good at first glance. Fortunately, your joint efforts will likely be rewarded, but only if you work out your differences before you start. Taking time to build a solid foundation makes for a relationship of lasting value.

Relying on your closest friends may lead you in the right direction today, but their advice might shock you. Don't expect others to sugarcoat their words now that the Moon is resonating with reactionary Uranus in your 3rd House of Communication. Embrace the current reality check as gracefully as possible; anything that isn't working should be set aside. Rather than wasting energy on an outdated plan, use what you learn to create a brilliant new strategy that carries you far into the future.

You thought you had a clear picture of the future, but unexpected events on the job bring hidden new vistas into view. It's been increasingly difficult to separate your fantasies from objective reality, but you're prepared to do whatever detective work is required to get to the truth. Take advantage of today's temporary clearing as the clouds of illusion vanish from the sky. Share your plans with someone you respect because a meaningful conversation could be the catalyst that changes everything.

Someone may perform such a convincing dog and pony show today that you're ready to drop everything and join the cause. However, don't sign on any dotted lines until you run through all the numbers and verify all the facts. Luckily, taking the time to do a proper analysis will quickly highlight any potential trouble spots with the story. Exercise caution and utilize your common sense, even if everything sounds amazing. Small steps forward are better than none at all.

You are still caught in a personal struggle, trying to find a happy balance between work and play. However, you may be more interested in planning your weekend activities now than fulfilling your obligations. Unfortunately, you can't sneak away to the beach today because your coworkers won't let you forget about your responsibilities. Instead of fantasizing about your escape, change your attitude and focus on what's right in front of you. The secret of  happiness can be found while you're busy counting your blessings and making the most out of every day.

You don't know how much longer you can hold out as you sit on the edge of your seat wishing for a bit of rest and relaxation. Although you try to rationalize your behavior today, the more you explain your intentions, the less people understand you. Naturally, it's a bit disconcerting when your words don't clearly communicate what's on your mind. Nevertheless, your silence can say more than you realize, especially if your actions are aligned with your heart.

It seems as if you're lingering in a dream state and have lost all sense of time. Frustration arises if your progress in the real world comes to a standstill. However, your current disorientation is just a temporary illusion caused by your mind playing tricks on you. Continue fine-tuning your plans while you still have time; your current efforts will pay off in the future. Remember, the longer you wait for something, the more you will appreciate it when it arrives. If you can imagine it, you can make it real.

You're willing to try nearly anything to make the day fly by quicker because you're eager to return to your nest. You might even be in the mood to make some home improvements or acquire new furnishings this weekend. However, it's wise to weigh your needs against your cash flow before you start spending like there's no tomorrow. Watch your bank account or a domestic project could jeopardize your fiscal stability. If you want to feel rich, just count all the things you have that money can't buy.

You may be entangled in a complicated relationship situation today. On one hand, you feel emotionally available and are open to sharing your feelings with someone close to you. On the other hand, your words say one thing while your actions reveal a different story. Avoid overcompensating to defend yourself against imaginary adversaries, since you might not be seeing things as clearly as you think now. Your perspective will straighten out on its own, but it could take a few days. In the meantime, have faith; the path to love will appear once you know what your heart wants.

Your well-kept secret or someone else's hidden agenda can have a strong influence on the dynamics of your day. Unfortunately, it may be quite challenging to put all the pieces together and make sense out of the current circumstances. After all, significant information is still missing and you're playing along without knowing the rules of the game. Paradoxically, sinking into the mystery might be the best way to coax the facts out into the open. Only time will tell.

You are naturally quite picky about whom you rub elbows with, but your growing circle of friends is still a significant part of your world. You may want to retreat from the crowd today to establish healthy boundaries, but don't disappear too fast because you're likely to receive intangible benefits from just hanging out with your peers. To paraphrase John Lennon, "You can get by with a little help from your friends."

The spotlight is shining on your career now as your concern for your workmates creates an open environment which is more fulfilling for everyone. Reexamine the obstacles that stand in the way of your success, but remember that the resistance is as much within your head and heart as it is anywhere else. Acknowledging your fears is the first step to overcoming them. Being honest about your feelings sets a positive tone for the entire group.

You continue to do your best at meeting your professional expectations, but you might wonder now why you try so hard. You're less concerned with your day-to-day obligations and more inspired by long-range planning. Nevertheless, problems may still arise if you let important details slip. There's little allowance for slacking today so don't get caught dawdling at the water cooler. A lazy day could cost you more than you realize so buckle up and get to work.

You may be lured into a complex emotional drama today and it could interfere with your productivity at work. Your performance might suffer if you are captivated by a spiritual philosophy, a metaphysical topic or an unconventional idea. However, you can glide your way through the unfolding circumstances as long as you maintain clarity about your priorities. Ultimately, it's not about having time; it's about making time for the things that matter.

A friend or coworker could wind up on your doorstep and present a problem to you as if it were yours alone to solve. This unfair request may stir up your anger, making it difficult to express your feelings openly. Thankfully, there's probably an easy-to-find resolution for nearly any potential conflict now, even if there seems to be no immediate solution. It's not disagreement that keeps people apart; it's a lack of communication. Compassionate dialogue is the key that unlocks nearly any puzzle.

Your senses are on high alert and your acute perceptions register every single nuance in your immediate environment today. Unfortunately, you may be so receptive to other people's feelings now that you start noticing things that aren't actually there. Be careful with your pronouncements about what is real; you might be fabricating stories to justify what's in your imagination without even realizing it. Asking lots of questions is better than making faulty assumptions that lead to nothing but trouble.

Everyone seems to be out of step while you are marching along to the beat of a very reliable drummer today. The Sun and Moon are walking hand in hand through fellow earth sign Virgo, supporting your efforts to maintain a steady pace. However, a few unexpected events could rattle your rhythm. Be gentle with yourself because you can easily grow anxious if you try to perform your work at record speed. There's really no need to rush; rely on your sense of humor to save the day.

You think you're ahead of the game only to discover that you somehow outsmarted yourself as trickster Mercury makes his presence known. There's no need to let your inquisitive nature tempt you to look for problems that haven't even surfaced when there is so much positive potential in front of you. Your mental agility is your strong suit, but it's more useful now to just stick with your original plan. Although counting your chickens before they hatch isn't wise, neither is letting negativity hijack your day.

Tinkering with your calendar one more time still won't enable you to fit everything into your day. You need to face the facts and decide what to eliminate before it's too late. Unfortunately, talking about your current time crunch may be a lot easier than actually resolving it. Nevertheless, you will feel a sense of welcome relief after you postpone a few things on your schedule. Setting limits is the kindest thing you can do for everyone involved.

You might feel a loss of momentum today as you readdress issues of financial security. Although you're eager to replenish your reserves, it will take longer than you think to put your finances back in order. Spring into action if you don't want your concerns about money to be more problematic in the weeks ahead. Remember, there's no need to spend what you don't have just to keep up appearances. Getting back to basics is the first step to reclaiming solid ground.

You're struggling with balancing two divergent approaches to life today. On one hand, the Moon, the Sun and Jupiter conspire in your discerning sign, inspiring you to singularly focus your intentions on your work. On the other hand, wildcard Uranus could change the rules of the game in a blink of an eye. Thankfully, you can manage the volatility by instinctively reacting in the present moment and sorting through the details later on. Don't waste time trying to figure out what's right; the answers will come to you organically on their own.

It feels as if people are pressuring you to participate in a group activity today, but you're not feeling very social. Normally, you're the neighborly one who seeks out the company of friends; however, the loud planetary noise in your 12th House of Privacy prompts you to run for the nearest cave. People might not understand your current need for solitude, but the secret to your happiness may be found by spending time in seclusion now rather than in the public eye. It's easy to lose yourself in a crowd; it takes true courage to stand alone.

You need to set aside a chunk of time for a serious relationship discussion with a close friend or partner today. Nevertheless, you're not interested in revisiting an old issue now because you really want to create forward movement. Unfortunately, you may feel as if you're stuck in an energetic holding pattern. Don't let your unspoken feelings fester; talking about them might not bring resolution, but it certainly starts the ball rolling. Communication is the glue of any relationship; without it, you're simply two people dancing in the dark.

You're happily racing ahead on the road of life today, but could be careening toward an unexpected roadblock in the distance. You might even be required to suddenly change directions if you're not willing to stop and reassess your motives. Although there's no need to finalize your new destination, the sooner you begin discussing your lingering fears with someone you trust, the quicker you'll be able to regain a clear perspective. Count on your resiliency; you can't keep a good Centaur down for long.

You may be very thankful that you have a concrete plan in place now, even if it will take considerable time to put it into motion. You're eager to dig in your heels and get serious about reaching your goals. Luckily, you excel at strategic calculations when it comes to obtaining what you want, especially if long-range ambitions are on the agenda. Nevertheless, gaining control of the details of your day will actually help you regain mastery over your entire life.

You have magic at your fingertips today whether you realize it or not. However, this cosmic gift is not meant to be used for personal benefit. Answers are more likely to appear in your dreams now instead of rational logic, so don't seek solutions to global problems through the usual channels. Although your thoughts might mislead you, images won't. Employing symbolic gestures can strongly impact the outcome of your spiritual work in a positive manner. Live the Aquarian dream and use your superpowers to help the world be a better place.

A significant relationship may fall short of your expectations now, especially if you believe your partner is being excessively critical. It might seem as if he or she is emotionally distant and you don't have a clue why. Meanwhile, you long for deeper personal connections in your life while others seem to be less available for one reason or another. Although it's easy to get confused by all the missing pieces of the puzzle, your imagination holds the keys to the kingdom today and not your logic. Keep calm and follow your dreams.

The tension is palpable today, distracting you with the anticipation of something dramatic that's about to occur. Although you can't push the feeling away, you're not ready to calmly accept your fate, either. Nevertheless, the Virgo Solar Eclipse rattles your 6th House of Logistics, reminding you that replaying a familiar old pattern does not allow you to progress on your journey of life. Embrace this opportunity to make the positives changes you've been dreaming of for too long. A rolling stone gathers no moss.

You can ride an impressive wave of creativity now if you simply concentrate on utilizing your talents. The Virgo New Moon Eclipse electrifies your 5th House of Play, reinvigorating your spirits and encouraging you to express yourself at any cost. However, focusing on the practical aspects of your day frees you to have more fun once you finish your chores. Paradoxically, the more you narrow your awareness, the better your chance of losing yourself in the spontaneity of the moment.

You may experience unexpected stress on the home front today, but luckily, you are wired to handle it with finesse. Whatever you do, keep the energy moving with the Virgo Solar Eclipse falling in your 4th House of Security. However, maintaining a smooth flow is a challenge, for worldly responsibilities pull you one way while your emotions and family dynamics pull another. You will probably be caught in the middle now, unless you do your famous Gemini shuffle. There's no need to choose between home and career; dance between the various parts of your life with a smile in your heart and a twinkle in your eye.

You are stepping into a new phase of your life where what you say is extremely critical to your success. You're preoccupied with how to best get your message across as the exacting Virgo Solar Eclipse lands in your 3rd House of Communication. But tossing out a few well-chosen words won't do the trick unless you follow through by expressing your deeper emotions. Don't let your rational thoughts talk your heart out of what it wants.

It is apparent to you that practice really does make perfect as today's Virgo New Moon Eclipse shakes up your 2nd House of Values. Luckily, you can successfully build on your previous efforts, but it will require ongoing determination on your part. Careful analysis before you do anything can make your actions count more later on. Move methodically and don't bite the bait that's dangling on the hook of immediate gratification. Proceed at your own pace; picking up steam will come naturally when the time is right.

You have reached a significant milestone that could remind you of all the hard work behind you as well as the challenges still in front of you. The Virgo Solar Eclipse accentuates your 1st House of Self, prompting you to attempt to make everything happen all at once. Needless to say, this ambitious tactic sets you up for failure. With visionary Jupiter blessing your sign now, you must strive for long-term completion rather than short-term satisfaction. Keeping your eyes on the distance prevents discouragement; your sustained efforts will earn you the accolades you seek, but only after you put in the work.

It's crucial to keep all your dealings above board now, for an unspoken assumption can be your undoing. The slightest hint of shady dealings may cause your world to come tumbling down as the Virgo New Moon Eclipse triggers your 12th House of Destiny. Even while in the midst of a significant transition, you still must honor your core beliefs, for it is your integrity and your faith that will ultimately pull you through any challenge. Do what is right, not what is easy, if you want to walk on a spiritual path.

Your social calendar may have filled up faster than you realized. Suddenly, it's obvious that you have way too much to do as the laser-like Virgo Solar Eclipse over-amps your 11th House of Community. It's probably too late to eliminate extraneous activities today, even if this sounds like the most intelligent strategy. Sometimes you just have to admit defeat and join the crowd. Surprisingly, you may end up learning something unusual, meeting someone influential or even opening a few doors of your own if you surrender to the idea of having fun.

Until quite recently you believed that your life was running on track, but you might start to question your direction when the Virgo New Moon Eclipse activates your 10th House of Career. It's challenging to have faith in your chosen path when your inner feelings don't seem to match up with your outer circumstances. But don't fret about the obstacles that prevent you from reaching your destination today. You may already be exactly where you're supposed to be without knowing it yet. Allow time for your head to catch up with your heart and for the universe to answer your prayers.

Taking a conservative route may not get you as far as you wish today. The discriminating Virgo Solar Eclipse galvanizes your 9th House of Distant Horizons, urging you to pick one of your big ideas to pursue or they will all fade without so much as leaving a trace. Thankfully, you're capable of executing an exquisitely complex scenario now. So disregard the distractions, select your destination and shift into high gear. Be tenacious about your goals and flexible about your methods for the best results.

An interpersonal drama might demand your undivided attention today, even if you try to remain cool, calm and collected. Your logical approach won't help you avoid the emotional pressure as the Virgo New Moon Eclipse zaps your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Although you may try to reason your way out of the situation at first, demonstrate your courage by exploring a new path to intimacy instead. Remember, flashy behavior is not as fulfilling as being true to your heart and making a real connection with someone you love.

The relationship issues that resurface now feel all too familiar because they won't disappear until you address them once and for all. It might seem as if the problem resides in people who are less than reliable as the Virgo Solar Eclipse destabilizes your 7th House of Companions. Unfortunately, there's little you can do to make anyone else take responsibility for their actions. However, you have your own rebellious nature to rein in before you ask others to do the same. Deal with your own idiosyncrasies; worrying about the rest of the world is just an easy distraction.

You don't have to turn every conversation into a competition. In fact, this is a perfect day for you headstrong Rams to practice the art of compromise. The good news is that you are able to soften your hard edges now and let someone else run the show. Your uncharacteristic gentleness enables you to meet others halfway. In turn, your sensitivity minimizes unnecessary conflict. Nevertheless, don't give in too quickly or you'll end up settling for less than you deserve. As Buddha said, "Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace."

Although you might dream about putting up your feet and relaxing today, you would likely grow bored and end up looking for something to do, anyhow. Luckily, with a little attitude adjustment you're able to adjust to the demands of the day and find pleasure from settling into your work while the Moon and Mercury are busy making hay in your 6th House of Daily Routine. You don't need to go searching the cosmos for anything special; the real magic is found in the most ordinary things you do now.

Your most demanding responsibilities may be placed on the back burner for a while today. But this temporary hiatus doesn't mean you can automatically avoid your obligations. Don't leave anyone in the dark when it comes to your work. Then again, the Libra Moon's equanimity indicates you don't need permission from anyone to deliver on your promises a little bit later than planned. Live in the moment; have yourself some good old-fashioned fun, but cover your bases before you run.

You might be required to make a decision that greatly affects your personal life while the diplomatic Libra Moon highlights your 4th House of Family. However, you would prefer to wait a bit longer to see how things develop before you announce your choice. Unfortunately, a difference of opinion could reach a boiling point sooner than you expect. Hiding your feelings won't work this time around. Crawl out of your protective shell and show your true colors, even if being honest feels like risky business.

Your rational approach to a relationship dilemma can be your greatest asset now. Being fair and balanced actually requires some mental effort, but is well worth the trouble. The alternative is to rely on your charm to smooth things over, but this familiar strategy will likely leave you short of emotional satisfaction today. Making a list of pros and cons is a good place to start. Objectively sift through a variety of possibilities and then do your best to find common ground that's acceptable to all.

The same old methods won't necessarily work now, so you must find new ways to accomplish your goals. However, following your impulses might not take you in the right direction, so stop to take a few deep breaths before you switch gears. Even if you made your mind up yesterday, reviewing your decision is a prudent move. But you don't have time to wallow in self-doubt; pick a path and act with confidence as you proceed. If you believe in yourself, so will others.

Although you may be extra moody with the evocative Moon lurking in your sign, you can still trust your feelings to tell the truth now. Even if you're planning on enjoying a peaceful day, you might also remember some deeper psychological issues that you have wrestled with before. Thankfully, you have a newly found hope for positive change. Use your natural instinct to fully consider both sides of a situation before choosing which one to support. Examining both your strengths and your weaknesses empowers you with the self-knowledge needed to win any battle.

There is so much you're not saying today, but it's also possible you're unaware that something significant is missing from the picture. Unfortunately, what you don't notice now can come back and bite you later. Your most reliable defense is to consider all angles, including thinking about the unthinkable. Push all of your own buttons by exploring your fear of change. If you can face the dark alone, you might just realize that the unknown isn't as frightening as it seems from the distance.

You're not a stranger to the idea of living in the future, since you often aim your arrows of intention toward the next possible adventure. However, you need to cut your inflated ideas down to size today or you will surely encounter disappointment later on. Instead of dreaming about an unrealistic journey around the world, start planning a much less ambitious itinerary that you could actually manifest. Set an obtainable goal that will bring you joy rather than one that will remain sadly beyond your grasp.

Your workload is stacking up faster than you can handle and the pressure is too intense for your liking. Escape sounds like a plausible idea, but you quickly realize your integrity won't permit you to quit until your job is done. Although you may feel as if you are in over your head, don't waste precious time entertaining the possibility of failure. You know exactly what must be done now, so bite the bullet and rise to the challenge. Every great accomplishment starts with a decision to try.

You're on an emotional roller coaster and you can't find an easy way to jump off the ride. Thankfully, it's moving a bit slower today, yet there's still no opportunity for a graceful exit. You have serious work to finish now, so save your idle daydreaming for another day. But rather than letting your feelings hijack the day, channel your frustration into fueling your superhero efforts. It might seem as if you're facing a final exam, and perhaps you are metaphorically, but with dedication and perseverance you can pass this test with flying colors.

You have an important message to deliver today, but it's especially tricky to put your complex emotions into words. Ironically, you're just as impatient with someone for misunderstanding you as you are with yourself for not speaking clearly. The harder you try to make your point, the more confusion seems to mount. Watch the signs; if you're not connecting with others now, stop forcing the issue. Simply start up the conversation again tomorrow after everyone has had a chance to chill out. Don't take anyone's behavior personally when it is more about the timing than anything else.

You can't escape from the consequences of someone's unexpected emotional outburst with the interdependent Libra Moon visiting your 7th House of Relationships now. You may be feeling particularly generous while energetic Mars supports your heroic efforts at putting others at ease. Nevertheless, you must also attend to your own needs today, or you won't have anything to give to anyone else. Being a more perfect partner is an admirable goal as long as you don't lose yourself in the process.

In theory, your straightforward strategy would make your workday more pleasant. However, in practice, you might be overwhelmed by all the details you must manage today. You can't hide your head in the sand because there is just too much going on now. Thankfully, you have a knack for simplifying the most complicated of circumstances with just a bit of resolve and common sense. Start by setting new priorities and you'll quickly regain your confidence after you eliminate some of the noise. Confucius said, "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones."

The emotional web you are weaving may begin to unravel this morning, and your energy might feel as if it's tangled up in knots. However, you should be able to iron everything out once you navigate your way through these annoying challenges. The key is perseverance; the difficult spots will only grow if you try to avoid them. Acknowledging the presence of negativity is the first step to putting your life back in order. You can't change what you refuse to confront.

Unexpressed feelings at home complicate family dynamics in more ways than one. Separating your own feelings from those you love today can be tricky, even if you attempt to remain objective in your assessment of the situation. Contemplating your options makes sense, but dwelling on them is of no use. Don't hesitate to take action once you review the possibilities; you have a small window of opportunity now to make something wonderful happen. Speak your truth and let the universe take care of the rest.

Your path into the future may seem clearly obvious, but a few distractions could obscure your way today. You might even feel as if others are acting out of desperation, trying to persuade you to set aside your plans in favor of theirs. Unfortunately, fighting for your cause won't solve anything; confrontation just escalates the tension. Don't stop to justify your actions. Sidestep the entire conflict by quietly doing your thing now instead of wasting energy in endless dialogue.

You might be caught off guard as a coworker or friend does something unexpected that derails your plans today. You may even feel emotionally abandoned now, even if no one has really left you. Keep in mind that times of great progress are often preceded by times of great chaos. Don't miss this opportunity to explore a whole new set of possibilities in response to the shifting landscape. Change is inevitable; growth is optional. Evolve while you have the chance.

You're searching for a good excuse to change your mind now that the evocative Moon is hanging out in your ambivalent sign. Although you often skillfully employ logic to explain your waffling, objectivity isn't all that helpful today. It's your emotions that are currently fluctuating every few minutes. If you don't like what you're feeling in the moment, just patiently wait for the next wave until your moods begin to stabilize. There's no harm in floating for a while in the ebb and flow of your heart.

You're trying to maintain a balanced perspective on your life, but there's only so much objectivity you can manage now. There are just too many variables to juggle these days, each adding subtle nuances to a delicate situation. You can make yourself crazy by attempting to untangle the threads of complexity. Or, you can turn up the volume on your daydreams and drift downstream for a while. Escape is an attractive alternative as long as you remember it's only temporary. Travel in your imagination today, solve your problems tomorrow.

You may feel an irrepressible urge to socialize with your friends today, partly because you're afraid you will miss out on the action. Although the idea of playing hooky is quite tempting, you can't just take the day off because it suits your fancy. Lucky Jupiter encourages you to believe that everything will work out fine, no matter what. But bailing on a commitment is not the right thing to do. Don't let blind optimism talk you out of being responsible. The choice is all yours, along with the consequences.

Although you have partnership issues on your mind today, they're actually just mere distractions from the real dilemma at hand. Career decisions need to be made now that will have long-lasting ramifications. In fact, your current choices also have a significant impact on a spouse or companion. Thankfully, your emotions begin to settle down later in the day, revealing the most direct path to your goal. If you take the feelings of those you love into consideration you will be able to act from both your head and your heart.

You are not the only one who thinks your adventurous ideas are pretty outrageous today. Although letting your imagination run wild could completely upset the apple cart, it might be worth the consequences anyhow. Set aside the restraints of logic and time while you explore all the alternatives without being attached to the outcome. Ultimately, you might not be able to take this particular dream trip, but giving yourself permission to fantasize may be enough of an escape for now.

Your restlessness may get the best of you today as you envision the numerous possibilities stretched out in front of you. Unfortunately, you are tied to your previously made commitments, so you can't just wander off the beaten path now. Instead, keep your eyes on the road and your feet on the ground. Honoring your priorities is a wise antidote to all the spacey energy coming your way. Delivering on your promises demonstrates the strength of your character and the integrity of your intentions.

Nothing is gained by turning every molehill you encounter into a mountain. The problem is you're viewing the world through a magnifying lens that's set to high power, and even the tiniest details assume epic proportions now. Obviously, it's challenging to navigate a path when it's nearly impossible to discern which things are the most important. Remain open to what you learn from your intuition, but don't make any major decisions until you possess a sound analytical perspective on the current events.

You need to stretch a bit further to grab the wonderful opportunities for self-expression and personal growth that are calling your name now. However, you must be careful about wandering down the garden path with over-the-top expectations. Others may suggest ideas that sound perfect, but they might prove less beneficial once put into action. Wearing rose-colored glasses will only lead to disappointment today, especially when your impulses are running wild. Releasing any thoughts of a preconceived outcome empowers your inner child to come out and play.

Your home life may be a rich source of love and support as you present an image of abundance to your family. Regardless of the professional opportunities knocking at your door now, your personal life remains your top consideration. In fact, you might be contemplating the purchase of a new house or remodeling your current residence. In any event, keeping your priorities straight is wiser than just automatically saying yes to the next rung on the ladder of success.

Your circles of communication are growing as a new wave of fascinating people flows into your life. However, you may encounter significant resistance that originates from your own unexpressed fears. Luckily, your current optimism outweighs your nagging concerns. Your dreams of the future are fueling your desire to get it right in the present moment. Narrowing your focus might be difficult at first, but it's exactly what you need to do. Make new friends, but keep the old; one is silver, the other is gold.

You are more determined than ever to acquire what you believe you deserve from life, but you might want to check yourself before you get your priorities twisted. Dreamy Neptune opposes excessive Jupiter in your 2nd House of Resources now, inflating the importance of money and material possessions. Nevertheless, the real significance of these worldly traps is not found in their dollar value, but in the good they can do for others. Happiness ultimately comes from the joy you spread when you share your abundance with those you love. Your generosity knows no bounds.

Relationships are your primary source of inspiration these days, but they may also be the cause of too much confusion. Most likely, you will experience some of both feelings today as ephemeral Neptune attracts the clouds of illusion and the mists of fantasy. Luckily, your penchant for personal growth can overcome even the murkiest of situations now. It's going to take more than a little fog to make you drop anchor. Where there's a will, there's a way; it might not be clear where you are going, but you'll get there, nonetheless.

Big things are happening for you now, but not necessarily in the outer world where they can be seen. Your transformation is occurring in the spiritual and metaphysical dimensions, even if you're not consciously aware of it. Nevertheless, frustration about your lack of progress may set in if you're feeling lost at work. Don't worry; the very same lessons you are learning now will pay off in ways that you can't yet imagine. Roll the cosmic dice and see where they land.

Your path to emotional satisfaction is being paved in social realms now as working and playing with others take on a greater importance. But your current popularity can be slightly disorienting if your personal needs are subsumed by the agendas of those around you. Don't let the unknown rattle your confidence. Focus on the potential camaraderie you can experience today instead of worrying about your individual needs. The more the merrier; life's joys and sorrows are meant to be shared.

Do you know what it feels like when you're stopped at a traffic light and the car next to you has huge speakers with the bass turned up outrageously high? Everything shakes and reverberates, fraying your nerves and offending your ears. The volume on your life is so loud now that it may keep you from fully enjoying the goodies that are waiting on your doorstep. But you can't soundproof your life, so you might as well tap your foot to the beat of the music, even if you didn't choose the song. Life is what you make it.

Your friends and coworkers don't know you as well as they think they do. Although they might see your industrious side, they're surprised with your current disinterest in racing to the top of the next summit. Nevertheless, you're more driven to explore the meaning of life now than to reach the next level of success. Thankfully, you don't need to sacrifice your worldly ambitions to pursue spiritual goals. Balancing the sacred with the mundane offers your soul true satisfaction.

You are usually quite clearheaded about your direction, your values and your skills. However, it's more complicated to get a handle on your life now for reasons you can't fathom. Even if you stand directly in front of a full length mirror and gaze for a long time today, you're still not going to capture an accurate picture of who you are or what you are worth. Save the self-judgments for another day. When the universe invites you to dance, say yes now and ask questions later.

You will likely receive the help you want if you can overcome your insatiable need for perfection now. In fact, nearly all one-on-one encounters are already destined to be more fulfilling than normal. However, there is danger afoot; your imagination may be spinning out of control and it's tough to know which feelings to act on. If you come on too strong, your motives could be easily misinterpreted. Continue to search for that sweet spot as you work at separating your desires from the undisputed truth.

People may have the best of intentions today, but their abrupt criticism can catalyze your thinking and set you off in a radical new direction. However, you must listen closely to what others say now because you could easily misinterpret something based on what you want to believe rather than what is actually said. Ask for clarification before you jump to any incorrect conclusions. You might hear a whole different story the second time around.

You suddenly realize today there's more work to do on a project that you thought was already finished long ago. If you glossed over what you believed was an insignificant detail, you may be required to go back and put things in order while Mercury is retrograde in your 6th House of Logistics. But seeking recognition for your extra efforts now will only bring frustration. Luckily, if you play your cards right, you'll get what you deserve later when you least expect it.

You could be ambivalent about romance as logical Mercury turns backward in your 5th House of Love and Play. One thing is for certain: you want to have fun, but you just don't know the best way to make it happen. Thankfully, it isn't necessary to figure everything out today; you're better off  making decisions on the fly now. All you need to do is maintain your optimism while remaining ready to change your plans on the spot. Living in the moment gives your creativity a chance to sprout wings.

Your personal life takes a surprising twist as an emotionally intense discussion morphs into a close encounter of some kind. It's nearly impossible to know how to define your interactions with others, for you could feel so detached from the drama now that you actually appear to be disinterested. Nevertheless, your curiosity may be enough to hook you on an issue while your tenacity helps to keep you in the game.

Juggling all the appointments on your calendar can hijack your day as you are busy reestablishing connections with people in your social network. You are hopeful that they will support your latest cause, but you might feel let down if your expectations are too high. Remaining flexible now should help you  handle a series of unexpected complications with grace and charm. Leading with your sense of humor paves the way for more meaningful communication down the road.

Pay close attention to your key planet Mercury as he begins dancing backward in your 2nd House of Money today. You might try to compensate for your past indulgences by watching every penny you spend. But problems could stem from the littlest of errors now, rather than a significant budgetary crisis. If you recently have been remiss in paying your bills or sloppy when balancing your accounts, this would be the perfect time to get it right. A bit of due diligence on your part will have your financial house in order before you know it.

You are particularly susceptible to the current retrograde of Mercury as he languishes in your ambiguous sign. You may start off a sentence with one idea in mind and finish it with another.
