Watch your words so you don't inadvertently offend someone you like with a half-baked opinion that slips out accidentally. No matter how profusely you apologize, you can't rewind the moment and take back what's already been said. If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all.

You can quickly work yourself into an uncomfortable position where you must obstinately cling to an idea to prove your point. However, it's just as likely to be someone else who is the bullheaded one today. Don't draw conclusions before you have all the data you need or you might find yourself making an incorrect assumption which, naturally, will lead you to the wrong answer. If you can exercise patience and give everyone the benefit of the doubt, everything else will fall into place in its own sweet time.

Getting down to business today takes a healthy dose of self-discipline because there's too much commotion in the air to hear yourself think. Even your workmates seem to be wandering off the straight and narrow path, beckoning at you to join them. However, you can still be highly productive if you keep your mind singularly focused on your chores. If you do have the luxury of some downtime, don't be afraid to escape into a fantasy, a good book or a movie of your own choosing rather than following the crowd.

Leading effectively is a challenging task when others aren't being completely honest with you. Your coworkers might intend to be forthright with their concerns now, but everyone is leery about what's not being said. No doubt, there is surely more going on than meets the eye today, but it's wise to give the process enough time to see where it's heading before you try to redirect it. Sometimes the best way to resolve a dilemma is to just leave it alone.

It may be necessary to reassess your upcoming plans now that Mercury is dragging his heels in your 9th House of Philosophy. If you are longing to delve deeper into a cultural emergence, spiritual pursuit or artistic endeavor, this planetary ride has your name written all over it. There is no time to waste when there is so much to learn. Use the next few weeks to expand your horizons by exploring any ideas and activities that tweak your curiosity or tug at your soul.

Experiencing true intimacy becomes more elusive today as mischievous Mercury turns retrograde in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You're willing to climb out on an emotional limb and reveal a secret that makes you feel vulnerable. But don't struggle with the thought of not being heard if your heartfelt disclosure seems to fall on deaf ears. Those who love you will listen to your message and respond when they are ready. Patience, grasshopper; it takes time for the seed to grow into a flower.

A change in the cosmic weather has you anticipating your future as industrious Saturn takes up residence in your 9th House of Distant Horizons. Although you may have been satisfied in the past with vague generalities when it comes to your goals in life, you are trying to make sense of what lies ahead and feel driven to establish a long-term plan now. If you have done your emotional homework and your personal relationships are in order, it's time to explore uncharted territory. Learning is no longer simply about satisfying your curiosity; instead, gather information as if it is a necessary tool for turning abstract ideas into concrete reality.

Your relationships have been the direct source of valuable lessons over the past couple of years. As strict Saturn gets comfortable in your 8th House of Transformation now, you must incorporate the knowledge you've acquired into your behavior so you can continue to evolve as an individual and a partner. Although the metamorphosis is gradual, you might have to delve into issues of your dependence when you can't count on anyone for financial and emotional support. Nevertheless, working within the current limitations fuels your personal growth; self-sufficiency builds strength of character.

Your closest associations become the grist for your mill as Saturn the Taskmaster methodically moves through your 7th House of Partnerships. People may seem more demanding these days, but it's only a reflection of your own need to raise the bar in all that you do. Interactions with others provide the stepping stones necessary for creating healthier relationships in your life. Deepening your own experience through one-to-one relationships empowers you to achieve more than you ever dreamed possible.

Sometimes, knowing what to do in life doesn't mean that you're always able to do it. As pragmatic Saturn puts down roots in your 6th House of Self-Improvement now, you must take all the information you've learned and put it into practice. Although there is still hard work ahead, the potential rewards are great if you start small and develop momentum gradually. Your vitality becomes an honest barometer of your overall well-being, signaling how well you're holding up under the pressures of your daily routine. Physical exercise is part of a larger disciplined regimen that assists you in reaching your potential; healthy habits elevate your game to a whole new level.

Channeling your impressive creativity into activities that bring tangible results can change your entire life for the better. Serious Saturn's shift into your 5th House of Self-Expression demands that you tell the world that you mean business now when it comes to love and laughter. Although your interactions with children may inhibit your personal choices, they can also teach you how to embrace a more spontaneous approach to life. Free your mind and the joy will follow.

It may feel as if you're walking through a time warp now that past experiences meander their way back into the present moment. Your home and family life are cast in the spotlight as traditional Saturn travels through your 4th House of Roots. Although parental relationships -- with yours or your children -- can take on greater significance, this is your time to accept responsibility for your role in the bigger picture. Your most personal issues require your thoughtful attention; remember, you're setting the tone and direction for years to come, not only for yourself but also for those you love.

It's crucial to say what you mean and to mean what you say while no-nonsense Saturn is journeying through your 3rd House of Communication. Even if you have been conscientious about your responsibilities over the past few years, you must begin making changes in your day-to-day activities that will eventually restructure your entire life. Instead of being discouraged by how far you must go to reach your long-term goals, focus on the little improvements you can make within the limitations of your current situation. Dream about the future but, as Ram Dass wrote, "Be here now."

You may feel waves of relief and exhilaration wash over you as somber Saturn finally leaves your intense sign after an almost three-year visit. Although celebration might be a bit premature, the seeds of your future are officially planted now. Even if you're on a spiritual quest, keeping a close eye on your finances empowers you to function effectively in the mundane world. Saturn's current trek through your 2nd House of Resources requires you to re-prioritize your values and choose what you cherish the most as you take the next steps on your journey through life.

Your power of concentration is growing stronger day by day. Although your serious demeanor enables you to accomplish more than ever, it can be troublesome if you focus solely on limitations rather than potential. Saturn's return to your optimistic sign brings newly found maturity to how you manage your life, no matter how young or old you are chronologically. Karmic Saturn delivers what you earn so stop putting off the inevitable and get to work. You reap what you sow.

You Mountain Goats are the champions of successfully making and executing long-term plans. You have the keen ability to calculate what you must do today in order to reach a specific goal tomorrow. However, your efforts are best put toward finishing up old projects now, rather than starting new ones. Hard-nosed Saturn's visit to your 12th House of Endings is an unambiguous message to clear the decks and eliminate baggage you no longer need. If you're traveling unencumbered, you will be freer to take advantage of the wonderful opportunities around the corner.

Working cooperatively as a valuable member of a team sounds like a good idea to you friendly Aquarians, but your non-conformist tendencies can make you feel like an outsider. However, it's crucial to integrate your needs with those of the group as responsible Saturn sets up shop in your 11th House of Networking. Resistance is futile; coming to terms with your social obligations could make the difference between failure and success. Your mission is to maintain your individuality while working for the common good.

Your past work habits will either lead to great successes or unfortunate setbacks in the near future as stern Saturn calls the shots in your 10th House of Public Affairs. If you have demonstrated your commitment to excellence, your efforts will be rewarded with well-deserved accolades, new responsibilities or a boost in your income. But if you've been dragging your feet, you must make up for lost time. Don't wait until the last minute to prepare for the final exam. The more sweat equity you invest now, the more rewards you receive down the road.

Your unrestrained confidence can create problems, unless you scale back your adventurous ambitions just a touch. Unfortunately, it's hard to tell where to draw the line between reality and fantasy today, making a simple decision more complex. Widening your spiritual horizons is easy now; however, maintaining a solid connection with the mundane world at the same time is where the true magic occurs. Nevertheless, keeping one foot in the real world is certainly worth the effort if you want to manifest your dreams.

Your newly acquired fascination with philosophy could have you thinking that you have discovered the meaning of life. Unfortunately, others might see your esoteric explorations in a different light. They are concerned you're evading important issues by pontificating about ephemeral ideas that are removed from the actual events of the day. Although your search for truth may seem cavalier, there's no need to change anything now as long as you're respectful to the reactions of those around you. There are mysteries waiting to be solved if you're willing to be a cosmic detective.

You are indescribably happy if the pace slows down a notch today, but you secretly wish that things would return to normal. The good news is you have a perfect chance to review your recent experiences and plan your next move. Just remember that there is a cosmic magnifying lens between you and your world now, making everything appear bigger, better or more significant than it truly is. Giving yourself a reality check is healthier than waiting for someone else to do it for you.

Your current sense of optimism has you believing that anything you can imagine will come true. Although a positive outlook on your future might be sufficient to tip the scales in your favor, other less pleasant variables should be taken into consideration, too. It's not necessary to adjust your attitude as long as you're also willing to confront the difficulties in an objective light. Fortunately, overcoming obstacles in your path is easier once you recognize the role they play in your learning process. Transforming into a peaceful warrior allows you to win in the end.

It may seem as if you're sitting pretty now when it comes to matters of money or love. Nevertheless, you might still be clinging to old insecurities about a close relationship or a financial venture. The truth is that your self-image could suffer if you spend too much time analyzing all the details. You probably have more tricks up your sleeve than you realize today. The quickest way to regain your swagger is to project yourself into the future instead of looking back into the past. Live long and prosper.

Your innate affinity for perfection is often useful, but now it can turn into an obsession that blocks your path to happiness. You may grow uncomfortable with your current starry-eyed visions and suddenly decide to rein in your fantasies. Unfortunately, you could pull back so hard and fast today that your caution causes you to miss out on a wonderful opportunity. You don't need to lower your standards as long as you remain open to working with a diamond in the rough and polishing it as you go along.

Interpersonal issues that linger from a recent emotional meltdown seem to be closer to resolution today. Although your worries might not be completely put to rest, at least you have a chance to raise the vibration to a higher level now. Instead of struggling for dominance or survival, shift your focus to more spiritual matters. Practice the Golden Rule whenever possible; surprisingly, you can release anger or resentment if you simply act with compassion rather than fear.

You might set your sights on establishing new financial goals now that the Moon is setting up shop in your 2nd House of Wealth. However, with stern Saturn lurking in the neighborhood, the connection between your self-esteem and your net worth is stronger than ever. There are many practical things you can do to augment your income and increase your assets, but an attitude makeover is more important than anything else today. It's more likely others will invest in you if you truly value yourself.

It's nearly impossible to keep your feelings under wraps because you're wearing your heart on your sleeve today. The moody Moon is visiting your 1st House of Self and She has her own communication style that bypasses words and social pleasantries. Nevertheless, it's unwise to just assume that anyone knows your emotional process unless you take the time to specifically tell them. Confiding in someone who has earned your trust will instantaneously lighten your load and brighten your day.

Your need to strut your stuff in the real world conflicts today with your current desire to work in solitude. Additionally, the reflective Moon's presence in your 12th House of Privacy widens this gulf. However, neither extreme is an acceptable course of action now, even if you believe you must choose one way over the other. Change the game by imagining a scenario where you magically appear on center stage when called, yet are still able to escape the clamor of the audience when you want to be alone.

You're driven by your dreams now that the visionary Sagittarius Moon is influencing your 11th House of Hopes and Wishes. Unfortunately, you might not have enough common sense today to know which of your ideas are practical enough to follow and which ones should be set aside. Thankfully, there's no need to decide yet; just allow your thoughts to take you on a fascinating ride without being bound to any single outcome. The sky is the limit when your imagination is running the show.

Although you may feel as if you're perched atop a mountain peak -- or, at least have a clear path to reach the summit-- others might not see your success in the same light. The Moon's current spotlight on your 10th House of Career inspires you to make big plans to fulfill your professional ambitions, even if people doubt your ability. Don't be discouraged by the naysayers; go ahead and reach for the stars. Just remember, gravity is still at work; make sure you have a parachute handy in case you get lost in space.

Trusting the universe is a no-brainer when you're sure that everything is going your way. Even if you recently overstepped your limits, you should be able to make amends and come out smelling like a rose. Nevertheless, you are still playing with fire and could effortlessly charm people with your passionate nature. However, your integrity is at stake so don't promise more than you can deliver today. Be sincere and others will respect you for who you are without harboring any false illusions.

It's such a treat when you feel comfortable enough with your life that you let your hair down and totally relax. Responsibilities finally take a back seat while you embark on a leisurely drive to soak in the colorful scenery. But don't be so fascinated by all the pretty sights that you forget to stop and appreciate where you are today. Feeding your soul with out-of-the-ordinary experiences puts a smile on your face and a bounce in your step.

It's as if you've been handed a "Get Out of Jail Free" card today to use any way you wish. Perhaps you were feeling emotionally restrained by a relationship and suddenly it seems as if the restrictions are lifted. Now's your chance to show your enthusiasm for life and your adoration for those you love. The deeper issues are still present, but your renewed sense of hope allows for real progress to be made when the conversation continues. Unchaining your heart gives you a whole new perspective on life.

Having the time to add some spontaneous fun to your day is a true blessing and you know you should be grateful. But, ironically, you might choose to work on a project at home or finish up some overdue chores, instead. Mischievous Tom Sawyer pretended to enjoy painting a fence so he could persuade others to join him. However, you aren't seeking any assistance; you're simply having a good time being productive on your own terms. But don't eliminate the possibility of participating in a social activity or two today. Don't sell yourself short now; you can enjoy the best of both worlds.

Your childlike approach to life often draws a crowd around you in search of a good time. Your playful demeanor is off the charts today and you are wired into the innocent spontaneity of the unfolding cosmos. In fact, you're willing to try nearly anything in search of a memorable experience. Humor is your best ally now when it comes to connecting with others. There's no reason to resist the joy in the air; laugh and the entire world laughs with you.

Your imagination knows no bounds today and your dreams can fuel a most unexpected escape. It's not even necessary for others to hear or see your burst of creative energy; it may safely remain within the confines of your mind. However, don't discount the possibility of expressing yourself in a more demonstrative manner. Redecorating a room in your home or redefining a relationship might be the perfect outlet for your artistic talents. Listening to your heart is mandatory; acting on your feelings is your choice alone.

If only there was a way to bottle your unbridled enthusiasm and save it for a rainy day. In theory, this should be one of those amazing days for the record books. In practice, you might bite off more than you can chew. If you don't want to suffer from a physical or emotional hangover tomorrow, rein in your fiery energy just a touch. Fortunately, there's no need to play it cool today; just find that magical spot where the universe hangs in perfect balance and everything will be fine.

Unplugging for the day might be just what the doctor ordered as a remedy to what ails you. The cosmos has conjured up the perfect emotional weather today for you to set your worries aside and leave your chores behind. Naturally, no one can talk you out of focusing on a project that is already in progress. But unfinished business and unresolved issues will still be there when you return. The healing that comes from temporarily shedding responsibilities is priceless and gives you the impetus to pursue your ambitions tomorrow.

You might be ready to get out your guitar to sing your old familiar theme song, "Don't Fence Me In." You want plenty of room to roam, space to breathe and time to pursue a variety of interests. The only downside is, no matter how hard you work at it today, you can't do everything you want. Nevertheless, it won't hurt to try. In fact, you might just experience the freedom you crave if you temporarily drop the word no from your vocabulary. For now, anything is possible if you're willing to say yes.

Sometimes you are so driven by your ambitions that you forget to stop and replenish your soul. Thankfully, you can finally engineer a real day of rest without feeling guilty that you should be doing something else. While others might just take off without notice, it helps to schedule your downtime on your calendar in advance, as if it is an important meeting not to be missed. The fact of the matter is you have an appointment with yourself, unencumbered by the stress of your everyday life. Give yourself the gift of time before it's too late.

You are visited by an angel today who grants you one of your wishes out of the blue. Perhaps a close friend or partner surprises you with an exciting adventure. Or maybe someone simply encourages you to take the risk that you've been sitting on the fence about recently. Whatever cosmic nudge comes your way now, interpret it as a sign that the universe wants you to break out of the rut that's been holding you back. This unexpected opportunity for personal growth may vanish in thin air if you don't grab it right away. It's better to fail spectacularly than to live a life of regret.

Knowing your place in a relationship, your family or the community gives you solid ground on which to launch your next project. Your mind is probably brimming with good ideas these days, but you might be uncertain which one is worth your undivided attention. Logical analysis won't help you set your priorities or determine a strategy to reach your goals. Intuition is your best friend today; strike now while the iron is hot and color in the details later on.

Although your intentions may be honorable, it's not a simple matter to keep your feelings to yourself. You might even acknowledge that what you are about to say should probably be left unspoken, but you may blurt it out anyway in a moment of excitement. Unfortunately, you can't take your words back once they are out in the open. Everyone knows that honesty is the best policy, but remember to think twice before you create an untenable situation. A little conscious self-restraint before the fact is wiser than an apology after it's too late.

Your sensory antenna are tingling today and you notice things you might ordinarily miss, prompting you to be more emotionally volatile now than usual. You're certain that your conclusions are correct and could easily start trying to convince others to see the future in the same light as you. However, it's dangerous to believe there's only a single perfect outcome and you know exactly what it is. Stay ahead of the curve by entertaining all possibilities before you fixate on just one. Keep in mind what works for you doesn't necessarily work for anyone else.

There are a lot of wheels spinning in your head, but it's prudent to keep most of your thoughts on the down low today. Ironically, your ideas are likely quite enlightening, but everyone will conclude your thinking is scattered if you keep changing your plans. Thankfully, you can still be more productive than others expect once you make a final decision. You newly found resolve is so strong that you won't give up until you reach your goal, making you a truly formidable opponent or a steadfastly loyal friend.

Stepping back from an explosive situation is smart, but you may get swept up in an emotional melodrama before you know it today. Reassess your involvement prior to doing something you might later regret. In fact, withdrawing your energy is your safest move if you decide that it's really not your business. On the other hand, if participating in this conflict is truly necessary, at least detach yourself from any specific outcome. Your contribution will be more valuable to the group process now if you use your head and not your heart.

You may become irritated today with someone who doesn't usually get under your skin, yet you can't put your finger directly on the source of your annoyance. Perhaps a coworker might bring up a sensitive subject that stirs deep emotions you have been purposefully trying to avoid. Whatever the circumstances are in the moment, it's time to face the music. Fortunately, your residual angst will begin to dissipate if you have the courage to put your feelings out on the table. Shining light into the shadows banishes your fear of the dark.

You might become sorely disappointed in yourself if you end up letting down someone who is counting on you today. Nevertheless, you won't likely sit still long enough to take the heat for something that is not in your control. Thankfully, you're too results-oriented to waste time wallowing in self-pity or drowning in self-doubt now. Dust yourself off and reclaim your power; determine what went wrong, improve your plan and try again before you lose momentum. Practice makes perfect.

Your opinions won't necessarily become any less extreme today just because the emotional intensity has started to wane. You could be unusually stubborn about your version of the truth and may even be uncharacteristically impatient with anyone who tries to change your mind. The good news is you have an opportunity to listen carefully to what others say now without being required to agree with any of their conclusions. Putting your exemplary diplomatic skills to good use has never been more important than during these volatile times. Let there be peace on Earth, and let it begin with you.

You're tired of setting ambitious goals and then falling short of your own lofty expectations. Fortunately, the strategic Capricorn Moon's visit to your 3rd House of Immediate Environment provides you with the structure you need to execute your plan without deviation. Nevertheless, you could create unnecessary opposition by inadvertently angering someone if you're too forceful in your approach. Persistence works in your favor if you know when to wear a velvet glove and when to take it off.

You can see right through people's excuses today and your incisive observations might make them quite nervous. Paradoxically, you could be absolutely correct in your assumptions yet only make matters worse by raising a sensitive subject in an inconsiderate manner. There's no reason to avoid a necessary discussion now as long as you steer clear of any type of judgmental criticism. Adopting an open-minded and compassionate approach puts others at ease; you can achieve the impossible when everyone sets aside their egos and concentrates on the common good.

You could be the proverbial go-to person of your group because everyone thinks you have the secret to success in your pocket. You may have a particularly strong grip on reality now, increasing your sense of authority even more. But don't mistakenly believe that your vision is the right answer for everyone just because you can effortlessly navigate your way into the future. Acknowledging that multiple solutions are possible earns you even more credibility points with your workmates in the long run.

You are working with a unique set of objectives today, yet the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Privacy suggests that you are determined to hide your plans from others. Perhaps you want to avoid premature judgment before you put your new strategy into motion. Or, maybe you just need to prove your mettle, so you choose to venture out on your own. Keep in mind that a collaborative effort with the right person will strengthen your hand and increase your overall effectiveness. Believe it or not, the whole is greater than the sum of its parts.

Your peers may be unfairly critical of your performance today, yet you can still learn something constructive from what they say. Unfortunately, you might not want to listen to anyone's advice now because of your own issues of low self-esteem. Thankfully, you can find a pearl of wisdom in this awkward exchange once you simply acknowledge your insecurities. Being transparent about your process is the current key to self-improvement. Seeing yourself as a work in progress gives you the inspiration to create a masterpiece.

You are resolved to fulfill your heart's desires, but may be growing frustrated because everything you want seems to take longer than anticipated. Fortunately, you aren't so quick to give in to negativity now. Recent delays were only temporary and your persistence will ultimately play out in your favor. Nevertheless, there's no reason to hide your impatience. Ultimately, your undying enthusiasm will be your key to climbing the ladder of success or winning the love of someone special.

Your coworkers might get a sudden taste of your obstinate nature today, even if you aren't expressing the full intensity of your feelings. You may believe that what you really want is so far outside the range of acceptability that you must refrain from saying anything at all. However, your well-intended discretion can backfire now, making you feel alienated from others. Luckily, it's not an all-or-nothing proposition. Taking smaller risks is much more likely to be rewarded if you're willing to exercise patience and display a generosity of spirit.

Your desire to do things differently today can be a bit disorientating for everyone involved. Nevertheless, you still want to impress others with your famous multi-tasking skills while you juggle many tasks at once. Innovation may be your strong suit now, but too much originality could end up sending you back to the drawing board. Instead of shocking others with your radical ideas, transform your unconventional approach into a slightly more conservative one for the best results. Considering the reaction of your audience first increases the likelihood of success.

Although you may blast through your regular self-imposed limits today, you still might have mixed feelings about revealing your true intentions. You're eager to engage with others by sharing your deepest emotions; however, you simultaneously wish you had more personal space to call your own. Even if you are resistant to letting go of your fear of rejection, this impulsive self-disclosure is a great opportunity to stretch outside of your comfort zone.

Keeping your emotions in check is more challenging than you think. You know what the logical thing is to do, but something still drives you to take a different course of action that brings you right to the edge of rebellion. Don't waste time in unnecessary deliberation. Instead, speak up and ask for what you really want, even if it's not what others expect. Take pride in the aspirations of your heart; be the Lion you are and roar like you mean it.

Living on your own little island sounds like an idyllic situation today. People think you're fully engaged in a friendly conversation or engrossed in your work, but you are actually busy hiding your passionate emotions. There's no need to satisfy anyone else's expectations of you now. Be true to yourself and take whatever personal time you need to sort out your feelings. Sometimes separating from the crowd is justifiable so you can work things out on your own.

A simple relationship issue rattles your world today when someone reveals his or her emotions and then impatiently waits for your response. However, you might not have a clue about what you what while non-conformist Uranus is rocking your key planet Venus; you just can't seem to shake off the restraints on your heart. In fact, your current indecision might be insurmountable, so it's in your best interest to let the other person decide for both of you now. Conflict does not serve you well; thankfully, you're a champion of practicing the art of compromise.

Someone might be maneuvering you into a corner today and you don't like one little bit. However, events are unfolding too quickly to manage and you resent being coerced to fall into line. You may seem willing to play along with the crowd now, but you're probably busy cooking up your own resistance so you can plant your feet when the time is right. Don't react immediately; your position will only increase in strength if you can delay your response until the frenetic pace settles down. The element of surprise is a perfect secret weapon when you use it at the just right moment.

You may appear like a footloose and fancy-free Archer today, but behind your fun-loving demeanor lurks a more serious character. Nevertheless, electrical Uranus is zapping seductive Venus in your 9th House of Big Ideas, drawing your attention away from work and aiming it toward social pleasures. But you're also acutely aware of pressing obligations that must be addressed before you go out in search of adventure. Normally, you are the one who tells others to lighten up and stop taking life so seriously, but now you should remind yourself. You only live once.

You're caught between two opposing strategies in response to your current circumstances. On one hand, you're determined to reward yourself for your hard work. There are treats already waiting for you and it would be all-too-easy to take advantage of what the universe is offering. However, on the other hand, you might not be able to forget about your responsibilities, even after you complete your chores. Honestly, you have earned the right to relax; give yourself unmitigated permission to enjoy the good times while they last.

There is a palpable high-frequency buzz in the atmosphere today. Luckily, you can use this exciting energy to move closer to your current heart's desires as your key planet Uranus shocks sweet Venus. Unfortunately, someone might stand between you and the fun you know you deserve. Acknowledging the resistance you receive from others now enables you to consider their feelings prior to exploring a whole new world of alternatives. Ultimately, it's up to you to judge if the potential pleasure is still worth the consequences.

Taking a leap of faith and exposing your dreams to the outer world is risky business. However, your timing couldn't be better now, so don't give up even if you also experience a strong reality check in the process. Keep in mind that some of your fantasies may be better left unrealized. Nevertheless, your friends and coworkers are unusually receptive to your far-out ideas. Move forward with your plans today; step out of your imagination and into your future.

Although you can be quite generous in spirit when you so choose, you're an independent Ram and there are times when you simply forget about the needs of others. But partnerships require more bandwidth once the Sun takes up residence in your 7th House of Relationships today. Stop chasing your dreams long enough to consciously consider what someone else wants. Demonstrating respect  to those around you shifts the energy and enables things to run much smoother than you ever expected. Life is meant to be shared.

You might not be aware of how much others look up to you now, yet even little things you do strongly influence them. However, you could be less concerned with anyone else's perceptions than you are with completing your chores today. It's tempting to narrow your vision to concentrate on maintaining your regular routine while the Sun inhabits your 6th House of Habits. But don't let your current obsession with the details get in the way of being fully present for your friends and family. Honor your core values and everything will work out for the best.

You're not in a very practical mood today, so it's wise to enjoy your colorful fantasies without trying to manifest them into reality. Luckily, there's nothing wrong with escaping into your daydreams for a little while; this harmless reverie can even provide inspirational food for thought. Just make sure you remain aware of the difference between the idle wanderings of your imagination and what's actually expected of you in the real world. Don't miss your chance to dance on the creative edge while the Sun is shining in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Life is what you make it.

Nothing brings you more pleasure now than hanging out in your castle with those you love. The Sun's current visit to your 4th House of Roots turns your attention inward and sets a nostalgic tone. Ironically, you might even consider traveling -- in the real world or in your imagination -- all the way back to the place of your origins. However, this isn't just a walk down memory lane; engaging in serious self-reflection strengthens your foundation for the months ahead. Learning something meaningful about your past inspires you to be more successful in the future.

Your calendar is filling up quickly and life seems to be running at a faster pace now that the Sun is lighting up your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. But complications arise if you can't manage your time effectively because your tight schedule is quite unforgiving today. Don't get flustered if you fall behind or miss a step; just be honest with everyone affected and continue to do the best you can to be in several places at once. Your heroic efforts are appreciated more than you know.

Your ambivalence over a fundamental issue can make a particular decision rather difficult. Unfortunately, a new wave of confusion may sour your actions with doubt and uncertainty as the Sun slips into your 2nd House of Values. Thankfully, there's no need to change your mind or alter your plans today, especially if you're unsure of your options. Hang tight; your confidence will rebound before you know it. In the meantime, sorting through all of your alternatives now gives you the best chance to make the right choice at the right moment.

Your mental clarity is razor sharp now as the brilliant Sun sets up shop in your creative sign. You're capable of making intelligent decisions that are based upon your keen sense of objectivity. However, your thinking is likely to change again with retrograde Mercury also camping out in Libra. Fortunately, sentimentality won't likely lead you off course today. Accept subjective artistic leanings as lovely inspirations brightening your day; incorporate what you can and leave the rest for another time.

Although this may not be what you want to hear today, there's no reason to waste your precious energy and limited resources on starting anything new now. The radiant Sun's shift into your 12th House of Endings is a powerful reminder to complete current projects and tie up as many loose ends as possible. Keeping a low profile allows you to focus on the more spiritual aspects of your life. There are many treasures to discover in other dimensions if you are willing to suspend your disbelief and let your imagination wander.

Your friends and associates may be nearly impossible to read today, leaving you uncertain about where they fit in your current plans. Unfortunately, your ideas might not be as clear as you think, creating problems you haven't even considered. But don't blame your lack of confidence on anyone else or you will just drift further away from your goals. Accepting responsibility for your actions now inspires you to take matters into your own hands. Mahatma Gandhi advised, "Be the change that you wish to see in the world."

All you can think about now is your career as you ambitiously plan for your future. Fortunately, your professional objectives may be clearly illuminated during the weeks ahead as the Sun travels through your 10th House of Public Responsibility. However, your preoccupation with work can strain your personal life as fulfilling your obligations distracts you from cultivating emotional connections. Establishing a healthy balance in your life is more important than reaching some imagined pinnacle of success. Humans can not live on bread alone.

You are strongly drawn in two distinct directions now as the Sun brightens fellow air sign Libra. Additionally, the Moon's return to your futuristic sign adds an emotional twist to an intellectual problem today. Still, your primary challenge is to remain optimistic without losing touch with reality. Deepening a close connection with someone you trust inspires you to keep your dreams alive. Author and activist Helen Keller declared, "Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light."

You may be uncomfortable with the information imbalance today if someone shares too many personal details and you don't say anything in return. No matter how pressing the situation seems now, there's a part of you that doesn't want to deal with the drama. Although you might actually believe that whatever you don't know can't hurt you, it's simply not the case. Even unexpressed thoughts create ripples in the atmosphere, so it's smarter to ask questions and listen to the rest of the story when someone asks for your advice. The only way to have a friend is to be one.

A casual conversation might lead you to places you weren't expecting to visit today, but stepping into new emotional territory is fuel for your growth. Exploring uncharted realms typically isn't a burden because you actually thrive on new experiences. However, you may grow anxious when you realize you're standing on shaky ground now. Be courageous and face your fears; opening your heart is the first step toward transforming your life.

You like the idea of being practical but your attempts at staying grounded may be futile today as you find yourself embarking on a rather unexpected adventure. Logic can't explain the intensity of your current passion, yet all is just as it should be when it comes to matters of the heart. Intellectualizing the reasons for this spontaneous detour will only take you so far. Embrace your feelings, whether they are rational or not. Walking on the emotional edge now offers the kind of benefits that make your vulnerability worth the risk.

There are countless ways to express your creativity today and your best strategy is to explore as many of them as possible. Your attraction to multiple choices enables you to shine as you experiment with different styles of communication. But you may run into trouble if someone thinks that one of your approaches is brilliant, for he or she might want you to use that method alone. However, you are following the unique beat of your own drum now, so don't compromise your artistic authenticity to satisfy anyone else.

Your sensitivity is a mixed blessing today because you can't avoid feeling someone else's pain or discomfort with your emotional revelation. However, when you recognize that this awkward tension is not about personal rejection, you may be able to grant him or her the necessary freedom for a new kind of connection to blossom. Learning how to give others the space they require actually brings them closer to you in the long run. Hold on loosely, but don't let go.

You have a chance to leap beyond your old limits as the independent Aquarius Moon skips through your 7th House Partners. It may be easier to entertain a relationship with less of a commitment now because you are feeling more emotionally secure. Exploring your passions could lead you in an unexpected direction if you have the courage to remain open to change. Honest communication is the way through the door to love, but you must let go of what you once thought was true if you want to find the partner of your dreams.

It's nearly impossible to escape from the obligations of your daily grind now. Needless to say, focusing on the work at hand isn't that unusual for you masters of efficiency. But your regular routine isn't necessarily the same old thing these days as you seek ways to reinvent yourself to prevent boredom from settling in. Don't be afraid to shake things up, for the invigoration you can feel should outweigh any fear of change. Variety is the spice of life.

You are naturally adept at gracefully sidestepping almost any complex issue that pops up. However, your feelings are stretched into disquieting places today in order to uncover the truth. Fortunately, this emotional roller-coaster ride doesn't seem as scary while the Sun is shining its light in your objective sign. Remember, it's not about being safe now; it's about doing whatever it takes to get to the heart of the matter. Poet T.S. Eliot said, "Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go."

Although you may be resigned to talk about your fears, it's still daunting to bring them out into the open. Thankfully, you receive cosmic assistance from expressive Mercury as it pushes against powerful Pluto in your 3rd House of Communication. However, it's still frightening when deeply buried feelings are finally exposed. Even if you are able to share them with someone who has your best interests at heart, it's not fun if the ensuing conversation is like rubbing salt on a wound. Nevertheless, your willingness to go on an intense emotional journey can transform your life in ways you can't imagine.

Your unique path toward your goals may take a surprising turn today once you realize that something is just too important to ignore. You might not do anything about it yet, but it's still an excellent idea to consider modifying your priorities to honor your need to speak your truth. More conventional measures of success are not of interest to you now. Don't waste energy telling anyone about your change of heart until you are more comfortable with explaining exactly what you want. Shakespeare says it best, "To thine own self be true."

You're standing at the threshold to your future but aren't quite ready to make that first big step off the ledge today. You may receive tantalizing glimpses of what's around the corner but it's still too soon to say anything about it. Instead of sharing your rapidly shifting perceptions, it's wiser to stay in observation mode without making any drastic changes now. Continue to quietly gather information and don't allow anyone to drag you into a conversation about your plans. Nevertheless, be ready to take flight when the universe calls; you're on the launch pad and the moment of ignition will arrive sooner than you think.

You aren't thrilled when your moods fluctuate so often because you can't settle into enjoying the pleasures that otherwise seem so close. Although your current restlessness could hinder your happiness, there's little you can do to change the cause of your dissatisfaction today. In fact, it's healthier to stir up unexpressed feelings now instead of suppressing them. Ultimately, moving the emotional energy can reestablish your positive outlook and provide a newly found stability.

Everyone might assume you're focusing your complete attention on the tasks at hand, but you're actually taking care of more sacred work now. Fortunately, you can quickly erect an effective smokescreen that throws people off course, giving you the freedom to embark on a spiritual quest or to explore your romantic fantasies. Enjoy your metaphysical excursion today without feeling the need to share anything with others until you return. Traveling in magical realms is easy once you master hearing without your ears, seeing without your eyes and speaking without your tongue.

It's an exercise in futility to start anything new today, especially if you're worrying about the criticism you might receive. You may wonder if it's too late to make your move, but there's nothing to be gained by wallowing in self-doubt now. Be grateful for small accomplishments, even if they don't meet your expectations. Luckily, you can pick up the speed in a day or two after impatient Mars is free from Saturn's choking restraints. In the meantime, channeling your excess energy into some form of strenuous physical activity is one of the healthier ways to manage your current dissatisfaction. Sweat more, whine less.

You may be completely convinced that you need to  set aside your individual desires to manage a heavy load of responsibilities at work now that go-getter Mars squares off with taskmaster Saturn. But instead of  putting your emotions in a box and closing the door to your heart, establish healthy priorities that honor both your personal and professional goals. You know what they say about all work and no play, so make room for fun whenever you get the chance.

Relationship concerns gobble up your bandwidth today, leaving little time for anything else. It doesn't really matter how lofty your career-related goals are now, you can't focus on them with a clear head until you handle the more pressing personal issues. Thankfully, you don't have to jump through outrageous hoops to demonstrate your  commitment. Just show up with an open mind and a vulnerable heart. If you remember to speak less and listen more, you might be pleased with how much ground you can cover.

You are being asked to reevaluate your objectives at work because your previous assumptions may have wandered off track somewhere along the way. But instead of scrambling to create a new game plan, reassess the situation and be certain that all the loose ends are tied up before deciding on your next step. It's more important to prove your competence now than it is to reach for the brass ring. A methodical approach today minimizes unnecessary trouble tomorrow.

An emotional complication ripples its way to the surface in a relationship today, leaving you disheartened and wondering what to do next. Nevertheless, you're hesitant to reveal what's really on your mind. Even if someone attempts to manipulate your actions, they can't change how you react. Unfortunately, doing whatever is demanded of you while hiding your true feelings could create an undertow of resentment. Honor your own heart by facing your resistance now and telling the truth. Transparency is your friend.

Your best efforts on the job may be thwarted now, no matter how diligently you work at overcoming the obstacles. You have plenty of stamina while warrior Mars is empowering your practical sign. But it feels so much like you're rolling boulders up a steep hill today that you wonder if it's worth all the stress. However, it's necessary to keep trying since you know better than anyone that when the going gets tough, the tough get going. Your high standards and admirable tenacity make for an unbeatable combination.

If your resources are stretched too thin today, your only logical answer is to cut back on your extraneous commitments. But don't waste energy complaining about the scarcity of time and money or your coworkers might grow annoyed with your negativity. Instead, roll up your sleeves and demonstrate your clever ingenuity by finding a way to improve your situation. Once you consciously shift your focus in a positive direction, others will do the same. In fact, you might be pleasantly surprised at how the universe steps in to help those who are busy helping themselves.

Your friends and relatives might not be the most enthusiastic of cheerleaders now when it comes to supporting your work. Nevertheless, it's still helpful to recognize you have allies on your side, even if it doesn't feel that way in the present moment. Rather than attempting to convince others to join your cause today, release them from any expectations and manage things on your own. This way if someone chooses to offer assistance, you can rest assured it will be a true act of generosity instead of a false pretense that originates from a sense of obligation. One real friend in the hand is worth many in the bush.

Your best intentions are being stymied today and nothing you do seems to fix the situation. The current dynamics at work could push your buttons and test your resolve to get things done. Don't let your anger hijack the day; losing your temper only makes matters worse. Sharing your feelings in a calm and rational manner is a more constructive approach. Luckily, you'll have a chance to air your grievances soon enough. In the meantime, act for the good of all instead of trying to even the score.

Stick to your schedule today or it could fall apart like a house of cards tumbling in front of your eyes. You may be tempted to walk away from all your responsibilities, but avoidance is not in your best interest. Planning ahead is always a good idea, but first you must acknowledge everything could take longer to finish than you expect. Adding extra time between activities allows you to work at a consistent pace without worrying that you'll lose control of your day. Your determination to stay on point earns you respect and admiration. Proving your competence to others is one thing but satisfying your own expectations is entirely something else.

You may feel a bit lost today as the reality of reaching your goals slips out of your grasp. However, don't write yourself off too quickly because the game isn't over yet. There's no time to linger in the land of discouragement now, even if your recent efforts didn't manifest your desired results. Prematurely admitting failure could stand between you and the success that is just around the next corner. Be persistent and continue to work for what you want; striving for excellence lets the rest of the world know you mean business.

Achieving your goals is an impossible dream today if they are solely built upon your vivid fantasies. Something has to give because you might not be able to keep up with your own ambitious aspirations, no matter how many tricks you have up your sleeve. It's smarter to scale back your hopes now than waiting until everything crashes down around your feet. Formulating a strategic action plan based on reality and not your imagination allows you to create a healthy balance in your life.

You receive a fleeting glimpse of clarity today,  but confusion quickly sets in before you have a chance to see the entire picture. Every question you answer peels off another layer of the onion. Seeking positive solutions may feel like a hopeless battle now. However, your current determination empowers you to defeat any negativity that clouds your view. You can become a hero in your own world if you summon your courage from the wellsprings within.

Getting a grip on the energy of the day is not as easy as it sounds because circumstances keep shifting beneath your feet. Nevertheless, the greatest challenges may come from your friends and associates while the Moon is busy mixing and mingling in your 11th House of Networking. You're prepared to separate yourself from the group if others aren't acting sensibly now. But you don't need to make any drastic moves; there are plenty of goodies to be discovered if you allow enough time to untangle the complexities. Give people a second chance to show their stuff before writing them off.

It's rather unsettling when the facts aim you one way while your intuitive hunch sends you in a completely different direction. But instead of jumping to a totally erroneous conclusion today, take your time and analyze the possibilities until your feelings are more certain about the present circumstances. Wait until after tomorrow's eclipse to gain more clarity about your choices before swinging into action. Working with the energy of the universe serves you well.

Although you're quite patient when there's a good reason, you grow so restless now that you don't want to wait another minute balancing your desires with other people's schedules. You have gathered the pertinent information and successfully developed your plan. However, you may be visualizing your ideal fantasies today more than you are zoning in on reality. You made it this far, so don't ruin everything with one reckless move. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

The spoken word carries great intensity today and can even reopen an old wound. However, it's crucial to look beyond the present circumstances and carefully consider the original source of the pain. Think about any previous situations that are brought to mind by current events. Explore your resistance to letting go of the past. Nevertheless, this isn't solely about your inner process; you must share your memories for true healing to begin. Making peace with your personal history empowers you to step methodically toward final resolution. When you close one door, another opens.

Irrational relationship fears may haunt you today, but you might struggle to expressing your deeply rooted emotions. Try not to let your insecurities stop you from sharing your heart now, for negative feelings can be destructive if you let them bottle up inside. Make time to have the type of conversations you typically prefer to postpone. Review what you intend to say and then execute your plan without further ado. Believe it or not, the first step is the hardest step.

Happiness may be as elusive as a butterfly now, but it's clear that your daily routine is in need of a dramatic change. On the surface, it seems like shaking up the current situation should be a simple task, but the closer you get to taking action, the more complicated it becomes. Don't give up just because you are feeling a bit confused today. Personal revolutions don't happen overnight; believe in yourself and you can't go wrong.

You just can't stop obsessing over something that's been bothering you recently. You intuitively understand that the only way anything will improve is to talk about it until the energy settles. However, it's painful to wear your heart on your sleeve because the resultant vulnerability makes you incredibly uncomfortable today. Be fearless; move directly toward the source of your discomfort now, not away from it. The way out is the way through.

It's as if your head and your heart aren't working in tandem today; they may even be reading from different adventure novels. You're feeling softer and more sentimental than you are acting as your confident behavior masks your true sensitivity. Thankfully, you can regain your center of gravity by looking within and exploring your motives for keeping your passions quiet. There's no need to hide behind a false sense of bravado; just be true to yourself and let the chips fall where they may.

You are a pillar of strength today once you let go of your tendency toward self-criticism. You're  eager to explore all the ways you can offer moral support to others. Your carefully picked words have a soothing effect and there are coworkers who can actually use your encouragement now. Push beyond any personal resistance to the idea of being a healer and start listening to those around you with an open heart. Lending an ear to someone in need makes all the difference in the world.

Even small doses of self-doubt are debilitating today, especially if they prevent you from participating in a significant discussion. Luckily, your thoughts are quite powerful and directly connected to your core essence now. Your common-sense perspective is desperately needed these days, no matter how many brilliant ideas you have to offer. Share your opinions, but be cautious about overstating your case in order to cover up your uncertainty. Keeping things simple is your key to success.

Your dream life may be too spellbinding to resist now that the Moon is splashing around with Neptune in your watery sign. Go ahead and explore your visions today, but be wary about using them to escape from the difficult emotions attached to real world circumstances. Fortunately, the symbolism that bubbles up from your unconscious might be the catalyst that suddenly clarifies your current choices. Paying rapt attention to the signs of the universe can transform your life in ways you can't yet imagine.

There isn't much of a chance that you can restrain your feelings today because the Full Moon Eclipse in your reckless sign urges you to say whatever is on your mind. Nevertheless, you can demonstrate your wisdom by following someone else's lead now and erring on the side of discretion. Instead of telling others to act with common sense, do it yourself. Count to ten before flying off the handle about something that won't ultimately matter. Words have power; use them wisely.

Although responsibilities can weigh you down today, they can't prevent you from escaping into your fantasies. The Aries Full Moon Eclipse energizes your 12th House of Spirituality, freeing you to go anywhere within your imagination as long as you keep up appearances by continuing to meet your obligations. But if you show any sign of slacking off, you'll lose your freedom to daydream as everyone watches you like a hawk. Acting in a conscientious manner allows you to travel in both worlds without any worries.

Upholding your reputation is tricky business today, even if you want to meet everyone's expectations. Chasing your ambitions for the future is a delightful distraction while the Aries Lunar Eclipse rattles your 11th House of Hopes and Wishes, leaving you bored with the mundane details of the present moment. Nevertheless, following your impulses will probably land you in hot water. Concentrating on a current deadline is a much more practical use of your time now than running down a dream for tomorrow.

You crave immediate acknowledgment from your close friends and family for your impressive list of accomplishments. You might even carry resentment from a recent slight as the reactionary Aries Full Moon Eclipse fires up your 10th House of Public Recognition. Unfortunately, you don't want to compromise and your normally sympathetic demeanor is nowhere to be found. It's healthy to express your feelings as long as you make sure you have your thoughts together before you start sharing your grievances. Keep in mind that others may have more pressing matters on their plate than stroking your ego. Ask for what you need and then move on.

You have a sudden flash of inspiration today and want to turn your new strategy into reality as fast as possible. The fiery Aries Lunar Eclipse sends shockwaves through your 9th House of Big Ideas, awakening you from your sleepy dreams with a clear vision of where you want to go. Everything looks good on paper until you start to put your plan into action. Finding satisfaction in your fantasies is the easy part, but you must attend to an endless stream of details if you actually want to manifest the future as you see it.

You might find yourself entangled in an emotionally charged melodrama today, even if you typically do your best to evade such distractions. Although the intensity of the Aries Full Moon Eclipse distresses your 8th House of Deep Sharing, there is also an undeniable adrenaline rush when you momentarily forget about remaining cool and detached. Rather than attempting to avoid this unfamiliar territory, sink into it while you can because your passion will settle back down naturally in the days ahead. Sometimes you have to stir things up to clear the air.

Pushy people might get on your nerves today but your annoyance with them could actually be a projection of your own irrepressible urges. The bold Aries Full Moon Eclipse polarizes your 7th House of Relationships, making it difficult to discern subjective feelings from objective ideas. Your distaste toward your own aggressive behavior morphs into your perception of this very same trait in someone else -- where it's easier to criticize. Instead of judging others so severely now, find ways to more fully accept all aspects of yourself. Unconditional love isn't just meant for others.

You are on a creative streak now, but may worry how long you can keep up this high level of ingenuity. Luckily, you receive a boost of energy from the ardent Aries Lunar Eclipse as it electrifies your 6th House of Work. You don't have to be responsible for everyone else's well-being; you only need to establish a productive routine for yourself. Concentrating your intensity on one task for a little while is more productive than casually meandering through your day without focus. Managing your time wisely is your most critical challenge now; there are only so many hours in the day.

It's one thing to be confident, but a laissez-faire approach to a relationship is counterproductive now. Your cavalier attitude could anger a close friend or playmate rather than endearing him or her to you. A spontaneous Aries Full Moon in your 5th House of Fun and Frivolity is usually cause for celebration, but this Lunar Eclipse may be more challenging today if someone resists your party plans or your positive perspective. Instead of only taking your needs into account, expand your vision to include those you love and your heart will thank you for it.

Although this may be your day off from the daily grind, thoughts of professional responsibilities  still vie for your attention. Instead of focusing on your ambitions, dance with the powerful Aries Full Moon Eclipse as it pumps energy into your 4th House of Home and Family. Re-prioritize your life to balance work with personal time. You Mountain Goats like to climb, but finding equilibrium should be your goal today, even if it means reaching the summit will take a bit longer.

You might as well set aside your plans and just roll with the unpredictable energy of the day. Your agenda may be an intelligent one, but the fast-acting Aries Lunar Eclipse zaps your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, turning the tables and making your previous plans obsolete. Stubbornly sticking to past assumptions isn't helpful at all. The more flexibility you can exhibit, the easier it is to navigate through the chaos without having a meltdown. Don't let anyone or anything bring you down; your positive outlook changes everything for the better.

It's no surprise that your financial condition is linked to your self-esteem. Money seems scarce when you don't value yourself. Today's enterprising Aries Lunar Eclipse wires your 2nd House of Income, stimulating new ideas for increasing your cash flow. But coming up with a get-rich-quick scheme on the fly doesn't mean that it will work. You may feel frustrated at first if others oppose your ideas. However, external resistance is not a setback; reality is offering you a chance to improve your attitude, modify your plans and reach your goals.

Controlling your emotions continues to be an uphill battle today as the Moon moves through your sign and forms disquieting aspects with several planets including warrior Mars. Unfortunately, talking about your feelings may stir up even more tension at first because there's no way to pretend that something is okay when it's not. Regardless of the potential drama, address whatever is bothering you now instead of waiting until the anxiety is even greater. Just make sure that you're not looking for trouble when you share what's on your mind. Stick to the facts for the happiest results.

Someone's provocative words can quickly escalate a simple discussion into a full-blown argument. You are a tough adversary, especially if you're defending a personal belief. Nevertheless, you probably won't convince your opponent that you're right and a conflict will only widen the gulf between you. Take the high road and absolutely avoid confrontation by refusing to partake in a verbal attack. Current differences aren't as significant as they seem; thankfully, this time around interpersonal stress settles down on its own.

Your perceptions may be slightly warped today making it wise to consciously delay an important discussion. Attempting to sidestep a painful topic makes you nervous until a relatively careless comment pushes your buttons and all bets are off. A temper tantrum empowers you to blow off some stream today, but it won't make anyone feel better in the long run. Instead of inadvertently provoking others for all the wrong reasons, set your sarcasm aside and simply speak from your heart. Delving directly into the core of the matter is the most direct route to a peaceful resolution.

You're a force to be reckoned with today, especially if someone tries to play the authority card to gain control over you. At other times you might actually choose to remain quiet and acquiesce to people's demands, but now you're ready to tenaciously fight to maintain your boundaries. It's healthy to let everyone know where you stand as long as you don't take your resistance too far. Claim your power but not at anyone else's expense.

You sincerely appreciate the love and support from your friends and family. However, you don't like it when someone meddles in your business, especially if you are adamant about your current goals. Your patience is burning on a short fuse today and your reaction to outside interference may be too swift. Be firm in your demeanor, but keep in mind that breaking rank could further incite unwanted conflict. Take a deep breath and think twice before you respond. There isn't any reason to burn bridges when you still have rivers to cross.

You prefer to have all the details in place, but something can go slightly awry today. Unfortunately, you may be caught off-guard if a friend or coworker leads you down the garden path. Rather than overreacting, practice the art of compassion, instead. In fact, a simple misunderstanding might have set the whole thing into motion. Once you know the source of the error, you can quickly correct it and get your day back on track.

It's a wonder that people can be so insistent with pushing their personal agendas that they don't even realize they're being offensive. On the other hand, you're overly concerned that someone else may think you're the one that's being too aggressive. Surprisingly, those closest to you might be much more cooperative if you spend more time and energy describing exactly what you need now. Establishing clear boundaries isn't rude behavior; a little personal space is exactly what's required for healthy relationships.

You may feel as if you're back into the swing of things now that the Moon is working her way through your 6th House of Routine. Nevertheless, her conjunction with incorrigible Uranus today is anything but a stabilizing influence. Although you might be yearning to try something completely new, it's reassuring to know you can still be successful by falling back on an old habit. Don't worry about what anyone else thinks; the opinions of others are less important than the results of your actions. The proof is in the pudding.

A current wave of confidence refuels your freewheeling approach to life, yet you may be jumping the gun and feeling the optimism a few days too soon. It's not that anything is wrong with your present circumstances; it's just that you still have more work to complete before you can harvest the fruits of your labor. Positive thinking is surely a vital part of your current strategy; just don't ignore reality in the process.

You're tempted to pick up and move somewhere else, even if you must re-evaluate the potential difficulties you might face. Whether or not relocation is even a tiny bit feasible now, unrelenting responsibilities increase your desire to escape. Nevertheless, it's not a great time to make drastic changes that destabilize your domestic life. Instead, resolve minor problems as they occur; think cosmically, act locally.

Your thoughts are spinning around in circles today, and you simply can't predict how busy you will be for the next few weeks. But even if you are anticipating what's next with all systems on standby, you still can't instantaneously jump forward to where you want to be. You must move into your future step by step, one day at a time, and right now that means clearing any lingering obstacles in your path, real or imagined. A clean slate makes room for your new dreams to come true.

Your self-esteem grows stronger day by day, but you may be so confident now that you take on more than you can manage. It's easier to see the possibilities in each moment than to stick with the boring facts. However, it's not useful to you or anyone else if you forecast blue skies when it's smarter to carry an umbrella. Karma comes around quickly today, so minimize any setbacks by making certain your goals are realistic. Believing in yourself works wonders now as long as your plans are practical and your intentions pure.

Hurrying to finish what you already started may be a hopeless cause, but you might have to try anyhow. Or you could be feeling pressured to begin something new while there's still time. Either way, you are driven to act immediately as familiar surges of urgency wash over you. However, you may grow irritated with your own moodiness until the reflective Moon leaves your reactive sign this afternoon. Although allowing time for contemplation is healthy, don't let your uncertainty hijack your day.

Your daydreams may be so shocking now that you're standing on unfamiliar ground. It's as if something is tickling your psyche today, yet it's difficult to decide whether or not you actually like it. You can't tell exactly what the energy is or where it's coming from, but you are inspired nonetheless. Unfortunately, you don't have a clear strategy for applying your current creative genius. Nevertheless, your visions help to inspire you through the days ahead.

You might believe there's no limit to what you can accomplish today, but actually there's only so much that you Twins can juggle at once. Unfortunately, overextending your energies quickly complicates your world now that Mercury is pedaling backwards. You must make difficult choices if you want something of lasting value to come from your current efforts. Setting priorities seems painful at first, but you'll feel a whole lot better once you do. Don't be a jack of all trades and a master of none.

Sticking with just one project is counterintuitive today because your thoughts are running in several directions at once. Nevertheless, your smartest strategy is even less obvious. Rather than making yourself crazy by trying to focus on the most practical tasks at hand, let your fantasies take you where they will. Although a deadline might slip under the radar, others may be quite willing to adapt to your schedule if you ask them. Currently, success is within your reach if you work at your own pace.

You Lions have been on the go for quite a while and it feels great if you can grab a catnap for a while. However, the overall cosmic theme isn't about sleeping; it's all about dreaming. Your subconscious is sending powerful messages today, and you may learn something significant about yourself if you take the time to decipher the symbols and break the code.

Although you prefer to sit back and enjoy your day, you quickly grow anxious if you're idle for more than just a few minutes. Logically, you know you can schedule some quality time for yourself, but you keep worrying about all the unfinished work that still needs to be completed. Instead of dreaming about what you would do with all your idle time if you had it, concentrate on your immediate goals for now. Enjoying your time off will be a pleasure if you feel like you earned it.

You hit the ground running today. You're psyched that you have a lot to do and are eager to get started. But you could bite off a bigger chunk of reality than you can handle with retrograde Mercury stirring up trouble in your sign. Everything seems to require more time and effort than you planned. Don't look expect others to bail you out; just continue to plod along as whatever pace you can. You may be happily surprised by the end of the day when you realize how much you actually accomplished.

Although your actions are well-intended and you enjoy the appreciation you receive, you still may feel overwhelmed if you assume too many responsibilities now. You might be afraid of the proverbial straw that could break the camel's back -- and the camel is you. But there's no easy way out. Take a deep breath and follow through with your promises to the best of your ability. Thankfully, the cosmos rushes to your rescue and things could work out much better than you expect.

There's plenty of work on your plate today and you have enough energy to do whatever is necessary. Your optimism is off the charts, making it increasingly tricky to separate the truth of the situation from your belief that everything will be fine. Don't fall asleep at the wheel of consciousness now or you could wake up to find yourself crashing into reality. There's nothing wrong with positive thinking as long as you accept the facts before you sign on the dotted line.

Unplanned events require your immediate intervention today. You are known for your organizational abilities, especially in the midst of dealing with minor crises. The problem is that your solutions may defy practical logic now. Make no mistake about it; this is a test and you can pass with flying colors if you trust your feelings and your intuition. Sometimes you must take a leap of faith and trust that the universe will support you.

Your world seems a bit more settled today than it did yesterday. However, you might not even realize you have passed through the eye of a storm and are coming out the other side now. You are a survivor because your individuality prevents you from losing yourself completely to the confusion of intense cosmic weather. Don't be afraid to fight for what is yours. Take time to reflect on your journey, appreciate your accomplishments and head into the future with a brave heart.

The currents of your emotions may be flowing too strongly for your taste today, especially if someone is making unfair demands on your heart. You might be anxious because you want to stand on solid ground now, but can't discern the facts from your feelings. Don't panic; you'll be fine if you trust the process. Just imagine that you're a surfer riding the waves that arise from the depths of your imagination and you'll come out on top.

You may be consciously holding yourself back because you know it's not quite time yet to break free from recently imposed routines. But you are eager for a change, nonetheless, and can't wait forever. It's no problem if you still lack specific plans since the details will fall into place over the next few days. Instead of initiating action today, just imagine what freedom will feel like once it's yours. Fly like an eagle and let your spirit soar.

Although you are confident that your goals are obtainable, you still might be unclear where reality fades into fantasy. You may not even realize that you're dreaming of a future that is beyond your reach. Nevertheless, you can work toward making the most of what you already have by walking in two worlds. One foot is stepping into your dreams and the other is wide awake in the present moment. Ironically, flights of fancy won't make you any less effective and they could even inspire you to greater heights.

You have an admirable-but-unrealistic desire to make everyone in your world happy today. You sincerely want to be of service to others, but you can't just drop your own issues in the process, especially if your intentions are at cross purposes with those around you. Unfortunately, compromise might not be a viable option at this time. Take care of your needs instead of worrying about pleasing the crowd. Sometimes the best thing you can do is acknowledge your differences, accept that which you can't change and move on.

You're surfing emotional waves that are bigger than you've seen in a while and they propel you further than you expect. You're likely to take your feelings seriously as you try to maintain your balance in very tricky circumstances. Nevertheless, the completion of any one specific task may be more elusive than you wish. You grow even more determined than ever to reach the finish line; nevertheless, patience and a healthy sense of humor are your greatest virtues at this time.

You are keen on keeping your current commitments but your instincts may be pulling you in an entirely different direction today. Your emotions are in flux, challenging you to stay in touch with your more radical feelings.
