On the outside, you have everything completely under control but you're working overtime to make it appear that way. Be gentle with yourself; you're as human as everyone else and you don't always have to save the day.

You often seem as cool as a cucumber, but your rational side is nowhere to be found today. People may be disappointed if they believe they can rely on your logical approach to lead the way now. But analytical thinking isn't the only viable method for reaching a sensible conclusion. Sometimes, you must dance to the music you hear inside your head, no matter what others might say. Your intuition holds the keys to your success.

An action-packed day at work and home keeps you in perpetual motion, but it's even more hectic within the confines of your mind. But there's no need to hide your thoughts and feelings simply for the sake of convenience. Thankfully, the planets are pushing the energy up toward the surface so it can be expressed. It really doesn't serve any purpose at all to withhold your best ideas from the world. Sharing your plans now attracts the encouragement you need to run with your dreams.

Even if you think you're fully aware of the emotional dynamics in your immediate environment, you still could be in for a surprise today. Although your romantic life may be very different from your expectations, rest assured this current detour isn't permanent. You are ready to react to the changing circumstances, but don't know which way to turn as your feelings build in intensity. If possible, postpone making any big decisions now; it's best if you can wait this one out until the fog lifts and your clarity returns.

It is all too easy to slip into your inner world now without informing anyone of your whereabouts. But even if you don't say anything, someone might still notice your emotional detachment. Be careful about withdrawing too far because you could inadvertently precipitate the melodrama you're trying to avoid. Stopping long enough to consider the feelings of everyone else is the first step to opening up the lines of communication.

Your ability to visualize the future is one of your greatest assets now. You might even believe you can manifest your dreams, regardless of how many obstacles are in your path. Unfortunately, you have a slightly distorted view of your own capabilities today. Even if the burden of responsibility is on your shoulders, you probably have a few more days before you must make your move. Continue to weigh and balance all the facts at your disposal until things start to make sense.

You have strived for success long enough and now you want to see tangible results. Although your ideal payoff may still seem far off in the distance, practicing patience goes a long way to calm your nerves today. Uncharacteristic confusion can add discouragement to the picture, but it fades quickly once you stop trying so hard to prove your worth. Luckily, a looming energetic shift brings you closer to your goals if you simply hang in there and keep the faith.

Conflicting cosmic messages ask you to focus your attention while simultaneously telling you to loosen your grip on the details. You are ready to jump into the fray yet your key planet Neptune makes it impossible to know what's most sensible in the moment. Considering the alternatives is a prudent course of action as long as you aren't seduced into believing you must choose one or the other today. The trick is to successfully navigate your way between the extremes now until you reach your destination.

You may look forward to taking some time off today, but might end up much busier than you ever expected. It's tempting to lazily kick back in the morning, but you could pay a hefty price if you fall behind on your work. Procrastination doesn't do you any favors now; turn your day around by working hard first and then pursuing your own interests once the Moon shifts into versatile Gemini. Life is less stressful when you keep your priorities straight.

Your feelings are still raw and close to the surface today, but you're probably calmer than you were yesterday. It's no problem to take things in stride now, even if you're emotionally dazed and confused. However, you might receive information that conflicts with what you thought to be correct. Instead of being overly concerned about verifying the validity of the conflicting stories, entertain all possibilities as the truth until the facts sort themselves out. Wait for the dust to settle and the answer will be in plain sight.

It may seem like someone is plotting against your every move, but the Moon's shift into adaptable Gemini this afternoon allows you to adeptly maneuver around most of the resistance. Don't overreact before you know what's going on because you could inadvertently turn a figment of your imagination into something real by giving it too much attention today. Instead, just continue putting your best foot forward and let the situation develop on its own. There's no reason to go looking for trouble unless it's knocking at your door.

Following your creative flow feels good today, especially if you're content to work behind the scenes. You may be producing something wonderful, but you don't necessarily need others to see what you're doing yet. Stick to your path without worrying about what anyone else thinks of your current endeavors. You'll receive the recognition you deserve later on when it really counts. Dancing with your muse is a lot more fun now without anyone judging your performance.

You begin to let down your guard today, leaving you with the complicated task of integrating your feelings more completely into your life. In some ways, life is simpler when your emotions are neatly tied up in a box, but it doesn't always work out that way. You may be afraid that no one understands your actions now, leading you to pull back from social interactions. Although you must function within your family or community, it's more important to acknowledge what your heart is trying to tell you, no matter what others say. It's your life to live, not theirs.

You feel a mega jolt of energy now that lightning-like Uranus zaps action-hero Mars as he journeys through your sign. People assume you're doing great because they can't help but notice your irrepressible enthusiasm. However, personal issues that are out of everyone else's sight can still negatively impact your day if you try to smile and bury your emotions. Instead of pretending life is perfect today, show real courage and reveal your vulnerability to someone you trust.

A hint of worry could lurk behind your gentle smile today, but your self-doubt dissipates when the evocative Moon enters your 9th House of Big Ideas this afternoon. There's no need to change a thing, although you might feel as if your timing is off if you don't react immediately. The best way to overcome your uncertainty is to remember that the details may not be as significant as they seem now. There's no reason to get hung up with what can go wrong in the future if you stick to the simplicity of the present moment.

You're finally able to breathe easy as the recent eclipse volatility starts to wane. Your emotions may have been trapped behind a dam for too long, yet now the waters are flowing freely again. Nevertheless, don't gloss over any residual blocked feelings because bringing them into awareness will ultimately help you reach satisfaction. Let go of the past once the stuck energy is moving or you won't be able to successfully swim into the future.

You might feel as if you're bouncing around in a sea of intense forces that you can't control. You could fritter away time and energy by trying to take charge of your life today, but a smarter tactic is to soften your position and temporarily relax your agenda. However, you don't need to alter your overall direction; just ease the pressure by demonstrating your trust in the wisdom of the cosmos. Being the master of your own destiny includes knowing when to hold on and when to let go.

You can find your groove and accomplish a great deal today if you remember to enjoy yourself along the way. Although your pace is steady and your resolve unwavering, social connections at work might become more meaningful than your job itself. Don't let important feelings slip into denial; be vigilant about keeping all communications clear and above board. Hiding the truth now multiplies problems later, so share your concerns and then let others do the same. An honest give-and-take dialogue cultivates mutual respect.

Your social life takes an odd detour now, ultimately revealing a whole new direction. Luckily, it doesn't matter if you can't logically figure out how the variety of pieces fit into place. Although maintaining a flexible attitude isn't always easy for you, especially when you are sure that you know the truth, today it holds the key to your happiness. You will never know where following your intuition will take you unless you suspend your disbelief and surrender to the flow.

Your unwavering commitment to finishing what you start may be so all-consuming now that it becomes counterproductive. Don't take yourself too seriously today, especially if you mistakenly believe that you have no time at all for extracurricular activities. Ironically, you'll accomplish more if you loosen up and focus on maintaining healthy and happy relationships rather than putting more hours into your work. When push comes to shove, love is all that matters.

You're cosmically disposed to be a pioneer, bravely exploring unknown territories and eagerly pursuing the rush of doing things for the first time. Today's fidgety Gemini Moon prompts you to pile on even more activities to your already hectic schedule just for the thrill of it. Although you may thrive on blasting off in several different directions at once, narrowing your focus and concentrating on one challenge at a time now enables you to be even more productive in the future.

A realistic assessment of what you need versus what you want produces some pretty interesting results today. You understand that life is less complicated when you get by with just the basics, but you're unwilling to make the adjustments necessary to change your lifestyle. Thankfully, no immediate action is required now; starting with a fresh perspective is enough to make you feel more secure all the way around. Counting your blessings allows you to see how rich you truly are.

Making an important decision can be challenging today because the dualistic Gemini Moon has you seeing double. Even after you make your choice, a single goal morphs into two very distinct possibilities -- just like the mythical Hydra who regrew two more heads each time one was cut off. Fortunately, there's no need to answer every question posed to you now; some dilemmas are better left unresolved. Keep your options open until Mercury turns direct and your clarity returns.

You probably sound more certain today than you actually feel. Although you may be inwardly lost in self-doubt, your coworkers won't realize that anything is wrong. Ironically, you're likely to receive support from others and be more successful professionally if you share your current concerns now, rather than trying to hide your insecurities. Your best policy is to keep the communication channels wide open and hope for the best.

Although you Lions often prefer playing in a pack, you might want to venture off on your own today. The truth is you need to maintain your autonomy or you will feel trapped by the very same people you want in your life. Don't sacrifice your individuality just to be accepted and loved. You will likely need more freedom, rather than less, over the days ahead. Be considerate and let others know your plans, but don't give anyone a chance to steal your thunder. Fortune favors the bold.

Maintaining your sense of purpose is a struggle today, even if you have a very clear sense of what you need to do. Nevertheless, circumstances will likely pull you in several directions at once while you prefer to drill down on the details with a singular focus. Simultaneously, responsibilities demand that you spread yourself thinner to cover the workload. You don't do anyone any favors promising more than is humanly possible. Staying within your lane now is best for everyone involved.

You may secretly worry that your expectations for the future will be impossible to meet. However, adopting a common sense approach actually enables you to live out your dreams. But this isn't an overnight project; your long-range planning might take months, or even years, to manifest. If you find yourself growing anxious or restless now, remember the old adage, "Rome wasn't built in a day." Relax; you have more time than you think to create your perfect life.

Sometimes you dive into an emotional situation with such abandon that you lose all sense of perspective. However, you're capable of being fully engaged without being hooked by someone else's melodrama today. Your rational approach rewards you with a cool head now, so others may lean on you even more in their times of need. It's an honor to share your wisdom if you don't attempt to control anyone else's life in the process. Your insight is a gift as long as your heart is in the right place.

You are a pro at gazing far off into the distance, but sometimes miss seeing what's right under your nose. A close friend or partner may overwhelm you with too much information about something that's occurring now. Although people might go to great lengths to change your opinion, you can't help but think that the current events are merely a distraction from your more evolved perspective. Don't be so quick to judge; instead, acknowledge that you don't have all the answers and remain open to the pearls of wisdom others  can offer you.

Spending the day talking around the water cooler seems like more fun than actually performing your job today, but idle chatter only leads to major trouble. Thankfully, the loquacious Gemini Moon's visit to your 6th House of Daily Routine is stabilized by the willful Sun, reminding you of your long list of obligations. Nevertheless, it's challenging to settle down if you are busy socializing when you should be focusing on your work. Remember, actions speak louder than words.

You are buzzing with so many creative ideas today that your innovative thinking could lead you in endless circles. You must slow down and take the time to turn your brilliant thoughts into bold action. However, initiating a new project doesn't ensure success now; you need to follow through on every detail to finish whatever you start. Ultimately, your ambitious intentions are valuable only if you relentlessly keep your eyes on the prize. No one can stop you from achieving your potential except yourself.

There is so much going on around you now that you might attempt to lose yourself in a daydream for a while. Unfortunately, you are involved in too many activities for you to get very far with your escape. In fact, you may be drawn from one project to another, without having enough time to settle into any of them. Instead of working yourself up into a state of high anxiety, remember that this level of noise won't last. In the meantime, set your fantasies aside until you put your priorities in order.

The rhythm of your own drumbeat is so loud today that you can't resist dancing to it, following the sound wherever it leads. Happily, your insatiable curiosity is running wild as it uncovers exciting discoveries. Although you aspire to be practical in your approach now, you naturally overextend your energy when given the opportunity. Thankfully, you can improve your chances for success by taking your goals more seriously. Eliminating unnecessary distractions flips the odds in your favor.

You're slightly uneasy with the accelerated pace of events today. It's obvious how your current actions are setting the stage for what will happen next, but there are so many variables to take in account now that it's challenging to keep your head on straight. Your prospects for success are improving, leaving you without any excuse for abandoning your responsibilities. Don't stop fighting for what you want. The impending rewards will likely vanish in thin air if you give up too soon. Passion gets you started while persistence gets the job done.

Your cheerful optimism attracts lovely surprises now, but you must be careful to balance positive affirmations with practical considerations. Although you can tell there is great potential for enjoyment today, the fun and games may have to wait if your Muse is calling. You have a chance to create something beautiful that enriches your spirit; including your friends in your process makes a meaningful experience even more special. Magic happens when you open your heart and share your joy.

A potential creative breakthrough is crackling in  the air today, inspiring you to let go of your previous inhibitions and explode onto the scene with ingenious ideas of your own. Something is radically different about you now and your spontaneous behavior may catch others off guard. Nevertheless, you can't let everyone's expectations rain on your parade; if you feel compelled to take a chance and risk exposure, then this is your moment to shine.

Whenever the going gets tough you always bounce right back. The planets infuse you with an extra blast of energy today, adding to your zest for life. But it isn't wise to initiate action if you're only trying to avoid a difficult situation. You still may feel like you're on top of the world because everything seems to be going your way. However, reality will likely disappoint you now if you inflate your hopes too much. Letting a little air out of your bubble ensures that it will not pop.

Your confidence continues to grow stronger and stronger, yet residual negativity could prevent you from freely riding your own waves of enthusiasm. You still believe that you can accomplish something special now if you just go out and give it your absolute best. Fortunately, you have an excellent grasp of the situation and success is at your fingertips. This is not the time for hesitation; no matter what, stay on course until you have the whole world at your feet.

You are known to be a people person and typically thrive on your interpersonal interactions. In fact, your discussions with someone else often help you to see yourself more clearly. The feedback you receive today deepens your perspective, but only if you can be receptive to hearing it. An additional point of view increases your current options, so take time to integrate what you learn now before making any important decisions. Keeping an open mind allows you to grow in ways you can't imagine.

You are such a realist by nature that you know your current enthusiasm won't last. But you're also clever enough to make the most of the good vibrations while you can. Recognition for a job well done is yours for the asking if you're willing to earn it. Although a bit of positive reinforcement won't change the overall trajectory of your life, you still appreciate the support and encouragement along the way. Continue on your journey by taking one step after another. Your sunny outlook and unwavering determination propel you through the many twists and turns ahead.

You are playing the lead character in a movie about your own mythical story. In your script, you have morphed into an invincible superhero that won't be stopped by mortal dilemmas. But there is a price to pay for such inflationary thinking and your efforts could be undone by the smallest mundane detail. Fortunately, you can have the best of both worlds today if you consciously choose to walk the middle path. You will accomplish extraordinary feats as long as you remember to keep one foot on the ground at all times.

A healthy dose of common sense is usually enough to see you through periods of excessive ambition, but you might not be able to keep everything in proportion today. You may be overcome by an impulsive drive to squeeze more out of life in the present moment and are eager to share your good news with everyone. However, you must be careful about spilling secrets to the wrong people; discuss your plans for world domination only on an as-needed basis for now.  As the old military saying goes, "Loose lips sink ships."

Reality may kick up a dust storm today, especially if you're hiding your true intentions. Nevertheless, you can make strong emotional connections if you initiate meaningful communication now instead of wasting time talking about trivialities. Although people admire your open mind, you might not even realize how influential your values are or what precious treasures you bring to a relationship. Let your friends see your vulnerability; they can help you change in ways that are not obvious yet. Your willingness to grow inspires others to do the same.

You have a profound sense of self-assurance that continues to deepen throughout next week. You're motivated to reach your goals and are ready to shift into high gear as quickly as you can. Your friends may think you're out of control now, but you're probably more centered than you appear. You have been considering your next move for a while, but your current excitement overshadows your previous planning. Just do what makes the most sense to you in the present moment and let the chips fall as they may.

Although you can slow down and enjoy the scenery today -- an unusual occurrence for you fast-moving Aries -- you still may resist easing up on the gas pedal. However, you have been racing at high speed for a while and could be in danger of exhausting your fuel if you don't stop running now. Take time to replenish your resources and recharge your batteries while you have the opportunity. After a short break from the mayhem, you will be ready to fire on all cylinders when the light turns green.

Maternal feelings toward someone you love may be overwhelming today, especially if you aren't the warm and fuzzy type. Nurturing others can be a healing experience for you, but you must make a concerted effort to push past your fears of rejection. But don't take care of anyone just so you can feel good about yourself. Reexamine your motives to make sure your heart is in the right place. Honesty is an essential ingredient found in healthy relationships.

Happiness begins at home by learning how to honor your heart's desires. You're often quick to say the right thing at the right time in order to receive the approval of others. Stop trying to elicit a particular response now and simply follow your own dreams, instead. Putting your needs first is mandatory today; ironically, being kind to yourself also sets the tone to deepen the connections between you and those you love. Your authenticity shines like a beacon in the dark.

You're sitting on pins and needles today but can't find the words to easily express the feelings you want to share. Although the Moon's visit to moody Cancer agitates your emotions, there are some serious self-restraint issues coming to light now. Keep in mind that you're probably being harder on yourself than is necessary. Stay aware of the facts, but save your critical judgments for another day. Treating yourself gently is a wonderful place to start.

Your fantasy life is spellbinding now with the evocative Moon illuminating your 12th House of Imagination. Nevertheless, keep one foot anchored in the real world so you don't get lost in the fog of the mystical realms. You have powerful feelings that you want to explore in the privacy of your mind today, especially since letting others in on your secrets doesn't seem appropriate yet. Trust your intuition to know when it's the right time to share your insights. Inspiration flowers when you look within.

Sometimes when you're participating in a group function you are hesitant to say what's on your mind. Normally, you don't have a problem talking to your partner or your boss in private; however, it's difficult to express yourself in a public forum. Gather your courage and speak your piece today. You don't need to disclose all the little details, but rest assured that every word you share will be taken seriously. If you believe in your message, others will, too.

You naturally want to behave in a socially acceptable manner, but something might prevent you from telling the truth now. You are quietly observing your feelings as they change, but haven't said anything yet because you don't want to upset the status quo. However, you can get away with sharing what's been bugging you as long as you do so with a healthy dose of sensitivity. Demonstrate how much you care in a way that allows you to say more and offend less.

You might be wondering about your future, but you don't want others to know about your current worries. Even your fantasies may be related to your career or community aspirations now, rather than your personal life. It's all too easy to get emotionally worked up about issues of social injustice today. Your opinions are so strong that your passion could erupt at an inopportune moment. State your truth, but tone it down just a touch so your message isn't lost in the drama of the moment.

Oddly enough, your unexpressed feelings may be the most significant ones now because your idealism can attract out-of-this-world dreams. Actually, the subtle signals you're receiving might not even be on the radar of perception. Don't question which dimension the messages are coming from. Just listen carefully, even if you aren't sure what you're hearing. Write down every idea that pops into your awareness; your comprehension continues to grow and the big picture will be clear soon enough. Don't rule anything out too soon when you should be opening doors, not closing them.

The truth is that it's not all about your plans today; in fact, it's about everyone else's. Or at least that's how it seems. But someone is withholding information and the lack of communication creates a tense situation. The first step is to look to your own issues and acknowledge your personal contribution to the current confusion. There are a variety of scenarios that could play out now, depending on your reaction. You can change your outer world most effectively by transforming your inner world first.

An odd feeling of anxiety rises from the depths today, creating a dilemma that stems from your intense desire for love and acceptance. Of course, nearly everyone wants to feel needed, but you complicate matters by cleverly dancing around emotional interdependence. There is no one-size-fits-all answer; instead of seeking the perfect solution, try to be comfortable with every side of an issue. Others will be more appreciative of your feelings when you are flexible enough to recognize their points of view, too.

Your emotions seem to be growing more serious these days, prompting you to pull away from the crowd. However, your withdrawal doesn't mean you are antisocial, even if you yearn for some quality time to yourself now. However, you don't need to put distance between you and a person you adore. In fact, this is an ideal day to pursue a romantic interest or create something beautiful. Eliminate the extraneous noise, but reach out to connect with someone special. Love makes the world go round.

Expressing feelings that you might normally keep to yourself could destabilize a significant relationship today. Your inclination is to jump right in because you are all fired up about a particular issue-- even though you will likely encounter an icy reception from your audience. Tread carefully because your outburst may be motivated by fear instead of by love. Focus on what must be said now and save the rest for another day once your emotions have returned to normal. You can be a formidable force for good if you wield your words wisely.

You may feel slightly contentious today and are quick to squabble with someone, if necessary, on your quest for personal satisfaction. Your ruling planet Venus is under intense pressure from provocative Pluto now, heightening your perceptions and activating your desires. Nevertheless, think again before you risk your emotional stability just to prove your point. Consider temporarily standing down until you can regain your cool practicality, especially if your sense of urgency is great. Channel your angst into your work and you will have something to be proud of at the end of the day.

Your inquiring mind wants to know what drives others to seek power at work or in love. You may be ready to delve into the mysterious world of hidden feelings, a place that you often choose to avoid. However, you're willing to overcome your resistance now, even if you shudder at the thought of what you might encounter. You are on the right track and will surely feel a great sense of relief once you uncover the truth. Shining the light of awareness into the shadows satisfies your curiosity and enlightens your soul.

Strong emotional currents draw you into unfamiliar waters today, and you aren't necessarily a willing participant. Your attempts to maintain a healthy outlook can help you keep your head above the waves, yet you still might scare yourself now by sinking into the darkness of your subconscious. There's no reason to fight the process when positive change is your reward. Once you complete your deep-diving exercises, resurface and use your new awareness to create the life of your dreams.

Managing your emotions is like an unsolvable puzzle today, especially if you're stuck in one particular way of viewing intimacy in relationships. Your love life might feel like an emotional minefield instead of the pleasure palace it's meant to be. As difficult as it is to see now, the real conflict is within and not with anyone else. Thankfully, everything can change for the better if you are willing to shift your perspective in a positive direction. A grateful heart is a powerful heart.

Relationship dynamics are particularly complicated now, especially if there are money problems in the mix. Keep in mind that resolution is easier once you accept the truth you previously tried to deny. Ironically, stress works in your favor today, motivating you to initiate overdue changes. Don't get sidetracked by your need to be right; no one wins if you choose to play the blame game. Fortunately, you can increase your chances to heal a current rift if you are willing to forgive without expecting anything in return.

Your desire for relationship stability finally gives way to the obvious need for change. Unfortunately, verbal communication might not solve all your problems because your emotions can be so passionate now that others question the validity of your perspective. Detach yourself from any desired outcome by simply stating your case and then letting it go. No matter what occurs next, your ability to quickly adapt to the changing circumstances is more valuable than clinging to your past hopes and wishes. There's no time like the present to grow.

You're resigned to gamble on your heart today, especially if you think it's necessary to get what you want. You may feel as if you've run out of options and have no alternatives at your disposal. Romantic Venus is frazzled by fierce Pluto, provoking the expression of intense emotions. You're living in the realm of extremes now, with very little gray between the black and the white. Take into account that your raging desires are distorting your clarity. Stay away from issuing any ultimatums and keep all channels of communication open if you want the relationship to last.

Your unspoken fears could have more of an influence on your relationships now than you realize. Nevertheless, you are driven to tackle complex issues, even when your common sense says there are no quick answers. The current challenges hold great potential for growth, but you can't just take the easy way out. You have a better chance of seeing things in their true light today if you try being less of an optimist and more of a realist. Exploring uncharted emotional territory might be scary but it is a worthwhile journey, nonetheless, if you learn to listen with your heart.

It's not appropriate in the current emotional environment to apply the same managerial skills you might use to handle your business affairs. Your attempts at controlling the energetic flow could block the raw feelings that need to be expressed today. This is not the right time to be overly demanding or stubbornly stoic; instead, acknowledge any negativity, shame or guilt that may be clouding the picture. Revealing your vulnerability is the key to a positive transformation.

Power struggles are likely if your dreams of the future differ from those closest to you. It requires extra work to find common ground today and the emotional discomfort that stems from social pressure tempts you to retreat from intense interactions. However, avoidance tactics won't lead to harmony in the future. Fortunately, the resistance dissipates if you move purposely into the uncertainty without trying to force your ideas on anyone else. Sometimes direct confrontation is the only way to clear the air.

Although it might seem as if you're losing something dear to your heart today, nothing is actually being taken from you. It's just that relationship dynamics are shifting and you don't want to end up with the short end of the stick. However, you may be overreacting due to old fears or pointless insecurities. Don't waste your energy fighting against changes you can't control. Expressing your appreciation for others is the fastest method for calming the volatile energy and reestablishing your center of gravity.

Your life path may grow even more convoluted if you are struggling to establish your place in a significant relationship. It seems like whatever you choose to do seems to go against the grain now. You're not purposefully trying to be difficult or rebellious; you simply want to be true to your heart. Don't let anyone talk you out of following your instincts. Trusting your inner voice today will lead you in the right direction as long as you don't let your pride stand in the way.

You might feel as if you're engaged in a classic battle between light and dark today as an associate or a casual acquaintance tries to smear your reputation. It's not easy to bring up certain topics for discussion, but you can't afford to let them slide now, in case someone gets the wrong impression. Awareness rather than denial clears the most direct path toward a peaceful resolution. Maintain your integrity at all costs and everyone will see who is telling the truth.

Your creative urges can generate plenty of mischief today as you search for ways to push people's emotional buttons. Ironically, you don't want to engage in a serious discussion about your work; you're looking to provoke reactions. However, you could be in denial about how controversial your artistic expression is now and might even be taken aback by the intense response you receive. Don't make matters worse by trying to avoid a meaningful conversation. Talking about your true intentions gives others the chance to know the real you.

You prefer to hide out and let the world pass you by now that Pluto is squaring the Sun in your 4th House of Roots. However, you also might need to face your fears about the possibility of failure. Retreating to the safety of your home can help you gain a better perspective on the weeks ahead. Instead of falling victim to self-doubt and worry, put all your energy toward visualizing your success. Once you have a clear picture of your bright and shiny future, you can step out of your shell and shine.

In the big scheme of things, today's dramas are not as significant as you may think. The Moon's return to your sign always stirs up suppressed feelings, making everything seem more intense -- and this time is no exception. However, a serious confrontation may develop from a rather trivial disagreement. Instead of allowing the energy to escalate into a major conflict, you can contain it early on in the process if you have the courage to speak your truth clearly. Make your point succinctly and then move on to something different.

You may be short on time, energy or money today as dark Pluto squares the impulsive Aries Sun in your 2nd House of Resources. You might overcompensate if you think you mismanaged a project now, bolting ahead early in the day. You're not sure why anyone would stand in your way, yet your eagerness could stir up resistance from others. Stick to your position and don't push the panic button yet. A thorough reevaluation of your goals now leads you back to the road to success.

A disagreement in a personal or business relationship today raises questions that have no easy answers. Instead of trying to force a resolution, seek common ground instead. Ironically, if you can understand each other's point of view, your differing perspectives might actually provide inspiration. Keep in mind that you're on an emotional roller-coaster ride today so beware that you're prone to overreact. Take a deep breath and give everyone a break, including yourself.

You want to slip into the shadows to escape from your responsibilities as a creative square from evolutionary Pluto activates the Sun in your 12th House of Fantasy. You realize that challenging times are on the horizon, so you're inclined to conserve your energy. Nevertheless, you seem to gain steam as you start to anticipate the future. Relinquish some of your downtime to complete as many chores as possible so you have less to do later on. You can overcome nearly any obstacles once you put your mind to it.

Put your best foot forward at work and at social events to make the most of today's profound cosmic energy. Remain open to an unexpected turn of events, even if it pushes your buttons at first. Rather than trying to influence a situation that's beyond your control now, change your response to it. Unfortunately, you're not in charge of everything, but you are fully responsible for your behavior. Your reaction sets the tone for everyone else.

You might think it's not fair that you make an extra effort to keep an open mind while someone else maintains such a rigid perspective. The bad news is this energetic imbalance leaves little room for compromise. Still, you're willing to talk about your feelings now if the other party is agreeable to an honest dialogue. The first step is to discuss the larger issue of negotiation to ensure everyone agrees that winning an argument is less important than cooperating for the good of all. Leaving egos at the door is the fastest way to cultivate peace.

Although you can see the flashing red light approaching, you still might not heed the warning. You're so impatient now that you're ready to step on the gas before you even know where you're going. But your long-term thinking runs into more immediate concerns if your day brings an unwarranted surprise. Even if you want to focus on the future, you're better off paying attention to what's happening this moment before you crash and burn.

You have an abundance of excellent ideas you would like to put into action, and as the day progresses you are able to zero in on the best ones. Your power to concentrate is strengthened today and you may find yourself dredging up forgotten memories. You could be surprised by what you discover from your persistent digging. However, you can emerge from this process with stronger values and higher self-esteem If you keep an open mind and continue to trust those who have earned your confidence.

Your key planet Mars is engaged in a cosmic tug of war with otherworldly Neptune, spinning you into a parallel universe before you know it. You might even slip on an imaginary banana peel, leaving you dazed and wondering if you should even bother getting up now. Remember, you are a fearless warrior; you're not going to take this disruption without fighting back. Stand up, dust your bruised ego off, and make a new plan that will leave everyone shaking their heads in amazement. Conquer the enemy within, and you will be a winner for life.

You could waste too much time and energy worrying about the future, especially since the conclusions you draw are probably built upon incorrect assumptions. Your senses are unreliable now because you can't help but project your fantasies onto the current events, creating a loss of objectivity. Enjoy the movie your mind is directing today, but remember it's a work of fiction based on your interpretation and not a true documentary. Thankfully, your imagination contains a treasure trove of creative ideas that you can use successfully as long as you don't mix them up with the facts.

You might sound confident when you share your plans with your friends or coworkers today, but it may just be a clever decoy to cover up your ambivalence. Don't make decisions now just to placate others, even if you believe you're running out of time. Avoid finalizing your schedule because cloudy Neptune can mess up even the simplest agenda for the next few days. In the meantime, you never know what your dreams will reveal if you let your thoughts roam far and wide. Albert Einstein wrote, "The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge, but imagination."

You are raring to show your colleagues how you can take charge and run the show. You're highly motivated now, confident that little can stop you on your road to success. But you may lose your concentration and temporarily succumb to your insecurities if you move too fast. Paradoxically, you will likely excel as a leader today if you don't push your crew so hard. A gentle but tenacious approach is more successful than attempting to set the world ablaze. Holding the reins with a light touch is essential to winning everyone over to your cause.

You may believe you've lost your fighting edge today as nebulous Neptune dissipates the energy of macho Mars. It's not that your defensive skills are diminished; it's just that you're inclined to engage with people in a more subtle manner now. Additionally, your intuitive radar is on target with the reflective Moon camping out in your sign. An adversary might not even realize that you made a power move, but you can be as effective as a ninja warrior, winning a duel without ever drawing your sword.

Putting your finger on the origin of a problem is nearly impossible today, yet you feel certain that you're close to finding a significant piece of the puzzle. You can sense that a major energetic shift is drawing near, but you're not quite ready to let go of your old agenda yet. Even if you're itching to begin your next adventure, hold on a while longer until you gather more information about your future mission. Waiting isn't easy when you are pursuing perfection, but your success depends on getting off to a proper start.

Facts and figures go in one ear and right out the other today. You hear the words, but just can't seem to retain any data because your mind is working in the mythical realm of symbols and not the rational realm of details. Luckily, your current fascination with the power of dreams does not put you at a disadvantage. Decisions you make based on intuition are just as valid now as someone else's choice determined by analysis. Sometimes a feeling in the pit of your stomach tells you more than all the logic in the world.

You know that participating in a group activity will nourish your soul, but you're afraid of losing your personal space in the process. Balancing your social commitments with the amount of time you spend in solitude can mean the difference between frustration and satisfaction today. You need some time alone in order to explore your creative urges now, but you're also drawn to connecting with others. Giving yourself permission to jump back and forth between these two worlds offers you the best chance for finding happiness.

Your unquenchable penchant for adventure could get the best of you today as you obsess about embarking on a once-in-a-lifetime journey to an exotic destination. Unfortunately, delusional Neptune is tugging on action-hero Mars, making it wiser to entertain fantasies now than to go anywhere at all. Nevertheless, confusing your hopes with reality will leave you stuck in your tracks. Sometimes dreaming is the best way to travel when you're needed at home. Your imagination is a vast universe all on its own.

You may feel as if you're on an amusement park ride that's messing with your center of gravity today -- and you don't like it one bit. You're not happy wasting valuable time because you have too many important things to do. You long to reestablish your balance and plant both feet firmly on the ground. You are not one to take kindly to someone else controlling your life, even if it's just for a spin on the tilt-a-whirl. Nevertheless, practicing adaptability is healthier now than resisting that which you cannot change; you might be surprised at how fun it is not to be the one calling the shots all the time.

Encountering an overly optimistic person could put you in a grouchy mood today when you realize you've been sold a bill of goods. However, the fault may not lie with anyone else; strangely enough, others might be telling the truth. Mixing up your desires with reality is all too easy now. However, there's no free lunch when it comes to love or money, even though assertive Mars is activating fantasy-prone Neptune in your 2nd House of Income. Scale back your assumptions and remember you must earn rewards the old-fashioned way; there's no substitute for realistic goals and hard work when it comes to achieving your dreams.

Someone may give you specific directions today, but you're still confused about which way you're supposed to go. Maybe the communication is muddled, or, perhaps, you have fixed ideas about how to reach your goal. Unfortunately, you can jeopardize a healthy working relationship unless you cooperate with others. Remembering there are multiple paths to every destination saves you from feeling frustrated when you realize you've taken a detour. Life's greatest lessons are often handed to you when you least expect it.

You believe you know exactly what you want in the love department today, but your desires are not as clear as you think. You tend to idealize your attractions now, which can be a lot of fun as long as you don't try to connect them directly to reality. In fact, too many concrete expectations hinder your current journey. However, going with the flow may reward you with a lovely experience that has long-lasting consequences. Follow your heart and see who you encounter along the way.

You may misinterpret an emotional situation today, especially if you aren't paying rapt attention to every word. The dynamics of a relationship are shifting and you're not sure if you know the entire truth when it comes to someone else's feelings. Whether or not your concerns are warranted, you can gain some comfort by asking questions to find out what others expect from you. However, there's no need to panic, even if you're treading on shaky ground. Just roll with the confusion until the path straightens out and you can determine your new direction.

Although you might think you expressed your needs well enough for people to understand, they still don't have a clue as to what you want. Your words are easily misconstrued today because you don't believe it's necessary to explain the obvious. However, you can be much more convincing now if you unfold your story gradually in bite-sized pieces that others can handle. Honesty is the best policy for everyone involved; playing guessing games isn't fun when your heart is on the line.

Your schedule can suddenly fall apart today if you don't allow enough time for everything that needs to be accomplished. You may not be as prepared as you prefer now because people aren't sharing their expectations with you. Instead of muddling your way through the uncertainty now, ask pointed questions to find out what others want. Your friends and associates might surprise you with their pragmatic answers, saving your day if you're willing to take their advice. Listen more than you speak for the best results.

Your dreams seem so amazingly real now that you could be living in a bubble of fantasies without even knowing it. Facts are shaded by your thoughts and feelings today, and it's tricky to separate objective perceptions from subjective opinions. The truth is that the potential for creating more meaning in your life grows stronger when your intuitive visions are integrated into your reality. Your imagination, intelligence and heart each play an integral part in illuminating your star.

Normally, you're way ahead of the curve when it comes to managing the details of complex projects and keeping everything in order. Although sweet Venus and the responsive Moon shift into your rational sign today, you may be wiser to save the critical analysis and hard work for another day. Relax for a change; give yourself permission to space out, instead of trying to limit your thoughts strictly to the mundane world. Your imagination is your greatest asset now; don't be afraid to use it.

You grow more introspective today as the Moon, along with your key planet Venus, takes up residence in your 12th House of Privacy. If you find yourself in the middle of a crowded room, you can still withdraw into your imagination while appearing as socially astute as ever. Thankfully, you don't need to isolate yourself in order to do your inner work. Your natural ability to offset one reality with another empowers you to pursue contemplation while still playing a vital role in the community.

You have a specific plan in mind that you want to share with your friends now, but your work might not give you the personal freedom you need to do what you want. Obviously, you aren't one to run out on your responsibilities, yet you can rearrange your schedule to your advantage today without negatively impacting anyone else. Following through on your word is crucial to maintaining your reputation, but so is pursuing your dreams.

Conditions on the home front can temporarily derail your ambitions, but they aren't your biggest problem now. Nothing is as it appears to be, and it's challenging to gauge the relative importance of a particular thought. Taking a simple idea and turning it into an overly complicated strategy won't make it any more effective. Let "less is more" be your mantra to keep you on the straight and narrow path. Misunderstandings that come to light in the next few days will make you glad that you strive for simplicity today.

You may grow frustrated if you can't subdue your desires now, especially if they distract you from previous commitments. There are days when you industrious Goats can magically build the very same roads you travel on. However, today's energy is meant for exploring territories that are off the beaten track. Paradoxically, it might be prudent to meander around, knowing that you'll be back on the highway and heading toward your destination again before you know it. As Tolkien reminds us, "Not all those who wander are lost."

Your logic seems sound enough to guide your way, but you might not be projecting a ton of confidence today. People can see your kinder and gentler side as your hidden emotions slip out through the cracks in the walls of your defenses. Instead of fighting your softness, consciously let those you trust inside your otherwise impenetrable shell. Sometimes it's necessary to be the strong and silent type; however, it's more important now just to be real.

Falling in love with a fleeting vision, a spiritual calling or a beautiful person is all too easy today. Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible to tell the difference between fact and fiction when it comes to your affections. Don't try to figure out what's happening now; just enjoy the experience for what it's worth. Untangle the threads in the tapestry of life on another day when things make more sense. The truth is reality and fantasy can blend into a magical moment that breaks open your heart if you're willing to believe in the impossible.

Lowering your defenses isn't all that easy because people may seem verbally aggressive for no reason today. Conversations might get stuck in the middle of nowhere while messenger Mercury stops to turn direct in your 7th House of Relationships. However, your heightened sensitivity might provoke you to misinterpret someone's friendly advice as criticism of your position. Don't take everything so personally; being more flexible in your thinking will help lighten your load. If you can't say something nice in return, don't say anything at all.

Your thoughts are so singularly focused on the details of a project today that you can lose sight of the overall picture. Although your undivided attention to little things might go unnoticed, it could actually save the day. Nevertheless, you may drive others crazy with your unforgiving perfectionism now. Remember, progress will become more obvious as clever Mercury gains momentum in the days ahead. Don't set aside those goals that are closest to your heart, but be wise enough to keep everything in proper perspective until everyone is on the same page.

Your friends may not offer you the support you expected today, but their concerns are probably for your own good. It's not that there's anything wrong with your ideas; it's just your enthusiasm might be distorting your sense of proportion. Whatever commitments you make now will need to be scaled back in the days ahead. Remember, your good intentions won't necessarily overrule any laws of nature. There are only so many hours in a day and your positive attitude can only take you so far.

You might believe you have to justify your existence today, but living up to someone else's expectations isn't as important now as being true to yourself. Instead of rushing ahead and impulsively trying to make everyone feel more comfortable, let others take responsibility for themselves. Of course, you can still act with kindness; just be sure to do your own emotional housekeeping before cleaning up for anyone else. Real change starts at home.

You could run around in circles chasing your tail today, yet end up feeling like you didn't accomplish  anything at all. Trickster Mercury's direct turn in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment keeps you busy with one distraction after another. Nevertheless, you can reduce your frustration by simply considering the consequences before you start moving in multiple directions. Exercising a dash of self-restraint might be enough to put a more positive spin on the weekend ahead.

Be careful what solutions you are selling today because you might easily convince someone that you know what's best, even if you don't. You are so sure of your logic you could even make a snap decision about buying something you don't need. Ask someone you trust for advice, rather than just defending your choices. But soliciting another opinion is only the first step; you must actually listen to the feedback you receive before you finalize a purchase. Demonstrate your intelligence by admitting when you don't have all the answers.

It's time to get to work and set things right, especially if you didn't accomplish all that you intended over the past three weeks while chatty Mercury retrograded in your sign. You're finished talking about what you need to do; today you must deliver the goods. Don't fall prey to someone else's harsh judgment or your own self-criticism. Your words are influential, but ultimately, it's your actions that count the most. Roll up your sleeves and show everyone who's the boss.

Although your fantasies have led you into new territory, spinning your wheels of logic helps you untangle a sticky situation today. You are in a time of transition now that rational Mercury is turning direct in your 12th House of Imagination. Whatever you do, don't give up if the answers to complex questions are not readily apparent. Your honorable intentions combined with your infamous persistence should clear the way for effective action. You can still be a huge success story without being the smartest person on the block.

You might feel as if you recently received the bad end of a deal. It appears that others are getting off easy now while you are paying the price for your hasty decision. But don't worry about past mistakes since talkative Mercury finally ends its retrograde phase today, enabling you to express yourself with a newly found clarity. Think first and then say exactly what's on your mind; you may not notice an immediate change, but your words will set you free to fly to new heights.

You aren't as overwhelmed as everyone else seems today, even though your feelings are bouncing around in the changing tides, too. You possess a sound sense of your career path, yet aren't surprised by the current resistance you encounter. Calmly observing your reactions to someone who tries to exert their authority is more constructive than responding impulsively now and regretting it later. Allow your emotions to settle down before sharing your opinion, or you might just complicate matters even more. Discretion is the better part of valor.

You may have watched your plans fall apart in slow motion as circumstances changed substantially over the past three weeks. Thankfully, mischievous Mercury is done with its retrograde through your 9th House of Big Ideas and today's turnaround can send you off in an exciting new direction. It might take a few days to capture a precise picture of what went wrong and to formulate a successful strategy, but don't get discouraged now. You should be back on your feet and raring to go soon enough; focus on the positives and everything will be alright.

You are itching for forward movement as you put a rather ambitious plan into motion. However, it may be more difficult than you imagined to get along with others now, especially if their goals are vastly different from yours. Unfortunately, your current impatience won't help the situation improve any faster. Luckily, you should excel at your endeavors over the next few days as your thinking grows sharper, enabling you to outmaneuver the competition. Slow and steady wins the race.

Although you may think you're at a turning point today, it's really more of a readjustment to your regular routine. No matter which way you go, you could run into a roadblock that prevents you from continuing in the same direction. But it's not necessary to abruptly change course; instead, shift your internal radio to a mellower station. Try not to be so demanding now. Pushing less can make everyone happier, including yourself. Magic happens when you're busy appreciating the music you hear at this very moment.

You might wonder if relationships are worth all the headaches they seem to bring these days. Love doesn't flow so easily when sensual Venus is stressed by sobering Saturn. Nevertheless, you must put in extra work now if you want romance in your life. Creating structure for a partnership to grow isn't all fun and games. But if you withdraw today, pleasure will be harder to find in the near future. Opening your heart doesn't come with a guarantee, but without the risk there is no reward.

You are normally quick-footed and light-hearted, no matter who is raining on your parade. However, you're obsessed with doing the right thing now, and this current attraction to perfection prevents you from fully enjoying yourself. You could be afraid that you will lose whatever relationship stability you've gained, prompting you to obstinately stand your ground today. Unfortunately, your resistance creates the opposite effect of what you desire. Staying in motion helps the current stress to pass; a rolling stone gathers no moss.

You wish you could pull your heart safely back behind a thick wall of protection today. After all, you don't want to get carried away by the tides of change that are washing onto the shores of your awareness again. You might think you have lost your chance to take action, but this assumption isn't true. You needn't sink into feelings of self-defeat. The universe is simply giving you time to tie up a few emotional loose ends before launching into the next cycle of work. The less baggage you carry, the easier it is to move into the future unencumbered. The lighter your load, the happier your heart.

You are regaining lost clarity on a recurring relationship issue and feel the need to make a dramatic gesture now. But instead of moving closer to someone special, you may require more separation, rather than connection. Although you have great potential to mend a rift that's been bothering you for a while, you need to reveal your vulnerability in order for healing to occur. Achieving true intimacy might take extra effort, but you must work for those things you truly want.

Bothersome domestic issues are popping up now, possibly indicating that you have recently neglected your responsibilities. But your frustration grows because you don't want to cut into your busy day to deliver on your promises. You could have a hard time gauging what you need to do, which makes you even less eager to try anything at all. Remember, it may take a few days before you're really in the swing of things since your key planet Mercury just turned direct. There' no reason to rush. Be gentle with yourself; everything will get done in time.

You might not feel as supported by others as you wish today. Your ruling planet, Venus, is under serious stress as she squares off with austere Saturn, and you could experience the brunt of this tension and a sense of isolation. Old abandonment issues may resurface if someone who loves you isn't immediately available now. Thankfully, you can move beyond playing the role of a victim if you are willing to remember the past and then let it go. Be your own best friend and don't allow your history to define you when you can embrace the future, instead.

Your recent optimistic tune regarding your social life could fade into the blues today. Keeping the weight of your worries to yourself only makes matters worse, yet it's challenging to find the right person to trust with your fears. As much as you need to talk about your feelings now, it's tough to explain complex yet subtle issues. Oddly enough, the key to increasing your self-esteem may come from being emotionally transparent. Your friends are willing to lend a sympathetic ear if you give them half a chance.

You're resigned to work hard for what you want, but you expect others to acknowledge your efforts. Unfortunately, you might feel as if you're spinning your wheels in a relationship without achieving any emotional traction. Pushing harder or going faster seems to have no noticeable influence on the current situation. But ultimately, a personal setback isn't a sign of failure today; it's a necessary delay for a valid reason. Turn off the engine and let your desires cool down before you try again. Paradoxically, learning the lesson of patience now enables you to find lasting contentment in the near future.

Of course, you want to have your share of fun, but you can't ignore your long list of chores without dire consequences. Wrapping up old business needs to be your number one concern because new challenges are looming on the horizon. Good times will have to wait as sweet Venus brushes up against your ruling planet, stern Saturn. The more effort you give your work now, the more relaxed you'll feel throughout the rest of the weekend. Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

Walking away from your work is not as easy as it sounds today, making it difficult to accept the lovely social invitations that are dangling in front of you. Unfortunately, it seems as if nothing you do alleviates your current sense of alienation. If you must postpone a special event, remember that this isn't a permanent cancellation. Taking care of previous obligations needs to be your top priority now. The sooner you finish your business, the sooner you can join in the fun.

The heaviness of what you don't know lurks right at the edges of your awareness today. Obviously, you can succumb to your uncertainty and steer clear of emotional encounters in the outer world. Or you could face a scary issue and cautiously overcome your instinctive resistance to treading on unfamiliar ground. The truth is your fear may have little to do with what's actually going on. The more light you shine in hidden places, the more confident you will feel about the direction of your life.

A friend or coworker appears to have all the answers today, even if you aren't asking any questions. Although it's wonderful to receive help when you need it, too much meddling is bothersome, especially if others act like they know more about your life than you do. Nevertheless, blowing your cool won't improve the situation. Instead, acknowledge everyone's good intentions while gently informing them that you'll request assistance on an as-needed basis. Establishing your independence is instrumental to your happiness.

You're psyched about taking the next step on a big project, but first you must complete unfinished business before moving ahead with your plans. You can sense you're on the edge of something significant today, but you're not sure where to begin. Ironically, there are so many alternatives now that you need to eliminate the distractions before you can figure out how to reach your destination. Start by narrowing down your choices; the rest will fall into place on its own.

Your friends encourage you to stretch beyond your limitations today, provoking uncharacteristic caution on your part. You know how far you can go and don't appreciate people who push you too far. Your impulse is to dig in your heels now; however, you don't want to miss out on such an exciting opportunity just to prove a point. Listen carefully to what's being offered and make your choice based on your own intuition and not anyone else's. Trusting yourself is key to your success.

An unexpected tug-of-war between social and personal responsibilities may tax your ability to remain flexible. You can see amazing possibilities popping up like flowers in a garden, even if they aren't quite what you anticipated. But mustering up enthusiasm is difficult when you have so many obligations in the present moment that you barely have time to think about tomorrow. Be patient and avoid making a final decision until the conflict settles down. There's no reason to panic; the urgency you feel is strictly your own.

You may shock your friends with risky behavior today that could seem a bit extreme from anyone else's perspective. But people might not realize that your current restlessness did not just appear overnight. You have been contemplating a drastic move to stir the energy up for quite a while. Fortunately, this is your chance to sparkle and shine with or without an appreciative audience; after all, you are the captain of your ship and the master of your destiny.

Sometimes you are so exacting in your thinking that you convince yourself all other perspectives are less valid than yours. Thankfully, you have a cosmic chance to break out of a rut now and experiment with a whole new approach. You may discover your values are changing and it's time to let go of outmoded beliefs that do nothing but hold you back. However, logic will only carry you so far; you need to follow your intuition if you want to manifest a positive transformation.

Accepting the limitations placed on you by your partner or a loved one can prove to be a real challenge today. Luckily, something special happens that opens the door of possibilities to what you once wanted but have since let go. Naturally, this surprise can be exciting, confusing and upsetting -- all at the very same time. Take a few deep breaths while you consider your choices today. Don't rush the decisions of your heart; time is on your side.

You're walking on eggshells at home now because too many things are left unsaid. Meanwhile, you have a long list of chores to finish, but haven't yet determined the smartest way to navigate through the messy dynamics. Nevertheless, you may feel as if you're being forced to make a decision before you're ready. The time for ambivalence is over. Whatever you choose will ultimately be more advantageous than continuing to sit on the fence. Trust your instincts and take a leap of faith.

You have recently spent more than your fair share of time examining all the possibilities and analyzing every angle of your life. Although your grand scheme may remain unchanged, your plan to create your ideal future continues to undergo radical transformation. It's difficult to discern know whether or not these wonderful opportunities are real, which, in turn, makes it nearly impossible to fix on any one strategy now. The truth is waiting to be discovered if you're willing to search for it.

You may have very specific tasks on your plate but they don't seem as significant now as your creative aspirations. Fortunately, you clearly understand the difference between your current responsibilities and your colorful dreams. Nevertheless, it's your less productive side that feeds your soul, and without inspiration your life begins to lose meaning. Don't favor your professional ambitions over your artistic leanings today; the ultimate key to your happiness is found in balancing both worlds.

You don't have a clue how your life got so hectic, but if things are running amok today, you're driven to do something about it. However, impulsive radical action isn't the answer now, since there are potential consequences that could make your daily routine even crazier. There's nothing wrong with wanting results right away, but success is more likely if you implement change in small and manageable increments. A true genius knows when to sit still and when to rock the boat.

You may be annoyed by a surprising money matter today that can't be resolved quickly because you don't have all the information at your fingertips. Finding resolution might be as easy as locating a misplaced bill, calling the bank or balancing your checkbook. But it's a risky idea to cut corners and take action until you know all of the facts. Someone else could supply you with everything you need now, so don't be afraid to ask for assistance. There's no point in standing on ceremony when others are happy to help.

You are ready to let go of your personal agenda now that the even-tempered Libra New Moon falls in your 7th House of Partnerships. Paradoxically, the likelihood of receiving support for your impetuous behavior increases when you distance yourself from others. Nevertheless, you could end up frustrated if you believe that you can happily exist in your dreamworld alone. Thankfully, finding ways to express yourself without going to extremes brings emotional satisfaction, but it just might arrive in a different package than you expected.

A coworker may present you with a complicated conundrum that eludes immediate resolution. Thankfully, the fair-minded Libra New Moon pacifies your 6th House of Employment, enabling you to emotionally detach yourself from the unresolved situation. You might not be able to fix the problem today, but you can't set it aside, either. Ultimately, you can be of the most help by just listening to your friends without interruption. Showing compassion by offering a  supportive shoulder is more useful now than rattling off an overly simplistic answer.

Wrestling with your own feelings isn't always the simplest thing to do; it's even more challenging when you're dealing with someone else's erratic emotions. Luckily, you can smoothly skate over this bumpy territory because the Libra New Moon's presence in your 5th House of Fun and Games allows you to maintain a playful attitude. But stress won't drop out of sight just because it's inconvenient for you; knowing what you can and can't control is your secret to happiness.

Taking a sentimental journey through your personal history isn't new behavior for you nostalgic Crabs, but the reflective Libra New Moon's emphasis on your 4th House of Roots raises issues that you might not have considered yet. Thankfully, you are in a positive frame of mind today, making it easier to handle the emotional complexities that arise now. But don't get lost on your trip down Memory Lane. It's more productive to remain in the present moment, instead of traveling back in time to relive your past.

Although you believe you know what's best for you, today's accommodating Libra New Moon falls in your 3rd House of Communication, encouraging you to also consider the needs of others. But don't allow your current enthusiasm to trick you into thinking everything will turn out fine just because you're feeling generous. Although you might not normally be so dependent on anyone else, you can't fill in your schedule now before talking to the people who have a stake in your success. Practicing the art of compromise allows everyone to win in the end.

You must make a significant decision about your finances now, yet it's challenging to reach a definitive conclusion while the ambivalent Libra New Moon influences your 2nd House of Money. You may waste time wavering back and forth today, unable to finalize your choice. However, it's not helpful to be too self-critical. Wait a couple of days to see where the new wave of energy carries you before committing one way or the other. Keeping your options open improves your chances for success.

You're eager to put your new intentions into constructive action, but first you need to express your desires clearly enough to create the impact you want. Thankfully, the strategic Libra New Moon triggers a sudden break from your recent past mistakes. Although focusing your thoughts on a specific goal can set you into motion, your irrepressible confidence isn't enough to assure that you'll reach your destination. Success is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

You're often a champion at keeping secrets, but something you are hiding could spell trouble now. Although the friendly Libra New Moon creeps into your 12th House of Privacy, you yearn to tell someone what you know. However, you won't likely spill the beans if it means going back on your word. This dilemma is stressful if you believe there's no right course of action. Put off your final choice until the Moon enters insightful Scorpio tomorrow and then let your intuition be your guide.

Even if your social calendar is chaotic, the energy shifts when the artistic Libra New Moon rattles your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. You're marching to the beat of a different drummer now as you begin to pull away from the crowd. Although stress is exacerbated by awkward relationship dynamics, you still can continue to be true to yourself. Your interpersonal dance grows more fulfilling as you take care of your own needs first. Ultimately, living life in a creative manner improves your connections with everyone else.

You're taking your professional obligations to heart while the diplomatic Libra New Moon is busy activating your 10th House of Social Status. Your career objectives are accentuated, but it isn't wise to pile more busy work onto your full plate today. Accept additional tasks only after you weigh and balance the pros and cons of having to fulfill another promise. Delegating specific jobs enables you to cover more ground without exhausting your resources. Think outside of the box and success is yours.

Your excitement grows as you anticipate new ways to widen your world view as the creative Libra New Moon lands in your 9th House of Big Ideas. You're inspired to make a decision now about a new course of study to expand your horizons. But don't limit yourself to work-related subjects because it is time to break out of your rut by exploring a totally different universe. Free your mind, buckle your seat belt and enjoy the ride.

Your sensitivity to someone's emotions is the key that opens a door to intimacy while the lovely Libra New Moon strengthens your 8th House of Deep Sharing. However, there is no need for worry because your intuitive compass will prevent you from getting lost in uncharted waters. Fortunately, you can maintain clear boundaries today, even while diving into the unexplored shadows of an evolving relationship. Solving the mystery of love is a lifelong journey, so don't forget to come up for air now and then.

You aren't willing to give up your freedom, even in a trade for a less stressful path in life. However, you might choose being responsible today over being independent -- although you may not be happy with your decision. Unfortunately, clinging to your annoyance can create serious problems. Expressing your negativity and then letting it go enables you to avoid feeling resentment later on. Living an ordinary life in an extraordinary manner inspires you to reach spiritual satisfaction.

Recent promises have you climbing the walls today, leaving you with little time to enjoy life's pleasures. Although your goals are straightforward, nothing is simple while everyone is making demands on your time. Unexpressed emotions can turn a casual encounter into a tangle of intrigue. Don't wait to address the source of a problem if you already understand the current dynamics. The sooner you start untying the knots, the faster it will go.

Your passions are running the show today, making you feel less confident of your decisions. But the intensity of relationship dynamics grows stronger as your emotions sink into the shadows of your subconscious. There isn't a lot of room for faulty logic now, so think through your plan before you initiate a process that can't be stopped midstream. Taking the time to consider what your heart needs empowers you to make the right choice.

You strive to see both sides of a relationship issue today, but are forced to take a position later on. The Moon's afternoon shift into emotional Scorpio reminds you that your feelings control so much of your behavior, you may not be able to change the outcome of the present situation. Listen to your inner voice now, but also be certain that your plan makes practical sense before doing something you soon regret. Using both your head and your heart allows you to see the full picture.

There is still a lot of hard work to do over the next few weeks and you're thankful that all the noise is beginning to settle down. But instead of trying to tie up loose ends, you're more likely inclined to take the day off for rest and relaxation now. Balancing your hectic schedule with a bit of peaceful solitude at home today may be the smartest use of your time. Stepping away from the fray can be enough to revitalize your sense of purpose.

You're able to assimilate big changes into your life without too much difficulty now. However, you're not interested in simply trading a relaxing day for one filled with distractions. Happily, making a commitment to express yourself creatively motivates you to realize your greatest potential. Share whatever thoughts come to mind, even if it complicates the picture today. It really doesn't matter what artistic medium you choose, just let your imagination be your guide.

You can't find enough time to kick back today, but you might believe you will get away without fulfilling all of your responsibilities. However, there is a difference between pursuing ambitious goals and simply honoring your promises. You may have to make up for lost time later in the evening if your laziness gets the best of you early on. Balancing work with play is a safer strategy than going to either extreme.
