Shuffling your priorities allows you to manage your calendar with finesse.

You reach a significant fork in the road today, yet your current map isn't clear about where either path leads. Unfortunately, your decision-making process is a lot more complicated now because of this ambiguity. Nevertheless, the Moon's shift into your sign later in the day triggers your final answer, emboldening you to paint your future exactly as you visualize it in your imagination. Follow your heart and you can't go wrong.

It's a whole new ballgame once you decide that you're ready to step up to the plate and get to work. Surprisingly, you may procrastinate for a while, yet the momentum shifts so quickly today that you need to make pragmatic choices or you'll drift off course. Ironically, your dreams reveal the most sensible strategy at this time. Integrating your most creative visions with your current reality is your best recipe for a winning season.

Your social life continues to be on the move as the emotional Moon enters your 11th House of Community. Although your friends may be overwhelmed with your relentless intensity, you just want to do the right thing. You're not interested in making mistakes that will send the wrong message. However, giving yourself permission to have fun is more important than anything else now. Nevertheless, you can deepen the connections in a significant relationship if you don't try so hard.

You may enjoy the thrill of imagining whatever is around the next bend, but other people's demands can squelch the excitement today. The Moon's afternoon shift into your 10th House of Public Responsibility reminds you that you're not as independent as you wish. Establishing new priorities helps you navigate your way through tricky territory. But choose your path carefully because your current choices will likely have a lasting impact.

You aren't interested in casual conversations today because you feel as if you're running out of time to connect on an emotional level. You have no patience for social games that distract you from the real issues on your mind. However, it's not always easy to find the right person to bring into your confidence. Listen closely to your intuition and allow the universe to pick your audience. Sharing a story about your personal journey can inspire others to choose love over fear. Spreading light is what you Fish do best.

You might be convinced that someone is manipulating reality now, trying to involve you in the very same emotional drama that you're doing your best to avoid. But your feelings are already aroused and it's more challenging to shut them off after they have been stirred. You may not be able to prevent an interaction from turning stormy today, but everyone will feel better once the whole story is out in the open. Applying equal measures of honesty and kindness cultivates peace and harmony.

You want to get back to basics now, yet others may be urging you to consider alternatives which will substantially complicate your life. Paradoxically, your resistance won't likely bring the simplicity you desire and might even trigger more unresolved emotions. This is not the time to stubbornly adhere to your principles. Demonstrating your flexibility could help everyone get through an awkward emotional impasse. Don't be afraid to let your wicked sense of humor save the day.

You are clinging to a set agenda today and aren't interested in anything that distracts you from making tangible progress toward your goal. Someone may misinterpret your single-mindedness as a personal rejection, but you just don't have time to engage in petty personal politics now. Keep your focus on your mission; you can let others know that you are ready for some fun and relaxation after you accomplish your work for the day. Making your priorities clear from the start makes life easier for everyone involved.

You're quietly preoccupied with making an important decision, leaving others to wonder why you're being so serious now. It's likely that your friends and family will want to help you narrow down your choices, but you might see this gentle interference as a way for them to exert control over your life. There's no reason to exclude someone who can be a trustworthy ally; let everyone know your concerns and be transparent about your boundaries. You may be in for a pleasant surprise if you assume the best of people instead of the worst.

You are secretly sorting out your mixed feelings about an old friend or family member now, and you might not be ready to share your thoughts yet. You are weary of always being the person that others rely on, but it's the wrong time to let anyone down. Keeping your emotions out of the picture is probably a good idea today, as long as you don't do it in a halfway fashion. Process your negativity swiftly because any lingering resentment will get in the way of the generous support you have to offer. Maintaining objectivity is the secret to your current success.

You wake up believing that you can accomplish nearly anything today. Although you might fall short of your expectations, it's useless to waste energy on self-judgment when your intentions are  so honorable. Squeeze a bit of well-deserved playtime into your schedule now, no matter how many chores are on your to-do list. Ultimately, you'll be more productive if you make room in your day for creative pursuits. Freeing your imagination gives you a magical outlook on life.

You might take an unpopular stance because you think remaining true to your core beliefs is more important than simply being nice today. But it can be challenging to hold your position, especially if your coworkers are trying to convince you that your ideas are wrong. The truth is, it's not about what anyone else wants; what counts the most is maintaining your integrity, even if it temporarily alienates you from others. To thine own self be true.

Your friends may pretend that a difficult issue has been swept under the rug because they don't want to risk rocking the boat and making you mad. However, you instinctively know when people are keeping secrets from you, and you do not like being played one bit. Unfortunately, there's enough emotional fuzziness in the atmosphere to misinterpret someone's motives now, so lighten up and give everyone the benefit of the doubt. Treating others with the respect you would like in return is a good place to start.

You think it's simply a matter of being polite to remain quiet if you don't have something positive to say today. However, your current silence communicates more meaning than you realize now since others can't help but notice that you're not your usual sunny self. The good news is that it's unnecessary to control the flow of a conversation so you feel emotionally more secure. As long as you don't have cruel intentions, telling the truth as you see it is the kindest thing you can do for everyone involved.

People put you on a pedestal, especially on a day like today when you can set a fine example by stepping into a leadership role. Nevertheless, it isn't wise to complicate a situation by telling anyone else what to do; instead, get to work without assuming your way is the only path to productivity. Your most effective strategy is simply to show up with a positive attitude. In the final analysis, it's more authentic to engage others with your uncertainty now than to act like you have all of the answers.

Everyone is demanding a lot from you now, and you might think that they are being unreasonable. Fortunately, you're not responsible to live up to anyone's expectations except your own. Don't promise more than you can deliver; set sensible goals early in the day and make your intentions known to others. Just remember to keep your doubts to yourself today or you could just feed into the negativity lingering in the air. Doing your best is all that is required to prove your sincerity.

It's surprising how quickly you're able to shift from overly ambitious goals to very pragmatic ones today. Some of your most vivid dreams are already fading, leaving you with a realistic picture of what you can actually accomplish. However, don't waste your precious time trying to conform to someone else's grand plan now. Trust your own vision; it's really the only one that matters in the end.

Achieving your career objectives or finding your life's purpose grows more crucial now as your ambitions intensify. You may even turn obsessive, fearful that you might miss your chance if you don't drive yourself as relentlessly as possible today. Unfortunately, it's possible to ride roughshod over people if you are only focused on your own goals. Thankfully, practicing a touch of diplomacy enables you to be more effective than you ever thought possible. Your heart connections enrich your life in ways your work never can.

A relationship grows more complex if your friend or partner is as inflexible as you are today. Fortunately, you can transform the tense dynamics by resolving to meet others halfway, instead of demanding that they adapt to your agenda. In fact, you might be so pleased with the results of your collaboration that you give more in return. Instead of trying to prove your superiority now, it's more useful to seek common ground instead. Mutual admiration is the key to creating an unbreakable bond.

It's rather unnerving when your rational thoughts are overpowered by irrational emotions. It might even appear as if you're losing control of your feelings today. However, this can be quite the magical moment if you're willing to admit to yourself that you weren't running the show even when you believed you were. Widen your horizons by exploring the darker corners of your heart and tune into a deeper message that's buried underneath the noisy distraction of language. Suspending your disbelief is the first step to embarking on a journey of the soul.

Existential concerns linger on  your mind now, but they won't prevent you from joining others in pursuit of a good time. You want to enjoy the camaraderie, but still have mixed feelings about engaging in lighthearted social chatter today. Unfortunately, you can take contemplation too far; obsessing too much on your emotions gets old quickly when you end up in the same dark place. Consciously setting your serious thoughts aside gives you the chance to create special memories with the ones you love the most.

You think you need to work diligently these days so you can earn more money, but financial success will lose its importance in the weeks ahead. Luckily, you aren't in a hurry now because you secretly believe that your patience will ultimately be rewarded. But don't reveal all your cards at once or you'll give away your power too soon. Playing the waiting game is easier if everyone doesn't know what move you're going to make next. The element of surprise is your secret weapon.

You might feel as if you've been operating within a protective bubble lately, but tensions still lurk in the shadows. You may be clever enough today to avoid an open conflict with someone close to you, but there's still a world of difference that separates you from each other. Thankfully, you're motivated by a sense of mutual respect and the tolerance of different beliefs. Giving the gift of freedom to others enables love to flourish in a healthy environment.

Perhaps you recently demonstrated your flexibility by encouraging the people you love to pursue their own interests. But now the tables are turned and you may need to defend your personal agenda. You're not so eager to accept someone else's vision if it contradicts your basic values or dashes your dreams. Overcome your fears and state your boundaries clearly. Although this confrontational strategy can feel frightening at first, everyone will understand your position once you stand up for your rights.

Although your emotions float dangerously close to the surface while the Moon visits your sign, you have the presence of mind to keep sensitive issues to yourself. Instead of talking strategy today, you're ready to act on your feelings while courageous Mars harmonizes with passionate Pluto. Although your moods fluctuate throughout the day, your resolve remains steadfast and you won't be easily deterred from your destination. Fortunately, you can make great progress now as long as you don't try to cut any corners along the way.

A recent shake-up of the status quo might have seemed exhilarating in the moment, but now you realize it will only take you so far. Others may not fully approve of your need to create change because they only see what's working well. Meanwhile, your inner restlessness won't leave you alone until you do something about it. There's a time for bending in the wind, but today you must be the strong and fearless Centaur charging toward the horizon. Act with authority, even if you have to fake it at first.

You have a welcome opportunity to retreat from your usual responsibilities today, giving you valuable time to reassess your overall direction in life. Normally, your legendary ambition drives you on an upward path toward your career aspirations, but you're less concerned with professional advancement now than with spiritual fulfillment. Thankfully, removing the pressure to succeed could open new doorways to destinations that were not previously on your map. Dance with the unknown and explore to your heart's content.

You know exactly where you are going and what you are doing today, but you don't want to make a big fuss about it. Even if someone tries to tap into your wisdom and experience, you might avoid engaging in a lengthy conversation because you prefer journeying alone now. Don't worry about impressing anyone else with your competence; you have nothing to prove to the rest of the world. Just get on with your current business and let everyone else take care of theirs. Some days you are an open book, and some days you're not.

Regaining clarity about your long-term goals rejuvenates your spirit today. However, your intense feelings about a relationship might not be  so well received by someone else. Your message is very important now, but so is the tone of your words. Even if your perspective is a radical one, there's no need to purposefully provoke people's fears. Thankfully, striving for the highest potential keeps you on a spiritual path and inspires others to do the same.

The more facts you have at your disposal today, the more you realize that you don't really know what someone else is feeling. Although you may be inclined to jump to premature conclusions now, the longer you can sit with your uncertainty, the better your chances for creating a meaningful connection. Instead of pushing for resolution on a relationship issue, surrender your need for control. The mysteries of love are enchanting when you're willing to open your heart and let Cupid play his part.

You are driven by a strong desire for perfection today, but satisfaction remains elusive. Romantic Venus opposes nebulous Neptune, tricking you into combining your dreams with reality. Nevertheless, you won't float off into the clouds while the Moon joins forces with pragmatic Saturn. Listening to your heart helps you turn a daydream into something real. Be willing to take a risk and let go of what you assume to be true; what you see now is not what you get, so trust your sixth sense over your sight.

You have big dreams about what you want to do today but your actual preferences are restrained by practical considerations. You might feel as if making a personal sacrifice will prevent you from manifesting your dreams. But instead of being disappointed if reality falls short of your expectations, look for undiscovered opportunities that accompany the unexpected changes. There are more options than you can imagine if you remain open to the abundance of the universe.

Your daydreams are so distracting today that you might easily overlook pertinent information required to make an informed decision. Successful strategies to combat your fuzzy thinking include asking questions and remembering to read every word before signing on the dotted line. If you're not careful, you could be swayed by someone's charming presentation now. You may be sorely disappointed if you just assume that everything will work out for the best. Gathering all the facts before making your move is your safest bet.

Your love life is a conundrum today because flirty Venus is playing with your heart while nebulous Neptune clouds your judgment. Someone may enchant you now as your imagination turns a frog into a prince or princess in your dreams. It's all rainbows and unicorns until you wake up and have to manage everything the way it is in reality rather than how you envisioned it in your fantasies. Follow your heart but don't get lost along the way.

You might be in for a rather frustrating day if you believe that you must maintain tight control in a relationship. But once you have your first confrontation with a friend or partner, your illusions will dissipate quickly like clouds after a storm. Asking someone else to lead for a while lessens the pressure and allows you to enjoy yourself without having to micromanage every detail. Accepting that others have just as much to bring to the table as you makes all the difference in the world.

You prefer seeking the elusive perfection of beauty than dealing with mundane reality. Although fulfilling your responsibilities can be challenging today, you can't leave your chores undone for another day. Your ruling planet Venus brings you a lovely image to play with now, but it's slightly out of focus as she duels with mystical Neptune. Thankfully, once your work is finished you can drift off into dreamland without any interruptions or guilt.

A solution to a stressful dilemma may not be forthcoming today, but part of the problem is that you won't receive useful answers until you can formulate clear questions. Take some quiet time away from your current obligations to untangle your thoughts. Once you've established a logical starting point, the rest of the process will be much easier. Patience is a virtue, especially when it comes to matters of the heart.

Even if you're dealing with the same confusing issues as yesterday, they might not appear to bother you as much today. However, just beneath your life-is-wonderful veneer, stresses are still at work. Don't waste precious energy trying to make your life look better than it actually is. Once others see that you have problems just like them, they'll be more inclined to interact with you on a personal level. Expressing the truth reveals your vulnerability and paves a path for  authentic relationships.

You might not know where to begin today if someone questions your integrity. Defending your position is challenging when the validity of your assumptions is uncertain and you don't have any specific evidence to back them up. Unfortunately, the more you argue your point, the greater the gulf grows between you and others. Forget about talking your way through this predicament now; let your actions speak for themselves.

Just when you thought everything was perfect, a close friend brings a missing fact to your attention today, reminding you that you are not seeing things in a clear light. Although you might slip into a downward spiral if you temporarily lose your center, you can pull yourself out of a nose dive as quickly as it began with a little positive self-affirmation. Readjust your thinking and widen your perspective to integrate the new information into your overall strategy. There's no reason to contract out of fear; spread your wings and fly.

Keeping your impulses in check is nearly impossible today, especially if someone is tempting you to climb out on a limb and express your feelings. But your partner or a friend could lay down some rules now that won't easily let you off the hook. Instead of striking out because you're afraid of rejection, face your fears before you experience a relationship crisis. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

Cleaning house (literally or figuratively) makes perfect sense today while energetic Mars joins visionary Jupiter in your 6th House of Details. You have a crystal clear idea of what you want to accomplish and possess the stamina to get things done now. However, you must take a big job and break it down into smaller manageable pieces in order to be efficient. Don't bite off more than you can chew or you'll be tired at the end of the day with little to show for your exemplary efforts. Making a sustainable plan sets you up for success.

A new idea captures your imagination today, but you won't necessarily put enough effort into making your vision come true. It's not that you're avoiding hard work now; it's just your common sense could overrule your initial excitement. Remember, your plan deserves enough time to simmer and marinate before you prematurely rush into action or discard it entirely. If your strategy is as brilliant as you think it is, it's worth investing your resources to see where it leads. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Although you usually thrive on being in the center of the action, you may actually reach an exhaustion point from all the social buzz today. Knowing when you have had enough is a sign of maturity, but setting limits can be a serious challenge. Acknowledge your fear of missing out on something special, but call it quits before your head starts to hurt. Rest and relaxation is the necessary prescription for the day; if you carefully follow the doctor's orders, tomorrow you will wake up with a fresh outlook on life.

Your current optimism could inspire you to make ambitious plans to accomplish your career goals. However, your unbridled enthusiasm immediately impacts your social activities today as your professional confidence spills over into your personal life. Fortunately, if you have earned the respect of those you love, they will be eager to follow your lead. Don't waste time asking questions now; it's your turn to take charge and show everyone you're the boss.

You can burn off excess energy easily today by doing something physical such as sweating at the gym or hiking a nearby trail. But it' also essential to stretch the muscles of your mind now by learning something new. Your mental appetite may be satisfied by passionately discussing an unique course of study with a friend, or perhaps doing research of your own involving topics of religion, metaphysics or politics. Whatever you choose to do now, going the distance will be far more rewarding than staying on familiar ground.

Your exuberance might lead you into the danger zone if you don't find a way to contain your confidence today. The combustible power of the Mars-Jupiter conjunction in your sign may be enough to blast you into orbit, but you could deplete your energy reserves too fast, leaving you to crash back to Earth with a painful thud. Remember, too much of a good thing isn't always good. Anything you can do to soothe your soul or settle your nerves will help you to make the most of this memorable time.

Your obsessive interest in getting to the bottom of a mystery might be a bit too intense for everyone else today. You want answers and you are prepared to ask whatever questions are necessary to find the missing pieces of the puzzle. However, your insatiable curiosity could seem confrontational now, even if that's not your intention. Be as transparent as possible so your actions are not misunderstood. You'll make more progress in your search for the truth if you don't push so hard.

Your friends may be so outrageously optimistic that you think they have gone slightly mad. At first it's fun being around exuberant people who are on a mission to do something out of the ordinary today. Unfortunately, you suddenly realize that you might be the only one who is willing to issue a reality check. However, don't try to change their plans by raining on their parade. All you have to do is be clear about the limits of your participation. Paradoxically, you can be a positive role model now by being brave enough to say no. A true leader knows when enough is enough.

Fun-filled activities can put a happy smile on your face now if you simply remember to moderate your natural inclination for bigger, better and more. You could get into trouble by taking a good idea and turning it into such a huge deal today that it eventually fizzles. Although you might believe you're being quite rational as you map out the future, your perspective is skewed by the conjunction of red-hot Mars and giant Jupiter. You can't do everything you imagine, but as long as your heart is in the right place, you can accomplish Herculean feats.

As much as you may love spending the day at home with your family, too much domestic bliss might have you dreaming about ways to escape today. It's not that you long to be somewhere else; it's just that you don't like giving up an entire day without having something tangible to show for it. Try motivating others to participate in some sort of home improvement project. If they seem more interested in goofing around now, join in the frivolity for a bit and then excuse yourself so you can create something beautiful on your own.

You are buzzing around like a busy bee today, flitting from one flower to the next in a field filled with beautiful distractions. In fact, there are so many exciting possibilities to explore, you might feel a bit lost because you don't know where to start or what to do next. However, there's no reason to hold back for appearance's sake; just dive in and indulge like a kid in a candy store with no one watching. Act now, analyze later.

Relationships are going your way now, as long as you don't try to put your partner into a box. The expansive Mars-Jupiter conjunction widens your 7th House of Others, surprising you with the amount of love and support you could receive if you're accepting of its many various shapes and colors. However, you might inadvertently cut yourself off from the emotional goodies if your expectations are too specific today. A grateful heart is a powerful heart.

Relationships hold great potential now, but only if you remember that you're seeing everything through a subjective filter. Distinguishing your dreams from the actual events in your life may be more complicated than you realize today. You don't have the whole picture yet, so don't make any promises you will regret later. Ask questions and listen closely to the answers, but don't miss the unspoken messages in between the words. Making a commitment is wise only after you have a solid grip on the current dynamics.

You start out the day with so many choices that you could feel slightly lost. In fact, sorting out all the possibilities may be so overwhelming that you throw your hands up in the air and walk away in frustration. You might even set aside the facts in favor of pursuing your desires today. Ironically, this ill-conceived strategy can actually work for you now as long as you remember that you still must contend with reality sooner or later. In the meantime, following the vagaries of your imagination could prove to be an amazing journey on its own.

Although you're able to put your faith in a friend or partner today, it takes more than one person's optimism to get you through the day. An emotional drama can become quite convoluted, especially if someone's feelings contradict yours. The good news is you don't have to agree on every issue; instead of focusing on the differences, concentrate on the similarities. All it takes to successfully sidestep an unnecessary conflict is to share a common dream and give others the benefit of the doubt.

Even if you are feeling under the weather today, you can still rely on your performance skills to successfully execute your agenda. Imagine reaching your goal and then discuss your vision with others as realistically as possible. Painting the details of your plan in your mind's eye helps you get started but you must take the next step and verbalize your ambitious ideas to launch your dream. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

You might be pleasantly distracted by a flirtatious encounter today. However, confusion stems from your inability to untangle your desires from the reality of the interaction. It's nearly impossible now to tell where the hard edges of truth crumble into the creative fabrications of your imagination. There's no harm in a little romance as long as no one's feelings get hurt, including yours. Wait for clarification from someone you trust before you hand over your heart to the wrong person.

Let go of the smallest details today because they will not matter much in the long run. Try to loosen your grip on your daily routine; going along with the flow can have an immediate beneficial effect on your self-esteem. An authoritative approach naturally invites backlash. However, a hands-off style prompts your friends to be more encouraging of your goals, which increases your optimism. You can enrich your experiences now by allowing the energy to unfold without micromanaging each and every moment.

Your artistic creativity may be soaring to great heights now, but you must consciously stretch to reach for your vision with all your heart. However, even if you're not aesthetically inclined, you can still use your charm to get what you want today. Tread carefully and pay attention to the feedback you receive from those who have your best interests at heart. Don't assume that others share your dream until they tell you their true feelings. Figuring out your next move will be a piece of cake once you know where everyone else stands.

You are standing at the threshold of a dream now, but you can't tell where it will ultimately carry you. Subconscious streams of messages are flowing into awareness and you might wish to act quickly on what you envision. But this isn't the time to just ride the currents of your imagination. Practice controlling your mind so you can take your creativity to the next level. Keep your thoughts on track and turn today's fantasies into tomorrow's reality.

You may be confused about what's true today. Your smartest strategy is to suspend judgment now if you cannot tell what is real. Just accept your perceptions as you would if they were scenes in a movie, without feeling any emotional attachment. The bad news is hasty decisions you make might have to be reconsidered in just a few days. Wait until reality sets you gently back on the ground before choosing your new direction. In the meantime, color your world any way you want.

Your contributions around the home are acknowledged by those close to you today, even if you aren't working very hard. Ironically, being appreciated for your extra efforts presents a problem if you don't think you deserve the recognition. Meanwhile, your current positive attitude tempts you to overextend your reach, especially if everything is looking rosy. Remember, it's more important to conserve what you have now rather than dreaming about your achievements in the future. Counting your blessings is always a good place to start.

Your mind is roaming to the distant edges of your imagination today, dreaming of exotic lands and traveling to other galaxies. Luckily, there's no reason to deny your desires since you are hearing the call of a great adventure -- and this is a perfect time to respond. Extrapolate on your most fantastic thoughts and use them to write the next chapter in your life. Mystical Poet William Blake wrote, "What is now proved was once only imagined."

You may be feeling pressured to let go of an impossible dream today, but it's tempting to hold on to your sweet fantasy no matter what anyone else says. Nevertheless, you might suddenly waver and conclude that a more practical approach will serve you better. However, anything is possible now, and your visions could actually begin to materialize if you accept them as real. Don't sell yourself short; even if you run into resistance, imagination rules. Master Michelangelo extolled, "Faith in oneself is the best and safest course."

You have a lot of chores to finish today and your responsible attitude carries over past normal business hours. Your current priority is to demonstrate your efficiency to others, so list all your tasks and stay focused until you make a serious dent in your work. Channel your stress into action by striving to tie up any loose ends now. Don't delay because your reservoir of energy could dissipate later in the week. Your willingness to put in overtime shows your commitment to getting the job done.

You might sense a growing resistance from a close friend today, but you're not in the mood for conflict and confrontation. Nevertheless, people seem emotionally distant now as roadblocks appear to delay your satisfaction. Thankfully, there's no point in getting your knickers in a twist because the tension will settle on its own. Instead, concentrate on the love that is already in your life; celebrating the glass being half-full is a much healthier strategy than complaining that it's half-empty.

Your greatest worry is that you can't pursue every curiosity that catches your eye today. However, your time and energy are limited by circumstances beyond your control. This temporary situation prevents you from being as footloose and fancy-free as you prefer. However, significant changes are occurring in your private inner world despite your current frustration. Don't stand in your own way of progress even if you're not clear where your choices will lead. Trusting the universe is the fastest way to find the silver linings in the clouds above your head.

Your emotional neediness could block your access to satisfaction, since it's not likely that others will meet your expectations now. But this imbalance isn't as bad as it might sound once you realize the real lesson is about learning what you can do for yourself. If you're already in a close partnership, you may need to back off a bit to allow everyone involved more breathing room. Fortunately, this exercise in self-sufficiency can help you clearly define what you want from a relationship if you're willing to let go and follow your heart.

It seems as if your life is finally settling down to a comfortable pace, but this optimistic assessment may be slightly premature. Even if you can see positive change at work today, there are unexpected twists and turns on your chosen path. Be smart and prepare for whatever you might find once you get around the next bend in the road. Your ability to analyze the facts and decide what is most critical now will help you navigate this transformative phase with flying colors.

Some people believe that the highest form of creativity originates only from the wellsprings of inspiration. However, the source of your current creative streak may be triggered by your pressing desire to finish a project now. Happily, you possess the ability to transform your professional ambitions and romantic urges into practical manifestations. Be certain that whatever endeavor you undertake today is done with a greater purpose in mind; your word is your wand.

Unresolved family issues work their way to the surface today, even if you attempt to remain as cool as a cucumber. But an unexpected disruption to your routine might not be the worst thing if it puts you in touch with buried emotions. Resisting the natural flow of your feelings is unnecessary now, even if it creates temporary discomfort or interrupts your productivity. Increasing your awareness facilitates positive change that may already be overdue. Metamorphosis happens if you're willing to explore your heart.

Two very different issues may require your attention now. On one hand, you're redefining your boundaries, and this emotional process might intensify your isolation for a while. But on the other hand, a parade of amazing revelations prevents you from sinking into self-pity. You're too amused by the soap opera that is your life to take things seriously today. Examine your world with an objective eye while you have the chance; cultivating emotional detachment encourages personal growth.

Although your optimism is a powerful motivational tool at times, your confidence can get in the way of your success today. If your healthy self-esteem is presently faltering, make a pact with yourself to intentionally travel to the depths of your subconscious. Decide what's most valuable and then return to the surface refreshed and ready to work for what you want. A treasure from the underworld contains magic and can be catalytic on your journey of self-transformation.

Your first inclination when waves of intense feelings begin to wash over you today is to reinforce your tide walls to halt the flow of emotions. You may be afraid that your powerful moods could destabilize your personal world in ways that aren't easy to manage. However, the more you constrain your irrational side now, the greater the probability of unwanted changes. Relax your resistance and trust your intuition to teach you how to navigate the murky waters of your heart.

Someone may be trying to manipulate your behavior today, yet you don't have enough information at your disposal to fight off the apparent threat. There are still hidden pieces to the puzzle and it's difficult to defend against an unseen enemy. Rather than shadow boxing, it's more productive to maintain familiar routines for a while longer. The truth becomes clear soon enough, and there will still be time to act when it does. Patience is your best friend now; proceed slowly and with great intent.

Although you're unable to express yourself freely  today, ironically, this emotional restraint works in your favor. Fortunately, your social connections stabilize your reactions as your peers help you keep your cool in the midst of a storm. You realize that you could inadvertently offend the people who mean the most to you by sharing whatever crosses your mind now. Heed the words of Thumper, "If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all." Exercising your right to remain silent is the key to your current interpersonal success.

You may breathe a sigh of relief today because it seems like recent tensions are beginning to subside. Although there are positive signs that make you smile, you won't likely get the full resolution you seek. You're not in an optimal position to make significant progress but, at least, you're growing more confident about the future. There's nothing to be gained by being overly ambitious now; just hold your ground and wait for a clear signal before moving forward. Timing is everything.

You're happily surprised by how quickly things change today as you're catapulted out of your regular routine and shot into a new orbit. Although the quirky Aquarius Moon might not bring emotional comfort, it sounds a loud wake-up call to remind you of the radical ideas you set aside recently in your quest to fit in. Your fan base is solid now, so you really don't have anything to lose. Thinking outside of the box will be instrumental to your future success.

Oddly enough, your growing sense of freedom may relieve your need to rebel against the status quo. Although you don't feel as independent as you wish, at least some restrictions appear to be lifting now. But don't spoil your opportunity to be productive by frittering away your precious time. Stay as focused as you were when you were under pressure and you might just accomplish more than you ever thought possible. Demonstrating your willingness to work hard earns you extra brownie points.

The slow pace of change might not be speedy enough for you today. You are acutely aware of how far you have already traveled on your journey, but there's still a huge gulf between where you are now and where you want to be in the future. However, there's no point in dwelling on your limitations. Instead of constantly comparing your current progress to your beautiful dreams, just concentrate on the task right in front of your nose. Inch by inch it's a cinch; yard by yard, it's hard.

Unexpressed feelings cultivate unrest in your life, but you can't seem to find the real source of the problem. Paradoxically, the closer you get to the truth, the more obscured the answer becomes today. Although it may be wise to dig deep on other occasions, this isn't one of them. Leave the sleeping mysteries alone while you redirect your attention to those things that are most obvious. For now, what you don't know can't hurt you. Save your impressive roar for another day.

So much has happened in your life over the past few months, yet you might not be able to see the ramifications of the changes yet. Although the transition continues to evolve slower than you wish, your life is undergoing a subtle-but-total transformation. Instead of ruminating over your past mistakes, focus on small tasks that you can start and finish in a day. Rather than working harder, work smarter. Consider yourself a diamond in the rough; don't let any criticism get in the way of your ultimate success.

Instead of stressing over a recent lost opportunity, try a more radical solution to your woes, like letting go and trusting the universe. Ironically, taking a well-deserved break may carry you further toward success now than if you push relentlessly ahead. It's essential to revitalize your creativity and reestablish your center. Don't be concerned if you aren't very productive today; it could take several more days to generate the results you want. Good things come to those who wait.

You might want to disconnect from your emotional roots today because you don't want anyone to perceive you as being overly needy. You can outwardly demonstrate an apparent aloofness so no one suspects that you're actually feeling quite vulnerable now. However, your reverse psychology could backfire by amplifying your sense of alienation and deepening your sorrow. You must take a risk if you want to break an old pattern based on mistrust and secrecy. Sharing your truth with someone you trust helps to heal your heart.

Unfinished projects continue to pile up at work, yet you could find time today to play a bit of catch-up. You might give yourself the luxury of relaxing later if you can stay on task during the day. But there is simply too much going on for you to check out completely. It may help to create a detailed list of everything you want to accomplish and then cross the items off one at a time. Believe it or not, the satisfaction you gain from a job well done is more gratifying now than any transient pleasures.

A highly productive morning goes a long way to ease the current pressure in your life. But slacking off before you do your chores is not your modus operandi, especially when there are so many people counting on you. Get down to work instead of wasting time replaying your recent accomplishments or fretting about missed deadlines. Just tie up as many loose ends as possible to fully prepare for the busy week ahead. The more you finish now, the more reason you have to celebrate later.

You could grow quite weary and discouraged today, if all of your hard work hasn't yet paid off. However, you may have already made more headway than you realize, since the moody Moon's shift into your sign might color your perceptions with doubt or deception. But don't shut down your awareness even if you want to escape from your feelings. Your negativity will fade if you put your emotions into a healthy perspective. Your sense of humor can be your saving grace if you are willing to laugh at yourself as much as others.

Although today may be a harbinger of exciting new beginnings, the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Endings also brings good fortune if you're willing to reflect on the past. But don't get too hooked by the mundane world or you could miss the intuitive inspiration that's bubbling up from your subconscious. There are unseen forces at work now and your subtle impressions can be instrumental for successfully guiding you through the major changes ahead.

A recent event may have unexpectedly triggered emotions that influence what you expect from your friends. However, something is brewing today that isn't obvious, and in the typical style of the Ram you just charge headlong into the situation without even stopping to think. Luckily, a sudden change of plans could lead to a win-win outcome if you can place the greater good of the community ahead of your own personal needs. Your quickest path to success is found by making others happy now.

You might be entangled in a complicated situation at work and speaking the truth won't make your life any easier today. Even if you can rationalize your desires with the best of intentions, you may still feel more comfortable if you temporarily suppress your emotions and follow a more practical course of action now. Sometimes direct confrontation is effective; other times, it's best to let sleeping dogs lie. Fly beneath the radar as long as it's feasible; better safe than sorry.

Your dreams have a chance to become real today, so don't squander this surprising opportunity by fixating on unattainable goals. The Aquarius Moon's presence in your 9th House of Adventure may give you an irrepressible case of restlessness. Fortunately, you could effectively use this cosmic energy to plan a quick getaway or a fabulous trip to a distant place. Pack your bags and pick a destination because you might just find yourself on the road for business or pleasure before you know it.

You like the idea of being amongst your peers today, even if you actually prefer to be alone. Ironically, your paradoxical thinking could quickly grow annoying to everyone else. On one hand, you want to sink into your feelings and wallow around in the recesses of your imagination. But you also want to enjoy the camaraderie of your friends and benefit from their wisdom. Don't try to resolve this inner contradiction now. Your current detachment will reward you with the inner clarity that you seek. Save your social networking until you're in the mood.

The conflict between your desire to get ahead professionally and your attachment to a personal relationship creates a minor dilemma today. You may find yourself in a tense situation where contradictory demands are being placed on you, but an emotional response might be inappropriate. Instead of making a scene, keep a tight lid on your feelings until you are alone. Maintaining a stable and steady outward appearance now cultivates peace and puts you on the path to resolution.

You're naturally quite adept at sorting through all the information and determining the most efficient route to get the job done. However, organizing your thoughts is more challenging now, especially since your perspective is distorted by your obsession with the details. At first, you believe you know the solution and act accordingly; but then you may wonder if you moved too soon. Don't declare your final answer just yet; instead, relax and allow the process to work out on its own.

The energetic imbalance between your current experience and what you previously thought to be true is making you second guess everything you believed. However intense this stress feels today, rest assured that it's a temporary condition. Your head and your heart are at odds with each other now as you perceive a reality that's vastly different from your ideal scenario. Simply acknowledging that there are many ways to view your world multiplies your options. Open your mind; the path to your future will appear when you least expect it.

Undeniable opportunities relentlessly lure you forward, but following your calling can cause undue stress on your personal life. Several planets place energetic emphasis on resourceful Venus and bountiful Jupiter as they wander through your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. However, maintaining domestic stability is just as important when it comes to your happiness. Don't run off to pursue altruistic ambitions until you know that your feet are on the ground and your priorities are in order. Reconnecting with those closest to you gives you the wind beneath your wings.

You are a straight shooter when sharing information, but your penchant for blunt honesty has unexpected consequences. You may have recently upset a coworker by expressing what was on your mind and now you have to clean up the mess that you inadvertently created. The problem is that you meant exactly what you said and you're irritated that you have to apologize today. Take the high road for the sake of the team and consider this as a lesson learned. Stating the truth is still the best policy but don't forget to be considerate of other people's feelings along the way.

It's a good idea to slow down now to avoid a snag in your plans if you're working on a creative project. Luckily, you can see the potential trouble before it rears its ugly head and adopting a more deliberate approach gives you additional time to solve the problem in advance. But don't give up on your vision when your clarity is so sharp; just regroup and acclimate to the new dynamics before pushing forward. Keeping your current inspiration alive is the key to your soul's satisfaction.

Although your ingenuity is in full bloom now, you can become overly fixated on executing your plan exactly as you see it in your mind's eye. Unfortunately, you may be tempted to dig in your heels today, even when the current circumstances are begging for an entirely new strategy. Ironically, greater flexibility in your thinking ultimately strengthens your position rather than weakening it. Being willing to modify your agenda doesn't necessarily mean changing your goals. Let your cool logic save you from yourself.

It appears that you can effectively communicate your needs today, but there is a churning turmoil within your heart that no one knows anything about. You may experience conflicting desires now, and are clueless on how to express them diplomatically. Honestly, you could benefit from a bit of solitude so you have the time to quietly sit with your own thoughts. You can turn your ideas into the right words once you get in touch with your feelings. Journey within before reaching out.

Nothing is to be gained by letting your anger distract you from what you need to say today. Even if your discomfort seems to be approaching a flash point, you don't have to automatically throw a burning match into the emotional tinder. The current situation is crazy enough without you adding to the volatility. Bite your tongue, take a few deep breaths and put on a happy face. Then, state your case as gently as possible. Remaining calm, cool and collected enables you to deliver your message with the greatest impact.

You're tempted to take risks today that you might normally never consider. It's nearly impossible to contain your energy while steady Saturn is at odds with unstable Uranus. You're uncharacteristically restless and may even be on the prowl for mischief. Acknowledging the intensity of your desires now empowers you to handle them with grace and maturity; denying your feelings only causes them to grow stronger. Strive to be unconventional without turning your life upside down in the process.

You could be in for quite a wonderful surprise today as something totally unexpected grabs your attention. However, don't move too fast if you feel a knot in the bottom of your stomach. What you see is not the whole story and trusting your intuition can save you from yourself. Ultimately, it's not a good idea to take the bait unless you are ready to go on a ride to points unknown. Stop moving for a minute, block out the noise and re-establish your center. The answer will be crystal clear once you listen to your heart.

You're obsessed with your ambitions today and already have a serious plan in mind to reach your goals. However, expressing your needs up front may be out of character for you. Even if you tend to be shy, you currently have the potential to rattle everyone's cage by acting impulsively. Don't spend too much energy resisting if your emotions are carrying you into new territory. A wonderful experience might be just around the next bend if you have the courage to take a leap of faith and go there.

Think twice before jumping into a new friendship or partnership today. Unfortunately, it may be tricky to see how deep the water actually is from your current vantage point on the shore. Even if you're an accomplished swimmer, the emotional currents can shift quickly now, making it challenging to predict which direction you're heading. Luckily, you could build a strong foundation for a relationship if you just remember to proceed with caution when sharing your heart. Dipping your toe in the shallow end to test the temperature is a good place to start.

You long to express your ambitions creatively today, but it can be a scary proposition if you feel threatened by someone's harsh criticism. You might believe you're being unnecessarily singled out, yet your immediate reaction may be overstated. Fortunately, you're in a much stronger position now than you think and there's no need to defend your motives or fight back with your sharp tongue. Just follow your original plan and others will applaud when they see you in action. The proof is in the pudding.

Although you may be feeling on edge today because everyone is busy pursuing their own interests, you have a natural ability to cope gracefully as the airy Aquarius Moon harmonizes with the Sun in peace-seeking Libra. Nevertheless, people might act irresponsibly when it comes to meeting their obligations; thankfully, you're repeatedly able to reestablish your balance with ease. Don't be afraid to make an important decision now, even if you wish you could keep your options open longer. Whether or not you can rely on anyone else, your instincts will lead you in the right direction.

You wish you could fast-forward reality to get through this rocky part of your journey. However, your life is in better shape now than you realize, even if you're having trouble shaking off free-floating anxiety. It's just that you crave more emotional stability and the current uncertainty may trigger unusual feelings of helplessness or fear today. It's understandable to feel uneasy when your relationships or finances are in transition. Thankfully, focusing on the myriad of possibilities ahead enables you to be more positive in the present moment.

Your social life is in the midst of turmoil today, yet your inner voice continues to quietly sing, "Everything's going to be alright." Unfortunately, you may be strangely reluctant to listen to your optimistic instincts when it comes to your relationships. However, circumstances could spiral out of control if you allow yourself to lose hope. Maintain your spiritual equilibrium now; the strength of your convictions will gently lead you through the maze of confusion. Success is yours as long as you keep the faith.

You are deeply committed to the long haul when it comes to your career. Obstacles that pop up in your path only increase your resolve to succeed. But you may wonder now if you made a bad decision along the way, especially if you're not climbing the proverbial ladder as fast as you expected. Nevertheless, continue your disciplined approach to your daily routine without making major adjustments today; your sincere efforts will begin to bear fruit very soon. Perseverance is your secret to success.

It seems as if lightning is striking all around you, yet you're not in any immediate danger now. Remain emotionally available in your relationships, even if you feel the impulse to isolate yourself from others. Ultimately, your security derives from facing your fears about being alone. All you need to do is accept the current ambiguity along with your independence. There's no reason to fix anything today; just enjoy the electricity in the air and do your best to stay out of trouble.

You might try to shirk off the responsibility for your current situation, but it's not helpful to blame the crisis of the moment on external circumstances. There's a lot more going on than anyone realizes; it's just that you may not know which feelings to trust. Rather than looking to someone else for your answers, tap into your inner fountain of wisdom. Let your emotions come and go without attachment. When you can find your peace in the calm eye of the hurricane, the storm will quickly pass.

It's a wizardly day, overflowing with the potential of magic. However, you must be willing to surrender to unseen forces if you want to benefit from this cosmic collaboration. Your spells and enchantments can cook up an intense emotional feast, but it may prove impossible to control the menu once you begin. The real power is found when you set aside your original recipe and follow your intuition. Dance with the unknown and you will not fail to impress even the most cynical of your critics.

You are quite single-minded when it comes to pursuing pleasure today as sensual Venus hooks up with unrelenting Pluto. Your feelings are so intense that you might not know how to keep your cool as you try to contain your emotions. Everything seems to assume cosmic proportions now, yet you may not want to say anything at all because you believe that your words will only get you into more trouble. It's okay to remain quiet as long as you are still willing to remain in touch with your heart.

Reality can hit you hard today and you might not know whether to be ecstatic or afraid. Rest assured that both emotions are likely appropriate responses, even if they seem to be mutually exclusive. The planetary currents are pulling you into deep emotional waters and you can't use your normal intellectual tools to stay on course. In fact, you may reach a point where you simply give up trying to figure out what to do next. Once you accept that your feelings don't need to be fixed, anything is possible.

Your strong convictions empower your actions and speech as long as you express yourself authentically. You Crabs are more sensitive to the shifting emotional tides than most people realize. As the currents build now, you might be prompted to act on a primal instinct. Although a swift decision may be your best move, make sure you aren't initiating unnecessary changes based upon your fears or you could inadvertently turn them into reality. No matter what the question is, love is the only answer.

Your powerful romantic desires surprise you today, because they may not be as bright and cheery as you normally entertain. The sunshine is hiding behind the clouds, blocking your natural light. You might even feel emotionally overwhelmed, which can elicit anxiety over the littlest of things. Remember, there's no need to share all of your feelings now. Consciously choose to settle your energy with a simple statement of intention. Stay calm by traveling to your internal happy place, even if you are scared. With the right motivation, you can wait this storm out and emerge stronger than ever.

Don't even bother attempting to keep up the image of a neat and tidy Virgo as your tightly-wound emotions begin to unravel today. A minor tropical depression is being upgraded into a full-blown hurricane, complete with powerful waves of passion that can overpower your analytical walls of containment. The truth is this storm could prove to be a memorable experience, stirring up enough feelings to remind you of the complexities of your heart. Put on your rain boots and don't be afraid to get wet.

The more immersed you are in the details today, the less you seem to know. Instead of sorting through all the facts about so many people, places and things, let your feelings take over the helm. You won't get pretty images, meaningless chatter or random interactions while your key planet Venus receives her instructions from survival-oriented Pluto. Abandon intellectual restraint and act on what you desire, rather than what others expect. If you want profundity and passion in your life now, all you need to do is ask.

You grow weary today when the cosmos just keeps handing you the same old line. Romantic Venus harmonizes with your key planet Pluto, motivating you to take a calculated risk in order to achieve the emotional satisfaction you seek. Travel to the depths; then go even deeper. Feel it all, the love and the pain. You already know that your thoughts are merely a distraction from the desires of heart. A magical metamorphosis is close at hand if you believe in yourself as much as you believe in your dreams.

Although these may be uncertain times, filled with potential hazards, you're quite hopeful about your professional trajectory today. Your determination is admirable; you're ready to knuckle down and take your work more seriously than ever. Take time out from your busy schedule to reconstruct the last few weeks in your mind and then consciously project your positive intentions forward. You're standing at a powerful threshold now, and whatever aspirations you set into motion will have a long-lasting impact.

Although you're obsessed with fulfilling your obligations today, it's smart to step back and spend time mapping out your plans for next year. But remember, reality is not what it appears to be; your attitude determines what you perceive. The current changes can be quite dramatic, especially if you are inclined to resist the inevitable. But don't be afraid of going on a spiritual journey as you explore your attractions and desires. The future is what you make it.

Maintaining a comfortable level of emotional detachment can be an uphill battle today. You long to share your feelings, but may be afraid of exposing your vulnerability for fear of rejection. This approach-avoidance conflict raises long-standing relationship issues. Be patient; you won't receive answers to all your questions right away. You are engaged in a profound emotional dance that invites reality to lead, whether you know it or not. You will end up with a great story to tell if you trust your heart and move with the music.

You may not be in the mood to play around because you have more urgent relationship business to attend to now. Your heart is open wide and you don't want to miss an opportunity to engage your passions while magnetic Venus in your 7th House of Others trines powerful Pluto. Nevertheless, there's also an inescapable gnawing fear of the unknown. Don't try to talk yourself out of this journey. Fortune favors the bold.

You may try to hide from the spotlight today because you feel like you have more freedom if you are not in plain view. It's not that you are afraid of being seen; it's just you're uncertain about your direction now and you want enough time to contemplate your options before others start chiming in with their opinions. Unfortunately, the feedback you receive from even well-meaning friends could pull you off course. Resist the urge to spill the beans for another day or two so you can develop your ideas on your own. Your independent nature and enterprising spirit serve you well.

You might experience a sudden change of heart today, leaving you with the urge to shout your feelings from the rooftop. Ironically, your passionate declaration can actually hide your immediate intentions rather than express them. You must pay attention to how someone might misinterpret your words, since the meaning could get lost in your current idealism. Keep in mind that most people don't want to be dragged into your internal process. It doesn't make sense to indiscriminately tell everyone your news; save your personal sentiments for your closest supporters who know you better than anyone else.

You aren't easily lured off track today because you are willing to adapt to the needs of others without losing sight of your own goals. Nevertheless, your desire to make everyone happy might be misunderstood now. Don't waste time explaining your motives if anyone suggests that your flexibility is a sign of weakness. In fact, you demonstrate your strength best when you bend in the breeze like a supple willow tree while holding onto your position with confidence.

Telling others what you want is complicated, even when you're in touch with your feelings. You aren't interested in showing your vulnerability now because of how much energy it takes to protect your heart. However, you probably have less to defend than you think, especially if you are speaking to a friendly audience. Although there's no need to say too much in public today, don't put up unnecessary walls with those who are your biggest fans. Knowing who you can trust is key to your happiness.

Although your fantasies are irresistibly captivating today, you're still searching for a more balanced approach to your life. The surreal Pisces Moon might entangle you in the magic of your dreams, but you need to snap back to reality when the reverie ends. Nothing can prevent you from cherishing your beautiful illusions, even if you must be present in the here and now. Dancing in both worlds inspires you to do your best work.

On one hand, you intrinsically know that others depend on you to be the most responsible person in the room, and you're eager to meet their expectations. But on the other hand, you're itching for a bit of excitement and yearn to take an uncharacteristic risk today. Although there's no immediate danger, it still makes sense to double-check the facts before doing anything you will soon regret. Exercising a little caution at the right moment paves the way for a safe and amazing adventure.

It's a fantastic day to lose yourself in a romantic fairy tale or to tap into your creative powers. Luckily, you may be magically inspired by your relationship with someone special today. Although you might have a lovely time in the imaginative realms, your thoughts could also manifest in the real world. Nevertheless, don't be sad if reality doesn't match your idyllic expectations. Finding small ways to incorporate your dreams into your daily life sets the tone for a brighter future.

You're feeling picky about your social activities today because you don't want to waste precious time. Nevertheless, you might accept an enticing invitation if you can limit your involvement. Unfortunately, circumstances beyond your control may turn a minor commitment into a major drama. Instead of trying to stuff things back in the box, it's best to just breathe and allow events to play out on their own. Don't panic; you can reclaim your personal space once everything quiets down. Knowing when to go with the flow is your secret to successfully weathering the storm.

Although playtime is a top priority today, don't overdo it or you could miss out on an extraordinary opportunity for personal growth. Instead of dutifully fulfilling your family obligations, change your attitude so you can enjoy yourself, even if you don't get to have as much fun as you want. However, The emotional Pisces Moon sensitizes your 4th House of Emotional Roots, rewarding you for creating time for introspection. Recovering hidden treasure from the recesses of your subconscious is a cause worthy of pursuit.

You might accomplish a lot around the house today, but it's not the relaxing day you had in mind. Part of the problem is you have this nagging thought that you're forgetting something important. Paradoxically, this nervous energy isn't dependent on your level of productivity, so don't base your emotional security on the expectations of the outer world. If you can find joy in each little achievement, you will be happy no matter what circumstances you face. Your confidence must come from within.

It's a wonderful time to reconnect with your soul's purpose if you don't have to handle too many interpersonal dynamics. The cosmic energy is working in your favor now, but you might wonder if you really deserve everything you receive while the Moon shines in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Although some of your ideas may seem to be a bit disconnected with reality, your friends will likely encourage you to follow your dreams, anyhow. If you start with the premise that anything is possible, there's a strong probability that you will find it to be true.

Discovering a new way of perceiving your talents is likely as the intuitive Pisces Moon illuminates your 1st House of Self. But it's not easy to believe in yourself now, especially if you recently doubted your role in the world. You don't have to slink off into the dark shadows today if you're unsure of your next move. Luckily, you can cultivate magic by crossing over to the sunny side of the street. Your light grows brighter when you focus on making the world a better place.

Cosmic light bulbs flash, illuminating your mind today, and you are eager to share your brilliant new ideas with anyone who will listen. You're wired for action and may be quite pleased with your own ingenuity. Unfortunately, you have an attention span of a kitten; you will likely lose interest in what you're doing before you gain traction. But don't worry if nothing comes to fruition now; your current thoughts will continue to evolve into something even better. Inspiration is alive and magic is afoot.

A spontaneous shift in your thinking could be precipitated by someone who decides to change shared plans without necessarily telling you first. This unilateral decision can be problematic because it impacts the rest of your day, too. You might be resistant to adjusting your schedule for the sake of anyone else, but it's not wise to be fixed in your ways today. Instead, demonstrate your cooperative spirit by being as accommodating as possible. You'll gain more respect if others see you as a team player who's willing to put the best interests of the group ahead of your own.

You would like to be known as a responsible person who your friends, family and community can rely on. However, you may not be fully committed to walking your talk today. Although others could have high expectations, you might not be interested in paying the price to earn the appreciation you want. Instead of wasting your time spinning idle fantasies now, show up and play your part to the best of your ability. Even if the role isn't your first choice, the rewards can still bring a surprising amount of emotional satisfaction.

You can hear the future calling your name today, and you yearn to get things rolling in that direction. But you aren't sure whether or not to take this cosmic message seriously. Rest assured this career opportunity is worth pursuing, so don't bother wondering if it's real or not. Just answer the pull of your heartstrings and explore all the possibilities. Engaging in a thought-provoking dialogue is one of the best ways to discover the next path you wish to take.

You feel connected to someone special today, only to suddenly experience an awkward distance between you for no apparent reason. Your partner's unexpected behavior could be upsetting to your heart and perplexing to your mind. Fortunately, it won't take you long to recover your balance, but you may keep your defenses up for a while to be on the safe side. It's fine to retreat a bit, but don't back up so far that you end up isolating yourself from the ones who love you the most.

You see every event as another potential escape route, but searching for a way to break out of a rut isn't enough today. Unfortunately, you might let a chance to try something new slip by without giving it a fair shot. Taking a risk sounds better than it actually is, because you believe that you will be happier if you stick to what's already familiar. Although avoiding change seems like the safer choice now, ignoring your desires could precipitate an unexpected chain of actions that you cannot control. Follow your initial instinct to shake things up a bit and let the cards fall where they may.

A sudden break in your routine catches you off guard today. At first, it may seem as if someone else's refusal to cooperate with you further complicates your day. But this twist of fate can work to your advantage by triggering your sense of independence. If nothing out of the ordinary occurs, go ahead and stir up some mischief on your own. Ultimately, something must change now and if you don't make it happen, the cosmos might just do it for you.

A burst of enthusiasm sets you into motion today, even if you feel stuck in a familiar pattern. You might attempt to initiate overdue improvements, but little will come of your efforts if you act prematurely. Waiting until you can sense that the time is right is key to your transformation. Your dedication to creating change will be rewarded with a high level of accomplishment, but it could take a few days before you fully appreciate the power of your personal evolution.

Although you may wish you could let your commitments slide today, your conscience gnaws at you, reminding you that you must do what you promised. But you might not be feeling your usual zest for life now; instead you could attempt a half-hearted effort just to get by. Unfortunately, your current detachment can create additional problems if you pretend that everything is okay when it's not. Even you Archers are entitled to an off day every now and then. Counting your blessings gently puts your life back in proper perspective.

Maintaining control over your own schedule now is unlikely if family members don't cooperate as you had hoped. Even if you're upset about your plans falling apart today, don't shift the blame to anyone else. No matter how it appears to you, no one is trying to sabotage your efforts. It might come as a surprise, but the cause of your current instability is you. Making a concerted effort to transform your inner dynamics changes external events, as if by magic. Your positive attitude generates a ripple of good vibrations that can spread far and wide.

You might not be able to turn your plans into reality because you encounter some interesting twists and turns that completely change the direction of your day. An unforeseen event could send you into an emotional tailspin if you try to cling to the past. However, this may prove to be a pivotal moment if you're ready to launch into the unknown. Rigid thinking turns small problems into larger ones; operating with an enlightened heart and an open mind makes the world a fascinating place.

Hiding your feelings is impossible while the Moon lingers in your sign. Your recent disclosure pays off today as people rally to your side. Nevertheless, your sudden emotional outburst may shock others once the Moon marches into hotheaded Aries. Don't hold back; expressing your thoughts spontaneously might be just what's needed to encourage someone else to say what's on his or her mind, too. It's up to you to take the lead by sharing your heart so everyone feels safe to follow your shining example.

You may be accustomed to the repetitive waves of energy that periodically surge through your life these days. But the Moon's current visit to your sign is another reminder of the big changes looming everywhere you turn. You are experiencing a bit of a cosmic roller-coaster ride today and could be easily overwhelmed by your emotions. Opening your heart to a friend might make you feel uncomfortable at first, but will ultimately calm your nerves and help you reestablish your center. Everyone needs someone to lean on sometimes.

Social commitments are stacking up on your calendar, making you realize that you don't have much time to spare. You may need to clarify your boundaries by saying no if you've managed to spread yourself too thin. But it's not that you're choosing to be antisocial; it's simply that you have too much on your plate. Avoid unproductive distractions now, even if you are feeling the urge to escape your obligations. Focus on your agenda and you'll be through this crunch sooner than you expect.

You want people to believe that you're eagerly embracing the future. You might even pretend that all is perfect in your world today, but you're afraid of being harshly judged if you admit to holding onto the past. Although you're usually adept at steering clear of unnecessary emotional drama, your impulsive actions could inadvertently stir up an uncomfortable level of intensity now. Being honest about your fears is the first step to resolving your insecurities. Revealing your vulnerability allows others to know the real you.

Your urge to be spontaneous could be constrained by memories of a past rejection that arise when you swing into motion. Luckily, reviewing your personal history enables you to learn from previous mistakes and push through the current resistance. No matter what happens, taking the initiative boosts your self-esteem and gives you the courage to ask for what you want. Act on your feelings instead of just experiencing them so that the universe knows you mean business.

A powerful surge of confidence inspires you to put an untried idea into definitive motion. You can do nearly anything you set your mind to while the Moon lights up your adventurous 9th House of Big Ideas. You have sufficient momentum to plan for the future, even if you haven't yet processed the unfolding dynamics of the present moment. Fortunately, you don't need to figure out everything all at once; examine all the angles while the universe works its magic on your behalf.

You're craving new experiences today, but reality is telling you to hold your horses. You may be bound to promises you made in a relationship, but something happens that reawakens your desires and re-energizes your passion for living. However, you cannot just forget about your commitments and sail off into the sunset without letting others in on your plans. It's best to make drastic changes on another day rather than turning your life upside down now and regretting it later.

Defining the line between love and codependency is particularly tricky now, especially because making other people happy comes so naturally to you. The Moon's emphasis on your 7th House of Relationships highlights how difficult it is to be completely yourself today when someone else's needs conflict with yours. Although honoring your heart might create a ripple of stress at first, it also makes you a better partner in the long run. An equal amount of give and take is essential for a happy and healthy partnership.

You're walking close to an emotional edge today, but it's wise to keep your feelings to yourself. Your patience has run out and you're on the threshold of doing something that you might later regret. There may be too much at stake to take an unnecessary risk now, so try working off your anxiety through physical exercise or hard work. You'll feel much better if you channel your nervous tension into something positive that you can be proud of at the end of the day.

You are sorely tempted to gamble with your heart because you're feeling lucky in love today. Maintaining a positive attitude is almost always a good rule to follow, but your sunny optimism might be too much of a good thing now. Putting your feelings out there won't necessarily lead to failure, but choosing a proven path improves your chances for success even more. Give others time to reflect on your disclosure; relaxing your expectations helps you avoid unnecessary disappointment. Love is a dance which can't be rushed.

Although you possess an ambitious plan to reach your goals, your foundation may be weak if you don't trust your perceptions. You might be so self-critical now that you assume you can't sustain your productivity as you move into unfamiliar territory.
