Intuitively, you know there are many ways to measure progress and not all of them matter. Your greatest satisfaction starts with a simple change in your attitude. Let go of your preconceived agenda and embrace the element of surprise.

It seems as if you're spinning around in circles without getting much done today. Thankfully, you can still meet your commitments as long as you don't throw in the towel too soon. Whether you're out running errands or just working around the house, concentrate on one task at a time. You may surprise yourself with how much you finish if you make a commitment to focus, rather than allowing yourself to be distracted by every little thing. The key to your current productivity comes from establishing priorities now and rewarding yourself with rest and relaxation later.

You are more than ready for the hectic pace of life to settle down today, but instead, you seem to face one irritating problem after another. Even if you can minimize the complications, your natural curiosity drives you to seek answers to an ever-growing list of questions. But your obsession for more information is an obstacle to your success. Fortunately, you can easily break this frustrating pattern once you realize that too many facts are almost as bad as no facts at all. Ironically, the apparent chaos was created by you and can be undone by your decision to live in the present moment.

You don't always like other people making decisions for you, but someone's interference might come as a welcome relief today. Take your cues from a trustworthy friend since he or she will steer you in the right direction. Unfortunately, your unfulfilled dreams could negatively influence your choices if you rely on your own instincts now. Just remember, heeding sound advice doesn't alleviate you of the final authority; ultimately, you're the one who must walk along the path you choose.

It bothers you to be tied to one predetermined course of action, but you're wise enough to acknowledge when something is for your own good. Swallow your pride and play the role expected of you today, especially if you want to be known as a person who follows through on your promises. Instead of rambling on about your dreams now, get busy with the work at hand. There's little time to waste; the truth is you will be judged by your accomplishments and not your words.

Everyone seems to look to you for guidance because your practical outlook is exactly what they need now. Your friends and relatives beg for your assistance because they're doing everything they can to make up for previous inefficiency. You might be in the mood to enjoy a day of rest but, nevertheless, you are still likely to help the ones you love out of a sense of obligation. There is no point in begrudgingly doing what's expected of you. Act from your heart or don't do it at all.

Family responsibilities may interfere with your ability to participate in other activities today, but you can do it all if you manage your time thoughtfully. You know that your loyalty to those you love trumps all the other items on your daily wish list, so you won't likely run out before you've done your duty. Just remember that approval from others isn't the only thing that matters, so follow your conscience when setting priorities. There's no stopping you if your actions are aligned with your heart.

Establishing a steady rhythm today enables you to accomplish much more than you ever thought possible. Adhering to a set schedule works to your advantage, even if you're planning on a day of relaxation. No matter what, don't commit to more than is feasible, for the pressure you place on yourself will make you anxious. Thankfully, others appreciate your honesty even if it's awkward at first. Your willingness to tell the truth is more important than almost anything else now.

You appear to be a pillar of stability today, even in the face of uncertainty and unrest. Your current determination to meet your obligations may win the admiration of your family and friends. But it's not about how hard you work; it's about your uncharacteristic practicality. You don't need to conjure up any brilliant ideas or perform with great expertise. All you must do is stick to the acknowledged agenda the best you can now. There will be plenty of time to wander off the beaten path later on.

Although you may be known as the champion of responsibility, your current success comes from your skill at blending your competence with a disarming emotional vulnerability. People find you extremely approachable today and are more likely to share their feelings with you. In return, you find it easy to present your softer side without sacrificing your strength. Even if you believe maintaining an air of authority is prudent, you will be happier now if you open your heart.

You might not understand all the nuances to your feelings today, but this doesn't mean that you should try to bury them. Although you're quite capable of hiding your frustrations, denying your emotions isn't a healthy strategy. It's always wise to be more conscious of your unexpressed needs before responding to any complex situation. As the anti-guru Krishnamurti proclaimed, "The highest form of human intelligence is to observe yourself without judgment."

Your assistance on an emotional cleanup team could be required today, especially if you are guilty of creating the original mess. Your recent declarations may have offended someone and now you must smooth over any feelings that were inadvertently hurt in the process. Thankfully, your determination to speak your mind with compassion sets a good example for everyone else to follow. A  heartfelt "I'm sorry" works wonders when it comes to mending fences.

You're not in total control of circumstances at work today. You could overcompensate by presenting an optimistic front, but you're not nearly as confident on the inside as you appear on the outside. Becoming more cognizant of your extreme emotions enables you to react with less fear. Although you can think on your feet better than most, it's still wiser to allow extra time for contemplation now rather than responding immediately. If your idea was good at first, it will be even better by tomorrow.

You want to share everything you feel in a big way now, but your desired level of disclosure might be too much for everyone else. Gigantic Jupiter in your 5th House of Play is pulled off center by the willful Sun, making it nearly impossible to express yourself objectively. You may claim you are protecting someone else from getting hurt, but you're also reducing the pressure on yourself. If you are going to dig in your heels about anything now, demonstrate your determination to grow from your current experiences. Communication is a two-way street.

You may not be the person who normally gets so caught up in a cause that you make a stand in public. However, you could become so attracted to a political ideology now that it plays on your need for emotional security. Luckily, if your intentions are honorable, almost nothing will be able to stop you, especially if you're willing to reveal your own shortcomings in the process. Nevertheless, possessing accurate information is absolutely crucial today, so familiarize yourself with all the issues before jumping on the bandwagon.

Surprisingly, your confidence is running on overdrive today, prompting you to believe that you can overcome nearly any obstacle. Every single invitation sounds like an exciting opportunity you simply can't refuse. However, you might say yes to so many potential adventures that you struggle to keep up with them. Good intentions only count for part of the battle; it's necessary to set sensible priorities before you even take your first step. If you attempt to do a little less, you will enjoy yourself a lot more.

Your social life gets an extra boost from the cosmos today, yet the favorable attention you receive can outlast the moment if you continue to stay true to your own values. This admirable tactic isn't about resting on your laurels or remaining stuck in place. There could be very powerful forces at work now that you don't completely understand. It's better not to confront opposition head on just yet. Have faith that your intuition will know when it's time to act and trust the universe to provide you with the answers you need.

You often excel at logically discerning what's best at each intersection of life, but this innate skill doesn't stop you from making bad decisions sometimes. Unfortunately, you may make a choice today for all the wrong reasons. Don't put your career goals ahead of personal dreams you know to be good for you. Try to keep everything in perspective now; otherwise, you will likely take on more than you can handle. If you overextend, you'll just have to go back and start all over again. Learn the art of saying no before it's too late.

Your heartfelt desire to do the right thing makes your life more complicated than you expected. However, you really don't have much of a choice when it comes to those you love. Today's Sun-Jupiter alignment tempts you to over-indulge, even if you are doing your best to avoid extremes. You need to do what resonates with your imagination now that your key planet Venus aligns with fantasy-prone Neptune. Demonstrate your courage and move confidently in the direction that you wish to go in your life.

Finding a healthy balance is nearly impossible when you're captivated by so many intriguing possibilities. Your desire to create a sense of harmony in your life is extremely strong now, but you want to entertain all of your options, nonetheless. Honestly, you don't want to miss any of the social opportunities that pop up on your radar screen today. You can't be all that surprised if the serenity you seek seems elusive. Peace and quiet will arrive sooner than you think if you don't make so much noise searching for it.

You are highly motivated to make something positive happen today. However, your ability to think big is at once your strength and your weakness now, because you may be tempted to put your efforts toward a project that is better left undone. Unfortunately, your key planet Jupiter is so out of control that you could do something foolish. Thankfully, applying a healthy dose of common sense should be enough to do the trick. You can accomplish amazing feats if you keep both feet on the ground.

You're worried about finishing everything that you accepted responsibility for doing today. But a few enticing distractions can change the landscape of your day as opportunities appear that look too good to be ignored. Normally, you can remain on track without much effort. However, your current lack of objectivity makes it difficult to determine what is most important. Keep in mind that bigger isn't always better when it comes to your plans for the future.

Harnessing the power you possess might be more challenging today than it seems. Unfortunately, you may have to venture into less-than-comfortable emotional realms to make the most of the current cosmic gifts. Although processing your feelings isn't as straightforward as untangling your thoughts, this is where your true creativity is born. Loosening your grip on the reins of rationality allows your heart to express in a more natural manner. Fly, baby, fly.

Movers and shakers enter your life now, bringing a variety of ventures to your door. Unfortunately, you might harbor an unrealistic understanding of the current potential because your confidence is as high as your expectations. But there's no need to work yourself into a frenzy if your path ahead isn't clear. You won't likely solve this particular dilemma today; luckily, the most reliable opportunities won't require an immediate answer. Be as mellow as possible and see how things develop before making a final decision.

You may grow weary of all the noise today, for it seems as though everyone has something to say. But it's not the volume of communication that bothers you; the problem is emotional conversations don't seem to move you any closer to your goals. Continuously getting things back on track is exhausting with so many interruptions. Although you naturally assume you don't have time for this level of powerful intensity, you might be in for a sweet surprise. Once you push through your resistance, a wonderful experience could be yours.

It's rather unsettling when you're trying to act professionally but don't appear to be in total control of your feelings. It's especially annoying now that people seem to infringe on your solitude with their problems. Ironically, you might be seeking something more in life today, even if you don't know what it is. Don't worry if you aren't satisfied with your current situation at work. There's no point in letting fleeting feelings determine your future when everything is in transition. Finding solace in spiritual pursuits is one way to discover your answers.

Although you might be one of the lucky ones who truly enjoy your work, stress can still plague you if your job doesn't offer you the security you need. Thankfully, the positive benefits probably outweigh your concerns of instability. Clinging to the past can prevent the next step of your future from unfolding. It's likely that your responsibilities are in flux and you'll feel more confident once you know your new direction. Fortune favors the bold.

You haven't the slightest idea which way to turn now because you can't resolve your need for emotional connection with a growing desire for independence. This unfamiliar ground can be frightening at first, since you usually feel more secure when you are in a fully committed relationship. Don't push your feelings away, even if they raise uncomfortable issues. There's no time like the present to face your fears; follow your heart wherever it leads.

You yearn for more time to spend with your family now, but you're not keen on slipping into a familiar old routine. You want to experiment with new activities or, perhaps you even hope to start a major project today. Don't rush into anything too quickly or your off-the-cuff decision will lead you astray. Take what time can be carved out of your day and enjoy hanging out with those you love without any extra expectations. Home is where the heart is.

Your frustration level may rise if someone denies you the chance to try an innovative solution to a problem at work today. Thankfully, all should turn out well if you can master the art of patience. Temporarily relaxing your agenda and accepting that things won't always go your way is your secret to success. Paradoxically, your flexible attitude might shift the dynamics completely, allowing you to execute your original plan once the dust settles. Trusting in the wisdom of the universe serves you well.

Maintaining control over your purse strings might be next to impossible today because you are overly attached to buying something that will make your heart purr with pleasure. Visualizing a variety of ways to indulge yourself is one thing, but chasing material dreams won't bring lasting satisfaction. You'll probably be much happier in the long run if you favor simplicity over anything else. Too much looking often blinds the eye that seeks but never finds.

Although your closest friends and relatives already know how intense your emotions can be, they still might not expect the abruptness at which your attitude shifts today. You could even surprise yourself as your mood wavers and you reverse your position for no apparent reason. Fortunately, there's no need for detailed explanations now; your feelings won't change just because you think you should be rational. Those who truly matter will accept you without judgment as long as your intentions are honorable and you aim from the heart.

Your colleagues look to you for inspiration because you wear your independence so proudly. At first blush, it appears as if your choices are guided by lofty ideals and well-considered philosophical truths. But it's tough to act on your beliefs when your head and your heart are not in agreement. Nevertheless, don't go silent about your observations today; sharing your personal struggles makes you even more lovable than you already are. Your vulnerability is a gift that others will cherish.

There's not much that can constrain you today, because you can see the unrealized potential in every situation. Nevertheless, you strive for a more balanced approach because you don't trust extreme emotions. But seeking moderation isn't the same as choosing based upon a personal preference. Instead of trying to maintain your objectivity now, bring your heart into the equation by asking yourself what you really want. Your willingness to be surprised by the answer may create the magic you were seeking all along.

Although the changes you once dreamed about are already under way, you could seriously doubt that you are progressing toward your goals today. Fortunately, this uncertainty is part of a natural process and will dissipate on its own over the days ahead. In the meantime, visualize what your heart desires instead of focusing on what you don't want. The power of positive thinking is stronger than just saying no because you are worried about the consequences if you say yes. Let your faith be bigger than your fear.

There are many tasks that require your undivided attention today, yet you must be ready to change direction in a moment's notice. Responding in the wrong way to an unexpected event could quickly unravel your plans. Unfortunately, the situation might grow unmanageable if you attempt to push forward with your preconceived agenda. However, dealing with a simple twist of fate won't be much of a problem at all if you remain light on your feet. Hope for the best, prepare for the worst and expect nothing.

You're eager to hitch your wagon to the nearest star today and simply hope for the best. Although you may grow discouraged, you're not ready to give up on your dreams. You believe good news is just around the next corner just waiting to override your current troubles. However, it's healthier to share your dissatisfaction now, because telling the truth can be the catalyst you need to escape the mundane realms. Shaking everything up might be enough to do the trick.

You may be surprised by the intensity of your negative reactions today, especially if you thought everything was progressing according to your plan. If you're participating in a group decision on a family matter, it might be impossible to keep your emotions hidden from everyone else. Don't bother  withholding your feelings; maintaining your integrity is more important than receiving approval from those you love. Taking the high road allows you to be compassionate while still being honest.

Expressing your personal freedom comes at a price today because you would prefer to pursue pleasure instead of meeting your professional obligations. Keep in mind that whatever you choose to do, the outcome won't be exactly what you expect. More importantly, escaping responsibilities might not be as much fun as it sounds, making it wise to postpone playtime for now. Thankfully, focusing on the practical aspects of your life provides a deeper sense of satisfaction when your work is done.

You might as well accept the fact you're going to run into some familiar obstacles today that get in the way of your personal plans. Perhaps you imagined a perfect scenario, only to find that your feelings aren't following the script in your head. Letting go of old expectations enables you to make unanticipated progress on the home front. Sometimes the scenic route, complete with detours and delays, turns out to be the road that leads to happiness.

Previously made promises must be acknowledged now, even if there are still too many pieces of the puzzle missing. Nevertheless, it's tough to know how to handle the current situation until you have all the facts at your disposal. Unfortunately, you can't get away with doing nothing today even if you're not ready to respond. The truth is you might know more than you realize. You won't go wrong if you take the time to listen to your heart. Trust your instincts when all else fails.

You're anticipating something special today, but the big news might be that nothing very exciting happens. Even if you are lucky enough to partake in pleasurable delights now, your outward response could be somewhat subdued. Unfortunately, you may pay a price for withholding your reactions and displaying an even-keeled front. Although keeping cool sounds like the safest strategy, your emotional detachment creates waves of its own. Expressing your feelings is risky business, but the potential rewards make it worthwhile.

A change in your daily routine can bring an unexpected sense of exhilaration as you are temporarily released from the drudgery of your work. Unfortunately, you may run into trouble determining your new course of action, tempting you to settle back into your regularly scheduled activities. Don't worry about what you should or shouldn't be doing today; let your heart -- and not other people's expectations -- guide your choices throughout the day.

Your intuition tells you that a creative burst of energy could turn a simple day into something special. Unfortunately, the lightning might not strike at all, leaving you emotionally deflated and confused now. Meanwhile, an unexpected chore may be dropped into your lap and you must spend your spare time working, rather than playing. Don't waste energy fighting against the inevitable or you'll be too tired to kick up your heels when the opportunity finally arrives. As Tom Petty sings, "Some days are diamonds, some days are rocks."

You might not be your regular cheery self today, making others wonder if they did something to upset you. The truth is you aren't eagerly looking forward to the rest of the workweek. You don't want things to continue in the same old way; you may even wish to turn your routine upside down for the sake of change. However, it's not a good time to push the envelope too aggressively. Hold onto your hat until tomorrow. Stop focusing on the negatives, adjust your attitude by counting your blessings, instead.

Your responsibilities are complicated by overlapping promises you made to different people. Although you're often a pro at simplifying chaos, it's not so easy to reduce the current complexity into a viable plan. The first step is acknowledging you can't be everything to everyone. Set new priorities and inform others of your limitations before it's too late. Ultimately, you'll be more appreciated for your honesty than your productivity if you deliver your message with care.

Your impulsive decisions could rattle the cages of your friends or associates today, temporarily turning allies into enemies. But don't act on your fears and fight back now, or things will just become even more convoluted. Thankfully, success can be yours if you sidestep direct confrontation for a while longer. Placing distance between you and the situation provides everyone with a much-needed fresh perspective. Hopefully, time heals all wounds.

You're unclear how to best express yourself within the context of relationships today, especially if someone seems to be withholding his or her true emotions. Although tense situations sometimes require extreme reactions, losing your temper now won't solve anything. Be as diplomatic as possible in your approach; your attempts at making everyone's life a little easier will also improve your own.

Everyone is counting on you to follow through with your end of the deal, but crossing off the tasks on your list is just the start. Jumping through all the hoops isn't going to be enough to prove your devotion today; you must perform your duties with heartfelt conviction. Go the extra mile by showing up and giving it all you got. Raising the bar of excellence demonstrates your intentions more effectively than words ever could.

You refuse to gloss over a sticky issue today because you believe that digging beneath the surface will eventually create the intimacy you seek. But the current situation isn't about quick answers or transient pleasures; the hidden magic won't be part of your experience unless you are committed to going deeper. Luckily, there's no need to rush the process when it's more interesting to let things unfold organically. It's not surprising that the longer you sustain a meaningful connection, the better it gets.

You can't simply ignore the presence of others in your space because they have something important to teach you today. Unfortunately, an interaction might not seem like a lot of fun at first, but the dynamics quickly improve if you show your more vulnerable side instead of posturing in a defensive manner. Listen without feeling the need to respond immediately. Don't allow your clever charm circumvent the chance of deepening a significant relationship. When in doubt, err on the side of your heart.

You really don't want to deal with anyone's negativity today, especially if it's directed at you. Nevertheless, it might feel as if people are on your case now, tempting you to dismiss their words without any regard for what they are trying to tell you. Fortunately, you can push through a barrier that seems to be standing between you and a potential adversary if you're willing to reveal your true feelings. But make sure to give the other party plenty of time to explain their intentions. Total honesty is the first step toward establishing an atmosphere of respect and harmony.

Your current secrecy at work makes perfect sense because you don't want your feelings to impede your efficiency. In fact, you prefer to lock your emotions inside until a more appropriate moment, such as when you're alone with a close friend or partner. Unfortunately, you still might appear more transparent than you realize, prompting others to wonder why you are pretending all is well. There's no reason to share your whole story yet, but it may be quite useful to acknowledge your dilemma with someone you can truly trust.

Your pragmatic approach to life helps you manage the powerful emotions that are simmering on the surface today, even if they are just below the threshold of expression. You don't need to tell everyone what's on your mind; your feelings are yours, alone. However, suppressing your desires is not the healthiest of long-term strategies. Start by giving yourself free rein to explore your unexpressed fears and unfulfilled dreams. Thankfully, bringing them out of the shadows lessens their intensity, allowing you to move on to more practical concerns.

Not surprisingly, your prosperity grows as your self-image improves and your doubt transforms into certainty. You could make significant financial gains today as powerful Pluto forms a supportive sextile with resourceful Venus while she travels through your 2nd House of Money. But your current success might not manifest as you  expect. Dream bigger than a modest raise or promotion; following your heart can transform your life. However, your patience is required because the process of metamorphosis does not happen overnight.

Your needs are undeniably strong and may be so complex now that you don't want to address them. Seductive Venus channels her energy into dark Pluto today, reminding you not to open a can of emotional worms for anyone who hasn't already proven his or her trustworthiness. There is nothing wrong with being selective about your audience; keep conversations on the casual side until someone earns your respect by showing a willingness to swim in dangerous waters. People with great passion can make the impossible happen.

Your unexpressed desires lead you on a wild goose chase today as you seek an elusive resolution to a dilemma. You strive to be honest, but you also want to keep the mood lighthearted. Unfortunately, you might need to jump directly into the confusing realm of your conflicted feelings to sort things out. Magically, once you begin to reveal your secret dreams, they don't seem as problematic. Shining the bright light of your awareness into the unknown changes everything for the better.

Your previous efforts pay off today as colleagues assist you in ways you might not expect. Friendly Venus makes herself comfortable in your 11th House of Networking, enabling you to disarm people with your special blend of charm and authority. Those who know how serious you are when it comes to business will vouch for your authenticity. There's no reason to let pride stand in your way; don't resist help from your peers when it's offered. Everyone benefits when others feel invested in your success.

There's so much activity occurring behind closed doors or in the confines of your mind today that it's impossible for others to know your true intentions. Thankfully, your associates might assume the best and approve of your apparent direction, even if they don't yet possess all the facts. But don't waste energy rationalizing your goals when you need to concentrate on moving toward your ultimate destination. There will be plenty of time to explain everything after your success is already won.

You are slowly regaining clarity about your plans for the future, but it's still too soon to put your ideas into words. In fact, your friends and associates might not be interested in what you have to say now. They want tangible results, not just idle promises. However, it may take several days for your current actions to bear fruit, so keep your immediate expectations to a minimum. Attempts to force resolution are counterproductive and will only slow down your progress. The only person you need to prove anything to is yourself.

Trailing behind the pack isn't your usual style, but today you find odd satisfaction in letting others take the lead. However, the longer you're not first in line, the more restless you grow. The Moon's afternoon shift into your action-packed sign is your cue to reassert your command. Unfortunately, you can come on so strong that you encounter push-back. Focus less on reclaiming the seat of control and put more effort into minding your own business, instead. Others will follow you when they witness your productivity, not when you're racing out in front.

There is a welcome sense of contentment in the air as your workmates acknowledge your contributions today. However, their words of appreciation might only whet your appetite for more recognition. Unfortunately, you can become stuck on your desire for fame or fortune now, prompting others to withhold further support. You could feel as if you've gone from top cat to the dog house in the blink of an eye. Don't panic; instead, quietly channeling your passion into your work gives everyone a reason to sing your praises again.

Keeping up a steady pace at work can be a challenge for you flighty Twins, especially if you feel emotionally detached from your family and loved ones. Your weariness may be taking its toll on your outlook, especially if you've been pushing yourself too hard recently. Don't slack off on meeting your obligations today, even if you're ready to throw in the towel. Accomplishing your goals now means you'll be ready to ride the incoming wave of energy that serves to revitalize you over the weekend.

You're finding your groove in the workflow today, but little annoyances keep surfacing that distract you from your appointed tasks. At first, it's easy to take all the interruptions in stride; your positive attitude is your saving grace. But like the straw that broke the camel's back, you too have your limit. Tread carefully, or your emotions might lead you right to the edge if you let them. Thankfully, you can employ logic to help you focus on your work rather than the trivialities that pull you off course. As Albert Einstein wrote, "ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important."

Your optimistic nature prompts you to take on more responsibility than is wise today. Although you hit the ground running, it quickly becomes apparent that you might be losing ground instead of gaining on your goals. Nevertheless, your confidence level makes a big difference in how much you actually accomplish. Set aside any concerns about failure versus success; there's no place for false pride now. If you just show up and do your absolute best, others can't help but be impressed.

Satisfaction is elusive today because it seems as if people keep moving the finish line as soon as you have it in sight. You think you're progressing toward an agreed-upon goal, only to discover that the destination has been changed without your knowledge. Just know that none of your efforts are wasted, even if you take a circuitous route to completing a job. In a day or two, you will see the silver lining in the cloud when you look back at your current frustration. Sometimes a little perspective is all that's necessary to put things in their proper order.

You might be slightly disappointed when your ideas are unsupported at work today. Nevertheless, you can make great progress working alone behind the scenes. Although you often prefer the companionship of collaboration, a solo performance now prompts great reviews later on. Set aside your personal feelings and nagging insecurities. Put your shoulder to the wheel and demonstrate to the world what you can accomplish when you set your mind to it.

This workweek began on a positive note and ends on another one just for good measure. You're riding a creative high while the imaginative Pisces Moon completes her visit to your 5th House of Self-Expression. Thankfully, your associates are currently more accepting of your special skills and give you the leeway to attack a project in your own unique manner. Your colleagues' support inspires you to even greater heights. Even if you feel a bit letdown later this evening, this whirlwind journey will produce surprising results that are well worth your effort.

Although it's nearly impossible to sustain a high level of enthusiasm all day, no one will notice that you're experiencing doubt. Still, you don't want anyone to know you're covering up a dance with low self-esteem today. Nevertheless, you feel vulnerable while the Sun in your optimistic sign squares the elusive Pisces Moon as she hides out in your 4th House of Security. The irony is that your friends and associates are likely to  stand by you now no matter what. Taking a risk and sharing your concerns could foster the nurturing environment that you need.

It's confusing when everyone seems to be saying different things at the same time; you don't know what to make of it all. You thrive when you're working with the facts and standing on solid ground, but today the truth is hard to find and the earth beneath your feet feels like quicksand. Paradoxically, your clash with reality is less about your external world than about your internal terrain. The tide begins to turn in your favor once you stop struggling. Nevertheless, a totally smooth sea never made a skillful sailor.

You might feel like an outcast today because your values seem vastly different from those of your coworkers. But focusing on the gulf that appears to be growing between you and your peers doesn't lead anywhere useful; it only adds to the discord and mayhem. Instead of magnifying the conflicts, seek common ground wherever you can. Setting mutually beneficial goals creates a cooperative environment rather than an unsupportive one. United you stand; divided you fall.

Your sensitivity may get the best of you today, especially if you can't find ways to establish boundaries when needed. It's a gift to be so compassionate that you always want to help others. But there's a point at which this blessing can become a curse -- and it's up to you to learn how to navigate around this delicate edge. Fortunately, practice makes perfect; don't expect a major epiphany to change your attitude overnight. Just lean into the place of discomfort and use it as a bird leans into the wind to gain momentum. Difficult roads lead to beautiful destinations.

Your words are packed with so much punch today that the powerful effect they have on people may surprise you. It's difficult to step out of your own shoes to experience how you come across to others, but the truth is you might not like what you would hear. There's no reason to speak condescendingly or to be purposefully abrasive; you can deliver your point without making an enemy. Instead of trying to gain dominance of a situation by exercising your authority, demonstrate your willingness to meet others halfway. Compromise is your friend, whether you like it or not.

You might wake up believing you are in possession of the ultimate solution to save the world, but you can't seem to get anyone to listen. The perceptive Mercury-Pluto conjunction intensifies your 9th House of Higher Thought, luring you to join like-minded people in a fight for a higher cause. But even if you think the momentum is growing, you may get hot under the collar if your altruistic behavior is misconstrued. The trick is to honor your point of view without trying to inflict it on everyone else. It's helpful to remember the universe is biased toward supporting multiple truths just like a mountain has many trails to the top.

You don't have the time or energy to engage in lighthearted chit-chat today. Although you're often seen as the life of the party, there isn't a valid reason to provide the comic relief when you're currently wrestling with more serious matters. However, your position on an issue may not be as set in stone as you believe, and you won't win any friends by sidestepping an uncomfortable discussion. It's more advantageous to aim for the center of the black hole so you can put this conversation to rest once and for all.

Making loud claims about your flexibility now is not the same as actually remaining open to changes in your environment. The problem is that it takes two to tango and not everyone is in the mood to dance. By the same token, someone else's rigidity is outside of your direct control. Nevertheless, you might be so stuck on a specific destination now that all you can see is the person blocking your path. Remember, there are plenty of stars out there and countless ways to reach them.

You are excited about all the creative endeavors  in front of you today. However, reality closes in pretty quickly and reminds you of the commitments you already made for the weekend. You cannot escape your chores while your 6th House of Work and Service is under siege by a ruthless Mercury-Pluto conjunction. Some struggles are just not worth it, but it's entirely up to you to decide how to best allocate your resources. Energy flows where attention goes, so think very carefully about how you spend your time.

Clear your calendar of all distractions today -- even for a short while. A pragmatic approach to an artistic project may bring you to the edge of a breakthrough in your work, but only if you give it enough time. There is a delicate dance between personal expression and your awareness of other people's needs. Moving too far in either direction has negative consequences so be prepared to take an extra minute or two to temper your actions before doing something you might soon regret. However, finding your sweet spot enables you to take your creativity to the next level.

People mean well today, but their unpredictable behavior is enough to drive you crazy. You want to rely on the stability of your environment, but things continue to change, nonetheless. Stop trying to fix things that are not yours to fix. As sages throughout history have told us: the outside is merely a reflection of the inner realms. When you blame someone else, you're also inadvertently blaming yourself. Focusing on your spiritual development empowers you to produce the most dramatic improvements.

No matter how hard you try, you can't stick to your schedule today because nothing seems to be happening on time. It might even feel as if the cosmos has thrown a little chaos into your day just to keep you on your toes. You could obsess about the way things were supposed to go, but lingering over your regrets doesn't lead anywhere constructive. Unfortunately, letting go of your preconceived expectations is more challenging than it sounds. Nevertheless, it can be done. In fact, nearly anything is possible now once you put your mind to it.

You are standing at a critical intersection and must rely on your core values to make a significant decision today. Thankfully, you possess the staying power to get the job done while the single-minded Mercury-Pluto conjunction falls in your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Unfortunately, it might be necessary to sacrifice a bit of spontaneity in order to handle your current dilemma. In fact, the more you plan and prepare now, the better the results.

You are working with a personal agenda today and woe to anyone who stands between you and your mission. Thankfully, no one can win an argument with you since your facts are in order and your delivery is strong. It's almost as if you possess superpowers while Messenger Mercury aligns with unrelenting Pluto in your 1st House of Self. Your persuasive words are backed up by your authoritative manner. But you must use your gift with care since your sterling reputation leads others to believe almost anything you say. Taking yourself a little less seriously helps everyone  relax. Finding the humor in the situation makes your message more palatable to your audience.

You prefer to downplay your point of view today so you don't have to defend it in public. But your strategy might backfire if you grow resentful of others who impose their beliefs on you. Even simple family dynamics could become complicated if you reach the point where you need to step back in to reassert your control. Fortunately, you can prevent a worse-case scenario from developing by being more forthcoming right from the start. No matter how the day unfolds, sharing your truth sets a fine example for everyone else to follow.

You want to establish a secure place in your social network and will do nearly anything to make sure you're not left out of the action. Unfortunately, you might be so eager to be included now that you sacrifice your integrity along the way. Reassess your values and decide your limits before you make another move. There are beliefs that shouldn't be denied just for the sake of acceptance by your peers. Being your authentic self is the only option that makes any sense if you expect your friendships to stand up to the test of time.

Sharing the details of your busy calendar with family and friends may be necessary to keep everything running smoothly today, but you don't have to over-explain your every move. Others are already experiencing information overload and they don't need you to add more noise to the existing mix. Instead of justifying your plans to everyone else now, channel your energy into managing your own time in a constructive manner. Creating a more peaceful existence also has a calming effect on those around you. Find your center and don't stray too far from there.

You're overdue for some respite from the hectic pace of your daily life, but you might not experience any relief today. It's tempting to blame the high intensity on the holiday season, but it's really more about the breakneck speed at which your mind is operating now. Unfortunately, you may feel slightly isolated if you can't connect your thoughts to everything happening around you. But don't try too hard to fit in with the crowd; you can use this time on your own to explore your brilliant ideas. Thankfully, the energy will begin to shift by tomorrow, giving you a chance to catch your breath.

Your social life may be causing you anguish today because everything seems to be more complicated than you expected. Although mischievous Mercury might be wreaking havoc on your life now, it probably feels worse than it actually is. In fact, it's likely that something awesome will come of a breakdown in communication or if your plans fall apart. Don't tenaciously cling to your previous expectations when life has so many surprises in store for you. Open your mind and allow the universe to work its magic.

You plan on keeping your opinions to yourself today, but things that you wouldn't normally say might suddenly slip off your tongue with ease. Although your disclosure could create static in the present moment by upsetting a friend, it may be useful in the long run to clear the air of unexpressed feelings. Believe it or not, everyone will likely feel relieved once the previously hidden issues are finally out in the open. Better the devil you know than the devil you don't.

You have certain ideas about how things should be done today and you may feel the urge to tell everyone to back off and leave you alone. But it's not that you want to be isolated from your loved ones; it's just you need to be your own boss now. Remember, your strength of conviction is a double-edged sword; it's admirable to be so passionate about your beliefs, but too much rigidity can stand between you and your current happiness. A little compromise here and there shows that your heart is in the right place.

You're pulled in opposite directions today and struggle to find middle ground. On one hand, your ruling planet Mercury is yelling fire, filling your head with one brilliant thought after another. On the other hand, quicksilver Mercury's alignment with shocking Uranus makes it nearly impossible to focus. Trying to narrow your choices is an exercise in futility now, so just let your ideas flow naturally. You can always return to the most innovative ones to review their merits once your nervous system returns to normal.

It takes every ounce of your concentration to see both sides of an important issue today. Your opinions may be uncharacteristically intense now, but there's no reason to express your thoughts unless they add something constructive to the conversation. Nevertheless, you feel so strongly that you're sure your words will make an immediate difference. However, it's wise to wait and see what happens before saying anything at all because you're likely to change your mind as the day progresses. A moment of patience saves you from many moments of regret.

It's easy to mistake a clever-but-shallow idea for a life-changing deep thought today, but the two are wildly different. Trickster Mercury may nudge you into thinking that a radical new idea is amazing enough to save the world or, at least, to save yourself. But innovative solutions that sound wonderful at first might not stand up to the test of time. Cool your jets and see how your recent epiphany holds up for a few days before proclaiming it to be the best thing since sliced bread.

You might grow annoyed today because everyone seems to be moving so quickly that you can't establish an even pace. Just as you sink into a meaningful conversation with someone, there's a new topic on the table or a knock at the door. Unfortunately, your attempts to alter the energetic flow only generate more frustration. Instead of trying to control reality to your liking, take your cues from external sources now and swim where the tides carry you. As Eckhart Tolle wrote, "Whatever you fight you strengthen, and what you resist, persists."

You can tell that your momentum is building, but your excitement could get the best of you today. Obviously, you don't want to miss a significant opportunity, but it may not be fading as quickly as you think. In fact, using your day to get all your ducks in order is smarter than attempting to execute a specific strategy right away. Thankfully, you are blessed with more patience than others, so continue to remind yourself that you don't have to be in a hurry when it comes to matters of importance.

You may be exhilarated by the buzz of everyone's enthusiasm today, but it's not wise to fall into the trap of hitching your happiness to external events. Rather than making your satisfaction dependent on people's reactions, cut yourself loose from the expectation game. You might not be very productive now, but you can enjoy the freedom that the unsettled energy brings. Give yourself permission to be creative for no other reason than how good it makes you feel on the inside.

You're not sure if it's in your best interest to reveal your thoughts today, especially if you're worried that your dreams are out of sync with everyone else's. Normally, you might respond to this kind of potential conflict by withdrawing to channel your inner hermit. However, something keeps pulling you back toward your friends now. Don't fight your intuition if you are drawn to share your heart. Happiness often sneaks in a door that you didn't even realize was open.

You're not in the mood to suffer fools gladly today, since you are committed to a specific agenda at work and are unlikely to be stopped. Although  contemplating your life's purpose has been a valuable detour, you're ready to shift gears and refocus on the present. Obviously, reconsidering your long-term goals can directly impact your trajectory. Nevertheless, even a minor crisis could instantaneously change everything while you balance your panoramic view of the distant horizon with whatever is on your plate. Don't let your career ambitions drown out the sweetness of the current moment.

Although you tend to be more methodical in your methods than most, it's still possible to overlook an important detail today. You can be so proud of your accomplishments that you set your sights even higher. Unfortunately, your single-minded determination could prevent you from hearing the sound advice offered by someone else. Scaling back your worldly commitments gives you time to reconsider your priorities. No matter what you think you know now, rest assured that you do not have all the answers. The wisest of humans are acutely aware of how much more there is to learn.

You may be seeking to cultivate relationships with those who challenge you with opinions that are different from yours. But it's not necessary to change your mind and simply agree with anyone else's point of view. However, you could go to the other extreme and fight fiercely for your position, but there's nothing to be gained by winning an argument now. Instead, just engage passionately and keep an open mind at all times. Life is a much more interesting ride when you leave room for surprise.

Failure is not an option today as you need to explain your intentions to others as concisely as possible. Thankfully, you receive a considerable amount of cosmic help while conversational Mercury is hanging out in your 7th House of Relationships. It's easier than you realize to initiate a discussion on a difficult matter because your thoughts gain clarity as soon as you begin to verbalize your position. Just don't try to share everything all at once; start now and bit by bit you can tell your story to those who care enough to listen.

Time is running out on your dreams, or so it feels. You have a pretty good idea of what you want in both the romance and business departments, but life grows more complicated when others don't share your same long-term goals. You are willing to go the distance now, yet someone appears to fall short of your expectations. Even if you are experiencing disappointment in the moment, don't settle for anything less than what you know you deserve.

You could be convinced that you're one of the most pragmatic people on the planet. Nevertheless, you're probably turning molehills into mountains so adeptly now that others are willing to embark on a hard climb to the summit with you. However, this is shaky territory because you don't have all your facts in order yet. Meanwhile, the truth will become apparent sooner or later; if you inflated reality to sell your cause to the crowd, you may be left on the hillside to fend for yourself.

An emotionally challenging situation at home may set the stage for an experience that is beneficial for all involved. The opportunity for growth, however, is not likely to arrive in a stress-free environment. Instead of avoiding the bigger issues that surface now, face them head on. Even if there is some discomfort, you won't be disappointed with the results if everyone is honest in the process.

Although relationships seem to be on an upward trajectory now, the long shadows of hidden agendas and unexpressed feelings can darken your day. You might be concerned that the light of awareness is fading, but you receive an emotional boost from the Moon's sweet trine to potent Pluto. It's in your best interest to transform leftover negativity into positive potential. Ultimately, it isn't about what happens to you; it's about how you respond. Showing your best self leaves no place for your heart to hide.

It's nearly impossible to tap dance around the intensity today; ultimately you must go directly through the center, even if your reactions make your life more complicated than necessary. Paradoxically, the more you attempt to control your feelings now, the less predictable the outcome. Fortunately, you can sustain your overall progress if you make only minor adjustments to your responses along the way. Ultimately, things should work out for the best as long as you stay true to yourself while still remaining kind to others.

Keeping secrets isn't such a good idea now, for your suppressed feelings will likely blast their way out into the open, whether you like it or not. Withholding information can create an energetic blockage, or even a backlash, prompting someone else to step in and manipulate the situation to his or her advantage. Methodically uncovering hidden facts keeps the energy moving in a positive direction. Opening your heart inspires others to do the same.

It appears as if you're forthcoming with your feelings but appearances can be quite deceiving now. You might even choose to retreat into your shell because you don't want to waste energy expressing anything less than positive. Your current penchant for remaining silent can be awkward for others, especially if they don't know what you think about their plans. Rather than worrying about anyone else's ideas today, focus on your own priorities and honor what's most important to you.

A series of irritating issues may come to an unexpected head today as your patience finally runs out. It might feel as if the current situation is a last-chance opportunity to resolve a lingering problem once and for all. However, you're eager to keep things above board and remain civil in your interactions. If you don't get the ball rolling now, things could quickly spin out of control. Take direct action while you can; he who hesitates is lost.

A natural lack of patience is often your undoing but, fortunately, you have the good sense to check your impulses today. You can hear sweet times calling you to escape from your duties, but you're unprepared to face the harsh consequences of unmet obligations. The most intelligent strategy starts with setting a rhythm that won't wear you out before you're done. A steady work pace enables you to reach your goals, so you can surf the fresh wave of energy blowing into your life later this evening.

You possess an unflappable dedication, making it possible to achieve almost anything you can imagine now. Nevertheless, simply stating your intention is fruitless unless you are willing to follow through with a resolute execution of your plan. Your commitment may be steadfast, but you still might need some assistance getting motivated today. It's a mistake to try to do everything on your own; ask an associate to work with you until you gain sufficient momentum. Inspiration is likely to be found wherever you look.

You may be processing strange messages from the cosmos that you downloaded recently, and trying to decipher them could mess with your sense of reality today. The energy seems copacetic until something reminds you of all the parts you still don't understand. But rather than getting lost in unsolvable mysteries while the Moon hides in your 12th House of Soul Consciousness, concentrate on the mundane tasks right in front of your nose. Believe it or not, the simple satisfaction of completing a job will bring more pleasure now than anything else.

Spirited interactions with intriguing people stimulate your creativity today. However, exploring your active imagination doesn't mean that you wish to share your current ideas with anyone else just yet. Your innovative thinking may lead you into exciting realms, but you prefer to remain quiet until you have something tangible to show for your thoughts. Don't let your reluctance to discuss your plans turn into a dance with self-doubt. Be up front about your motives; telling others why you want to wait enables them to be the steady pillars that you need at this time.

Don't waste precious energy second-guessing yourself today because your intuition is likely right on target. Unfortunately, overreacting to someone else's doubt could quickly lead you into an argument as you attempt to justify your position without the necessary facts at your disposal. However, it doesn't matter whether others understand why you chose your current path. Just give your very best performance and your friends will eventually see the wisdom in what you do.

As odd as it sounds, setting your goals too high  can actually make you less productive. It's more important to reach your destination now than to exhaust your resources by attempting to go too far. Your natural wisdom comes from your sense of practicality, which means working less today and enjoying yourself more. Don't worry if your current productivity doesn't quite meet your original expectations; there's more going on than meets the eye and you'll easily make up for lost time in the days ahead.

You're driven by a strong desire for pleasure today, especially within the safe boundaries of your family or an intimate relationship. Ironically, your wish to experience joy could motivate you to work extra hard, especially if you can imagine the rewards you will receive later for your current efforts. Oddly enough, people might see you as acting selfishly. Just remember that taking care of your own needs is sometimes the best way to replenish your vitality. You have even more to give to those you love when you feel personally fulfilled.

A close friend might matter-of-factly tell you exactly what he or she thinks you need to know today. However, you may feel as if everyone is turning a simple problem into a convoluted one. People who know you well won't question your ability to overcome an obstacle, but it's still challenging to maintain a healthy perspective. Don't assume a defensive posture or your indignation will only add to the stress. Keep your mind open, no matter what nonsense you hear. A down-to-earth approach now all but guarantees your success.

Your ability to see a situation from a more global perspective is one of your greatest strengths. However, the Moon's current visit to your 6th House of Health has you visualizing the improvements you can make to your daily regimen. Although you're tempted to dream big, little incremental steps are more efficient now than setting larger changes into motion. Don't set yourself up for failure by taking on too much. For once, size does matter and thinking small is better than falsely believing that you're capable of fixing everything all at once.

Your world seems to be in order today and you are relatively optimistic about your life. However, you might avoid making specific plans while jolly Jupiter contacts the Moon as she meanders through your 5th House of Fun and Games. Unfortunately, you could grow lazy as you continue to justify your lack of initiative, but this evasive approach isn't helpful in the long run. Take advantage of this magical moment by mapping out your future while your creativity is running wild and free. Make hay while the Sun still shines.

Sometimes when you reflect back on your life you only remember the plan that went wrong or a time you failed to meet someone's expectations. Thankfully, you can relive past experiences that bring a smile to your face today as you replay the good times over in your imagination. Regardless of your workload now, the Moon's presence in your 4th House of Roots invites you to take a sentimental journey that could be quite therapeutic. A quick trip down Memory Lane allows you to return to the present moment with a grateful perspective and a lighter heart.

A casual acquaintance could surprise you by stepping up and offering you the support you need to feel safe and secure. The Moon's visit to your 3rd House of Immediate Surroundings indicates that those closest to you might play a more active role in your life now. But don't push these connections too far or you may sour the sweet process that's unfolding. If you try too hard, you could inadvertently create a gulf between you and a true friend. Happily, adopting a more relaxed approach builds bridges over troubled waters.

You might quickly work yourself into an emotional frenzy today by following one captivating distraction after another. In a perfect world, you could flit from task to task without completing anything you start. But don't be surprised if your boss demands that you finish one project before you head off to the next. In spite of your natural tendencies, you can do things right the first time around by exercising a little self-discipline. Act in a responsible manner and no one will have a valid reason to question your intentions or criticize your work.

You believe everything is under control as you glide through your day smoothly, maximizing your productivity with clever ingenuity. However, an unexpected turn of events may raise self-doubt about your recent choices. The truth is you can't undo what's happened in the past, but you can make the most of the present. Fortunately, you should be able to maintain your promised delivery schedule if you don't waste too much time replaying your previous performance. Albert Einstein wrote, "The distinction between the past, the present, and the future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion."

The buzz factor is off the charts today and you're so excited about your future prospects that your impatience can make you crazy. Unfortunately, bouncing off walls isn't necessarily conducive to accomplishing your goals, even if you like the thrill of it. Your current exuberance leads to trouble unless you allow extra time to complete the work at hand. Try not to make too many plans while promising too much. Make the magic last by pacing yourself to sustain your output until the wild energy settles down.

Your fantasies are more active today than anyone realizes because you're capable of counterbalancing them with measurable productivity. Keeping your daydreams under wraps goes a long way to convince others that your feet are actually on the ground when you're really floating in the clouds. Nevertheless, a sudden shift in the winds of fate could reveal your secret life in a flash. Happily, there's no reason to hide the truth once your work is done.

Finding your groove at work is a piece of cake today, enabling you to feel great about your accomplishments. Just keep in mind that whatever you do now has a lasting impact on your future. However, everything is not as breezy and easy as it seems. Serious issues must be addressed and the sooner you deal with them the better. The bad news is your self-expression is so spontaneous that you could overreact in the moment. Ask your friends or colleagues for their advice before you fly off the handle and say something you regret. A drama-free existence improves your productivity.

You're driven to act in a pragmatic and decisive manner, but it's challenging to make practical use of your colorful thoughts today. You might even feel as if you're suspended in another dimension, watching the world below you with bemusement. Obviously, this otherworldly sensation doesn't allow you to get the traction you need to reach your goals. Rather than trying to make the impossible happen, explore all your options without choosing one course of action yet. You can pick a long-term strategy when you land back on your feet in a few days.

Your recent commitment to work hard and stabilize your life are still part of your current plans, but you're also itching for a bit of guilt-free fun today. You might even convince yourself that you're just making up for lost time as you reconnect with your inner child or your adult adventurer. Nevertheless, you can't ignore the pressing responsibilities that still need your attention. Fortunately, you are the champion of balance and can moderate your impatience when necessary. Don't give up what you want most for what you want now.

Your pent-up tension continues to build today, motivating you to search for a healthy way to express your adrenaline. It's tempting to just act out your feelings willy-nilly, but reconnecting with your spiritual center creates ripples of compassion and positivity. Instead of distracting yourself with social events or strenuous exercise now, consider spending some quality time alone with your thoughts. You don't have to do anything at all except increase your awareness. Changing your perspective changes everything.

People continue to catch your eye and pique your curiosity today, but your emotional connections may be limited to a superficial basis. Even if you like the idea of building profound relationships, it's more fun to just drop in and out of discussions as your attention waxes and wanes. There's no need to judge yourself harshly now if your energy is scattered and you feel pulled one way and then another. Thankfully, you'll have plenty of time to dig deeper in a few days when you can focus on one person at a time.

You may worry so much about being stuck in a situation at work that you forget to enjoy the present moment. But it's impossible to interact with your coworkers if you spend so much time in your mind planning your escape. Honor the part of you that wants to explore a variety of other interests now, whether or not you can. There's nothing wrong with remaining open to what the world has to offer. On the other hand, don't let your dreams of the future stand in the way of experiencing the magic that's already at your feet.

A playful interlude with a good friend or lover is just the thing you need today to regain your healthy perspective on life. Although you may be up to your eyeballs in work or have a long list of errands to run, don't skip this chance to pursue pleasure, even for just a little while. You can always finish up with your responsibilities tomorrow with a big smile on your face and a bounce to your step. You can't always wait for the perfect time when the opportunity is now.

A business or personal connection may be a source of awkward tension now, especially if someone is trying to extract a commitment from you that you're not prepared to give. Share your concerns with the other person if your fears about a negative outcome begin to create doubt. But don't shift the discussion to hypothetical scenarios in the future. Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, keep bringing the conversation back to the present moment. Honest communication is the key to relationship success.

Your day starts off quietly enough, but the pace picks up quickly and you can't help but enjoy the buzz. Nearly all the possibilities seem enticing and so many thoughts are racing through your mind now that it's tricky to discern which ones are actually worth pursuing. It's fantastic when you feel this level of enthusiasm, but make sure to finish your work before you rush out the door in search of fun and frivolity. Pride in your accomplishments is a gift you can give yourself.

You get so stuck in your ways sometimes that you drive your friends and associates nuts. However, today's energy is different and you're busy sharing big ideas faster than anyone can assimilate them. Delectable Venus is channeling the boundless energy of jovial Jupiter, inviting you to participate in a cosmic party of pleasure. There's no reason to downplay your current optimism. Freely express whatever visions of abundance and joy that pop into your awareness now. Magic is afoot if only you believe.

Your spirits are soaring today, but the Moon's current visit to your lighthearted sign can also bring strong longings of restlessness. Your moods swing rapidly now, rising and falling and rising again. Others might not get a clear read on you because each time they think they know what you're feeling, your attitude shifts. Don't be overly concerned about other people's expectations; increase your chances for happiness by letting your emotions continue to run their natural course. Sometimes you have no choice but to follow your heart.

This is not a day to keep secrets, even if you normally excel at maintaining clear boundaries. It's not that you want to agitate uncomfortable feelings or betray anyone's trust; you just find it challenging to hold back your emotions now if you feel close to someone. Nevertheless, taking a disclosure too far certainly won't improve a relationship. In fact, it could jeopardize whatever trust is already established. Be conscious of everything you say so that you don't accidentally break your promise of silence. Your word is your wand.

Although you're emotionally open today, you still might be inclined to protect yourself if your defenses begin to soften. The good news is people will likely notice the shift in your behavior if you are genuinely interested in cultivating a deeper connection. Retreat is unnecessary when the feelings are mutual; bask in the admiration now, even if it makes you feel vulnerable. Letting your love light shine is a gift to everyone around you.

You may be the one that everyone depends on to put things in order because you're normally quite organized when you're in charge. However, your energy could be a bit scattered today, making it tough to live up to everyone's expectations. Don't worry if there isn't enough time in the day to finish everything on your to-do list. Just attack the most important chores, leaving other less critical tasks to complete when you aren't feeling so rushed. Perfection isn't all that it's cracked up to be, especially when love is all that really matters.

If you want everything to be in perfect harmony, you may need to assert yourself more aggressively today than you prefer. Your anxiety increases when you think about all there is to do, but thankfully, you are capable of rising to the occasion. The clever Gemini Moon's presence in your 9th House of Big Ideas is supported by energetic Mars, enabling you to power your way through nearly any resistance you encounter. Happily, you might even surprise yourself with how gracefully you perform under pressure.

You feel as if everything is going to go as planned today as long as you continue to stay in motion. Maintaining a high level of activity is a key to your current success; nevertheless, conflicting thoughts may distract you from being in the moment as soon as you start to slow down. Although it might hinder your productivity for a while, stopping long enough to reconnect with the spirit of the holidays will bring you more joy in the long run.

Everyone seems to be running on a different frequency than you, yet you're not motivated to catch up with them now. However, you can't just take yourself out of the game and expect your friends to willingly play without you. The most effective solution to this dilemma is to simply share your feelings. Engaging in an honest dialogue will take all of you to common ground where you can operate without any unexpressed agendas. Being true to yourself encourages others to do the same.

Your coworkers seem to be missing the point today and there isn't a subtle way to give them the facts. Unfortunately, you can't go on the offense to set others straight or they will think you're  pushing your own agenda. However, no one will realize there's more to your story if you don't say anything at all. Rather than trying to change anyone's mind, just gently share your perspective and then let each person form their own opinion. The interpersonal dynamics will flow much smoother if you avoid the assumption that you  are the only one with all the answers.

You're in an extra playful mood today, yet your commitments won't necessarily allow you to drop everything for the sake of fun and games. Nevertheless, complaining about your obligations is a total waste of your time and energy. Instead, resign yourself to fulfilling your current responsibilities as expediently as possible. Time is on your side; you will still have the chance to partake in activities that make you smile later on. Whistle while you work and everyone will sing along.

A family squabble may require your immediate attention now that the Moon is camping out in your 4th House of Domestic Matters. Luckily, you can see all the angles of a complex issue today; unfortunately, your desire to be fair-minded brings uncertainty about which solution is the best one. Your wisest strategy is to avoid taking sides until your clarity returns later in the day. No one can force you to choose your course of action until you're good and ready. Let there be peace on Earth, and let it begin with you.

Your entire life path seems up for grabs today. The Cancer Full Moon brightens your 4th House of Home and Family, causing you to wonder how to balance your domesticity with your place in the world. You're trying to figure out how much emotional safety you need before you attempt to reach your goals. Asking important questions now can propel you into action. Although others might see you as acting too aggressively, do whatever it takes to get back on track. Using your powers of concentration empowers you to thrive in a situation that anyone else would call unwinnable.

Loved ones come to the rescue today, encouraging you to shrug off any self-limiting thoughts. Although you might be insecure about your ability to communicate while the hypersensitive Cancer Full Moon shines in your 3rd House of Information, your words can produce a powerful impact. It's not what others say about you that matters the most; the critical component is how you feel about yourself. Nothing is likely to bring you down now if you continue to cultivate a healthy self-esteem.

Your thoughts might be moving so fast today that you can't keep up with every idea. You may have a very sensible plan in mind, but you can still ruin your chances of realizing a goal if you diffuse your energy. The Cancer Full Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Values is a cosmic reminder to focus on what is most important and allow the trivial matters to fall away. The truth is you have your limits just like anyone else. Don't talk about your dreams until you find the right audience. Taking yourself more seriously encourages others to do the same.

You expect people to acknowledge and respect your desire for emotional safety. The evocative Full Moon spotlighting your sensitive sign might send you over the edge today, prompting you to worry that your intentions are misunderstood. However, your needs may be based upon old insecurities -- and no one can fix this if you fear rejection or change. You can't solve this dilemma overnight, but discussing your concerns with someone you love helps you feel more hopeful about the current circumstances. A burden is much lighter once shared.

You really want to hold up your end of the bargain but the Cancer Full Moon is sneaking around in  your 12th House of Secrets, prompting you to struggle in ways no one else notices. You know there are specific things you can do to help those you love, but you're already too busy trying to fulfill your previous commitments. You can't do everything you planned, yet your high expectations  make it difficult for you to let go. Nevertheless, everyone will appreciate your generosity if you don't promise more than you can deliver. Love is the gift that keeps giving back.

You fully intend to accomplish your goals today, even if it temporarily means that your needs come first. However, everyone can tell that you want some space because actions really do speak louder than words. But the introspective Cancer Full Moon highlights your 11th House of Friends, encouraging you to retreat into your cozy cocoon for a while. Nevertheless, a social context is still the best place to demonstrate your generosity of spirit. Compromise is key to making everyone happy, including yourself.

Knowing what's best is not a simple task, even if today's issues seem vaguely familiar. You might not want to put up with the same level of domestic-related stress now that the moody Cancer Full Moon floods your 10th House of Authority. If you are withholding your feelings, take a deep breath and release them out into the open. Just remember to be kind in your delivery process, even if a power struggle ensues. Ultimately, others will appreciate you going out on a limb to clear the air if you are just as anxious to listen as you are to speak.

Internal frustration seems to intensify today while direct communication helps to dissipate the energy. However, the emotionally powerful Cancer Full Moon rocks your 9th House of Truth, making it nearly impossible to disengage from a disagreement until it's resolved. Endless fighting doesn't lead to peace of mind; take your old wounds out of the picture and examine the situation from a fresh perspective. If you can create meaning in the midst of the current chaos, then everyone emerges as a winner.

You won't run from your feelings today, even if you wish you could walk away from an unpleasant situation. However, your current passion prevents you from just dropping an issue that's important to you. Although you possess realistic expectations now, the protective Cancer Full Moon illuminates your 8th House of Deep Sharing, cautioning you to withhold some of your darker emotions. Proceeding with patient persistence prevents encountering disappointment in the immediate future. Your unwavering optimism saves the day.

Your acute sense of reality may be tested today as you confront one of your most fundamental fears. The needy Cancer Full Moon stimulates your 7th House of Others, raising concerns that a relationship might draw you into an emotional abyss. More than anything, you don't want to fall victim to irrationality as you attempt to stay on the safe path of logic. Thankfully, you can step beyond your concerns to participate in the holiday festivities and still land safely back on Earth in the days ahead.

You might not feel so self-assured today because the supersensitive Cancer Full Moon lights up your 6th House of Service, filling you with angst about your current role. But keeping your emotions under wraps leaves everyone wondering why you're acting more distant now. Nevertheless, you don't want to share your experiences, even if someone asks. Temporarily shifting your attention away from your feelings to something more constructive is a clever deflection. Focus on the needs of those you love as you wait for your heart to sort itself out.

You may grow concerned if the uncontrollable swirl of complex emotions is moving too quickly. However, these are well-traveled waters for you Fish and it helps to remember that you are swimming in safe territory. Thankfully, the nurturing Cancer Full Moon brightens your 5th House of Creativity today, inspiring you to feel more positive -- even if you are also overwhelmed.
