Luckily, success is likely if you allow time for the right situation to gel organically, instead of pushing things ahead too soon. Trust in the magic of the universe and everything will work out fine.

Jump-starting a project may be a bigger challenge than you expected today, especially if you previously postponed similar creative tasks. You might even feel as if you hesitated too long, however, there is nothing to be gained by beating yourself up. Be satisfied  with whatever you accomplish now, even if it is less than you promised. You can make up for lost time tomorrow once your key planet, Mars, is freed from the grips of Saturn. No one can fault you if you're doing your best.

Previous obligations to loved ones may have impeded your progress on personal projects in recent months, and  once again they consume a large share of your energy. Naturally, you want to do what is expected of you and make everyone happy, but not at the expense of your own well being. Don't panic and overreact today, even if you can't see an obvious resolution in sight. Channel your frustration into increased effort. You will generate positive results and feel more empowered in the process.

It's often difficult for you speedy Geminis to slow down long enough to follow big plans through to their completion. Unfortunately, a simple project may have morphed into more than you expected. Now it's time for you to get closure on anything you might still have simmering on the back burner. Stick with your original goals for another few days and then reevaluate your recent progress before moving on. Sometimes the best things take a while to marinate before there is sweet success.

You may feel disheartened today if too many responsibilities prevent you from participating in social activities. But there's no reason to throw a pity party for yourself; you can either whine about your current dilemma or do something about it. Instead of trying to change things that are beyond your control, consider where your efforts will have the most immediate impact. You have more power to wield than you realize as long as you don't waste energy on the wrong goals. Choose your battles carefully, show everyone what you can do, and then reward yourself by joining in the fun.

Your efforts to make progress at home may be thwarted now, no matter how hard you apply yourself. It could seem as if creating change is as impossible as rolling bowling balls up a hill. In fact, you might hit rock bottom and wonder if it's really worth the trouble. Regardless of your lack of forward movement today, it's crucial to keep working, for you are setting the stage for larger opportunities that will come to fruition over the next year. Your faith is your saving grace.

You might have to shelve that big remodel or the plans to restructure a budget -- at least for a while. If you feel the tendrils of stress sneaking up on you, it's advisable to close your windows and lock your doors. Less action and more understanding is your mantra now. Place your big expectations a few months into the distance and your budding anxiety will vanish. No one is asking you to surrender your dreams, but taking a timeout gives everyone a chance to catch their breath. All is not lost; downshift and be ready to hit the gas when the next opportunity rolls around.

Your friends and relatives are not supporting you in the way that you wish today. However, appearances can be deceiving, especially if you are feeling insecure. Thankfully, no one is conspiring against you or judging your every move. In fact, you're all on the same team, even if it doesn't seem that way now. Instead of trying to guilt anyone into joining your cause, release everyone from any favors. If others jump in to help, it will be of their own free will instead of from a sense of obligation.

There's no time like the present to take a long hard look at the most persistent patterns of resistance in your life. In particular, search for an authority figure (Saturn) who is stirring up trouble, possibly eliciting feelings of anger and resentment (Mars). Reexamine your intentions with an objective eye, but don't push the issues now. Although there might be very little progress made today, the most problematic situation will likely resolve on its own. Change is your friend.

A steady hand might be required today as you pursue artsy or crafty activities since your energy is skipping all over the place. Naturally, you prefer to be playing on a tropical island or embarking on a spiritual quest, but there will be plenty of time for adventure at a later date. Continue to place one foot ahead of the other for now. Start a small project you can finish instead of a giant one that is left undone. Creativity plus practicality equals success.

Normally you possess the good sense to be aware of the motives behind your actions, and sometimes you even know the results before anyone else. However, you may be feeling a bit lost today without your moral compass navigating the way. Your recent goals might have been so far out of line that you are receiving an overdue reality check. It's one thing to reflect back on all the ground you've covered, but things are not panning out to your expectations. Patience, grasshopper; your life is a glorious work in progress.

Making choices between your personal life and your career is growing more stressful as time wears on. There is another factor in the mix now that confuses your decision-making process even more. Someone may be resisting your efforts while someone else is encouraging you to fight back. Unfortunately, outright conflict doesn't help you reach your goals any faster. Lay low for a bit before pushing forward. Keeping your options open enables you to continue soliciting advice and gathering information. Better safe than sorry.

Your schedule has grown so complex that it feels like you are losing control of the details. You might even believe that you can't honor all your commitments in the limited amount of time allotted. If you somehow managed to over-extended your resources, it's better to explain yourself and cut back now than to wait until it's too late. Setting priorities and establishing boundaries today create a healthier balance in your life tomorrow.

You are raring to go now and you're eager to tell everyone about your upcoming creative projects while the Moon is kicking up her heels in your 5th House of Self-Expression. However, instead of receiving the applause you expect today, your plans may fall on deaf ears. An unappreciative audience could send you back to the drawing board, requiring you to rethink your big ideas. But don't view this delay as a defeat: use it as opportunity to improve your chances for success.

Taking care of the chores you should have done yesterday will be less burdensome once you actually shift into gear. However, you may feel as if cosmic forces are working against you now, preventing you from initiating action. Unfortunately, finding the source of these elusive pockets of resistance is challenging. It's tough to change your attitude once you realize completing even a simple task is complicated today. Thankfully, your persistence will open doors that were previously locked.

People seem to enter your life today for the express purpose of encouraging you to take the next step on your journey. But this support may come with a mixed message because following someone else's advice isn't very straightforward now. You're tempted to impetuously rush ahead, but complicated logistics and unwieldy red tape are likely to hinder your progress. Slow down and tend to details that need handling one more time. One can't succeed on inspiration alone.

It's nearly impossible to stick to your plans today, even if you believe that your abundant physical energy and unwavering willpower are enough to power you through any unexpected obstacles. Unfortunately, brute strength won't be sufficient; you must work smarter, not harder. Start by recognizing the limits of your knowledge; faking it will only damage the trust others place in you. Expressing your vulnerability can deepen the bonds between you and those you love.

Be wary if anyone attempts to convince you that he or she is right and you are wrong. Other people's arguments may be so persuasive now that you might be tempted to drop your agenda for theirs. Unfortunately, your disdain for details can have you moving so fast that you overlook an important fact or two. Give yourself time to think through any change in plans before you find yourself backed into a corner. A dose of common sense prevents an unnecessary headache later on.

You are leaning towards jumping into a project or organizing a social event, but you might be afraid of someone's negative judgment today. You prefer to do things your way but may not have as much say in the matter as you wish. Your decision doesn't allow for any ambiguity now, requiring a yes-or-no answer. Think very carefully about your desired outcome before choosing whether or not you're willing to sacrifice your freedom. Sometimes the path of integrity is a lonely one.

You might not get as much time to yourself today as you were hoping while the Moon shines in your 11th House of Social Networking. Everything and everyone that passes your way is just another bundle of possibilities, making it challenging to turn down any invitations for business or pleasure. Instead of  attempting to limit your options now, follow the course of least resistance. If you stop trying to control the outcome, you could discover something wonderful right in front of your nose.

You are super-jazzed about turning a corner and starting a new chapter with your work and family, yet you could end up spending too much time trying to keep everyone happy now. You might not be able to work on the larger shift until you open up more free time, especially if you're juggling a number of mundane issues and projects today. In the meantime, balance your anticipation for something different with the constancy of familiar routines. Maintaining a tight schedule is key; timing is everything.

You act as if you have all the answers today as you supply family and friends with a constant stream of political and philosophical repartee. But in spite of all your bravado, you just want to emotionally connect with those closest to you. Unfortunately, you could get carried away in an argument about a topic that's not even important to you. You aren't fooling anyone; admit what you don't know and engage others on the basis of honest interactions about subjects that really matter.

You may discover a few new interesting things to do with your time at home today, enabling you to retreat behind your castle walls without growing bored. It's fun when there are so many possibilities available, but it can be tricky to narrow your choices and just pick one to pursue now. Don't blame your indecisiveness on anyone else. You will feel more like yourself again once you choose a path and begin following the whims of your heart.

You're feeling quite positive about your current opportunities now, but your friends might not see things in the same light. Although everyone seems to have a different idea of how your life should unfold, it's pointless arguing with anyone else about subjects that are your own personal business. Instead of escalating a war of words, politely excuse yourself from the conversation. Setting clear boundaries gives all those involved a chance to cool off before you revisit the topic at a later date. Maintain the peace at all costs.

If you recently started to put a big idea into motion, today's bold Leo Moon gives your momentum another boost. Although you possess plenty of energy now, it still could be challenging to sustain it over an extended period of time. Even if you're ready to take on the world in a moment, don't burn up your resources all at once. Operate in a methodical manner so you can finish what you start with a smile on your face.

You could hold such idealistic expectations today that nothing in the real world will satisfy your ambitions. Fortunately, your fate is in your own hands because you can change the game now by changing your mind about what you want. You don't have to settle for anything less if you simply re-frame your idea of what makes you happy. Touching people with your generous heart is more meaningful than making sure everything goes exactly as planned. Giving the gift of love will add the magic back into your life.

Putting on a winning performance for your friends or family seems like a wonderful way to continue the holiday festivities. But you might inadvertently create unnecessary waves by taking over and doing everything your way. Considering someone's preferences may not be enough to smooth over any ruffled feathers now. The real lesson is that this doesn't need to be a one-person show. Instead, involving others in the planning process from the start fosters the spirit of the season that's beyond the reach of any individual.

You may be running around in circles preparing for a social gathering, but you're also seeking a more spiritual approach to the holiday season. You're often the life of the party because of your witty  conversation, but now you're searching for something more than sparkly lights and transient smiles. You can transform this time by slowing down and focusing on the heart connections between people instead of making everyone laugh with your clever stories. Magic is yours for the making.

Spending lots of money is not the only way to show others how much you care. However, the demonstrative Leo Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Money might tempt you to spring for an extravagant display anyhow. Nevertheless, if you want to be taken seriously today, don't give in to an overly dramatic gesture of affection. Obviously, the bright lights could draw an extra round of applause, but acting thoughtfully will earn you the appreciation and respect you desire. The gifts that matter the most come from the heart.

Your resolute follow-through is your ticket to success today because fantastic ideas about entertaining coworkers or celebrating with your family won't be sufficient unless you deliver something special. It's essential to plan every detail out in  advance, since there are too many variables in the mix now. Of course, there will always be factors outside of your control; honestly, you are the only one who expects perfection. Luckily, if "Plan A" doesn't work, there are twenty-five more letters in the alphabet.

Your cool ability to minimize the end-of-the-year excitement might make others wonder if your behavior is Scrooge-like. However, closer examination reveals that you're simply saving the best celebration for last. You're happy to ride a building wave of anticipation right into the New Year. Instead of talking about your intentions today, let your actions speak for themselves. Open up your heart and demonstrate your affection while you have the chance. Tomorrow is another day.

Hanging out with those you love is more fun than anything else now. However, it may be challenging to reconcile your desire to break free of some holiday traditions this year while still remaining open to what the rest of the group wants. Although you might not see a clear solution to your dilemma, remember there's no single correct path to take today. Being flexible enough to go along with the flow will probably make everyone happier in the long run.

There may be an established schedule of events today and everyone is depending on you to adhere to the plan. Unfortunately, there's a small margin for error today because the fixed Leo Moon in your 10th House of Responsibility gives you a very specific notion of what you need to do. But even if you suddenly have a different impulse, it's wiser now to just let it pass. Save your ideas for another day when others will be more amenable to a radical point of view. In the meantime, demonstrating your ability to be a team player adds to everyone's satisfaction, including your own.

There are many ways to ensure the holidays are a memorable experience for all, yet they will be over so fast that you need to fine-tune your options quickly. Fortunately, you are an instant inspiration to your friends and family because your joyful attitude is so contagious. Although you may have already handed out traditional tokens of affection, you can still create a positive impact by shifting your focus onto establishing lasting emotional connections. Gifts of emotional and spiritual intention are the ones that outlast the others.

You're weary of being the one who always takes charge when no one else steps up to the plate. But no one seems to realize how much this external pressure weighs on you. However, you almost don't care that others are relying on now. Instead of just burying your feelings, talk to someone you trust. Your anxiety will be less of a nuisance if you can get your concerns off your chest. Surrounding yourself with those who love you, rather than those who love what you do, is the best way to enjoy yourself today.

You may experience a perplexing series of conflicting desires today. The big-hearted Leo Moon is hanging out in your 7th House of Others, reflecting your need to be actively involved in your relationships now. But several planets in hardworking Capricorn are traveling through your 12th House of Secrets, urging you to stay out of sight. Although wanting to be seen and being invisible are mutually exclusive, you can still find clever ways to honor both extremes.

You don't mind jumping in and helping your family, friends, or community as long as you feel like you're a valuable member of a team. But you might not be as eager to contribute to the cause if you are sitting on the sidelines. Fortunately, others seem to go out of their way to include you today, making it more fun for you to participate. Focusing on an altruistic goal allows you to enjoy a true sense of camaraderie. Consider this a gentle cosmic reminder of how much you receive when you give.

You won't have much of an opportunity to rest today if you left too many tasks undone yesterday. Nothing is to be gained by worrying about the outcome; instead, just get busy with your chores right off the bat. But even if you don't have any pressing obligations to fulfill now, you might still be too serious-minded to completely chill out. Thankfully, there will be plenty of time to play later on when you're in the mood. The math is simple; the sooner you get started with what's on your plate, the more likely you are to finish.

Although you're distracted by the pursuit of pleasure now, you might need to wait until a later date to actually obtain your object of desire. In the meantime, it's prudent to direct your attention to more mundane tasks. You're better off setting a measurable goal early in the day and then diligently tracking your progress. Even if you would be happier doing something else today, you can still derive sweet satisfaction from your list of accomplishments. Save the fun and games for when you can play without guilt.

Of course, you know that you should be grateful for the many blessings in your life, but you can't avoid feeling annoyed if you're blocked from chasing your dreams today. Your natural tendency is to sow your ideas like Johnny Appleseed; however, it's more useful now to keep them to yourself until you are certain you have found fertile ground. Even after testing the soil and waiting for the right temperature, take your time to share your thoughts and carefully nurture them until they reach fruition.

You could be overly protective of those you love as you attempt to balance your concerns with their needs. You might not even notice that you have overstepped your role in your haste to do the right thing. Although you want to initiate action for someone else's benefit, consider that your interference may not be in their interest. Sometimes a temporary setback or emotional hurt is the best teacher even if it is hard to witness. Taking responsibility for your actions inspires others to do the same.

Your life may already be in a state of flux now that a significant cycle is reaching a turning point. You know you need to narrow your focus, but you're receiving mixed signals from the cosmos. Instead of closing down your mind in fear of making the wrong choice, visualize all the things that make your heart happy. You don't have to do anything at all about your fantasies today if you commit to executing your new strategy tomorrow. Your dreams are the roots of your future.

Your creative juices are flowing and your drive for self-expression is strong, but you might not be confident enough to fully trust your impulses today. Instead of taking an unnecessary risk, play things more conservatively for now. After all, you're not interested in an easy come, easy go solution. Demonstrate your wisdom by building on your previous accomplishments while still progressing on your long-term goals.

Although you're quite adept at balancing work and play, relaxing can be challenging today until you complete your unfinished business. Free-floating anxiety may throw you off schedule now, especially if you believe that you are running out of time. Fortunately, an impending deadline is more flexible than you think; instead of wasting your energy on panic and despair, just breathe deeply and continue doing the very best job you can. A moment or two of meditation is the fastest trick to regaining your center.

People may be making too many demands on your time these days. They might not think twice before asking you for what they want, even if their neediness poses a major inconvenience. It's hard to tell if your associates are aware of the impact of their behavior, so you can't really accuse them of being selfish. However, your loyalty runs deep enough that if a friend requests your help now, you will be there in an instant. Follow your instincts today, but remember that setting healthy boundaries won't detract from supporting those you love.

You're so concerned now about what others think of you today that you tiptoe around deciding what is appropriate in your current social sphere. However, you're not any less confident of your judgment just because it differs from the crowd. But you really want to be a team player and will sacrifice some of your personal needs now for the good of the family, group, or community. Honorable intentions bring positive results.

You might be feeling a bit ornery today, especially if an acquaintance is pushing your buttons. You're short on patience, especially when it comes to situations that aren't your immediate concern. You're not willing to waste your time on trivial matters just because someone else does. But don't be too quick to judge others; politely playing within the rules of social etiquette now will serve you well. Kindness is key.

You're likely to jump to conclusions now, unless you consciously slow down your mental process. But there's a special trick to making this proactive strategy work; you don't have to change the speed of your thinking. Instead, just increase the amount of time between a thought and the moment you respond. You'll be surprised with the difference you can make if you slowly count to ten before saying a word. A moment of patience in the height of emotion saves many moments of regret.

Someone you admire may stubbornly stand in the way of your satisfaction today, and you might not even have a clue as to their motives. Your first impulse is to ignore the whole situation or just laugh it off to reduce the pressure. But instead of making light of a potential problem, find the courage to initiate a conversation in a nonthreatening manner. Nearly all complicated dynamics are easier to resolve once you commit to handling it together. Just remember that it takes two willing participants to tango.

There may be danger ahead if everything appears to glitter like gold in the sunlight. Nevertheless, it's still best to imagine the positive possibilities instead of focusing on the negative contingencies. Affirmations are extremely potent today, yet acknowledging what could go wrong enables you to recognize a problem before it becomes critical. Addressing the weakest part of your plan does not have to turn you into a pessimist. You create your future with every word you utter and every action you take.

Receiving long-overdue recognition from your coworkers or your boss is a sweet reward today. To add icing to the cake, a delayed raise or promotion could finally come through as you had hoped. Obviously, being appreciated for your contributions is heartwarming, but accepting praise might also be challenging now as your key planet Venus stumbles into suspicious Pluto. Nevertheless, succumbing to fear of success is a waste of your talent. Brush off your uncertainty, smile and proudly celebrate your accomplishments.

It's as easy as pie to start the day off right by conjuring up a fantastic plan, and then keep making it even bigger and better by increments. Unfortunately, your current desire to inflate nearly everything could turn a very sensible idea into a strategy that becomes so grandiose that it's impractical. A healthy helping of self-restraint is your key to satisfaction. Less is more is your mantra now, whether you like it or not.

You're so intuitive today that you can accidentally confuse an idealistic fantasy with reality. It requires constant vigilance to remain objective now, even if you have a plethora of facts at your disposal. But don't believe for a moment that you own a corner on the truth; even the most unbiased data can become tinted with subjective emotions. Color outside the lines when you dream about your ideal future. Just be sure to also pay close attention to your heart in the present moment.

Distinguishing the real world from your subconscious mind is tricky today because the Moon's opposition to magical Neptune means the veil that separates these two worlds is very thin now. You are entering a creative zone, but the spirit realm feels so close that you could bump into a few ghosts of your own. At first, your visions might seem to have little in common with reality, but don't dismiss them prematurely. Ignoring your dreams can stifle your self-expression, while allowing your imagination to flow naturally should be enough to keep you inspired for weeks.

You might not be able to complete everything that you start today, even if you planned to work hard and stay late. Unfortunately, you may underestimate the time and resources necessary to finish your assignments. Managing your own disappointment will be challenging enough if you don't deliver what you promise, but dealing with others now is even harder. Thankfully, you can rely on your intuition while the Moon is in your sign. Stay alert like a fox, and don't make any commitments you can't keep.

You are still walking a fine line, trying to juggle serious responsibilities with your optimistic hopes and dreams. However, you might be afraid of exhausting yourself now, since you know there's still more work coming your way. Perhaps you would be wise to squeeze in a bit of downtime while you can. Just remember, denial isn't a useful strategy, so be aware of the consequences of your choices before you land in trouble. You may not be able to plan for every contingency, but with a little luck you can shift the odds in your favor.

Step back from your regular routine today so you can reevaluate your overall fiscal condition. Venus is traveling through your 2nd House of Personal Resources, giving you an opportunity to put your finances in order. But don't procrastinate, for it will take time to see the results of your current actions. At least make sure that your accounts are in order, bills are paid and you're ready for any unexpected expenses that may come your way. A little preparation now comes in handy on a rainy day.

Others don't know what to make of you when you're socially withdrawn, yet a recent contemplative phase is coming to a close. Vivacious Venus saunters into your sassy fire sign today for a three-week visit, boosting your charisma and emphasizing interpersonal dynamics. But your emotional intensity might be too much for others to handle. Thankfully, your feelings will become more manageable over the next week. Nevertheless, don't try to hide your changing moods; ultimately, expressing the truth as you experience it is all anyone can ask.

Expecting too much from a coworker or loved one today can set the stage for major disappointment. Nevertheless, you probably won't be the one to drop the ball if you realistically assess what you can do before you begin. Even if you don't want to hurt anyone's feelings, over-committing isn't nice in the long run. Being totally honest is kinder on all involved than having to clean up a mess you make by promising the stars. Keep things simple and adopt an attitude of gratitude right from the start.

Others see you as a positive force in their lives while charming Venus sets up camp in your 11th House of Social Networks. Even if you struggle with people's interference in your personal affairs, you can still project a cheerful image. Your friends are happy to see you doing so well now, but they don't know the entire story. Sharing your uncertainties may feel like a risky venture, but it can also remove barriers to cultivating deeper emotional connections. Strike while the iron is hot.

You might grow uneasy today if you're running into trouble maintaining meaningful boundaries. The Moon is shining her light in your 7th House of Relationships, attracting you to the emotional comfort of a partnership, but you also need your freedom, too. Don't be afraid to reassert your independence as long as you aren't trying to avoid an important issue. Consciously flowing with the currents should help to reduce the resistance to your opinions. Love is best given with no strings attached.

Although you might not do anything special today, you will likely keep busy imagining the biggest and wildest party ever. Your visions can take you anywhere today as irrepressible Uranus excites pleasure-oriented Venus in your 9th House of Infinite Possibilities. But you may be able to satisfy your restlessness without all the fuss and drama, so don't risk everything trying to make your dreams come true yet. Knowing when to turn a fantasy into reality can make the difference between disappointment and happiness. Believe it or not, joy is within your grasp.

Your big ideas regarding a hot romance sound intriguing on paper, but they may quickly fade if you end up engaging in an emotional conflict with your love interest. You prefer an easygoing exchange of pleasantries before there's any mention of feelings, but you could be confronted with a radically different point of view today. Fortunately, you might just receive the intimate connection you are seeking if you possess the courage to stick around and stay present in the conversation. You can't find love unless you open your heart.

A friend or lover may tell you more about his or her desires now than you ever wanted to know. Although it's wonderful that others trust you with their secrets, they might not stop talking long enough to find out if you are interested in the subject matter. Sometimes, your curiosity enjoys acquiring as much information as possible, but today you could be wishing that you didn't seem so approachable. Unfortunately, there's no quick fix; your best strategy is to politely change the topic of conversation when the opportunity arises.

You need to limit your thinking to those activities that matter the most today. If you believe you can do everything, you won't be able to take care of your important obligations. Nevertheless, you're still tempted to escape from the pressures of work early by imagining all the fun things you could be doing instead. Thankfully, your chance of finding a pleasurable distraction continues to grow throughout the day. Don't make social commitments until the last minute; decisions made too far in advance can negatively impact your production. Finish your work and then reward yourself with the celebration of your choice.

A shortage of excess cash could put a crimp in your New Year's Eve party plans now that the Moon is tap-dancing through your 2nd House of Money. It may be that you don't have enough funds to splurge in the style you prefer. But a scarcity of time is yet another obstacle that prevents you from spontaneously engaging in an event simply for the fun of it. Reevaluate your resources before making plans you can't keep. Happily, generosity of the heart can be demonstrated in a multitude of ways without spending a penny.

You might have plans to invite some friends over for a toast to the New Year, or you could be heading out on the town for some holiday fun. However, managing family obligations must come first. Your relatives and loved ones are depending on you now, so you can't let them down. Nevertheless, nothing is gained by punishing yourself if you're unable to fulfill everyone's expectations. Fortunately, anyone who knows you can easily tell that your heart is in the right place.

You're ready to toss your schedule aside today so you can be more spontaneous, but it will be nearly impossible to forget your previous commitments. Others may not realize how much you have chosen to take on during the holiday season, because you can easily appear quite cavalier about all your responsibilities. Nevertheless, you are undoubtedly your own worst critic now. Finding a middle ground between extremely productive and totally lazy is your best position.

Your main interest in social interactions now is limited to those that deepen your understanding of life and broaden your spiritual purpose. It's crucial to build flexibility into your plans because you may want to change your mind at the last minute. It's not that you are avoiding your friends; it's just that indulging in some quiet solitude sounds more appealing than feeling lost in a crowd. Don't let anyone talk you into something you don't want to do. Cultivating your inner voice often means taking the road less traveled.

You might spend more time than you prefer in the service of others, but there isn't a viable way to completely avoid your duties today. Luckily, sweet Venus is dancing in your sign now, helping you to maintain a positive demeanor in the face of challenges. You want be seen as the hero who saves the day by going the extra mile, but you didn't expect how much work that entails. Extraordinary things can happen if you temporarily set your own needs aside and act from the heart.

You're lucky that big things come in small packages today because your attention span is somewhat limited by your previous obligations. Nevertheless, you still have an infinite amount of space to wander around in the far corners of your imagination, regardless of your socially pre-determined role. Taking care of business can still be productive now, even if your thoughts are lost in fantasy. Actively playing in both worlds fuels your creativity and your success at the same time.

Fresh waves of cosmic energy wash onto the shores of your awareness today. There's magic in the unrealized potential of the new year ahead and you may be feeling quite optimistic about upcoming social activities. Unfortunately, your unbridled passion can run into practical considerations, preventing you from doing everything on your list. But don't let discouragement overtake your enthusiasm. Just meditate on the old adage that good things come to those who wait.

Keeping your desires in check can be a real challenge as your plans for tonight spin out of control. But rather than arguing with someone who tries to help you see the folly of your ways, demonstrate your wisdom by listening to their constructive advice. No one is raining on your parade; it's just that stretching the limits too far could ruin your fun. Stirring a pinch of caution into the mix actually improves your chances of having one of the best New Year's Eve ever.
